verse_text: Yeezuu yaabɔɔ wɔɔ ba n nɩ: Yeezuu ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, cir Davɩd Nyɩ m, Abraham do gʋaa m sɔ.
Abraham n Izakkɩ yɩ,
Ziida n Farɛɛs kan Zaaraa kɩ yɩ, ŋ da m Tamaar m, Farɛɛs n Ɛsrɔm yɩ, Ɛsrɔm n Aram yɩ,
Aram n Aminadaab yɩ, Aminadaab n Naasɔɔn yɩ, Naasɔɔn n Salmɔɔn yɩ,
Salmɔɔn n Boozɩ yɩ, a da m Rahab m, Boozɩ n Zobɛɛd yɩ, a da m Rutɩ m, Zobɛɛd n Yesee yɩ,
Yesee n cir Davɩd yɩ, Davɩd n Salomɔɔn yɩ, a da nyɩnta Iirii lʋ,
Salomɔɔn n Roboam yɩ, Roboam n Abɩya yɩ, Abɩya n Azaa yɩ,
Azaa n Zozafat yɩ, Zozafat n Zooram yɩ, Zooram n Ozɩyas yɩ,
Ozɩyas n Zowatan yɩ, Zowatan n Akaazɩ yɩ, Akaazɩ n Ezekɩyas yɩ,
Ezekɩyas n Manase yɩ, Manase n Amɔɔn yɩ, Amɔɔn n Zozɩyas yɩ,
Zozɩyas n Zekonɩyas kan a dannɔ kɩ yɩ. A n a ga kʋ ʋ kan Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa tarɛ dɔmɩm bɩ kɩ.
Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Zekonɩyas Salatɩyɛl yɩ, Salatɩyɛl n Zorobabɛl yɩ,
Zorobabɛl n Abiyud yɩ, Abiyud n Eliyakim yɩ, Eliyakim n Azɔɔr yɩ,
Azɔɔr n Sadɔk yɩ, Sadɔk n Akim yɩ, Akim n Eliyud yɩ,
Eliyud n Eleyazaar yɩ, Eleyazaar n Matan yɩ, Matan n Zakɔɔb yɩ,
Zakɔɔb n Maarii zim Zozɛf yɩ, Maarii bɩ do ɩ Yeezuu yɩ n n'a birm Krista.

Yaabɔɔ wɔɔ haay lɛ a zɛ kʋ ra bueeresi-si. A n a sa Abraham ma an ta m Davɩd ra bueeresi, an a sa Davɩd ma an ta m Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa ma bueeresi, an a sa Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa ma an ta m Krista ra bueeresi.
Yeezuu yɩrɛ bɩ zaa ba n nɩ: A da Maarii bɩ, nyɩnta a ʋ Zozɛf jaan, bɩ, an lɛɛ ka kʋ Maarii n a ba Zozɛf lʋ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka Maarii n jɩsɩ sa.
A jaan Zozɛf bɩ kʋ gʋaa mɩŋŋa m bɩ, a n a ŋʋa k'a a da nyannɩ ʋ y. A n a hɔɔn da k'a wɔ saa kʋ gɔsɩ b'a dɔ y.
K'a n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Zuuba Malɛɛka bʋr zi nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zozɛf, Davɩd do gʋaa, ɩ bɩ nyi ba k'ɩ Maarii sa ɩ ba ɩ lʋ y, bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa y'a ka, an nɩ jɩsɩ bɩ m,
a nyɩ yɩm yar, k'ɩ tɔ ka Yeezuu, bala, a m n'a do bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ a mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ."
Naa do woo••• naa, ba ʋ kʋ meerbaa kʋ Woso a ba kan a lɛsinnɩsorazaa lɛ kɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ.
A ba n nɩ: nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ k'a n yar dɔ bɩ jɩsɩ sim, an nyɩ yɩ yar, n y'a tɔ karɛ Emanʋwɛl, a jɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Woso ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ.
Zozɛf k'a bɩ gu hinceem ma bɩ, a hɔ kʋ Zuuba malɛɛka b'a hɩ m bɩ ba: A Maarii gaa, an a ba a lʋ,
bɩ, a n a dɔ lʋ y, an ta an aa dɔmɩm k'a nyɩyar bɩ yɩ ʋ bɩ ku, an a tɔ ka Yeezuu.
Yeezuu bɩ, yɩ a ʋ Betelehɛm ʋ Zidee kʋ ʋ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ dɔmɩm ʋ, bɩ hɔdonno a to dɔjɩr ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr Zerizalɛm ʋ,
ŋnɩ laaka da: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir k'a yɩ b'ɩ ka? Wɔɔ monyaa yɩ dɔjɩr ʋ bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ n bʋr k'ʋ b'a da ʋ."
Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a da bɔ ʋ kan Zerizalɛm zannɔ kɩ haay.
A n wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an laaka da ŋ han kʋ niŋŋə kʋ Krista bɩ n nɩ yɩŋ ʋ bɩ ma.
Brɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: Betelehɛm ʋ Zidee kʋ ʋ, bala, hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa b'a hɩ bɩ n naa do.
B'ɩbɩɩ Betelehɛm, Zidee kʋ, ɩbɩɩ bɛɛ m poore Zidee kʋrɔ gʋtɔɔ wɔɔ barla y. Bala, cir bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ bireyaa ʋ, an ka Israyɛl mɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ.
A m bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ n hɔdonno wɔɔ bir sɛɛrɛ, an laaka da ŋ han dɔmɩm kʋ monyaa bɩ bɔ ʋ bɩ ma.
A n ŋ nyɔɔ Betelehɛm ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta a laaka da nyɩ bɩ mim ma mɩŋŋa, k'a nyɩ bɩ yɩ, k'a a wusigə a b'a hɩ mɔɔ m, kʋ m ta m aa da ʋ sɔ."
Cir bɩ k'a naa hɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hʋr, ta kʋ ŋ nawʋm bɩ, monyaa kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋn'a yɩ dɔjɩr b'ɩ tarɛ ŋ lɛɛ, an ta an aa jɩm lɛɛ kʋ nyɩ bɩ n ta ʋ bɩ burə ʋ.
Monyaa bɩ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ heer yɩ nyɩnta gʋta.
Ŋ gasʋ cɛ b'ʋ, ŋn'aa nyɩ bɩ yɩ kan a da Maarii kɩ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ a taa, ŋnɩ yaa da m, bɩ jɛ ʋ, ŋn'a mɔdrɔ wɔɔ hʋr, ŋnɩ gan wʋ ma: Sarma m kan tidəər nyisi kɩ, mɩɩr kɩ.
Bɩ Woso a hɩ ŋ nɩ nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ bɔ Hɩrɔɔdɩ zi y. Naa minto bɩ, brɔɔ zaa vanta sa ŋnɩ doo a kʋ ʋ.

A hʋr kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka a hɩnka Zozɛf m nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti ɩ nyɩ bɩ gaa kan a da bɩ kɩ, ɩ ɩ si, ɩ ta Eziptɩ ʋ, nyɩnta b'ʋ k'an ta an aa dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ m yarɛ m meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ ku, bala, Hɩrɔɔdɩ y'a kam nyɩ bɩ ma, k'a zɛ."
Zozɛf n wuti, an nyɩ bɩ kan a da bɩ kɩ gaa gunuu ʋ, an a hʋr an ta Eziptɩ ʋ.
A gɔɔta b'ʋ an ta, an Hɩrɔɔdɩ garɛ ku, kʋ Woso meerbaa k'a ba kan a lɛsinnɩsorazaa lɛ kɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ. Mɔɔ m Nyɩ bɩ bir, k'an bɔ Eziptɩ ʋ.

Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a b'a dɔ a ʋ, hɔdonno wɔɔ a yamba a m bɩ, a wuti nɔmaa gandaara m. A n gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ Betelehɛm ʋ kan kʋrɔ vantɔɔ k'a a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'aa nyɩnɔ poorero yaarɔ kʋ ŋ dɔɔraa hɩɩya gɛɛ ŋ n a ku rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ. Amba hɔdonno wɔɔ a hɩ m, nyɩnta k'a ʋ, an laaka da k'a nyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm dɔ bɩ ma.
Naa ma bɩ, hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zeremii a hɩ bɩ kʋ yɩ, a ʋ:
N zeedarɛ ma Ramaa ʋ, nyikəre kan heerzarlɛ gʋta kɩ: Rasɛl nɩ nyi karɛ a nyɩnɔ minto, a lɛ baa kʋ n n'a wɔ zɩnzɛ a nɩ y, nyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga bɩ tɔ ma.
Hɩrɔɔdɩ garɛ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka a hɩnka Zozɛf m nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ Eziptɩ ʋ.
A n meer ba kan kɩ, a ʋ: "Wuti, ɩ nyɩ bɩ kan a da bɩ kɩ gaa ɩ ɩ wusigə, ɩ ta Israyɛl tara ra. Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam ma k'a nyɩ bɩ meeyaa bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gɩnga."
Zozɛf n wuti, an nyɩ bɩ kan a da bɩ kɩ gaa, an ta Israyɛl ʋ.
Bɩ, Zozɛf k'a a ma, n ʋ, Arkelayus nɩ cirbəə m Zidee ʋ a zɩ Hɩrɔɔdɩ bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, nyibəə a nyasʋ k'an ta b'ʋ bɩ kɩ, bɩ Woso meer ba kan kɩ nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ, an ta Galilee kʋ ʋ.
A n aa nyɩnta kʋ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma Nazarɛtɩ ʋ b'ʋ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ, ŋ ʋ: N y'a birm Nazarɛtɩ gʋaa.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ bɩ, Zaan-Batiisi bʋr Zidee poo nɔ ʋ, an nɩ Woso lemim pa dam.
A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a a bɔ a taam, k'a sugur yɛ, bala, Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ."
A mɩŋŋa wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ ma, a ʋ: Gʋaa leer nɩ bɔm poo nɔ ʋ: k'a Zuuba zaa banka, k'a zaa fɔɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩmbanka kʋ ŋ nɩ yɩ tɩrga.
Zaan bɩ, yoonde ka huu a a du a ma, an kʋmbar sa an a so a ʋ, bɩsɩnɔ kan zɔɔn kɩ n a hɔbɩrɛ.
A m naa, Zerizalɛm, Zidee kʋ bɩ haay, kɔ k'a tɔ m Zʋrdɛn kʋrɔ wɔɔ haay nɩ tam zi,
ŋ n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ hɩrɛ, Zaan nɩ batɛm karɛ ŋ ʋ Zʋrdɛn kɔ ʋ.
K'a farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ yɩ ŋn'ɩ zɛm gʋta batɛm sire bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɩnnɔ kʋsɩrɔ do, nka y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a ʋ, a a si Woso nɔmaa gʋta k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ lɛɛ?
K'a zibəə k'a n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, awɔɔ heerlʋrlɛ yɩ bɩ ba.
B'a b'a hɔɔn da a ʋ, awɔɔ zɩ m Abraham nɩ y. Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Woso a da ma an jaarɔ nɔɔn duro wusigə an ŋ ba Abraham nyɩnɔ.
Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, n sɩga banka k'an gɔrɔ zɩnzɛ ra ŋ məsi ma, gɔ niŋŋə k'a bɩr nyɩ mɩŋŋa darɛ y, n y'a zɛm la, n n a da sɛ ʋ."
"Mɔɔ ɩ batɛm karɛ awɔɔ ʋ hi ʋ a heer k'awɔɔ lʋr bɩ minto. Bɩ, an nɩ zɛm mɔɔ jɛ ʋ bɩ paŋŋa lɛ da mɔɔ ra, mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʋsɔrɔ waa a gannɔ ʋ y, a batɛm karɛ awɔɔ ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan sɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
A y'a gʋr m a wɔ ʋ, a y'a tʋyaa waarɛ an a hɔyaa gʋr an a zar sɩ ʋ, bɩ, a sɛ k'a bɩr lihim bɩ nyam puur b'ʋ."
A m bɩ, Yeezuu n a to Galilee ʋ, an bʋr Zʋrdɛn ʋ Zaan zi, k'a bɩ batɛm si.
Bɩ, Zaan a gu an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ ga m, ɩ batɛm ka mɔɔ ʋ, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ya, ɩ nɩ zɛm mɔɔ zi!"
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "A to k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʋ naa ma, bala, naa n'a karɛ, wɔɔ n hɔ haay k'an tɩrga Woso ma bɩ ba." Zaan n yɛ kɛɛrɛ.
Yeezuu k'a batɛm bɩ si bɩ, a bɔ hi b'ʋ. A m bɩ, brama n a gʋ, an Woso Ɛspri yɩ an nɩ zerle, am cirpʋʋrɛ hɔ bɩ m an bɩ zer la.
Leer n a to mim ʋ an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ba mɔɔ Nyɩ m na. Mɔɔ ŋʋa gʋta. A mɔɔ nɔ yɩ paan•••."
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ ta Yeezuu m poo nɔ ʋ, kʋ Sʋtaana n a gɩnga ma.
K'a a lɛ kʋsɩ dɔmɩm busi sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ bɩ, nɔ b'a nyasʋ.
Sʋtaana n a zɔ ma, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ ka kʋ jaarɔ nɔɔn duro n a ba hɔbɩrɛ."
Bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Hɔbɩrɛ bɛɛ gʋaa n'a bɩm bala k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba y, bɩ lemim haay k'a nɩ bɔm Woso lɛ ʋ bɩ m."
Sʋtaana n a gaa an ta m Zerizalɛm ʋ, an a der Wosocɛ bɩ mim ʋ.
A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m k'ɩ hɩr ɩ ɩ da tara ʋ, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: A lɛrɔ karɛ a malɛɛkarɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'ɩbɩɩ busu a wɔrɔ ʋ k'ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ gəm zɛ y."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba sɔ, n ʋ: Ɩ bɩ da Zuuba ɩ Woso lɛ ʋ y."
Sʋtaana n a ya, an ta m ci gʋta mim ʋ, an durnya cirbəəro kʋrɔ hɩnka m kan ŋ paŋŋa kɩ,
an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ kukurə zɛ mɔɔ taa, ɩ mɔɔ da ʋ, mɔɔ naa haay karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ."
Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩ jɛ bɔ mɔɔ jɩr ʋ, Sʋtaana! Bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: Zuuba Woso y'a deem ɩbɩɩ nɩ yaa dam nɩ, ɩ da ʋ."
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Sʋtaana n a bɔ a jɛ ʋ, lɛɛm bɩ malɛɛkarɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʋ.
Yeezuu k'a a ma, n ʋ, n Zaan du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ bɩ, a a hʋr, an ta Galilee ʋ.
A n gɔɔta Nazarɛtɩ ʋ y. A hʋr a ʋ, an aa nyɩnta Kapɛrnawum ʋ. Kʋ m bɩ, an nɩ Galilee higʋta lɛ ra Zabɩlɔn kan Nɛftalii kɩ kʋrɔ wɔɔ barla.
Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro n kʋ yɩ.
Zabɩlɔn tara, Nɛftalii tara, higʋta zaa, kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zʋrdɛn kɔ gəm la kan doro vantɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Galilee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Do k'a nɩ monsigə ʋ bɩ lɛɛgure gandaara yɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛ kʋ ʋ kan zɛ hinni kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, lɛɛgure bʋr brɔɔ minto.
A n a sa naa ma bɩ, Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ Woso lemim pa darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a bɔ a taam k'a sugur yɛ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ."
Yeezuu k'a nɩ Galilee higʋta lɛ ra an nɩ tam bɩ, a gʋɔɔ yɩ hɩɩya: Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n n'a birm Pɩyɛɛr kan a danzaa Andɩr kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋa zom higʋta b'ʋ, bala, zɔbənno m.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr a zu mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bam gʋɔɔ kama zannɔ."
Lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ y'a zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ to, ŋn'ɩ zum Yeezuu ʋ.
K'a ta lɛɛ bɩ, a Zakkɩ yɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ, Zebedee nyɩnɔ m ŋn'ɩ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ kan a zɩ Zebedee bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a zaŋŋarɔ bankam. A n ŋ bir.
Ŋ n a bɔ a zɩ b'ʋ kan kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ kɩ lɛɛm, ŋn'ɩ zure a jɛ ʋ.

Yeezuu gasʋ Galilee kʋ b'ʋ haay, an nɩ bɩmbɩrm, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam, an nɩ yaaba do haay waam kan kʋsɩ do haay kɩ zamaa bɩ bire ʋ.

A tɔ bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ, an ta kan Siirii kʋ kɩ haay, a m naa, n nɩ zɛm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cicir bam yaaba do haay kan kʋsɩ do haay nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m: Gʋɔɔ kʋ zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ, parparlɔzannɔ, mɛgarɛzannɔ kɩ an ŋ waa.
Zamaa cir gʋta nɩ zure a jɛ ʋ, a to ŋ y'a ʋ Galilee ʋ, Taraburo ʋ, Zerizalɛm kan Zidee kɩ, kan Zʋrdɛn kɔ gəm la kɩ.
Yeezuu k'a zamaa bɩ yɩ bɩ, a der ci burə ʋ, an nyɩnta. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma.
A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
"Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m mɩŋŋazerlezannɔ m: Ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdɔɔ wɔɔ m: Ŋ y'a hɔjirle yɩm durnya ʋ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m nyikərezannɔ m: Woso bra barɛ ŋ nɩ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ tɩrgabaa nɔ nɩ ŋ zɛm kan mɩsɩ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m: Hɔ yɩ ŋ kam.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m cicirzɛrɛzannɔ m: Woso yɩ ŋ cicir zɛrɛ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m heerhuzannɔ m: Ŋ Woso yɩrɛ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam kʋmarɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ m: Woso yɩ ŋ birle a nyɩnɔ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cicir bam tɩrgabaa tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ m: Ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, kʋ n y'awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ, n nɩ cicir karɛ awɔɔ ma, n nɩ ŋʋaar do haay karɛ awɔɔ ra mɔɔ minto,
k'a heer nyɔɔ heernyɔɔ gʋta m, bala, awɔɔ ganwʋrɛ gʋta yɩm arzana ʋ. A ba n y'a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ m."
"Durnya yɛ n'awɔɔ m. Bɩ, kʋ yɛ nyɩntabaa bɔ, n y'a bam lɔ, k'a a ya, a nyɩntabaa ka ʋ? A zibəə ba ʋ dɔ y, a lo n nawʋm garga ra, gʋɔɔ nɩ tʋntɔm la."
"Durnya lɛɛgure n'awɔɔ m, kʋ k'a nɩ zigi burə ʋ bɩ b'a dam ma, an a nyaakʋm da y.
Kʋ gʋaa sɛ nya fɩtɩrɛ ʋ a bɩr a cɩntam kasɩ taa y, a cɩnta a tɩr a ʋ hɔ burə ʋ an cɛ bɩ gu gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ daahan minto.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ lɛɛgure n yɔ ncɩnaaʋ gʋɔɔ mɩm ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔ awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ b'ʋ, awɔɔ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ minto."
"A b'a hɔɔn da a ʋ, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m bɩ Moyiisi lɛ, gɛɛ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ rɔ wɔɔ zar y. Mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ m bɩ ŋ zar y, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋ yɩ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, an lɛɛ ka kʋ tara kan brama kɩ n cem bɩ, Woso lɛ bɩ nyɩ deem bɩ bɩ cenle y, a jɩ deem bɩ cenim sɔ y, kʋ nawɔnnɔ haay n bɔkarɛ an kʋ yɩ.

Naa minto bɩ, kʋ gʋaa bɩsɩ ka Woso lɛ bɩ poore deem taan••• ma an a dɩnda gʋɔɔ m kʋ ŋ n'a ba maam sɔ, a zaa bɩ do bir n nawʋm gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay poore Woso cirbəə b'ʋ. Bɩ gʋaa k'a zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an a dɩnda gʋɔɔ m ŋn'a ba maam sɔ bɩ, bɩ zaa nyɩntam gʋta Woso cirbəə b'ʋ.
Kʋ m sɩra hɩ awɔɔ m. K'awɔɔ tɩrgabaa n cem wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ tɩrgabaa kɩ han, awɔɔ bɩ gasʋm Woso cirbəə ʋ y."
"Awɔɔ ma n n a hɩ wɔɔ yaabɔɔ m, n ʋ: 'Ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y', kʋ gʋaa a mim meeyaa bɔ ʋ, a a ga m, kʋ n n ta m dʋdɔkənno taa.

Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʋ gʋaa nɔmaa ba kan a mim kɩ, a a ga m, kʋ n n ta a zaa m dʋdɔkənno taa. Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a mim m, a ʋ: 'Hɔɔnwarzaa', a a ga m, kʋ n n ta a zaa m dʋdɔkənno jɩtannɔ taa. Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a mim m, a ʋ: 'hɔɔzaa', a ga a ʋ m k'an ta sɛhar ʋ.
Naa minto bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ ta Wosocɛ ʋ k'ɩ yaa ganwʋrɛ ka Woso ʋ, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ ɩ zar ɩ mim ma,
k'ɩ ganwʋrɛ bɩ to Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ɩ ta ɩ yaa n'ɩ zɛ kʋ ra kan ɩ mim bɩ kɩ, k'ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ ɩ wusigə ɩ bʋr, ɩ b'ɩ ganwʋrɛ bɩ ka Woso ʋ.
K'ɩbɩɩ jɩm ɩ tarɛ ɩ m dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, k'ɩ tɔ ʋ, a kʋ ma zaa ra. K'a n yɩ ncɩnaaʋ y, a y'ɩ kam dʋdɔkər ʋ, dʋdɔkər bɩ n ɩ ka lɔnnɔdɔmazannɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: Ɩbɩɩ bɩ bɔm b'ʋ k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ zɩm bɩ ka haay y, bɩ tanka deem taan••• bɩ gɔɔtarɛ y."
"Awɔɔ ma, n ʋ: 'Ɩ bɩ jaan da y.'
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʋ gʋaa dɩga lʋ ma a hɔɔn n ta zi, a jaan da kan kɩ a heer ʋ."
"K'ɩ bɩsɩ mɩnyaa bɩ y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ bɔ ʋ, ɩ zo laatʋ ɩ ma. Bala, a jɩra k'ɩ mɛ vəŋŋə deem n a zaar ba, k'ɩ mɛ bɩ haay bɩ ta sɛhar ʋ y.
Bɩ, k'ɩ bɩsɩ wɔ bɩ y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra ɩ zo laatʋ ɩ ma. A jɩra k'ɩ mɛ vəŋŋə deem n a zaar ba, k'ɩ mɛ bɩ haay bɩ ta sɛhar ʋ y."
"N y'a ya, n n a hɩ sɔ, n ʋ: 'Kʋ gʋaa la a lʋ ra k'an wɔsaalʋmaci ka ʋ.'
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʋ gʋaa la a lʋ ra, bɩ jaan bɛɛ a a da y, lʋ bɩ da an nawʋm jaandarɛ ma. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lʋ k'a gʋ a zim ma sa, jaan a da."
"Awɔɔ ma, n n a hɩ wɔɔ yaabɔɔ m, n ʋ: 'Ɩ bɩ ɩ lerbɔrɛ to y, b'a ka kʋ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ler bɔ Zuuba m ɩ ɩ wer si bɩ n kʋ yɩ.'
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, a b'a wer si fɩɩga y: A b'a wer si brama tɔ nɩ y, bala, Woso cirbəəduu m bɩ.
A b'a wer si tara tɔ nɩ y, bala, a gam cɩntarahɔ m bɩ, a b'a wer si Zerizalɛm tɔ nɩ y, bala, cir gʋta bɩ kʋ m bɩ.
Ɩ b'ɩ wer si ɩ mim tɔ nɩ y, bala ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ ka minkə deem n a ba kunkum gɛɛ fu y.
K'awɔɔ ɩ meer barɛ, kʋ ɩɩn••• m, k'a hɩ, a ʋ: ɩɩn••• m. Kʋ ayy••• m, k'a hɩ, a ʋ: ayy••• m. Meerbaa k'a n'a nam ma bɩ, a to a ʋ a Bʋnyaabarɛzaa bɩ zi."
"Awɔɔ ma, n n a hɩ, n ʋ: 'Mɩnyaa nɩ sompim mɩnyaa bɩncɛ ʋ, sɔ nɩ sompim sɔ bɩncɛ ʋ.'
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ gʋaa a ba awɔɔ m bʋnyaa, a b'a bʋnyaa ba m sɔ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a wɔ ta ɩ bɩsɩ paasɩ rɛ, k'ɩ ɩ jɩsa paasɩ bɩ ka ʋ k'an a ta rɛ.
Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, k'a dʋdɔ ka kan ɩ kɩ, k'a ɩ huudaara yɔ ɩ m, k'ɩ to k'an ɩ huukuurə sa sɔ.
Kʋ gʋaa paŋŋa ba ɩ ma, k'a ɩ da tarɛ ma ganjɩbɔʋrɛ tisi kan a kɩ, k'ɩ ta ganjɩbɔʋrɛ tisi hɩɩya kan kɩ.
Kʋ gʋaa hɔ yɛ ɩ han, k'ɩ ka ʋ. Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, k'a zɩm sa ɩ zi, ɩ bɩ ɩ gu han y."
"Awɔɔ ma, n n a hɩ, n ʋ: 'K'ɩ ɩ gʋaa ŋʋa, k'ɩ sɔ ɩ jɩm m.'
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: K'a a jɩnnɔ ŋʋa, k'a yaa da Woso m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, awɔɔ yɩm awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ nyɩnɔ paan•••rɔ. Bala, a a ka woso nɩ gum gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ ra kan gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. A a ka sɔ, la nɩ bam gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ra kan gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ ŋʋarɛ, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka? Bala, yawʋrsinno wɔɔ y'a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ a danyɩnɔ m bala, bɔ awɔɔ n'a bam, an nɩ yɩrɛ a hɔ? Kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ ra?
K'a maam, k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa paan••• amba awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ n mɩŋŋa paan••• bɩ m."
"A b'a ka k'a a zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ ba, kʋ gʋɔɔ n dɩga a ma y. K'awɔɔ ŋ ba kʋ ŋ nɩ dɩga a ma, awɔɔ bɩ ganwʋrɛ yɩm awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ zi y.

K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ kam cicirzaa ʋ, ɩ bɩ hɔ ba kʋ gʋaa haay n a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ kam gʋaa ʋ, amba zambʋzannɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bam sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ kan zaa birero ʋ kɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ a ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ y'a ganwʋrɛ yɩ.
B'ɩbɩɩ, k'ɩ ɩ gan wʋrɛ, k'ɩ jɩsa wɔ bɩ bɩ hɔ k'ɩ bɩsɩ wɔ n'a bam bɩ dɔ y.
K'ɩ ganwʋrɛ bɩ nyaakʋm da ɩ ka, ɩ Zɩ k'a nɩ hɔ nyaakʋndarɛ yɩm bɩ ganwʋrɛ karɛ ɩ ʋ."

"K'awɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ, a bɩ yɩ am zambʋzannɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa kʋ gʋɔɔ n a yɩ bɩ, jɩm ŋ tɩr a ʋ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kan zaarɔ zɛkʋrajɩrɔ kɩ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ bɩr yaa darɛ. Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, sɩra m, ŋ y'a ganwʋrɛ yɩ.
B'ɩbɩɩ, k'ɩ lɛ taa kɩ yaa da, gasʋ ɩ cɛ ʋ ɩ lɛ ta, ɩ yaa da ɩ Zɩ Woso k'a nɩ b'ʋ bɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ k'a nɩ lɛɛ k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ yɩm bɩ, a y'ɩbɩɩ zibəə k'ɩbɩɩ nyaakʋm da bɩ ganwʋrɛ karɛ ɩ ʋ.
K'awɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ, a bɩ meer ba gʋta am kɩfɩɩrɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. A hɔɔn ŋn'a darɛ, ŋ ʋ, k'a meer ba gʋta, Woso y'a yaadarɛ mam.
A b'a ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Bala, awɔɔ Zɩ Woso bɩ lɛɛ ka an hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ, awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, an n'a yɛm han."
"K'awɔɔ k'a yaa da, k'a da ncɩnaaʋ: Wɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ, k'ɩ tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ,
k'ɩ cirbəə n bʋr, k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ n ba tara burə ʋ, amba an nɩ bam arzana ʋ bɩ m.
Wɔɔ her hɔbɩrɛ ka wɔɔ ʋ.
Wɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʋ, amba wɔɔ n'ʋ muno kʋrɔmarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʋ bɩ m.
Dɔ wɔɔ ma k'ʋ bɩ yɛ ʋ ʋ do makra bʋnyaa nɔ ʋ y, bɩ wɔɔ yɔ Bʋnyaabarɛzaa bɩ wɔ ʋ. [Bala, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ so cirbəə ʋ kan paŋŋa kɩ, lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ."]
"Kʋ sɩra nɩ, k'awɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʋ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ sugur karɛ awɔɔ ʋ sɔ.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bɩr sugur kam gʋɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ b'awɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur karɛ awɔɔ ʋ sɔ y."
"K'awɔɔ y'a lɛ kʋsɩrɛ, a bɩ tɩr a meer zɩnzar kʋ ʋ, am zambʋzannɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. A meer ŋ tɩr a zɩnzar kʋ ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, a a lɛ kʋsɩ. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: ŋ y'a ganwʋrɛ yɩ.
K'ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ lɛ kʋsɩrɛ, k'ɩ hi da ɩ meer ʋ, ɩ tidəər zɛ ɩ mim ma,
kʋ gʋɔɔ b'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, ɩ lɛ ɩ kʋsɩ y. Bɩ, k'ɩ Zɩ k'a nɩ lɛɛ k'a nyaakʋm da ʋ bɩ n a dɔ a deem. B'a y'ɩ ganwʋrɛ karɛ ɩ ʋ."
"A b'a ka arzaka ma durnya burə ʋ naa ʋ y. Bala, bɛɛ kan muku kɩ y'a zarm, konno ɩ cɛlɛ yarm, ŋn'a sarɛ.
Bɩ k'ɩ ka arzana arzaka ma. Bala, muku kan bɛɛ kɩ ba b'ʋ k'a zar y, konno ba b'ʋ k'a cɛlɛ yar, k'a sa y.
Bala, lɛɛ k'ɩ arzaka n ta ʋ b'ɩ heer n ta ʋ sɔ."
"Mɛsim fɩtɩrɛ m mɩnyaa m. K'ɩ mɩnyaa mɩŋŋa ɩbɩɩ mɛ bɩ haay ɩ lɛɛgure ʋ.
Bɩ k'ɩ mɩnyaa bɩ mɩŋŋa y, ɩbɩɩ mɛ bɩ haay nyɩntam monsigə ʋ. K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lɛɛgure k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m bɩ monsigə nɩ, monsigə bɩ do yɩm gʋta bidə."
"Gʋaa ba ʋ an b'a dam ma, an zuubɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ zi ba y. A deem ŋʋam, an sɔ deem m, gɛɛ, an a zɛ kʋ ra kan deem kɩ, an kaanm deem m. Awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a zu Woso ʋ, k'a a ya, a zu busoo ʋ y."
"Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a b'a heer kɔ a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ hɔbɩrɛ mim ma y. B'a b'a heer kɔ huu mim ma sɔ y. Mɩsɩrbaa n lɛ da hɔbɩrɛ m na? Mɛsim bɩ n lɛ da huu m na?
K'a dɩga bɛnnɔ ma: ŋ bɩr hɔ duure y, bɩ ŋ bɩr hɔ darɛ y, ŋ bɩr hɔ zarm sɩ ʋ y, b'awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ yɩ ŋ tʋrm! Awɔɔ n lɛ da ŋ nɩ gallɛm hɔka ra?
Nka n'a dam ma, an a mɩsɩrbaa da ra poore tɔkkɛ a hɔɔn k'a n'a dam ma gʋta minto?
Bɔ y'a ka, awɔɔ n'a heer kɔm huu mim ma? K'a dɩga pooyaa hɔvuro ma, ŋ yɩ mam, bɩ ŋ bɩr zi barɛ, bɩ ŋ bɩr huu barɛ y.
Bɩ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ awɔɔ m, Salomɔɔn mɩŋŋa, b'a kan a cirbəə bɩ kɩ, a n huu du a ma, am ŋ deem hɔ bɩ nɩ y.
Bɩ, kʋ Woso ɩ huu dum pooyaa bur ma ncɩnaaʋ, bɩ ta an a ʋ her kʋ sɛ n b'a bɩ booti m, a bɩ huu dure awɔɔ ma an lɛ da brɔɔ m na? Sɩrakarɛ poore zannɔ!
K'a maam, a b'a heer kɔ a bɩr a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Bɔ wɔɔ n'a bɩrɛ? Bɔ wɔɔ n'a mire? Bɔ wɔɔ n'a dure ʋ ma?
Naa do haay kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋ ma kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ, b'awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ b'a dɔ, a ʋ, awɔɔ lɛ taa ŋ ma.
K'a lɛɛ ka a ka Woso cirbəə bɩ ma, kan a tɩrgabaa kɩ. Maam bɩ, Woso hɔ k'a gɔɔta bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
Naa minto bɩ, a b'a heer kɔ booti mim ma y. Booti dɩgarɛ a mɩŋŋa mim ma. Dɔmɩm biyəə y'a mɩŋŋa mim m."
"A bɩ gʋaa dʋdɔ yar y, kʋ Woso b'a dʋdɔ yar y.
K'awɔɔ gʋaa dʋdɔ yar lʋnlɔ, awɔɔ dʋdɔ yar n nawʋm maam sɔ, hɔganhɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m gʋɔɔ minto bɩ, bɩ nɩ nyɩntam hɔganhɔ awɔɔ minto sɔ.
A lɔ ɩbɩɩ nɩ bur k'a n'ɩ mim mɩm ʋ bɩ yɩrɛ, an bɔkarɛ kusə n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʋ, b'ɩ bɩr a yɩrɛ?
Ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ, ɩ hɩ ɩ danyɩ m, ɩ ʋ, jɩm kʋ m bur bɔ ɩ mɩm ʋ, an bɔkarɛ kusə n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʋ!
Zambʋzaa, kusə bɩ bɔ ɩ mɩm ʋ cɩna, k'ɩ dɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa, ɩ bur bɩ bɔ ɩ danyɩ bɩ mɩm ʋ.
A bɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa ka jino ʋ y, kʋ n bɛɛ m, ŋ y'a bɔrɛ, ŋn'awɔɔ bɩ. A bɩ hɔ wɩsɩ sa a ka kurkuuro ʋ y, kʋ n bɛɛ m, ŋ tʋntɔm la.
K'a hɔ yɛ, n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ. K'awɔɔ a ka ma, awɔɔ y'a yɩm. K'awɔɔ cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʋrɛ awɔɔ m.
Bala, kʋ gʋaa hɔ yɛ, a y'a yɩm. K'a a ka ma, a y'a yɩm. Kʋ gʋaa cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʋm nɩ.
Gʋaa y'awɔɔ bire ʋ a nyɩ nɩ bur yɛm han, an jaa ka ʋ ra?
Gɛɛ, k'a zɔ yɛ han, a mɩm kaŋ ʋ ra?
Awɔɔ k'an bʋnyaa ncɩnaaʋ a bɔkarɛ a hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ka a nyɩnɔ ʋ dɔ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ bɛɛ lɛ da ra? A hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a yɛm han rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa haay kʋ gʋɔɔ n a ba awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a ba ŋ nɩ sɔ. Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ ciro wɔɔ kɩ a hɩ.
K'a gasʋ cɛlɛ fɔɔrɛ bɩ m, bala, cɛlɛ gʋta bɩ kan zaa zanta bɩ kɩ bɩ, ta ŋ nawʋm nyaanlɛ bɩncɛ ʋ. Gʋɔɔ gʋta yɩ ŋ sam.
Bɩ, cɛlɛ fɔɔrɛ bɩ kan zaa kʋsɩ bɩ kɩ bɩ, ta ŋ nawʋm mɩsɩrbaa bɩncɛ ʋ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ bɩ gʋta y.
K'a dundo a zi kan ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, bʋr ŋ tɩr a ʋ awɔɔ zi, am seero hɔ bɩ m, an bɔkarɛ poojino kʋsɩrɔ m.
Ŋ zibəəro awɔɔ nɩ ŋ dɔm ma. N bɩr tʋgɔ nyɩ nɔm laa gɔ ra y, n bɩr sɔɔn nyɩ nɔm laazankʋrɛ ra y.
Gɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ, nyɩ mɩŋŋa an n'a dam, gɔ bʋnyaa bɩ, nyɩ bʋnyaa an n'a dam sɔ.
Gɔ mɩŋŋa b'a dam ma an nyɩ bʋnyaa da y, gɔ bʋnyaa b'a dam ma, an nyɩ mɩŋŋa da sɔ y.
Gɔ haay k'a bɩr nyɩ mɩŋŋa dam bɩ, a zɛ n nawʋm la, n n'a dam sɛ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ ŋ zibəəro awɔɔ nɩ ŋ dɔm ma.
Gʋaa haay k'a n'a hɩm mɔɔ ma: 'Zuuba, Zuuba' bɩ bɛɛ nɩ gasʋm Woso cirbəə ʋ y. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ bam nɔ wɔɔ m.
Dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, gʋɔɔ gʋta y'a hɩrɛ: 'Zuuba, Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ tɔ minto, wɔɔ Woso lɛ si ʋ so ra. Ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma wɔɔ la zinəro ra. Wɔɔ hoserlo ba gʋta ɩbɩɩ tɔ minto.'
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Mɔɔ n awɔɔ dɔ fɩɩga y. K'a a hʋr mɔɔ jɩr ʋ, mimbʋnyaabənno!'
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ba naa mam bɩ, an nɩ zi bam nɩ bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a hɔɔn n ta ʋ, an a cɛ dɔ ci burə ʋ kɩ.
La n ba, hi n yar, hɩnhɛr n hɔn kan paŋŋa kɩ, an a mom cɛ b'ʋ, a n a da y. Bala, a jɩr bɩ da n y'a ʋ ci burə ʋ.
Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ba naa mam b'a bɩr zi bam nɩ bɩ, gʋaa bɩ do bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa yarma k'a cɛ dɔ nyɩntaa burə ʋ kɩ.
La n ba, hi n yar, hɩnhɛr n hɔn kan paŋŋa kɩ, an a mom cɛ b'ʋ, cɛ bɩ n wurgə, a hɔsɩ n gɔɔta y."
Yeezuu k'a hɔ dɩnda ncɩnaaʋ an a nya bɩ, gʋɔɔ cir gʋta kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ minto.
Bala, Yeezuu bɩr hɔ dɩndarɛ am ŋ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Woso paŋŋa an nɩ hɔ bɩ dɩndam nɩ.
Yeezuu k'a a to ci bɩ mim ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ cir gʋta zu a jɛ ʋ.
Kusimə n b'a zɔ ma, an kukurə zɛ a taa, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, k'ɩ lɛ taa, ɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ mɔɔ waa, ɩ dintim naa do gʋ mɔɔ ma."
Yeezuu n a wɔ hʋr, an a da ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛ taa, ɩ waa. Kʋ dintim bɩ n gʋ ɩ ma." Lɛɛm bɩ, a kusiməbaa bɩ nya ma.
A m bɩ, Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y, bɩ ta ɩ yaa n'ɩ hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbər bɩ m, k'ɩ ganwʋrɛ kʋ Moyiisi lɛ ka kʋ n n a ba bɩ ka, k'an nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ waarɛ bɩ kasɛtɩ gʋaa haay minto."
Yeezuu k'a nɩ gasʋm Kapɛrnawum ʋ bɩ, sʋrdaarɔ cir bʋr zi, an a hɩ m, a ʋ:
"Zuuba, mɔɔ zibəənyɩ nɩ wʋtam har ʋ, a mɛ n ga, an nɩ fɩr yɩm gʋta."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ tam, m aa a waa."
Bɩ sʋrdaarɔ cir b'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ n m ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ n gasʋ mɔɔ har ʋ y, meerbaanyɩ ba deem bala, mɔɔ zibəənyɩ bɩ y'a waam!

Lɛɛzannɔ y'a so mɔɔ mɩŋŋa ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ m so sʋrdaarɔ ʋ. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ deem m, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Ta!', b'a ta. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ a vanta m, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Bʋr!', b'a bʋr. Kʋ mɔɔ m ya, m a hɩ m zibəənyɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Naa ba!', b'a a ba."
Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a dɩga gʋaa bɩ ma, an zɛ kədə, an a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ n sɩrakarɛ naa do lɔɔ yɩ Israyɛl gʋaa zi y.
A hɩ mɔɔ n nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ y'a tom gʋta dɔjɩr ʋ kan meer kɩ ŋnɩ bɩ nyɩnta kan Abraham kɩ Izakkɩ kɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ bɩ Woso cirbəə b'ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ n lɛɛ ka n ŋ bɔ ʋ Woso cirbəə bɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ, n brɔɔ nyɔɔm garga ra monsigə ʋ. Nyikəre kan sɔsʋrɛ kɩ nyɩntam b'ʋ."
Meerbaa naa do jɛ ʋ, Yeezuu a hɩ sʋrdaarɔ cir bɩ m, a ʋ: "Doo har ʋ, k'an ba ɩbɩɩ m, amba ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ m." Wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ lɛɛm bɩ, zibəənyɩ b'a waa.
Yeezuu k'a gasʋ Pɩyɛɛr har ʋ bɩ, a Pɩyɛɛr dində yɩ an nɩ wʋtam mɛmarɛ m.
A n a wɔ da a wɔ ma mɛmarɛ bɩ n bɔ a mɛ ʋ, an wuti an nyasʋ Yeezuu m.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, n bʋr gʋɔɔ m gʋta zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ. Yeezuu meer ba bala an la zinəro wɔɔ ra, an yaabazannɔ wɔɔ waa haay.
Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ. A a hɩ, a ʋ: A ɩ hɔ haay k'a nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ mɛsim ma bɩ sa, an wɔɔ yaabarɔ gʋ wɔɔ ma.
Yeezuu k'a gʋɔɔ cir gʋta yɩ, ŋnɩ bɩr a ma bɩ, a lɛ ka a ʋ, k'a ta higʋta bɩ gəm deem la.
Wosocikarɩnsaamba deem n a zɔ ma, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ zure ɩbɩɩ jɛ ʋ lɛɛ haay k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ taŋ ʋ b'ʋ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɛɛʋnrɔ ɩ yaarɔ m, bɛnnɔ ɩ cɛlɩŋŋarɔ m, bɩ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ ba bɩncɛ m k'a a mim cɩnta ʋ y."
Karɩndanyɩ vanta n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, zaa ka m ʋ, kʋ m aa nɩ m zɩ gər bir, kʋ m a dɔ m bʋr."
Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ, k'ɩ gəəno to kʋ ŋ n'a gəəno bir."
Yeezuu gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ n zu a jɛ ʋ.
Lɛɛm bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʋta wuti hi bɩ burə ʋ, an a ŋʋa k'a ka kʋ hi m kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ mom. Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ, an nɩ hinceem bam.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma, ŋn'a gu, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, wɔɔ yɔ! Kʋ m bɛɛ m wɔɔ gɩngam!"
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ nyi barɛ, sɩrakarɛ poore zannɔ!" A n wuti an jɩm, an həən si hɩnhɛr bɩ ma kan higʋta bɩ kɩ. Lɛɛ bɩ n zɛ sɩɩ•••
Ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɩ gʋaa bɩ kara n naa, baa hɩnhɛr kan hi kɩ n n'a lɛ sire?"

Yeezuu k'a lee ku higʋta bɩ tʋr deem ʋ Gadara zannɔ kʋ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a m bɩ, gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʋ zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ n bɔ gəənoyaarɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ b'a zɛ ʋ. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro nyɩnta bʋnyaa gʋta. Naa minto bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma, an cem lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ y.
Ŋ n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ ba wɔɔ nɩ Woso Nyɩ? Bʋr ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ bɩ fɩr ka wɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ dɔmɩm bɩ n a ku cɩna ra?"
A n bɔkarɛ, kurkuuro cir gʋta ɩ nyɩnta laatʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩrɛ.
Zinəro wɔɔ n'a yɛm Yeezuu han gʋta, ŋ ʋ: "K'ɩ la wɔɔ ra, k'ɩ wɔɔ nyɔɔ kurkuuro wɔɔ mɛ ʋ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta!" Ŋ nɩ bɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ mɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ gasʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ mɛ ʋ. A m bɩ, kurkuuro cir gʋta bɩ n bra si, ŋnɩ zer, ŋn'a zar higʋta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
Kurkuuro dundonno wɔɔ n bra si, ŋn'aa hɔ k'a ba bɩ hɩ kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ, kan hɔ k'a ba gʋɔɔ kʋ zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ n bɩ kɩ.
A m bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ n bɔ, ŋn'ɩ tam k'a yaa Yeezuu zɛ ʋ. A yɩ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ han gʋta k'an bɔ a kʋ b'ʋ.
Naa jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, an a wusigə, an higʋta bɩ zɛ ra an ta a kʋ ʋ.
N n mɛgarɛzaa busu wʋtarahɔ ra, n nɩ bʋr m Yeezuu zi. K'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr m nɔ wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "M nyɩnnɩ, ɩ tɔ ʋ, ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ sugur yɩ."
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ a heer ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do ɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ!"
Yeezuu k'a hɔ k'a nɩ ŋ heer ʋ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto, awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʋ?
Kara m zanta? Mɔɔ n b'a hɩm lʋgɔ bɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ: Ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ bɩ m gɛ, gɛɛ, ɩ wuti ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr, ɩ ta bɩ nɩ?
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ, a ʋ: Gʋaanyɩ b'ɩ lɛ m tara burə ʋ, k'a gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʋ." A n a hɩ lʋgɔ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr ɩ doo!"
Gʋaa bɩ n wuti an doo.
Gʋɔɔ cir gʋta kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ da bɔ ʋ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, k'a paŋŋa naa do ka gʋɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto.
Yeezuu k'a nɩ tam bɩ, a a to, an gʋaa yɩ an nɩ nyɩntam yawʋrsire bɩncɛ b'ʋ, a tɔ m Matiyee, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ!" A n wuti an zu a jɛ ʋ.
Kʋ Yeezuu nɩ nyɩntam Matiyee har ʋ b'ʋ k'a hɔ bɩ bɩ, yawʋrsinno kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ gʋta kan kɩ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "A lɔ, awɔɔ karɩnsaamba bɩ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan yawʋrsinno kɩ, mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ?"
Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩzannɔ lɛ baa lɔɔtɔr ma y, yaabazannɔ lɛ n taa lɔɔtɔr ma.
K'a ta, a yaa a ka meerbaa naa do jɩ ma: 'Cicirzɛrɛ mɔɔ lɛ n taa, mannɩ barɛ bɛɛ y'. Mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ m bɩ gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bir y. Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m bɩ mimbʋnyaabənno bir."
Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋnɩ laaka da han, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto m, wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ n'ʋ lɛ kʋsɩm, b'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr a kʋsɩrɛ?"

Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ɩ lʋsarɛ cibsa barɛ, lʋ bɩ zim bɩ nɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bireyaa ʋ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a dam ma, ŋnɩ heerzarlɛ ba ra? Bɩ dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʋ, n zɛm bɩ lʋ bɩ zim bɩ gʋ ŋ ma, ŋ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ.
Gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ pɛɛra daa kər sam, an n'a tam huu gusire rɛ y. Bala, pɛɛra daa kər bɩ huu gusire bɩ gaam an a kaansʋ, an lɛ da biisi ra.

Gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ dɩvɛn daa sam k'a tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ gusinno ʋ y. Kʋ m bɛɛ m, hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ hɩnhaanm, dɩvɛn bɩ n a lo hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ n a zaar ba. Bɩ dɩvɛn daa bɩ tɔ n tɩr a ʋ hibɔɔnrɔ daarɔ ʋ, dɩvɛn bɩ kan hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ b'a zaarbarɛ y."

K'a nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir deem n a zɔ ma, an sʋnta a taa, an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ ɩ ga, a n maasɩrɛ ba cɩna y. Bɩ, bʋr ɩ wɔ ka a mim la, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu n wuti kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ zu a jɛ ʋ.
Bɩ, lʋ n ta ʋ, ma n'a dam zi a dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya hɔ m naa, an a zɔ Yeezuu ma jɛ ʋ, an a wɔ da Yeezuu huu lɛ ma.
Bala, lʋ bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a heer ʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ m wɔ da a huu lɛ ma tɔkkɛ, mɔɔ yɩ m waam."
Bɩ, Yeezuu a bɔ an dɩga a jɛ ʋ, an lʋ bɩ yɩ an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɩnnɩ, ɩ heer ba kookoo, ɩ sɩrakarɛ y'ɩ bʋmbɔ". Lɛɛm bɩ, lʋ b'a waa wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ.
Yeezuu k'a lee ku zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ har ʋ bɩ, k'a hirpenno wɔɔ yɩ kan gʋaa cir bɩ bʋgʋr barɛ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"K'a bɔ, nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ n ga y. Hinceem a a ba." Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʋm ma.
Kʋ n bɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, a gasʋ zi, an nyɩ bɩ sa a wɔ ma, a m bɩ, nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ n wuti.
Mim naa do n ta lɛ haay ʋ kʋ bɩ do ʋ.
Yeezuu k'a hʋr b'ʋ bɩ, bʋʋrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ b'a zɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ zu a jɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ baa dam, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ cicir zɛ Davɩd Nyɩ!"
Yeezuu k'a lee ku har ʋ bɩ, bʋʋrɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɩra ka a ʋ, mɔɔ yɩ m dam ma, m naa ba ra?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩɩn•••, Zuuba."
A m naa, Yeezuu n a wɔ da ŋ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'awɔɔ sɩra ka k'a yɩ bɩ, k'a yɩ maam."
Ŋ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ n gʋ. Yeezuu n lɛ ka ŋ ʋ paŋŋa m, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi! A b'a ka gʋaa n a dɔ y!"
Bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ bɩ, ŋ y'a sɩŋŋɩda sa lɛɛm, ŋn'a mim dɩndam kʋ b'ʋ haay.
Yeezuu k'a n'a hʋrm bɩ, n bʋr gʋaa m zinə n ta m, an a ba bəətir.
Yeezuu k'a la zinə bɩ ra bɩ, bəətir b'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ meer bam. Gʋɔɔ cir gʋta bɩ zɛ kədə. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Hɔ naa do lɔɔ n ba cɩna Israyɛl kʋ naa ʋ y!"
Bɩ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zinəro jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɩ paŋŋa kaŋ ʋ, an nɩ lam zinəro wɔɔ ra."
Yeezuu ɩ bɩrm kʋnɔrɔ wɔɔ ʋ kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ kʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta pa dam sɔ, an nɩ yaaba do haay waam kan kʋsɩ do haay kɩ.
K'a gʋɔɔ cir gʋta bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ cicir a nyasʋ, bala, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ heerzarlɛ nɔ ʋ kan kɔrɛ kɩ, amba hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ ba dundor m bɩ m.
A n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Mɔsa zibəə bɩ gʋta, bɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩ gʋta y.
Naa minto bɩ, k'a yɛ Wutuzaa bɩ han k'an zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ a mɔsa zibəə bɩ tɔ ma."
Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir, an paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a da zinəro wɔɔ ma, kʋ ŋ nɩ la ŋ la, kʋ ŋ nɩ yaaba do haay waa, kan kʋsɩ do haay kɩ.
Kristazibəəzannɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ tɔrɔ ba n nɩ: Lɛɛkarɛ zaa bɩ tɔ m, Sɩmɔɔn, n n'a hɩm ma Pɩyɛɛr, kan a danzaa Andɩr kɩ, Zebedee nyɩnɔ Zakkɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ.
Filipi kan Bartelemii kɩ, Toma kan yawʋrsirezaa Matiyee kɩ, Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ kan Tade kɩ.
Sɩmɔɔn Zelɔtɩ, kan Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ kɩ, b'ɩ Yeezuu da jɩnnɔ wɔ ʋ bɩ.
Yeezuu bueerehɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro nyɔɔ, an lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: "A bɩ kɩfɩɩrɔ zaa sa y, b'a bɩ gasʋ Samarii zannɔ kʋ ʋ y.
Bɩ k'a ta Israyɛl do zi, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ zi.
K'awɔɔ ɩ tam k'a bɩr a pa darɛ, a ʋ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ.
K'a yaabazannɔ waa, k'a gəəno mɩm bɔ ʋ, k'a kusiməro waa, a dintim gʋ ŋ ma, k'a la zinəro ra. A ka n y'a ʋ awɔɔ ʋ vam, k'a ka vam sɔ.
A bɩ sarma sa, b'a bɩ busoo sa sɔ y. A bɩ bɔɔlʋgʋ zar a mɔr ʋ sɔ y.
A bɩ hɩra sa zaa bɩ sarɛ minto, b'a bɩ huu sa hɩɩya y. A bɩ kʋsɔ kan bara kɩ sa y, bala, zibəəzaa b'a ga m, an hɔbɩrɛ yɩ.
K'awɔɔ gasʋ kʋ poore ʋ gɛɛ kʋ gʋta ʋ, k'a laaka da, kʋ gʋaa ta ʋ a lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ si a har ʋ, k'a gɔɔta b'ʋ k'an ta an awɔɔ hʋrlɛ ku.
K'awɔɔ ta k'a gasʋ har b'ʋ, k'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.'
Kʋ har bɩ do a ga m, k'awɔɔ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta kan kɩ. Bɩ, k'a n a ga m, k'awɔɔ laafɩɩ n a wusigə awɔɔ zi.
Har bɩ do nɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ n awɔɔ si, kʋ ŋ n a tʋr ka awɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma, ŋn'a si sɔ, k'a ɩ bɔm har bɩ do ʋ, gɛɛ kʋ bɩ do ʋ, k'a taanyisi gʋ a gannɔ ma.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, kʋ naa do fɩryɩrɛ yɩm gʋta an lɛ da Sodɔm kan Gomɔɔr kɩ kʋ ra."
"K'a tʋr ka mɩŋŋa, awɔɔ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋm am seero hɔ bɩ m poojino bireyaa ʋ. Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a hɔɔn ka mɩŋŋa, am mɩnnɔ hɔ bɩ m. K'a yɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mim ba ʋ y, am cirpʋnnɔ hɔ bɩ m.
K'a dundo a zi kan gʋɔɔ kɩ, bala, ŋ y'awɔɔ gʋrm, ŋnɩ ta awɔɔ m dʋdɔkənno zi. Ŋ y'awɔɔ zɛm madɩɩrɔ m a sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ.
Ŋ tarɛ awɔɔ m kʋrɔ lɛɛzannɔ kan cinno kɩ taa mɔɔ tɔ ma. Naa nɩ nyɩntam kasɛtɩ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ kan kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ.
Kʋ ŋ bɩ ta awɔɔ m brɔɔ lɛɛ, a b'a hɔɔn da k'awɔɔ meer bam lʋnlɔ, gɛɛ, bɔ awɔɔ n n'a hɩrɛ y. Hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ.
Bala, awɔɔ bɛɛ n nɩ meer barɛ a zim y, awɔɔ Zɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n nɩ meer k'awɔɔ n n'a bam bɩ darɛ awɔɔ lɛ ʋ.
Danyɩnɔ kʋ kam zɛ ma. Zɩ y'a nyɩ karɛ, n n a zɛ. Nyɩnɔ wutire ŋnɩ jɩm kan a zɩrɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ ka, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Gʋaa haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma. Bɩ gʋaa k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ an ta an fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nyarɛ ku bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm.
Kʋ ŋ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma kʋ niŋŋə ʋ, k'a a si a ta kʋ vanta ʋ. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ bɩ Israyɛl kʋnɔrɔ wɔɔ nyarɛ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m bɔkarɛ, an bʋr y.
Karɩndanyɩ bɩ n lɛ da a karɩnsaamba ra y, zibəənyɩ bɩ n lɛ da a zuuba ra sɔ y.
Karɩndanyɩ a ga m, an yɩ am a karɩnsaamba m. Zibəənyɩ a ga m, an yɩ am a zuuba m. Kʋ n har bɩ zaa bɩ ba zinəro jɩtaarɛ, awɔɔ hɔɔn ʋ naa, n b'a bam har bɩ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m ncɩnaaʋ ra?
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a bɩ nyi ba gʋɔɔ nɩ y. Bala, hɔ ba ʋ, an a nyaakʋm da, n ba yɩrɛ y. Mim ba ʋ, an a nyaakʋm da, n b'a dɔrɛ y.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m monsigə ʋ bɩ, k'a hɩ garga ra, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam sɔ awɔɔ y'a minto bɩ, k'a pa da kʋ gʋaa haay n a ma.
A bɩ nyi ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɛsim zɛm gər, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ gʋaa nyi zɛ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y. K'a nyi ba Woso m. Bɩ y'a da ma, an mɛsim kan nyi kɩ zaar ba sɛhar ʋ.
N bɩr bɛnnɔ hɛɛnm hɩɩya wacɩr la? A n bɔkarɛ deem taan••• bɩr gam k'awɔɔ Zɩ bɛɛ zaa ka y.
B'awɔɔ, ŋ y'awɔɔ minkə bɩ lɛ dɔ.
K'a maam, a bɩ nyi ba y. Awɔɔ gore ta ʋ, an lɛ da bɛnnɔ haay ra.
Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ gʋɔɔ lɛɛ, a ʋ, a mɔɔ dɔ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ m Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ zaa dɔ sɔ.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gʋɔɔ lɛɛ, mɔɔ bɩsɩ karɛ a zaa ma sɔ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ lɛɛ.
A b'a hɔɔn da, a ʋ, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ kʋ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta ʋ tara burə ʋ y. Mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta ʋ y. Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ zoobarɛ m.
Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m gʋaa gʋ a zɩ ma, kʋ m nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ gʋ a da ma, kʋ m lʋ gʋ a nyar ma.
Gʋaa har gʋɔɔ n nɩ yɩrɛ a jɩnnɔ.
Kʋ gʋaa a zɩ ŋʋa gɛɛ a da an lɛ da mɔɔ m, gʋaa bɩ do n a ga m, an yɩ mɔɔ gʋaa y. Kʋ gʋaa a nyɩyar gɛɛ a nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ ŋʋa an lɛ da mɔɔ m, gʋaa bɩ do n a ga m, an yɩ mɔɔ gʋaa sɔ y.
Kʋ gʋaa n a gɔdarkʋra busu an zu mɔɔ ʋ, a n a ga m, an yɩ mɔɔ gʋaa y.
Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a a meeyaa bʋmbɔ, a b'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ gʋaa k'a yɛ zɛ ma mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm."
"Kʋ gʋaa awɔɔ si, mɔɔ a m si. Mɔɔ si k'a ʋ bɩ, bɔzaa ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a a si.
Kʋ gʋaa wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa si k'an wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ minto, a wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ganwʋrɛ yɩm. Kʋ gʋaa gʋaa tɩrga si a tɩrgabaa tɔ ma, a gʋaa tɩrga ganwʋrɛ yɩm.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ gʋaa hi ka hɩnnɩ ʋ tɔkkɛ nyɩnɔ poorero nɔɔn duro deem ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ m bɩ tɔ ma, gʋaa bɩ do bɩ kʋrɔm ganwʋrɛ ma y."
Yeezuu k'a hɔ dɩnda a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ m an a nya bɩ, a a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ k'a yaa Woso lemim pa da, k'a hɔ dɩnda sɔ kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Zaan k'a nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'a to an Krista zibəəro wɔɔ mim ma, an a karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nyɔɔ,
kʋ ŋ n aa laaka da han, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ŋn'ɩ dɔrɛ ɩ zɛrɛ ma bɩ gɛɛ, gʋaa vanta nɩ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "K'a ta a yaa hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam, an n'a yɩm naa dɩnda Zaan m:
Bʋʋrɔ mɩm ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, lʋgɔrɔ ɩ tam, kusimoo y'a waam, dintim nɩ gʋrɛ ŋ ma, tikkiro ɩ meerbaa mam, gəəno y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, lemim nyɩnta ɩ hɩm ŋʋazannɔ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a n a sɩrakarɛ to mɔɔ minto bɩ m."
Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a hʋr bɩ, Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a hɩm zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a poohɔɔn ʋ? Hɩnhɛr awɔɔ yɩ, an nɩ niigə gɔ yəŋŋəm gɛ?
Bɔ awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a paan•••? Gʋaa m, an huu wɩsɩ da a ra gɛ? Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ huu wɩsɩrɔ darɛ a ra rɔ wɔɔ ɩ cinno harlɔ ʋ.
Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a? Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m gɛ? Ɩɩn•••, mɔɔ y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a lɛ da wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ra.
Zaan mim n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ nɩ m zibəəzaa nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, k'an ɩbɩɩ zaa banka.'
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lannɔ nyɩnɔ barla gʋaa ba ʋ an lɛ da Zaan-Batiisi ra y. A n bɔkarɛ gʋaa k'an poore Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ bɩ lɛ da m.
A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa Zaan-Batiisi Woso lemim padarɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ, an lee ku dɩɩtaa naa ma bɩ, arzana bɩ gasʋ n nawʋŋ ʋ paŋŋa m, tʋntɔʋrɛzannɔ n'a soŋ ʋ.
Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ haay kan Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩnda, an ta an Zaan dɔmɩm ku.
K'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, Elii niŋŋə kʋ n ʋ a zɛm bɩ m Zaan m.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ tʋr m k'an a ma!
Kʋ m her gʋɔɔ nɔɔn makra ba kan bɔ kɩ? Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ yaa nyɩnta daasɩyaa ʋ, ŋn'a to, ŋn'ɩ kʋ bimbirm, ŋ ʋ:
Wɔɔ hir hɛ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n sar ba y! Wɔɔ zɛlaa lɔ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n nyi ka y!
Bala, Zaan k'a bʋr bɩ, a bɩr hɔ bɩrɛ y, a bɩr dɩvɛn mim sɔ y. N n a hɩrɛ, n ʋ: zinə n ta m.

Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bʋr, an nɩ hɔ bɩm, an nɩ hɔ mim, n n'a hɩm ma, n ʋ: Naa do naa, nɔzaa m, bɩ, bɛɛmir m sɔ. Yawʋrsinno kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ hannyɩ m. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ ŋ ʋ, Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ tɩrga."
A m naa, Yeezuu n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ nyaa bam kan kʋrɔ k'a hoserlo ba ʋ gʋta bɩ ŋ n a bɔ a taam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

"Korazɛn, ɩbɩɩ kʋsɩ yɩm! Bɛtsayɩdaa, ɩbɩɩ kʋsɩ yɩm sɔ! Bala, hoserlo kʋ ŋ ba awɔɔ bireyaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ ba ŋ y'a ʋ Tiir kʋ ʋ kan Sidɔn kʋ kɩ, k'an naa brɔɔ huu yiiro gʋr ŋnɩ ŋ ka a ra ŋnɩ suu lo a ra, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a lɛ taa k'a a bɔ a taam.
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, awɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ nyɩntam kʋsɩ, an lɛ da Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ m.
B'ɩbɩɩ, Kapɛrnawum, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ busure ɩ lee ku brama ra? Ɩbɩɩ zerm ɩ gasʋ gəənokʋ ʋ! Bala, kʋ hoserlo kʋ ŋ ba ɩbɩɩ zi rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ ba ŋ y'a ʋ Sodɔm kʋ ʋ, k'an naa a gɔɔta an ta ʋ her dɔmɩm ʋ.
Naa y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dʋdɔkarɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, ɩbɩɩ fɩryɩrɛ yɩm kʋsɩ an lɛ da Sodɔm hɔ ra."

Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu meer ba, a ʋ: "Zɩ k'a a so tara ʋ kan brama kɩ, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m barka, k'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro nyaakʋm da gʋɔɔ hɔɔnzannɔ m kan hɔdonno kɩ m, ɩ bɔkarɛ, ɩ ŋ hɩnka nyɩnɔ poorero m bɩ minto.
Ɩɩn•••, Zɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'a ŋʋa ɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ.
Mɔɔ Zɩ hɔ haay ka mɔɔ ʋ. Zɩ bɩ y'a deem ɩ Nyɩ bɩ dɔ. Nyɩ bɩ y'a deem ɩ Zɩ bɩ dɔ kan gʋɔɔ k'a lɛ n taa k'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ bala.
K'a bʋr mɔɔ zi, awɔɔ haay k'awɔɔ mɔr gorezaa busu an n'a kɔm nɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ hoonsire karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
K'a zu mɔɔ ʋ, k'a mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ si, bala, mɔɔ bʋgʋ-bʋgʋ, mɩŋŋazerlezaa m mɔɔ m. Bɩ, awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ hoonsire yɩm.
Bala, zuuba k'an kʋsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔr kʋ mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ bɩ gore ba ʋ sɔ y."
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, sabaa hinni ʋ, Yeezuu bɔ hɔsɩrarɔ ʋ, nɔ n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ hɔyaa yɩnyarm ŋn'a tiŋŋəre, ŋn'a sʋm.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Dɩga ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, hɔ k'a n a ga barɛ m sabaa hinni ʋ bɩ ŋn'a bam."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mim k'a pakra ba Davɩd m kan a gʋɔɔ kɩ bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ, hɔ niŋŋə k'a a ba, nɔ k'a a nyasʋ bɩ,
gasʋ k'a ʋ Woso zɛʋjɩ bɩncɛ ʋ, an mannɩ bur bɩ gʋr an a bɩ, kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, bɩ lɛ ba ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a bɩ kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ bɛɛ m bala bɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba ra?
Gɛɛ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba Moyiisi lɛrɔ ci b'ʋ, n ʋ: Woso zɛʋjɩ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ bɩr zum sabaa hinni b'ʋ y, bɩ kʋrɔma bɛɛ nɩ y.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Gʋaa ɩ naa ʋ, an lɛ da Wosocɛ bɩ ra.
N ʋ: cicirzɛrɛ mɔɔ lɛ n taa, mannɩbarɛ bɛɛ y, k'awɔɔ meerbaa naa do jɩ ma, awɔɔ bɩ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro dʋdɔ yarlɛ y, bala, ŋ n kʋrɔma y.
Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m sabaa hinni bɩ minzaa."
Cem kʋ Yeezuu ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, ta a ʋ, an aa gasʋ ŋ sokʋmacɛ ʋ.
Lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋaa n nɩ b'ʋ, a wɔ deem n ga. Ŋ n laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʋ: "A a ga m, kʋ n nɩ gʋaa waa sabaa hinni ʋ ra?" A hɩ ŋ y'a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, k'a Yeezuu ku, a mim ka ra.
Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Nka n'awɔɔ bire ʋ, a ser deem bala n n'a dam yaa ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ, b'a bɩ tarɛ an aa a bɔ yaa b'ʋ?
Gʋaa n lɛ da ser m denter la? K'a maam, a a ga m, kʋ n nɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba gʋaa m sabaa hinni ʋ."
A m bɩ, an a hɩ wɔgərzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ wɔ bɩ hʋr!" Gʋaa bɩ n a hʋr, a wɔ bɩ n a banka mɩŋŋa am deem bɩ hɔ bɩ m.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a dɩnda k'a ka zaa ma k'a Yeezuu ku a zɛ.
Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ, gʋaa cir gʋta n zu a jɛ ʋ, an yaabazannɔ wɔɔ waa haay.
A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ: A b'a ka gɔsɩ n a dɔ y.
Kʋ hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ. A a hɩ, a ʋ:
Mɔɔ Zibəənyɩ kʋ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ. Gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam kan m heer kɩ haay bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m Ɛspri bɩ kaŋ ʋ. A mɔɔ lɛrɔ hɩ m do gʋta m.
A b'a kam nyaa ma y. A bɩ zee darɛ y. Gɔsɩ b'a leer mam zaarɔ bire ʋ y.
A bɩ niigə gɔ paŋŋawarzaa darɛ y. A bɩ fɩtɩrɛ k'a sɛ paŋŋa ba ʋ bɩ lihire y. A ba a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, an ta an paŋŋa ka tɩrgabaa ʋ.
Do haay sɩra kaŋ ʋ.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, n bʋr gʋaa m Yeezuu zi, zinə n ta m, an a ba bʋʋ, bəətirbaa n ta m sɔ. Yeezuu n a waa, a n nɩ meerbarɛ, a mɩm n nɩ lɛɛ yɩm sɔ.
Gʋaa cir bɩ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Davɩd Nyɩ bɛɛ m na?"
Bɩ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Naa do k'an naa, la a nawʋm zinəro ra, zinəro jɩtaarɛ Bɛlzebul paŋŋa m bala."
Yeezuu k'a hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ k'a gʋɔɔ bɩr kʋ mam bɩ y'a darɛ. Kʋnɔ gɛɛ, har kʋ kʋmarɛ ba ʋ bɩ y'a dam sɔ.
Kʋ Sʋtaana bʋr an nɩ lam Sʋtaana ra, gʋngʋrɛ m bɩ. A kʋ bɩ y'a dam ma, an jɩm dʋntɔ ra?
Bɩ kʋ Bɛlzebul paŋŋa y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra, awɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ la kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ ŋ la sɔ bɩ, ŋ paŋŋa b'a to ka? Bɩ y'a ka ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n n'awɔɔ dʋdɔ karɛ.
Bɩ kʋ Woso Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra, k'a maam k'a dɔ a ʋ, Woso cirbəə bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi.
A n ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, gʋaa ba ʋ, an b'a dam ma, an gasʋ gʋaa paŋŋazaa har ʋ, k'a mɔrlɔ gʋr, k'a n ser ka, an a kʋsɩ, an bɔkarɛ, an gasʋ, an mɔrlɔ wɔɔ gʋr y.
Gʋaa k'a ba kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ, mɔɔ jɩm m. Gʋaa k'a bɩr a dam mɔɔ han an a so kʋ ma bɩ, a hɩsɩga a nawʋm."
"Naa y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Woso mimbʋnyaarɔ haay kan sʋnsɔrɔ haay kɩ sugur kam gʋɔɔ ʋ. Bɩ, gʋaa biyəə k'a nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sʋnsɔ wʋm bɩ, a b'a sugur yɩm fɩɩga y.
Kʋ gʋaa meer ba Gʋaanyɩ bɩ ma, a y'a sugur yɩm, bɩ k'a meer ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma, a b'a sugur yɩm tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, b'a b'a yɩm booti hinni ʋ sɔ y."
"K'a dɔ a ʋ: gɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ, nyɩ mɩŋŋa a n'a dam. Gɔ bʋnyaa bɩ nɩ nyɩ bʋnyaa dam. N gɔ biyəə dɔ a nyɩ ma.
Mɩnnɔ kʋsɩrɔ, awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ k'a mim mɩŋŋa hɩ a kʋsɩrabaa bɩ nɔ ʋ? Bala, hɔ k'a gʋaa heer han b'a lɛ n'a hɩm.
Gʋaa mɩŋŋa k'a n'a mɩŋŋabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʋm mim mɩŋŋa m a heer ʋ. Gʋaa bʋnyaa k'a n'a bʋnyaabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʋm mim bʋnyaa m a heer ʋ sɔ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ: Meerbaa k'a nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ haay kʋ gʋaa n'a bam bɩ, Woso y'a larm ma.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ meerbaa n n'ɩ bʋmbɔrɛ, ɩ meerbaa n n'ɩ dam mim ʋ sɔ."
Naa kur bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ɩ hoser ba k'ʋ a yɩ."
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Her naa gʋɔɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ m, ŋ bɩr Woso lɛ sire y, ŋ y'a kam makra ma, bɩ kʋ makra bɩ nɩ, ŋ bɩ makra vanta yɩrɛ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zonas makra bɩ bɛɛ y.
Bala, Zonas k'a gɔɔta zɔ gʋta nɔ ʋ hi ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ bɩ, sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ gɔɔtam maam sɔ tara noom ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ, sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ.

Dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, Niniivɩ gʋɔɔ wutire, ŋnɩ her gʋɔɔ nɔɔn da lɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ gumə war bɩ hɩnka ŋ nɩ. Bala, Niniivɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ a bɔ a taam ŋnɩ sugur yɛ Zonas Woso lemim padarɛ ma. Bɩ naa ʋ bɩ, gʋaa ta ʋ an lɛ da Zonas ra.

Dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, lʋ cir k'a a to jɩsadɔpaasɩ ma an bʋr k'a b'a tʋr ka Salomɔɔn mindɔrɛ meerbaa ma bɩ, a zamaana naa do gumə war bɩ hɩnkarɛ ŋ nɩ. Bala, a to a ʋ kʋ laatʋrɛ ʋ, an bʋr k'a b'a tʋr ka ma, an bɔkarɛ, gʋaa ɩ naa ʋ an lɛ da Salomɔɔn ra."
"Kʋ zinə bɔ gʋaa mɛ ʋ, a da an nawʋm lɛɛ gəəro zi, k'a a ka hoonsire bɩncɛ ma, bɩ k'a bɩr a yɩrɛ,
b'a hɩ a heer ʋ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ yɩ m wusigəre m bɩncɛ gusire ʋ.' K'a yaa leeku bɩ, a yaa dɩga a gɔsɩ n a so cɛ b'ʋ, bɩ dintim ba b'ʋ sɔ y. Hɔ haay ɩ cɛ b'ʋ, a bɩncɛrɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa.

K'a yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, b'a ta an aa zinəro vantɔɔ gaa saanhɩna, ŋ bʋnyaabaa n lɛ da a mɩŋŋa ra, ŋnɩ bɩ gasʋ, ŋn'a so gʋaa bɩ do ʋ. Gʋaa bɩ do mim bɩ bʋnyaabaa lɛ dam biisi hɔ ra. Zamaana naa do k'an bʋnyaa naa, a mim yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ."
Yeezuu k'a nɩ meer bam kan gʋɔɔ cir bɩ kɩ bɩ, a da kan a danyɩnɔ kɩ bʋr, ŋnɩ jɩm garga ra, ŋn'a ŋʋam k'a meer ba kan kɩ. [
Gʋaa n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da kan ɩ danyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ garga ra, ŋ lɛ n taa k'a meer ba kan ɩ kɩ."]
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ gʋaa bɩ nʋ, a ʋ: "Nka m mɔɔ da? Nkɔɔ m mɔɔ danyɩnɔ?"
A n bɔkarɛ, an a wɔ nyɔɔ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ da bɩ ba n nɩ, kan mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Gʋaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ bam bɩ, mɔɔ danyɩ m, mɔɔ danlʋ m, mɔɔ da m."
Hinni bɩ dɔ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu bɔ har ʋ, an aa nyɩnta higʋta bɩ lɛ ra,
zamaa cir gʋta a so kʋ ma a jɩr ʋ. A m bɩ, Yeezuu n kɔ, an aa nyɩnta kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, zamaa bɩ haay n nɩ jɩnɩm hi bɩ lɛ ra.
A hɔ dɩnda ŋ nɩ gʋta hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ nɔ ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ bɔ, k'a hɔ duu.
A duu k'a nawʋm bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo zaa gʋr ma, bɛnnɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ b'a bɩ haay.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo jaarɔ bɩncɛ ʋ, taa n nyɩnta b'ʋ gʋta y. Hɔyaa bɩ n bɔ lɛɛm, kʋ taa ba b'ʋ gʋta bɩ minto.
Woso k'a der bɩ, a na hɔka bɩ ma, an ga, k'a məsi ba ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a zar laa gaa ʋ, laa bɩ n haan, an ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ, ŋnɩ haan, ŋnɩ ma, ŋnɩ nyɩ da. A yaa deem yaa ka zɔrɔ, deem busɔrdɩ, deem bukərku.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ tʋr m bɩ, k'an a tʋr ka ma."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ n tɩr meer ba kan ŋ kɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom nɩ?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Woso a ka k'awɔɔ n Woso cirbəə bɩ minno kʋ ŋ y'a nyaakʋm da rɔ wɔɔ dɔ, b'a n a ka nawɔnnɔ ʋ y.
Bala, gʋaa k'an ta hɔ m bɩ, n y'a yarɛ n n a ka ʋ, a hɔ n yɩ gʋta, bɩ gʋaa k'a ba m bɩ, baa hɔ k'an ta m bɩ, n bɩ yɔm nɩ.
Naa y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan ŋ kɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom m. Bala, ŋ yɩ dɩgam, bɩ ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y. Ŋ y'a tʋr kam, bɩ ŋ bɩr a marɛ, ŋ bɩr a jɩ mam sɔ y.
Kʋ hɔ kʋ Ezayii a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ ŋ minto. A ʋ: Awɔɔ mim mam gʋta, b'awɔɔ b'a jɩ marɛ y. Awɔɔ dɩgam mɩŋŋa, b'awɔɔ bɩ lɛɛ yɩrɛ y.
Bala, do naa do heer a ta. Ŋ tʋr bɩr mim marɛ y, ŋ y'a mɩnyaarɔ tɩnta, k'a bɩ lɛɛ yɩ, k'a bɩ mim ma y, k'a heer bɩ mim jɩ ma y, k'a bɩ sugur yɛ, a a bɔ a taam kʋ mɔɔ n a waa y!
B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ jɩra: awɔɔ mɩnyaarɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, awɔɔ tʋʋrɔ ɩ mim mam!
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gʋta kan gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ gʋta kɩ a ŋʋa, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm naa yɩ, bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y. K'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam naa ma, bɩ ŋ n a ma y."
"K'a tʋr ka hɔduure hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom bɩ jɩ ma.
Hɔyaa k'a nɩ zaa lezi bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim bɩ mam, bɩ ŋ bɩr a jɩ mam nɔ wɔɔ m. Bala, lɛɛm bɩ, Sʋtaana lemim kʋ n y'a duu ŋ heer ʋ bɩ si ŋ han.
Hɔyaa k'a nɩ jaarɔ bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ marɛ, ŋn'a sim lɛɛm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m brɔɔ m.
Bɩ, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ məsi ba ʋ y, hindeem gʋɔɔ m. Kʋ heerzar gɛɛ fɩryɩrɛ bʋr Woso lemim bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ ŋ y'a do lɛɛm.
Hɔyaa k'a nɩ laarɔ bireyaa ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋnɩ Woso lemim bɩ ma, durnya hɔɔndama kan a arzaka lɛtaama kɩ ŋ lemim bɩ zɛ, a bɩr nyɩ darɛ y.
Hɔyaa k'a nɩ lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Woso lemim bɩ ma, ŋn'a jɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ m: Ŋ n'ɩ nyɩ dam. A yaa deem ɩ nyɩ dam zɔrɔ, deem busɔrdɩ, deem bukərku."
Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom vanta da, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a hɔdo mɩŋŋa duu a hɔsɩra ʋ bɩ kɩ.
Gum k'a bɩ da gʋɔɔ nɩ hinceem bam bɩ, gʋaa bɩ jɩm deem n bʋr, an bɩ sʋr duu hɔyaa bɩ barla, an a hʋr.
Hɔyaa bɩ k'a bɩ bɔ, an ma, an yaa ka bɩ, sʋr bɩ n bɔ sɔ.
Hɔsɩrazaa bɩ zibəənyɩnɔ n b'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Zuuba, hɔdo mɩŋŋa bɛɛ ɩbɩɩ duu ɩ hɔsɩra b'ʋ ra? A a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ sʋr n bʋr, an ta ʋ?'
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: 'Jɩm deem ɩ hɔ naa do ba'. A m naa, zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ʋ ta, ʋ aa sʋr bɩ wʋnwʋr la?' A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ:
'Ayy••• Bala, k'awɔɔ k'a sʋr bɩ wʋnwʋr, awɔɔ cenle a hɔka bɩ wʋnwʋr sɔ.

K'a ŋ to kʋ ŋ nɩ ma kan kʋ kɩ, k'an ta, an aa hɔdarɛ dɔmɩm ku. Hɔdarɛ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩm zibənno wɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ: K'a lɛɛ ka a sʋr bɩ gʋr, a kʋsɩ, a da sɛ ʋ, k'a bɔkarɛ a hɔyaa bɩ gʋr a zar m sɩ ʋ.' "
Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom vanta da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma mutardɩ yaa, kʋ gʋaa n'a sam, an n'a duum a hɔsɩra ʋ bɩ kɩ.
A m hɔdo haay rɔ wɔɔ poore. Bɩ, kʋ n y'a duu an bɔ, ma an nawʋm, an nɩ lɛ dam hɔyaa haay ra: a ba an nawʋm gɔ gʋta, bɛnnɔ n b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ cɛ kɩnka a vəŋŋəro ma."
A a ya an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ rɛ kan nyʋnyɔɔ kɩ. Lʋ n a sa, an a tʋntɔ kan nyisi kɩ mɔr gʋta lɛ ma kaakʋ. Nyisi bɩ n ta an der."
Minno nɔɔn duro haay hɩ Yeezuu n nawʋrɛ ŋ nɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom m. A bɩr hɔsɩ hɩm gʋɔɔ cir bɩ m, k'a hɩ bɛɛ a nawʋm hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom nɩ y.
Kʋ hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa b'a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ. A a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ gʋrɛ, m hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, m hɔ k'a nyaakʋm da durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʋ tee••• bɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ.
Yeezuu k'a zamaa cir bɩ to, an doo bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Sʋr hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom bɩ jɩ dɩnda wɔɔ m."
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa do duum bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m.
Hɔsɩra bɩ, durnya m. Hɔdo mɩŋŋa bɩ, Woso cirbəə nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m. Sʋr bɩ, Sʋtaana nyɩnɔ m.
Jɩm k'a sʋr bɩ duu bɩ, Sʋtaana m. Hɔdarɛ bɩ, durnya nyarɛ m. Hɔdənno wɔɔ, malɛɛkarɔ m.
Amba kʋ ŋ nɩ sʋr gʋrm ŋn'a dam sɛ ʋ bɩ, yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʋ:
Gʋaanyɩ bɩ y'a malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔrɛ, ŋnɩ hɔ haay k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ gʋm Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ gʋr Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ. Ŋ mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ gʋrm sɔ, ŋnɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ,
ŋn'aa ŋ zar sɛhar ʋ. Ŋ nyi kam b'ʋ, ŋn'a sɔ sʋ.
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ tɩrgarɔ wɔɔ gure am wosogure hɔ bɩ m, ŋ Zɩ bɩ cirbəə nɔ ʋ b'ʋ. Gʋaa k'a nɩ tʋr m, k'a n'a tʋr ka ma."

"Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ rɛ kan arzaka gʋta kʋ n y'a nyaakʋm da hɔsɩra ʋ bɩ kɩ, gʋaa n sʋr la: a n so ra, an a nyaakʋm da. K'a heer nyɔɔ bɩ, an a hʋr, an aa hɔ haay k'an ta m nɔ wɔɔ hɛɛ, an hɔsɩra bɩ do si m."
"Woso cirbəə b'a ya an bɔ kʋ rɛ kan terbarɛzaa k'a n'a kam nyɛɛnyaarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma kɩ.
K'a nyɛɛnyaa wɩsɩ yɩ, a busoo nɩ yɩm gʋta bɩ, an ta, an aa hɔ haay k'an ta m nɔ wɔɔ hɛɛ, an b'a si m."
"Woso cirbəə b'a ya, an bɔ kʋ rɛ kan zaŋŋa kʋ ŋ n'a zom hi ʋ, an nɩ zɔ do haay gʋrlɛ an nɩ bɔm nɩ bɩ kɩ.
Kʋ zɔnɔ a han bɩ n y'a gaa, n n bɔ m hi bɩ lɛ ra. N n bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta, ŋnɩ zɔnɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋkɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ zar mɔr ʋ, ŋnɩ zɔnɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ lo.
Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʋ. Malɛɛkarɔ zɛm bɩ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ gʋ gʋɔɔ tɩrgarɔ wɔɔ ma,
ŋnɩ ŋ zar sɛhar ʋ. Ŋ nyi kam b'ʋ, ŋn'a sɔ sʋ."
Yeezuu n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lar, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ naa haay woo••• ma mɩŋŋa ra?" Ŋ ʋ: "Ɩɩn•••"
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaamba biyəə k'a n'a bam Woso cirbəə kʋ bɩ karɩndanyɩ bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ rɛ kan harzaa k'a nɩ hɔ gusire kan hɔ daa kɩ bɔrɛ a arzaka ʋ bɩ kɩ."
Yeezuu k'a hɔbɔkʋrɛnoonno nɔɔn duro da an ŋ nya bɩ, a a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ,

an doo kʋ k'a tʋr ʋ b'ʋ. A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam kʋ bɩ do sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ, zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ a to mindɔrɛ naa do m ka? A a ba lɔ, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ?
Gɔwurezaa bɩ nyɩ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m na? Maarii nyɩ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m na? Zakkɩ, Zozɛf, Sɩmɔɔn, Ziidi, a danyɩnɔ bɛɛ m nawɔnnɔ ra?
Awɔɔ danlʋrɔ ba wɔɔ bire ʋ naa ʋ ra? A a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ, an n'a dam naa do haay barɛ ma?"
Naa do a ka, ŋ n kaanm Yeezuu m. A m naa, Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ɩ daʋrɛ yɩm bɩncɛ haay ʋ, b'a bɩr a yɩm a kʋ ʋ, a bɩr a yɩm a har ʋ sɔ y."
Yeezuu n hoser ba b'ʋ gʋta y, ŋ sɩrakarɛwar bɩ tɔ ma.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ Yeezuu mim ma, bala a tɔ bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ.
A n n'a hɩrɛ a zibəənyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do, Zaan-Batiisi m! K'a a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ y'a ka, an paŋŋa yɩ, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ."
Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ka, ŋnɩ Zaan nyasʋ, ŋn'a sur, ŋn'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, a dam Filipi lʋ k'an ta m, a tɔ m Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ bɩ minto.
Bala, Zaan a hɩ Hɩrɔɔdɩ m, a ʋ: "A n a ga m k'ɩbɩɩ n a ba ɩ lʋ y!"
Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ŋʋa k'a Zaan zɛ gər, b'a ɩ nyi bam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m. Bala, brɔɔ haay ɩ dɩgam Zaan ma, ŋ ʋ: Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m.
Bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm cibsa hinni ʋ, Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ sar ba gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ bir cibsa ma rɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ, an Hɩrɔɔdɩ nɔ yɩ.
Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a wer si, a ʋ: hɔ k'a lɛ n taa haay bɩ, a y'a kaŋ ʋ.
Nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ da bɩ n a nyʋnnyɔɔta, a ʋ: "A n Zaan-Batiisi mim yɛ laaga burə ʋ." Nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ n a yɛ maam sɔ.
Cir bɩ heer n a zar, b'a b'a dam ma, an a gu y, k'a wer si hɔbɩrɛbinno wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ minto. A m bɩ, an lɛ ka kʋ n n'a ka ʋ.
A n gʋaa deem nyɔɔ, an aa Zaan mim gʋ ma lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ,
an bʋr m laaga ʋ, an b'a ka nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ b'ʋ, an a si, an aa a ka a da ʋ.
Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ Zaan gər bɩ sa, ŋn'aa bir, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'aa hɔ k'a a ba bɩ hɩ Yeezuu m.
Yeezuu k'a mim naa do ma bɩ, a a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ, an da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ k'a ta toore ma a deem. Gʋɔɔ cir kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hʋr a kʋrɔ ʋ a gam ma, k'a zu a jɛ ʋ.
Yeezuu k'a bɔ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a gʋaa cir yɩ gʋta, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ cicir n a nyasʋ, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ ŋ yaabazannɔ waarɛ.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gum da, bɩ pooyaa m naa, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra kʋ ŋ nɩ ta kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'aa hɔbɩrɛ si, ŋn'a bɩ!"
Bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A n a ga m, ŋn'a hʋr y. K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ a zim."
A m bɩ, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bur soor kan zɔnɔ kɩ hɩɩya wɔɔ n ta m naa ʋ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ŋ ka m ʋ naa ʋ".

A n lɛ ka, kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta bur bɩ ra, an bur soorlɔ wɔɔ si kan zɔ hɩɩya bɩ kɩ a wɔ ʋ, an dɩga brama, an barka da Woso m. A n buuro wɔɔ zɩnzɛ ra, an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a ka zamaa b'ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay a bɩ, an ŋ ka. Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bur kan zɔ kɩ kuuro kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma bueerehɩɩya.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔ bɩ bɩ rɔ wɔɔ, yaarɔ wɔɔ lɛ a zɔ tisi soor ma. N n lannɔ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ lɛ sa y.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a ka karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bra higʋta bɩ gəm deem la, k'a gɔɔta a zamaa bɩ da zaa ra.
K'a zamaa bɩ da zaa ra an a nya bɩ, a a hʋr a deem, an ta ci ra, k'a yaa da. Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, a gɔɔta b'ʋ a deem.
Kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ n a gʋ hi bɩ lɛ bɩ ma, an ta laatʋ hi bɩ bire ʋ. Bala, hɩnhɛr y'a nyam kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zi, hikurero wɔɔ n'a monɩm kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ
Dɔ k'a bʋr an nɩ mɛm bɩ, a wuti an tɔ hi bɩ ra, an nɩ tarɛ ŋ zi.
Kʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a yɩ an nɩ tam hi bɩ ra bɩ, nyibəə gasʋ ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Toor m!" Ŋ n'ɩ zee dam.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu meer ba kan ŋ kɩ, a ʋ: "K'a sɩra ka, mɔɔ m, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y!"
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, k'ɩbɩɩ m paan••• k'ɩ lɛ ka kʋ m bʋr ɩ zi hi bɩ burə ʋ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr." Pɩyɛɛr n bɔ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ tɔm hi bɩ ra k'a ta Yeezuu zi.
K'a hɩnhɛr bɩ yɩ an nɩ hɔnm kan paŋŋa kɩ bɩ, a da bɔ ʋ, hi bɩ n'a monɩm, an zee da, a ʋ: "Zuuba, m bɔ lɛ m!"
Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a wɔ nyɔɔ an a nyasʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ sɩrakarɛ poore! A lɔ ɩbɩɩ n sɩnsɩm ka?"
Ŋ n'a da kʋ ʋ, ŋnɩ gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ hɩnhɛr bɩ n jɩm.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kukurə zɛ a taa, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m paan•••."
Kʋ ŋ higʋta bɩ zɛ ra bɩ, ŋ yaa lee ku Zenezarɛtɩ ʋ.
Kʋ bɩ do gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu yɩ, ŋn'a dɔ bɩ, ŋ yaa a hɩ kʋ b'ʋ haay kan kʋrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʋ, a bʋr. Ŋ n bʋr yaabazannɔ wɔɔ m haay Yeezuu zi.
Ŋ n a yɛ han, k'a a wɔ da a huu lɛ tɔkkɛ ma. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a wɔ da ma rɔ wɔɔ waarɛ yɩ haay.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ a to Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ:
"Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩr zum wɔɔ yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ ʋ? Ŋ n'ɩ hɔ bɩm, bɩ ŋ n a wɔ hir y. A n a ga nɩ y."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "B'awɔɔ, a lɔ awɔɔ bɩr zum Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, a bɔkarɛ, an nɩ zum a yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ ʋ?
Woso a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ. Bɩ gʋaa k'a zɩ bɔ ʋ gɛɛ a da a bɔ ʋ, pakra m, kʋ n n a zɛ gər.'
B'awɔɔ ʋ, kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a zɩ m, gɛɛ a da m, a ʋ: 'Daahan kʋ mɔɔ m ga m, m a ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ, Woso hɔ nɩ.'
Pakra bɛɛ m kʋ gʋaa bɩ do m a da a zɩ kan a da kɩ han y. Woso lemim bɩ zar awɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ a yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ minto.
Zambʋzannɔ, Ezayii gumə ta ʋ, an awɔɔ mim hɩ, a ʋ:
Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro, mɔɔ da ŋ nawʋŋ ʋ a lɛ m, bɩ ŋ heer laatʋ mɔɔ ma.
Daʋrɛ kʋ ŋ n'a kam mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, vam m. Bala, durnya mim ŋn'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ m, ɩ ʋ Woso hɔ m."
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu zamaa bɩ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a tʋr ka mɩŋŋa k'a jɩ ma!
Hɔ k'a nɩ gasʋm gʋaa lɛ ʋ an ta a nɔ ʋ bɩ bɛɛ nɩ dintim kam ma y, bɩ hɔ k'a nɩ bɔm gʋaa lɛ ʋ bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma."
A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, a busu ŋ ma ra?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Hɔ haay kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ n a sɔɔn bɩ, n y'a wʋrm.
K'a ŋ to, bʋʋrɔ nɩ bʋʋrɔ gaam. Bɩ, kʋ bʋʋ bʋr, an nɩ bʋʋ gaarɛ, ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya haay y'a zarm yaa ʋ!"
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do jɩ hɩ ʋ m."
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ gɔɔta, awɔɔ n a jɩ dɔ ra?
Awɔɔ n a dɔ, a ʋ, hɔ haay k'a nɩ gasʋm gʋaa lɛ ʋ, an nɩ tarɛ a nɔ ʋ bɩ, ta an nawʋm, an nɩ bɔm garga ra ra?
Bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ bɔm gʋaa lɛ ʋ bɩ, a to a nawʋm gʋaa heer ʋ, bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma.
Bala, gʋaa heer hɔɔndarɛ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ bɔŋ ʋ: gərzɛrɛ, jaandarɛ, koorbarɛ, gʋɔɔ tɔ zarlɛ, kan sʋnsɔwʋrɛ kɩ.
Nawɔnnɔ nɩ dintim kam gʋaa ma, bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, ɩ n ɩ wɔ hir bɩ bɩr dintim kam gʋaa ma y."
Yeezuu k'a cem b'ʋ bɩ, a ta Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Lʋ nɩ b'ʋ an ta Yeezuu zi, zɩɩfʋ bɛɛ nɩ y, Kanaan do nyɩ m, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "M cicir zɛ Zuuba, Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ zinə n ta m, an nɩ fɩr kam ma gʋta."
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ y. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma, ŋn'a yɛ han, ŋ ʋ: "La lʋ naa do ra, bala, a ɩ wɔɔ kɔm kan a zeedarɛ kɩ."
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɔɔ n y'a ʋ Israyɛl gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan seero kʋ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ zi."
Bɩ, lʋ b'a gu an bɩ kukurə zɛ a taa, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, bʋr ɩ da mɔɔ han!"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A n a ga m, n nɩ nyɩnɔ hɔbɩrɛ sa, n n a ka jinnyɩnɔ ʋ y."
Lʋ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, Zuuba, baa jinnyɩnɔ wɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bʋtʋ k'a a lo ŋ zuubarɔ wɔɔ taa bɩ gʋrlɛ, ŋn'a bɩrɛ."
A m naa Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Lʋ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ gandaa ʋ! Ɩ hɔ k'ɩ lɛ n taa bɩ yɩm!" Lɛɛm bɩ, a nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ b'a waa wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ.
Yeezuu a hʋr b'ʋ, an ta Galilee higʋta lɛ ra, an aa der ci ra, an nyɩnta.
Gʋɔɔ cir gʋta bʋr zi, lʋgɔrɔ m, bʋʋrɔ m, gandeenzannɔ m, bəətinno kan yaabazannɔ vantɔɔ kɩ m, ŋnɩ bɩ ŋ nyɩnta Yeezuu taa, an ŋ waa.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə, kʋ bəətinno nɩ meer barɛ, gandeenzannɔ n a gannɔ yɩ, lʋgɔrɔ nɩ tam mɩŋŋa, bʋʋrɔ nɩ lɛɛ yɩm bɩ minto. Ŋ y'a lɛ bɔ Israyɛl Woso ʋ.

Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zamaa bɩ cicir ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, bala, a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hɔ m naa, ŋ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, hɔsɩ ba ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a bɩrɛ y. Mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m ŋ da zaa ra kan nɔ kɩ y. Kʋ n bɛɛ nɩ, ŋ y'a dundom zaa ra."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'ʋ bur yɩ ka pooyaa ʋ naa ʋ, ʋ a ka gʋɔɔ cir naa ʋ, k'an ŋ ka?"
Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bur karɔ n ta awɔɔ ʋ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Saanhɩna kan zɔ poorenyɩnɔ kɩ."
A n lɛ ka kʋ zamaa bɩ n nyɩnta tara ʋ.
A n bur saanhɩna bɩ sa kan zɔnɔ wɔɔ kɩ an yaa da Woso m barka, an n'a zɩnzɛm la, an n'a kam a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'a kam, zamaa b'ʋ.
Ŋ n a bɩ, an ŋ ka, an a yɔ, ŋn'a kuuro gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma saanhɩna.
Zamaa bɩ gʋɔɔyaarɔ a zɔ tisi si ma, n n lannɔ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ lɛ sa y.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ da zaa ra, an da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ an ta Magadaan ʋ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋnɩ hoser yɛ han, k'a makra ba.
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ woso lɛ a zo, b'awɔɔ ʋ, lɛɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa, bala, brama bɩ piin•••.
Dɔgta m, b'awɔɔ ʋ la bam her, bala, brama bɩ piin••• b'a kundə sɔ. Awɔɔ brama mim dɔ, b'awɔɔ b'a dam ma a hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bam dɩɩtaa rɔ wɔɔ jɩ dɔ y.
Her gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr Woso lɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ ɩ hoser yɛrɛ, bɩ ŋ bɩ hoser vanta yɩrɛ kʋ Zonas hɔ bɩ bɛɛ y." A n a gʋ ŋ ma, an cem.
A hʋr kʋ Yeezuu ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ ŋnɩ bra higʋta bɩ gəm deem bɩ ra bɩ, bur tɔ bɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi, k'a a ba laatʋ farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ nyʋnyɔɔ bɩ ma."
Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ n bur sa bɩ y'a ka an naa hɩ."
Yeezuu n a dɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A lɔ awɔɔ n'a hɩm kʋ m, a ʋ: kʋ wɔɔ n bur sa bɩ minto nɩ? Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ gʋta y!
Awɔɔ gɔɔta a bɩr naa jɩ dɔm na? Kʋ mɔɔ bur soor zɩnzɛ ra, m a ka gʋɔɔyaarɔ tisi soor ʋ bɩ, a tɔ b'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ ra? Awɔɔ kuuro gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ?
Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ bur saanhɩna zɩnzɛ ra m a ka gʋaa tisi si ʋ bɩ, kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ awɔɔ kuuro gʋr ʋ? A tɔ b'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ ra?
A a ba lɔ awɔɔ n a jɩ ma, a ʋ, bur bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma? K'a dundo a zi kan farizɛɛnrɔ, sadisɛɛnrɔ nyʋnyɔɔ bɩ kɩ."
A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a jɩ ma, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, bur barɛ nyʋnyɔɔ bɛɛ an n'a hɩm ma y. Farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ hɔdɩndarɛ an n'a hɩm ma.
Ŋ yaa lee ku kʋ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma, ŋ ʋ: Filipi-Sezaaree kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Yeezuu laaka da a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ han, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: nka m Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nɩ?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: Zaan-Batiisi m, nawɔnnɔ ʋ: Elii m, gɔsɩnnɔ a ya, ŋ ʋ: Zeremii m, gɛɛ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ deem m."
A n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: nka m mɔɔ nɩ?"
Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ si, an a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Krista bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ nyɩ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, Sɩmɔɔn, Zonas nyɩnnɩ, bala, gʋaa bɛɛ sɩra naa do hɩnka ɩbɩɩ nɩ y. Mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, Pɩyɛɛr n'ɩbɩɩ m, bɩ ci naa do mɔɔ n nɩ m sokʋma bɩ dɔrɛ a burə ʋ. Zɛ kan a paŋŋa kɩ bɩ bʋrm la y.
Mɔɔ Woso cirbəə cɛnyɩrɔ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n n'a kʋsɩm tara burə ʋ bɩ, n y'a kʋsɩm arzana ʋ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n n'a hʋrm tara burə ʋ bɩ, n y'a hʋrm arzana ʋ."
Naa do jɛ ʋ, a lɛ ka ŋ ʋ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ: ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ m, ŋ ʋ, Krista n'awɔɔ nɩ y.

A n a sa wakatɩ bɩ do ma, Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Pakra m, kʋ m ta Zerizalɛm ʋ kʋ m aa fɩr yɩ gʋta gʋɔɔgusinno kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ wɔ ʋ. Ŋ mɔɔ zɛm gər. B'a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, Woso mɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʋ."
Pɩyɛɛr n Yeezuu gaa, an bɔ m toore ma, an nɩ nyaa bam kan kɩ, a ʋ. "Woso dɔrɛ ɩ ma kan naa kɩ Zuuba, mim naa do b'ɩ b'ɩ yɩrɛ y."
Bɩ, Yeezuu a bɔ, an a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Ɩ jɛ bɔ mɔɔ jɩr ʋ! Sʋtaana, mɔɔ makra ɩbɩɩ n'a bam, ɩbɩɩ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Woso hɔ kɩ y. Gʋɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ m."
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a zu mɔɔ ʋ, k'an sɔ a mɩŋŋa m, k'an a gɔdarkʋra busu, an zu mɔɔ ʋ.
Bala, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a a meeyaa bʋmbɔ, a b'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa ga mɔɔ tɔ ma a y'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a so durnya hɔ haay ʋ, an bɔkarɛ an kʋrɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ ma, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka? Gɛɛ gʋaa y'a mɩsɩrbaa lʋrm kan bɔ kɩ?
Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ a Zɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, a gʋaa biyəə zibəə nyɔɔdʋ kaŋ ʋ."
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ naa, gɔsɩnnɔ zɛ b'a kure, kʋ ŋ n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩ an bʋr a cirbəə nɔ ʋ y."
Dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu Pɩyɛɛr gaa, kan Zakkɩ kɩ a danzaa Zaan kɩ, an bɔ ŋ nɩ toore ma a minto, ci jintə mim ʋ.
A n a lʋr ŋ mɩm ʋ. A meer nɩ yɔm am wosogure hɔ bɩ m, a huuro wɔɔ nɩ nyakɩ bɔm, ŋn'a ba fu fɩrr•••.
Elii n a hɩnka ŋ nɩ kan Moyiisi kɩ, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan Yeezuu kɩ.
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ naa ʋ, a mɩŋŋa. K'ɩ lɛ taa, kʋ m bur ba kaakʋ: ɩbɩɩ hɔ deem, Moyiisi hɔ deem, Elii hɔ deem."
K'a nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, warkʋ k'a nɩ yɔm bʋr an b'a ku ŋ la. Meerbaa n a to warkʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ba mɔɔ Nyɩ m na. Mɔɔ ŋʋa gʋta. A mɔɔ nɔ yɩ paan•••. K'a a tʋr ka ma."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a dundo, ŋn'a meer kunku tara ma, dabɔʋ gʋta k'a ŋ nyasʋ bɩ minto.
Yeezuu n a zɔ ŋ ma, an a wɔ da ŋ ma, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a wuti, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y!"
Kʋ ŋ y'a bɔ ŋnɩ dɩga bɩ, ŋ n gɔsɩ yɩ dɔ, kʋ Yeezuu y'a deem bɛɛ y.
Kʋ ŋ n'ɩ zerm ci bɩ ra bɩ, a lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'awɔɔ yɩ naa, a b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y, k'an ta, an Gʋaanyɩ bɩ mɩmbɔʋrɛ ku gəəno bire ʋ."
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Elii lɛɛkarɛ an bʋr?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, Elii nɩ lɛɛkarɛ an bʋr k'a bɩ hɔ haay banka.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Elii bʋr kara, bɩ ŋ n a dɔ y, a hɔɔnhɔ ŋ y'a ba m. Gʋaanyɩ bɩ fɩr yɩrɛ ŋ wɔ ʋ maam sɔ."
A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, Zaan-Batiisi an n'a hɩm ma.
Kʋ ŋ lee ku zamaa cir gʋta bɩ zi bɩ, gʋaa a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an kukurə zɛ a taa, an a hɩ m, a ʋ:
"Karɩnsaamba, m nyɩnnɩ cicir zɛ, hɔɔ n'a zɛm, an nɩ fɩr yɩm gʋta, a tɩr a da sɛ ʋ, gɛɛ hi ʋ.
Mɔɔ n bʋr m ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, bɩ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋn'a waa y."
Yeezuu n meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʋ: "Zamaana sɩrakarɛwar zannɔ, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm bam karɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ? Dɔmɩm karɔ mɔɔ nɩ m yarɛ, m yɛ kɔrɛ ma awɔɔ minto? K'a bʋr m mɔɔ zi."
Yeezuu n həən si zinə bɩ ma, an bɔ nyɩ bɩ mɛ ʋ, nyɩ bɩ n laafɩɩ yɩ wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar a deem, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ y'a ka wɔɔ n ʋ da ma, ʋ la zinə bɩ ra?"

A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ k'an poore bɩ m. Bala, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan mutardɩ yaa kɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɩm ci naa do m, a ʋ: wuti, ɩ ta lɛɛ naa do ʋ! A wutire an ta, awɔɔ bɩ jɩram hɔsɩ barɛ ra y. [
Bɩ, zinə ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hɔ ba ʋ an b'a dam ma an a ka, an bɔ, kʋ yaadarɛ bɛɛ kan lɛkʋsɩrɛ kɩ y.]"
Hindeem ʋ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a so kʋ ma haay Galilee ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N Gʋaanyɩ bɩ dam gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
Ŋ y'a zɛm, b'a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, Woso y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ." Meerbaa naa do ŋ heer zar gʋta.
Kʋ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ lee ku Kapɛrnawum ʋ bɩ, Wosocɛ yawʋrsinno a zɔ Pɩyɛɛr ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ karɩnsaamba bɩ bɩr Wosocɛ yawʋr kam na?"
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A y'a kam." Pɩyɛɛr k'a lee ku har ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu lɛɛ ka m an a lar, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, nkɔɔ durnya cinno nɔɔm nɩ yawʋr sire ŋ han? Ŋ nyɩnɔ m gɛɛ, saanɔɔ nɩ?"
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Saanɔɔ m." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'a maam ŋ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ ba ŋ barla y.

Bɩ k'ʋ lɛ baa kʋ ŋ n'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ, ʋ ʋ zar a ma bɩ, ta higʋta b'ʋ, ɩ yaa ka zo hi b'ʋ. Zɔ niŋŋə k'a nɩ lɛɛ kam an ka bɩ mom bɩ, bɔ zɔ bɩ do m, ɩ lɛ gʋ, ɩbɩɩ busoo yɩrɛ a lɛ b'ʋ, an nɩ mɔɔ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ yawʋr karɛ bɔm. K'ɩ bɔ ʋ, ɩ b'a ka yawʋrsinno wɔɔ ʋ."
Wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Nka m jɩtaarɛ Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ?"
Yeezuu n nyɩ poore bir an a jɩm ŋ bire ʋ,
an bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a lʋr a a ba, am nyɩ poore hɔ bɩ nɩ, awɔɔ bɩ gasʋm Woso cirbəə b'ʋ y.
Gʋaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa zerm am nyɩ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, bɩ zaa n jɩtaarɛ Woso cirbəə b'ʋ.
Gʋaa k'a nyɩ poore si mɔɔ tɔ ma am nyɩ naa do m bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a yɩ m si."
"Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a ka nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka mɔɔ rɔ nɔɔn duro gʋaa deem n a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ, kʋ n jɛnlajaa gʋta kʋsɩ a wer ma, n n a da higʋta ʋ, a jɩra.
Kʋsɩ nɩ kan durnya kɩ, kʋ minno n ta ʋ, ŋn'ɩ gʋɔɔ dom mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ bɩ minto. Minno wɔɔ duro bɩ nyam durnya nɔ ʋ y, bɩ kʋsɩ ɩ kan gʋaa k'a ka ŋn'ɩ zɛm bɩ kɩ.

K'ɩ wɔ gɛɛ, ɩ gam y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra, ɩ zo laatʋ ɩ ma k'ɩ gasʋ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ b'ʋ, ɩ wɔ deem m, gɛɛ ɩ gam deem m, bɩ jɩra, gasʋ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʋrɛ ɩ wɔ hɩɩya m, gɛɛ ɩ gam hɩɩya m sɛhar k'a lihire ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
K'ɩ mɩnyaa y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ bɔ ʋ ɩ zo laatʋ ɩ ma, k'ɩ gasʋ ɩ mɩnyaa deem m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, bɩ jɩra, gasʋ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʋrɛ ɩ mɩm hɩɩya m sɛhar ʋ bɩ m.
K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka a nyɩnɔ nɔɔn duro gʋaa deem bɔ ʋ y. Bala, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, arzana ʋ bɩ, ŋ malɛɛkarɔ ɩ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ mɛ yɩm wakatɩ haay. [
Bala Gʋaanyɩ bɩ, bʋr a ʋ, k'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ.]
Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lʋnlɔ? Kʋ gʋaa ɩ seero m zɔrɔ, deem n a bɔ ʋ an nyaam, a bɩ bunɛɛhʋ a yaa nɛɛhʋ rɔ wɔɔ tom zigi ra, an ta an aa a ka deem k'a nyaam bɩ ma ra?
K'a ser bɩ yɩ, a heer yɩm nyɩnta kan kɩ an lɛ da bunɛɛhʋ a yaa nɛɛhʋ rɔ kʋ ŋ n nyaam nɔ wɔɔ ra.
Awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ lɛ baa sɔ kʋ nyɩnɔ nɔɔn duro gʋaa deem n nyaam y.
K'ɩ danyɩ a zar ɩ ma, k'ɩ ta zi, ɩ yaa hɔ k'a ba ɩbɩɩ m bɩ hɩ m, ɩbɩɩ kan kɩ a hɩɩya. K'a ɩbɩɩ mim bɩ si, k'ɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra.
Bɩ, k'a n a tʋr ka ɩ ma, k'ɩ gʋaa na ɩ ma deem gɛɛ hɩɩya, amba Wosoci a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Gʋaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ y'a ga mim kasɛtɩ barɛ m.'
Kʋ gʋaa bɩ lɛ baa k'a tʋr ka brɔɔ ma sɔ, k'ɩ hɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ m. K'a ʋ a b'a tʋr kam kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ ma, k'ɩ dɩga ma kɩfɩr gɛɛ, yawʋrsirezaa.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: hɔ haay, k'awɔɔ n'a gum ma tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, n y'a gum ma sɔ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ. Hɔ haay k'awɔɔ nɩ yɛm ma tara burə ʋ, n yɛm ma sɔ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ m ya, m n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m sɔ: K'awɔɔ gʋaa hɩɩya a zɛ kʋ ra tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, k'a hɔ niŋŋə haay yɛ yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ hɔ bɩ do karɛ ŋ ʋ.
Bala, lɛɛ kʋ gʋɔɔ a so kʋ ma ʋ hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ bireyaa ʋ."
Pɩyɛɛr n a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, kʋ mɔɔ danyɩ a zar mɔɔ ma, gallɛm karɔ mɔɔ nɩ sugur kaŋ ʋ? Gallɛm saanhɩna gɛɛ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ gallɛm saanhɩna y, bɩ, gallɛm busaanhɩna a gallɛm saanhɩna."
"Naa do minto bɩ, Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ rɛ kan cir k'a wuti k'a a zibəənyɩnɔ lar ŋ zibəə ma.
A sɩŋŋɩda k'a k'a ba bɩ, bʋr n y'a ʋ zibəənyɩ deem m, an ta talan waa bu zɩm m.
Bɩ, gʋaa bɩ ba hɔsɩ m an b'a zɩm bɩ karɛ y. A m bɩ, cir bɩ n lɛ ka, kʋ n nɩ gʋaa bɩ hɛɛ kan a lʋ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ, kan hɔ niŋŋə k'an ta m haay kɩ, k'a cɩnta zɩm bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ.
A m naa, zibəənyɩ bɩ n kukurə zɛ cir bɩ taa, an cicir ba a lɛ ra, a ʋ: 'M cicir zɛ, mɔɔ yɩ m zɩm bɩ kam haay!'
Gʋaa bɩ cicir n cir bɩ nyasʋ, an zɩm bɩ to m, an a da zaa ra.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ n bɔ, an a muno wɔɔ deem zɛ ʋ zaa ra, a zɩm n ta ra deniyee zɔrɔ, an a wɔ so a bʋkɔ ʋ, an n'a ŋʋam k'a hoonsi ta rɛ, an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: 'M zɩm bɩ ka m ʋ.'
A mim bɩ n kukurə zɛ a taa, an cicir ba a lɛ ra, a ʋ: 'M cicir zɛ, mɔɔ yɩ m zɩm bɩ kam.'
Bɩ, gʋaa b'a gu, an ta, an aa a ka, n n a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, k'an tolle ba, an zɩm bɩ ka, an a nya.
Zibəənyɩnɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ heer a zar gʋta, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'aa hɔ haay woo••• k'a ba bɩ hɩ cir bɩ m.
Cir bɩ n zibəənyɩ bɩ bir an a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Zibəənyɩ bʋnyaa, mɔɔ ɩ zɩm bɩ to ɩbɩɩ m haay, k'ɩbɩɩ cicir ba mɔɔ lɛ ra bɩ minto.
Ɩbɩɩ n ɩ da ma sɔ, ɩ ɩ mim bɩ cicir zɛ, amba mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ cicir zɛ bɩ n na?'
Cir bɩ nɔ n ma ʋ gʋta, an gʋaa bɩ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ k'an fɩr yɩ, k'an zɩm bɩ ka haay."
Yeezuu n a ya, an a na ma, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ y'a barɛ awɔɔ m ncɩnaaʋ, k'awɔɔ bɩr sugur kam kʋ ʋ kan a heer kɩ haay y."
Yeezuu k'a naa do dɩnda haay bɩ, a a hʋr Galilee ʋ, an ta Zidee ʋ, Zʋrdɛn kur.
Zamaa cir gʋta zu a jɛ ʋ, an ŋ yaabazannɔ waa b'ʋ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ n a zɔ ma, k'a nyasʋ meerbaa nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ laaka da han, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa a da ma, an la a lʋ ra, baa kʋ mim kara m na?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba Wosoci b'ʋ ra? A ʋ: 'A sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ, Woso gʋaa da kan lʋ kɩ.'
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'Bɩ y'a ka: gʋaa y'a gʋrɛ a zɩ kan a da kɩ ma, an a zɛ kʋ ra kan a lʋ kɩ, ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya bɩ n a ba deem.'
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩ hɩɩya dɔ y, ŋ deem. Bɩ, gʋaa bɩ hɔ kʋ Woso a zɛ kʋ ra bɩ gʋngʋm kʋ ma y."
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m Moyiisi ʋ, n nɩ harcɩntarɛ kaansʋrɛ ci ba, kʋ n nɩ bɔkarɛ n nɩ la lʋ ra?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ heerkarɛ minto y'a ka Moyiisi n lɛ ka k'awɔɔ n la a lannɔ ra. Bɩ, durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ, ncɩnaaʋ bɛɛ y.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: kʋ gʋaa la a lʋ ra, bɩ lʋ bɩ n jaan da y, an lʋ vanta sa, gʋaa bɩ do, jaandarɛzaa m."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa kan a lʋ kɩ mim b'ɩ yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ gʋaa n lʋ sa y, a jɩra."
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa haay bɛɛ nɩ hɔdɩndarɛ naa do sire y, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a si rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ y'a sim.

Minno y'a hʋnhɔ y'a karɛ gʋɔɔ bɩr lʋ sire y: Gʋɔɔ ta ʋ, yɩ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ lʋ si y, gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʋ, gʋɔɔ y'a ba ŋ nɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ n ta ʋ, ŋ bɩr lʋ sire y Woso cirbəə bɩ minto. Gʋaa k'a n'a dam ma, an meerbaa naa do si bɩ, k'an a si."
Gʋɔɔ bʋr nyɩnɔ poorero m Yeezuu zi, k'an a wɔ ka ŋ mim la, an yaa da ŋ tɔ ma, bɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n yɛ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, ŋn'a bam kan ŋ kɩ.
Yeezuu k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a nyɩnɔ poorero wɔɔ to, ŋnɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi, a b'a ta ŋ nɩ tolle y. Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan nawɔnnɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m."
A n a wɔ ka nyɩnɔ wɔɔ mim la, an a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, gʋaa a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an a lar, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, bɔ mɩŋŋa mɔɔ n'a barɛ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ larm hɔ mɩŋŋa mim ma? Gʋaa mɩŋŋa ba ʋ kʋ Woso deem bɛɛ y. K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ gasʋ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'ɩ zu Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ."
Gʋaa bɩ n laaka da Yeezuu han, a ʋ: "Karɔɔ m Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ barla?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y, ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɩ kasɛtɩ ŋʋaar ba ɩ ka ɩ mim la y,
ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ, ɩ ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa ŋʋa bɩ m."
Nyukumbueere bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zu lɛrɔ nɔɔn duro haay ʋ, bɔ ɩ gɔɔta mɔɔ n'a barɛ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ yɩ mɩŋŋa paan••• k'ɩ ta ɩ yaa hɔ k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʋ haay bɩ hɛɛ, ɩ busoo bɩ ka ŋʋazannɔ ʋ. Maam bɩ, ɩbɩɩ arzaka yɩm arzana ʋ. K'ɩ bʋr, ɩ bɩr zum mɔɔ ʋ."
Bɩ, nyukumbueere bɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a heer a zar gʋta, an a hʋr kan heerzar kɩ, bala, arzakazaa gʋta m.
A m naa, Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a wer ta ʋ kʋ arzakazaa n gasʋ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ m ya, m n'a hɩrɛ: Yoonde gasʋ huuka yaa ʋ zanta, an lɛ da arzakazaa gasʋ Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ m."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə meerbaa naa do minto, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɩ nka n'a dam ma kɛɛrɛ an bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ?"
Yeezuu n dɩga ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ b'a dam ma y, bɩ, Woso a da hɔ haay ma."
Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʋ: "Dɩga, wɔɔ hɔ haay to k'ʋ zu ɩbɩɩ ʋ, a nyɩntam wɔɔ ma lɔ?"

Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bʋr an nɩ nyɩntam a cirbəəduu paŋŋazaa bɩ ra durnya daa b'ʋ, awɔɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ k'a zu mɔɔ ʋ naa, awɔɔ nyɩntam sɔ duuro ra kan mɔɔ kɩ k'ʋ Israyɛl do bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ ka.
Bɩ, gʋaa haay k'a gʋ a harlɔ ma, gɛɛ a danyɩnɔ ma, a danlʋrɔ ma gɛɛ a zɩ kan a da kɩ ma, a nyɩnɔ ma, a hɔsɩrarɔ ma mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a nawɔnnɔ haay yɩm gallɛm zɔrɔ kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ, lɛɛkarɛzannɔ gʋta nyɩntam jɛzannɔ, jɛzannɔ gʋta n nyɩnta lɛɛkarɛzannɔ."
"Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ rɛ kan gʋaa k'a wuti dɔgta mɩŋŋa m, k'a gʋɔɔ sa a dɩvɛnsɩra zibəə ma bɩ kɩ.
A n lɛ sa kan zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ k'a deniyee deem ka ŋ ʋ hindeem zibəə busoo. A n ŋ nyɔɔ a hɔsɩra b'ʋ.
A n a ya, an a bɔ dɔgta wakatɩ nɛɛhʋ ma an gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm daasɩyaa ʋ, bɩ ŋ ba zibəə nɩ y.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'K'a ta mɔɔ hɔsɩra b'ʋ sɔ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ zibəə busoo k'a a ga m karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.'
Ŋ n ta hɔsɩra b'ʋ. A n a ya, an bɔ sinsebir ʋ kan yirbəə wakatɩ kaakʋ kɩ ma, an a ya, an a ba maam sɔ.
Yirbəə wakatɩ soor k'a a ku bɩ, a a ya, an bɔ, an gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ yɩ ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm daasɩyaa b'ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'Bɔ m, awɔɔ n gɔɔta naa ʋ dɔgta m saa•••, b'awɔɔ ba zibəə nɩ y?'
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Gɔsɩ n wɔɔ sa zibəə ma y.' A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'K'a ta mɔɔ hɔsɩra b'ʋ sɔ a yaa zi ba.'
Lɛɛ k'a bʋr k'a lihi bɩ, dɩvɛnsɩra zaa b'a hɩ a zibəədɩgamazaa bɩ m, a ʋ: 'Zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ bir, ɩ ŋ busoo ka ŋ ʋ. A sɩŋŋɩda ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, k'ɩ nyambʋr lɛɛkarɛzannɔ wɔɔ ma.'
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr yirbəə wakatɩ soor ma rɔ wɔɔ a zɔ, n nɩ deniyee deem-deem ka ŋ ʋ.
Lɛɛkarɛzannɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɔ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, a y'a yɩrɛ an lɛ da. Bɩ, deniyee deem-deem ŋ y'a ka ŋ ʋ sɔ.
Busoo bɩ kʋ ŋ n'a sim bɩ, ŋn'ɩ kukur bam hɔsɩrazaa bɩ ma.
Ŋ ʋ: 'Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro, bʋr ŋ y'a ʋ jɛ ʋ, ŋ n zi ba wakatɩ deem taan•••, ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ, ɩ busoo ka ŋ ʋ hɔdeem kan wɔɔ kɩ, bɩ zi wɔɔ ba, ʋ kɔ dɔgta m tee••• woso n wɔ wɔɔ ʋ, am sɛ hɔ bɩ m!'
Hɔsɩrazaa bɩ n a hɩ ŋ gʋaa deem m, a ʋ: 'M gʋaa, mɔɔ n tu ta ɩbɩɩ rɛ y, ɩbɩɩ n lɛ sa kan mɔɔ kɩ kʋ m deniyee deem ka ɩ ʋ hindeem zibəə busoo ra?
Ɩ zibəə busoo si k'ɩ hʋr. Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m busoo ka gʋaa k'a bʋr jɛ ʋ naa ʋ, amba mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m a ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ naa m.
Mɔɔ ba lɛ m kʋ m m hɔɔnhɔ ba m busoo m na? Gɛɛ nɔntaama n ta ɩbɩɩ m kʋ mɔɔ m mɩŋŋa bɩ minto ra!' "
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, jɛzannɔ yɩm lɛɛkarɛzannɔ, lɛɛkarɛzannɔ n yɩ jɛzannɔ."
Yeezuu a hʋr, an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʋ. A n karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gaa a hɔ, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"K'a tʋr ka, ta kʋ wɔɔ nawʋm Zerizalɛm ʋ naa, bɩ n nɩ zɛm bɩ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋ ʋ, n n a ka wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ʋ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ n a ka zɛ ma.
Ŋ y'a kam kɩfɩɩrɔ ʋ, brɔɔ n yaa wʋ ma, ŋn'a zɛ madɩr m, ŋn'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, b'a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, Woso y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ."
Zebedee nyɩnɔ da a zɔ Yeezuu ma kan a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an kukurə zɛ a taa, k'a hɔ yɛ han.
Yeezuu n a lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩ lɛ n taa?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Lɛ ka kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔm n bɩ nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ. Deem ɩ bɩsɩ, deem ɩ jɩsa."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n hɔ k'a n'a yɛm bɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ y'a dam ma, a fɩryɩrɛ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ yɩ ra?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ʋ da ma."

Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Fɩryɩrɛ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ. Bɩ, k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ jɩsa kan mɔɔ bɩsɩ bɩ kɩ nyɩntarɛ nɩ, mɔɔ n m da ma, m zaa ka y, bala, mɔɔ n m so ŋ ʋ y. N zɛm bɩ ŋ ka gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ bɩncɛrɔ wɔɔ banka ŋ minto rɔ wɔɔ ʋ."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ buro kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ nɔ ma ʋ kan danyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Yeezuu n ŋ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ dɔ, a ʋ: gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ, ŋ cinno ɩ paŋŋa barɛ ŋ ma, paŋŋazannɔ n n'a hɔɔnhɔ bam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ.
B'a n a ga m, an yɩ ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ bire ʋ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a yɩ jɩtaarɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ, k'an a ba awɔɔ zibəənyɩ.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a yɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa awɔɔ bire ʋ, k'an a ba awɔɔ lɔ.
Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n bʋr kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a hɔɔnhɔ ba y, bʋr a ʋ k'a b'a ba gʋɔɔ zibəənyɩ, k'a ga, kʋ gʋɔɔ gʋta n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ."
Bɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ Zeriko ʋ bɩ, gʋaa cir gʋta zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ.
Bʋʋrɔ nyɩnta hɩɩya zaa bɩ lezi. Kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʋ: Yeezuu n nɩ cenim bɩ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda ba ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʋ. "Karɩnsaamba, Davɩd Nyɩ, wɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ bʋgʋr barɛ ŋ ma, ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a tʋr ka, bɩ ŋ y'a banka ŋn'a da ra: "Karɩnsaamba, Davɩd Nyɩ, wɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
Yeezuu n jɩm, an ŋ bir, an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m bɔ ba awɔɔ minto?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, a ka kʋ wɔɔ n lɛɛ yɩ."
Yeezuu n ŋ cicir zɛ, an a wɔ da ŋ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩrɛ, ŋn'ɩ zum Yeezuu ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ y'a zɔ Zerizalɛm ma, ŋn'a zɔ Bɛtfazee jɩr ʋ Oliviyee ci mim ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta kʋ k'a n'awɔɔ lɛɛ naa ʋ. Awɔɔ brada yɩrɛ, n n a kʋsɩ kan a nyɩnnɩ kɩ, k'a hʋr a bʋr ŋ nɩ.
Kʋ gʋaa awɔɔ lar a hʋrlɛ zaa ma, k'a hɩ m a ʋ: Zuuba lɛ n taa. B'a yɩ ŋ tore ŋnɩ bʋr."
Ba mim naa do ʋ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ hɔ k'a hɩ naa n kʋ yɩ. A ʋ:
K'a hɩ Siyɔn zannɔ m, a ʋ: K'a dɩga a cir k'a nɩ zɛrɛ a zi mɩŋŋazerle m, an da bra ʋ, brapoo m, brada nyɩnnɩ m.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ta, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba.
Ŋ n bʋr brada bɩ m kan a nyɩnnɩ bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a huuro ka ŋ la, Yeezuu n da ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ gʋta n a huuro ka zaa bɩ ra, gɔsɩnnɔ n gɔ lɛɛ yɩnyar ŋn'a ka zaa bɩ ra sɔ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Yeezuu lɛɛ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Hozaana Davɩd Nyɩ! Gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ! Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ arzana ʋ!"
Yeezuu k'a gasʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, kʋ bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay ŋn'ɩ bɩrlɛ a mim ma, ŋn'ɩ laaka dam, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do nka nɩ?"
Zamaa bɩ n'a nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Yeezuu m, a to a ʋ Nazarɛtɩ ʋ, Galilee kʋ ʋ."
Yeezuu n gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ lam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ hɛɛnm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ sim nɔ wɔɔ ra. A busoolʋrlɛzannɔ taabɩrlɔ hɩnhɩsɩga kan cirpʋnnɔ hɛɛnno nyɩntaragɔrɔ kɩ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N n a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'N mɔɔ cɛ bɩ birm yaadarɛcɛ' ra? Awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ a sa, a ba konno nyaakʋndajɩ!"
Bʋʋrɔ kan kusiməro kɩ n a zɔ Yeezuu ma Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ an ŋ waa.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ heer n yɩ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ y, kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ an nɩ zi gʋta barɛ, kan nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zee dam Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Hozaana, Davɩd Nyɩ!"
Ŋ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩm bɩ mam na?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn•••, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba fɩɩga Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ ka nyɩnɔ kan banfinnirɔ kɩ n n'a lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ' ra?"
A m bɩ, Yeezuu n ŋ to b'ʋ, an a hʋr an bɔ kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ, an ta Betanii ʋ dɔ n mɛ m b'ʋ.
Yeezuu k'a wusigə dɔgta mɩŋŋa m, an nɩ tam kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, nɔ a nyasʋ.
A n sɔɔn yɩ zaa bɩ lezi, an a zɔ ma b'a n hɔsɩ yɩ ma k'a lɛɛ bɛɛ bala y. A m bɩ, an a hɩ sɔɔn bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ yarɛ ɩ nyɩ da dɔ y!" Lɛɛm bɩ, sɔɔn bɩ ga.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, ŋnɩ laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʋ: "A a ba lɔ sɔɔn bɩ n ga lɛɛm ncɩnaaʋ?"
