Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: k'awɔɔ sɩra ka, bɩ bɩsɩkarɛ b'awɔɔ heer ʋ, awɔɔ mɔɔ zi kʋ mɔɔ ba sɔɔn naa do m bɩ bam. B'awɔɔ a da ma sɔ, a hɩ ci naa do m, a ʋ, ɩ bɔɔta naa ʋ, ɩ ɩ da higʋta ʋ. A bam maam.
K'awɔɔ sɩra ka, hɔ haay k'awɔɔ n n'a yɛm yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ haay bɩ, Woso yɩ ŋ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu k'a gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Lɛ kara ɩbɩɩ n ta m k'ɩ naa ba? Nka ɩ lɛ bɩ do ka ɩ b'ʋ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ m awɔɔ lar mim deem ma, deem bala, k'awɔɔ nyɩ bɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɔkarɛ, m lɛ kʋ mɔɔ n ta m bɩ jɩ hɩ awɔɔ m.
Batɛm kʋ Zaan n n'a kam bɩ, a to a ʋ Woso zi gɛɛ, gʋɔɔ zi?" Ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ a to a ʋ Woso zi, a y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Bɔ minto m, wɔɔ n sɩra ka ʋ?
Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ zi, wɔɔ ɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ kʋ ŋ Zaan dɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa paan••• bɩ, ŋ bɩ yɛm kan ʋ kɩ y."
A m naa, ŋn'a nyɩ bɔ Yeezuu nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n a dɔ y." Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ bɩ lɛ kʋ mɔɔ n ta m, m nɩ naa bam bɩ jɩ hɩrɛ awɔɔ m sɔ y."
"Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam mim naa do ma lɔ? Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta nyɩnɔ m hɩɩya. A n a hɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: 'M nyɩnnɩ, ta her ɩ yaa zi ba mɔɔ dɩvɛnsɩra ʋ.'
Nyɩ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ bɩ tarɛ y.' Maasɩrɛ k'a ba bɩ, a a hɔɔndarɛ lʋr an ta hɔsɩra b'ʋ.
Gʋaa bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ nyɩ vanta bɩ m maam sɔ. Nyɩ bɩ do ʋ: 'Ɩɩn•••, baaba,' b'a n ta y.

Nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro bire ʋ bɩ, nka y'a zɩ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ m". Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, yawʋrsinno kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa hɛɛnm nɔ kɩ lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ.

Bala, Zaan-Batiisi bʋr awɔɔ zi, an zaa mɩŋŋa hɩnka awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n a mim si y. Bɩ, yawʋrsinno kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa hɛɛnm nɔ kɩ a mim si. Awɔɔ naa yɩ, b'awɔɔ gɔɔta awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam k'a mim si y."

"K'a tʋr ka hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom vanta ma: Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta, an dɩvɛn gɔ sɔɔn, an lambaar da ma, an yaa hɔn, k'a bɩr dɩvɛn bɩ hi bɔŋ ʋ, an bɛŋŋʋ dɔ sɔ k'a tɩr dɔ hɔsɩra bɩ ma. A n a sa, an a da gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a zi ba, k'a b'a nyɔɔdʋ bɩ jir. A n a hʋr, an ta kʋ ʋ.
Dɩvɛn mɔsa k'a ku bɩ, an a zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɔsɩra bɩ zibənno wɔɔ zi, kʋ ŋ n'aa a hɔ si, ŋnɩ b'a ka a ʋ.
Zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ŋ nyasʋ, ŋnɩ deem dundu, ŋnɩ deem zɛ gər, ŋnɩ deem bɩmba jaarɔ m, ŋn'a zɛ, an ga.
Hɔsɩrazaa bɩ n a ya, an zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ gʋta an lɛ da biisi bɩ m. Bɩ, zibənno wɔɔ a ya ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba lɛɛkarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ba nawɔnnɔ m sɔ.
A nyarɛ ma bɩ, a nyɩyar a nyɔɔ, an n'a hɔɔn darɛ, a ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ nyɩ m naa, ŋ y'a daŋ ʋ.
Bɩ, zibənno wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to ŋnɩ nyɩ bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋn'a dɩndam kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: 'Naa n nɩ zɛm b'a so a zɩ arzaka b'ʋ. K'a bʋr, k'ʋ a zɛ, k'ʋ ʋ so arzaka b'ʋ!'
Ŋ n a nyasʋ, ŋnɩ bɔ m hɔsɩra b'ʋ, ŋn'a zɛ gər."
Yeezuu n laaka da ŋ han, a ʋ: "Kʋ dɩvɛnsɩrazaa bɩ bʋr, bɔ an n'a bam zibənno wɔɔ nɩ?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "A gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro zɩnzɛm, a bɩ ŋ cicir zɛrɛ y, an hɔsɩra bɩ ka gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ ʋ ŋn'a zi ba, ŋn'a hɔ ka ʋ a dɔmɩm ʋ."

Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n hɔ kʋ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ karɩnda ba ra? A a hɩ, a ʋ: Jaa kʋ cɛdonno wɔɔ a zo bɩ y'a ba cɛ bɩ jɩr jaa paŋŋazaa. Hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba bɩ n naa do, wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma hɔ mɩŋŋa gʋta.
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, n Woso cirbəə bɩ yɔrɛ awɔɔ m, n n a ka do vanta ʋ an cirbəə bɩ zibəə k'a a ga m bɩ ba. [
Kʋ gʋaa a do jaa naa do ra, a hɩsɩga dam, bɩ kʋ jaa b'a da gʋaa ra a gʋaa bɩ do hɔɔnsɩrɛ.]"
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoonno nɔɔn duro ma bɩ, ŋ y'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a hɩ a nawʋrɛ a ma.
Ŋ n'a kam ma k'a nyasʋ, bɩ, ŋ yɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m, bala, zamaa b'ɩ dɩgam Yeezuu ma wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa.
Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"Woso cirbəə bɔ kʋ rɛ kan cir k'a a nyɩnnɩ lʋsarɛ cibsa ba kɩ.
A n a zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'aa gʋɔɔ k'a hɩ ŋ nɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ cibsa bɩ rɔ wɔɔ bir, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋ ʋ, a bɩ zɛrɛ y.

A n a ya, an zibəənyɩnɔ vantɔɔ nyɔɔ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'K'a yaa hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ bir cibsa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: mɔɔ cibsa bɩ banka m a nya, mɔɔ m dono zɩnzɛ kan m hɔbɩsɩrɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ, hɔ haay banka, k'a bʋr cibsa bɩ ma kɛɛrɛ.'
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n dɩga cibsa birle bɩ ma hɔsɩ y, ŋn'a hʋr ŋnɩ ta a zibəəjɩrɔ ʋ, naa n ta hɔsɩra ʋ, naa n ta daasɩ ʋ mɔdrɔ hɛɛjɩ ʋ.
Ŋ n gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ n zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋnɩ nyannɩ da ŋ ma, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Cir bɩ nɔ n ma ʋ, an sʋrdaarɔ nyɔɔ ŋn'aa gərzenno nɔɔn duro zɩnzɛ, ŋnɩ sɛ da ŋ kʋ bɩ ma.
A m naa, an a hɩ a zibəənyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: 'Cibsa bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bankarɛ nya, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ n a ga kʋ ʋ ba y.
K'a ta zaazɛkʋrarɔ wɔɔ ra, kʋ nka awɔɔ yɩ, k'a hɩ m k'an bʋr cibsa bɩ ma.'
A zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hʋr, ŋnɩ zaarɔ sa ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, kan gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ. Gʋɔɔ n cɛ kʋ n nɩ cibsa bɩ baŋ ʋ bɩ han.
Cir bɩ gasʋ k'a dɩga gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr cibsa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma, an a to, an gʋaa yɩ, gʋaa bɩ do n harcɩntarɛ cibsa huu du a ma y.
A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ ba lɔ ɩ gasʋ naa ʋ, b'ɩbɩɩ ba harcɩntarɛ cibsa huu nɩ?' Bɩ gʋaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ y.
A m bɩ, cir bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'K'a gannɔ kan a wɔrɔ kɩ kʋsɩ a zo garga ra, monsigə ʋ. Lɛɛ bɩ do an nɩ nyi kaŋ ʋ, an a sɔ sʋ.' "
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "N gʋɔɔ bir gʋta, bɩ, n nɩ ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ poore."
Naa jɛ ʋ bɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ ta, ŋn'aa a so kʋ ma, k'a a ka zaa k'a nɩ Yeezuu nyasʋm ma a meerbaa nɔ ʋ bɩ dɔ.

Ŋ n a karɩndanyɩnɔ kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ jɛzannɔ kɩ nyɔɔ Yeezuu zi, kʋ ŋ n'aa hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ sɩra ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm, Woso zaa ɩbɩɩ n'a dɩndam sɩra bɩncɛ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr nyi bam gʋɔɔ nɩ y, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩr gʋɔɔ nyʋkɔŋ ʋ sɔ y.
Bɩ minto bɩ, ɩ hɔɔnhɔ hɩ wɔɔ m, wɔɔ lɛ bɩ zaa ka k'ʋ Rɔm cir yawʋr ka ʋ gɛɛ, ʋ b'a ka ʋ gɛ?"
Bɩ, kʋ Yeezuu ŋ zambʋ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zambʋzannɔ! Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ mɔɔ makra barɛ?
K'a busoo kʋ n nɩ Rɔm cir yawʋr kam nɩ bɩ hɩnka m m." Ŋ n deniyee deem hɩnka m.
Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Gʋaa mim kʋ n y'a da ʋ naa kan gʋrsɩra naa do kɩ, nka hɔɔ nɩ?"
Ŋ ʋ: "Rɔm cir hɔɔ m." A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a maam k'a hɔ kʋ Rɔm cir hɔ m bɩ ka ʋ, k'a hɔ kʋ Woso hɔ m bɩ ka ʋ sɔ."
Meerbaa naa do a ka ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hʋr, ŋnɩ Yeezuu to.
Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, sadisɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʋr Yeezuu zi. Bala, sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ ʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ b'a ʋ y. Ŋ n laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʋ:
"Karɩnsaamba, Moyiisi a gʋrsɩra ba an a ka wɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ, kʋ gʋaa cɛmba ta ʋ, an ga an a lʋ to, b'a nyɩ ba ʋ y, k'a dam n lʋ bɩ si, k'an nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ a cɛmba bɩ minto.
A n bɔkarɛ, danyɩnɔ ɩ nyɩnta saanhɩna wɔɔ bire ʋ, lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n lʋ sa an ga, b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan lʋ bɩ kɩ y.
A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n lʋ bɩ si, an ga, an lʋ bɩ to b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y. A kaakʋ hɔ bɩ maam sɔ, saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay ŋ gɩnga bɩ ŋ n nyɩ yɩ kan lʋ bɩ kɩ y.
Ŋ haay kur bɩ, lʋ bɩ n ga sɔ.
Gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, kʋ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, nka y'a so lʋ b'ʋ ŋ bireyaa ʋ? Bala, gʋɔɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay lʋ bɩ si."
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ n gʋrsɩra mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ dɔ kan Woso paŋŋa kɩ bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ n'a nyʋnnyɔɔm.
Bala, gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, yar bɩr lʋ sarɛ y, lʋ bɩr yar sarɛ y, bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ, kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ mim nɩ, awɔɔ n hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ karɩnda ba ra? A a hɩ, a ʋ:
'Abraham kan Izakkɩ kɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso m mɔɔ m.' Gəəno Woso bɛɛ y, gʋɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ Woso m."
Yeezuu hɔdɩndarɛ naa do cem zamaa bɩ hɔɔndarɛ han.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu a ka sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋn'a ya ŋnɩ meer ba bɩ, ŋ y'a so kʋ ma.
Ŋ gʋaa deem kʋ wosocikarɩnsaamba gʋta m bɩ laaka da Yeezuu han, k'a makra ba.
A ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay bire ʋ, kara ɩ lɛ da?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: " 'K'ɩ Zuuba Woso ŋʋa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, kan ɩ nyi kɩ haay, kan ɩ hɔɔndarɛ kɩ haay.'
Lɛ k'a lɛ da, a m lɛ gʋta bɩ m naa do.
Lɛ hɩɩya hɔ k'a gʋtabaa lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ ku bɩ m naa do: 'K'ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m.'
Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ meerbaarɔ kɩ haay məsi m lɛrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro m."
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a so kʋ ma bɩ, Yeezuu laaka da ŋ han, a ʋ:
"Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam Krista ma lʋnlɔ? Nka nyɩ nɩ?" Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Davɩd Nyɩ m."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "B'a yɩ lɔ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ka Davɩd n a bir a Zuuba? Bala, Davɩd b'a hɩ, a ʋ:
Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ zuuba m, a ʋ: nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʋ, kʋ m tolle ba m a ka, k'ɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta ɩ gam taa.
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ Davɩd y'a birm a Zuuba, yɩ an nawʋm lɔ kɛɛrɛ kʋ Krista n yɩ Davɩd Nyɩ?"
Gɔsɩ n a da ma, an a nyɩ bɔ nʋ y. Hinni bɩ do tɛkka ma, gʋaa ba ʋ dɔ, a heer n kookoo k'a lar mim ma y.
Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ meer bam kan zamaa bɩ kɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
"Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋn'a hɩnkam gʋɔɔ m.
Bɩ minto bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m, a sɩra ka ŋ ʋ, a hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m haay bɩ ba, b'a bɩ zu ŋ zibəə ʋ y. Bala, ŋ bɩr hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ m bɩ barɛ y.
Ŋ tɩr mɔr gorezaa kʋsɩ ŋn'a ka gʋaa mee, bɩ ŋ bɩr a wɔ dam ma k'a a da a zaa han, an a busu y.
Ziro kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ bam haay rɔ wɔɔ ba ŋ nawʋm kʋ gʋɔɔ m dɩga a ma, bɩ y'a ka, Wosoci lemim kʋ ŋ tɩr a kʋsɩ a tusə ma gɛɛ a za ma bɩ ba ŋ tɩr a ʋ jintə, ŋ tɩr pɛɛra lensəzannɔ dɔ a huuro rɛ, k'an bɩr yɩm.
Lɛɛ mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋ tɩr a ka ma cibsarɔ bɩncɛ ʋ, sokʋma bɩncɛ ʋ, lɛɛ wɩsɩ ŋ tɩr a kam ma.
A ŋʋa ŋ tɩr a ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr yaa darɛ a m mɩŋŋa gʋɔɔ gaa ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n bɩr a birm karɩnsaamba.
B'awɔɔ, a bɩ yɛ kʋ n n'a bir karɩnsaamba y, bala, danyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m haay, awɔɔ karɩnsaamba bɩ deem.
A bɩ gɔsɩ bir tara burə ʋ a ʋ, a Zɩ y, bala, awɔɔ Zɩ bɩ deem, an nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ.
A b'a ka ma kʋ n n'a bir jɩtaarɛ y. Bala, awɔɔ jɩtaarɛ bɩ deem, Krista m.
Gʋaa k'a lɛ da awɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ, k'an yɩ awɔɔ zibəənyɩ.
Kʋ gʋaa a mɩŋŋa busu, Woso y'a zerm. Kʋ gʋaa a mɩŋŋa zer, Woso y'a busum."

"Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ lɛ tam kʋ gʋɔɔ bɩ gasʋ y. Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bɩr gasʋrɛ y, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a gasʋ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ bɩr brɔɔ tore ŋn'ɩ gasʋrɛ y. [

Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ awɔɔ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ zonno hɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m bɩ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, a a ya, a gaa, an nɩ yaa jintoo dam kʋ n n'a hɩ a ma gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ. Naa minto m, awɔɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ n nɩ yɩm maam-maam.]

Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ tam kʋrɔ ʋ tara burə ʋ kan kɔɔlʋʋ nɔ ʋ kɩ an n'a kam gʋaa deem taan••• ma k'an zu awɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, bɩ k'awɔɔ ku b'awɔɔ ka an yɩ sɛhar gʋaa gallɛm hɩɩya an lɛ da awɔɔ m.
Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ k'an bʋʋrɔ, an nɩ zaa hɩnkam gʋɔɔ m, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Kʋ gʋaa ler bɔ Wosocɛ bɩ tɔ ma hɔsɩ bɛɛ nɩ y, bɩ k'a ler bɔ Wosocɛ bɩ sarma bɩ tɔ ma pakra m k'an hɔ k'a hɩ bɩ ba.'
Hɔɔnwarzannɔ, bʋʋrɔ n'awɔɔ m! Kara ɩ lɛ da a mim nɩ? Sarma bɩ m gɛɛ, Wosocɛ k'a ka sarma bɩ nɩ yɩm Woso hɔ bɩ nɩ?
Awɔɔ a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Kʋ gʋaa ler bɔ mannɩduu ma hɔsɩ bɛɛ y, bɩ k'a ler bɔ mannɩhɔ k'a n'a burə ʋ bɩ ma, pakra m k'an hɔ k'a hɩ bɩ ba.'
Bʋʋrɔ n'awɔɔ m! Kara ɩ lɛ da? Mannɩhɔ bɩ n gɛɛ, mannɩduu k'a nɩ mannɩhɔ bɩ kam Woso ʋ bɩ nɩ?
Gʋaa k'a nɩ ler bɔm mannɩduu bɩ ma bɩ, ler bɔ a nawʋm duu bɩ ma, kan hɔ niŋŋə haay k'a nɩ duu bɩ burə ʋ bɩ kɩ.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ ler bɔm Wosocɛ bɩ ma bɩ, ler bɔ a nawʋm Wosocɛ bɩ ma, kan Woso k'a nɩ cɛ b'ʋ bɩ kɩ.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ ler bɔm arzana ma, ler bɔ a nawʋm Woso duu bɩ ma kan Woso mɩŋŋa k'a nyɩnta ra bɩ kɩ.

Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ dʋlɛɛrɔ bu hɔ ganwʋrɛ bɔŋ ʋ an n'a kam Woso ʋ, a bɔkarɛ, a hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ to, amba: Tɩrgabaa, mɩŋŋabaa, kan sɩrabarɛ kɩ, nawɔnnɔ awɔɔ a ga m, a ŋ ba, a ŋ gɔɔtarɔ wɔɔ ba sɔ.
Awɔɔ k'an bʋʋrɔ, an nɩ zaa hɩnkam bɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɔ mire sʋrm k'a mɛɛm bɔ ʋ, b'awɔɔ ɩ yoonde monɩm.

Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔmihɔ kan hɔbɩrɛ mɔr burə kɩ sʋrgɔm, k'a dintim gʋ ŋ ma. Bɩ, ŋ nɔ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ koorbaa zibəə kan a hɔɔndarɛ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ yɩ ŋ han.
Farizɛn, bʋʋ n'ɩbɩɩ m, lɛɛ ka ɩ hɔmihɔ bɩ nɔ sʋrgɔ, a burə bɩ hu bɔm sɔ.
Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, bɔ awɔɔ ʋ kʋ rɛ kan gəənoyaarɔ huro kɩ, ŋ burə gʋɛrɛ n ta ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, ŋ nɔ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, yaarɔ kan hɔɔ vənno do haay kɩ yɩ ŋ han.
Awɔɔ do m bɩ, gʋɔɔ ɩ dɩgarɛ a ma gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, an bɔkarɛ zambʋ kan bʋnyaabaa kɩ y'awɔɔ heer han."
"Kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʋzannɔ kɩ, gəənoyaarɔ awɔɔ nɩ ŋ bankam mɩŋŋa wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ minto, gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ awɔɔ nɩ ŋ yaarɔ gʋɛrɛ dam ma.
A bɔkarɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta ʋ yaabɔɔ dɔmɩm ʋ, wɔɔ b'ʋ zɛm kʋ ra kan ŋ kɩ, ʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ y.'
Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ kasɛtɩ karɛ a ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m.
K'a maam, k'a a tʋntɔ ʋ, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ yaabɔɔ a sɩŋŋɩda ba bɩ nyambʋr.
Mɩnnɔ, cɩrkarɔ do n'awɔɔ m! Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lɔ, k'a a da ma, a a si Woso k'awɔɔ dʋdɔ yar, an awɔɔ da sɛhar ʋ bɩ lɛɛ?
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ, hɔɔnzannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ zi. Awɔɔ nɔɔn zɩnzɛm, a gɔsɩnnɔ wɔ gɔdarkʋrarɔ ma, awɔɔ nɔɔn zɛm madɩɩrɔ m a sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, a fɩr ka ŋ ma kʋrɔ ʋ.

Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩm gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ minto, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa gʋaa tɩrga Abɛl zɛrɛ ma, an ta an aa Baraki nyɩ Zakarii k'awɔɔ zɛ Wosocɛ bɩ bɩncɛ paan••• bɩ kan mannɩduu bɩ kɩ bire ʋ bɩ ma.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, hʋnhʋrlɛ k'a a ga m gʋɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ naa do minto bɩ, her zamaana naa do n nɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ bɩ do yɩm."

"Zerizalɛm, Zerizalɛm, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ zɩnzɛm, ɩ nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ nyɔɔ ɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ bɩmbam jaarɔ m bɩ! Mɔɔ gallɛm karɔ m a ŋʋa kʋ m ɩ ɩ zamaa so kʋ ma m taa amba kʋrda tɩr a nyɩnɔ so kʋ ma a zarɔ taa bɩ m, b'awɔɔ n yɛ!
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, 'N y'a bɔrɛ awɔɔ cɛ b'ʋ.'
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: an a sɩŋŋɩda sa naa ma, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ y, k'awɔɔ m b'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Barka ɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ mim ʋ!' "
Yeezuu k'a bɔ Wosocɛ b'ʋ k'a a hʋr bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma ŋn'ɩ Wosocɛ bɩ dɔrɛ mim hɩm nɩ.
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Naa k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm haay naa, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: jaa deem bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a mim burə ʋ y. Ŋ haay zɛm bɩ wurgə."
Yeezuu k'a nɩ nyɩntam Oliviyee ci mim ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ a zɔ ma a minto, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "A hɩ wɔɔ m, ba naa do nawʋm brɔ? Makra kara n n'ɩbɩɩ zɛrɛ hɩnkarɛ kan durnya nyarɛ kɩ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi kʋ gɔsɩ b'awɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ y.
Bala, gʋɔɔ zɛm gʋta, ŋnɩ meer ba mɔɔ tɔ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Mɔɔ m Krista,' bɩ ŋ gʋɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔm gʋta.
Awɔɔ yarbarɛ mim mam, kan yarbarɛ k'a n'a dam ma an bɩ wuti bɩ mim kɩ, a bɩ dabɔʋ ba y. Bala, pakra m, kʋ naa haay n ba, bɩ durnya bɩ nyarɛ bɛɛ m cɩna y.
Do deem gʋɔɔ wutire ŋnɩ yar ba kan do vanta kɩ, tara deem zannɔ wutire ŋnɩ yar ba kan tara vanta zannɔ kɩ, nɔ nyɩntam kʋrɔ ʋ, bɩncɛrɔ niŋŋoo nyiŋŋəm.
Naa do haay bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ rɛ kan lʋ nyɩ yɩrɛ fɩryɩrɛ sɩŋŋɩda kɩ.
Bɩ, n y'awɔɔ gʋrm, ŋnɩ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma, ŋn'a zɩnzɛ. Doro haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ minto.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ gʋɔɔ gʋta sɩrakarɛ tom, ŋnɩ ŋʋaar ba kʋ m, ŋnɩ sɔ kʋ m.
Ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ zɛm gʋta ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta nyʋnnyɔɔ.
Mimbʋnyaa pasɩm gʋta, an a ka gʋaa cir gʋta ŋʋarɛ n nyɔɔ.
Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nyasʋ a sɩrakarɛ m kaŋŋɩda an ta an fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nyarɛ ku bɩ, bɩ zaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm.
Ŋ Woso lemim nyɩnta naa do pa dam durnya haay nɔ ʋ, k'an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ, doro minto. Naa jɛ, durnya nyarɛ n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ."
"K'awɔɔ bɩ 'Gʋaa kʋ hɔzaarbarɛzaa bʋnyaa m bɩ yɩ', wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Danɩyɛl n a hɩ ma bɩ, an nɩ nyɩntam lɛɛ mɩŋŋa kʋ Woso bɩncɛ m, b'a n a ga nɩ y, gʋaa k'a nɩ karɩnda bam bɩ, k'a n'a jɩ ma mɩŋŋa.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʋ bɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a si, ŋnɩ ta ciro ʋ.
Gʋaa k'a n'a cɛ mim ʋ bɩ, a b'a ka zerle ma k'a gasʋ a cɛ ʋ a hɔsɩ sa y.
Gʋaa k'a n'a hɔsɩra ʋ sɔ bɩ, a bɩ doo k'a yaa a huu sa y.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, a yɩm kʋsɩ lannɔ jɩsɩzannɔ wɔɔ ma, kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɔ karɛ a nyɩnɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
K'a yaa da Woso m k'awɔɔ sire bɩ bɩ nyɩnta la barɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ gɛɛ, sabaa hinni ʋ y.
Bala, a nyɩntam fɩryɩrɛ gʋta dɔmɩnnɔ an lɛ da fɩryɩrɛ haay ra, an a sa durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma an naa ma ku, naa lɔɔ n nyɩnta ʋ y, b'a bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ fɩɩga y.
Kʋ Woso bɛɛ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro bɔrɛ, gɔsɩ bɩ larɛ y. Bɩ, a ŋ bɔrɛ a gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto.
Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ awɔɔ m, a ʋ: Krista ɩ naa ʋ, gɛɛ, a ɩ bra ʋ, a b'a si y.
Bala, kristarɔ ŋʋaarzannɔ kan ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ gʋta. Ŋ hoserlo bam kan makrarɔ kɩ, k'an yɩ ʋ, a a da ma, a gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ.
K'a tʋr ka mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ ser ka m a hɩ awɔɔ m.
Kʋ n b'a hɩ awɔɔ m, n ʋ, k'a dɩga, a ɩ poo ʋ, a bɩ ta y, gɛɛ kʋ n y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, n ʋ, a a nyaakʋm da naa ʋ, a b'a si y.
Amba brama tɩr nyakɩ bɔ dɔjɩr ʋ an ta meer ʋ bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛm maam sɔ.
Lɛɛ kʋ hɔgər n ta ʋ bɩ, gɔbɩrgʋrɔ n n'a som kʋ ma ʋ."
"Kʋ fɩr gʋta dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ bɩ cem, woso bɩ gum dɔ y, mom bɩ gum sɔ y, monyaarɔ surm, brama hɔɔpaŋŋazannɔ haay nyiŋŋəm.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ makra y'a hɩnkam brama. 'Do haay n nyi ka. Ŋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an a to brama warkʋ mim ʋ' kan paŋŋa kɩ, lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ.
'Ŋ hir gʋta bɩ hɛm, an a malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔ durnya gʋrga siro wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, an a sa durnya lɛ ma an ta a cɩntarɛ ma.' "
"K'a makra sa sɔɔn ma: k'awɔɔ b'a yɩ, an lɛɛ daa da, a lɛɛ nɩ kure, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, siire a zɔ.
A maam sɔ, k'awɔɔ bɩ minno nɔɔn duro yɩ, k'a dɔ a ʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ a zɔ, bɩ, yɩ an nawʋm maam sɔ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zamaana naa do bɩ cenim, kʋ nawɔnnɔ haay bɛɛ ba y.
Brama kan tara kɩ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ bɩ cenle y."
"A n ta ʋ bɩ, gɔsɩ n dɔmɩm bɩ do kan a wakatɩ kɩ dɔ y. Baa, malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ y, Nyɩ bɩ n a dɔ sɔ y. Zɩ bɩ y'a dɔ a deem.
Hɔ k'a ba Nowee dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ sɔ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ.

Kʋ sɩra nɩ, an lɛɛ ka kʋ hi m durnya bɩ Nowee dɔmɩm b'ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mim, ŋn'ɩ lʋ kam cɛ ʋ, ŋn'a nyɩnɔ kam gʋɔɔ ʋ ŋnɩ ŋ kam cɛ ʋ, an ta an aa dɔmɩm kʋ Nowee gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ ku.
Ŋ n a zu a ʋ, ŋ n a dɔ ŋ ʋ hɔsɩ ɩ barɛ y, hi bɩ n tolle ba an bɩ cem ŋ nɩ haay. A yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ.
Kʋ gʋaa hɩɩya ɩ hɔsɩra ʋ: n deem gaam, n nɩ deem to.
Kʋ lannɔ hɩɩya ŋn'ɩ jaa lɔm, n deem gaam, n nɩ deem to.
Naa minto bɩ, a b'a zu a ʋ y, bala, awɔɔ n dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ bɩ dɔ y.
K'a mim naa do jɩ ma mɩŋŋa. Kʋ harzaa b'a dɔ a ʋ, koor bɩ zɛm gunuu wakatɩ naa do ma, a bɩ hinceem barɛ y, a bɩ koor bɩ tore an gasʋ a cɛ b'ʋ y.
Bɩ y'a ka, awɔɔ sɔ k'a a banka, bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛm wakatɩ k'awɔɔ bɩr a hɔɔn dam ma b'ʋ y."
"Zibəənyɩ kara n mɩŋŋa, a hɔɔn n ta ʋ? Zibəənyɩ lɛɛzaa zibəə ka ʋ, a ʋ, an dɩga zibəənyɩnɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa k'a nɩ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ kaŋ ʋ a dɔmɩm ʋ.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ do nyɩntam mimbirenyɩntazaa, k'a lɛɛzaa b'a wusigə an bʋr har ʋ, an b'a ku an nɩ zibəə k'a ka ʋ bɩ barɛ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lɛɛzaa bɩ y'a kam an yɩ a har bɩ haay arzaka dɔmazaa.
Bɩ, kʋ zibəənyɩ bʋnyaa m, a y'a hɩrɛ a heer ʋ, a ʋ, mɔɔ Zuuba maasɩrɛ ba a bɩr zɛrɛ y.
A n wuti, an a muno wɔɔ zɛ, an hɔ bɩ, an bɛɛ mi kan bɛɛminno kɩ.
B'a Zuuba bɩ zɛm dɔmɩm kʋ zibəənyɩ bɩ bɩr dɔm ma b'ʋ, kan wakatɩ k'a n a dɔ bɩ kɩ ʋ.
A zibəənyɩ bɩ hʋnhʋrm mɩŋŋa, an zambʋzannɔ fɩryɩrɛ ka ma, bɩncɛ niŋŋə k'a nɩ nyi kaŋ ʋ, an a sɔ sʋ ʋ b'ʋ."
"Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʋ rɛ kan nyɩmbɔnnɔ buro kʋ ŋ y'a fɩtɩrɛrɔ gʋr, ŋnɩ bɔ k'a yaa n'a zim zɛ ʋ kɩ.
Soor hɔɔn ɩ ba ʋ y, soor hɔɔn n ta ʋ.
Ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n a fɩtɩrɛrɔ gʋr, bɩ ŋ n nyɔɔ tɔ mɔr ʋ, ŋn'a sa y.
Bɩ, ŋ hɔɔn n ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ nyɔɔ tɔ mɔdrɔ ʋ ŋn'a na a fɩtɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma.
Bɩ, zim bɩ bɔkarɛ an maasɩrɛ ba a bɩr zɛrɛ y. Hinceem n nyɩmbɔnnɔ bu rɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋnɩ hinceem ba.
Gunuu wakatɩ bueerehɩɩya k'a b'a ku bɩ, zee n bɔ, a ʋ: 'Zim bɩ ba n nɩ! K'a bɔ a yaa a zɛ ʋ!'
A m naa, nyɩmbɔnnɔ bu rɔ wɔɔ n gu, ŋn'a fɩtɩrɛrɔ bankarɛ.
Ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm, ŋ ʋ: 'K'a nyɔɔ bɩ ka wɔɔ ʋ poore, bala, wɔɔ fɩtɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ lihim.'
Ŋ hɔɔn ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: 'Ayy•••, bala, a bɩ gʋta y, a bɩ wɔɔ bɔm kan awɔɔ kɩ y. K'a ta a yaa n a hɔ si a hɛɛrɛzannɔ wɔɔ zi.'

Ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n ta k'a yaa nyɔɔ bɩ si, a hʋr kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, zim bɩ gɔɔta an bʋr ŋ jɛ ʋ, nyɩmbɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ y'a banka rɔ wɔɔ n gasʋ kan kɩ harcɩntarɛ cibsa cɛ ʋ b'ʋ, n nɩ cɛlɛ bɩ gaa, n n a ta a nyɩ m.
Maasɩrɛ k'a ba bɩ, nyɩmbɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ bʋr, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: 'Karɩnsaamba, karɩnsaamba, cɛ bɩ gʋ wɔɔ m!'
Bɩ, b'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: 'Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ n awɔɔ dɔ y.' "
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "A bɩ hinceem ba y, bala, awɔɔ n dɔmɩm bɩ kan wakatɩ bɩ kɩ dɔ y."
"Woso cirbəə b'a ya, an bɔ kʋ rɛ kan gʋaa k'a n'a ŋʋam k'a ta kʋ ʋ, an a zibəənyɩnɔ bir, an a arzaka ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔ ma bɩ kɩ.
A n talan soor ka deem ʋ, an talan hɩɩya ka naa do ʋ, an talan deem ka a vanta ʋ. Gʋaa biyəə n n'a dam ma an zi ba m b'a ka ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, an cem.
Gʋaa k'a talan soor bɩ yɩ bɩ n ta an ter ba m, an talan soor vanta yɩ an a na ma.
Gʋaa k'a talan hɩɩya yɩ bɩ n ta an ter ba m sɔ, an talan hɩɩya yɩ an a na ma.
Bɩ, gʋaa k'a talan deem yɩ bɩ, ta a ʋ, an aa yaa hɔn, an a zuuba bɩ busoo nyaakʋm da ʋ.
Zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ zuuba bɩ, k'a ta tee••• bɩ, a a bɔ an bʋr, an n'a busoo bɩ mim laaka darɛ ŋ han.
Gʋaa k'a talan soor yɩ bɩ n a zɔ, an talan soor k'a yɩ an a na ma bɩ hɩnka, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, talan soor ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ hɔɔ, talan soor vanta ba mɔɔ yɩ na.'
A zuuba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa k'an tɩrga n'ɩbɩɩ m, a mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ sɩra zi ba hɔ poore nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔ gʋta zibəə karɛ ɩ ʋ, bʋr ɩ heernyɔɔ ba kan mɔɔ kɩ.'
Zibəənyɩ k'a talan hɩɩya yɩ bɩ n a zɔ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Talan hɩɩya ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ, talan hɩɩya vanta ba mɔɔ yɩ na.'
A zuuba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa k'an tɩrga n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ sɩra zi ba hɔ poore nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔ gʋta zibəə karɛ ɩ ʋ, bʋr ɩ heernyɔɔ ba kan mɔɔ kɩ.'
Zibəənyɩ k'a talan deem yɩ bɩ n a zɔ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ gʋaa kʋsɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, lɛɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n hɔ duu ʋ bɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔ daŋ ʋ, lɛɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n hɔ sɔɔn ʋ bɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔ saŋ ʋ.
Nyibəə mɔɔ nyasʋ, mɔɔ n ta m aa ɩ busoo bɩ biitə tara ʋ, dɩga, ɩ busoo bɩ ba n nɩ.'
A zuuba bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: 'Zibəənyɩ bʋnyaa yakʋzaa ra! Ɩbɩɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ hɔ dam lɛɛ kʋ mɔɔ n hɔ duu ʋ, m nɩ hɔ sam lɛɛ kʋ mɔɔ n hɔ sɔɔn ʋ.
A dɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ʋ maam bɩ, mɔɔ busoo bɩ cɩnta ɩbɩɩ nawʋm busoocɩntarɛcɛ ʋ, mɔɔ wusigəre ma, mɔɔ yɩ m busoo bɩ sam kan nyɔɔdʋ kɩ.
Naa minto bɩ, k'a busoo talan deem k'an ta m bɩ yɔm, a ka talan bu zaa b'ʋ.
Bala, gʋaa k'an ta hɔ m bɩ, n y'a kam bɩ zaa ʋ, an a na ma, a hɔ m yɩ gʋta. Bɩ gʋaa k'a bam bɩ, baa hɔ k'an ta m bɩ, n bɩ yɔm nɩ.
Bɩ, k'a zibəənyɩ hɔ vam naa do zo garga ra monsigə ʋ. Lɛɛ bɩ do an nɩ baa daŋ ʋ, an a sɔ sʋ.' "
"Kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bʋr a cirbəə nɔ ʋ kan malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, a nyɩntam a cirbəəduu paŋŋazaa bɩ ra.
Durnya kʋrɔ haay gʋɔɔ y'a som kʋ ma a lɛɛ, an gʋɔɔ gʋngʋ a hɔ, amba hɔbɩsɩrɔ dundor tɩr seero gʋ biiro ma bɩ m.
A seero wɔɔ nyɔɔrɛ a bɩsɩ, an biiro wɔɔ nyɔɔ a jɩsa.
Cir bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a bɩsɩ ra zannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'Awɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ barka n nɩ kan a kɩ bɩ, k'a bʋr, a cirbəə kʋ Woso a banka awɔɔ minto durnya darɛ sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ si.
Bala, nɔ mɔɔ zɛ, awɔɔ n hɔbɩrɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ, mɩsɩ mɔɔ zɛ, awɔɔ n hi ka mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ bʋr awɔɔ zi saana, awɔɔ mɔɔ si a har ʋ,
mɔɔ nyɩnta dɩgɩ, awɔɔ n huu du mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ n nyɩnta laafɩɩ y, awɔɔ bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ nyɩnta lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, awɔɔ m bʋr mɔɔ zi b'ʋ.'
Meerbaa naa do jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: 'Zuuba, wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ nɔ n'ɩbɩɩ zɛrɛ, ʋ hɔbɩrɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ, gɛɛ mɩsɩ n'ɩ zɛrɛ, ʋ hi ka ɩ ʋ?
Wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ saana, ʋ ɩbɩɩ si ʋ har ʋ, gɛɛ ɩbɩɩ n dɩgɩ, ʋ huu du ɩ ma?
Wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ ɩ nɩ yaaba m, gɛɛ ɩ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, ʋ ta, ʋ aa dɩga ɩ ma?'
Cir bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, hɔɔ nɔɔn duro k'awɔɔ n n'a bam gʋɔɔ poorero nɔɔn gʋaa deem m bɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩ, a ba awɔɔ nawʋm mɔɔ m.'
Naa jɛ ʋ, a y'a hɩm jɩsa ra zannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'K'a jɩ bɔ mɔɔ ma a ta laatʋ, awɔɔ kʋ Woso lerbɔrɛ bʋnyaa n'a jɛ ʋ, k'a ta sɛ k'a lihire ba ʋ, n n a banka Sʋtaana kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ minto b'ʋ.
Bala, nɔ mɔɔ zɛ, b'awɔɔ n hɔbɩrɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ y, mɩsɩ mɔɔ zɛ, b'awɔɔ n hi ka mɔɔ ʋ y,
mɔɔ nyɩnta saana, awɔɔ n mɔɔ si a har ʋ y, mɔɔ nyɩnta dɩgɩ, awɔɔ n huu du mɔɔ ma y, mɔɔ n nyɩnta laafɩɩ y, awɔɔ n bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma y, mɔɔ nyɩnta lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, awɔɔ n bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma sɔ y.'
Brɔɔ y'a hɩm nɩ, ŋ ʋ: 'Zuuba, wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ nɔ n'ɩ zɛrɛ, mɩsɩ n'ɩ zɛrɛ, gɛɛ saana, ɩ n dɩgɩ, ɩ nɩ yaaba m, ɩ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, wɔɔ n dɩga ɩbɩɩ ma, k'ʋ da ɩ han?'
Cir bɩ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a ba gʋɔɔ poorero nɔɔn duro gʋaa deem m bɩ, awɔɔ n a ba mɔɔ m sɔ y.'
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a hʋrlɛ ŋnɩ ta hʋnhʋrlɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, bɩ gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ tam mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu k'a meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba haay bɩ, a a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ pakkɩ cibsa n zizer.
N Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋrɛ, n n a zɛ gɔdarkʋra ma."
A m naa, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ, kan kʋ bɩ gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ n a so kʋ ma wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Kayiifʋ har ʋ.
Ŋ n kʋ ma k'a Yeezuu nyasʋ hɔɔnkarɛ m, a zɛ gər.
Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ b'a nyasʋ cibsa bɩ bire ʋ y, kʋ m bɛɛ zɛkʋma nyɩntam zamaa bɩ bire ʋ."
Yeezuu k'a ta Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n n'a birm kusimə bɩ har ʋ, Betanii ʋ bɩ,
Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ bɩm bɩ, lʋ n a zɔ ma tidəər k'a lɛ n kʋsɩ m albatɩr jaa gedre ʋ, an a burgu Yeezuu mim la.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ nɔ n yɩ y, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ noonkahɔma n naa?
N y'a da ma, n nɩ tidəər naa do hɛɛ busoo gʋta ma, n n a ka ŋʋazannɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a ʋ, ŋ yɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ lʋ naa do heer kɔrɛ? Zibəə mɩŋŋa a a ba mɔɔ m naa.
Ŋʋazannɔ gɔɔtarɛ ŋnɩ bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ tee•••, bɩ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ tee••• y.
Tidəər naa do k'a a burgu mɔɔ ra naa, mɔɔ gər birle a a banka.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lɛɛ haay kʋ gʋɔɔ n nɩ lemim nyɩnta naa do dɩndaŋ ʋ durnya lɛɛ haay ʋ bɩ, ŋ lʋ naa do zi k'a a ba bɩ tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a dɩnda."
Bɩ kur bɩ, Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ ta wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zi.
A n aa a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ, awɔɔ: "Bɔ hɔ awɔɔ n n'a kam mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ Yeezuu nyasʋ m a ka a ʋ?" Brɔɔ n wanzurfu busooyaa lɛ sa bukərku, ŋn'a ka ʋ.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do tɛkka ʋ, Zidas y'a kam toore mɩŋŋa ma k'a Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka ŋ ʋ.
Bur kʋ n nɩ nyʋnyɔɔ da ʋ cibsa lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm ma bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bʋr Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa kʋ aa pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ banka lɛɛ kara ʋ ɩbɩɩ minto?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "K'a ta kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ niŋŋəzaa naa zi, a hɩ m, a ʋ: Karɩnsaamba ʋ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm a zɔ, ɩbɩɩ har mɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ bɩ bɩŋ ʋ kan ŋ karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba, ŋnɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, Yeezuu nyɩnta k'a hɔ bɩ kan bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kʋ ŋ n'a bɩm bɩ, Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ gʋaa deem mɔɔ nyasʋrɛ, an mɔɔ ka."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ heer n a zar, ŋn'ɩ laaka dam han deem-deem, ŋ ʋ: "Yɩ a nawʋm mɔɔ ra, Zuuba?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a a wɔ nyɔɔ laaga b'ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bɩ m.
Gʋaanyɩ bɩ garɛ amba hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba a tɔ ma bɩ m, bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋm k'a ka bɩ kʋsɩ yɩrɛ. Kʋ gʋaa bɩ do ɩ nɩ yɩ, a jɩra m."
Zidas k'a nɩ zɛm b'a nyasʋ an a ka bɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ m gɛɛ karɩnsaamba?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩ ɩ zi m."
Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kʋ ŋ n'a bɩm bɩ, Yeezuu bur sa an barka da Woso m, an a zɩnzɛ ra, an bɔkarɛ an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a si a bɩ, naa do naa mɔɔ mɛ m."
Bɩ kur bɩ, an hɔmire sa, an barka da Woso m, an bɔkarɛ an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ haay k'a mi.
Bala, mɔɔ ma n naa, gʋaasɩbabaa ma m, an a lo gʋɔɔ ciiro minto, mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m dɩvɛn daa mi dʋntɔ y, an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n a mim kan awɔɔ kɩ m Zɩ cirbəə nɔ ʋ bɩ ku."
Kʋ ŋ cibsa bɩ laarɔ lɔ ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a hʋr ŋnɩ ta Oliviyee ci ra.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Gum naa do ʋ bala, awɔɔ haay y'a sɩrakarɛ tom mɔɔ minto, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ seero dundor bɩ zɛm, seero wɔɔ n hɩsɩga da.'
Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ bɩ m mɩm bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʋ."
Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ sa, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Baa kʋ nawɔnnɔ haay a sɩrakarɛ to, mɔɔ bɩ m sɩrakarɛ tore y."
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: Gum naa do ʋ bala, an lɛɛ ka koo baadarɛ m, ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʋ ɩ ʋ, ɩ n mɔɔ dɔ y."
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Baa kʋ ga mɔɔ nawʋm kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, bɩ m. Mɔɔ bɩ bɩsɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma y." A muno wɔɔ haay n a hɩ maam sɔ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu ta kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ kʋ n n'a birm Gɛtsemanee ʋ b'ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a nyɩnta naa ʋ, kʋ m aa yaa da lɛɛ naa do ʋ kʋ m bʋr."
A n Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zebedee nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Heerzar kan dabɔʋ kɩ gasʋ ʋ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ heer a zar an a zɔ zɛ ma, k'a gɔɔta naa ʋ, a bɩ hinceem ba y."
A n ta lɛɛ poore, an a do an a meer ku tara ma, an nɩ yaa darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, kʋ fɩryɩrɛ naa do y'a dam ma an a gʋ mɔɔ ma, k'ɩ gʋ m ma. Kan naa kɩ haay ɩ bɩ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y, ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba."
A n a wusigə, an bʋr karɩndanyɩnɔ kaakʋrɔ wɔɔ zi, a bɩ dɩga a ŋ hinceem ba. A n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, awɔɔ n a da a mɩŋŋa ma a jɩm wakatɩ deem nɔ ʋ tɔkkɛ kan mɔɔ kɩ y!
K'a yaa da, a bɩ hinceem ba y, a yaa n a do makra nɔ ʋ. Gʋaa heer lɛ taa, b'a mɛsim paŋŋa ba ʋ y."
A n a ya, an a bɔ a hɩɩya hɔ ma, an yaa da, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, kʋ pakra m kʋ fɩryɩrɛ naa do n mɔɔ yɩ, k'an yɩ maam, k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ n kʋ yɩ."
A n a ya, an a bɔ an bʋr karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an bɩ ŋ yɩ ŋn'ɩ hinceem barɛ, hinceem k'a nɩ ŋ zɛm bɩ minto m.
Yeezuu n a ya, an a gʋ ŋ ma a kaakʋ hɔ ma, an aa so a yaadarɛ bɩ ra.
A n a bɔ an bʋr karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ gɔɔta an nɩ hinceem bam, an nɩ hoon sim na? K'a dɩga a wakatɩ a ku, n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋrɛ, n n a ka mimbʋnyaabənno ʋ.
K'a wuti! K'ʋ ʋ hʋr! Gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ lee ku."

K'a gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem Zidas bɩ lee ku. Bʋr a ʋ kan zamaa cir gʋta kɩ, ŋn'ɩ kargʋrɔ m kan bənkənno kɩ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ.
Zidas bɩ lɛɛ ka an hɔ k'a n'a bam ŋnɩ Yeezuu dɔ ŋn'a nyasʋ bɩ makra hɩnka ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ yaa dam nɩ kan daʋrɛ kɩ bɩ, gʋaa bɩ do m, k'a nyasʋ."
Zidas n a zɔ Yeezuu ma lɛɛm, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m!" A n bɔkarɛ, an yaa da m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "M gʋaasɩba, hɔ k'ɩ bʋr, kɩ b'a ba bɩ ba." A m naa, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a nyasʋ.
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem a kargʋ gaa ʋ, an wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ deem sakʋ, an a tʋr gʋ ma.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ kargʋ bɩ du a caan ʋ, bala, gʋaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ yar bam kargʋ m bɩ, kargʋ n n'a zɛm gər.
Ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ n da ma, m m Zɩ bir, an malɛɛkarɔ tisi bam hɔka-hɔka nyɔɔ mɔɔ m lɛɛm na?
Bɩ k'a yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, Wosoci bɩ meerbaa y'a bam lɔ, an kʋ yɩ? Bala, a a hɩ, a ʋ: Pakra m k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʋ."
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ gʋaa cir bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr awɔɔ ʋ kargʋrɔ m kan bannɔ kɩ k'a bɩ mɔɔ nyasʋ, ɩ ʋ, dazaamazaa m mɔɔ nɩ! Mɔɔ nyɩnta Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ dɔmɩm haay, m nɩ hɔ dɩndam, b'awɔɔ n mɔɔ nyasʋ y.
Bɩ naa do haay naa, ba a ʋ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ meerbaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosoci b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n kʋ yɩ." A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay n a si, ŋn'a bɔ Yeezuu ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu nyasʋ rɔ wɔɔ ta m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Kayiifʋ har ʋ. Lɛɛ bɩ do wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ a so kʋ ma ʋ, kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ.
Pɩyɛɛr n zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ laatʋ, an ta an aa lee ku wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʋ. A n gasʋ har b'ʋ, an aa nyɩnta kan hallɛdɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a dɩga mim bɩ nyambʋrlɛ ma.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ haay kɩ y'a kam mim ma k'a ka Yeezuu ra, k'a ku a dʋdɔ yar, a ka kʋ n n a zɛ gər.
Bɩ, ŋ bɩr mim yɩrɛ y, baa kʋ gʋɔɔ bʋr gʋta ŋnɩ ŋʋaar ba k'a ka ra bɩ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋnɩ hɔsɩ yɩ k'a ka ra y. Gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ bʋr.
Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ m da ma, m Wosocɛ bɩ wurgə, m m ya, m a dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʋ nɔ ʋ."
Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n wuti, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩr a nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ ra? Bɔ mim gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ minto na?"
Bɩ, Yeezuu bɩr hɔsɩ hɩrɛ y. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a ya, an lɛ ka ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩ wer si Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ tɔ ma, sɩra hɩ wɔɔ m, ɩbɩɩ m Krista Woso Nyɩ bɩ gɛ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩrɛ, bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an nyɩnta Woso paŋŋazaa bɩ bɩsɩ ra, awɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ, an bɩr zɛm warkʋ mim ʋ."
A m naa, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɔ n ma ʋ, an a huuro kɩnkaansʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso sʋnsɔ a a wʋ, kasɛtɩzannɔ zibəə a ya an ta wɔɔ ma ra? Awɔɔ Woso sʋnsɔ k'a wʋ bɩ ma.
Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lɔ kɛɛrɛ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "A a ga zɛ m."
Ŋ n lihi da a meer ma, ŋn'a wɔrɔ hunhuŋŋu ŋn'a zɛrɛ, gɔsɩnnɔ n n'a wɔ tɩntam lɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ:
"Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa zi ba, ɩ hɩ wɔɔ m, Krista, nka y'ɩ zɛ?"
Kʋ Pɩyɛɛr nɩ nyɩntam tɩnsara b'ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩlʋrɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem a zɔ ma, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ kan Galilee gʋaa Yeezuu bɩ kɩ sɔ!"
Pɩyɛɛr n bɩsɩ ka gʋaa haay lɛɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ hɩ naa jɩ dɔ y."
A n a hʋr b'ʋ, an nɩ tam har bɩ lɛ ma, zibəənyɩlʋ vanta n a yɩ, an a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do nyɩnta kan Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ kɩ."
Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an bɩsɩ ka Yeezuu ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ m wer si, mɔɔ n gʋaa naa do dɔ y."
Kʋ maasɩrɛ ba poore bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a zɔ Pɩyɛɛr ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ sɩra m, ŋ gʋaa n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ, ɩbɩɩ meerbaa y'ɩ tojɩ hɩnkarɛ."
Pɩyɛɛr n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a wer sim, an n'a tarɛ a rɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n gʋaa naa do dɔ y!" Lɛɛm bɩ, koo n baa da.
Pɩyɛɛr n mim kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʋ koo n bɔkarɛ, an baa da." A n bɔ, an nɩ nyi kam kan heer zar gʋta kɩ.
Dɔ k'a mɛ dɔgta mɩŋŋa m bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan tara bɩ gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ lɛ sa k'a Yeezuu ka zɛ ma.
Ŋ n a sur, ŋnɩ ta m, ŋn'aa ka Rɔm lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ b'ʋ.
Zidas Yeezuu nyasʋ an a ka, bɩ, k'a b'a yɩ ŋnɩ Yeezuu dʋdɔ yar k'a zɛ gər bɩ, a kʋrkʋr da, an a bɔ an a wanzurfu busooyaa bukərku rɔ wɔɔ ka wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ʋ kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ ʋ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a n hɔsɩ ba naa kʋ mɔɔ ka ŋn'a zɛ naa, mimbʋnyaa mɔɔ ba." Bɩ brɔɔ a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Kara ɩ pakra ba wɔɔ ma? Ɩbɩɩ mim m!"
A n aa busoo bɩ lo Wosocɛ b'ʋ, an a hʋr, an ta an aa bar da a ma.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ n busoo bɩ gʋr, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, a n a ga m, kʋ wɔɔ n busoo naa do zar Wosocɛ bɩ busoo ra y, bala, gərzɛrɛ busoo m."
Ŋ nɩ kʋ ma, ŋnɩ busoo bɩ sa ŋnɩ mɔrdor hɔsɩra si m, k'an yɩ saanɔɔ gəənoyaa.
Bɩ y'a ka, n n hɔsɩra bɩ do tɔ ka, n ʋ: 'Ma sɩra,' an ta, an her dɔmɩm ku.

A m naa, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zeremii meerbaa k'a ba bɩ n kʋ yɩ: 'Ŋ wanzurfu bukərku bɩ sa, ŋnɩ mɔrdor bɩ hɔsɩra bɩ si m, amba Zuuba a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m. Gʋaa kʋ Israyɛl nyɩnɔ kʋ ma, ŋn'a ter ba bɩ busoo m.'
Bɩ, Yeezuu yaa jɩm lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ lɛɛ. Bɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ hɩ ɩ zim."
Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ ɩ mim kam Yeezuu ra, b'a n hɔsɩ nyɩ bɔ ʋ y.
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩr minno kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ karɛ ɩ ra bɩ mam na?"
Bɩ, Yeezuu n deem taan••• nyɩ bɔ ʋ y, naa do a ka cir bɩ n zɛ kədə.
Pakkɩ cibsa biyəə ma, lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ bɩ tɩr lɔ kʋ zamaa bɩ lɛ n taa bɩ bɔ, an a ka ŋ ʋ.
A n bɔkarɛ lɔ deem ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, lɔ wɩsɩ, a tɔ m Barabas.
Pɩlatɩ n laaka da gʋaa cir k'a so kʋ ma b'ʋ bɩ han, a ʋ: "Nka awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ mɔɔ n wɔ saa ma, Barabas gɛɛ, Yeezuu kʋ n n'a birm Krista bɩ nɩ?"
Bala, Pɩlatɩ a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ Yeezuu nyasʋ ŋ y'a ʋ ŋn'a ka a ʋ jɩmbaa minto.
Pɩlatɩ k'a nɩ nyɩntam dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, a laarɛ nyɔɔ da ma, kʋ n n a hɩ m, n ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ gasʋ gʋaa tɩrga naa do mim ʋ y. Bala, gunuu ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ fɩr yɩ nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ a minto."
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ k'ɩ gʋaa cir bɩ nyʋnnyɔɔm, kʋ ŋ nɩ Barabas bɔrɛ yɛ, kʋ ŋ nɩ Yeezuu garɛ yɛ.
Lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ bɩ n a ya, an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya bɩ barla bɩ, kara awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m bɔ m a ka a ʋ?" Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Barabas."
Pɩlatɩ n laaka da ŋ han, a ʋ: "Bɩ bɔ mɔɔ n'a bam Yeezuu kʋ n n'a birm Krista bɩ nɩ?" Ŋ haay n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "A wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!"
Pɩlatɩ n laaka da, a ʋ: "Mimbʋnyaa kara a a ba?" Ŋ n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!"

Pɩlatɩ k'a n'a yɩrɛ, a ʋ, awɔɔ b'a dam mim bɩ bankarɛ ma bɩ, bɩ zamaa bɩ y'a ŋʋam k'a lɛɛ zɛ kʋ ma bɩ, a hi kusi, an a wɔ hir m zamaa bɩ lɛɛ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ba gʋaa naa do zɛrɛ barla y, awɔɔ mim m!"
Zamaa bɩ haay n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ: "K'a zɛrɛ mim n wɔɔ yɩ, kan ʋ nyɩnɔ kɩ."
A m naa do, Pɩlatɩ n Barabas bɔ, an a ka ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ madɩr m, an a ka kʋ n n a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
Pɩlatɩ sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n ta Yeezuu m lɛɛzaa bɩ har ʋ b'ʋ, sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ haay n a so kʋ ma ŋnɩ bɩr Yeezuu ma,
ŋn'a huuro bɔ ma, ŋnɩ zaba piinə du ma,
ŋnɩ laa waa ŋn'a ku a mim ma, ŋ ʋ, cinno firgə m, ŋnɩ bənkə da a bɩsɩ wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ a taa ŋn'ɩ yaa wʋm ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m zɩɩfʋrɔ cir!"
Ŋ n'ɩ lihi dɩndam ma, ŋn'ɩ bənkə bɩ sarɛ ŋn'a zɛm nɩ a mim ma.
Kʋ ŋ yaa wʋ ma ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ zaba bɩ bɔ ma, ŋn'a huuro wɔɔ du ma, ŋn'a hʋr m k'a yaa wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
Bɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ Sirɛnnɩ gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn bɩ zɛ ʋ, sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n paŋŋa ba ma, an Yeezuu gɔdarkʋra bɩ busu.
Ŋ n lee ku lɛɛ kʋ ŋ n'a birm Golgotaa b'ʋ, a jɩ ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ, 'Minkorgo bɩncɛ.'
Ŋ n dɩvɛn war kʋ ma kan hɔ hɛɛnr kɩ, ŋn'a ka ʋ, k'an a mi. K'a da a lɛ ma bɩ, a n a ŋʋa an a mi y.
Ŋ n a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, ŋnɩ pʋɛɛga da a huuro wɔɔ ma ŋnɩ ŋ jir.
Ŋ n a gaa, ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ dɔm ma.
Ŋ n Yeezuu zɛ bɩ jɩ gʋrsɩra ba warga ma, Yeezuu mim la gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma, ŋ ʋ: 'Yeezuu m naa, zɩɩfʋrɔ cir m.'
Ŋ konno wɔ hɩɩya gɔdarkʋra ma Yeezuu jɩr ʋ, deem a bɩsɩ, deem a jɩsa.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cenim b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'a mim zukə zɛrɛ, ŋn'a sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ.
Ŋ n'a hɩm Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n'ɩ dam ma, ɩ Wosocɛ bɩ wurgə, ɩ ya, ɩ dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʋ nɔ ʋ bɩ, ɩ bʋmbɔ ɩ zim kʋ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ zer gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma!"
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ ɩ yaa wʋm ma sɔ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ:
"A gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ bʋmbɔ, b'a b'a dam ma, an a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ y. Kʋ Israyɛl cir nɩ, k'an zer gɔdarkʋra bɩ ra kɛɛrɛ, k'ʋ sɩra ka ʋ.
A sɩra ka Woso ʋ, an a hɩ a ʋ, Woso Nyɩ n'a mɩ, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, kʋ Woso y'a ŋʋarɛ, k'a n a yɔ wa."
Konno kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma a jɩr ʋ rɔ wɔɔ y'a sʋnsɔ wʋm sɔ.
Sinsebir k'a da bɩ, monsigə gʋta zɛ tara burə ʋ, an ta an wakatɩ kaakʋ ku yirbəəre m.
Yirbəə wakatɩ kaakʋ zeezi bɩ, Yeezuu zee gʋta da, a ʋ: "Eloyii, Eloyii, lama sabaktaani?" A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Woso, mɔɔ Woso, bɔ m, ɩ ɩ bɔ mɔɔ ʋ?"
Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ naa ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A ɩ Elii birm!"
Ŋ gʋaa deem n bra si, an aa hɔ mafʋ-mafʋda sa, an a nyɔɔ hɔ hɛɛnr ma an a da bənkə ma, an a ka Yeezuu ʋ k'an a mi.
Bɩ, a muno wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Jɩm cɩna, k'ʋ dɩga a Elii zɛm b'a bʋmbɔ gɛ?"
Yeezuu n a ya, an zee gʋta da, an ga.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Wosocɛ bɩ pɛɛra bɩ n zɛ kumbir, an a sa mim ʋ an b'a zɛ tara ma. Tara n nyiŋŋə, ciro n wunwu,
gəənoyaarɔ n a gʋngʋ. Wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n a mɩm bʋmbɔ ʋ gʋta.
Ŋ n bɔ yaarɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Yeezuu k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ hinni ʋ, ŋnɩ gasʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ mɩŋŋa b'ʋ, gʋɔɔ gʋta nɩ ŋ yɩ.
Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ cir, kan sʋrdaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔm Yeezuu ma rɔ wɔɔ tara bɩ nyiŋŋəre yɩ, kan hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba haay bɩ kɩ, ŋ da n bɔ ʋ gʋta, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Sɩra m, Woso Nyɩ m paan•••"
Lannɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ guta, ŋn'a to laatʋ ŋn'ɩ dɩgam, zu ŋ y'a ʋ Yeezuu jɛ ʋ Galilee ʋ tee•••, ŋn'a dam han.
Magdalaa Maarii nyɩnta ŋ barla, kan Maarii, Zakkɩ kan Zozɛf kɩ da bɩ, kan Zebedee nyɩnɔ da kɩ.
Woso lɛ k'a b'a zo bɩ, Arimatee kʋ gʋaa arzakazaa deem k'a tɔ m Zozɛf bʋr, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩ deem m sɔ.
A n ta Pɩlatɩ zi, an aa Yeezuu gər bɩ yɛ han. Pɩlatɩ n lɛ ka, n n a ka ʋ.
A n gər bɩ sa, an pɛɛra fɛʋda burgu ma,
an a da a mɩŋŋa yaa daa k'a hɔ ci ʋ b'ʋ, an jaa gʋta gərgu an a ta rɛ, an a hʋr.
Magdalaa kʋ Maarii kan Maarii vanta bɩ k'ɩ nyɩntam b'ʋ, ŋn'a meer nya yaa bɩ rɛ.
Sabaa bankarɛ hinni k'a cem dɔ n mɛ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ zu kʋ ʋ ŋnɩ ta Pɩlatɩ zi.
Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ lɛɛzaa, ŋʋaarzaa naa do k'a nyɩnta an a hɩ, a ʋ: Dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, mɔɔ yɩ m mɩm bɔŋ ʋ bɩ, a tɔ ɩ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ.

Lɛ ka kʋ n n dɔ yaa bɩ ma, k'an ta an dɔmɩm kaakʋ bɩ ku, k'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma, ŋnɩ bʋr, ŋn'a gər bɩ kʋna, ŋn'a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: A a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ y. Kʋ m bɛɛ m, ŋʋaar naa do lɛ dam lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ m."
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ ɩ sʋrdaarɔ m, k'a ta a ka ŋnɩ dɔ yaa bɩ ma amba awɔɔ a da ma bɩ m."
Ŋ n a hʋr, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'aa jaa k'a ta yaa bɩ lɛ bɩ kʋsɩ, ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ da a dɔma ʋ.
Sabaa hinni bɩ k'a cem bɩ, hatʋ hinni ʋ wutigʋta m bɩ, Magdalaa Maarii kan Maarii deem bɩ kɩ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ dɩga yaa bɩ ma.
Tara n nyiŋŋə lɛɛm, Zuuba malɛɛka n a to brama an zer, an bɩ jaa bɩ gərgu an a gʋ yaa bɩ rɛ, an nyɩnta ra.
A mɛ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan brama nyakɩ kɩ, a huu bɩ fu am lajaa hɔ bɩ m.
Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ da n bɔ ʋ, ŋ mɛ nɩ hinkəm, ŋn'a ba ɩ ʋ, gɩnga ŋ y'a ʋ.
Bɩ, malɛɛka bɩ meer ba kan lannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ Yeezuu kʋ n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ awɔɔ n'a kam ma.
A ba naa ʋ dɔ y, a a mɩm bɔ ʋ amba a lɛɛ ka an a hɩ bɩ m, k'a bʋr a dɩga lɛɛ k'a nɩ wʋtaŋ ʋ hɔɔ bɩ ma.
Bɩ, k'a ta zɔɔ a yaa hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: A a mɩm bɔ ʋ, bɩ, a ɩ lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʋ, lɛɛ bɩ do awɔɔ naa yɩ ʋ, naa do mɔɔ kʋ m a hɩ awɔɔ m."
Lannɔ wɔɔ a hʋr yaa bɩ ra zɔɔ-zɔɔ, kan dabɔʋ kɩ heernyɔɔ gʋta kɩ, ŋn'a si, k'a yaa mim bɩ hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ, Yeezuu bʋr an ŋ zɛ ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m." Lannɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma ŋn'a gannɔ nyɩnnyasʋ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ a taa.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. K'a ta a yaa hɩ mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋnɩ ta Galilee ʋ, ŋ mɔɔ yɩm b'ʋ."
Kʋ ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, sʋrdaarɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʋr kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ hɔ k'a ba haay bɩ sa, ŋn'a dɩnda wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m.
Brɔɔ n a so kʋ ma, kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ kʋ ma, ŋnɩ busoo ka sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ ʋ gʋta.
Ŋ nɩ lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a hɩ a ʋ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ ɩ bʋr gunuu ʋ, ŋnɩ b'a gər bɩ kʋna, bɩ ma bɩ, wɔɔ hinceem ba.
Bɩ, kʋ lɛɛzaa b'a ma, wɔɔ y'a dɩndarɛ dɔm, mim b'a nɔrɛ awɔɔ ma y."
Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n busoo bɩ si, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a dɩnda ŋ nɩ bɩ ba, mim naa do n bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, an ta an lee ku her dɔmɩm ʋ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ bueeredeem nɔ wɔɔ n a hʋr, ŋnɩ ta Galilee ʋ, ci kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ a ʋ, ŋnɩ ta ra bɩ burə ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ yaa yɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ, bɩ gɔsɩnnɔ sɩnsɩm ka.
Yeezuu n a zɔ ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N paŋŋa do haay ka mɔɔ ʋ, brama kan tara kɩ burə ʋ.
Bɩ, k'a ta doro haay zi, a yaa gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ba mɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ, a batɛm ka ŋ ʋ, Zɩ kan Nyɩ kɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri kɩ tɔ ma.
A hɔ kʋ mɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m haay bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ zu ʋ. Bɩ mɔɔ ba n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ, k'an ta an durnya nyarɛ ku."
Lemim nyɩnta k'a nɩ Woso Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista bɩ mim dɩndam bɩ n naa do.
Mim bɩ, a sɩŋŋɩda a ba, amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a gʋrsɩra ba biisi bɩ m, a ʋ: Mɔɔ nɩ m zibəəzaa nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, k'an b'ɩ zaa banka.
A mɩŋŋa leer nɩ bɔm poohɔɔn ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: k'a Zuuba zaa banka, k'a a zaarɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋntɔ rɔ wɔɔ banka, k'a ŋ zɛ kʋ ŋ n yɩ tɩrga.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Zaan a hɩnka poohɔɔn ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ pa dam, a ʋ: "K'a a bɔ a taam, k'a batɛm si, k'a a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ."
Zidee kʋ zannɔ kan Zerizalɛm kʋ zannɔ kɩ bʋr Zaan zi, ŋnɩ batɛm si Zʋrdɛn kɔ ʋ, ŋn'a mimbʋnyaarɔ hɩrɛ.
Zaan bɩ, yoonde ka huu a du a ma, an kʋmbar so a ʋ. Bɩsɩnɔ kan zɔɔn kɩ a n'a bɩrɛ.
A hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, a y'a hɩm gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa nɩ mɔɔ jɛ ʋ, an nɩ zɛm, bɩ, a zaa paŋŋa cem mɔɔ han. Mɔɔ n m ga m, m sʋnta a taa, m a kʋsɔrɔ bar tɔkkɛ hʋnhʋr y.
Mɔɔ batɛm ka awɔɔ ʋ hi nɔ ʋ, bɩ, a mɩŋŋa zɛm bɩ batɛm ka awɔɔ ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m."
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a to Nazarɛtɩ ʋ, Galilee kʋ nɔ ʋ, an bʋr Zʋrdɛn kɔ ʋ k'a bɩ batɛm si Zaan zi.
Bɩ, k'a bɩ batɛm si an a nya, an nɩ bɔm hi b'ʋ bɩ, brama a gʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer a mim ʋ, am cirpʋʋrɛ hɔ bɩ m.
Bɩ leer a to mim ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Nyɩ kʋ mɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa kan m heer kɩ haay."
Lɛɛm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka an ta poohɔɔn ʋ.
A gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm busi, Sʋtaana n'a gɩngam ma. A mɩsɩrbaa ba a nawʋm poohɔɔ barla, bɩ malɛɛkarɔ bʋr k'a b'a da han.
N Zaan nyasʋ, n n a du, Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ an bʋr Galilee ʋ,
an nɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta pa dam gʋɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Dɔmɩm b'a ku, Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ. K'a bɔ a taam, k'a lemim nyɩnta bɩ si."
Kʋ Yeezuu nɩ tam Galilee higʋta lɛ ra bɩ, a zɔbənno yɩ hɩɩya, Sɩmɔɔn kan a danzaa Andɩr kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zɔ bam, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋa zom higʋta b'ʋ, bala, zɔbənno m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr a zu mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bam gʋɔɔkamazannɔ!"
Lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ to, ŋn'ɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan kɩ.
K'a ta lɛɛ poore bɩ, a Zebedee nyɩnɔ yɩ, Zakkɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋarɔ bankarɛ a kɔɔlʋʋ nɔ ʋ.
Yeezuu n ŋ bir lɛɛm, ŋn'a zɩ Zebedee to kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ kan zibənno wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a hʋr, ŋn'ɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan kɩ.
Ŋ gasʋ Kapɛrnawum kʋ nɔ ʋ, sabaa hinni ʋ, Yeezuu n gasʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ, an hɔ dɩnda.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ minto. Bala Woso paŋŋa an nɩ hɔ bɩ dɩndam nɩ, a bɩ hɔdeem kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ kɩ y.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋaa kʋ zinəro n ta m nɩ ŋ sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ, an nɩ zee darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
"Bɔ ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ ba wɔɔ nɩ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu? Bʋr ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ bɩ wɔɔ zibəə zar gɛ? Kʋ nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ dɔ: Woso gʋaa mɩŋŋa n'ɩbɩɩ m."
Yeezuu n meer ba ma, a ʋ: "Ɩ tʋr ka, k'ɩ bɔ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ!"
Zinə bɩ n gʋaa bɩ hinkə kan paŋŋa kɩ, an bɔ a mɛ ʋ kan zee kɩ.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay zɛ kədə, ŋn'ɩ laaka dɩndam kʋ han, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m naa? Hɔdɩndarɛ daa kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ bɩ ba n nɩ! A m lɛ da bɩ, Yeezuu ɩ həən sim zinəro wɔɔ ma, ŋn'a lɛ sire."
Yeezuu tɔ bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ, Galilee kʋ ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ bɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ ta Sɩmɔɔn kan Andɩr kɩ har ʋ, kan Zakkɩ kɩ Zaan kɩ.
Bɩ ma bɩ, Sɩmɔɔn dində ɩ wʋtam kan mɛmarɛ kɩ. Lɛɛm bɩ, n yaabazaa bɩ mim hɩ Yeezuu m.
Yeezuu a zɔ, an a wɔ nyasʋ, an a ka an wuti. Mɛmarɛ bɩ n bɔ a mɛ ʋ, an wuti, an nyasʋ ŋ nɩ.
Yirbəəre m bɩ, woso lɛzore dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, n bʋr yaabazannɔ m kan hɔɔzannɔ kɩ m haay Yeezuu zi.
Kʋ bɩ zannɔ haay a so kʋ ma har bɩ lɛ ma.
A yaabazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cicir bam yaaba do haay m nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ waa gʋta, an la zinəro ra gʋta gʋɔɔ mɛ ʋ. Yeezuu n zinəro wɔɔ to ŋn'ɩ meer barɛ y, kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ bɩ minto.
Dɔgta mɩŋŋa m, Yeezuu wuti, an bɔ, an ta poohɔɔn ʋ, an nɩ yaa dam b'ʋ.
Sɩmɔɔn wuti kan a muno kɩ, ŋn'a dɩndaŋ ʋ,
ŋn'aa yɩ, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma!"
Bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ʋ ta kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lezima rɔ wɔɔ ʋ sɔ, kʋ m aa Woso lemim nyɩnta dɩnda ŋ nɩ. Bala, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto."
A a da Galilee kʋrɔ wɔɔ zi haay, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ ŋ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra.
Kusimə deem n b'a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an sʋnta, an a zuutə a taa, an n'a yɛm han, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ mɔɔ waa."
Yeezuu a cicir zɛ, an a wɔ hʋr, an a da ma, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛ taa ma k'ɩ laafɩɩ yɩ."
Lɛɛm bɩ, yaaba bɩ bɔ kusimə bɩ mɛ ʋ, an a ba mɩŋŋa.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɔɔ, an lɛ ka ʋ,
an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Dundo ɩ zi, ɩ b'a ka ɩ hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y. Ta ɩ yaa ɩ hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbər bɩ m, hubɔrɛ mannɩ kʋ Moyiisi lɛ ka awɔɔ ʋ k'a ba bɩ, k'ɩ bɩ ba, kʋ gʋaa biyəə n a dɔ, a ʋ, ɩbɩɩ laafɩɩ yɩ."

Bɩ, gʋaa bɩ bɔ, an a hʋr, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ mim bɩ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m lɛɛ haay ʋ. Naa do minto ma, Yeezuu b'a dam ma, an a hɩnka, an gasʋ kʋnɔ ʋ y. Gɔɔta a tɩr a ʋ bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʋ. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ a to lɛɛ haay ʋ, ŋn'ɩ zɛm Yeezuu zi.
Dɔmɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ cem nɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, Yeezuu a wusigə, an bʋr Kapɛrnawum kʋnɔ ʋ, bɩ gʋɔɔ a ma ŋ ʋ, a lee ku an nɩ har ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ cir gʋta bʋr, ŋnɩ b'a so kʋ ma b'ʋ, lɛ ba b'ʋ y, baa cɛlɛ ma bɩ, lɛ ba ʋ sɔ y. Yeezuu nɩ Woso lemim dɩndam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʋr zi mɛgarɛzaa m, ŋn'a busu gʋaa si.
Kʋ ŋ n a da ma, ŋn'ɩ tam nɩ Yeezuu zi bɩ, zamaa bɩ minto m, ŋ n cɛ mim bɩ hɔn ra, bɩncɛ kʋ Yeezuu n ta ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ busu kan a wʋtarahɔ bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a zer cɛ bɩ yaa bɩ m.
Kʋ Yeezuu ŋ sɩrakarɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "M nyɩnnɩ, ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ sugur yɩ!"
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ nyɩntam, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ a heer ʋ, ŋ ʋ:
"Bɔ m, gʋaa naa do nɩ meer naa do barɛ? Woso sʋnsɔ a n'a wʋm! Nka y'a da ma, an gʋaa mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka ʋ, kʋ Woso deem bɛɛ?"
Zɔɔ-zɔɔ bala, hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam ma a heer ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a dɔ a zim, an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto m awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʋ?
Kara m naanaa? Mɔɔ n b'a hɩm mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ: ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ bɩ m gɛɛ, ɩ wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr, ɩ ta bɩ nɩ?
Bɩ, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ, a ʋ: Gʋaanyɩ b'a da ma, an gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʋ, tara burə ʋ naa ʋ."
A n a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr, ɩ doo ɩ har ʋ!"
Lɛɛm bɩ, a wuti, an a wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr, an bɔ m, gʋaa biyəə mɩm m. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n mim naa do lɔɔ yɩ deem y."
Yeezuu a ya, an ta Galilee higʋta lɛ ra. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay bʋr zi, an nɩ Woso lemim dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
K'a nɩ cenim bɩ, a Alfee nyɩnnɩ Levii yɩ. A n nɩ nyɩntarɛ a yawʋrsire bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ!" Levii bɩ n wuti, an nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan kɩ.
Kʋ Yeezuu nɩ nyɩntam Levii har ʋ b'ʋ k'a hɔ bɩ bɩ, yawʋrsinno kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ gʋta nyɩnta kan kɩ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Bala, gʋɔɔ gʋta zu kʋ ʋ kan Yeezuu kɩ.

Zɛkʋrazannɔ n ta ʋ, ŋn'ɩ ŋ birm farizɛɛnrɔ. Kʋ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a yɩ, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan yawʋrsinno wɔɔ kɩ, mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "A lɔ, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan yawʋrsinno wɔɔ kɩ, mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ kɩ?"
Yeezuu k'a mim bɩ ma bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩzannɔ lɛ baa lɔɔtɔr ma y, bɩ yaabazannɔ lɛ n taa lɔɔtɔr ma. Mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ m bɩ gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bir y, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɩ mimbʋnyaabənno bir."

Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm. Ŋ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ Yeezuu lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto nɩ, Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ n'a lɛ kʋsɩm, b'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr a lɛ kʋsɩrɛ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ɩ lʋsarɛ cibsa barɛ, lʋ bɩ zim bɩ n gɔɔta, an nɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, ŋ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm na? Kʋ lʋ bɩ zim bɩ nɩ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a lɛ kʋsɩ y.
Dɔmɩnnɔ niŋŋoo zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ, kʋ n bɩ lʋ bɩ zim bɩ gʋ ŋ ma, ŋ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ."
A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ pɛɛra daa kər sam, an a sɩnsar kan huu gusire kɩ y. Pɛɛra daa kər bɩ n nɩ huu gusire hɔ bɩ gaam, an n'a kaansʋm, an nɩ cenim biisi han."

A n a ya, an a vanta hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ dɩvɛn daa sam k'a tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ gusinno ʋ y. Kʋ n bɛɛ m, dɩvɛn bɩ hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ hɩnhaanm. Dɩvɛn bɩ kan hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ y'a zaar bam. Bɩ, k'a dɩvɛn daa tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ daarɔ ʋ."
Hindeem ʋ, sabaa hinni ʋ, Yeezuu bɔ hɔsɩrarɔ ʋ. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ y'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ hɔyaa gɔyir yɩnyarm.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Dɩga, hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bam sabaa hinni ʋ! A n a ga m, ŋn'a ba a hinni ʋ y."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mim k'a pakra ba Davɩd m kan a gʋɔɔ kɩ bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ, hɔ niŋŋə k'a a ba, nɔ k'a ŋ nyasʋ bɩ,

gasʋ k'a ʋ Wosocɛ ʋ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Abɩyataar dɔmɩm ʋ, an bur kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta Woso m bɩ gʋr, an a bɩ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba ra? Bɩ, ŋ n a ga m, ŋn'a bɩ, kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ bɛɛ m bala y."
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Hoonsire dɔmɩm bɩ ba Woso ʋ, gʋaa minto, bɩ, a n gʋaa ba hoonsire dɔmɩm minto y.
Bɩ y'a ka, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m sabaa hinni bɩ minzaa."
Sabaa vanta hinni ʋ, Yeezuu a ya, an gasʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, gʋaa deem n ta ʋ, a wɔ n ga.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ dɩgam Yeezuu ma, hɔ k'a n'a bam sabaa hinni ʋ, k'a gʋaa bɩ waam k'a yɩ. A ka brɔɔ nawʋm ma, k'a mim ka Yeezuu ra, mim naa do jɛ ʋ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ wɔgərzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti, ɩ bʋr bireyaa ʋ naa ʋ!"
B'a a hɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Sabaa hinni ʋ, bɔ barɛ n mɩŋŋa? Zibəə mɩŋŋa barɛ m gɛɛ, zibəə bʋnyaa barɛ nɩ? Gʋaa meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ m gɛɛ, gʋaa zɛrɛ nɩ?" Bɩ ŋ bɩr a nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ y.
A ɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma a jɩr ʋ kan nɔmaa kɩ, a heer n a zar ŋ heerkarɛ bɩ minto. A n a hɩ gʋaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ wɔ bɩ hʋr!" B'a a hʋr, a wɔ bɩ n a banka.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a hɔɔn dam hɔ k'a n'a bam, k'a Yeezuu ku a zɛ bɩ ma.
Yeezuu ta kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ Galilee higʋta lɛ ra. Zamaa gʋta n zu a jɛ ʋ. Zamaa bɩ, a to ŋ y'a ʋ Galilee ʋ, Zidee ʋ,
Zerizalɛm ʋ, Idumee ʋ, kan Zʋrdɛn kɔ kur zannɔ kɩ, Tiir kʋ kan Sidɔn kʋ zannɔ kɩ. Gʋɔɔ gʋta n bʋr zi, hɔ haay k'a a ba bɩ minto.
A a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ, k'a a zɔ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ m mɔɔ jɩr ʋ, kʋ zamaa bɩ b'a da ma, ŋn'a so mɔɔ ʋ y.
Yeezuu k'a gʋɔɔ waa gʋta bɩ minto y'a ka, yaabazannɔ wɔɔ haay lɛ n taa k'a lɛɛ ka a a zɔ ma, a a wɔ da ma.
Zinəro wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ kukurə zɛ, ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʋ: "Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m!"
A həən si ŋ ma kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ, ŋ b'a ka n n'a dɔ y.
Yeezuu der ci ra, an nɩ gʋɔɔ k'a lɛ n taa ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ birm. Brɔɔ ŋ bʋr zi.
A n ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ gʋaa bueerehɩɩya, kʋ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta kan a kɩ, k'a bɩr ŋ nyɔɔm, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr Woso lemim nyɩnta bɩ dɩndam,
kʋ ŋ n paŋŋa yɩ, ŋnɩ wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ la zinəro ra.
Bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ Yeezuu ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ ba n nɩ: Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n n'a hɩm ma Pɩyɛɛr ta ʋ,
Zebedee nyɩ Zakkɩ ta ʋ, kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ. Yeezuu tɔ vanta ka brɔɔ ma, a ʋ: Bʋanɛrgɛs, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ: bramahəənsire nyɩnɔ.
Andɩr ta ʋ sɔ, kan Filipi kɩ, Bartelemii kɩ, Matiyee kɩ, Toma kɩ, kan Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ kɩ, Tade kɩ, Sɩmɔɔn Zelɔtɩ kɩ sɔ,
kan Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʋ gʋaa Zidas, k'a Yeezuu zambʋ zɛ bɩ kɩ.
Yeezuu a wusigə, an bʋr har ʋ, zamaa bɩ n a ya, an a so kʋ ma. Bɩ minto nɩ, Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ ba toore m k'a hɔ bɩ y.
Bɩ k'a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ma bɩ, ŋ bʋr, k'a b'a gaa, bala ŋ y'a hɔɔndarɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A mim n'a wusigəm!"
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɛlzebul nɩ kan kɩ!" Ŋ y'a hɩ sɔ, ŋ ʋ: "Zinəro cir daahan minto y'a ka, an wɔ ʋ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra."
Yeezuu n ŋ bir, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sʋtaana y'a bam lɔ, an zoo ba kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ?
Kʋ k'a gʋɔɔ bɩr kʋ mam bɩ y'a darɛ.
Kʋ har gʋɔɔ a gʋngʋ, har bɩ do b'a dam ma, an ta lɛɛ y.
Kʋ Sʋtaana bʋr, an nɩ yar bam kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ, kʋ gʋngʋrɛ ta ʋ, a b'a dam ma, an jɩm mim ʋ dʋntɔ y, bɩ, a cirbəə bɩ nyam.
Gʋaa ba ʋ, an b'a dam ma, an gasʋ gʋaa paŋŋazaa har ʋ, k'a mɔrlɔ gʋr, k'a n ser ka, an bʋr la an a sʋr y. K'a sʋr an a nya, b'a bɔkarɛ an gasʋ, an mɔrlɔ wɔɔ gʋr.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Woso mimbʋnyaarɔ haay kan sʋnsɔrɔ haay kɩ sugur kam gʋɔɔ ʋ.
Bɩ gʋaa biyəə k'a nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sʋnsɔ wʋm bɩ, a b'a sugur yɩm fɩɩga y. A mimbʋnyaa bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a mim ʋ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu naa do hɩ, kʋ ŋ ʋ: Sʋtaana nɩ kan kɩ bɩ minto.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu da kan Yeezuu danyɩnɔ kɩ bʋr, ŋnɩ jɩm garga ra, ŋ n nyɔɔ da kʋ ŋ n Yeezuu bir.
Zamaa bɩ nyɩnta, n nɩ bɩr ma, n n'a hɩm nɩ, n ʋ: "Gaafra, ɩbɩɩ da kan ɩbɩɩ danyɩnɔ kɩ y'ɩbɩɩ birm garga ra."
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Nka m mɔɔ da? Nkɔɔ m mɔɔ danyɩnɔ?"
A n bɔkarɛ, an a bɔ, an nɩ dɩgam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋnɩ bɩr ma rɔ wɔɔ ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ da bɩ ba n nɩ, kan mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ!
Gʋaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ Woso hɔɔnhɔ bam bɩ, mɔɔ danyɩ m, mɔɔ danlʋ m, mɔɔ da m."
Yeezuu a ya, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam Galilee higʋta lɛ ra. Zamaa a so kʋ ma gʋta ŋnɩ bɩr ma, an wuti, an aa nyɩnta kɔɔlʋʋrɔ wɔɔ deem ʋ hi bɩ nɔ ʋ. Zamaa bɩ haay n nyɩnta tara ʋ hi bɩ lɛ ra.
A hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ nɔ ʋ, a hɔ dɩnda ŋ nɩ gʋta. A hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"K'a tʋr ka: gʋaa ɩ bɔ k'a hɔ duu, a duure nɔ ʋ bɩ, a hɩsɩga an nawʋm.
K'a n'a duum bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo zaa gʋr ma. Bɛnnɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ b'a bɩ.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo jaarɔ bɩncɛ ʋ, taa n nyɩnta b'ʋ gʋta y. Hɔyaa bɩ n lɛɛ ka an bɔ, kʋ taa ba ʋ gʋta b'ʋ bɩ minto.
Woso k'a der bɩ, an na hɔka bɩ ma, an ga, kʋ ŋ məsi ba ʋ bɩ minto.
Gɔsɩnnɔ a zar laa bɩncɛ ʋ, laa bɩ n haan, an a ta ŋ mee, ŋ n nyɩ da y.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ, ŋnɩ haan, ŋnɩ ma, ŋnɩ nyɩ da. A yaa deem yaa ka bukərku, deem busɔrdɩ, deem zɔrɔ."
Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a jɩ ma, k'an a tʋr ka ma mɩŋŋa."
Kʋ zamaa b'a hʋr bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta kan Yeezuu kɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'a larm a hɔbɔkʋrɛnoonno wɔɔ jɩ ma.
A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ Woso cirbəə mim k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ yɩ, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr a kam ma k'a yɩ rɔ wɔɔ, a hɩ n nawʋrɛ ŋ nɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ m.
Bɩ minto y'a ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam, bɩ ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y, ŋn'a tʋr kam, bɩ ŋ bɩr hɔsɩ jɩ marɛ kʋ ŋ b'a da ma ŋn'a bɔ a taam kʋ Woso n sugur ka ŋ ʋ y."
Yeezuu n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do jɩ dɔ ra? Bɩ, awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, a hɔbɔkʋrɛnoonno haay jɩ dɔ?"
Hɔduurezaa bɩ, Woso lemim a n n'a duum.
Hɔyaa k'a a lo zaa lezi bɩ, bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ Woso lemim bɩ ma, lɛɛm bɩ Sʋtaana lemim kʋ n y'a duu ŋ heer ʋ bɩ si ŋ han.
B'a hɔdeem kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔyaa k'a a lo jaarɔ bɩncɛrɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, brɔɔ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ marɛ, ŋn'a sim lɛɛm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ məsi ba ʋ y, hindeem gʋɔɔ m. Kʋ cicir gɛɛ fɩryɩrɛ bʋr Woso lemim bɩ minto, bɩ ŋ y'a to.
Gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔyaa k'a a lo laa bireyaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ mam.
Kan durnya hɔɔndama bɩ kɩ, braba a mɩŋŋa m arzaka kama kɩ, kan hɔɔ vantɔɔ lɛtaama kɩ gasʋ ŋ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ Woso lemim bɩ zarm, a bɩr nyɩ darɛ y.

A nyambʋrlɛ ma bɩ, gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ n ta ʋ, ŋnɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔyaa k'a a lo bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ marɛ, ŋn'ɩ yɛm ma, ŋn'ɩ nyɩ dam. A yaa deem nɩ nyɩ dam bukərku, deem busɔrdɩ, deem zɔrɔ.
A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N bɩr sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʋ, n n'a cɩntam kasɩ gɛɛ gargʋ taa y, gɛɛ lɔ? A cɩnta n nawʋm hɔ burə ʋ.
Bala, mim haay kʋ gʋɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋn'a dɔ naa ma bɩ, ŋ zɛm b'a dɔ. Hɔ ba ʋ n n a nyaakʋm da a dɔ n mɩ y.
Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a jɩ ma, k'an a tʋr ka ma mɩŋŋa."
Yeezuu a vanta hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam bɩ kɩ. Awɔɔ makra barɛ hɔ bɩ, n zɛm b'a sa, n nɩ ganwʋrɛ makra bam, n n'a ka awɔɔ ʋ. N y'a lɛŋŋa dam sɔ.
Bala, n hɔ kam gʋaa k'an ta m b'ʋ; Gʋaa k'a ba m bɩ, baa k'a ta m poore, n y'a yɔm nɩ."
A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ duum tara ʋ bɩ kɩ.
Kʋ hinceem a n'a barɛ gɛɛ, jɩm a nawʋrɛ, sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, hɔyaa bɩ, haan a nawʋm, an nɩ mam, b'a n a dɔ kʋ ba a nawʋm lʋnlɔ y.
Tara bɩ n'a zi barɛ, hɔyaa bɩ n nɩ lɛɛkarɛ an nɩ haanm, an nɩ gɔ dam, an nɩ jɩsɩ sim, a nyambʋrlɛ ma bɩ, an nɩ nyɩ dam.
Hɔyaa bɩ k'a ma bɩ, a da n nawʋm, k'a dɔmɩm a ku bɩ minto."
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'ʋ Woso cirbəə makra ba lʋnlɔ kan bɔ kɩ?
Bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan hɔ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma mutardɩ bɩ yaa kɩ; A m hɔyaa haay k'a nɩ durnya nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ poore, n n'a duum.
Kʋ n y'a duu, ma a nawʋm, an nɩ gɔ dam an lɛ da hɔyaa haay ra, an nɩ haanm gʋta, a vəŋŋəro n ta ʋ, bɛnnɔ n b'a dam ma ŋnɩ cɛ kɩnka ma."
Yeezuu ɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta dɩndam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m kan makrarɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kɩ gʋta, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma ŋn'a jɩ ma.
Hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom an n'a dam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m bala, bɩ k'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ, a y'a jɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ haay.
Hinni bɩ do yirbəə m bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Ʋ bra gəm deem bɩ ra."
Kʋ Yeezuu a gʋ zamaa bɩ ma bɩ, a zu kʋ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'aa gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ. Kɔɔlʋʋrɔ vantɔɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ sɔ kan kɩ.
Lɛɛm bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʋta wuti an nɩ hɔnm. Hi kurə bɩ n'a tɔm kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an a han lɛɛm.
Bɩ ma bɩ, Yeezuu a mim ka minkarahɔ ra an nɩ hinceem bam kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ jɛ ʋ, ŋn'a gu, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ gɩngarɛ bɩr hɔsɩ barɛ ɩbɩɩ m na?"
K'a gu bɩ, an həən si hɩnhɛr bɩ ma, an a hɩ higʋta bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ tʋr ka ɩ zɛ sɩɩ•••" Hɩnhɛr bɩ n jɩm, lɛɛ bɩ n zɛ sɩɩ•••.
Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ nyi barɛ ncɩnaaʋ? Awɔɔ ba sɩrakarɛ nɩ?"
Nyibəə gʋta n gasʋ ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɩ, gʋaa bɩ kara n naa, hɩnhɛr kan hi kɩ n'a lɛ sire?"
Ŋ yaa lee ku higʋta tʋr ʋ, Gerazaa zannɔ kʋ ʋ.
Kʋ Yeezuu nɩ zerm kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ, gʋaa kʋ zinəro n ta m bɔ gəənoyaa ra, an b'a zɛ ʋ.
A wʋtajɩ m gəənoyaa ra bɩ m. Baa kan pɔyaabar kɩ, gʋaa paŋŋazaa ba ʋ, an b'a dam ma, an a nyasʋ y.
Bala, dɔmɩm biyəə bɩ, ŋ pɔyaa da a gam ʋ, ŋn'a wɔ kʋsɩ pɔyaabar m, an a cencer haay. Gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ bʋrm ma y.
Sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, gəənoyaarɔ an nɩ wʋtaŋ ʋ kan ciro wɔɔ burə kɩ, zee an n'a dam, an nɩ yaaba darɛ a mɩŋŋa ma jaarɔ m.
K'a a to an Yeezuu yɩ laatʋ bɩ, a bra si, an aa sʋnta a taa,
an nɩ zee darɛ, a ʋ: "Yeezuu, Woso k'a lɛ da haay Nyɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ? Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han Woso tɔ ma gʋta: ɩ bɩ zibʋnyaa ba mɔɔ nɩ y!"
Bala, Yeezuu y'a hɩm zinə bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ!"
Yeezuu n a lar, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ tɔ m bɔ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ tɔ m Leziyɔn, bala wɔɔ gʋta."
A n a yɛ Yeezuu han kan a heer kɩ haay, a ʋ: "A bɩ la a ra tara bɩ nɔ ʋ y!"
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, kurkuuro cir gʋta nɩ ci bɩ zeezi, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm.
Zinəro wɔɔ n n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A ka k'ʋ gasʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ mɛ ʋ!"
A n zaa ka ŋ ʋ. Zinəro wɔɔ n bɔ, ŋnɩ gasʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ ʋ. Kurkuuro wɔɔ haay n'a to ci bɩ ma, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋnɩ zer, ŋn'aa a zar higʋta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ gɩnga haay. Kurkuuro wɔɔ a zɔ tisi hɩɩya ma.
Kurkuuro dundonno wɔɔ n bra si, ŋn'aa hɔ k'a ba bɩ hɩ taranɔzannɔ wɔɔ m, kan lezimazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ m. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ dɩga hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba bɩ ma,
ŋnɩ bʋr Yeezuu jɩr ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ gʋaa kʋ zinəro Leziyɔn n ta m bɩ yɩ, an huu du a ma, an nɩ nyɩntam kan laafɩɩ kɩ. Dabɔʋ n ŋ nyasʋ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta, ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba gʋaa kʋ zinəro n ta m bɩ m, kan kurkuuro wɔɔ kɩ m bɩ dɩnda gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Ŋ n a da a ra, ŋn'a yɛm Yeezuu han k'an a hʋr a tara bɩ ra.
Kʋ Yeezuu bʋr an nɩ dam kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ, gʋaa kʋ zinəro n ta m bɩ k'a waa b'a yɛ han k'a bɩr kan kɩ.
Bɩ Yeezuu n zaa ka ʋ y, b'a a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Doo ɩ yaa a hɩ ɩ har zannɔ m. K'ɩ hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba ɩbɩɩ m a cicirzɛrɛ minto bɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ."
Gʋaa bɩ n a hʋr, an aa hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba a m haay bɩ dɩnda Taraburo wɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m. Gʋaa haay n zɛ kədə.
Kʋ Yeezuu a wusigə kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ m an higʋta bɩ zɛ ra an lee ku tʋr deem bɩ ra b'ʋ bɩ, zamaa cir gʋta a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋnɩ bʋr zi. Nyɩnta Yeezuu b'ʋ higʋta bɩ lɛ ra.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir deem n bʋr, a tɔ m Zayɩɩr. K'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a kukurə zɛ a taa,
an a yɛ han kan a heer kɩ haay, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ poore a zɔ zɛ ma, bʋr ɩ bɩ ɩ wɔ ka nyɩ bɩ mim la, k'an a waa, k'an la sɔ."
Yeezuu n cem kan kɩ, zamaa gʋta n zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ, ŋn'a so ʋ, ŋn'ɩ tʋntɔm kʋ ra.
Lʋ n ta ʋ, ma n'a dam zi a dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya hɔ m naa.
A a yɔ gʋta nyɩsɩbənno wɔ ʋ, a nyɩsɩbarɛ nɔ ʋ. A a wɔhɔ zar haay a tar la, b'a n a waa y. Yaaba bɩ n'a dam la.
Lʋ bɩ k'a Yeezuu mim ma bɩ, a bʋr a kur zamaa gaa ʋ b'ʋ, an a wɔ da a huu ma.
Bala, lʋ b'a hɩ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ m wɔ da a huu tɔkkɛ ma, mɔɔ yɩ m waam."
Lɛɛm bɩ, lʋ bɩ yaaba b'a da jɩm ʋ. A n a dɔ a ʋ, yaaba bɩ bɔ a mɛ ʋ, b'a a waa.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a dɔ a ʋ, paŋŋa bɔ a mɛ ʋ poore, an a wusigə zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, an laaka da, a ʋ: "Nka y'a wɔ da mɔɔ huu ma?"
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ yɩ zamaa bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔtam, ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ nɩ laaka darɛ, ɩ ʋ, nka y'a wɔ da ɩbɩɩ ma gɛ?"
Yeezuu nɩ dɩndɩgarɛ a jɩr ʋ, k'a zaa yɩ.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lʋ b'ɩ nyi bam a mɛ n nɩ hinkəm, k'a hɔ k'a ba a m bɩ dɔ bɩ, a bɩ kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa, an a sɩra hɩ m haay.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyɩnnɩ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ, ta kan laafɩɩ kɩ, bɩ, ɩ ɩ waa ɩ yaaba bɩ minto."
K'a nɩ meer bam bɩ, gʋɔɔ a to zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ har ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ ga. K'ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ Zuuba da kɔrɛ ma lʋnlɔ gɛ?"
Bɩ, Yeezuu n a tʋr ka mim bɩ ma y. A n a hɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, sɩra ka bala."
A n yɛ kʋ gɔsɩ n zu kʋ ʋ kan a kɩ y. Pɩyɛɛr a gaa bala, Zakkɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ.
Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ har ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu gʋɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ tatʋr barɛ, ŋn'ɩ baa darɛ, ŋn'ɩ zee dam.
A n gasʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ tatʋr kan baadarɛ kɩ nɩ? Nyɩ bɩ n ga y, hinceem a ba."
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʋm Yeezuu ma. A n la gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ra, ŋnɩ bɔ, an nyɩ bɩ zɩ kan a da kɩ to, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ gasʋ nyɩ bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
K'a nyɩ bɩ wɔ sa bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Taliita kum" A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "M nyɩnnɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, wuti!"
Lɛɛm bɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ wuti, an nɩ tam. Bala, nyɩ bɩ dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya. A m bɩ, zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə.
Yeezuu lɛ ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y." A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka nyɩ b'ʋ, k'an a bɩ!"
Yeezuu a hʋr lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an ta kʋ k'a tʋr ʋ b'ʋ.

Sabaa hinni k'a a ku bɩ, Yeezuu hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ. Zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gʋta y'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ a to mindɔrɛ naa do m ka? A to awɔɔ ʋ hɔɔn naa do m ka, an a da ma, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ a wɔ nɩ?
Awɔɔ bɛɛ m Maarii nyɩ, an nɩ gɔ wum bɩ ra? Zakkɩ, Zozɛs, Ziidi kan Sɩmɔɔn kɩ danyɩ bɛɛ ra? Awɔɔ danlʋrɔ ba wɔɔ bire ʋ naa ʋ ra?" Naa do a ka ŋ n kaanm Yeezuu m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ daʋrɛ yɩrɛ a zɩ kʋ ʋ kan a yɩrɛrɔ kɩ, a har gʋɔɔ kɩ bire ʋ y."
Yeezuu n hoser ba b'ʋ y, kʋ gʋɔɔ k'a wɔ ka ŋ mim la, an ŋ waa rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y.
Yeezuu zɛ kədə ŋ sɩrakarɛ war bɩ tɔ ma. Yeezuu cem an nɩ hɔ dɩndam kʋrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu n bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir, an a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ ŋ nyɔɔm hɩɩya-hɩɩya, an lɛ ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n la zinəro ra.
A a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ sa a wɔ ʋ zaa sarɛ minto y. Bur, hɛra, busoo, a b'a sa y, k'a maam bara m.
Bɩ, k'a kʋsɔrɔ da ʋ, k'a huu sa deem."
A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a lee ku kʋ ʋ, k'a gɔɔta har kʋ n y'awɔɔ si ʋ b'ʋ, an ta, an awɔɔ hʋrlɛ dɔmɩm ku.
K'awɔɔ ta kʋ ʋ, ŋ nɩ kaanm awɔɔ m, kʋ ŋ n a tʋr ka awɔɔ mim ma, k'a ɩ doom, k'a kʋ bɩ taanyisi gʋngʋ a gam ma, k'an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ."
Bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a hʋr ŋn'a hɩm gʋɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'a a bɔ a taam, k'a sugur yɛ."
Ŋ la zinəro ra gʋta, ŋ nyɔɔ nɔ yaabazannɔ gʋta ma, ŋnɩ ŋ waa.
Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ Yeezuu mim ma, bala, a tɔ bɔ lɛɛ woo••• ʋ. Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zaan-Batiisi a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ. Bɩ y'a ka, an paŋŋa yɩ, an nɩ hoserlo bam."
Nawɔnnɔ ʋ: "Elii m." Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ deem m am biisi hɔɔ wɔɔ m."
Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba bɩ ma bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zaan-Batiisi m! Mɔɔ n a ka, n n a mim gʋ ma bɩ y'a a ya, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ!"
A yɩ sɩra, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ka, n nɩ Zaan nyasʋ, n n'a sur, n n'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Hɩrɔɔdɩ bɩ, naa ba a ʋ: a dam Filipi lʋ k'a yɔ m a tɔ m Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ bɩ minto.
Bala, Zaan a hɩ Hɩrɔɔdɩ m, a ʋ: "A n a ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ m ɩ dam lʋ yɔm y!"
Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ nyɩnta an sɔ Zaan m, a lɛ n taa k'a ka kʋ n n a zɛ, b'a b'a dam ma y.

Hɩrɔɔdɩ ɩ nyi bam Zaan m, an nɩ kum la, bala, a a dɔ, a ʋ: Zaan bɩ, gʋaa tɩrga nɩ, gʋaa mɩŋŋa m sɔ. K'a a tʋr ka Zaan meerbaa bɩ ma bɩ, a n a dɔ kʋ bɔ an n'a hɩm Zaan nɩ y, b'a a meerbaa bɩ ŋʋa, an n'a tʋr kam ma.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, toore a ka Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ ʋ. Hɩrɔɔdɩ a kʋ lɛɛzannɔ, yarbənno jɩtannɔ, kan Galilee gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ bir a yɩrɛ cibsa hɔbɩrɛ ma.

Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ gasʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ cɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an sar ba zamaa bɩ bire ʋ; a Hɩrɔɔdɩ nɔ yɩ kan hɔbɩrɛbinno wɔɔ kɩ. Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a hɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa bɩ yɛ mɔɔ han, kʋ m a ka ɩ ʋ."
Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a wer si bɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa bɩ, mɔɔ y'a karɛ ʋ, baa kʋ mɔɔ cirbəə tara bɩ zɛkumbir m."
Nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ n bɔ, an aa a hɩ a da m, a ʋ: "M bɔ yɛ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zaan-Batiisi mim yɛ."
Nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ n ta zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an aa a hɩ cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛ n taa dɩɩtaa, k'ɩ Zaan-Batiisi mim da laaga ʋ, ɩ ka m ʋ."
Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ heer a zar, bɩ, a b'a dam ma, an a gu ma y, k'a a wer si hɔbɩrɛbinno wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ minto.
Lɛɛm bɩ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ lɛ ka a dɔmazaa deem ʋ, k'an bʋr Zaan mim m. A dɔmazaa bɩ n ta lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an aa Zaan mim gʋ ma,
an bʋr m laaga ʋ, an b'a ka nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ b'ʋ, an a si, an a ka a da ʋ.
Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ Zaan gər bɩ sa, ŋn'aa bir.
Yeezuu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʋr zi, ŋnɩ hɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a ba bɩ hɩ Yeezuu m, kan hɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a dɩnda gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m bɩ kɩ.
Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ n toore yɩ k'a hɔ bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm, ŋn'a wusigəm bɩ minto. Bɩ minto y'a ka, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr k'ʋ bɔ toore ma, bɩncɛ kʋ gʋɔɔ ba ʋ b'ʋ, k'a hoon si poore."
Ŋ yaa da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ŋnɩ ta toore ma bɩncɛ kʋ gɔsɩ ba ʋ b'ʋ.
Bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta ŋ cenle yɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ dɔ, ŋnɩ bra si a gam ma, ŋnɩ lɛɛ ka Yeezuu m kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ.
Kʋ Yeezuu bɔ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a zamaa cir gʋta yɩ. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ cicir n a nyasʋ, bala, bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan hɔbɩsɩ cir kʋ ŋ dɔmazaa ba ʋ bɩ kɩ. A a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ hɔ gʋta dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
Gum k'a bʋr an nɩ dam bɩ, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gum da, bɩ pooyaa m naa,
gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra kʋ ŋ nɩ ta kʋrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'aa hɔbɩrɛ si, ŋn'a bɩ!"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a bɩ!" Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ʋ aa bur si deniyee zɔɔhɩra k'ʋ b'a ka ŋ ʋ gɛ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a yaa dɩga a, bur karɔ n ta awɔɔ ʋ?" Kʋ ŋ yaa dɩga a bɩ, ŋ b'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bur soor n ta ʋ kan zɔ kɩ hɩɩya."
A n lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n zamaa bɩ nyɩnta bur butur bɩ ra.
Ŋ nɩ nyɩnyɩnta zɔrɔ-zɔrɔ, busoor-busoor.
Yeezuu bur soor bɩ si kan zɔ hɩɩya bɩ kɩ a wɔ ʋ, an dɩga brama, an a barka da ʋ, an ŋ zɩnzɛra, an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n a ka zamaa b'ʋ. A zɔ hɩɩya bɩ jir zamaa bɩ m sɔ.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay a bɩ, an ŋ ka.
Ŋ bur kan zɔ kɩ kuuro gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma bueerehɩɩya.
Bur bɩ binno wɔɔ barla, yar tisi soor ɩ nyɩnta ʋ.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, k'a bra gəm la Bɛtsayɩdaa zeezi." A mɩŋŋa n gɔɔta k'a zamaa bɩ da zaa ra.
K'a ŋ da zaa ra, an a nya bɩ, a a hʋr, an ta ci ra k'a yaa da.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ hi bireyaa ku, a mɩŋŋa nɩ gəm la.
K'a yɩ hɩnhɛr n a nya ŋ lɛ, ŋn'a yɔm kan kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bɔrɛ kɩ bɩ, dɔ k'a bʋr an nɩ mɛm bɩ, a wuti an tɔ hi ra, an nɩ tarɛ ŋ zi, an a yo k'a cem ŋ han.
Kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ an nɩ tam hi ra bɩ, ŋ yɩ dɩgam ma, ŋ ʋ: "Toor m," ŋn'ɩ zee dam.
Bala, ŋ haay a yɩ, nyibəə n ŋ nyasʋ. Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu meer ba kan ŋ kɩ, a ʋ: "K'a sɩra ka, mɔɔ m, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y!"
A n da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ kan ŋ kɩ, hɩnhɛr bɩ n jɩm. Ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋ n a so a ʋ y.
Baa kʋ ŋ bur bɩ jirle yɩ bɩ, ŋ n hɔsɩ jɩ ma ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu a da hɔ haay ma y.
Kʋ ŋ higʋta bɩ zɛ ra bɩ, ŋ yaa lee ku Zenezarɛtɩ gəm la, ŋn'a kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ kʋsɩ.
Kʋ ŋ zer lɛɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ Yeezuu dɔ.
Ŋ n a si, ŋnɩ ta kʋrɔ haay ʋ, ŋn'aa yaabazannɔ busu a gʋraŋŋarɔ m, ŋnɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ bɩncɛ kʋ Yeezuu n ta ʋ b'ʋ.

Bɩncɛ k'a nɩ taŋ ʋ, kʋrɔ gʋtɔɔ ʋ, kʋrɔ poorero ʋ, bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʋ, zɛ n nawʋm yaabazannɔ m daasɩrɔ ʋ, ŋn'a yɛm han, k'an yɛ kʋ ŋ n'a wɔ da a huu lɛ ma bala. Bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a wɔ da ma rɔ wɔɔ waarɛ yɩ haay.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ y'a to Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋnɩ bʋr Yeezuu zi,
ŋnɩ Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm kan dintim kɩ, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: ŋ n a wɔ hir y.
Kʋ sɩra nɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ kɩ haay hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ bɩ, a wɔ ŋn'a hirm mɩŋŋa, amba ŋ yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ m.
Kʋ ŋ y'a to daasɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr, ŋ bɩr hɔ bɩm kʋ ŋ n dintim gʋ a ma y. Ŋ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ vantɔɔ ta ʋ gʋta, amba hɛrɔ sʋrgɔrɛ, gərlo kan hɔbɩrɛ mɔdrɔ kɩ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩr zum wɔɔ yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm, bɩ ŋ n hi nyasʋ?"

Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zambʋzannɔ, Ezayii gumə ta ʋ, Woso lɛ k'a a si an so ra, an awɔɔ mim hɩ bɩ nɔ ʋ, bala, a a gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ, a ʋ: Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro, mɔɔ da ŋ nawʋŋ ʋ a lɛ m, bɩ ŋ heer laatʋ mɔɔ ma,
bɩ mɔɔ daʋrɛ bɩ vam m. Durnya mim ŋ n'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ m, Woso hɔ bɛɛ y.
Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ awɔɔ to, an nɩ zum gʋɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɔ awɔɔ ʋ a jɛ m, an nɩ zum a yɩnnɩbayɩ ʋ.
Bala, Moyiisi a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ,' bɩ, 'Gʋaa k'a zɩ bɔ ʋ kan a da kɩ, kʋ ŋ n a zɛ gər.'
B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɩm, a ʋ: Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a zɩ m gɛɛ a da m, a ʋ: hɔ kʋ mɔɔ m ga m, m m dam ɩbɩɩ han bɩ 'kɔrbaan m' a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Woso mannɩ hɔ m.'
A n a ga m, k'an a da a zɩ han gɛɛ a da han dɔ y.
A ba awɔɔ nawʋm ncɩnaaʋ an nɩ Woso lemim bɩ zaar bam a yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ m. Ziro ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ lɔɔrɔ awɔɔ nɩ ŋ bam gʋta."
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu zamaa bɩ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma, k'a da a heer ʋ.
Hɔ ba ʋ, an n'a tom garga ra, an gasʋ gʋaa nɔ ʋ k'a dintim ka ma y. Bɔ n'a tom gʋaa nɔ ʋ bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma. [
Gʋaa k'a nɩ tʋr m bɩ, k'an a tʋr ka ma.]"
K'a a gʋ zamaa bɩ ma, an gasʋ har ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a lar hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do jɩ ma.
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ n naa do jɩ dɔ ra? Awɔɔ n a dɔ, a ʋ: hɔ k'a n'a tore, an nɩ gasʋm gʋaa nɔ ʋ bɩ b'a dam ma, an dintim ka ma ra?
Bala, a nɔ an nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ, an ta, an nɩ bɔm garga ra, a bɩr gasʋrɛ a heer ʋ y." Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Yeezuu y'a hɩnkarɛ, a ʋ: "hɔbɩrɛ haay mɩŋŋa."
A a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ nɩ bɔm gʋaa nɔ ʋ bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma.
Bala, gʋaa heer hɔɔndarɛ bʋnyaa bɩ n nɩ bɔŋ ʋ: so a mɩŋŋa ʋ, koorbarɛ, gərzɛrɛ,
jaandarɛ, gʋaa hɔ ŋʋarɛ, zibʋnyaa do haay barɛ, bra ba gʋaa m, mɩsɩrbaa bʋnyaa barɛ, jɩm barɛ, gʋaa tɔ zarlɛ, mɩŋŋa busure kan yarmabaa kɩ.
Hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro haay, bɔ ŋ nawʋm gʋaa heer ʋ, ŋn'ɩ dintim kam ma."
Yeezuu k'a cem b'ʋ bɩ, a ta Tiir kʋ ʋ, an aa gasʋ har ʋ, a lɛ baa kʋ ŋ n a yɩ y. Bɩ, a n a da ma, an a nyaakʋm da y.
Bala, lʋ nɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ m, zinə nɩ kan kɩ. Bɩ, lʋ bɩ Yeezuu mim ma, an bra si, an bɩ kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa.
Lʋ bɩ, grɛkkɩ do m, yɩ a ʋ Siirii kʋ Fenisii ʋ. A n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'an la zinə bɩ ra nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ mɛ ʋ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "A to kʋ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ ŋ hɔ bɩ, an ŋ ka. A n a ga m, ŋnɩ nyɩnɔ hɔbɩrɛ sa, ŋn'a ka jinnyɩnɔ ʋ y."
Lʋ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, Zuuba, bɩ, jinnyɩnɔ wɔɔ tɩr hɔbɩrɛ kuuro kʋ ŋ y'a lunlo taabɩr bɩ taa bɩ gʋr, ŋn'a bɩ." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ:
"Meerbaa naa do minto, doo, zinə bɩ bɔ ɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ mɛ ʋ."
Lʋ bɩ n a hʋr, an doo, an aa a nyɩ bɩ yɩ, an nɩ wʋtam gargʋ burə ʋ. Zinə bɩ n bɔ a mɛ ʋ.
Yeezuu a hʋr Tiir kʋ ʋ, an a bɔ, an bɔ Sidɔn ʋ kan Taraburo wɔɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ, an ta Galilee higʋta zeezi.
N bʋr tikki m Yeezuu zi. Tikki bɩ, bɛkka m sɔ. N n a yɛ han k'an a wɔ ka a mim la, k'an a waa.
Yeezuu n a gaa zamaa bɩ jɩr ʋ, an bɔ m toore ma, an a nyʋkʋnnyɩnɔ dundu tikki bɩ tʋr ʋ, an lihi da, a nyʋkʋr ma, an a nɔ a nɛɛm ma,
an a bɔɔta an dɩga brama, an hoonsi bɔ a rɛ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɛfata!"
A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ gʋ!" A tʋʋrɔ wɔɔ n a gʋ lɛɛm, a nɛɛm bɩ n a bɔ kʋ zi, an nɩ meer bam mɩŋŋa.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y." Yeezuu k'a lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: ŋ b'a hɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a pa da, an lɛ da biisi ra.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A ɩ hɔ haay bam mɩŋŋa; A ɩ tikkiro tʋr gʋm, a a ka bəətinno nɩ meer bam!"
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ bɩ, zamaa gʋta a ya, an ta ʋ, bɩ hɔbɩrɛ ba ʋ kʋ ŋ n a bɩ y. Yeezuu n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"Zamaa bɩ cicir ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, bala, ŋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ mɔɔ zi, bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ ba ŋ ʋ y.
Kʋ mɔɔ ŋ da zaa ra kan nɔ kɩ, ŋ y'a dundom zaa ra, bɩ gɔsɩnnɔ a to laatʋ."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "K'ʋ bur yɩ ka poohɔɔn ʋ naa ʋ, ʋ a ka ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a bɩ k'an ŋ ka?"
Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bur karɔ n ta awɔɔ ʋ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Saanhɩna"
A n lɛ ka, a ʋ, ŋ n nyɩnta tara ʋ. A n bur saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ gʋr, an a barka da ʋ, an n'a zɩnzɛ ra, an n'a kam a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'a kam zamaa b'ʋ.
Zɔnnyɩnɔ nyɩnta ŋ ʋ sɔ. Yeezuu n ŋ barka da ʋ, a ʋ: ŋ n a ka ŋ ʋ sɔ.
Ŋ n a bɩ, an ŋ ka. Ŋ n a kuuro gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma saanhɩna.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta, ŋn'a zɔ tisi si ma. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ da zaa ra.
Lɛɛm bɩ, a da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam Dalmanutaa zeezi.
Farizɛɛnrɔ bʋr, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan Yeezuu kɩ, ŋn'a yɛ han, k'an hoser kʋ Woso a ka ʋ bɩ ba, k'a dɩga a, a y'a dam ma, an a ba gɛ.
Yeezuu hoon gʋta si, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto her zamaana naa nɩ hoser yɛrɛ? Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, hoser ba ʋ mɔɔ n n'a bam awɔɔ zamaana naa do minto y."
A n a gʋ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ ma, an aa da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an bra gəm deem bɩ ra.
Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, bur sarɛ tɔ bɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ. Bur deem bala nɩ ŋ ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Yeezuu lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi, k'a ba laatʋ farizɛɛnrɔ nyʋnyɔɔ bɩ ma, kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ hɔ bɩ kɩ ma sɔ."
Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kʋ kɩ, kʋ bur ba ŋ ʋ bɩ minto.
Yeezuu n a ma, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ n'a karɛ? Bur k'a ba awɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto m gɛ? Awɔɔ hɔɔn gɔɔta a n gu k'a jɩ dɔ ra? Awɔɔ heer ɩ ka gɛ?
Awɔɔ mɩnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩm na? Awɔɔ tʋʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩr mim mam na?
Kʋ mɔɔ bur soor zɩnzɛ ra, m a ka gʋaa tisi soor ʋ bɩ, a tɔ ba awɔɔ nɔ ʋ ra? Awɔɔ kuuro gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Bueerehɩɩya."
"Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ bur saanhɩna zɩnzɛ ra m a ka gʋaa tisi si ʋ bɩ, kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ awɔɔ kuuro gʋr ʋ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Saanhɩna."
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ gɔɔta a n a dɔ, a ʋ, bur mim bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma ra?"
Ŋ lee ku Bɛtsayɩdaa ʋ, n n bʋr bʋʋ m Yeezuu zi, n n a yɛ han, k'an a wɔ da bʋʋ bɩ ma, k'an lɛɛ yɩ.
A n bʋʋ bɩ gaa a wɔ ma, an bɔ m bɔlɛɛma, an lihi da a mɩm ma, an a wɔ ka a mim la, an n'a larm, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔsɩ yɩm na?"
K'a mɩm bɩ gʋ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ yɩm, ɩ ʋ, gɔrɔ m, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ."
Bɩ, Yeezuu a ya, an a wɔ ka gʋaa bɩ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ ra. Gʋaa bɩ nɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ•••, an a waa, an nɩ lɛɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa.
Yeezuu n a da a har zaa ra, a ʋ: "Ɩ b'a ka ɩ gasʋ kʋnɔ b'ʋ y!"
Yeezuu ɩ tam kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ Filipi-Sezaaree kʋrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ. Zaa ra bɩ, a a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lar, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩm, ŋ ʋ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: Zaan-Batiisi m, nawɔnnɔ ʋ: Elii m, gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem m."
Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Nka m mɔɔ nɩ?" Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ sa, an a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Krista n'ɩbɩɩ m."
A n lɛ ka ŋ ʋ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ: ŋ b'awɔɔ mim bɩ hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y.

Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, a n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: pakra m, kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n cicir ba gʋta. Bɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kɩ, kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ kaanɩm nɩ, an ta kan a zɛrɛ kɩ, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ.
A n minno nɔɔn duro nyaakʋm da an n'a hɩrɛ y. Pɩyɛɛr n a gaa an bɔ m toore ma, an nɩ nyaa bam kan Yeezuu kɩ, a ʋ: a n a ga m, an naa hɩ y.
Bɩ, Yeezuu k'a wusigə an dɩga a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, a həən si Pɩyɛɛr ma, a ʋ: "Ɩ jɛ bɔ mɔɔ jɩr ʋ! Sʋtaana, ɩbɩɩ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Woso hɔ kɩ y. Gʋɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ m."
Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ, an a karɩndanyɩnɔ bir kan zamaa bɩ kɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a zu mɔɔ ʋ, k'an a mɩŋŋa lɛtaamarɔ to, k'an a gɔdarkʋra busu, an zu mɔɔ ʋ.
Bala, gʋaa k'a a lɛ n taa k'a meeyaa bʋmbɔ bɩ, a b'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa ga mɔɔ tɔ ma, kan lemim nyɩnta bɩ kɩ tɔ ma, a y'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a so durnya hɔ haay ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, an ga, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka?
Bɔ gʋaa bɩ n n'a sam, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ nɩ?

Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ nyannɩ zɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma kan mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta bɩ kɩ tɔ ma, her zamaana jaandənno nɔɔn duro kan mimbʋnyaabənno nɔɔm kɩ bireyaa ʋ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ b'a zaa nyannɩ zɛm, dɔmɩm k'a nɩ zɛŋ ʋ, kan malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ kɩ b'ʋ y."
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gɔsɩnnɔ zɛ hinni b'a kure y, ŋn'ɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ yɩm kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ."
Dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu Pɩyɛɛr, Zakkɩ kan Zaan kɩ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ toore ma a minto ci jintə mim ʋ, an a lʋr ŋ mɩm ʋ.
A huuro wɔɔ nɩ nyakɩ bɔm, gʋaa ba ʋ an b'a nyakɩ bɔrɛ bɩ makra barɛ y.
Elii n a hɩnka ŋ nɩ kan Moyiisi kɩ, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan Yeezuu kɩ.
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ naa ʋ, a mɩŋŋa. K'ʋ bur ba kaakʋ: ɩbɩɩ hɔ deem, Moyiisi hɔ deem, Elii hɔ deem."
Dabɔʋ ŋ haay nyasʋ. Bɩ y'a ka, Pɩyɛɛr n a dɔ kʋ bɔ an n'a hɩrɛ y.
Warkʋ bʋr an b'a ku ŋ la, meerbaa n a to warkʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Nyɩ kʋ mɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ n naa do, k'a tʋr ka ma."
Lɛɛm bɩ, a bɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ, ŋnɩ dɩga a jɩr ʋ bɩ, ŋ n gɔsɩ yɩ kʋ Yeezuu bɛɛ m a deem kan ŋ kɩ y.
Kʋ ŋ n'ɩ zerm ci bɩ ra bɩ, a lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: "hɔ kʋ ŋbɔɔ n a yɩ bɩ, ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y, k'an ta, an Gʋaanyɩ bɩ mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ku gəəno bire ʋ.
Ŋ lɛ naa do si, bɩ, ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa larm: 'Mɩmbɔʋrɛ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ mim bɩ ma.' "
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ Elii n lɛɛ ka an bʋr Krista m gɛ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, Elii nɩ lɛɛ karɛ an bʋr k'a bɩ hɔ haay banka. Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, a m lɔ, ŋn'a gʋrsɩra ba ŋ ʋ: Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bɔʋrɛ yɩm b'a fɩr yɩm gʋta gɛ?
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Elii bʋr, bɩ ŋ y'a hɔɔnhɔ ba m, amba hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba a minto bɩ m."
Kʋ Yeezuu a wusigə kan karɩndanyɩnɔ kaakʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ zi bɩ, ŋ zamaa cir gʋta yɩ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan ŋ kɩ.
Zamaa bɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋn'ɩ tam k'a yaa daʋrɛ yaa da m.
A n karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ n'a kam kan ŋ kɩ?"
Gʋaa n a to zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, an a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: karɩnsaamba, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ, m nyɩ m ɩbɩɩ zi, zinə n ta m, an a ba bəətir.
K'a wuti ma bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, a do an nawʋm b'ʋ, an lihihur ta a lɛ rɛ, an n'a sɔ sʋrɛ, a mɛ bɩ n a ba taŋŋɩ-taŋŋɩ. Mɔɔ n a yɛ ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ han kʋ ŋ nɩ la zinə bɩ ra, bɩ ŋ n a da ma y.
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Do sɩrakarɛ war zannɔ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm karɔ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ? Kʋ m nyasʋ awɔɔ m dɔmɩm karɔ? K'a nyɩ bɩ gaa, a bʋr m mɔɔ zi."
Ŋ n a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m. Nyɩ bɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ lɛɛm bɩ, zinə bɩ n a hinkə, an a do tara ʋ, an nɩ pɩr kam, an nɩ lihi bɔrɛ a rɛ.
Yeezuu n a zɩ bɩ lar, a ʋ: "Yaaba b'a sɩŋŋɩda ba brɔ an nɩ nyɩ bɩ ma?" A ʋ: "A nyɩbaa ma.
Dɔmɩm niŋŋoo ʋ, a a zɛ, an a da sɛ ʋ, gɛɛ hi ʋ k'an ga. Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ dam hɔsɩ ma, k'ɩ da wɔɔ han, ɩ cicirzɛrɛ minto."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto ɩ n'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ: k'ɩ y'ɩ dam ma! Hɔ woo••• a da ma an ba sɩrakarɛzaa m."
Lɛɛm bɩ, nyɩ bɩ zɩ bɩ n zee da, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ sɩra ka, mɔɔ cicir zɛ, m sɩrakarɛ war bɩ minto!"
Yeezuu k'a zamaa bɩ yɩ ŋn'ɩ zɛm gʋta bɩ, a həən si zinə bɩ ma, a ʋ: "Zinə, ɩbɩɩ n nɩ gʋaa bam bəətir, ɩ n n'a bam tikki, bɔ nyɩ naa do mɛ ʋ, bɩ, ɩ b'ɩ ya ɩ gasʋ y!"
