Zinə bɩ n nyɩ bɩ hinkə kan paŋŋa kɩ, an bɔ a mɛ ʋ kan zee kɩ. Nyɩ bɩ n gɔɔta am gər hɔ bɩ m. Gʋɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Ga a ʋ."
Bɩ, Yeezuu a sa a wɔ ma, an a busu, an a jɩm brama.
Kʋ Yeezuu gasʋ har ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a lar a deem, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto y'a ka wɔɔ n ʋ da ma, ʋ la zinə bɩ ra?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zinə ncɩnaaʋ do bɩ, hɔ ba ʋ, an b'a dam ma an a ka, an bɔ, kʋ yaadarɛ bɛɛ y."
Yeezuu k'a cem kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ bra Galilee ʋ, Yeezuu n a ŋʋa kʋ n n a dɔ y.
Bala, a nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ dɩndam a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "N Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋm, ŋn'a ka gʋɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'a zɛ, b'a zɛ bɩ kur bɩ dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ."
Bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta ŋ n'a jɩ dɔrɛ y, b'a larlɛ nyibəə ta ŋ nɩ.
Ŋ yaa lee ku Kapɛrnawum ʋ. Gasʋ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ har ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ n'a kam zaa ra bɩ?"
Ŋ n zɛ pi, bala, zaa ra bɩ, ŋ bʋgʋr ba kʋ ma jɩtambaa minto.
Yeezuu n nyɩnta, an gʋaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a bɩr jɩtaarɛ, k'an bɩr gʋaa haay jɛzaa, k'an bɩr gʋaa haay zibəənyɩ."
A n nyɩ gaa, an a jɩm ŋ bire ʋ, an a wɔ burgu ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"Gʋaa k'a nyɩnɔ nɔɔm gʋaa deem da ʋ bɩ, a ba a ʋ mɔɔ m. Bɩ gʋaa k'a mɔɔ da ʋ bɩ, a n mɔɔ da ʋ m deem y, Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a da ʋ sɔ."
Zaan n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ gʋaa yɩ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra ɩbɩɩ tɔ m, wɔɔ k'ʋ a gʋ ma k'a bɩr zum kʋ ʋ kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ minto."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A b'a gʋ ma y, bala, gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra mɔɔ tɔ m, an a ya, an mɔɔ tɔ zar y.
Gʋaa k'a bɩr jɩm bam kan wɔɔ kɩ y, wɔɔ gʋaa m.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a hi ka awɔɔ ʋ poore a mi, kʋ mɔɔ gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ minto, a zaa bɩ kʋrɔm a ganwʋrɛ ma y.
Kʋ gʋaa a ka nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ nɔɔn duro gʋaa deem n'a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ, kʋ n jɛnlajaa gʋta kʋsɩ a wer ma, n n a da higʋta ʋ, a jɩra.
K'ɩ wɔ y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra, k'ɩ gasʋ ɩ wɔ deem m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ b'ʋ, bɩ jɩra, gasʋ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʋm ɩ wɔ hɩɩya m sɛhar k'a lihire ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
K'ɩ gam y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra, k'ɩ gasʋ ɩ gam deem m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ b'ʋ, bɩ jɩra, gasʋ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʋm ɩ gam hɩɩya m sɛhar ʋ bɩ m.
K'ɩ mɩnyaa y'ɩ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ bɔ ʋ, k'ɩ gasʋ ɩ mɩnyaa deem m, Woso cirbəə b'ʋ, bɩ jɩra, k'ɩ gasʋ ɩ mɩm hɩɩya m sɛhar ʋ bɩ m,
bɩncɛ kʋ mukuno bɩr gɩngaŋ ʋ, sɛ bɩr lihiŋ ʋ sɔ y.
Bala, n sɛ sam, n nɩ yɛ da gʋaa haay ma.
Yɛ naa, hɔ mɩŋŋa m. Bɩ kʋ yɛ b'a nyɩntabaa nɩ y, k'a banka bɔ nɩ? K'a ka kʋ yɛ n bɩr ta a ma, k'a nyɩnta kan kʋ kɩ laafɩɩ."
Yeezuu a hʋr b'ʋ, an ta Zidee ʋ, Zʋrdɛn kur, zamaa n a ya, an a so kʋ ma a jɩr ʋ, an a ya, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, am dɔmɩm haay hɔ bɩ m.
Farizɛɛnrɔ n a zɔ k'a nyasʋ meerbaa nɔ ʋ. Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋn'a larlɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Yar a da ma an la a lʋ ra gɛ?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Bɔ Moyiisi a gʋrsɩra ba awɔɔ nɩ?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Moyiisi ʋ, n n harcɩntarɛ kaansʋrɛ ci ba, kʋ n n bɔkarɛ, n n la lʋ ra."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ heerkarɛ minto y'a ka, an lɛ naa do gʋrsɩra ba.
Durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma bɩ, Woso yar da kan lʋ kɩ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, yar n n'a gʋm a zɩ ma kan a da kɩ, k'a nyɩnta kan a lʋ kɩ.
Bɩ, ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya bɩ y'a bam mɛsim deem. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩ gʋaa hɩɩya dɔ y, mɛsim deem zannɔ m.
Hɔ kʋ Woso a zɛ kʋ ra bɩ, a b'a ka gʋaa n a gʋngʋ kʋ ma y."
Kʋ ŋ y'a bɔ, ŋnɩ doo har ʋ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ya, ŋn'a lar mim naa do jɩ ma.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a la a lʋ ra, an a vanta sa bɩ, jaan an n'a dam kan bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ, kʋ lʋ a gʋ a zim ma, an a vanta sa, jaan an n'a dam kan bɩ kɩ sɔ."
Gʋɔɔ bʋr nyɩnɔ poorero m Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a yɛ han k'an a wɔ da ŋ ma, b'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n yɛ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
Yeezuu k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a nɔ ma ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ to ŋnɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi, a b'a ta ŋ nɩ tolle y, bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan nawɔnnɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a n Woso cirbəə bɩ si am nyɩ poore hɔ bɩ m bɩ, a bɩ gasʋŋ ʋ y."
Bɩ kur bɩ, a a wɔ burgu ŋ ma, an a wɔ ka ŋ mim la, an nɩ ŋ barka daŋ ʋ.
Kʋ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ zaa sa, ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, gʋaa n a si, an bɩ kukurə zɛ a taa, an a yɛ han, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba mɩŋŋa, bɔ mɔɔ m ga m, m a ba, kʋ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto, ɩ n nɩ mɔɔ birm mɩŋŋa? Gʋaa mɩŋŋa ba ʋ kʋ Woso deem bɛɛ y.
Ɩbɩɩ Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ. 'Ɩ bɩ gʋaa zɛ y, ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɩ ŋʋaar ba y, ɩ b'ɩ hɔɔn da gʋaa hɔ ma k'an yɩ ɩ hɔ y, ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ.' "
Gʋaa bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ naa haay sɩŋŋɩda sa m nyɩbaa ma, m n'a barɛ."
Yeezuu n dɩga gʋaa bɩ ma, an a ŋʋa, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ deem ɩ jɩra ɩbɩɩ ma: ta, hɔ k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ hɛɛ haay, ɩ jir ŋʋazannɔ m. Ɩbɩɩ yaa arzaka yɩ Woso zi, k'ɩ bʋr ɩ zu mɔɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ bɩ, gʋaa bɩ heer a zar gʋta, an a hʋr kan heerzarlɛ kɩ, bala, a arzaka nyɩnta ʋ gʋta.
Yeezuu k'a dɩga a jɩr ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə gasʋʋrɛ nyɩntam arzakazannɔ ma kaŋŋɩda!"
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə a meer naa do barɛ minto. Yeezuu n a ya, an so ra, a ʋ: "M danyɩnɔ, Woso cirbəə gasʋʋrɛ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Yoonde gasʋ huuka yaa m nyɩntam zanta an lɛ da arzakazaa gasʋ Woso cirbəə ʋ m."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ya ŋnɩ zɛ kədə an lɛ da, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Nka n nɩ bɔm lɛ nɩ?"
Yeezuu n dɩga ŋ ma, a ʋ: "Gʋaa b'a dam ma, an a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ y, bɩ Woso y'a da hɔ haay ma."
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɩga, wɔɔ hɔ haay to, k'ʋ zu ɩbɩɩ ʋ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ gʋaa a gʋ a har, kan a zɩ kɩ, a da kɩ, a dakumbonno kɩ, a danlʋrɔ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ, a tara kɩ ma mɔɔ minto kan lemim nyɩnta bɩ minto kɩ,
a zaa har, kan da kɩ, dakumbonno kɩ, danlʋrɔ kɩ, nyɩnɔ kɩ, tara kɩ yɩm gallɛm zɔrɔ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ, kan fɩryɩrɛ kɩ. Durnya k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nɔ ʋ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩm sɔ.
Lɛɛkarɛzannɔ gʋta nyɩntam jɛzannɔ, jɛzannɔ nyɩntam lɛɛkarɛzannɔ."

Ŋ y'a hʋr, ŋnɩ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʋ. Yeezuu nɩ tarɛ ŋ lɛɛ. Dabɔʋ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ, nyibəə gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zu kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ. Yeezuu a ya, an bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir a jɩr ʋ, an nɩ mim k'a nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ ba m bɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"K'a dɩga, ta kʋ wɔɔ nawʋm Zerizalɛm ʋ naa, n yaa Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋ n a ka wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ ʋ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ ʋ. Ŋ y'a dʋdɔ yarlɛ k'a zɛ gər, ŋn'a da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
Ŋ yaa wʋm ma, ŋ lihi dam ma, ŋ y'a zɛm madɩɩrɔ m, ŋ y'a zɛrɛ an ga, bɩ, dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ."
Zebedee nyɩnɔ Zakkɩ kan Zaan kɩ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han naa ma bɩ, ɩ bɩ zɛ wɔɔ m ma y."
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ mɔɔ n a ba awɔɔ minto?"
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'ʋ a yɛ ɩbɩɩ han, ɩbɩɩ cirbəə bɩncɛ ʋ, k'ɩ ka kʋ wɔɔ gʋaa deem n nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ, deem ɩbɩɩ jɩsa."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n hɔ k'a n'a yɛm bɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ a da ma, a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a mim laaga ʋ bɩ mi ra? Gɛɛ awɔɔ a da ma a fɩryɩrɛ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ yɩ ra?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ʋ da ma." Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Laaga hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a mim bɩ, awɔɔ y'a mim, fɩr kʋ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ,
bɩ, k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ jɩsa kan mɔɔ bɩsɩ bɩ kɩ nyɩntarɛ nɩ, mɔɔ n m da ma m zaa ka y, bala, mɔɔ n m so ʋ y. Bɩncɛ bɩ banka Woso ʋ ŋ zannɔ minto."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ buro wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ nɔ ma ʋ kan Zakkɩ kɩ, Zaan kɩ.
Yeezuu n ŋ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ dɔ, a ʋ: gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma cinno wɔɔ, brɔɔ nɩ paŋŋa barɛ a kʋrɔ ma, paŋŋazannɔ n'a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ a gʋɔɔ ma.
B'a bɩ nyɩntarɛ ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ bire ʋ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a bɩr jɩtaarɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ, k'an a ba zibəənyɩ.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a bɩr lɛɛkarɛzaa awɔɔ bire ʋ, k'an a ba awɔɔ haay lɔ.
Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n bʋr kʋ gʋɔɔ n b'a hɔɔnhɔ ba y, bʋr a ʋ k'a b'a da gʋɔɔ han, k'a a mɩsɩrbaa ka gʋɔɔ gʋta bʋmbɔrɛ minto."
Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, zamaa bɩ kɩ yaa lee ku Zeriko ʋ. Kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔm kʋnɔ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, bʋʋ ɩ nyɩnta zaa lezi b'ʋ, a tɔ m Bartimee, Time nyɩ m, an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm.
K'a a ma ŋ ʋ: Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu m bɩ, an nɩ zee darɛ, a ʋ: "Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ bʋgʋr bam ma, ŋ ʋ, an a tʋr ka, b'a a banka, an a da ra: "Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
Yeezuu n jɩm, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bir!" N n a bir, n n a hɩ m, n ʋ: "Ɩ tɔ ʋ, wuti, a y'ɩ birm."
Bʋʋ bɩ n a gɔbga bɔ a ra, an a zo, an wuti kan bra kɩ, an bʋr Yeezuu zi.
Yeezuu n a lar, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa kʋ m bɔ ba ɩ nɩ?" Bʋʋ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, a ka kʋ m m ya, m lɛɛ yɩ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ta, ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ." Lɛɛm bɩ, a mɩnyaa ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, an zu Yeezuu ʋ, an nɩ tam.
Kʋ ŋ n'a zɔm Zerizalɛm ma, Bɛtfazee kan Betanii kɩ jɩr ʋ, ci kʋ n n'a birm Oliviyee ci bɩ zeezi bɩ, Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya,
an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta kʋ k'a n'awɔɔ lɛɛ naa ʋ. Bɩ, k'awɔɔ yaa gasʋ b'ʋ lɛɛm nɩ, awɔɔ brapoo yɩm, n n a kʋsɩ, bɩ gʋaa n da ʋ cɩna y. K'a hʋr a bʋr m.
Kʋ gʋaa awɔɔ lar, a ʋ: bɔ minto m awɔɔ nɩ naa barɛ, k'a hɩ m, a ʋ: Zuuba lɛ n taa, a y'a tore awɔɔ m bʋr m lɛɛm."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ta, ŋ n'aa brapoo yɩ, n n a kʋsɩ tɩnsara harlɛ ma zaa lɛ zi, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hʋr.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ŋ lar, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ n nɩ brapoo bɩ hʋrlɛ?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, amba Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ m, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n ŋ to, ŋn'a hʋr.
Ŋ n ta brapoo bɩ m Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a huuro ka brapoo bɩ ra, Yeezuu n da ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ gʋta n a huuro ka zaa bɩ ra, gɔsɩnnɔ n gɔ lɛɛ yɩnyar hɔsɩrarɔ ʋ, ŋn'a ka ra.
Bɔɔ nɩ Yeezuu lɛɛ, kan bɔɔ n'a kur lɔ wɔɔ kɩ ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʋ: "Hozaana! Kʋ gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ!
Kʋ cirbəə k'a nɩ zɛm naa n barka yɩ, am wɔɔ yaaba Davɩd hɔ bɩ m. Hozaana! K'ɩ tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ brama."
A n gasʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ, Wosocɛ ʋ. K'a dɩga hɔ haay ma bɩ, a a hʋr an ta Betanii ʋ kan bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kʋ gum da bɩ minto.
A dɔ k'a mɛ ŋn'ɩ bɔm Betanii ʋ bɩ, nɔ Yeezuu nyasʋ.
A n a to, an sɔɔn yɩ laatʋ a lɛɛ n ta ʋ, an ta kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a yaa dɩga a hɔsɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ gɛ. A zɔ k'a ʋ sɔɔn bɩ ma bɩ, a lɛɛ a yɩ, bala, sɔɔn bɔɔnrɛ dɔmɩm bɛɛ y.
A n a hɩ sɔɔn bɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa b'a yarɛ an ɩbɩɩ nyɩ bɩ dɔ y!" A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a ma.

Yeezuu yaa lee ku Zerizalɛm ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. Gasʋ kʋ Yeezuu ʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ lam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ hɛɛnm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ sim nɔ wɔɔ ra Wosocɛ hallu ʋ b'ʋ. A busoolʋrlɛzannɔ mɔdrɔkuntərehɔɔ hɩnhɩsɩga kan cirpʋnnɔ hɛɛnno nyɩntaragɔrɔ kɩ.
Bɩ, a n gɔsɩ to an nɩ cenim mɔr m Wosocɛ hallu ʋ b'ʋ y.
A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: 'N mɔɔ cɛ bɩ birm yaadarɛ cɛ, do haay minto.' Awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ a sa, a ba konno bɩncɛ."
Kʋ Yeezuu naa hɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ n a ma bɩ, ŋ y'a karɛ a zɛrɛ zaa ma. Bɩ, ŋ yɩ nyi bam. Bala, zamaa b'a lɛ bɔ Yeezuu hɔdɩndarɛ b'ʋ.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, Yeezuu bɔ tara bɩ nɔ ʋ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
A dɔ k'a mɛ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɩ cenim bɩ, ŋ sɔɔn bɩ yɩ, an ga kan a məsi kɩ.
Pɩyɛɛr n hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Dɩga, Zuuba, sɔɔn k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ lɛ da ʋ bɩ ga haay!"
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a sɩra ka Woso ʋ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ gʋaa a hɩ ci naa do m: 'Ɩ bɔɔta, ɩ ɩ da kɔ ʋ,' bɩ bɩsɩkarɛ ba a heer ʋ, k'a a sɩra ka, a ʋ: hɔ k'awɔɔ hɩ bɩ barɛ, a bam, amba a a hɩ bɩ m.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɛm a yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a sɩra ka, a ʋ, awɔɔ yɩ, bɩ n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ sɔ.
Bɩ k'awɔɔ jɩm brama, an nɩ yaa dam, kʋ hɔ y'awɔɔ heer ʋ kan gʋaa kɩ, k'a sugur ka ʋ, k'awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ n awɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur ka awɔɔ ʋ sɔ. [
Bɩ k'awɔɔ n sugur ka a muno ʋ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ b'awɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ wɔɔ sugur karɛ y.]"
Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ a ya, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ. Yeezuu k'a nɩ bɩmbɩrm Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ bʋr zi, ŋ ʋ:
"Nka ɩ lɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ naa barɛ minto? Nka ɩ zaa ka?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ m awɔɔ lar mim deem ma, k'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɔkarɛ, m bɩncɛ kʋ n lɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ hɩ awɔɔ m.
Batɛm kʋ Zaan nyɩnta an n'a kam bɩ, a to a ʋ Woso zi gɛɛ, gʋɔɔ zi? K'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ!"
Ŋ n'ɩ bɩsɩ kɩnkam kʋ ma, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ: a to a ʋ Woso zi, a y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ: bɔ minto m wɔɔ n a mim si gɛ?
Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ: a to a ʋ gʋɔɔ zi, zamaa bɩ bɩ yɛrɛ y. Kʋ zamaa bɩ Zaan dɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa paan••• bɩ minto."
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n a dɔ y." Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɩ minto bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ n lɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ hɩrɛ awɔɔ m sɔ y."

Yeezuu n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ meer bam kan ŋ kɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta an dɩvɛn gɔ sɔɔn, an lambaar da ma, an yaa hɔn, k'a bɩr dɩvɛn nyɩ bɩ hi bɔŋ ʋ, an bɛŋŋʋ dɔ sɔ, an gʋɔɔ sa kʋ ŋ n dɔ dɩvɛnsɩra bɩ ma, an a hʋr an ta zaa ra.
Dɩvɛn mɔsa k'a a ku bɩ, a n a zibəənyɩ deem nyɔɔ wutu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zi, k'an aa a hɔ si, an b'a ka a ʋ.
Ŋ n a nyasʋ, ŋn'a zɛ, ŋn'a da zaa ra a wɔ n tu.
Wutu zaa bɩ n a ya, an zibəənyɩ vanta nyɔɔ. Wutu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a zɛ, ŋnɩ yaaba da a mim ma, ŋnɩ fɩr ka ma.
A n a ya, an a kaakʋ hɔ nyɔɔ, ŋn'a zɛ gər. Bɩ jɛ ʋ, an gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ nyɔɔ, ŋnɩ fɩr ka gɔsɩnnɔ ma, ŋnɩ gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛ.
A kur ma hɔ ma bɩ, a nyɩ k'a ŋʋa bɩ y'a deem ɩ gɔɔta, an a nyɔɔ ŋ zi, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Ŋ mɔɔ nyɩ bɩ daŋ ʋ.'
Wutu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a dɩnda kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: 'A n nɩ zɛm b'a so arzaka b'ʋ. K'a bʋr, k'ʋ a zɛ, k'ʋ ʋ so wutu b'ʋ.'
Ŋ n a nyasʋ, ŋn'a zɛ gər, ŋnɩ bɔ m dɩvɛnsɩra b'ʋ, ŋn'a zo."
"Bɔ dɩvɛnsɩra zaa bɩ n'a barɛ? A zɛm, an b'a dɩvɛnsɩra zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, an a sa, an a ka a vantɔɔ ʋ.
Awɔɔ n naa karɩnda ba ra? Jaa kʋ cɛdonno a bɔ ʋ ŋn'a zo bɩ, bɩ y'a ba jaa paŋŋazaa, cɛ bɩ dɔrɛ minto.
Zuuba ɩ naa ba, bɩ wɔɔ yɩ hɔ gʋta m."
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka ma rɔ wɔɔ n'a kam ma k'a nyasʋ, bɩ, ŋ yɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m. Ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ: hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da Yeezuu ʋ awɔɔ minto. Ŋ n a hʋr, ŋn'a gʋ ma.
N farizɛɛnrɔ kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ gʋɔɔ kɩ nyɔɔ Yeezuu zi kʋ ŋ n'aa a nyasʋ a meerbaa nɔ ʋ.

Ŋ n b'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, wɔɔ dɔ sɩrazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ heer tɩrga kan gʋaa biyəə kɩ. Ɩbɩɩ bɩr dɩgam gʋaa meer ma bala y, Woso zaa ɩbɩɩ n'a dɩndam sɩra bɩncɛ ʋ. Zaa ta ʋ k'ʋ Rɔm cir yawʋr ka gɛ? A a ga m gɛɛ a n a ga nɩ?"
Bɩ, kʋ Yeezuu ŋ zambʋ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ n'a gɩngam mɔɔ ma ncɩnaaʋ? K'a bʋr wacɩr m deem, kʋ m dɩga a."
Ŋ n bʋr m. Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ŋʋasa naa do kan gʋrsɩra naa do kɩ, nka hɔ nɩ?" Ŋ ʋ: "Rɔm cir hɔ m."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a hɔ kʋ cir a so ʋ bɩ ka ʋ, k'a hɔ kʋ Woso a so ʋ bɩ ka ʋ." Meerbaa naa do nyɩbɔʋrɛ a ka, ŋ n zɛ kədə.
Sadisɛɛnrɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ bɩ, ŋ bʋr Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ laaka da han, ŋ ʋ:
"Zuuba, Moyiisi a gʋrsɩra ba an a ka wɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ, 'Kʋ gʋaa ga, an a lʋ to, b'a nyɩ ba ʋ y, k'a danyɩ n lʋ bɩ si, k'an nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ a danyɩ bɩ minto.'
Danyɩnɔ ɩ nyɩnta saanhɩna. Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n lʋ sa, an ga, an a gʋ lʋ bɩ ma, bɩ nyɩ ba ʋ y.
A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n lʋ bɩ si, an ga, b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y. A kaakʋ hɔ bɩ maam sɔ.
Saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay ŋ gɩnga, bɩ ŋ n nyɩ yɩ kan lʋ bɩ kɩ y. Ŋ haay kur bɩ, lʋ bɩ n bɩ ga.
Gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, kʋ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, ŋ haay bireyaa ʋ, nka y'a so lʋ b'ʋ? Bala, gʋɔɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay lʋ bɩ si."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ n gʋrsɩrarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kan Woso paŋŋa kɩ dɔ bɩ, bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ nɩ nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ nɔ ʋ.
Bala, kʋ gəəno b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, yar bɩr lʋ sarɛ y, lʋ bɩr yar sarɛ y. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ mim nɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba Moyiisi ci bɩ nɔ ʋ ra, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso meer ba kan Moyiisi kɩ tutugu nɔ ʋ bɩ, a ʋ: 'Abraham kan Izakkɩ kɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso m mɔɔ m.'
Gəəno Woso bɛɛ y, mɩsɩɩrɔ Woso m. Awɔɔ ɩ nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ nɔ ʋ gʋta."
Wosocikarɩnsaamba deem ŋ bɩsɩkarɛ bɩ ma, a a yɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa, an a zɔ, an Yeezuu lar, a ʋ: "Lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay bire ʋ kara ɩ lɛ da?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Lɛ lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ n naa do: 'K'a tʋr ka Israyɛl zannɔ, Zuuba k'a m wɔɔ Woso bɩ, a y'a deem m Zuuba.
K'ɩ Zuuba ɩ Woso bɩ ŋʋa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, kan ɩ nyi kɩ haay, kan ɩ hɔɔndarɛ kɩ haay, kan ɩ paŋŋa kɩ haay.'
A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: 'K'ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m.' Lɛ vanta ba ʋ an lɛ da nawɔnnɔ ra y."
Wosocikarɩnsaamba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra ɩbɩɩ hɩ, karɩnsaamba, a mɩŋŋa gʋta: 'Woso y'a deem m, bɩ a vanta ba ʋ, an a na ma y.
Ɩ Woso ŋʋa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, ɩ hɔɔn kɩ haay, ɩ paŋŋa kɩ haay, k'ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m,' bɩ jɩra mannɩ haay kʋ n nɩ sɛ nyaŋ ʋ bɩ m, kan ganwʋrɛrɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ ŋ kam Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ."
Yeezuu k'a yɩ gʋaa b'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩ laatʋ Woso cirbəə bɩ ma y." Bɩ kur bɩ, gʋaa biyəə ɩ nyi bam Yeezuu larlɛ m.
Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔ dɩndam Zerizalɛm Wosocɛ ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto m wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ: Davɩd Nyɩ m Krista bɩ m gɛ?
Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka Davɩd n a hɩ, a ʋ: Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ Zuuba m: nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʋ, kʋ m b'a ka k'ɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta ɩ gam taa.
Davɩd mɩŋŋa y'a birm Zuuba. Kʋ Zuuba n a ba lɔ, an nyɩnta Davɩd Nyɩ gɛ?" Zamaa bɩ n'a tʋr kam ma kan heernyɩnta kɩ.
Yeezuu y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ a hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩmbɩrm zabarɔ m, ŋn'a kam daʋrɛ ma zamaa gʋta bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ,
ŋn'a kam lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛ ma hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, kan sokʋma bɩncɛ kɩ.
Ŋ n'ɩ zonno hɔ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋn'a mɩŋŋabaa hɩnkam kan yaadarɛrɔ jintoo kɩ. Ŋ hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩm maam-maam."
Yeezuu nyɩnta an a meer nya busoo daʋrɛ bɩncɛ bɩ rɛ, an nɩ dɩgam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ busoo bɩ daʋrɛ ma. Arzakazannɔ wɔɔ barla gɔsɩnnɔ y'a daŋ ʋ gʋta.
Zoro n bɩ tanka hɩɩya zar ʋ.
Yeezuu n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zoro ŋʋazaa naa do busoo bɩ zar ʋ gʋta, an lɛ da gʋaa haay k'a n'a daŋ ʋ bɩ ra.
Bala, ŋ haay busoo k'a zibəə ba ŋ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a da ʋ. Bɩ zoro bɩ kan a cicir bɩ kɩ, a a mɩsɩrbaa hɔ sa haay, an a da ʋ."
Yeezuu k'a bɔ Wosocɛ b'ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, dɩga cɛ bɩ jaarɔ wɔɔ gʋɛrɛ ma kan a dɔrɛ kɩ!"
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɩga ɩbɩɩ nawʋm cɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔrɛ gʋtabaa ma ra? Jaa deem bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a mim burə ʋ y. Ŋ haay zɛm bɩ wurgə."

Yeezuu yaa nyɩnta Oliviyee ci bɩ ra, an a meer nya Wosocɛ bɩ rɛ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zakkɩ kɩ, Zaan kɩ, Andɩr kɩ kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, gɔsɩ ba b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ laaka naa do da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʋ: "Naa do bam brɔ?
A hɩ wɔɔ m, makra kara n nɩ nawɔnnɔ nyarɛ bɩ hɩnkam wɔɔ nɩ?"
Yeezuu n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi kʋ gɔsɩ b'awɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ y.
Gʋɔɔ gʋta zɛm, ŋnɩ bɩ meer ba mɔɔ tɔ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Krista n a mɩ,' bɩ ŋ gʋɔɔ gʋta nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ.
K'awɔɔ bɩ yar mim ma kan yar k'a n'a dam ma, an bɩ wuti bɩ kɩ, a bɩ dabɔʋ ba y, bala, pakra m kʋ naa haay n ba. Bɩ, durnya nyarɛ bɛɛ m naa cɩna y.

Do deem gʋɔɔ wutim ŋnɩ yar ba kan doro vantɔɔ kɩ. Tara deem zannɔ wutim ŋnɩ yar ba kan tara vanta zannɔ kɩ. Bɩncɛrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ tara nyiŋŋəm. Nɔ nyɩntaŋ ʋ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, k'a dɔ, a ʋ: fɩryɩrɛ sɩŋŋɩda a zɔ.

K'a dundo a mɩŋŋa zi, ŋ y'awɔɔ gʋrm, ŋnɩ ta awɔɔ m dʋdɔkənno zi, ŋ y'awɔɔ zɛm madɩɩrɔ m sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ. Ŋ tarɛ awɔɔ m tara lɛɛzannɔ kan cinno kɩ taa mɔɔ minto. Nawɔnnɔ y'awɔɔ yɩm mɔɔ minto, an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ brɔɔ minto.
Bɩ pakra m kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka, ŋnɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da durnya haay nɔ ʋ, kʋ durnya nyarɛ n bɔkarɛ, an a ku.

Kʋ ŋ b'awɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ awɔɔ m dʋdɔkənno bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, a bɩ lɛɛ ka a a hɔɔn da hɔ k'awɔɔ n aa a hɩ bɩ ma y. Mim k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr awɔɔ hɔɔn ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, b'awɔɔ n n'a hɩm. Bala, awɔɔ bɛɛ n nɩ meer bam dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n nɩ meer bɩ barɛ awɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ.
Danyɩnɔ kʋ kam zɛ ma. Zɩ y'a nyɩ karɛ n n a zɛ. Nyɩnɔ wutim nyaam kan a zɩrɔ kɩ, ŋn'a ka, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Gʋaa haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma, bɩ gʋaa k'a nyasʋ a sɩrakarɛ m kɔɔkɔɔ an ta an fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nyarɛ ku, bɩ zaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm."

"K'awɔɔ bɩ 'Gʋaa kʋ hɔzaarbarɛzaa bʋnyaa m bɩ' yɩ an nɩ bɩncɛ niŋŋə ʋ, b'a n'a ga m, an nyɩnta bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, gʋaa niŋŋə k'a n'a karɩnda bam bɩ ma bɩ, k'an a jɩ ma. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɩntam Zidee ʋ bɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a si ŋnɩ ta ciro ʋ.
Gʋaa k'a n'a cɛ mim ʋ bɩ, a b'a ka ma k'a zer a gasʋ a cɛ ʋ, k'a hɔsɩ sa dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ y.
Gʋaa k'a n'a hɔsɩra ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, a b'a bɔ an doo k'a yaa a huu sa y!
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, mim pakra bam lannɔ jɩsɩzannɔ m, kan bɔɔ n nɩ nyɔ karɛ a nyɩnɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
K'a yaa da, kʋ naa do bɩ lee ku la dɔmɩm ʋ y.
Bala, a nyɩntam fɩryɩrɛ dɔmɩnnɔ k'an nyɩnta ʋ hallɩ durnya kʋ Woso a da bɩ sɩŋŋɩda ma, an ta an naa ma ku, bɩ, ʋ b'ʋ yarɛ, ʋ a do yɩ fɩɩga y.
Kʋ Woso bɛɛ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro bɔrɛ, gʋaa ba ʋ an b'a dam ma, an a meeyaa bʋmbɔ y. Bɩ gʋɔɔ k'an ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto, a dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro bɔrɛ.
Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ, a ʋ: Krista ɩ naa ʋ, gɛɛ, a ɩ bra ʋ, a b'a si y.
Ŋʋaarzannɔ kʋ ŋ Krista tɔ sa ŋn'a ka a ma rɔ wɔɔ, kan ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ gʋta. Ŋ makrarɔ bam gʋta kan hoserlo kɩ k'a a da ma, a gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ.
Bɩ k'awɔɔ m, k'a dundo a zi kan hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ haay awɔɔ m, b'a n'a ku cɩna bɩ kɩ."
"Bɩ kʋ fɩryɩrɛ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ bɩ cem, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nɔ ʋ, woso b'a yarɛ an gu y, mom b'a yarɛ an gu sɔ y.
Monyaarɔ surm, brama paŋŋa haay y'a zɛm kʋ ma.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an a to warkʋ nɔ ʋ an bɩr zɛm kan paŋŋa kɩ, cirbəə gʋta kɩ.
A n bɔkarɛ, an malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ, ŋn'aa gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, an a sa dɔjɩr ma an ta kan meer kɩ.
K'a sɔɔn makra bɩ sa. K'awɔɔ b'a yɩ, an lɛɛ daa da, an nɩ kum, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ siire a zɔ.
A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ bɩ minno nɔɔn duro yɩ, ŋn'ɩ zɛrɛ, k'a dɔ a ʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm a zɔ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: zamaana naa do bɩ cenim, kʋ nawɔnnɔ haay bɛɛ ba y.
Brama kan tara kɩ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ bɩ cenle y.
Bɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do kan wakatɩ bɩ do kɩ, gʋaa ba ʋ an b'a dɔrɛ y. Baa malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ y. Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n a dɔ sɔ y. K'a maam, Zɩ bɩ y'a deem y'a dɔ.
K'a dundo a zi, a bɩ hinceem ba y. Bala, awɔɔ n dɔmɩm bɩ do zɛrɛ dɔ y.
Bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ tam kʋ ʋ bɩ kɩ, an a har to a zibəənyɩnɔ m, an lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, an zibəə ka gʋaa biyəə ʋ k'an a ba. A n a hɩ hardɔmazaa bɩ m, a ʋ: a bɩ hinceem ba y.
K'a b'a zu a ʋ y. Bala, awɔɔ n har bɩ zaa bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm dɔ y. Kʋ dibsir nɩ, kʋ wuti gʋta nɩ, kʋ koo baadarɛ dɔmɩm nɩ, kʋ dɔmɩrɛ nɩ, awɔɔ n a dɔ y.
Dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr ʋ bɩ, a b'a ka, an bɩ dɩga a awɔɔ hinceem ba y.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, awɔɔ haay mɔɔ hɩ a m. K'a bɩ hinceem ba y."
Pakkɩ cibsa kan bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma cibsa kɩ gɔɔta dɔmɩm hɩɩya. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ y'a kam zaa k'a n'a sam k'a Yeezuu ku a nyasʋ a mim ka ra, kʋ n n'a zɛ bɩ ma.
Ŋ y'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ b'a ba cibsa hinni ʋ y. Kʋ n bɛɛ nɩ, zamaa bɩ wutim yar m kan wɔɔ kɩ a minto."

Yeezuu nyɩnta Betanii ʋ, gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn kusimə bɩ har ʋ. K'a nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm bɩ, lʋ deem bʋr har ʋ b'ʋ kan gedre kɩ, n n a ba albatɩr jaa m, tidəər n a han. A ji n nyɩnta, a lɛ m kʋsɩ, an tidəər gedre bɩ yi, an tidəər bɩ lo Yeezuu ra.
Bɩ, naa do gʋɔɔ gʋta heer zar, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ tɔ ma m, n n tidəər naa do zaar barɛ?
N y'a da ma, n n tidəər naa do hɛɛ, a busoo n cem deniyee zɔɔkarkʋ han, n n a ka ŋʋazannɔ ʋ." Bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ kukur bam lʋ bɩ ma.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a lʋ bɩ to zenyy••• Bɔ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n'a heer zarlɛ? Zibəə mɩŋŋa a ba mɔɔ tɔ ma.
Ŋʋazannɔ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ dɔmɩm haay. Awɔɔ y'a dam ma a hɔ mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa ʋ. Bɩ mɔɔ, mɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay y.
Lʋ naa do, hɔ k'a a da ma b'a a ba. K'a tidəər nɔ mɔɔ mɛ ma bɩ, lɛɛ a ka, an mɔɔ mɛsim banka mɔɔ birle minto.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: durnya nɔ ʋ, bɩncɛ kʋ n nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa daŋ ʋ haay bɩ, n y'a tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʋ, n n lʋ naa do hɔ k'a a ba bɩ hɩ sɔ."
Bɩ kur bɩ, Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ ta, an aa wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ yɩ, k'a Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka ŋ ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ heer nyɔɔ gʋta, ŋnɩ ler bɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'a busoo ka ʋ." Zidas n yɛ, an n'a kam dɔmɩm k'a n'a dam ma a Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ ma.
Bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm ma bɩ, n nɩ pakkɩ sinnyɛɛm mannɩ baŋ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa kʋ aa pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba ka, ɩbɩɩ minto?"
A n a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta tara nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ gʋaa zɛŋ ʋ, an hi busu gər ʋ, k'a zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ,
a gasʋ bɩncɛ k'a nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ b'ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, k'a hɩ har bɩ zaa m, a ʋ: 'Zuuba ɩ laaka dam: bɩncɛ kara awɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩŋ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ?'
A cɛ gʋta hɩnkarɛ awɔɔ m mim ʋ, ŋn'a banka haay. Bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ awɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ baŋ ʋ."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hʋr, ŋnɩ ta tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'aa hɔ haay bɩ yɩ amba a a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ m, ŋnɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, Yeezuu bʋr kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩm kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ gʋaa deem k'a nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm, an mɔɔ ka."
Ŋ haay nɩ nyɩntam kan heer zar kɩ. Ŋ gʋaa deem-deem n'a larm, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ m gɛ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ gʋaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ deem m. Gʋaa k'a n'a wɔ nyɔɔm kan mɔɔ kɩ laaga b'ʋ, bɩ m.
Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ cenim amba hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba a tɔ ma bɩ m. Bɩ kʋsɩ ɩ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ kɩ. Kʋ gʋaa bɩ do ɩ nɩ yɩ, a jɩra."
Kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩm bɩ, Yeezuu bur sa, an a barka da ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a si, naa do naa, mɔɔ mɛ m.
Bɩ kur bɩ, a a ya, an laaga sa, dɩvɛn n a han, an barka yaa da Woso m, an a ka ŋ ʋ, ŋ haay n a mi."
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ma m naa, gʋaasɩbabaa ma m, an a lo gʋɔɔ gʋta minto.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m dɩvɛn mi dɔ y, an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ m ya, m a mi kan awɔɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ ku."
Kʋ ŋ barka laarɔ wɔɔ lɔ ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ bɔ ŋnɩ ta Oliviyee ci ra.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ y'a wɩsɩrabaa tom, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ seero dundor bɩ zɛm, seero wɔɔ n hɩsɩga da.'
Bɩ mɔɔ mɩmbɔʋrɛ kur bɩ, mɔɔ lɛɛ karɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʋ."
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Baa kʋ gʋaa haay bɩ wɔ saa a wɩsɩrabaa ma, mɔɔ bɩ wɔ saa n ma y."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, gum naa do ʋ bala, koo bɩ baa dam gallɛm hɩɩya y, ɩbɩɩ n bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʋ."
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, an so ra kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ ga mɔɔ nawʋm kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ a jɩra, mɔɔ bɩ bɩsɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma y." A muno wɔɔ n a hɩ maam sɔ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, ŋ ta bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm Gɛtsemanee ʋ b'ʋ. Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a nyɩnta naa ʋ, kʋ m yaa da, kʋ m bʋr."
A n Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zakkɩ kɩ Zaan kɩ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, heerzar gʋta kan dabɔʋ kɩ gasʋ ʋ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ heer a zar an a zɔ zɛ ma. K'a gɔɔta naa ʋ, a bɩ hinceem ba y."
A n ta lɛɛ poore, an kukurə zɛ, an a meer ku tara ma, an nɩ yaa darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ, kʋ fɩryɩrɛ k'awɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ y'a dam ma, an a gʋ a ma.
A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, hɔ ba ʋ an kɔɔkɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ma y. Fɩr naa do gʋ mɔɔ ma, kan bɩ kɩ haay, ɩ bɩ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y, ɩ hɔ ba."
A n a bɔ, an bʋr a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, a bɩ dɩga a ŋ hinceem ba, an ŋ gu, an a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, hinceem ɩbɩɩ n'a bam na, ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ da ɩ mɩŋŋa ma wakatɩ deem ma tɔkkɛ ra!
K'a yaa da, a bɩ hinceem ba y, a yaa n a do makra nɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ heer lɛ taa, bɩ mɛsim paŋŋa ba ʋ y."
A n a bɔ, an ta yaadarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an a ya, an so a yaadarɛ bɩ ra.
A n a bɔ, an bʋr a hɩɩya hɔ ma a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an bɩ dɩga a, ŋ hinceem ba. Bala, hinceem ta ŋ nɩ gʋta. Ŋ n hɔ k'a n'a hɩm nɩ bɩ dɔ y.
A n a bɔ an bʋr a kaakʋ hɔ ma ŋ zi, an b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a lɛ taa, k'a hinceem ba kɛɛrɛ, k'a hoon si. Hɔ haay nya. Dɔmɩm a ku. Naa ma bɩ, n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋrɛ n a ka mimbʋnyaabənno ʋ.
K'a wuti, k'ʋ ta, gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ lee ku."

Kʋ Yeezuu gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, Zidas, bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ lee ku lɛɛm, kan gʋɔɔ cir kɩ, bannɔ kan kargʋrɔ kɩ a wɔ ʋ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ.
Zunzukʋrazaa bɩ lɛɛ ka an makra hɩnka ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ m wɔ burgum ma bɩ, bɩ zaa m. K'a nyasʋ, a dɔ ma mɩŋŋa, a ta m."
Zidas k'a lee ku lɛɛm bɩ, a a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba." A n a burgu ma.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro Yeezuu nyasʋ lɛɛm.
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem kargʋ gaa ʋ, an wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ sakʋ, an a tʋr gʋ ma.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋr awɔɔ kargʋrɔ m kan bannɔ kɩ m k'a bɩ mɔɔ nyasʋ, ɩ ʋ, dazaamazaa n mɔɔ m.
Mɔɔ nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʋ dɔmɩm haay, m nɩ karɩnda bam Wosocɛ ʋ, b'awɔɔ n mɔɔ nyasʋ y." Naa do naa, ba a ʋ, kʋ hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ bɩ n kʋ yɩ.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a gʋ ma, ŋn'a si.
Nyukumbueere deem zu a jɛ ʋ, an gɔbga zu a kɔɔn ʋ. Gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n a nyasʋ.
Bɩ n a mɩŋŋa yɔ, an a si a mɛ m dɩgɩ, an gɔbga bɩ to ŋ wɔ ʋ.
Ŋ ta Yeezuu m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ har ʋ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ, gʋɔɔgusinno kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ a so kʋ ma b'ʋ.
Pɩyɛɛr n zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ laatʋ, an ta, an aa lee ku wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʋ b'ʋ, an aa nyɩnta kan hallɛdɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ nyɩkam sɛ ma.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan dʋdɔkənno vantɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay y'a kam mim ma k'a ka Yeezuu ra, a dʋdɔ yar, k'a ka kʋ n n a zɛ gər, bɩ ŋ bɩr a yɩrɛ y.
Bala, kasɛtɩ ŋʋaarzannɔ bʋr gʋta, bɩ ŋ meerbaa bɩ bɩr zum kʋ y.
Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n wuti, ŋnɩ ŋʋaar ba, ŋn'a ka a lɛ m, ŋ ʋ:
"Wɔɔ ma an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Wosocɛ naa do kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ a wɔ m naa, mɔɔ y'a wurgəm, bɩ dɔmɩm kaakʋ nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ y'a vanta dɔm, b'a bɩ nyɩntam gʋaa wɔ zibəə y."
Bɩ kan hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩm bɩ kɩ, ŋ meerbaa bɩ bɩr a gam kʋ ʋ y.
Bɩ kur bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ wuti gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, an Yeezuu lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ mim gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ra na? Ɩbɩɩ b'a nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ ra?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ y. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a ya, an a lar, a ʋ: "Krista n'ɩbɩɩ m na? Ɩbɩɩ m Nyɩ kʋ Woso barkazaa b'a nyɔɔ bɩ gɛ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m. B'awɔɔ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩm an aa nyɩnta Woso paŋŋazaa bɩsɩ ʋ, an a to brama warkʋ nɔ ʋ, an bɩr zɛm."
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɔ ma ʋ, an a mɩŋŋa huuro kɩnkaansʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Kasɛtɩzannɔ zibəə a ya, an ta wɔɔ ma ra?
Awɔɔ ma an Woso sʋnsɔ wʋ. Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lɔ?" Ŋ haay n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A a ga zɛ m."
Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ lihi dɩndam ma, ŋnɩ pɛɛra ku a meer ma, ŋn'a zɛm, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ nka nɩ zɛrɛ k'ɩ dɔ ɩ hɩ!" Hallɛdɔmazannɔ wɔɔ n'a zɛm.
Kʋ Pɩyɛɛr nɩ hallu b'ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩlʋrɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ bʋr b'ʋ.
A n bɩ Pɩyɛɛr yɩ, an nɩ nyɩ kam sɛ ma, an dɩga a meer ma, an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu Nazarɛtɩ gʋaa bɩ kɩ sɔ."
Pɩyɛɛr n bɩsɩ ka, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n a dɔ y. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ hɩ naa, mɔɔ n a jɩ ma y." A n bɔ, an ta zaŋŋʋ ʋ.
Zibəənyɩlʋ bɩ k'a a ya an a yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Naa do naa ŋ gʋaa deem m."
Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an bɩsɩ ka. Bɩ kur bɩ, kʋ maasɩrɛ ba poore bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ haay a ya, ŋn'a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ sɩra m, ɩbɩɩ, ŋ gʋaa n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ. Bala, Galilee gʋaa n'ɩbɩɩ m."
Pɩyɛɛr n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a wer sire, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n gʋaa k'awɔɔ n'a mim dɩndam naa dɔ y."

Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, koo baa da gallɛm hɩɩya hɔ ma. Pɩyɛɛr bɔkarɛ, an mim kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: "Koo bɩ baa dam gallɛm hɩɩya y, ɩbɩɩ n bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʋ." A n bɔ zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an nɩ nyi karɛ.

Wutigʋta m bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, kan dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ a zɛ kʋ ra, k'a dɩga hɔ k'a n'a bam bɩ ma. Ŋ y'a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu wɔrɔ sur, ŋnɩ ta m, ŋn'aa ka Pɩlatɩ ʋ.
Pɩlatɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ hɩ."
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ŋʋaar ba ŋn'a kam la kan ŋʋaarbaa do haay kɩ.
Pɩlatɩ n a ya, an a lar, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ b'a nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ ra? Dɩga mim haay kʋ ŋ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ra bɩ ma."
Bɩ Yeezuu n a ya, an hɔsɩ nyɩ bɔ ʋ Pɩlatɩ nʋ y. Pɩlatɩ n zɛ kədə.
Kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ bʋr ŋn'ɩ cibsa gʋta barɛ, Pɩlatɩ bɩ, lɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɛ bɩ, an n'a bɔrɛ, an wɔ saa.
Bala, gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Barabas bɩ nyɩnta lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yar ba tara nɔ ʋ ŋnɩ gər zɛ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Zamaa bɩ n ta Pɩlatɩ zi, ŋn'aa hɔ k'a n'a karɛ ŋ ʋ biisi bɩ yɛ.
Pɩlatɩ n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m zɩɩfʋrɔ cir bɩ bɔ, m wɔ saa gɛ?"
Bala, a a dɔ a ʋ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ nɔ nɩ tam Yeezuu ma, kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ a ŋʋa bɩ minto.
Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zamaa bɩ nyʋnnyɔɔ, kʋ Pɩlatɩ m Barabas bɔ an wɔ saa.
Pɩlatɩ n a ya, an zamaa bɩ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m a ba gʋaa k'awɔɔ n'a birm zɩɩfʋrɔ cir bɩ nɩ?"
Ŋ n zee da, ŋ ʋ: "K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!"
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ a a ba an bʋnyaa?" Ŋ n a ya, ŋnɩ zee da, an lɛ da biisi ra: "K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!"
Pɩlatɩ k'a lɛ n taa k'a zamaa bɩ heer nyɔɔ bɩ, a Barabas bɔ an wɔ saa, an a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ madɩɩrɔ m, an a ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
Yarbənno Yeezuu gaa ŋnɩ ta m hallu ʋ, bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma Pretʋaar b'ʋ, kan yarbənno kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, ŋnɩ cinno huu kʋ n y'a ba pɛɛra piinə m da Yeezuu ra, ŋnɩ laa waa, ŋn'a ku a mim ma.
Ŋ n'ɩ yaa dam nɩ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir, wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m."
Ŋ n'a zɛrɛ a mim ma bara m, ŋn'ɩ lihi dɩndam ma. Ŋ n sʋnta a taa, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam nɩ.
Kʋ ŋ y'a hɔɔnhɔ ba Yeezuu m ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ cinno huu bɩ bɔ ma ŋn'a huuro wɔɔ du ma, ŋn'ɩ tam nɩ k'a yaa a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
Sirɛnnɩ gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn b'a to a har ʋ, an nɩ tam kʋnɔ ʋ. Alɛsandɩr kan Rifis kɩ baaba m. Yarbənno wɔɔ n paŋŋa ba ma k'an Yeezuu gɔdarkʋra bɩ busu.
Ŋ n ta Yeezuu m bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm Golgotaa b'ʋ. A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Minkorgo bɩncɛ.'
Ŋ n dɩvɛn war kʋ ma kan mɩɩr kɩ ŋn'a ka Yeezuu ʋ, b'a n a mi y.
Ŋ n a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, ŋnɩ pʋɛɛga da a huuro wɔɔ ma ŋnɩ ŋ jir. Gʋaa biyəə kan a hɔ kɩ.
Ŋ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma ŋn'a nya dɔgta m wakatɩ nɛɛhʋ ma.
Ŋ n Yeezuu zɛ bɩ jɩ gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ warga ma Yeezuu mim la gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma: 'Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir m.'
Ŋ konno wɔ hɩɩya gɔdarkʋrarɔ ma bɩncɛ deem ʋ kan Yeezuu kɩ. Deem a jɩsa, deem a bɩsɩ. [
Hɔ kʋ n nyɩnta, n n a da Wosoci nɔ ʋ bɩ kʋ yɩ: 'N y'a lɛ sa n n a da mimbʋnyaabənno barla.']
Cenlezannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cenim b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ y'a sʋnsɔ wʋm, ŋn'a mim zɛm zukə-zukə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Haya! Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ Wosocɛ wurgə, ɩ ɩ bɔ, ɩ dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʋ nɔ ʋ bɩ,
ɩ mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ, k'ɩ zer gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma."
Wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ sɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ y'a dɩndam kan kʋ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ yaa wʋm Yeezuu ma, ŋ ʋ: "A a muno bʋmbɔ, an bɔkarɛ, a b'a dam ma an a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ y."
Kʋ Krista, Israyɛl cir bɩ n zer gɔdarkʋra ma kɛɛrɛ, k'ʋ a yɩ, k'ʋ sɩra ka. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma rɔ wɔɔ y'a sʋnsɔ wʋm sɔ.
Sinsebir k'a bɩ da bɩ, monsigə gʋta zɛ tara burə ʋ an ta an wakatɩ kaakʋ ku yirbəəre m.
Wakatɩ kaakʋ bɩ ma bɩ, Yeezuu zee gʋta da, a ʋ: "Eloyii, Eloyii, lama sabaktaani?" A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Woso, mɔɔ Woso, bɔ nɩ, ɩ ɩ bɔ mɔɔ ʋ?"
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ naa ma, ŋ ʋ: "K'a tʋr ka, a ɩ Elii birm k'an b'a da a han."
Ŋ deem n bra si an aa hɔ mafʋ-mafʋda sa, an a nyɔɔ hɔ hɛɛnr ma, an a du bənkə ma, an a ka Yeezuu ʋ k'an a mi, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a to, k'ʋ dɩga a Elii zɛm b'a zer gɛ."
Yeezuu n zee gʋta da, an ga.
Wosocɛ bɩ pɛɛra bɩ n kaansʋ a bire ʋ, an a sa mim ʋ an b'a zɛ tara ma.
Yarbənno cir bɩ n jɩm, an a nya Yeezuu rɛ. K'a yɩ an ga maam bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, gʋaa naa do nyɩnta Woso Nyɩ paan•••."
Lannɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ jɩm laatʋ ŋn'ɩ dɩgam. Magdalaa Maarii nyɩnta ŋ bire ʋ, kan Salomee kɩ, Zozee kan Zakkɩ poore da Maarii kɩ.
Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta Galilee ʋ bɩ, lannɔ nɔɔn duro nyɩnta ŋnɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ, ŋn'a dam han. Lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ, ŋnɩ bʋr Zerizalɛm ʋ.
Woso lɛ ter. Sabaa bankarɛ wakatɩ m, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʋ, hoonsire dɔmɩm n bɩr booti m.

Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Arimatee kʋ gʋaa deem k'a tɔ m Zozɛf bɩ lee ku. Nyɩnta a ʋ gʋaa gʋta dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ bire ʋ. A nyɩnta, an nɩ dɔm Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ ma. A n a heer ba koodə, an ta Pɩlatɩ zi, k'a yaa Yeezuu gər bɩ yɛ han.
Yeezuu k'a ga lɛɛm ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Pɩlatɩ zɛ kədə, an yarbənno cir bɩ bir, an a lar kʋ Yeezuu garɛ bɩ maasɩrɛ ba gɛ.
K'a hɔ kʋ yarbənno cir b'a hɩ bɩ ma bɩ, a Yeezuu gər bɩ ka Zozɛf ʋ.
Zozɛf n pɛɛra fɛʋda si, an a ka, n n Yeezuu gər bɩ zer gɔdarkʋra bɩ ma, an pɛɛra fɛʋda bɩ burgu ma, an aa wʋta yaa kʋ n y'a hɔn ci ʋ b'ʋ. A n jaa gʋta gərgu, an a ta yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ.
Magdalaa Maarii kan Zakkɩ da Maarii kɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ dɩgam bɩncɛ kʋ n nɩ Yeezuu gər bɩ wʋtaŋ ʋ bɩ ma.
Sabaa hinni bɩ k'a cem bɩ, Magdalaa Maarii kan Salomee kɩ, Maarii Zakkɩ da kɩ tidəər si k'a yaa da Yeezuu ma.
Hatʋ hinni k'an lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm bɩ wutigʋta m bɩ, ŋ bʋr yaa ra b'ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, woso n haan y.
Ŋ n'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Nka n nɩ jaa bɩ gʋm wɔɔ m yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ?"
Kʋ ŋ y'a bɔɔta ŋnɩ dɩga bɩ, ŋ jaa k'a nyɩnta gʋta bɩ yɩ, n n a gərgu, n n a gʋ yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ.
Ŋ n gasʋ yaa b'ʋ, ŋn'aa nyukumbueere yɩ, an nɩ nyɩntam bɩsɩ ʋ, an zaba fu du a ma. Ŋ da n bɔ ʋ gʋta.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu kʋ n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma b'awɔɔ n'a kam ma. A a mɩm bɔ ʋ, a ba naa ʋ dɔ y. Ba bɩncɛ kʋ n y'a wʋta ʋ bɩ n na."
Bɩ, k'a yaa a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʋ: "A lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʋ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do awɔɔ n n'a yɩŋ ʋ, amba a hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ m."
Ŋ n bɔ yaa b'ʋ, ŋnɩ bra si kan mɛhinkə kɩ, ŋ n a so a ʋ y. Kan dabɔʋ k'an ta ŋ nɩ bɩ kɩ, ŋ n yɛ, ŋ n a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y. [
Yeezuu k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ hatʋ hinni k'an lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm bɩ wutigʋta m bɩ, a lɛɛ ka an a hɩnka Magdalaa Maarii m. A n nyɩnta an la zinəro ra saanhɩna a mɛ ʋ bɩ m.
Magdalaa Maarii n ta, an aa hɔ k'a yɩ bɩ hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m. Brɔɔ haay heer nyɩnta an a zar, ŋn'ɩ nyi karɛ.
Kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka Magdalaa Maarii meerbaa bɩ ma an n'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, a a mɩm bɔ ʋ, b'awɔɔ yɩ bɩ, ŋ n a si nɩ y.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩnka makra do vanta m karɩndanyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ bɔm tara nɔ ʋ.
Ŋ n a wusigə, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ a muno karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, bɩ brɔɔ n a si sɔ y.

A nyarɛ ma bɩ, a a hɩnka karɩndanyɩnɔ bueeredeem nɔ wɔɔ m, ŋnɩ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm. Yeezuu n ŋ sɩrakarɛ war kan ŋ heerkarɛ bɩ kɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ. Kʋ ŋ n gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ rɔ mim si bɩ minto.
A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta durnya haay nɔ ʋ, a yaa lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da gʋɔɔ m.
Gʋaa k'a sɩra ka, an yɛ an batɛm si sɔ bɩ, bɩ zaa n nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm. Bɩ gʋaa k'a bɩ sɩra kam bɩ, a zaa bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y.
Ba makrarɔ kʋ sɩrakarɛzannɔ a da ma, ŋnɩ ŋ ba bɩ n na: Ŋ lam zinəro ra mɔɔ tɔ ma, ŋ lemim daarɔ hɩrɛ.
Kʋ n cem ŋnɩ mɩnnɔ gʋr a wɔ ʋ gɛɛ, ŋnɩ nyɩsɩ da hɔ ʋ, ŋn'a ka ŋ ʋ, a bɩ hɔsɩ barɛ ŋ nɩ y. Ŋ y'a wɔ kam yaabazannɔ ra, bɩ brɔɔ y'a waam."
Kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu meer ba kan ŋ kɩ an a nya bɩ, a der, an ta arzana ʋ, an aa nyɩnta Woso bɩsɩ ʋ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ta, ŋn'aa lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da lɛɛ haay ʋ. Zuuba bɩ y'a darɛ ŋ han, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ paŋŋa daŋ ʋ kan hoserlo barɛ kɩ.]
Jɩtaarɛ Teofil, gʋɔɔ gʋta a tʋntɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ minno kʋ ŋ ba wɔɔ bire ʋ ŋnɩ cem nɔ wɔɔ gʋrsɩra ba.
Kasɛtɩzannɔ kʋ ŋ minno wɔɔ yɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ma kan a nyarɛ kɩ, ŋn'a ba Woso lemim nyɩnta padənno wɔɔ ɩ b'a dɩnda wɔɔ m amba ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa sɔ, mɔɔ laaka dɩnda mɩŋŋa. Jɩtaarɛ Teofil, a ta mɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa, kʋ m mim haay sa a sɩŋŋɩda ma an ta kan a nyarɛ kɩ, m a gʋrsɩra ba ɩbɩɩ ma,
k'ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ, ɩ ʋ, hɔ kʋ n y'a dɩnda ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, sɩra m.
Zidee cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a tɔ m Zakarii. Abɩya hargʋaa m, a m wosocɛmannɩbər sɔ. A lʋ bɩ tɔ m Elizabɛtɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Aarɔn yaŋŋa m sɔ.
Ŋ hɩɩya haay nyɩnta gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ Woso taa. Ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ hɔ kʋ Zuuba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ bam mɩŋŋa.
Ŋ n nyɩ yɩ y, bala, Elizabɛtɩ bɩ cɩna m, ŋ hɩɩya haay gusi.
Hindeem ʋ, Zakarii y'a wosocɛmannɩbərbaa zi bam Woso taa. Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Abɩya wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ zibəə hinni m.
Amba wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ tɩr a ba bɩ m bɩ, pʋɛɛga bɩ, a da a ʋ Zakarii mim la hinni bɩ do ʋ, k'an sɛ nya tidəər nyisi ʋ, an gasʋ m Wosocɛ ʋ, bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa b'ʋ.
Zamaa bɩ jɩm garga ra, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam tidəər nyisi bɩ sɛ nyaʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ.
Zuuba Woso malɛɛka deem a hɩnka Zakarii m, an jɩm brama tidəər nyisi bɩ sɛnyaʋrɛhɔ bɩ bɩsɩ ʋ.
Zakarii k'a a yɩ bɩ, a nyi wer ma, nyibəə n gasʋ ʋ.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zakarii, ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, bala, Woso ɩbɩɩ yaa si. Ɩbɩɩ lʋ Elizabɛtɩ bɩ nyɩ yɩrɛ an a ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ. B'ɩbɩɩ y'a birm Zaan.
B'a nyɩntam heernyɩnta kan heernyɔɔ zee kɩ ɩbɩɩ minto. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ gʋta y'a heer nyɔɔm a yɩrɛ minto.
A nyɩntam gʋaa gʋta Zuuba Woso taa. A bɩ dɩvɛn mire y, a bɩ bɛɛ kʋsɩ vanta mim sɔ y. K'a bʋr an a da nɔ ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a heer hanm.
A bɔm Israyɛl gʋɔɔ lɛɛ, an bʋr ŋ nɩ ŋ Zuuba Woso zi.

A lɛɛ kam Zuuba lɛɛ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Elii hɔɔn kan a paŋŋa kɩ m, k'a bɩ 'zɩrɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ', kʋ bayɛrɛzannɔ wɔɔ n hɔɔn yɩ an gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ m. K'an zamaa banka mɩŋŋa, kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔ Zuuba ma."
Zakarii n malɛɛka bɩ lar, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, m a dɔ mɔɔ ʋ sɩra nɩ? Mɔɔ gusi, mɔɔ lʋ bɩ gusi sɔ."
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gabrɩyɛl m mɔɔ m, m nɩ Woso lɛɛ. Mɔɔ nyɔɔ a ʋ, kʋ m bɩ meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, kʋ m bɩ lemim nyɩnta hɩ ɩbɩɩ m.
Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bam bəətir, ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ meer ba dɔ y, an ta an minno nɔɔn duro nyarɛ dɔmɩm ku. Bala, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka mɔɔ meerbaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ kʋ yɩ dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta b'ʋ y."
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, zamaa b'ɩ dɔm Zakarii ma. Ŋ zɛ kədə, k'a maasɩrɛ ba Wosocɛ bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa b'ʋ bɩ minto.
K'a bɔ bɩ, a n a da ma an nɩ hɔsɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ y. Bɩ minto y'a ka ŋn'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, Woso makra a yɩ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ. A n hɔɔrɔ bɩmba a wɔ ma, k'a hɩnka, a ʋ, a b'a dam ma a meer ba dɔ y. A n gɔɔta bəətir.
Kʋ Zakarii a zi bɩ ba an a nya, a dɔmɩm n a ku bɩ, a a hʋr an doo.
K'a yɩ poore bɩ kur bɩ, a lʋ Elizabɛtɩ jɩsɩ si. A n a mɩŋŋa nyaakʋm da mom soor, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
"Ba hɔ kʋ Zuuba Woso a ba mɔɔ m bɩ n na. A dɩga mɔɔ ma, an mɔɔ bɔ nyannɩ ʋ gʋɔɔ bire ʋ."
Elizabɛtɩ jɩsɩ mom sɔrdɩ hɔ ma bɩ, Woso malɛɛka Gabrɩyɛl nyɔɔ Galilee tara nɔ kʋ n n'a birm Nazarɛtɩ b'ʋ,
nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ deem zi. A ler n y'a bɔ gʋaa m. A jaan bɩ tɔ m Zozɛf. Cir Davɩd do gʋaa m. Nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ tɔ m Maarii.
Malɛɛka bɩ n gasʋ zi, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m Maarii, ɩbɩɩ kʋ Woso barka ka ɩ ʋ gʋta, Zuuba Woso ɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ."
Maarii k'a meerbaa bɩ ma bɩ, a da bɔ ʋ. A n n'a hɔɔn dam yaadarɛ bɩ jɩ ma.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y Maarii, bala, ɩbɩɩ barka yɩ Woso zi.
Ɩbɩɩ jɩsɩ sim, ɩ nyɩ yɩ yar, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a birm Yeezuu.
A nyɩntam gʋaa gʋta, bɩ n y'a birm Woso k'a lɛ da haay Nyɩ. Zuuba Woso y'a yaaba Davɩd cirbəə bɩncɛ kaŋ ʋ,
a cirbəə bɩm Zakɔɔb do nɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay, b'a cirbəə bɩ nyarɛ ba ʋ y."
Maarii n a hɩ malɛɛka bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɩ naa y'a bam lɔ an kʋ yɩ, kʋ mɔɔ n yar dɔ naa?"
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɛnt-Ɛspri zerle ɩbɩɩ mim ʋ, Woso k'a lɛ da haay paŋŋa y'a kure ɩbɩɩ ra, am hinni hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ y'a ka, nyɩ k'a nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ yɩ bɩ, n y'a birm Woso Nyɩ mɩŋŋa.
Ɩbɩɩ danyɩ Elizabɛtɩ, kʋ n n'a birm cɩna b'ɩ jɩsɩ m sɔ, a mom sɔrdɩ hɔ m naa. A nyɩyar yɩm a gusimbaa nɔ ʋ.
Bala, 'hɔ ba ʋ, Woso n a da ma y.' "
Maarii n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zuuba zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, k'an ba mɔɔ m amba ɩbɩɩ hɩ bɩ m." Malɛɛka bɩ n a hʋr, an a gʋ ma.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Maarii wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an zaa sa, an bɔ kʋrɔ kʋ ciro n ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an ta Zidee kʋ deem nɔ ʋ.
A n aa gasʋ Zakarii har ʋ, an yaa da Elizabɛtɩ m.
Elizabɛtɩ k'a Maarii yaadarɛ bɩ ma bɩ, nyɩ k'a n'a nɔ ʋ bɩ heer ba. Sɛnt-Ɛspri n Elizabɛtɩ heer han.
A n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Woso ɩbɩɩ barka da ʋ an lɛ da lannɔ haay ra, bɩ barka bɩ zer an nawʋm nyɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ bɩ ra.
Nka m mɔɔ nɩ, kʋ mɔɔ Zuuba da n bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma?
Bala, k'ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛ bɩ gasʋ mɔɔ tʋr ʋ bɩ, nyɩ bɩ heer ba mɔɔ nɔ ʋ kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka, ɩ ʋ, meerbaa kʋ n y'a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m Zuuba Woso tɔ ma bɩ kʋ yɩm."
Bɩ, Maarii a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ nyi y'a lɛ bɔm mɔɔ Zuuba Woso ʋ.
Bɩ, heernyɔɔ mɔɔ heer han, bala Woso m mɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa.
Bala, a zerga an dɩga a zibəəzaa cicirzaa bɩ ma. Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, do haay y'a hɩm mɔɔ ma mimbirenyɩntazaa.
Paŋŋazaa Woso minno gʋtɔ-gʋtɔɔ ba mɔɔ minto. A tɔ bɩ, tɔ mɩŋŋa m.
A cicirzɛrɛ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi bam nɩ rɔ wɔɔ mim ʋ dɔmɩm haay.
A zibəəro gʋtɔɔ ba a wɔ paŋŋa m. A gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa busum nɔ wɔɔ hɩsɩga.
A paŋŋazannɔ bra a cirbəəduuro ra an ŋ dundo. A n gʋɔɔ ŋʋazannɔ wɔɔ busu brama.
A gan wʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ nɔ nɩ ŋ zɛm nɔ wɔɔ ma, an arzakazannɔ da zaa ra a wɔ n tu.
A b'a da a zibəənyɩ Israyɛl han, an a cicirzɛrɛ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
Ler k'a bɔ Abraham m, kan a yaŋŋɔɔ kɩ m a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ minto."
Maarii gɔɔta kan Elizabɛtɩ kɩ an a zɔ mom kaakʋ ma, an bɔkarɛ, an doo.
Elizabɛtɩ nyɩ yɩrɛ a ku. A nyɩ bɩ yɩ yar.
A cɩsɔnnɔ kan a dogʋɔɔ kɩ a ma ŋ ʋ, Zuuba a cicir zɛ, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ, ŋn'a heer nyɔɔm.
Nyɩ bɩ k'a dɔmɩm sinnyə ba bɩ, ŋ bʋr k'a b'a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. Ŋ y'a ŋʋa k'a tɔ ka Zakarii, am a zɩ bɩ hɔ bɩ m.
A da bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ayy•••, a tɔ m Zaan."
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ do bɩ nɔ ʋ, gʋaa ba ʋ, n n a tɔ ka ncɩnaaʋ y."
Ŋ n makra ba a wɔ m, ŋn'a zɩ bɩ lar, kʋ n y'a birm lʋnlɔ gɛ?
Zakarii n warga yɛ, an gʋrsɩrarɔ nɔɔn duro ba ma: "A tɔ m Zaan." Ŋ haay n zɛ kədə.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Zakarii lɛ a gʋ, a nɛɛm n a bɔ kʋ zi, an nɩ meer barɛ, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
Nyibəə gasʋ a cɩsɔnnɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay, an ta kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cigəəzi rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Zidee gʋrga haay jilli, sʋʋra n'a bam mim naa do ma.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mim naa do ma rɔ wɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa larm, ŋ ʋ: "Nyɩ naa do zɛm bɩ nyɩnta lɔ?" Sɩra m, Zuuba Woso wɔ nyɩnta nyɩ bɩ ra.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri nyɩnta an nyɩ bɩ zɩ Zakarii heer han, an nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsora meer barɛ, a ʋ:
"Zuuba, Israyɛl Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, bala, a bɩ dɩga a do ma, an a bʋmbɔ.
A bɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa paŋŋazaa m wɔɔ minto, a zibəənyɩ Davɩd do nɔ ʋ.
Naa a lɛɛ ka an a hɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛ m biisi.
A ʋ, a wɔɔ bɔm wɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔ ʋ, kan gʋaa haay k'a sɔ wɔɔ m bɩ kɩ.
A wɔɔ yaabɔɔ cicir zɛ, a a gʋaasɩbabaa mɩŋŋa tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
A lerbɔrɛ k'a bɔ wɔɔ yaaba Abraham m bɩ ba n nɩ:
K'a wɔɔ bʋmbɔ jɩnnɔ wɔ ʋ an nya, a zaa kam wɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ a zi ba kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ,
mɩŋŋabaa kan tɩrgabaa kɩ nɔ ʋ, Woso taa dɔmɩm haay kan ʋ mɩsɩrbaa nyarɛ kɩ.
B'ɩbɩɩ, m nyɩnnɩ, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ birm Woso k'a lɛ da haay lɛsinnɩsorazaa. Bala, ɩbɩɩ kam Zuuba lɛɛ k'ɩ zaarɔ banka,
k'ɩ ka, k'a dogʋɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ dɔ, ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur karɛ nɔ ʋ.
Bala, wɔɔ Woso bɩ cicirzɛrɛ gʋta. Naa minto bɩ, lɛɛgure y'a tom brama, an gu wɔɔ m, amba woso haanrɛ hɔ bɩ m,
k'a bɩ lɛɛ gu gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ monsigə ʋ, ŋn'ɩ nyi bam zɛ m nɔ wɔɔ m, k'a bɩ laafɩɩ zaa hɩnka wɔɔ m."
Kʋ nyɩ bɩ nɩ, a ɩ mam, a heerkoodəbaa n'a dam la. A gɔɔta zaŋŋa ʋ, an ta an dɔmɩm k'a a hɩnka ʋ Israyɛl zamaa lɛɛ bɩ dɔmɩm ku.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, cir Ogisti bɩ lɛ ka, a ʋ, n n durnya haay gʋɔɔ lɛ sa.
Lɛɛkarɛ lɛsarɛ n naa, an ba Kiriniyusi k'a nyɩnta Siirii kʋzaa bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ.
Gʋaa haay ta, kʋ n n'a lɛ sa, gʋaa biyəə lɛ sa n nawʋrɛ a kʋ ʋ.
Zozɛf wuti sɔ Galilee kʋ Nazarɛtɩ ʋ, an ta Zidee gʋrga deem kʋ n n'a birm Betelehɛm ʋ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do cir Davɩd yɩ ʋ. Bala a mɩŋŋa naa, cir Davɩd do gʋaa m.
Ta a ʋ k'a yaa lɛsarɛ bɩ wʋ kan a jaan Maarii kɩ. Bɩ ma bɩ, Maarii ɩ jɩsɩ m.
Kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ bɩ, Maarii nyɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm a ku.
A a dʋndɔmbaa nyɩ yɩ yar, an pɛɛra burgu ma, an a wʋta hɔbɩsɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ mɔr ʋ. Bala, ŋ n toore yɩ saanɔɔ cɛ ʋ b'ʋ y.
Gʋrga bɩ do poo ʋ bɩ, dundonno nɩ b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ dɔrɛ a hɔbɩsɩrɔ ma gunuu ʋ.
Zuuba malɛɛka n a hɩnka ŋ nɩ. Zuuba lɛɛgure n yɔ ŋ nɩ. Nyibəə gʋta n ŋ nyasʋ.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, bala, zɛ mɔɔ nawʋm lemim nyɩnta m kʋ m b'a hɩ awɔɔ m. A nyɩntam heernyɔɔ gʋta do bɩ haay minto.
Bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ yɩ her Davɩd tara ra awɔɔ tɔ ma. A m Krista, Zuuba.
Makra k'a n'a kam awɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: awɔɔ yaa nyɩhure yɩ, n n pɛɛra burgu ma, n n a wʋta hɔbɩsɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ mɔr ʋ."
Lɛɛm bɩ, arzana malɛɛkarɔ cir gʋta bʋr, ŋ n b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan malɛɛka bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, ŋ ʋ:
"Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ brama, kʋ gʋɔɔ k'a nɔ yɩ ŋ la tara burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m mɛnyɔɔ yɩ."
Kʋ malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ a gʋ ŋ ma ŋnɩ der brama bɩ, dundonno wɔɔ gɔɔta ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ ta Betelehɛm ʋ, k'ʋ aa hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ, Zuuba n a hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ."
Ŋ n ta zɔɔ-zɔɔ, ŋn'aa Maarii yɩ kan Zozɛf kɩ, kan nyɩhure bɩ kɩ, n n a wʋta hɔbɩsɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ mɔr ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ malɛɛka b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ nyɩ naa do minto bɩ dɩnda.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka dundonno wɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma haay rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ zɛ kədə.
Bɩ, Maarii minno nɔɔn duro da a heer ʋ, an n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma.
Dundonno wɔɔ n a wusigə, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, ŋn'a daŋ ʋ, hɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋn'a yɩ sɔ bɩ minto. Bala, hɔ haay ba amba malɛɛka b'a hɩ bɩ m.
Dɔmɩm sinnyə k'a ku bɩ, n nyɩ bɩ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. N n a tɔ ka Yeezuu, tɔ kʋ malɛɛka bɩ nyɩnta an a ka, bɩ ma bɩ, a da n a jɩsɩ sa bɩ m.
Kʋ ŋ hubɔrɛ dɔmɩnnɔ a ku amba Moyiisi lɛ ka bɩ m bɩ, Zozɛf kan Maarii kɩ nyɩ bɩ busu, ŋnɩ ta m Zerizalɛm ʋ, k'a yaa ka Woso ʋ,
amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Zuuba lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ m: 'Nyɩyar haay k'an a da nyɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ, Zuuba hɔ m.'
N n 'pʋnnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ gɛɛ cirpʋʋrɛ nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ' ka, kʋ n n mannɩ ba m, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Zuuba Wosoci ʋ bɩ m.
Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta Zerizalɛm ʋ, a tɔ m Sɩmɩnyɔɔ. Gʋaa tɩrga m, an nɩ zum Woso ʋ mɩŋŋa. Nyɩnta a ʋ, an nɩ Israyɛl bʋmbɔrɛzaa mɩm dam. Sɛnt-Ɛspri nyɩnta kan kɩ.
Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri nyɩnta an a hɩnka m, a ʋ, awɔɔ bɩ gam, k'a n Krista, kʋ Zuuba n n'a nyɔɔm bɩ yɩ y.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka, an ta Wosocɛ ʋ. Bɩ ma bɩ, a Yeezuu zɩrɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ zɛrɛ a nyɩ bɩ m k'a b'a ka Woso ʋ amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba bɩ m,
Sɩmɩnyɔɔ nyɩ bɩ si a wɔ ʋ, an barka da Woso m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
"Naa ma bɩ, Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ lerbɔrɛ bɩ kʋ yɩ. Ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ ɩ zibəənyɩ bɩ to an cem kan laafɩɩ kɩ amba ɩbɩɩ hɩ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ yɩ,
ɩbɩɩ n a banka doro haay lɛɛ.
Ɩbɩɩ do Israyɛl lɛbɔʋrɛ m. Lɛɛgure m, an n'ɩbɩɩ hɩnkam doro haay m."
K'a nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, nyɩ bɩ zɩ kan a da kɩ zɛ kədə.
Sɩmɩnyɔɔ n ŋ barka da ʋ, an a hɩ nyɩ bɩ da Maarii m, a ʋ: "Nyɩ naa do, bʋr a ʋ k'a bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta do, k'a gʋɔɔ gʋta wuti Israyɛl nɔ ʋ sɔ. A nyɩntam Woso makra, bɩ gʋɔɔ bɩsɩ kam ma.
A gʋɔɔ gʋta hɔɔndarɛrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a nyaakʋm da rɔ wɔɔ hɩnkam lɛɛgure ʋ. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, kargʋ n n'ɩbɩɩ heer hɔnm."
Lʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, a tɔ m Annɩ. Nyɩnta a ʋ Fanɩyɛl nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ, Asɛɛr do m. A gusi gʋta. A nyɩnta kan a zim k'a sa a poombaa ma bɩ kɩ dɔɔraa saanhɩna.
A gɔɔta zoro, a dɔɔraa businnyə a yaa si ku. A n nɩ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ dɔmɩm haay, an nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ. A n n'a lɛ kʋsɩm, an nɩ yaa dam sɔ.
A mɩŋŋa bʋr dɔmɩm kʋ n nɩ nyɩ bɩ kam Woso ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ barka dam Woso m, an nɩ nyɩ bɩ mim dɩndam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔm ma kʋ Woso n bʋr Zerizalɛm bʋmbɔrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ m.
Kʋ Yeezuu zɩrɔ wɔɔ hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Zuuba lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ ba ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ, ŋnɩ ta Galilee kʋ Nazarɛtɩ ʋ.
Nyɩ bɩ n nɩ marɛ, a paŋŋa n n'a dam la. A mindɔrɛ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta, Woso barka nɩ kan kɩ.
Dɔɔraa haay, Yeezuu zɩrɔ wɔɔ tɩr ta Zerizalɛm ʋ pakkɩ cibsa ma.
Kʋ Yeezuu dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya kʋ bɩ, ŋ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ cibsa bɩ ma, amba ŋn'a bam dɔɔraa haay bɩ m.
Kʋ cibsa bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ cem bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə, ŋnɩ doore. Nyukumbueere Yeezuu bɩ gɔɔta Zerizalɛm ʋ, b'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ y.
Ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, zaasənno an nɩ kan ŋ kɩ. Ŋ tarɛ bɩ yɩ dɔmɩm deem, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'a kam ma a yɩrɛrɔ kan a dɔrɛrɔ kɩ bire ʋ.
Bɩ, ŋ n a yɩ y. Ŋ n'a wusigə, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, a kama jɩ ʋ.
A dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, ŋ yaa a yɩ Wosocɛ ʋ, an nɩ nyɩntam karɩnsaambɔɔ bire ʋ, an n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ meerbaa ma, an nɩ ŋ larm sɔ.
Gʋaa haay k'a n'a tʋr kam ma bɩ, zɛ a nawʋm kədə a hɔɔntaʋrɛ meerbaa nyɩbɔʋrɛ tɔ ma.
K'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ a yɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, a da bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "M nyɩnnɩ, bɔ m ɩbɩɩ m naa do ba wɔɔ nɩ? Dɩga a, ɩ zɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ da bɔ ʋ, ʋ n'ʋ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma."
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m an n'a kam mɔɔ ma? Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ m ga m, m bɩr m Zɩ har ʋ ra?"
Bɩ, hɔ k'a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ŋ n a jɩ ma y.
Yeezuu n a wusigə kan ŋ kɩ Nazarɛtɩ ʋ. A n nɩ ŋ lɛ sire. A da bɩ minno nɔɔn duro da a heer ʋ.
Yeezuu nɩ marɛ, a mindɔrɛ n'a dam la. A Woso nɔ yɩ, an gʋɔɔ nɔ yɩ sɔ.

Rɔm cir Tibɛɛr cirbəə bɩrɛ dɔɔraa bueeresoor hɔ ma bɩ, Pɔns Pɩlatɩ nyɩnta an a so Zidee gʋrga ʋ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a so Galilee ʋ, a danyɩ cir Filipi n a so Itiree kʋ ʋ kan Trakonitɩ kʋ kɩ, cir Lizaniyas n a so Abɩlɛnnɩ kʋ ʋ.
Hannɩ kan Kayiifʋ k'ɩ nyɩnta wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Woso a lemim ka Zakarii nyɩ Zaan ʋ poohɔɔn ʋ.
Bɩ Zaan ta Zʋrdɛn gʋrga haay ʋ, an nɩ heerlʋrlɛ kan batɛm kɩ mim pa dam gʋɔɔ m, ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto,
amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci nɔ ʋ bɩ m: Gʋaa leer nɩ bɔm poohɔɔn ʋ: K'a Zuuba zaa banka, k'a zaafɔɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩmbanka kʋ ŋ nɩ yɩ tɩrga.
K'a hɔ zar toko haay ʋ, k'a ciro kan dimbirlɔ kɩ zɛ a wʋta, k'a zaarɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋntɔ rɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋr, bɔɔ ɩ bɩ mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ, k'a ŋ banka a ŋ lʋnlɔ.
Bʋmbɔrɛzaa k'a a to Woso zi bɩ, a gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔm do haay nɔ ʋ.
Zamaa gʋta nɩ zɛm Zaan zi, k'a bɩ batɛm si. A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ naa, cɩrka do n'awɔɔ m. Nka y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a ʋ, a a si a bɔ lɛm Woso heerbusu k'a nɩ zɛm booti m bɩ lɛɛ?

K'a zi mɩŋŋa ba amba gɔ nɩ nyɩ dam bɩ m, k'an zu kʋ ʋ kan awɔɔ heerlʋrlɛ bɩ kɩ, b'a b'a hɔɔn da a ʋ, awɔɔ yaaba m Abraham nɩ y. Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, Woso a da ma, an jaarɔ nɔɔn duro wusigə an ŋ ba Abraham nyɩnɔ.
Bala, n sɩga banka an nɩ cɩntam k'an gɔrɔ zɩnzɛ ra ŋ məsi ma. Gɔ niŋŋə k'a bɩr nyɩ mɩŋŋa dam bɩ, n y'a zɛm la, n a da sɛ ʋ."
Zamaa bɩ barla gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n laaka da, ŋ ʋ: "K'a maam, k'ʋ a ba lɔ?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ɩ huu m hɩɩya, k'an a jir kan gʋaa k'a ba m bɩ kɩ. Gʋaa k'an ta hɔbɩrɛ m bɩ, k'an a ba maam sɔ."
Yawʋrsinno n bʋr sɔ k'a bɩ batɛm si, ŋnɩ laaka da Zaan han, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, bɔ wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ a ba?"
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A bɩ busoo si an lɛ da lɛ kʋ n y'a ka bɩ ra y."
Yarbənno n a lar sɔ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɩ wɔɔ, bɔ wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ a ba?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "A bɩ paŋŋa ba gʋaa ma y, b'a bɩ ŋʋaar ba a ka gʋaa lɛ m k'a busoo yɩ y. Bɩ k'a zerga a yawʋra bɩ rɛ."
Zamaa bɩ nɩ dɔm hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ bɩ ma. N n'a hɔɔn dam. N nɩ laaka darɛ a mɩŋŋa han a heer ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Krista bɛɛ m Zaan bɩ m na?"
Zaan n a hɩ ŋ haay m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ naa, batɛm mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ hi ʋ. Bɩ, gʋaa ɩ zɛm, a paŋŋa n lɛ da mɔɔ ra, bɩ mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʋsɔrɔ bar tɔkkɛ hʋr y. A batɛm karɛ awɔɔ ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m kan sɛ kɩ m.
A gʋr sa a wɔ ʋ, k'a tʋyaa kʋnkɔ m, k'a hɔyaa zo m. A hɔyaa bɩ zarlɛ a sɩ ʋ, a sɛ k'a bɩr lihim bɩ nyam puur b'ʋ."
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Zaan a ya, an minno gɔsɩnnɔ hɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ hɩm Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Zaan nyaa ba kan cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ kɩ, a cɛmba lʋ Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ k'a yɔm, kan a hɔbaa bʋnyaarɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ minto.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ya, an mimbʋnyaa ba an a na ma: a a ka n nɩ Zaan du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
Dɔmɩm kʋ zamaa bɩ haay nɩ batɛm siŋ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu batɛm si sɔ. K'a nɩ yaa dam bɩ, brama a gʋ,
Sɛnt-Ɛspri n cirpʋʋrɛ mɛ sa, an zer a mim ʋ. Leer n a to brama an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa gʋta, mɔɔ nɔ yɩ ɩbɩɩ ra."
Yeezuu dɔɔraa bɩ, a ga kʋ ʋ a ba kan bukərku kɩ, an bɔkarɛ an a zibəə sa. Ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʋ Zozɛf nyɩ m. Zozɛf zɩ m Helii m,
Helii zɩ m Mataat m, Mataat zɩ m Levii m, Levii zɩ m Mɛlkii m, Mɛlkii zɩ m Yanayɩ m, Yanayɩ zɩ m Zozɛf m,
Zozɛf zɩ m Matatɩyas m, Matatɩyas zɩ m Amɔs m, Amɔs zɩ m Nahum m, Nahum zɩ m Hɛslii m, Hɛslii zɩ m Nagayɩ m,
Nagayɩ zɩ m Maatɩ m, Maatɩ zɩ m Matatɩyas m, Matatɩyas zɩ m Semeyini m, Semeyini zɩ m Yosɛkɩ m, Yosɛkɩ zɩ m Yooda m,
Yooda zɩ m Yohanam m, Yohanam zɩ m Reeza m, Reeza zɩ m Zorobabɛl m, Zorobabɛl zɩ m Salatɩyɛl m, Salatɩyɛl zɩ m Neerii m,
Neerii zɩ m Mɛlkii m, Mɛlkii zɩ m Adii m, Adii zɩ m Kozam m, Kozam zɩ m Ɛlmadam m, Ɛlmadam zɩ m Ɛɛr m,
Ɛɛr zɩ m Yeezuu m, Yeezuu zɩ m Eliyezɛɛr m, Eliyezɛɛr zɩ m Yoorim m, Yoorim zɩ m Mataat m, Mataat zɩ m Levii m,
Levii zɩ m Sɩmɩnyɔɔ m, Sɩmɩnyɔɔ zɩ m Ziida m, Ziida zɩ m Zozɛf m, Zozɛf zɩ m Yoonam m, Yoonam zɩ m Eliyakim m,
Eliyakim zɩ m Meleyaa m, Meleyaa zɩ m Menaa m, Menaa zɩ m Matataa m, Matataa zɩ m Natan m, Natan zɩ m Davɩd m, Davɩd zɩ m Yesee m,
Yesee zɩ m Yobɛdɩ m, Yobɛdɩ zɩ m Boozɩ m, Boozɩ zɩ m Salaa m, Salaa zɩ m Naasɔɔn m,
Naasɔɔn zɩ m Aminadaab m, Aminadaab zɩ m Admɩnɩ m, Admɩnɩ zɩ m Arnii m, Arnii zɩ m Ɛsrɔm m, Ɛsrɔm zɩ m Farɛɛs m, Farɛɛs zɩ m Ziida m,
Ziida zɩ m Zakɔɔb m, Zakɔɔb zɩ m Izakkɩ m, Izakkɩ zɩ m Abraham m, Abraham zɩ m Taaraa m, Taaraa zɩ m Nahɔɔr m,
Nahɔɔr zɩ m Seruki m, Seruki zɩ m Ragoo m, Ragoo zɩ m Falɛkɩ m, Falɛkɩ zɩ m Ebɛɛr m, Ebɛɛr zɩ m Salaa m,
Salaa zɩ m Kayɩnam m, Kayɩnam zɩ m Arfasatɩ m, Arfasatɩ zɩ m Sɛm m, Sɛm zɩ m Nowee m, Nowee zɩ m Lamɛk m,
Lamɛk zɩ m Matusalam m, Matusalam zɩ m Enɔk m, Enɔk zɩ m Yarɛtɩ m, Yarɛtɩ zɩ m Maleleyɛl m, Maleleyɛl zɩ m Kayɩnam m,
Kayɩnam zɩ m Enɔs m, Enɔs zɩ m Sɛt m, Sɛt zɩ m Adam m, Adam zɩ m Woso m.
Yeezuu kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a han bɩ, a a to Zʋrdɛn kɔ lɛ ra b'ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ka, an ta poohɔɔn ʋ.
B'ʋ bɩ, Sʋtaana a makra ba dɔmɩm busi. A n hɔsɩ bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nɔ ʋ y. Bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro kʋ ŋ cem bɩ, nɔ a nyasʋ.
Sʋtaana bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ ka kʋ jaa naa do n a ba bur."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Gʋaa b'a dam ma an mɩsɩrbaa ba hɔbɩrɛ m bala y."
Sʋtaana bɩ n ta m brama, an tara burə cirbəəro haay hɩnka m lɛɛm.
A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ cirbəəro nɔɔn duro paŋŋa kan a arzaka kɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, ɩ ɩ so ʋ. Bala, mɔɔ hɔɔ m. Mɔɔ m da ma m a ka gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ ŋʋa ʋ.
Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ yɛ ɩ kukurə zɛ mɔɔ taa ɩ mɔɔ da ʋ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ haay."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: Ɩ ɩ Zuuba Woso da ʋ, bɩ, deem bala ɩbɩɩ n nɩ yaa dam nɩ."
Sʋtaana bɩ n a gaa, an ta m Zerizalɛm ʋ, an aa a jɩm Wosocɛ bɩ mim ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ hɩr naa ʋ, ɩ ɩ da tara ʋ:
Bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: Woso lɛ karɛ a malɛɛkarɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔ ɩbɩɩ ma,
bɩ, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba sɔ, n ʋ: Ŋ y'a wɔ karɛ ɩbɩɩ taa k'ɩ b'ɩ gəm zɛ jaa ma y."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "N y'a hɩ: ɩ bɩ da Zuuba ɩ Woso lɛ ʋ y."
Kʋ Sʋtaana bɩ Yeezuu makra ba kan makrarɔ do haay kɩ an a nya bɩ, a a gʋ ma an cem, an n'a kam toore vanta ma.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ, Yeezuu a bɔ an bʋr Galilee ʋ. A tɔ n bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ.
A n nɩ hɔ dɩndam sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, gʋaa haay n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ.
Yeezuu ta Nazarɛtɩ ʋ, kʋ kʋ n y'a tʋr ʋ b'ʋ. A n gasʋ sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ hoonsire hinni kʋ n n'a birm sabaa bɩ hinni ʋ, amba a tɩr a ba biisi bɩ m. A n wuti k'a Wosoci karɩnda ba.
N nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci ka ʋ. K'a ci bɩ hʋr bɩ, a a zɛ bɩncɛ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ ma:

Zuuba mɔɔ bɔ ʋ, a a Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer mɔɔ ra, kʋ m lemim nyɩnta pa da cicirzannɔ m, [kʋ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ heer a zar lɔ wɔɔ heer wʋta.] A mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʋ m b'a hɩ lɔnnɔ m, ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa ku, kʋ m a hɩ bʋʋrɔ m, ŋ mɩm lɛɛ yɩm. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Mɔɔ nyɔɔ a ʋ sɔ, kʋ m ba hɩ gʋɔɔ m, Zuuba barka dɔ ɩ gʋ ra.
A n ci bɩ huŋŋu, an a ka sokʋmacɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ b'ʋ, an nyɩnta. Ŋ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ cɛ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'ɩ dɩgam Yeezuu ma.
A n a sa ma, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Wosoci meerbaa k'awɔɔ ma dɩɩtaa-dɩɩtaa naa ʋ bɩ kʋ yɩ her."
Ŋ haay n yɛ Yeezuu ma y, bɩ ŋ zɛ kədə barka meerbaa nyɩnta k'a n'a bam bɩ tɔ ma. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zozɛf nyɩ bɩ bɛɛ m naa ra?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ bɔɔr naa do zɛm mɔɔ ma: Lɔɔtɔr, lɛɛ ka ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa waa. Wɔɔ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ba Kapɛrnawum ʋ bɩ ma. Bɩ ba ɩ kʋ ʋ naa ʋ."
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, n bɩr wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa sɩ sim mɩŋŋa a kʋ ʋ y.
Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, biisi bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Elii dɔmɩm ʋ, la a gʋsɩ barɛ ma dɔɔraa kaakʋ kan mom kɩ sɔrdɩ, nɔ gʋta n a da tara bɩ ra haay. Zonno nyɩnta ʋ gʋta Israyɛl ʋ bɩ ma.
Bɩ, Woso n Elii nyɔɔ ŋ gʋaa deem zi y, kʋ bɩ m, zoro deem k'a nyɩnta ʋ Sarɛptaa ʋ, Sidɔn gʋrga ʋ bɩ m.
Kusimoo nyɩnta ʋ sɔ gʋta Israyɛl ʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Elizee dɔmɩm ʋ. Bɩ ŋ gʋaa deem taan••• n a waa, kʋ saana k'a a to Siirii ʋ, n n'a birm Naaman bɩ bɛɛ y."
Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ haay nɔ ma ʋ gʋta sokʋmacɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
Ŋ nɩ wuti, ŋn'a nyʋnnyɔɔta, ŋnɩ bɔ m tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ ta m a kʋ ci mim ʋ k'a yaa nyɔɔta a bɩra a da tara ʋ.
Yeezuu n bɔ ŋ bireyaa ʋ, an cem.
Yeezuu ta Galilee gʋrga deem Kapɛrnawum ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m sabaa hinni ʋ.
Ŋ zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ tɔ ma, bala, a meer bɩ ba an nawʋm lɛ k'an ta m bɩ m.
Gʋaa deem ɩ nyɩnta sokʋmacɛ ʋ b'ʋ, zinə nɩ kan kɩ. A n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ a ʋ:
"Hey! Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu, ɩbɩɩ bɔ nɩ wɔɔ zi? Bʋr ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ bɩ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ gɛ? Kʋ nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, gʋaa mɩŋŋa kʋ Woso a nyɔɔ bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m."
Yeezuu n zinə bɩ da jɩm ʋ a meerbaa m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Zɛ hi, k'ɩ bɔ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ." Zinə bɩ n gʋaa bɩ do tara ʋ zamaa bɩ lɛɛ, an bɔ a mɛ ʋ, b'a n yaaba da ma y.
Ŋ haay zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ meerbaa m naa! A n nɩ lɛ kam zinəro ʋ kan paŋŋa kɩ ŋn'ɩ bɔrɛ!"
N nɩ Yeezuu mim dɩndam lɛɛ haay ʋ, gʋrga bɩ do nɔ ʋ.
Yeezuu k'a bɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a ta gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn har ʋ. A n aa dɩga a, Sɩmɔɔn dində ɩ yaaba m. Ŋ n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'an a waa.
Yeezuu n a zɔ ma, an zerga a burə ʋ, an həən si yaaba bɩ ma, an bɔ a mɛ ʋ. A n wuti lɛɛm an nyasʋ ŋ nɩ.
Kʋ woso lɛ a da bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yaabazannɔ m, ŋnɩ yaaba do haay m bɩ, ŋ bʋr ŋ nɩ Yeezuu zi. Bɩ n a wɔ ka ŋ gʋaa deem-deem la, an ŋ waa.
Zinəro bɔ yaabazannɔ gʋta mɛ ʋ, kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m!" Bɩ, Yeezuu ɩ həən sire ŋ ma, a bɩr yɛm kʋ ŋ nɩ meer ba y. Bala, zinəro wɔɔ a dɔ, ŋ ʋ Krista m.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Yeezuu bɔ, an ta poohɔɔn ʋ, gʋɔɔ gʋta n'a kam ma. Kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a ŋʋa kʋ Yeezuu n gɔɔta kan a kɩ.
Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Pakra m, kʋ m aa Woso cirbəə bɩ pa da tara gɔsɩnnɔ ra, bala, mɔɔ nyɔɔ n y'a ʋ bɩ minto."
A n nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m Zidee sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ.
Hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu ɩ jɩnɩm Zenezarɛtɩ higʋta lɛ ra, zamaa bɩ nɩ kʋ nyʋnnyɔɔtam a jɩr ʋ k'a tʋr ka Woso lemim ma.
A kɔɔlʋʋ yɩ hɩɩya higʋta bɩ lɛ ra. Zɔbənno wɔɔ n bra, ŋn'a zaŋŋarɔ sʋrgɔm.
Yeezuu n da kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ deem ʋ. Nyɩnta a ʋ Sɩmɔɔn hɔ. A n a yɛ han k'an a gaa higʋta bɩ lɛ ma poore. Yeezuu n nyɩnta, an a to kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam zamaa bɩ m.
K'a meer bɩ ba an a nya bɩ, a a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn m, a ʋ: "Ɩ zɔ hi bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'a a zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ zo, k'a zɔ gʋr."
Sɩmɔɔn n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ zi ba gunuu ʋ tee••• bɩ wɔɔ n hɔsɩ nyasʋ y. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ hɩ bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ zom."
Kʋ ŋ zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ zo bɩ, ŋ zɔ gʋr gʋta, ŋ zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ nɩ kɩnkaansʋrɛ.
Ŋ n a to, ŋn'a wɔ zo a zibəəkɔɔnrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kɔɔlʋʋ deem bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, kʋ ŋ nɩ b'a da a han. Brɔɔ n bʋr, ŋnɩ b'a da ŋ han ŋn'a waa ʋ, ŋn'a zar kɔɔlʋʋrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an a han, ŋn'a yo k'a nyoo ba.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩ ba mɔɔ ma laatʋ, bala, mimbʋnyaabər m mɔɔ m."
Dabɔʋ gʋta y'a nyasʋ kan a muno wɔɔ kɩ, zɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ y'a gʋr bɩ tɔ ma.
Dabɔʋ Zebedee nyɩnɔ Zakkɩ kan Zaan kɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ Sɩmɔɔn zibəəkɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ sɔ. Yeezuu n a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ zɔnɔ gʋr biisi, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bam gʋɔɔkamazaa kɛɛrɛ."
Ŋ n a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʋr kɔɔlʋʋrɔ wɔɔ m higʋta lɛ ra b'ʋ, ŋnɩ hɔ haay bɩ to, ŋnɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ.

Yeezuu k'a yaa lee ku tara deem la bɩ, gʋaa nɩ b'ʋ kusiməbaa n ta ma jilli. K'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a sʋnta, an a meer zuutə tara ʋ, an yaa da m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, k'ɩ lɛ taa ma, ɩ ɩ da ma ɩ mɔɔ waa, k'ɩ dintim gʋ mɔɔ ma."
Yeezuu n a wɔ hʋr, an a da ma, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛ taa, ɩ waa." Lɛɛm bɩ, a kusiməbaa bɩ nya ma.

Yeezuu n lɛ ka ʋ, a ʋ, a b'a hɩ gʋaa nɩ y. Bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ta ɩ yaa n'ɩ hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbər m, k'ɩ ganwʋrɛ ka amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Moyiisi lɛ ka bɩ m, ɩ dintim gʋ ɩ ma minto, k'an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ gʋaa haay lɛɛ."
Bɩ y'a ka Yeezuu tɔ n bɔ an n'a dam la. Zamaa gʋta n tɩr a zɛm kʋ ra, k'a tʋr ka a lemim ma, k'a ka kʋ Yeezuu n a waa a yaabarɔ minto.
Bɩ, kʋ Yeezuu nɩ, ta a tɩr a ʋ a deem bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʋ, an bɩr yaa darɛ.

Hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ dɩndam. Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ. A to ŋ y'a ʋ Galilee kan Zidee kɩ Zerizalɛm kɩ kʋrɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr. Zuuba paŋŋa nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ, an a ka, an nɩ yaabazannɔ waam.
Gʋɔɔ n lee ku mɛgarɛzaa m wʋtarahɔ ʋ, ŋn'a kam ma k'a gasʋ m har ʋ b'ʋ, a wʋta Yeezuu taa.
Zamaa bɩ minto bɩ ŋ n a dɔ kʋ gasʋ awɔɔ n nawʋm nɩ lʋnlɔ y. Ŋ nɩ der cɛ bɩ ra, ŋnɩ cɛ bɩ mim hɔn ra, ŋn'a nyɔɔ, ŋn'a zer kan a wʋtarahɔ bɩ kɩ Yeezuu taa zamaa bɩ lɛɛ.
Yeezuu k'a ŋ sɩrakarɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ yaabazaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa, ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ."
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ y'a mɩŋŋa larm a heer ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ kara n naa, an nɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ? Nka y'a da ma an mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka kʋ Woso deem bɛɛ?"
Bɩ Yeezuu k'a ŋ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʋ?
Kara n naanaa? M a hɩ, m ʋ: Ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ bɩ m gɛ, ɩ wuti ɩ ta bɩ nɩ?"
Bɩ k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, Gʋaanyɩ b'ɩ lɛ m k'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka tara burə ʋ bɩ, an a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ y'a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ sa ɩ doo."
Bɩ n wuti lɛɛm, ŋ mɩnyaa m, an a wʋtarahɔ bɩ sa, an doo, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
Ŋ haay zɛ kədə, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ. Dabɔʋ n ŋ nyasʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ mim daa yɩ her."
Bɩ kur bɩ, a bɔ an yawʋrsir yɩ, a tɔ m Levii, an nɩ nyɩntarɛ a zibəə bɩncɛ ʋ. Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ."
Levii n wuti, an a gʋ hɔ haay ma, an zu Yeezuu ʋ.
Levii n cibsa gʋta ba a har ʋ, an hɔbɩrɛ ba Yeezuu minto. Yawʋrsinno gʋta bʋr, kan gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ b'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan a wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ n bʋr, ŋn'ɩ kukur bam karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto, awɔɔ n nɩ hɔ bɩm, an nɩ hɔ mim kan yawʋrsinno kɩ, mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩzannɔ bɩr a kam lɔɔtɔr ma y, yaabazannɔ n n'a kam ma.
Mɔɔ n bʋr kʋ m bɩ gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ bir y, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ mimbʋnyaabənno minto, kʋ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa lʋr."
Gʋɔɔ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʋ: "Gallɛm gʋta Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm, ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩrɛ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mire?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ y'a dam ma, a ka lʋ daa zim gʋaasɩbɔɔ n a lɛ kʋsɩ, kʋ lʋ daa bɩ zim b'ɩ kan ŋ kɩ ra?
Dɔmɩm zɛm, n nɩ zɛm bɩ lʋ daa zim bɩ bɔ ŋ bire ʋ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ kʋsɩm."

A n a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom vanta da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ba ʋ, an nɩ pɛɛra daa kur sam, an a sɩnsar kan huu gusire kɩ y. Bala, pɛɛra daa bɩ b'a gam kʋ ʋ kan a gusire bɩ kɩ y. Pɛɛra daa bɩ y'a gusire bɩ kaansʋm.
Gʋaa b'a dam ma, an dɩvɛn daa tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ gusinno ʋ y, kʋ bɩ bɛɛ nɩ, dɩvɛn bɩ yɩ ŋ hɩnhaanm, an a lo, bɩ hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ nyɩntam bɔm.
Bɩ, a ga a wʋm, ŋnɩ dɩvɛn daa tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ daarɔ ʋ.
Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ dɩvɛn gusire mim bɩ, a lɛ baa dɩvɛn daa ma y. Bala, a hɩ a nawʋrɛ, a ʋ, dɩvɛn gusire bɩ m mɩŋŋa."
Hindeem ʋ, sabaa hinni ʋ, Yeezuu bra hɔsɩrarɔ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m hɔyaa bɩ yɩnyar, ŋn'a tiŋŋə, ŋn'a sʋrɛ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto, awɔɔ nɩ naa barɛ? Bɩ n n lɛ ka kʋ n naa ba sabaa hinni ʋ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Nɔ k'a Davɩd nyasʋ kan a muno kɩ an hɔ niŋŋə ba bɩ,
an gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ, an bur kʋ n y'a ka Woso ʋ bɩ sa, an a bɩ kan a muno wɔɔ kɩ, bɩ n nɩ lɛ ka kʋ n a bɩ kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno bɛɛ bala bɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba ra?"
A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m sabaa hinni bɩ minzaa."
Sabaa hinni vanta ʋ, Yeezuu gasʋ sokʋmacɛ ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam. Gʋaa nɩ b'ʋ, a bɩsɩ ra wɔ n ga.
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ dundom Yeezuu zi, k'a dɩga a, a yaabazaa bɩ waam sabaa hinni ʋ gɛ, k'a ku a mim ka ra.
Bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ dɔ. A n a hɩ wɔgərzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti ɩ jɩm naa ʋ, zamaa bɩ bire ʋ." Gʋaa bɩ n wuti an jɩm b'ʋ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ kʋ m awɔɔ lar: zaa ta ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ, kʋ n nɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba gɛɛ, kʋ n nɩ zi bʋnyaa ba? Zaa ta ʋ kʋ n nɩ gʋaa meeyaa bʋmbɔ gɛɛ, kʋ n n'a zar?"
A n dɩga ŋ ma a jɩr ʋ, an a hɩ gʋaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ wɔ hʋr." Gʋaa bɩ n a wɔ hʋr, a wɔ bɩ n a waa.
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, k'a mim ka ra rɔ wɔɔ nɔ ma ʋ gʋta, ŋn'a dɩndam kan kʋ kɩ, k'a dɩga hɔ k'a n'a bam Yeezuu m bɩ ma.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu ta ci mim ʋ, k'a yaa yaa da. B'a yaa bɩ da Woso m gunuu ʋ b'ʋ kan dɔmɩrɛ kɩ.
Dɔ k'a mɩ bɩ, a a karɩndanyɩnɔ bir, an ŋ bɔ ʋ bueerehɩɩya, an tɔ ka ŋ ʋ, kristazibəəzannɔ.
Sɩmɔɔn k'a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr, a danzaa Andɩr, Zakkɩ, Zaan, Filipi, Bartelemii,
Matiyee, Toma, Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ, Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n n'a birm Zelɔtɩ,
Zakkɩ nyɩ Zidas, kan Iskarɩyɔtɩ Zidas k'a a ba zambʋzaa bɩ kɩ.

Yeezuu a to ci mim ʋ kan ŋ kɩ, an zer, an aa jɩm bɩncɛ fapɩda ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ gʋta gɔɔta b'ʋ. Zamaa gʋta nyɩnta b'ʋ sɔ. A to ŋ y'a ʋ Zidee ʋ, Zerizalɛm ʋ, kan kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ higʋta lɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ, Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ jir ʋ.
Bʋr ŋ y'a ʋ, k'a b'a tʋr ka ma, k'an a waa a yaabarɔ minto. Gʋɔɔ kʋ zinəro nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a waam sɔ.
Zamaa bɩ haay y'a kam ma k'a a wɔ da ma. Bala, paŋŋa nyɩnta an nɩ bɔrɛ a mɛ ʋ, an nɩ ŋ haay waarɛ.
Yeezuu n dɩga a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma kɛɛrɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a m ŋʋazannɔ, Woso cirbəə bɩ, awɔɔ y'a so ʋ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʋ nɔ n'awɔɔ zɛm naa ma, hɔbɩrɛ y'awɔɔ bɔm. Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a nɩ baa dam naa ma, awɔɔ yaa wʋm.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, kʋ n sɔ awɔɔ m, kʋ n kaanm awɔɔ m, kʋ n y'awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋ, ŋn'a bʋnyaa hɩ awɔɔ ma Gʋaanyɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
K'a heernyɔɔ gʋta ba hinni bɩ do ʋ. Bala, Woso ɩ ganwʋrɛ gʋta bankam awɔɔ minto arzana ʋ. Ŋ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ, nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ, ŋn'a ba ncɩnaaʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ m biisi.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ arzakazannɔ. Bala, awɔɔ a heernyɔɔ yɩ biisi.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a hɔ bɩ an a ka her bɩ, nɔ y'awɔɔ zɛm. A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a nɩ yaa wʋm naa ma bɩ, awɔɔ heer y'a zarm, a baa da.
Awɔɔ kʋ gʋaa haay n n'awɔɔ mɩŋŋabaa hɩm bɩ, a pakra barɛ awɔɔ m. Ŋ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ, a ba ŋ y'a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ biisi lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ŋʋaarzannɔ wɔɔ m."
"B'awɔɔ k'a n'a tʋr kam mɔɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'a a jɩnnɔ ŋʋa, k'a hɔ mɩŋŋa ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɔ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ m.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ler bʋnyaa bɔrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a brɔɔ barka da ʋ. K'a yaa da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ŋʋaar ba ŋn'a karɛ awɔɔ lɛ m nɔ wɔɔ minto.
Kʋ gʋaa a wɔ ta ɩ paasɩ deem lɛ, k'ɩ deem bɩ ka ʋ k'an a tarɛ. Kʋ gʋaa ɩ gɔbga yɔ ɩ m, k'ɩ to k'an ɩ huuduama sa.
Kʋ gʋaa hɔ yɛ ɩ han, k'ɩ ka ʋ. Gʋaa k'a ɩbɩɩ hɔ sa bɩ, ɩ b'a laaka da han y.
Hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a ba awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a ba ŋ nɩ maam sɔ.
K'awɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ ŋʋam bala, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka? Bala mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ ŋʋam.
K'awɔɔ ɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a barɛ awɔɔ n nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka? Mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ y'a bam maam sɔ.
K'awɔɔ zɩm sa gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, ŋ y'a karɛ awɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka? Bala, mimbʋnyaabənno wɔɔ ɩ zɩm sam kʋ m, k'a b'a si a lɛ ma.

Bɩ, k'a a jɩnnɔ ŋʋa, k'a zi mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ, k'a zɩm sa ŋ nɩ, b'a b'a hɔɔn da a sire ma y. Maam bɩ, awɔɔ ganwʋrɛ yɩm gʋta, awɔɔ nyɩntam Woso k'a lɛ da haay nyɩnɔ. Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n barka darɛ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ kan gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ.
K'a cicirzɛrɛ zi ba, amba awɔɔ Zɩ m cicirzɛrɛzaa bɩ m.
A b'a muno dʋdɔ ka y. Maam bɩ, Woso b'awɔɔ dʋdɔ karɛ y. A b'a muno dʋdɔ yar y. Maam bɩ, Woso b'awɔɔ dʋdɔ yarlɛ y. K'a sugur ka a muno ʋ, maam bɩ, Woso sugur karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.

K'a hɔ ka a muno ʋ. Maam bɩ, Woso y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ sɔ. N hɔgammɔr mɩŋŋa sam, n nɩ hɔ zar m awɔɔ mɔr ʋ, an a han, n n'a yɩga-yɩga zɛ, an bɩr a lom. Bala, hɔgammɔr k'awɔɔ n ta m gʋɔɔ minto bɩ, bɩ n nɩ nyɩntam hɔgammɔr awɔɔ minto sɔ."
Yeezuu n a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋʋ y'a dam ma an bʋʋ gaa ra? Ŋ hɩɩya haay b'a zarm yaa deem ʋ ra?
Karɩndanyɩ n lɛ da a karɩnsaamba ra y, bɩ karɩndanyɩ haay, k'a bankarɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa, a nyɩntam am a karɩnsaamba hɔ bɩ m.
Bɔ nɩ, ɩ nɩ bur k'a n'ɩ mim mɩnyaa ʋ bɩ yɩrɛ, an bɔkarɛ kusə k'a n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʋ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr a yɩrɛ?

Ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ ɩ hɩ ɩ danyɩ m, ɩ ʋ: Jɩm kʋ m bur bɔ ɩ mɩm ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr kusə k'a n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʋ bɩ yɩrɛ? Zambʋzaa, kusə bɩ bɔ ɩ mɩm ʋ cɩna, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ mɩm lɛɛ yɩm, k'ɩ bur bɩ bɔ ɩ mim bɩ mɩm ʋ."
"Gɔ mɩŋŋa ba ʋ, an nɩ nyɩ bʋnyaa darɛ y, gɔ bʋnyaa ba ʋ, an nɩ nyɩ mɩŋŋa dam sɔ y.
N gɔ biyəə dɔ kan a nyɩ kɩ. N bɩr sɔɔn nyɩ nɔm laa gɔ ra y. N bɩr tʋgɔ nyɩ nɔm laazankʋrɛ ra y.
Gʋaa mɩŋŋa k'a n'a mɩŋŋabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʋm mim mɩŋŋa m a heer ʋ sɔ. Gʋaa bʋnyaa k'a n'a bʋnyaabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʋm mim bʋnyaa m a heer ʋ. Bala, hɔ k'a ɩbɩɩ heer han bɩ, b'ɩ lɛ n'a hɩm."
"Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ nɩ mɔɔ birm Zuuba, Zuuba, b'awɔɔ bɩr hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ barɛ?
Gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm mɔɔ zi, an n'a tʋr kam mɔɔ meerbaa ma, an nɩ zi bam nɩ bɩ, kʋ m a bɔkʋrɛ hɩnka a m.
Bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ cɛ dɔm, an yaa hɔn zukudə, an a jɩr bɩ cɩnta ci burə ʋ bɩ kɩ. La gʋta bʋr, hi n yar kan hɩnhɛr kɩ an a mom cɛ b'ʋ, b'a n a da ma, an a wurgə y, bala a dɔrɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa.

Gʋaa k'a n'a mam, b'a bɩr zi bam nɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a cɛ dɔ tara ʋ, b'a na jɩr cɩnta y. La gʋta bʋr, hi n yar kan hɩnhɛr kɩ an a mom cɛ b'ʋ, an wurgə lɛɛm. Bɩ cɛ bɩ wurgəre kur, a hɔsɩ n gɔɔta y."
Yeezuu k'a meer bɩ ba kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ an a nya bɩ, a wuti an ta Kapɛrnawum ʋ.
Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ cir deem n ta lɔ m, an a ŋʋa maam-maam, an yaaba zɛ, an a zɔ zɛ ma.
K'a Yeezuu mim ma bɩ, a zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔgusinno nyɔɔ zi, kʋ ŋ n'aa a yɛ han, k'an b'a lɔ bɩ waa.
Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku Yeezuu zi bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ han, ŋnɩ so ra, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do a ga m k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ da han,
bala, a wɔɔ do bɩ ŋʋa, a sokʋmacɛ dɔ an a ka wɔɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu n ta kan ŋ kɩ. Kʋ ŋ y'a zɔ har bɩ ma bɩ, sʋrdaa zɔrɔ cir b'a gʋaasɩbɔɔ nyɔɔ, ŋn'a hɩm, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa da kɔrɛ ma, bala, mɔɔ n m ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ n gasʋ mɔɔ har ʋ y.
Mɔɔ m hɔɔn da mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ poore kʋ m bʋr ɩbɩɩ zi, bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ meer ba deem bala, mɔɔ lɔ bɩ y'a waam.
Lɛɛzannɔ y'a so mɔɔ mɩŋŋa ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ m so sʋrdaarɔ ʋ. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ deem m, an ta, a tam. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ a vanta m, an bʋr, a zɛm. Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ zibəənyɩ m, an naa ba, a y'a bam."
Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a zɛ kədə sʋrdaa zɔrɔ cir bɩ tɔ ma, an a bɔ an dɩga zamaa k'a zu a jɛ ʋ bɩ ma, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, baa Israyɛl nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ n sɩrakarɛ yɩ ncɩnaaʋ y."
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ doo sʋrdaa zɔrɔ cir bɩ har ʋ bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a lɔ b'a waa.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu ta tara deem kʋ n n'a birm Nayin bɩ nɔ ʋ. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ kan zamaa gʋta kɩ.
K'a n'a zɔm tara bɩ lɛ ma bɩ, n gər busu, n nɩ tam nɩ yaa ra. Zoro nyɩ m, b'a m nyɩyar a deem a da han. Tara bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋta lʋ bɩ da zaa ʋ.
Zuuba k'a lʋ bɩ yɩ bɩ, lʋ bɩ cicir gasʋ ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ b'ɩ ya ɩ nyi ka y."
A n a zɔ, an a wɔ da gʋraŋŋa bɩ ma. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a busu rɔ wɔɔ n jɩm. Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Nyukumbueere, mɔɔ lɛ ka, wuti."
Gər bɩ n wuti an nyɩnta, an nɩ meer bam. Yeezuu n nyɩ bɩ gaa, an a ka a da ʋ.
Dabɔʋ gʋta ŋ haay nyasʋ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa gʋta a hɩnka wɔɔ bire ʋ. Bɩ Woso bɩ dɩga a do ma."
Hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba bɩ ta Zidee haay ʋ kan a gʋrgarɔ kɩ ʋ.
Zaan-Batiisi karɩndanyɩnɔ yaa hɔ haay k'a ba bɩ hɩ m. Zaan nɩ ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya bir,
an ŋ nyɔɔ Zuuba zi kʋ ŋ n'aa a lar: "Ɩbɩɩ n nɩ dɔrɛ ɩ zɛrɛ ma bɩ gɛɛ, gʋaa vanta nɩ?"
Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku Yeezuu zi bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zaan-Batiisi ɩ wɔɔ nyɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ma, k'ʋ bɩ laaka da ɩbɩɩ han: ɩbɩɩ n gʋaa k'a a ga m an bʋr bɩ gɛɛ, gʋaa vanta nɩ?"
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu yaabazannɔ waa gʋta, an gʋɔɔ waa a yaabarɔ do haay nɔ ʋ, kan zinərozannɔ kɩ, a bʋʋrɔ mɩm gʋ sɔ.

A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ Zaan-Batiisi ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a ta, a yaa hɔ k'awɔɔ yɩ, a ma sɔ bɩ hɩ Zaan m: bʋʋrɔ mɩm ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, lʋgɔrɔ ɩ tam, kusimoo laafɩɩ yɩ, tikkiro tʋr a gʋ, gəəno a mɩm bɔ ʋ, lemim nyɩnta ɩ hɩm cicirzannɔ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a n a sɩrakarɛ to mɔɔ minto bɩ m."
Gʋɔɔ kʋ Zaan-Batiisi ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a hʋr bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a poohɔɔn ʋ? Hɩnhɛr awɔɔ yɩ an nɩ niigəgɔ yəŋŋəm gɛ?
Bɔ awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a paan•••? Gʋaa m, an huu wɩsɩ da a ra gɛ? Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ huu wɩsɩrɔ da a ra, ŋn'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam mɩŋŋa bɩ, cinno har brɔɔ n ta ʋ.
Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a? Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m gɛ? Ɩɩn••• mɔɔ y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a lɛ da wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ra.
Bala, Zaan bɩ mim n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ bɩ, n ʋ: 'Ba mɔɔ nɩ m zibəəzaa nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, k'a n'ɩbɩɩ zaarɔ bɩmbanka na.'
Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lannɔ nyɩnɔ bire ʋ, gʋaa ba ʋ an lɛ da Zaan-Batiisi ra y. Bɩ gʋaa k'an poore Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ bɩ, a lɛ da m."
Zamaa bɩ haay kan yawʋrsinno wɔɔ kɩ a tʋr ka Zaan ma, ŋn'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ Woso tɩrga, ŋn'a ka an batɛm ka a ʋ.
Bɩ farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ kaanm hɔ kʋ Woso lɛ n taa ŋ minto bɩ m, kaanm kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ Zaan batɛm bɩ m bɩ tɔ ma.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ m her gʋɔɔ nɔɔn makra ba kan bɔ kɩ? Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan bɔ kɩ?
Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ yaa nyɩnta daasɩ ʋ, ŋn'a to ŋn'ɩ kʋ bimbirm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: Wɔɔ hir hɛ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n sar ba y! Wɔɔ zɛ laa lɔ b'awɔɔ n nyi ka y?
Bala, Zaan-Batiisi bʋr, a bɩr bur bɩrɛ y, a bɩr dɩvɛn mire y, awɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Zinə nɩ kan kɩ.
Bɩ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bʋr, an nɩ hɔ bɩm, an nɩ hɔ mim, awɔɔ ʋ: Naa do naa, nɔzaa m bɩ dɩvɛnmir m sɔ, yawʋrsinno kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ hannyɩ m.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ ŋ ʋ, Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ tɩrga."
Farizɛn deem Yeezuu bir k'an bɩ hɔ bɩ kan a kɩ. Yeezuu n gasʋ a har ʋ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋnɩ hɔ bɩrɛ.
Lʋ n nɩ tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, mimbʋnyaabər m. A n a ma ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu ɩ hɔ bɩm farizɛn har ʋ b'ʋ. A n bʋr gedre m, n n'a ba albatɩr jaa m, tidəər n a han,
an bɩ sʋnta a kur a gannɔ ma, an nɩ nyi karɛ. A mɩm hi n bɔ, an n'a lom Yeezuu gannɔ ra. A n a minkə gaa, an a nʋnnɔ ma, an a wɔ barka ŋ la, an tidəər bɩ sa, an a lo ŋ la.
Farizɛn k'a Yeezuu bir bɩ k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a y'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: "Kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m gʋaa naa do nɩ, a lʋ k'a n'a wɔ nɔrɛ awɔɔ ma naa dɔm, kʋ nka m sɔ: mimbʋnyaabər naa."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, mɔɔ ɩ mim m kʋ m a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m." A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Meer ba, karɩnsaamba."
"Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, gʋaa hɩɩya n n'a zɩm m. Deem nɩ dɔmɩm zɔrsoor zibəə busoo m, deem bɩ n ta dɔmɩm busoor zibəə busoo m.
Kʋ ŋ ba busoo m k'a zɩm bɩ kam bɩ, busoo bɩ zaa b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: ŋn'a to. Nka nɩ busoozaa bɩ ŋʋarɛ an lɛ da?"
Sɩmɔɔn n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ y'a hɩm, mɔɔ ʋ, gʋaa k'a zɩm lɛ da a mim la bɩ m." Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ sɩra hɩ."
Yeezuu n a bɔ an dɩga lʋ bɩ ma, an a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lʋ naa do yɩ ra? Mɔɔ gasʋ ɩbɩɩ har ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n hi lo mɔɔ gannɔ ra y, bɩ, a nyi ka, a mɩm hi n a lo mɔɔ gannɔ ra, an a gʋngʋ ma a minkə m.
Ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ nyaasɩ ka kan daʋrɛ kɩ y. Bɩ lʋ bɩ mɔɔ nyaasɩ ka an a wɔ barka mɔɔ gannɔ ra, b'a bɩr a tore y.
Ɩbɩɩ n nyɔɔ nɔ mɔɔ mim ma y, bɩ, a tidəər nɔ mɔɔ gannɔ ma.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ʋ: a a mimbʋnyaarɔ k'a ŋ ba gʋta rɔ wɔɔ sugur yɩ, bɩ tɔ ma m, an ŋʋarɛ gʋta zi naa ba. Gʋaa k'a mimbʋnyaa m poore n nɩ sugur ka ʋ bɩ, a ɩ ŋʋarɛ m poore sɔ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ lʋ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ."
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a heer ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Nka m gʋaa naa do nɩ? A n yɛ an nɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur karɛ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ lʋ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ. Ta kan laafɩɩ kɩ."
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu zaa sa an bɔ kʋrɔ gʋtɔɔ kan kʋrɔ poorero kɩ nɔ ʋ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa darɛ. Karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta kan kɩ,
kan lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ k'a ŋ waa zinəro kan yaabarɔ kɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ kɩ: Magdalaa Maarii kʋ zinəro bɔ a mɛ ʋ saanhɩna,
Hɩrɔɔdɩ har dɩgamazaa Kuzaa lʋ Zannɩ kɩ, Sʋzannɩ kan lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ gʋta, kʋ ŋ y'a da ŋ han a hɔnyɩrɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Zamaa a to kʋrɔ haay ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr Yeezuu zi. Kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra bɩ, Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da.
"Gʋaa ɩ bɔ k'a hɔ duu. K'a n'a duum bɩ, a hɩsɩga an nawʋm. A yaa gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo zaa bire ʋ. N n tʋntɔ ra, brama bɛnnɔ n a bɩ.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo jaarɔ ra. Ŋ haan, ŋnɩ gɩnga kʋ taa butur ba ʋ bɩ minto.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a zar laa ʋ. Ŋ bɔ, laa bɩ n a ta ŋ mee, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ. Ŋ bɔ, ŋnɩ nyɩ da zɔrɔ-zɔrɔ." Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, an so ra kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a tʋr n ta ʋ, k'an a ma!"
Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do jɩ ma.
A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso zaa ka awɔɔ n hɔ k'a nyaakʋm da Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ bɩ dɔ, bɩ, bɔɔ ɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom n n'a darɛ ŋ nɩ, kʋ 'ŋnɩ dɩga, bɩ ŋ b'a yɩ y, kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr ka, bɩ ŋ b'a ma y.' "
"Ba hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom bɩ jɩ n na. Hɔduure bɩ, Woso lemim m.
Bɔɔ nɩ zaa bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋn'a mam, Sʋtaana k'a lee ku bɩ, an nɩ hɔ k'a nɩ ŋ heer ʋ bɩ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ b'a da ma, ŋn'a si, ŋnɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ nɩ y.
Bɔɔ nɩ jaarɔ burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, kʋ ŋ Woso lemim bɩ ma, a si ŋ nawʋm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, bɩ ŋ məsi ba ʋ y. A si ŋ nawʋm, bɩ k'a yɩ poore, makra dɔmɩm ʋ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa.
Bɔɔ y'a zar laa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋn'a mam, bɩ kan hɔɔndarɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, durnya arzakarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, durnya heernyɔɔrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gɔɔta ŋ nawʋm jɛ ʋ, ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ nyɩ da mɩŋŋa y.
Bɔɔ y'a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋn'a tʋr kam lemim bɩ ma, ŋn'a sim mɩŋŋa kan heer tɩrgabaa kɩ. Ŋ bɩr a tɔ bɔrɛ a nɔ ʋ y, ŋ bɩr a tom sɔ y, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ nyɩ dam."
"Gʋaa bɩ sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʋ, an mɔr sa an a ku ma, gɛɛ an a sa, an a nyɔɔ gargʋ ta y. A cɩnta n nawʋrɛ a bɩncɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋm nɔ wɔɔ n bɩr lɛɛ gure bɩ yɩm.
Bala, mim haay kʋ gʋɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋn'a dɔ naa ma bɩ, ŋ zɛm b'a dɔ. Mim ba ʋ n n a nyaakʋm da a dɔ n mɩ y.
K'a dundo a zi kan a tʋr k'awɔɔ n'a kam ma lʋnlɔ bɩ kɩ. Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ m bɩ, n y'a dam la. Bɔ ɩ bɩ hɔsɩ n bɩ, a hɔɔn k'a a da a ʋ, a ta m poore bɩ, n y'a yɔm nɩ."
Yeezuu da kan a danyɩnɔ kɩ bʋr zi, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a zɔ ma y, zamaa minto.
N n'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ da kan ɩ danyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ garga ra, ŋ lɛ n taa ɩbɩɩ ma."
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ da kan mɔɔ danyɩnɔ kɩ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam Woso lemim ma, ŋn'a zi bam nɔ wɔɔ m."
Hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ʋ ta higʋta bɩ gəm deem bɩ ra", ŋnɩ cem.
Kʋ ŋ y'a hʋr, ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, Yeezuu hinceem ba. Hɩnhɛr gʋta n yar higʋta bɩ ra. Hi n'a tɔm kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an n'a ŋʋam k'a nyoo zɛ.
Ŋ n'a zɔ, ŋn'a gu, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, karɩnsaamba, ʋ ɩ gɩngam!" A n wuti, an həən si hɩnhɛr bɩ ma kan hikurero wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a da zenyy•••, lɛɛ n zɛ sɩɩ•••
A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ b'ɩ ka?" Dabɔʋ nɩ ŋ nyasʋ, ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Nka m gʋaa naa do nɩ? A n nɩ lɛ kam hɩnhɛr ʋ kan hi kɩ, ŋn'a lɛ sire!"
Ŋ yaa lee ku Gergezaa zannɔ kʋ ʋ. Kʋ bɩ, a nya a ʋ Galilee kʋ bɩ rɛ.
