Yeezuu k'a zer tara ʋ bɩ, tara bɩ gʋaa deem a zɛ ʋ, zinəro nɩ kan kɩ. A dɔmɩm laatʋ, a n a ya, an nɩ huu darɛ a ra y, b'a n a ya, an nɩ wʋtam har ʋ y. Wʋta a nawʋm gəənoyaarɔ nɔ ʋ.

Gallɛm gʋta zinə bɩ tɩr gasʋ gʋaa b'ʋ an maasɩrɛ ba. N n a wɔrɔ sur baŋŋarɔ m, n n pɔyaarɔ da a gam ʋ k'a dɔ ma. Bɩ, a tɩr ŋ yɩnyar, zinə bɩ n a gaa, an ta m zaŋŋa ʋ. Yeezuu n lɛ ka zinə b'ʋ k'an bɔ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ. K'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a zee da, an sʋnta a taa, an n'a hɩm kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ, Yeezuu, Woso k'a lɛ da haay Nyɩ? Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, ɩ bɩ fɩr ka mɔɔ ma y."
Yeezuu n a lar, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ tɔ m bɔ?" A ʋ: "Leziyɔn" A jɩ k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Gʋta maam-maam, bala, zinəro gʋta ɩ gasʋ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ.
Zinəro wɔɔ n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'a bɩ lɛ ka a ʋ, k'a gasʋ yaa gʋta ʋ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ y.
Kurkuuro ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ gʋta, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm ci bɩ ra. Zinəro wɔɔ n a yɛ Yeezuu han, k'an zaa ka a ʋ, k'a gasʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ ʋ. A n zaa ka ŋ ʋ.
Zinəro wɔɔ n bɔ gʋaa bɩ mɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ gasʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ ʋ. Kurkuuro wɔɔ n bra si ci bɩ mim ʋ, ŋnɩ zer, ŋn'a zar higʋta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
Kurkuuro dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ bra si, ŋn'aa hɩ tara nɔ ʋ, kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n bʋr k'a bɩ dɩga hɔ k'a ba bɩ ma. Ŋ lee ku Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ gʋaa kʋ zinəro bɔ a mɛ ʋ bɩ yɩ, an nɩ nyɩntam Yeezuu jɩr ʋ, an huu da a ra, an a ba gʋaa mɩŋŋa, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da n bɔ ʋ.
Bɔɔ ɩ hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ zinəro zaa bɩ waarɛ jɩ dɩnda gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr lɔ wɔɔ m.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Gergezaa zannɔ wɔɔ n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'an a hʋr a tara ra. Bala, nyibəə gʋta gasʋ ŋ ʋ. Yeezuu n a bɔ, an da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an a wusigə.
Gʋaa kʋ zinəro bɔ a mɛ ʋ b'a yɛ Yeezuu han k'a zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ. Yeezuu n a da zaa ra, a ʋ:
"Doo ɩ har ʋ, k'ɩ yaa hɔ kʋ Woso a ba ɩbɩɩ minto bɩ hɩ." Gʋaa bɩ n a hʋr, an aa hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a ba a m bɩ hɩ tara bɩ nɔ ʋ jilli.
Yeezuu k'a a bɔ, an bɩ lee ku bɩ, zamaa bɩ b'a zɛ ʋ, ŋn'a si. Bala, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ dɔm ma.
Gʋaa n bʋr b'ʋ, a tɔ m Zayirus, sokʋmacɛ cir m. A n bɩ sʋnta Yeezuu taa, an a yɛ han, k'an bʋr a har ʋ,
bala, a nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ n ta ʋ deem bala, a dɔɔraa a zɔ bueerehɩɩya ma, an n'a bam k'a ga. Kʋ Yeezuu nɩ tam bɩ, zamaa b'a so ʋ.
Lʋ ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ma n'a dam zi dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya. [A n a hɔnyɩ zar lɔɔtɔɔrɔ zi,] bɩ, gʋaa ba ʋ an a da ma, an a waa y.
A n a zɔ Yeezuu ma a kur, an a wɔ da a huu lɛ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, a ma b'a da jɩm ʋ.
Yeezuu n laaka da, a ʋ: "Nka y'a wɔ da mɔɔ ma?" Ŋ haay n bɩsɩ ka. Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a so ɩbɩɩ ʋ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ nyʋnnyɔɔtam nɔ wɔɔ m."
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa a wɔ da mɔɔ ma, bala paŋŋa bɔ mɔɔ mɛ ʋ, mɔɔ n a dɔ."
Lʋ bɩ k'a a dɔ a ʋ, ŋ sʋr a ra bɩ, a bʋr kan mɛhinkə kɩ, an bɩ kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa. Hɔ niŋŋə k'a ka, an a wɔ da ma, an a waa lɛɛm bɩ, an a jɩ sa, an a dɩnda m zamaa bɩ haay taa.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "M nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ. Ta kan laafɩɩ kɩ."
Kʋ Yeezuu gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, gʋaa a to sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ har ʋ, an b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ ga. Ɩ b'ɩ ya, ɩ karɩnsaamba da kɔrɛ ma y."
Bɩ Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, an a hɩ Zayirus m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Sɩra ka bala, a y'a waam."
Kʋ Yeezuu lee ku har ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a n zaa ka gɔsɩ ʋ k'an gasʋ y. Pɩyɛɛr a gaa bala, kan Zaan kɩ, Zakkɩ kɩ, kan nyɩ bɩ zɩ kɩ, a da kɩ.
Zamaa bɩ haay nɩ baa dam, ŋnɩ heerzar nɔ ʋ nyɩ bɩ minto. Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "A bɩ baa da y. A n ga y, hinceem an n'a bam."
Ŋ nɩ yaa wʋm Yeezuu ma, bala, ŋ sɩra ka, a ga.
Yeezuu n nyɩ bɩ sa a wɔ ma, an a bir, a ʋ: "M nyɩnnɩ, wuti!"
A n a mɩm bɔ ʋ, an wuti lɛɛm. Yeezuu n zaa ka, a ʋ, ŋnɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʋ.
A zɩrɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə, bɩ Yeezuu lɛ ka, a ʋ, ŋ bɩ hɔ k'a ba naa hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y.
Yeezuu bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, a paŋŋa kan lɛ kɩ ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ la zinəro ra, kʋ ŋ nɩ yaabazannɔ waa.
A n ŋ nyɔɔ, kʋ ŋ n'aa Woso cirbəə bɩ pa da, kʋ ŋ nɩ yaabazannɔ waa.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A bɩ hɔsɩ sa a wɔ ʋ k'a zaa bɩ sa nɩ y. A bɩ bara sa, gɛɛ hɛra, gɛɛ bur, gɛɛ busoo y. A b'a ka gʋaa deem m huuro gʋr hɩɩya y.
Har niŋŋə kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ siŋ ʋ bɩ, k'a gɔɔta b'ʋ, an ta, an awɔɔ hʋrlɛ dɔmɩm ku.
Kʋ ŋ n awɔɔ si kʋ bɩ do nɔ ʋ y, k'a bʋr an n'a hʋrm, k'a kʋ bɩ taanyisi bɩ gʋngʋm a gannɔ ma, kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, a kʋrɔ ma."
Ŋ n'a hʋr ŋnɩ ta kʋrɔ haay ʋ, ŋn'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam, ŋn'ɩ yaabazannɔ waam bɩncɛ haay ʋ.
Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ hɔ haay kʋ Yeezuu a ba naa ma. A n a dɔ k'a hɔɔn an n'a dam lɔ y. Bala, nawɔnnɔ ʋ Zaan y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ.
Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ Elii y'a hɩnka. Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ʋ biisi rɔ wɔɔ deem y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ.
Hɩrɔɔdɩ ʋ: "Mɔɔ ka ŋnɩ Zaan mim gʋ ma. Bɩ, nka ŋn'a mim dɩndam mɔɔ n'a mam naa?" A n n'a kam ma k'a yɩ.
Zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a wusigə bɩ, ŋ yaa hɔ haay kʋ ŋ yaa ba bɩ hɩ Yeezuu m. A n ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ toore ma, tara kʋ n n'a birm Bɛtsayɩdaa bɩ zeezi.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ bɩ, ŋ zu ŋ jɛ ʋ. Yeezuu nɩ ŋ si, an nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, an nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa laafɩɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ waarɛ.

Gum k'a bʋr an nɩ dam bɩ, bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra, kʋ ŋ nɩ ta kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ jɩnjɛɛm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'aa a ka wʋtajɩrɔ ma kan hɔbɩrɛ kɩ ma ŋn'a bɩ. Bala, bɩncɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta ʋ naa, laatʋ hadrɔ ma."
Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ ŋn'a bɩ a zim." Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Bur soor taan••• ɩ gɔɔta wɔɔ ʋ kan zɔnɔ kɩ hɩɩya, kʋ bɩ bɛɛ y, k'ʋ ta ʋ aa hɔbɩrɛ si, ʋ b'a ka zamaa b'ʋ."
Gʋɔɔ yaarɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tisi soor ku. Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta busoor-busoor."
Ŋ n'a ba maam, ŋnɩ ŋ nyɩnta haay.
Yeezuu n bur soor bɩ sa kan zɔ hɩɩya bɩ kɩ, an a mɩm busu brama, an ŋ barka da ʋ, an a zɩnzɛ ra, an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a ka zamaa b'ʋ.
Ŋ n'a bɩ, an ŋ ka haay. A kuurero kʋ ŋ gɔɔta bɩ, ŋn'a gʋr kasɩ lɛ ma bueerehɩɩya.
Hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu bɔ toore ma, an nɩ yaa dam, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ kan kɩ. A n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Zamaa bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ, Zaan-Batiisi m. Nawɔnnɔ ʋ, Elii m. Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ, biisizannɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ?" Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Krista kʋ Woso a nyɔɔ bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m."
Yeezuu ŋ lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y."

A n a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Pakra m kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n fɩr yɩ gʋta, kʋ gʋɔɔgusinno n kaanm m kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a zɛ an ga, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ."
Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ haay, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a zu mɔɔ ʋ, k'an a mɩŋŋa lɛtaamarɔ to haay, dɔmɩm haay, k'an a gɔdarkʋra busu, an zu mɔɔ ʋ.
Kʋ sɩra nɩ, gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a a meeyaa bʋmbɔ, bɩ zaa n nɩ kʋrɔm ma. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a yɛ zɛ ma mɔɔ minto bɩ, bɩ zaa ɩ bɩ kʋrɔm a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ ma y.
Bɩ kʋ gʋaa durnya naa arzaka yɩ haay, a zaa n bɔkarɛ an a mɩŋŋa nyaam, gɛɛ, an a mɩŋŋa zar, a nyɔɔdʋ ɩ ka?
Bala, kʋ gʋaa ɩ nyannɩ zɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma, an nɩ nyannɩ zɛm mɔɔ meerbaa tɔ ma, kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bʋr a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ kan a Zɩ hɔ kɩ malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔ kɩ, a b'a zaa nyannɩ zɛrɛ y.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla, gɔsɩnnɔ Woso cirbəə bɩ yɩm, a mɩsɩrbaa dɔmɩm ʋ."
Yeezuu k'a meer bɩ ba bɩ, a dɔmɩm a zɔ sinnyə ma. A Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zaan kɩ, Zakkɩ kɩ, an der ci ra k'a yaa da.
K'a nɩ yaa bɩ dam bɩ, a meer a lʋr, a huu n a ba fu fɩtɩtɩ, an nɩ nyakɩ bɔm.
Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ bʋr, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan kɩ; Moyiisi kan Elii kɩ y'a hɩnka Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ,
ŋn'ɩ zibəə kʋ Yeezuu n n'a nyambʋrlɛ a zɛ m, Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ mim dɩndam kan kɩ.
Bɩ ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr ɩ hinceem barɛ a ra kan a muno wɔɔ kɩ. Hinceem bɩ n bɩ ku ŋ la. Kʋ ŋ gu bɩ, ŋ Yeezuu lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ yɩ kan gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a gʋm Yeezuu ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ naa ʋ a mɩŋŋa. Ʋ bur ba kaakʋ: Ɩbɩɩ hɔ deem, Moyiisi hɔ deem, Elii hɔ deem." A n hɔ k'an a hɩm bɩ dɔ y.
K'a nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, warkʋ bʋr an b'a ku ŋ la. Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ warkʋ bɩ yɩ an n'a kure a ra bɩ, ŋ da bɔ ʋ gʋta.
Meerbaa n a to warkʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Nyɩ m naa, mɔɔ n'a bɔ ʋ. K'a a tʋr ka ma."
Meerbaa bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n gɔsɩ yɩ, kʋ Yeezuu deem bɛɛ y. Ŋ n hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ hɩ gɔsɩ m dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ y, ŋ zɛ pi.
Bɩ dɔ k'a mɩ bɩ, ŋ zer ci bɩ ra, zamaa n bʋr, an bɩ Yeezuu zɛ ʋ.
Gʋaa deem nɩ zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, an zee da, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, dɩga mɔɔ nyɩyar bɩ mim ma, an mɔɔ nyɩ a deem bala.
Zinə deem ɩ gasʋ ʋ, an tɩr a da zeedarɛ ma, an a hinkə. A n bɩr lihihur tarɛ a lɛ rɛ, an bɩr a dam kɔrɛ ma, a bɩr bɔrɛ a mɛ ʋ naanaa y.
Mɔɔ yɛ ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ han kʋ ŋ nɩ la ra, bɩ ŋ n a da ma y."
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩrakarɛ warzannɔ kan gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ do n'awɔɔ m. Mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m dɔmɩm karɔ ba, kʋ m bʋraama zi ba kan awɔɔ kɩ? Bʋr ɩ nyɩ bɩ m naa ʋ."
Nyɩ bɩ k'a bʋr an n'a zɔm bɩ, zinə b'a zɛ an a zo tara ʋ, an a hinkə. Yeezuu n həən si zinə bɩ ma, an nyɩ bɩ waa, an a ka a zɩ ʋ.
Ŋ haay n zɛ kədə Woso gʋtabaa bɩ minto. Hɔ haay kʋ Yeezuu a ba bɩ a ka gʋaa biyəə heer n nyɩnta. A a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ:
"K'a tʋr ka hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ ma mɩŋŋa: N Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyasʋm, n n'a da gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ."
Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩr a meerbaa bɩ jɩ marɛ y. A jɩ b'a nyaakʋm da ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ b'a da ma, ŋn'a dɔ y, ŋn'ɩ nyi bam Yeezuu larlɛ m mim naa do minto.
Laakadarɛ deem bʋr ŋ hɔɔn ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩsɩ kam kʋ ma, ŋ ʋ: nka y'a da ma an yɩ jɩtaarɛ a bire ʋ.
Yeezuu k'a ŋ laaka bɩ darɛ jɩ dɔ bɩ, a nyɩ gaa, an a jɩm a jɩr ʋ,
an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a nyɩ naa do si mɔɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ a yɩ m si. Gʋaa k'a mɔɔ si bɩ, gʋaa k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a a si. Bala, gʋaa k'an poore awɔɔ haay barla bɩ, bɩ n'awɔɔ jɩtaarɛ."
Zaan meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ gʋaa yɩ an nɩ lam zinəro ra ɩbɩɩ tɔ m, wɔɔ n a gʋ ma, k'a ba kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ tɔ ma."
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "A b'a gʋ ma y, bala, gʋaa k'a bɩ bʋnyaa kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ gʋaa m."
Dɔmɩm k'a a ga m kʋ Woso n Yeezuu bɔ durnya ʋ bɩ k'a n'a zɔm bɩ, a a cɩnta k'a ta Zerizalɛm ʋ.
A gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka a m. Brɔɔ n zaa sa, ŋn'aa gasʋ Samarii kʋ deem ʋ, k'a leekure bɩ banka.
Bɩ, ŋ n a si y, k'a zaa sa an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ Zaan kan Zakkɩ kɩ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ʋ lɛ ka, kʋ sɛ n a to brama an zer, an nawɔnnɔ bɩ gɛ?"
Yeezuu n a bɔ an dɩga ŋ ma, an nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ, [a ʋ: "Nyi k'an ta awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ n a dɔ y. Gʋaanyɩ bɩ n bʋr k'a bɩ gʋɔɔ zɩnzɛ y, bʋr a ʋ k'a bɩ ŋ bʋmbɔ."]
Ŋ n'a hʋr, ŋnɩ ta tara vanta ra.
Kʋ ŋ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, gʋaa deem a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zum kʋ ʋ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, m ta bɩncɛ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n nɩ taŋ ʋ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɛɛʋnrɔ yaarɔ ta ʋ, bɩ bɛnnɔ y'a cɛrɔ m. Bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ ba bɩncɛ m k'a mim cɩnta ʋ y."
A n a hɩ gʋaa vanta m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ." Bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, zaa ka m ʋ, kʋ m dɔ m zɩ birle ma."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Gəəno wɔɔ to kʋ ŋ n a gəəno bir. B'ɩbɩɩ, ta ɩ yaa Woso cirbəə pa da."
Gʋaa vanta n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zure ɩbɩɩ ʋ karɩnsaamba, bɩ zaa ka m ʋ, kʋ m m leer so m harzannɔ m."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa donokaan sa k'a dam wʋ, an a bɔ an nɩ dɩgarɛ a kur, a zaa b'a dam ma an Woso cirbəə zi ba y."
Bɩ kur bɩ, Zuuba karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bɔ ʋ busaanhɩna a yaa hɩɩya, an ŋ nyɔɔ hɩɩya-hɩɩya, kʋrɔ kan bɩncɛ haay k'a a ga m an ta ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ lɛɛ ka a lɛɛ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔdarɛ bɩ gʋta, b'a darɛzannɔ ba ʋ gʋta y. K'a yaa da wutu zaa bɩ m, k'a yɛ han, k'an zibənno nyɔɔ hɔdarɛ bɩ minto.
K'a ta! Awɔɔ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋm am sinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ hɔ bɩ m tamparɔ bire ʋ.
A bɩ busoo sa y, a bɩ hɛra sa y, a bɩ kʋsɔ sa sɔ y. A bɩ jɩm a yaa da gʋaa m zaa ra y.
K'a lɛɛ ka a hɩ har k'awɔɔ n nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ b'ʋ, a ʋ: Kʋ laafɩɩ n bɩr har naa do mim la.
Kʋ laafɩɩ zaa ɩ b'ʋ deem, awɔɔ laafɩɩ bɩ zerm la. Kʋ bɩ bɛɛ y, a y'a bɔm an bʋr awɔɔ zi.
K'a gɔɔta har bɩ do ʋ. Hɔ kʋ n n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, a bɩr a bɩrɛ, a bɩr a mire. Bala, zibəəzaa b'a ga a busoo m. A bɩ har lʋnlʋr y.
K'awɔɔ yaa gasʋ tara niŋŋə nɔ ʋ, n n'awɔɔ si, k'a hɔ kʋ n y'a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ bɩ.
K'a yaabazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ waa. K'a hɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ awɔɔ ma.
K'awɔɔ yaa gasʋ kʋ niŋŋə ʋ, bɩ ŋ n awɔɔ si, k'a bɔ a hɩ gʋɔɔ gaa ʋ, a ʋ:
Baa k'awɔɔ kʋ bɩ taanyisi k'a naasʋ wɔɔ gannɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ y'a gʋngʋm ma, ʋ a to awɔɔ m. Bɩ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ awɔɔ ma.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Woso dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, Sodɔm hʋnhʋrlɛ bɩ nyɩntam gʋta, an kʋ bɩ do ku y."

"A nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma bʋnyaa, Korazɛn zannɔ! A nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma bʋnyaa, Bɛtsayɩdaa zannɔ! Bala, hoserlo kʋ ŋ ba awɔɔ bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ ba ŋ y'a ʋ Tiir ʋ kan Sidɔn kɩ, ncɩnaaʋ naa ŋ yɔrgɔrɔ da a ra, ŋnɩ suu lo a mim la, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a a mɩsɩrbaa lʋr, a dɔmɩm laatʋ.
Bɩ minto bɩ, dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ bɩ nyɩntam gʋta, an awɔɔ hɔ bɩ ku y.
B'ɩbɩɩ Kapɛrnawum, ɩ hɔɔn ɩbɩɩ n n'a darɛ ɩ ʋ, n y'ɩbɩɩ busum ɩ ta arzana ʋ ra? N y'ɩbɩɩ zerm yaa gʋta ʋ, fɩryɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ."
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔzaa n n'a tʋr karɛ awɔɔ ma bɩ, a tʋr an n'a kam mɔɔ ma. Bɔzaa ɩ kaanm awɔɔ m bɩ, kaanm a ʋ mɔɔ m sɔ. Bɩ bɔzaa ɩ kaanm mɔɔ m bɩ, kaanm a ʋ gʋaa k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ m."
Karɩndanyɩnɔ busaanhɩna a yaa hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a wusigə, ŋnɩ bʋr kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, baa zinəro wɔɔ lɛ si ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Sʋtaana yɩ, an a to brama an a da, am brama nyakɩ hɔ bɩ m.
Ba n nɩ: mɔɔ paŋŋa ka awɔɔ ʋ k'a tɔ mɩnnɔ ra kan bɔɔrɔrɔ kɩ kan jɩnnɔ paŋŋa kɩ haay, bɩ hɔsɩ bɩ barɛ awɔɔ nɩ y.
Bɩ, a b'a hɔɔn nyɔɔ zinəro kʋ ŋ y'awɔɔ lɛ si rɔ wɔɔ minto y. K'a heer nyɔɔ, kʋ Woso awɔɔ tɔrɔ gʋrsɩra ba arzana ʋ bɩ minto."

Lɛɛm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka heernyɔɔ gʋta n gasʋ Yeezuu ʋ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, brama kan tara kɩ Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ mim naa do nyaakʋm da hɔɔnzannɔ, kan hɔdonno kɩ m, ɩ b'a hɩnka gʋɔɔ poorero m. Sɩra m, m Zɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'a ŋʋa k'an nyɩnta ncɩnaaʋ."
"Mɔɔ Zɩ hɔ haay sa, an a ka mɔɔ ʋ, bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ an Nyɩ bɩ dɔ kʋ Zɩ bɩ bɛɛ bala y. Bɩ, gʋaa ba ʋ an Zɩ bɩ dɔ kʋ Nyɩ bɩ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ Nyɩ bɩ lɛ n taa k'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɛɛ bala y."
A n a bɔ, an dɩga karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ a minto, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm nɔ wɔɔ yɩm.
Bala, Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gʋta kan cinno kɩ a ŋʋa k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ yɩ, bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam bɩ ma, bɩ ŋ n a ma y."
Wosocikarɩnsaamba deem wuti an laaka da Yeezuu han, k'a nyasʋ meerbaa nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, bɔ mɔɔ m ga m m a ba, kʋ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Moyiisi lɛ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ, bɔ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba? Ɩbɩɩ y'a karɩnda bam lɔ?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "K'ɩ Zuuba ɩ Woso ŋʋa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, kan ɩ nyi kɩ haay, kan ɩ paŋŋa kɩ haay, kan ɩ hɔɔndarɛ kɩ haay. K'ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ nyɩ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa. A ba ncɩnaaʋ, ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ yɩm."
Bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaamba bɩ k'a lɛ n taa k'a gumə ka a mɩŋŋa ʋ bɩ, a Yeezuu lar, a ʋ: "Nka m mɔɔ mim nɩ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta an a to Zerizalɛm ʋ, an nɩ tam Zeriko ʋ. Konno n aa da ma, ŋn'a huuro yɔ m, ŋn'a zɛ bannɔ m, ŋnɩ yaaba da ma, ŋn'a gʋ ma, an n'a bam k'a ga.
Wosocɛmannɩbər deem a to b'ʋ sɔ, an bʋr an nɩ cenim zaa bɩ do ra. A n gʋaa bɩ yɩ, an bɩr ma, an cem.
Wosocɛ zibəəzaa deem a to Zerizalɛm ʋ sɔ, an nɩ cenim b'ʋ. Levii do gʋaa m. A n gʋaa bɩ yɩ, an bɩr ma, an cem.
Bɩ, Samarii gʋaa deem y'a to zaa ra, an bɩ lee ku gʋaa bɩ zi. K'a a yɩ bɩ, a cicir a nyasʋ.
A n a zɔ ma, an a nyinno wɔɔ sʋrgɔ dɩvɛn m, an nyɔɔ nɔ ŋ ma, an pɛɛra burgu ma, an a busu, an a da a sisi ʋ, an ta m zaasənnocɛ ʋ, an aa nyɩsɩ ba m.
Dɔ k'a mɩ bɩ, a busoo bɔ ʋ bɔɔlʋgʋ hɩɩya, n n a ba wanzur m, an a ka zaasənnocɛ zaa b'ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: Dɩga a mim ma, bɩ k'ɩ busoo zar a kur, kʋ mɔɔ m wusigə, kʋ m b'a sompi a yaa ʋ.
Ɩbɩɩ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ, gʋaa kaakʋ naa bireyaa ʋ, nka m gʋaa kʋ konno a zɛ bɩ mim nɩ?"
Wosocikarɩnsaamba bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩ mɩŋŋabaa ba kan kɩ bɩ m." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "B'ɩbɩɩ sɔ, ta, ɩ ba maam sɔ."
Kʋ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ yaa gasʋ kʋ deem ʋ. Lʋ kʋ n n'a birm Martɩ bɩ ŋ si a har ʋ.
A dam n ta ʋ, a tɔ m Maarii, b'ɩ nyɩnta Zuuba bɩ taa, an n'a tʋr karɛ a meerbaa ma.

Martɩ nyɩnta an n'a tʋntɔŋ ʋ kan hɔbɩrɛ barɛ kɩ, zibəə gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ sɔ. A n bʋr, an b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ dam bɩ k'a mɔɔ to m deem, m nɩ ziro wɔɔ bam bɩ, a bɩr hɔsɩ barɛ ɩbɩɩ n na? A hɩ m k'an b'a da m han."
Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Martɩ, Martɩ, hɔ gʋta y'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔn ʋ, an n'ɩbɩɩ kɔm.
Deem bala m pakra. Maarii hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ bɔ ʋ, bɩ, gʋaa b'a yɔm nɩ y."
Hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu nyɩnta an nɩ yaa dam bɩncɛ niŋŋə ʋ. K'a yaa bɩ da an a nya bɩ, karɩndanyɩ deem a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, yaadarɛ dɩnda ʋ m, amba Zaan a dɩnda a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m bɩ m."
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ɩ yaa dam, k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Zɩ, a ka kʋ n n'ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa dɔ Woso a deem, k'ɩ cirbəə n bʋr.
Wɔɔ dɔmɩm biyəə hɔbɩrɛ ka wɔɔ ʋ,
k'ɩ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʋ, amba wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ y'a sugur kam bɔɔ ɩ kʋrɔma kan wɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ m. Ɩ b'a ka, ʋ ʋ do makra nɔ ʋ y."
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ kara hannyɩ n ta ʋ, an ta an aa hɩ m dibsir ma, a ʋ: 'M hannyɩ, bur zɩm sa m m kaakʋ,
mɔɔ hannyɩ deem y'a to zaa ra an bʋr mɔɔ zi, bɩ hɔsɩ ba mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ka ʋ y.'
Bɔ n nɩ cɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: 'Ɩ bɩ mɔɔ kɔ y. Mɔɔ cɛ lɛ ta. Mɔɔ kan m nyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ wʋtam. Mɔɔ bɩ m dam ma, m wuti, m bur ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ y.'
Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: baa k'a b'a dam ma, an wuti an a ka ʋ a hannyɩbaa bɩ minto, a wutire an hɔ haay k'a lɛ n taa bɩ ka ʋ, k'a lɛ baa k'an a kɔ bɩ tɔ ma."
"Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: K'a hɔ yɛ, n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ. K'a ka, awɔɔ y'a yɩm. K'a cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʋrɛ awɔɔ m.
Bala, gʋaa k'a hɔ yɛ, n y'a kaŋ ʋ, gʋaa k'a ka, a y'a yɩm, gʋaa k'a cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʋrɛ a zaa m.
Zɩ bɩ kara n n'awɔɔ bire ʋ naa ʋ, a nyɩ n zɔ yɛ han an mɩm sa an a ka ʋ?
Gɛɛ a n a ya, an jir yɛ, bɩ n bɔɔrɔ sa an a ka ʋ?
K'awɔɔ n gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ hɔ mɩŋŋa ka a nyɩnɔ ʋ dɔ. Bɩ Zɩ Woso k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ, a bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a yɛm han rɔ wɔɔ ʋ an lɛ da ra?"
Yeezuu ɩ lam zinə k'a gʋaa ba bəətir bɩ la. Bɩ, zinə bɩ k'a bɔ bɩ, bəətir b'ɩ meer bam, zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə.
Bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ a hɩ, ŋ ʋ, la Yeezuu n nawʋm zinəro wɔɔ ra, zinəro cir Bɛlzebul paŋŋa m.
Gɔsɩnnɔ lɛ n taa k'a Yeezuu makra ba a dɩga a, ŋn'a yɛm han k'an a ka kʋ makra n a to arzana ʋ k'a yɩ.
Bɩ Yeezuu ŋ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ yɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ cirbəə deem zannɔ wuti ŋn'ɩ yar bam kan kʋ kɩ, a da an nawʋm, a cɛrɔ wɔɔ n a dɩnda kʋ ra sɔ.
K'awɔɔ ʋ, Bɛlzebul paŋŋa minto y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra bɩ, kʋ Sʋtaana a bɔ an nɩ yar bam kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ sɔ, a cirbəə bɩ nyɩntam lɔ?
Kʋ Bɛlzebul minto y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra, awɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ, la ŋ nawʋrɛ ŋ la, nka tɔ ma? Awɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n n'awɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm.
Bɩ kʋ la mɔɔ nawʋm zinəro wɔɔ ra kan Woso wɔ paŋŋa kɩ, k'a dɔ a ʋ: Woso cirbəə b'ɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi.
Kʋ gʋaa paŋŋazaa ɩ dɔrɛ a har ma kan a yarbaa mɔrlɔ kɩ, hɔsɩ bɩ bam hɔ k'an ta m bɩ nɩ y.
Bɩ kʋ paŋŋazaa vanta bʋr a paŋŋa n lɛ da ra, an b'a nyasʋ an a da ra, an a yarbaa mɔrlɔ k'a ŋ ka a ma rɔ wɔɔ yɔ nɩ, hɔ k'an ta m bɩ gʋr an nawʋm an a jir.
Gʋaa k'a ba kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ, mɔɔ jɩm m. Gʋaa k'a bɩr a dam mɔɔ han an a so kʋ ma bɩ, a hɩsɩga an nawʋm."
"Kʋ zinə bɔ gʋaa mɛ ʋ, bɩmbɩr an nawʋm zaŋŋa ʋ an n'a kam mɛnyɔɔ darɛ bɩncɛ ma. K'a n a yɩ y, a y'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: Mɔɔ yɩ m wusigəm, m ta m har gusire ʋ, bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ m bɔ ʋ bɩ.
K'a a wusigə bɩ, a yaa dɩga a, n y'a waa, n n'a banka mɩŋŋa.
A n a bɔ an ta, an aa zinəro gaa saanhɩna, ŋ bʋnyaabaa n lɛ da ra, ŋnɩ bɩ gasʋ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ. Bɩ gʋaa bɩ do bʋnyaabaa lɛ da m biisi ra."
Yeezuu k'a meer ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, lʋ deem a leer busu an meer ba zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazaa m lʋ k'a ɩbɩɩ yɩ durnya ʋ, an nyɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ m."
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam Woso lemim ma, ŋn'a lɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ m."
Zamaa bɩ k'a a so kʋ ma bɩ, Yeezuu y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Her naa ʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ m, makra ŋn'a kam ma. Bɩ kʋ makra bɩ nɩ, ŋ bɩ makra vanta yɩm kʋ Zonas makra bɩ bɛɛ y.
Bala, Zonas k'a nyɩnta makra Niniivɩ gʋɔɔ mɩm ʋ bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ nyɩntam makra sɔ her naa ʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ minto.

Woso dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, lʋcir k'a a to jɩsadɔpaasɩ ʋ bɩ wutim kan her naa ʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔ m kɩ an ŋ dʋdɔ yar, bala, a to a ʋ durnya lɛ cɩnta jɛ ʋ, k'a b'a tʋr ka mindor Salomɔɔn lemim ma. Bɩ, bɔ ɩ lɛ da Salomɔɔn m b'ɩ naa ʋ.
Dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, Niniivɩ gʋɔɔ wutim kan her gʋɔɔ nɔɔ m kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yar, bala, kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka hɔ kʋ Zonas a hɩ bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ a taam. Bɔ ɩ lɛ da Zonas ra b'ɩ naa ʋ."
"Gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʋ, an a nyaakʋm da y, gɛɛ, an a nyɔɔ kasɩ taa y. A cɩnta n nawʋm hɔ burə ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋm nɔ wɔɔ n lɛɛgure bɩ yɩ.
Ɩbɩɩ mɛsim fɩtɩrɛ bɩ, mɩnyaa m. K'ɩbɩɩ mɩnyaa mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ mɛsim bɩ haay b'ɩ lɛɛgure ʋ. Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ mɩnyaa bɩ mɩŋŋa y, ɩbɩɩ mɛsim b'ɩ monsigə ʋ sɔ.
Dundo ɩ zi kan lɛɛgure k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ kɩ, ɩ b'a ka, an a ba monsigə y.
K'ɩbɩɩ mɛsim haay ɩ lɛɛgure ʋ, bɩ monsigə poore ba ʋ tɔkkɛ, a haay nyɩntam lɛɛgure ʋ amba fɩtɩrɛ k'a nɩ lɛɛ bɔrɛ a ʋ, an nɩ lɛɛgure kam bɩ m."
Yeezuu k'a nɩ meer bam bɩ, farizɛn deem a bir a har ʋ k'an bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ. A n gasʋ, k'a hɔ bɩ.
Farizɛn bɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'a n a wɔ hir amba n tɩr a ba bɩ, a zɛ kədə.
Zuuba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɩga, awɔɔ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ, hɛ kan laaga kɩ kur awɔɔ n'a sʋrgɔm, koorbaa n bɔkarɛ an awɔɔ heer han kan kʋsɩrabaa kɩ.
Hɔɔnwarzannɔ n'awɔɔ m! Gʋaa k'a kur bɩ ba bɩ, a bɛɛ y'a nɔ bɩ ba sɔ ra?
Bɩ, k'a hɔ ka cicirzannɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n n'a bam kɛɛrɛ bɩ haay yɩm mɩŋŋa awɔɔ ma.

A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, farizɛɛnrɔ ra! Bala, ganwʋrɛ bu hɔ awɔɔ n'a kam kan mantɩ, poobur kɩ, kan hɔ haay k'a nɩ haanm brikəro ʋ bɩ kɩ. A bɔkarɛ a kaanm Woso tɩrgabaa bɩ m kan a ŋʋarɛ bɩ kɩ m. Bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m, a ba, a bɔɔ ɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ ba sɔ.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, farizɛɛnrɔ ra! Awɔɔ ɩ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, awɔɔ gʋɔɔ yaadarɛrɔ ŋʋa daasɩrɔ ʋ.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gəənoyaarɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tɔrɛ ŋ la, bɩ ŋ bɩr a dɔrɛ y."
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ deem a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wɔɔ sʋnsɔ ɩbɩɩ n'a wʋm sɔ."
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɔ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ ra, a pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ mɔrlɔ gorezannɔ kam gʋɔɔ ra, b'awɔɔ bɔkarɛ, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bɩr a nyʋkʋr deem taan••• dam mɔrlɔ wɔɔ duro ma y.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ yaarɔ dɔm bɩ minto, b'awɔɔ zɩrɔ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ a ʋ, awɔɔ yɛ ŋ zibəə bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ yɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, awɔɔ m bʋr an nɩ ŋ yaarɔ bɩmbankam.
Bɩ y'a ka Woso n a hɩ a mindɔrɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kan m zibəəzannɔ kɩ nyɔɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛrɛ ŋ barla, ŋnɩ zibəə bʋnyaa ba gɔsɩnnɔ m.
Bɩ minto bɩ, ŋ her gʋɔɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋrm, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ haay kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ hallɩ durnya darɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma lore minto.
A n a sa Abɛl ma lore ma, an ta m Zakarii k'a ga Wosocɛ ʋ, mannɩjaa bɩ kan bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ kɩ bire ʋ. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ her naa ʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro hʋnhʋrm minno nɔɔn duro minto.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ ra, awɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ cɛlɛnyɩ sa a nyaakʋm da. Awɔɔ n gasʋ a zim y, a bɔkarɛ an n'a nyam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ taa k'a gasʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu k'a bɔ b'ʋ bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ wuti ŋn'ɩ tatʋr bam kan nɔmaa kɩ, ŋn'ɩ laakarɔ do haay dɩndam han.
Ŋ n'ɩ dundom zi k'a ku a nyasʋ, a meerbaa deem nɔ ʋ.

Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ dɔrɛ ba ʋ a zɛ kʋ ra, hallɩ ŋn'ɩ tʋntɔm kʋ ra. Yeezuu n a sa, an n'a dɩndam a karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: "A n lɛ da haay bɩ, k'a dundo a zi kan farizɛɛnrɔ nyʋnyɔɔ kʋ zambʋ m bɩ kɩ.
Hɔ ba ʋ, an a nyaakʋm da, n b'a yɩrɛ y. Mim ba ʋ, an a nyaakʋm da, n b'a dɔrɛ y.
Hɔ k'awɔɔ hɩ monsigə ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a mam lɛɛgure ʋ. Awɔɔ n a hɩ tʋr ʋ cɛ ʋ bɩ, n bɔm garga ra ŋn'a hɩ."
"A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, m hannyɩnɔ: A bɩ nyi ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɛsim zɛm gər, bɩ, ŋ b'a dam hɔsɩ ma ŋn'a ba bɩ jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
Hɔ k'awɔɔ a ga m a nyi ba m bɩ, kʋ m a hɩnka a m: K'a nyi ba Woso k'a a da ma an gər zɛ, bɩ jɛ ʋ an a da ma, an ɩ gasʋ sɛhar ʋ bɩ m. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m a nyi ba m.
N bɩr bɛnnɔ nyɩnɔ hɛɛnm soor, k'a tanka hɩɩya yɩ ra? Bɩ deem taan••• tɔ bɩr bɔm Woso nɔ ʋ y.
B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ minkə bɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ sa haay. A da bɩ bɔ y, awɔɔ jɩra bɛnnɔ nyɩnɔ m jilli."
"A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʋ gʋaa kasɛtɩ ka gʋɔɔ taa, a ʋ, mɔɔ gʋaa n'a mɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ y'a kasɛtɩ kam Woso malɛɛkarɔ taa sɔ.
Bɩ kʋ gʋaa bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gʋɔɔ taa, mɔɔ bɩsɩ kam ma Woso malɛɛkarɔ taa sɔ.
Gʋaa k'a meerbaa bʋnyaa ba Gʋaanyɩ bɩ ma, a y'a sugur yɩm. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a meerbaa bʋnyaa ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma, a b'a sugur yɩrɛ y.
Kʋ ŋ bʋr, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ awɔɔ m yaadarɛcɛrɔ ʋ, gɛɛ cinno taa, gɛɛ taralɛɛzannɔ taa, a b'a heer kɔ kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a hɩm k'a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔm bɩ kɩ y.
Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, a hɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ."
Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, a hɩ mɔɔ danyɩ bɩ m k'an wɔɔ zɩ arzaka niŋŋə k'a a to bɩ jir kan mɔɔ kɩ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Nka ɩ lɛ ka kʋ mɔɔ n nyɩnta awɔɔ dʋdɔkarɛzaa gɛɛ awɔɔ hɔjirlezaa?"
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi kan arzaka ŋʋarɛ kɩ. Bala, gʋaa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ bɩr zum kʋ ʋ kan a arzaka kɩ y, baa kʋ arzakazaa m."
A n hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Arzakazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a hɔsɩra n hɔ ba mɩŋŋa.
A n n'a hɔɔn darɛ a heer ʋ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ y'a bam lɔ? Bala, bɩncɛ ba mɔɔ ʋ, m nɩ m hɔyaa bɩ zarŋ ʋ y.
A n n'a hɩ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ ba n nɩ: kʋ m m sɩrɔ wɔɔ zɔ haay, m ŋ banka m ŋ dɔ gʋta-gʋta, m m hɔyaa bɩ zar ʋ kan m arzaka bɩ kɩ.
Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ m mɩŋŋa m, mɔɔ ʋ: Ba ɩ n nɩ arzaka gʋta m na, dɔɔraa hɔka-hɔka minto. Mɛnyɔɔ da, hɔ bɩ, ɩ hɔ mi, k'ɩ heer nyɔɔ.
Bɩ, Woso a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Hɔɔnwarzaa ra, ɩbɩɩ gam gum naa ʋ. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ banka haay bɩ, nka n n'a sarɛ?'
Ncɩnaaʋ m kan gʋaa k'a arzaka gʋr an n'a kuntəre a mɩŋŋa tɔ ma, an bɔkarɛ hɔntazaa bɛɛ m Woso mɩm ʋ y."
Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: "Naa minto y'a ka mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a b'a heer kɔ kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a bɩm k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba bɩ mim kɩ y, a b'a heer kɔ kan huu k'awɔɔ n n'a dure a ma bɩ mim kɩ sɔ y.
Bala, mɩsɩrbaa lɛ da hɔbɩrɛ m, mɛsim n lɛ da huu m.
K'a dɩga kaakaarɔ ma, ŋ bɩr hɔ duure y, bɩ ŋ bɩr a darɛ y. Ŋ ba hɔbɩrɛ kuntəjɩ nɩ y, ŋ ba sɩ m sɔ y. Bɩ Woso yɩ ŋ tʋrm. Awɔɔ jɩra bɛnnɔ m gallɛm hɔka!
Gʋaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʋ, an n'a dam ma, an a mɩsɩrbaa nyɔɔ lɛɛ poore a heerkɔrɛ minto?
K'awɔɔ b'a dam a poore bɩ barɛ ma bɩ, bɔ minto m, awɔɔ n n'a heer kɔm kan bɔ ɩ gɔɔta haay bɩ kɩ?
K'a dɩga burvuro kʋ ŋ nɩ haanm hɔsɩra ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋ bɩr lannɩ nɔɔrɛ, ŋ bɩr huu barɛ y, bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Salomɔɔn kan a cirbəə bɩ kɩ, a n huuro gʋɛrɛrɔ yɩ an burvuro nɔɔn duro deem nɩ y.
Kʋ Woso ɩ bur gʋɛrɛ dam ma ncɩnaaʋ her, booti m kʋ sɛ n a bɩ, a bɩ dɩgarɛ awɔɔ mim ma gʋta an lɛ da ra, sɩrakarɛ poore zannɔ ra?
B'awɔɔ, a b'a mɩŋŋa da kɔrɛ ma a a ka hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a bɩm, kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a mim bɩ kɩ ma y.
Naa haay naa, durnya gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yaa dam nɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋ ma. B'awɔɔ Zɩ Woso a dɔ a ʋ, a zibəə ta awɔɔ ma.
Bɩ, k'a ka Woso cirbəə bɩ ma. A n nɩ bɔ ɩ gɔɔta bɩ darɛ awɔɔ m la."
"Awɔɔ k'a bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔbɩsɩ cir poore kɩ bɩ, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Bala, a awɔɔ Zɩ bɩ nɔ yɩ, k'a a cirbəə bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ."

"K'a hɔ k'an ta awɔɔ ʋ bɩ hɛɛ, a ka cicirzannɔ ʋ. K'a a ka busoohɛra k'a bɩr zarm bɩ ma, kan arzaka k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ arzana ʋ bɩ kɩ. B'ʋ bɩ, ŋ nyaanlɛ ba ʋ y. Konno b'a dam ma ŋn'a sa, bɛɛ b'a dam ma an a bɩ y.
Bala, bɩncɛ k'awɔɔ arzaka bɩ n ta ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ heer bɩ, b'an ta ʋ sɔ."
"K'a hɔsoaʋ sa, a so a ʋ, k'a sɛ da a fɩtɩrɛ ʋ.
K'a a ba amba zibəənyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ dɔm a harzaa k'a ta harcɩntarɛ cibsa ma rɔ wɔɔ m. Kʋ harzaa b'a bɔ an nɩ zɛrɛ, k'a bɩ lee ku an cɛlɛ zɛ, k'a gʋ m.

Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m zibəənyɩnɔ nɔɔn duro m, kʋ ŋ harzaa bɩ bʋr, an bɩ dɩga a ŋ n hinceem ba y. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a y'a hɔsoaʋ sarɛ, an a so a ʋ an ŋ nyɩnta hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, an hɔbɩrɛ sa a zim an b'a ka ŋ ʋ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, k'a bɔ an bʋr dibsir ma gɛɛ dɔmɩrɛ m, a n a ya, an bɩ dɩga a ŋ n hinceem ba y.
K'a mim naa do jɩ ma mɩŋŋa. Kʋ harzaa bɩ, kʋ koor zɛrɛ dɔmɩm a dɔ, a b'a tom an gasʋ a cɛ ʋ y.
Awɔɔ sɔ, k'a a banka mɩŋŋa. Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'awɔɔ bɩr a hɔɔn dam ma b'ʋ."
Pɩyɛɛr n a lar, a ʋ: "Zuuba, wɔɔ minto ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do dam gɛɛ, gʋaa haay minto nɩ?"
Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Nka m zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa, a hɔɔn n ta ʋ? Bɔ harzaa lɛ ka ʋ k'an dɩga a har bɩ mim ma, k'an hɔbɩrɛ ka a muno wɔɔ ʋ dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a a ga m b'ʋ bɩ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m zibəənyɩ bɩ do m, kʋ harzaa a wusigə, an bʋr a har ʋ, an bɩ dɩga a a y'a zibəə lɛ ra.
Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, harzaa bɩ y'a dɔm a arzaka bɩ haay ma.
Bɩ kʋ zibəənyɩ bɩ do a hɩ a heer ʋ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ harzaa bɩ bɩr zɛm zɔɔ y, an wuti an n'a zibəənyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ zɛrɛ, kan zibəənyɩlʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ hɔ bɩrɛ an nɩ hɔ mire a mɩm nɩ durgəre.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ do harzaa bɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr hin niŋŋə k'a n a hɔɔn da ma b'ʋ, kan wakatɩ k'a n a dɔ a ʋ a zɛm bɩ kɩ ʋ. A lam la, an fɩr ka ma mɩŋŋa, an a da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr zum Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla.
Zibəənyɩ k'a hɔ k'a harzaa lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ bɩ, b'a bɩr a mɩŋŋa bankam, b'a bɩr bɩ hɔɔnhɔ barɛ, a zɛrɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa.

Bɩ bɔ ɩ nɩ hɔ k'a harzaa lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ an bɔkarɛ an nɩ zi k'a a ga zɛrɛ m bam bɩ, a bɩ zɛrɛ yɩm gʋta y. Bɩ bɔ n y'a ka ʋ gʋta bɩ, n y'a laaka dam han gʋta. Bɔ n y'a ka ʋ gʋta k'an dɔ ma bɩ, n y'a sim han gʋta sɔ."
"Bʋr mɔɔ ʋ sɛ m tara burə ʋ. A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm paan••• k'an yɔ.
Fɩryɩrɛ n ta ʋ an nɩ mɔɔ yɩm. A gore ta ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ, b'a mɔɔ ku an nya.
A hɔɔn awɔɔ n'a darɛ a ʋ laafɩɩ mɔɔ bʋr m tara burə ʋ ra? Ayy•••, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, bʋr mɔɔ ʋ gʋngʋ kʋ ma m.
Bala, naa ma kɛɛrɛ naa, kʋ gʋaa soor ɩ har deem ʋ, ŋ y'a gʋngʋm kʋ ma, gʋaa kaakʋ y'a gʋm gʋaa hɩɩya ma, gʋaa hɩɩya n a gʋ gʋaa kaakʋ ma.
Zɩ y'a gʋrɛ a nyɩ ma, nyɩ n a gʋ a zɩ ma. Da y'a gʋrɛ a nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ ma, nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ n a gʋ a da ma. Da y'a gʋrɛ a nyar ma, nyar y'a gʋrɛ a da ma."
A n a ya, an a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ warkʋ yɩ an jɩm meer ʋ, b'awɔɔ hɩ lɛɛm a ʋ: la n nɩ zɛm, b'a kʋ yɩm maam.
K'awɔɔ hɩnhɛr yɩ an a to jɩsadɔpaasɩ an nɩ hɔnrɛ, b'awɔɔ ʋ lɛɛ ma m, b'a kʋ yɩm maam.
Zambʋzannɔ ra, awɔɔ ba lɔ a brama kan tara kɩ minno dɔ, a bɔkarɛ a n dɔmɩm k'an ta ʋ dɩɩtaa naa mim dɔ?"
"Bɔ m sɔ b'awɔɔ bɩr hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ dʋdɔ karɛ a zim nɩ y?
K'ɩbɩɩ jɩm ɩ tarɛ ɩ m dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ tɔ ʋ a kʋ ma zaa ra, k'a bɩ ta ɩ m dʋdɔkər taa y, kʋ dʋdɔkər bɩ b'ɩbɩɩ ka lɔnnɔdɔmazannɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ y.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: N b'ɩbɩɩ bɔm lɔnnɔcɛ b'ʋ k'ɩbɩɩ n zɩm bɩ ka haay ɩ nya y. Baa tanka deem bɩ gɔɔtarɛ y."
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ Galilee gʋɔɔ kʋ Pɩlatɩ a ka ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ ŋ mannɩbarɛ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ mim hɩ Yeezuu m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, Galilee zannɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ naa mimbʋnyaabənno gʋtɔɔ m ŋnɩ lɛ da Galilee gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ ra gɛ?
Ayy•••, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam y, gɩnga awɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ.
Bɩ, gʋaa bueeresinnyə kʋ Silowee cɛjintə a da ŋ la, an ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, mimbʋnyaabənno m an lɛ da Zerizalɛm gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ ra gɛ?
Ayy•••, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam y, gɩnga awɔɔ nawʋm haay am brɔɔ hɔ bɩ m."
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a sɔɔn n ta ʋ a dɩvɛnsɩra ʋ. A n bʋr k'a b'a bɔ, b'a n bɩ hɔsɩ yɩ y.
A n a hɩ hɔsɩra zibəəzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: A dɔɔraa kaakʋ hɔ m naa, mɔɔ n tɩr bʋr kʋ m b'a bɔ, bɩ mɔɔ n tɩr a nyɩ yɩ y. A da! Bɔ m an tara si an a so ʋ b'a zibəə ba ʋ y?
Bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Karɩnsaamba, ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ to dɔɔraa deem, kʋ m yaa hɔn, m a bɩr ma, kʋ m buundi da ma.
A a da ma, an bɩ nyɩ da dɔɔraa m, k'a bʋr a n nyɩ da y, k'ɩ ka kʋ n n'a da."
Yeezuu nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ dɩndam sokʋmacɛ ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ.
Lʋ ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ zinə n a ka, an a huŋŋu a dɔɔraa bueeresinnyə hɔ m naa. A b'a dam ma an jɩm brama tɩrga y.
Yeezuu k'a a yɩ bɩ, a a bir, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Lʋ, ɩ ɩ waa, ɩ yaaba bɩ nya."
A n a wɔ ka a mim la. Lɛɛm bɩ, lʋ b'a ba tɩrga, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.

Sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ k'a a yɩ Yeezuu n lʋ bɩ waa sabaa hinni ʋ bɩ, a nɔ ma ʋ. A meerbaa bɩ si, an a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ n ta ʋ, gʋɔɔ n a da ma, ŋnɩ zi ba. Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro awɔɔ a ga m, a bʋr, ŋn'a waa, sabaa hinni ʋ bɛɛ y."
Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zambʋzannɔ ra! Awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə bɩr a der zarm, gɛɛ, a bra, k'a yaa ka hi ma sabaa hinni ʋ ra?
Bɩ lʋ naa do Abraham yaŋŋa m, zinə n yaaba da ma a dɔɔraa bueeresinnyə hɔ m naa, sabaa hinni bɛɛ a a ga m, n n a bɔ bar ma ra?"
K'a naa hɩ bɩ, nyannɩ a jɩnnɔ wɔɔ haay nyasʋ. Zamaa bɩ n'a heer nyɔɔm kan zibəə gʋtɔɔ haay k'a n'a bam bɩ kɩ.
A a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan bɔ kɩ? A makra mɔɔ n'a bam kan bɔ kɩ?
Bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan mutardɩ yaa kʋ gʋaa n'a sam, an n'a duum a brikə ʋ bɩ kɩ. A n haan, an a ba gɔ gʋta, bɛnnɔ nɩ cɛ kɩnkarɛ a vəŋŋəro ma."
A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ makra mɔɔ n'a bam kan bɔ kɩ?
A makra mɔɔ n'a bam kan nyʋnyɔɔ kʋ lʋ n'a sam, an n'a warm kʋ ma kan koŋŋo kaakʋ nyisi kɩ, an nɩ derm haay."
Yeezuu bɔ kʋrɔ ʋ kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ kɩ ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam, an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm zeezi.
Gʋaa deem n a lar, a ʋ: "Zuuba, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ gʋta nɩ?"
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a a tɔ ʋ k'a gasʋ hallɛ poore bɩ m. Bala, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ gʋta y'a kam ma k'a gasʋ m, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma y.
Kʋ harzaa bɩ bɩ wuti, an hallɛ bɩ ta, awɔɔ gɔɔtam garga ra, awɔɔ ba n bɩr cɛlɛ zɛrɛ, a bɩr a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Zuuba, cɛlɛ gʋ wɔɔ m. A y'a nyɩ bɔrɛ awɔɔ nʋ, a ʋ: Awɔɔ, mɔɔ n awɔɔ tojɩ dɔ y.
Awɔɔ y'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: Wɔɔ hɔ bɩ, ʋ hɔ mi kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ. Ɩbɩɩ hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m, ʋ daasɩrɔ ʋ.
B'a y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, a ʋ: Mɔɔ n awɔɔ tojɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ, k'a a gaa mɔɔ ma, awɔɔ haay k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ bam bɩ.
K'awɔɔ bɩ Abraham kan Izakkɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ yɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ, kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ awɔɔ n nɩ garga ra, a nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma baadarɛ kan sɔ sʋrɛ kɩ.
Gʋɔɔ y'a tom dɔjɩr kan meer kɩ ʋ, jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ nyɩnta ŋnɩ hɔ bɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, jɛzannɔ nyɩntam lɛɛkarɛzannɔ, lɛɛkarɛzannɔ n nyɩnta jɛzannɔ."
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ b'a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ta bɩncɛ vanta ʋ. Hɩrɔɔdɩ y'a kam ma k'a ɩbɩɩ zɛ."
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a yaa hɩ pooji naa do m: mɔɔ ɩ lam zinəro ra, m nɩ gʋɔɔ waam, her kan booti kɩ zizer kɩ, an nya.
Bɩ pakra m kʋ m ta lɛɛ her, kan booti kɩ zizer kɩ. Bala wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa b'a dam ma an ga bɩncɛ vanta ʋ kʋ Zerizalɛm nɔ bɛɛ y."

"Zerizalɛm, Zerizalɛm, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ zɩnzɛm, ɩ nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ bɩmbam jaarɔ m bɩ. Gallɛm karɔ, mɔɔ ŋʋa kʋ m ɩ nyɩnɔ so kʋ ma, amba kʋr tɩr a nyɩnɔ so kʋ ma a za taa bɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ n yɛ?
Dɩga! Woso y'a bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ y, an ta an dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba Woso tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ.' "
Yeezuu gasʋ farizɛɛnrɔ jɩtaarɛ deem har ʋ, sabaa hinni ʋ, k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ. Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ nɩ dundom zi.
Gʋaa deem ɩ bɩ jɩm Yeezuu lɛɛ, a mɛ n hɩnhanrɛ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ m kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ k'ʋ yaabazaa waa sabaa hinni ʋ gɛɛ, zaa ba ʋ y?"
Ŋ nɩ zɛ pi. Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Yeezuu n yaabazaa bɩ gaa, an a waa, an a da zaa ra.
Bɩ kur bɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʋ naa ʋ, a nyɩ, gɛɛ, a der n a da hiyəə ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ, a bɩ bra sire, an a bɔ ʋ lɛɛm nɩ?"
Bɩ ŋ n a da ma ŋn'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ y.
Yeezuu k'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ bir hɔbɩrɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ bʋmbɔŋ ʋ bɩ, a hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"Kʋ gʋaa ɩbɩɩ bir harcɩntarɛ cibsa ma, ɩ b'aa nyɩnta lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ y. Bala, a a da ma, a gʋaa vanta bir, an lɛ da ɩbɩɩ ra.
Gʋaa k'awɔɔ bir bɩ, a b'a ka, an b'a hɩ awɔɔ gʋaa hɩɩya bɩ m, a ʋ: toore ka ɩ mim b'ʋ y. Ɩbɩɩ zɛm bɩ wuti kan nyannɩ kɩ, ɩ ta jɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.

Bɩ kʋ n y'ɩbɩɩ bir hɔbɩrɛ ma, k'ɩ yaa nyɩnta jɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, gʋaa k'a ɩbɩɩ bir bɩ, k'a bɩ bʋr, a y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, a ʋ: M hannyɩ, ɩ zɔ lɛɛ bɩncɛ b'ʋ. A nyɩntarɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ busure gʋaa haay kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ bɩrɛ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ rɔ kɩ lɛɛ.
Bala, gʋaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa busum bɩ, n y'a zerm, bɔ n'a mɩŋŋa zerm bɩ, n y'a busum."
A n a hɩ gʋaa k'a a bir bɩ m sɔ, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ sinuu hɔbɩrɛ ba gɛɛ gunuu hɔ, ɩ b'ɩ hannyɩnɔ, gɛɛ, ɩ dogʋɔɔ, gɛɛ ɩ cɩsɔnnɔ arzakazannɔ kɩ bir y. Kʋ n bɛɛ, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ birm sɔ a zɩm ma, ŋn'a so a yaa ʋ.
Bɩ, k'ɩ cibsa hɔbɩrɛ ba, k'ɩ cicirzannɔ, paŋŋawarzannɔ, lʋgɔrɔ, bʋʋrɔ kɩ bir,
b'a nyɩntam mimbirenyɩnta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, bala, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋ n a ba, ŋ n a so a yaa ʋ y. Bala, Woso naa sompire ɩbɩɩ m, gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ."
Gʋaa deem k'a nyɩnta b'ʋ an naa haay ma bɩ, a a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ bɩ m."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa deem ɩ nyɩnta an cibsa gʋta hɔbɩrɛ ba. A n zamaa bir gʋta kʋ ŋ nɩ b'a bɩ.
Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ, a a zibəənyɩ nyɔɔ gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ bir hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ zi, a ʋ: K'a bʋr kɛɛrɛ, n hɔ haay banka, an nya.
Ŋ haay n a lɛ ba deem, ŋ ʋ: a b'a dam ma y. Lɛɛkarɛ zaa bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩ bɩ m, a ʋ: hɔsɩra mɔɔ si, pakra m kʋ m ta, m aa dɩga a. Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ sugur ba m ma.
A vanta n a hɩ, a ʋ: Dono mɔɔ n si bu, kʋ m aa nɩ ŋ makra ba ŋ dɩga a. Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han k'ɩ sugur ba m ma.
A vanta n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: lʋ mɔɔ sa daa, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ bɩ m dam ma, m bʋr y.

Zibəənyɩ bɩ k'a a wusigə bɩ, a yaa naa hɩ a harzaa bɩ m. Harzaa bɩ nɔ n ma ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: ta zɔɔ-zɔɔ kʋ bɩ daasɩrɔ ʋ, kan kʋ bɩ zaa bire rɔ kɩ, ɩ cicirzannɔ gaa kan paŋŋawarzannɔ kɩ, lʋgɔrɔ kɩ, bʋʋrɔ kɩ ɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ naa ʋ.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ n ta an a bɔ an bʋr an b'a hɩ, a ʋ: harzaa, ʋ lɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ka bɩ ba, bɩ lɛ gɔɔta.
Harzaa bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩ bɩ m, a ʋ: ta zaa poorero wɔɔ ra kan brikəro kɩ, ɩ ɩ ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma ɩ gasʋ ŋ nɩ, kʋ lɛ bɩ gɔɔta mɔɔ har b'ʋ y.
Bala, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ n bir lɔ wɔɔ, gʋaa deem taan••• ba ʋ an nɩ mɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ darɛ a lɛ ʋ y."
Bɩ jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ cir gʋta zu Yeezuu ʋ. A n a bɔ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"Kʋ gʋaa bʋr mɔɔ zi, a n mɔɔ ŋʋa an lɛ da a zɩ ra, kan a da kɩ, a lʋ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ, a cɛmbɔɔ kɩ, a danlʋrɔ kɩ, baa kan a mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa kɩ, a b'a dam ma an nyɩnta mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ y.
Gʋaa k'a bɩr a gɔdarkʋra busure an nɩ zum mɔɔ jɛ ʋ, a b'a dam ma an nyɩnta mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ y.
Kʋ sɩra nɩ, gʋaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʋ a lɛ n taa k'a cɛ gʋta dɔ, a n lɛɛ ka an nyɩnta, an busoo k'a n'a bɩm bɩ lɛ zɛ, an a dɔ, k'a cɛ bɩ dɔm gɛ ra?
Kʋ bɩ bɛɛ, k'a lɛɛ ka an a jɩr cɩnta b'a b'a dam ma an a nyambʋr y, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ n'a yɩm bɩ, ŋ yaa wʋm ma,
ŋnɩ bɩr a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: Ba gʋaa cɛ dɔrɛ sɩŋŋɩda sa na, b'a n a nyambʋr na.
Gɛɛ cir bɔ n ta ʋ, k'a ɩ tam k'a yaa yar ba kan cir vanta kɩ, a n lɛɛ ka an nyɩnta an dɩga, k'a y'a dam ma kan gʋaa tisi bu kɩ, a yar ba kan gʋaa k'a nɩ gʋaa m tisi buhɩra bɩ kɩ gɛ?
Kʋ bɩ bɛɛ, cir deem bɩ k'a gɔɔta an laatʋ bɩ, a gʋaa deem nyɔɔ n zi, an aa laafɩɩ mim dɩnda kan kɩ.
Ncɩnaaʋ sɔ bɩ, awɔɔ bire ʋ kʋ gʋaa lɛ baa k'a wɔ saa hɔ k'an ta m bɩ ma, a b'a dam ma an nyɩnta mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ y."
"Sɩra m, yɛ k'an naa, hɔ mɩŋŋa m. Bɩ kʋ yɛ nyɩntabaa bɩ bɔ, bɔ n'a yarɛ an bʋr a nyɩntabaa bɩ nɩ?
A bɩ mɩŋŋa tara minto, b'a bɩ yɩm buundi sɔ y. A lo n nawʋm garga ra. Gʋaa k'a nɩ tʋr m k'an a ma."
Yawʋrsinno kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ haay a zɔ Yeezuu ma, k'a a tʋr ka ma.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ nɩ kukur barɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do ɩ mimbʋnyaabənno sim, an nɩ hɔ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ."
Bɩ Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"Gʋaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʋ, a seero n ta ʋ zɔrɔ, deem n nyaam, a bɩ bunɛɛhʋ a yaa n nɛɛhʋ rɔ wɔɔ tom a hɔbɩjɩ ʋ, an ta an aa a ka deem bɩ ma, an tolle ba an a yɩ?
Bɩ, k'a a yɩ, a busu an nawʋm kan heernyɩnta kɩ a kɔɔn ra.
K'a lee ku har ʋ, an a hannyɩnɔ so kʋ ma kan a cɩsɔnnɔ kɩ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: k'a heer nyɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bala mɔɔ m ser k'a nyaam bɩ yɩ.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, heernyɔɔ nyɩntaŋ ʋ gʋta arzana ʋ, mimbʋnyaabər deem k'a a bɔ a taam bɩ tɔ ma, an lɛ da gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ bunɛɛhʋ a yaa nɛɛhʋ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ heerlʋrlɛ zibəə ba ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ ra."
"Gɛɛ lʋ bɩ kara n ta ʋ, a wanzurfu m bu, deem n nyaam, a bɩ sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʋ, an cɛ bɩ waa, an a ka ma mɩŋŋa an tolle ba an a yɩ?
Bɩ k'a a yɩ, a y'a hannyɩnɔ som kʋ ma, kan a cɩsɔnnɔ kɩ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: K'a heernyɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bala mɔɔ m wanzurfu k'a nyaam bɩ yɩ.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, heernyɔɔ ta ʋ Woso malɛɛkarɔ zi mimbʋnyaabər deem k'a n'a bɔrɛ a taam tɔ ma."
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a nyɩnɔ hɩɩya.
A poore bɩ n a hɩ a zɩ m, a ʋ: M zɩ, arzaka k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m bɩ, a jir, k'ɩ m hɔ ka m ʋ. Ŋ zɩ bɩ n arzaka k'an ta m bɩ jir ŋ nɩ.
A dɔmɩm k'a yɩ poore bɩ, nyɩ poore b'a hɔ bɩ gʋr an a hɛɛ, an ta zaa ra, kʋ laatʋrɛ ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, a yaa a arzaka bɩ zar zibəəro bʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ.
K'a a zar an a nya bɩ, nɔ gʋta a da kʋ b'ʋ, cicir n a nyasʋ.
A n ta, an nɩ zi bam kan tara bɩ gʋaa deem kɩ, bɩ n a nyɔɔ kurkuuro dɔ ma ʋ a hɔsɩra ʋ.
A mɩŋŋa a ŋʋa k'a hɔbɩrɛ kʋ kurkuuro wɔɔ n'a bɩm bɩ bɩ, k'an a ka. Bɩ gɔsɩ bɩr a kaŋ ʋ y.
A n bɩ, an nyɩnta an a hɔɔn da, a ʋ: Mɔɔ zɩ zibəəzannɔ gʋta, ŋn'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ a mɩsɩ nɩ gɔɔtam, mɔɔ n bʋr kɛɛrɛ, m nɩ gam nɔ ma naa ʋ.
Mɔɔ tarɛ m zɩ zi, m aa a hɩ m, mɔɔ m zar Woso kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ ma.
Mɔɔ n m ga m, ɩbɩɩ n ɩ ya, ɩ mɔɔ bir ɩ nyɩ y. Mɔɔ ba am ɩ zibəəzannɔ gʋaa deem hɔ bɩ m.
A n a bɔ an nɩ doore a zɩ bɩ zi. K'a gɔɔta an laatʋ bɩ, a zɩ bɩ n a to an a yɩ, a cicir n a nyasʋ. A n bra si, an aa a wɔ burgu ma, an a lɛ dɔrɛ.
A nyɩ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: M zɩ, mɔɔ mim zar Woso kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ ma, mɔɔ n m ga m, k'ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ mɔɔ bir ɩ nyɩ y.
B'a zɩ b'a hɩ a zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: K'a ba zɔɔ, a bʋr huu k'a gʋɛrɛ lɛ da bɩ m, a b'a du ma. K'a bʋr tolleŋŋa m a da a nyʋkʋm ma, k'a kʋsɔrɔ da a gam ʋ.
K'a bʋr dinnyɛɛm ka mɛ ka bɩ m, a zɛ k'ʋ a bɩ, k'ʋ ʋ heer nyɔɔ,
bala, mɔɔ nyɩ k'a nyɩnta an ga bɩ, a a mɩm bɔ ʋ, a nyɩnta an nyaam, ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ a yɩ. Ŋ n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'ɩ cibsa barɛ.
A nyɩ jɩtaarɛ bɩ nyɩnta pooyaa ʋ. K'a a bɔ, an nɩ zɛm an a zɔ har ma bɩ, a bɩ kɔnnɩrɔ kan bintiiro kɩ nyi ma, kan sarbaa kɩ.
A n zibəənyɩ deem bir an laaka da a jɩ ma.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ dam bɩ y'a bɔ an bʋr, ɩbɩɩ zɩ bɩ n dinnyɛɛm k'ʋ wɔɔ tʋr bɩ zɛ, k'a a nyɩ bɩ yɩ kan laafɩɩ kɩ bɩ minto.
Nyɩ jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɔ n ma ʋ, a ʋ: A bɩ gasʋm har ʋ y. A zɩ bɩ n bɔ k'a yaa bir k'an bɩ gasʋ.
A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: Dɩga a, a dɔɔraa gʋta mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ zi bam, mɔɔ n kaanm ɩbɩɩ lɛ m deem nɩ y. B'ɩbɩɩ n binnyɛɛm ka mɔɔ ʋ cɩna m a zɛ, m cibsa ba m kan m hannyɩnɔ kɩ y.
B'ɩbɩɩ nyɩ k'a ɩbɩɩ arzaka gʋr, an aa a zar kan lannɔmɩŋŋaheenno kɩ an a bɔ an bʋr naa, ɩbɩɩ dinnyɛɛm k'a mɛ ka bɩ zɛ a minto.
A zɩ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: M nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay, hɔ haay k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ so ʋ.
Bala, a a ga m k'ʋ cibsa ba, k'ʋ ʋ heer nyɔɔ. Ɩbɩɩ dam bɩ k'a nyɩnta an ga, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ minto. Nyaam a ʋ, ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ a yɩ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Arzakazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, a zibəənyɩ n ta ʋ, an nɩ dɩgarɛ a hɔnyɩ mim ma. Gʋɔɔ n b'a hɩ arzakazaa bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: Awɔɔ zibəənyɩ bɩ y'awɔɔ arzaka bɩ zarm.
A n a bir, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: bɔ minto m n n'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩndam mɔɔ m, ncɩnaaʋ? Ɩ hɔcɩntarɛ ciro ka m ʋ, bala ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ yarɛ, ɩ mɔɔ zi bɩ ba y.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ n'a mɩŋŋa larm, a ʋ: Kʋ m a ba lɔ? Kʋ mɔɔ zuuba mɔɔ bɔ zibəə b'ʋ bɩ? Mɔɔ paŋŋa ba ʋ kʋ m dam wʋ ra? Hɔyɩnyɛrɛ nyannɩ ɩ mɔɔ zɛm.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a bam bɩ mɔɔ dɔ, kʋ m bɩ bɔ zibəə b'ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n m si a har ʋ.
A n gʋɔɔ kʋ zuuba bɩ zɩnnɔ ta ŋ lɛ rɔ wɔɔ bir deem-deem, an lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ lar, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ ta mɔɔ zuuba bɩ zɩm m karɔ?
Bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Nyɔɔ gər zɔrɔ. A n'a hɩ bɩ m, a ʋ: Ba ɩ sɩraci m na, a si, ɩ nyɩnta zɔɔ-zɔɔ ɩ gʋrsɩra ba busoor.
A n a ya, an a vanta lar, a ʋ: B'ɩbɩɩ, ɩ ta m karɔ? A ʋ: Hɔyaa yɔrgɔ zɔrɔ. Zibəənyɩ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: Ba ɩbɩɩ sɩraci n na, a gʋrsɩra ba businnyə.
Zuuba bɩ n a lɛ bɔ zibəənyɩ b'ʋ, zi k'a ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ tɔ ma. Her naa ʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn ka kan kʋ kɩ, an lɛ da lɛɛgurezannɔ wɔɔ ra."
"Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'a durnya arzaka bɩ sa a gʋaasɩbabaa da m gʋɔɔ ma. Dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a bʋr a b'awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, Woso y'awɔɔ sire a har ʋ.
Gʋaa k'a sɩra ba kan hɔ poore kɩ, a sɩra barɛ a gʋta m sɔ. Bɩ gʋaa k'a n sɩra ba hɔ poore m, a bɩ sɩra bam hɔ gʋta m sɔ y.
Bɩ minto bɩ, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ba kan durnya naa arzakarɔ kɩ y, nka nɩ hɔnyɩ paan••• bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ?
Bɩ k'awɔɔ n sɩra ba gʋaa hɔ m, nka n n'awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔ bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ?
Zibəənyɩ ba ʋ a n n'a dam ma, an zuubɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ zi ba y. A deem ŋʋarɛ, an sɔ deem m. Gɛɛ an bɩr kan deem kɩ, an kaanm deem m. Awɔɔ b'a dam ma a Woso ŋʋa, a busoo ŋʋa sɔ y."
Farizɛɛnrɔ busoo ŋuənno wɔɔ y'a tʋr kam naa haay ma, ŋn'ɩ yaa wʋrɛ a meerbaa bɩ ma.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A ka awɔɔ nawʋm ma k'a bɩr tɩrga gʋɔɔ mɩm ʋ. Bɩ Woso awɔɔ heer dɔ, bala, hɔ niŋŋə kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ bɩ, hɔ vəm m bɩ Woso mɩm ʋ.
Lɛrɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ ta an Zaan dɔmɩm ku. N y'a sɩŋŋɩda ba dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, n nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta pa dam, gʋaa haay n'a tɔŋ ʋ k'a gasʋ ʋ kan paŋŋa kɩ.
Brama kan tara kɩ cenle naanaa an lɛ da lɛ minnyɩ deem taan••• k'a nɩ gɔɔtam bɩ ra.
Bɩ y'a ka, gʋaa biyəə k'a nɩ larɛ a lʋ ra, an n'a vanta sam bɩ, jaandər m. Bɩ gʋaa k'a lʋ k'a zim la ra bɩ sa, jaandər m sɔ."
"Arzakazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, an nɩ huu wɩsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ ŋ kʋsɩ dure a ma, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ mɩŋŋa bɩrɛ dɔmɩm haay, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa nyɩnta bam.
Cicirzaa deem k'a tɔ m Lazaar bɩ nɩ wʋtam arzakazaa bɩ cɛlɛ ma, a mɛ haay bɩ, nyinno m.
A ɩ hɔbɩrɛ kuuro kʋ ŋ n'a lom arzakazaa bɩ hɔbɩrɛ gɔ bɩ ra bɩ ŋʋam k'a bɩ, b'a bɩr a yɩrɛ y. Kan naa kɩ haay, jino bʋr ŋn'a nyinno mɩmmɛɛsʋm.
Cicirzaa bɩ n bɩ ga. Malɛɛkarɔ n a busu ŋnɩ ta m Abraham jɩr ʋ. Arzakazaa bɩ m bɩ ga sɔ, n n a bir.
Gəəno bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, arzakazaa b'ɩ fɩr yɩm gʋta. A n a mɩm busu brama an a to an Abraham yɩ laatʋ, Lazaar n'a jɩr ʋ.
A n zee da, a ʋ: M zɩ Abraham, mɔɔ cicir zɛ, k'ɩ Lazaar nyɔɔ k'an a nyʋkʋm nyɔɔ hi ma k'an b'a tɔkʋ m nɛɛm la, k'an bɩsa, bala, mɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm gʋta sɛ naa do nɔ ʋ.
Abraham n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: M nyɩnnɩ, a tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta mɩŋŋa ɩ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, Lazaar n a bʋnyaa yɩ. Naa ma bɩ, a heernyɔɔ yɩ naa ʋ, ɩbɩɩ nɩ fɩr nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, yaa gʋta y'awɔɔ kan wɔɔ kɩ bire ʋ kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tom wɔɔ zeezi naa ʋ k'a ta awɔɔ zi rɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma, ŋnɩ cem y, awɔɔ zeezi sɔ, kʋ ŋ b'a da ma ŋnɩ bʋr naa ʋ y.
Arzakazaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: M zɩ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ Lazaar nyɔɔ mɔɔ zɩ har ʋ,
bala, mɔɔ danzannɔ ta ʋ soor, k'an aa a hɩ ŋ nɩ, kʋ brɔɔ bɩ bʋr fɩr yɩrɛ bɩncɛ naa do ʋ sɔ y.
Abraham n a hɩ m, a ʋ: Ŋ yɩ Moyiisi ciro m kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ hɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a tʋr ka ŋ lemim ma.
Arzakazaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: Ayy•••, m zɩ Abraham, kʋ gʋaa a to gəəno zi naa ʋ an ta b'ʋ, ŋ y'a bɔrɛ a taam.
Abraham n a hɩ, a ʋ: Kʋ ŋ n a tʋr ka Moyiisi ma kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, baa kʋ gʋaa a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, ŋ b'a sire y."
Yeezuu n a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Mim k'a a da ma an gʋaa do bɩ b'a dam ma, a n nyɩnta ʋ y. Bɩ, a pakra bam gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ m.
Kʋ n bar da jɛnlajaa ma, n n'a da a wer, n n'a da higʋta ʋ jɩra, nyɩnɔ poorero nɔɔn duro deem k'a n'a dam mim ʋ bɩ m.
K'a dundo a zi mɩŋŋa! K'ɩ danyɩ a zar ɩ ma, k'ɩ dʋndɔ, k'a a bɔ a taam, k'ɩ sugur ka ʋ.
Bɩ k'a zar ɩbɩɩ ma gallɛm saanhɩna hindeem ʋ, an tɩr a bɔ an bʋr ɩbɩɩ zi an b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ m bɔ m taam, sugur ka m ʋ, k'ɩ sugur ka ʋ."
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ Zuuba m, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ da ra."
Zuuba n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ, kʋ mutardɩ yaa a ku, awɔɔ y'a hɩm gɔ naa do m, a ʋ: Ɩ bɔɔta, ɩ yaa ɩ sɔɔn higʋta ʋ, b'a y'awɔɔ lɛ sim."
"Gʋaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʋ naa ʋ, a zibəənyɩ n ta ʋ, an nɩ dam wʋm, gɛɛ, an nɩ dɔm hɔbɩsɩ ma. K'a a to poo ʋ, an bʋr, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: A ba zɔɔ ɩ bʋr, ɩ nyɩnta ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ?
A hɩ bɛɛ an nawʋrɛ, a ʋ: Hɔbɩrɛ ba gum naa ʋ, k'ɩ huuro da ɩ ra, ɩ sa ɩ ba ka m ʋ kʋ m a bɩ, kʋ m a mi, k'ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ bɩ, ɩ mi ra?
A yaa dam zibəənyɩ bɩ m barka ra? K'a a lɛ si an a zi bɩ ba bɩ minto ra? Mɔɔ n a si a yaa dam nɩ barka y.
A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ hɔ haay kʋ Woso lɛ ka awɔɔ ʋ k'a ba bɩ ba, k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bala, wɔɔ ʋ zibəə k'a a ga m bɩ ba."
Kʋ Yeezuu zaa sa an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm zeezi bɩ, bɔ a ʋ Galilee kan Samarii kɩ bire ʋ.
K'a nɩ gasʋm tara deem ʋ bɩ, kusiməro bu b'a zɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ jɩm laatʋ,
ŋn'a leer busu, ŋ ʋ: "Yeezuu, karɩnsaamba! Wɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
Yeezuu k'a ŋ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a yaa a hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbənno m." Kʋ ŋ y'a hʋr ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ yaa a waa zaa ra, dintim n gʋ ŋ ma.
Ŋ gʋaa deem k'a yɩ a laafɩɩ yɩ bɩ, a a wusigə an bʋr, an a leer busu, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
A n sʋnta Yeezuu taa, an a meer zuutə tara ʋ, an nɩ barka dam nɩ. Gʋaa bɩ, Samarii gʋaa m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa bu haay bɛɛ y'a waa dintim n gʋ ŋ ma ra? Bɩ nɛɛhʋ rɔ wɔɔ be?
Gɔsɩ n a bɔ ŋ bire ʋ k'a b'a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, kʋ saana naa do bɛɛ y."
A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti ɩ ta, ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ."
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n Yeezuu lar, ŋ ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛ an nawʋm brɔ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Woso cirbəə bɩ bɩr zɛrɛ, an nɩ yɩrɛ y.
N b'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: Woso cirbəə bɩ ba n nɩ, gɛɛ, a ɩ naa ʋ y!" A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ kɛɛrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a dɩga a, Woso cirbəə bɩ y'awɔɔ bire ʋ."
A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʋ: "Dɔmɩnnɔ ta ʋ ŋn'ɩ zɛm, awɔɔ n n'a ŋʋam k'a Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩ hindeem ʋ bala, b'awɔɔ ba yɩrɛ y.
N y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: A ba n nɩ, gɛɛ, a ɩ naa ʋ! A bɩ ta y, a b'a si a ta y.
Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm bɩ, zɛ an nawʋm amba brama tɩr nyakɩ bɔ dɔjɩr ʋ an ta meer ʋ bɩ m.
Bɩ, a lɛɛkarɛ an fɩr yɩ gʋta, her gʋɔɔ nɔɔn n kaanm m.
Hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba Nowee dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, a zɛm bɩ nyɩnta maam Gʋaanyɩ bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ:
Ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mim, ŋn'ɩ lʋ sam, ŋn'ɩ zim sam an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ Nowee gasʋ ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ bɩ ku. Bɩ, Woso a ka la gʋta n ba an ŋ bɩ haay.
Gɛɛ, am hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba Lɔttɩ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ hɔ bɩ m: Ŋ yɩ hɔ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mim, ŋn'ɩ hɔ sim, ŋn'ɩ hɔ hɛɛnm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ duum, ŋn'ɩ cɛ dɔm.
Bɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ Lɔttɩ bɔ ʋ Sodɔm ʋ bɩ, Woso a ka sɛ n a to brama, an ba am la hɔ bɩ m, an ŋ zɩnzɛ haay.
Gʋaanyɩ bɩ hɩnkarɛ hinni ʋ, a nyɩntam maam sɔ.
Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ cɛ mim ʋ a mɔdrɔ nɩ cɛ ʋ bɩ, a bɩ zer an gasʋ an ŋ gʋr y. A maam sɔ kan gʋaa k'a ta poo ʋ bɩ kɩ, a b'a bɔ an bʋr har ʋ y.
K'a Lɔttɩ lʋ bɩ mim tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a a meeyaa bʋmbɔ bɩ, a b'a yɩrɛ y. Bɩ gʋaa k'a yɛ zɛ ma mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a y'a meeyaa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, gum bɩ do ʋ, gʋaa hɩɩya y'a zɛm kʋ ra, ŋnɩ wʋta gargʋ deem la. N deem gaarɛ, n n deem to.
Lannɔ y'a zɛm kʋ ra hɩɩya, ŋn'ɩ bɩr jaa lɔm. N deem gaarɛ, n n deem to." [
Kʋ gʋaa hɩɩya ɩ hɔsɩra ʋ: N deem gaam, n nɩ deem to.]
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, a nyɩntam ka?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Bɩncɛ kʋ sim n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ bɩ, bɩncɛ bɩ do gɔbɩrgʋrɔ n n'a som kʋ ma ʋ."
Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a a ga m kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa da dɔmɩm haay, bɩ ŋ bɩ kɔ kan yaadarɛ bɩ kɩ y.
A a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Dʋdɔkər ɩ nyɩnta tara deem nɔ ʋ, a bɩr nyi bam Woso nɩ y, a bɩr gʋɔɔ daŋ ʋ sɔ y.
Zoro nɩ tara bɩ do nɔ ʋ, an nɩ zɛm tee••• an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Gumə ka m ʋ mim kʋ mɔɔ jɩm bɩ n ta m kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Dʋdɔkər bɩ n a gu, gallɛm hɔka. Bɩ kur bɩ, a n n'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: Baa kʋ mɔɔ bɩr nyi bam Woso m, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr gʋɔɔ daŋ ʋ sɔ,
lʋ naa do k'a bʋr an nɩ mɔɔ kɔm bɩ, mɔɔ y'a dʋdɔ bɩ karɛ, m gumə ka ʋ, k'a bɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi dɔ dɔmɩm haay, an bɩr mɔɔ kɔrɛ y."
Zuuba n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a tʋr ka, hɔ kʋ dʋdɔkər bʋnyaa b'a hɩ bɩ ma mɩŋŋa.
Bɩ, Woso b'a darɛ a gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ ŋn'ɩ zee dam zi sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ han ra? A maasɩrɛ bam, an bɔkarɛ an a da ŋ han ra?
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, a y'a darɛ ŋ han zɔɔ-zɔɔ. Bɩ kʋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bɩ bʋr, a zɛm bɩ sɩrakarɛ yɩ tara burə ʋ ra?"
Yeezuu hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n'a mɩ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a muno bɔŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ:
"Gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ k'a yaa da. Gʋaa deem bɩ farizɛn m, deem bɩ yawʋrsirezaa m.
Farizɛn bɩ n jɩm brama an nɩ yaa darɛ a heer ʋ ncɩnaaʋ: Woso, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m barka kʋ mɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ konno, mimbʋnyaabənno, jaandənno, gɛɛ yawʋrsir naa do kɩ minto.
Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ kʋsɩm gallɛm hɩɩya dɔmɩm saanhɩna nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔnyɩ haay nɔ ʋ mɔɔ y'a bu hɔ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ.
Yawʋrsir bɩ n jɩm laatʋ, a lɛ baa k'a a mɩm busu brama y, an n'a cɩ zɛrɛ k'a a heerzar hɩnka, a ʋ: Woso, mɔɔ cicir zɛ, bala, mimbʋnyaabər m mɔɔ m.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, a tɩrgabaa yɩ Woso mɩm ʋ, an a bɔ an doo, deem bɩ n a yɩ y. Bala, gʋaa k'a n'a busum bɩ, n y'a zerm tara ʋ, bɩ gʋaa k'a a mɩŋŋa zer bɩ n y'a busum."
Gʋɔɔ bʋr nyɩnɔ poorero m Yeezuu zi k'an a wɔ ka ŋ mim la. Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ.
Yeezuu n a ka ŋnɩ bʋr nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ to ŋnɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi, a b'a ta ŋ nɩ toore y, bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a so Woso cirbəə b'ʋ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a n Woso cirbəə bɩ si am nyɩ poore hɔ bɩ m bɩ, a bɩ gasʋŋ ʋ y."
Cir deem Yeezuu lar, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba mɩŋŋa, bɔ mɔɔ n'a barɛ kʋ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ birm mɩŋŋa? Gʋaa mɩŋŋa ba ʋ kʋ Woso y'a deem bɛɛ y.
Ɩbɩɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ ra? Ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɩ ŋʋaar kasɛtɩ ka y, ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ."
Gʋaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ naa haay ba m nyɩbaa ma tee•••."
Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ deem ɩ gɔɔta ɩbɩɩ ma k'ɩ ba: Hɔ k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ hɛɛ haay ɩ jinjir ŋʋazannɔ m, k'ɩ bʋr ɩ zu mɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ arzaka yɩm arzana ʋ."
Kʋ gʋaa bɩ naa ma bɩ, a heer a zar, bala, a arzaka bɩ gʋta.
Yeezuu k'a a heerzarlɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Arzakazannɔ Woso cirbəə gasʋʋrɛ yɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.
Sɩra m, yoonde huuka yaa gasʋʋrɛ nyɩntam naanaa, an lɛ da arzakazaa Woso cirbəə gasʋʋrɛ m."
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam ma rɔ wɔɔ a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, nka m nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Hɔ kʋ gʋaa b'a dam ma an a ba bɩ, a naanaa Woso ma."
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Dɩga, wɔɔ hɔ haay to, ʋ zu ɩbɩɩ ʋ."
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa k'a a har to, kan a lʋ kɩ, a danyɩnɔ kɩ, a zɩrɔ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə minto,
a naa haay yɩm gʋta an lɛ da durnya naa do nɔ ʋ, b'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩm durnya k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nɔ ʋ sɔ."
Yeezuu bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ba wɔɔ nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʋ na, bɩ, hɔ haay kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a gʋrsɩra ba Gʋaanyɩ bɩ minto bɩ kʋ yɩm.
N y'a nyasʋm, n n'a ka kɩfɩɩrɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa wʋ ma, kʋ ŋ n'a sʋnsɔ wʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ lihi dɩnda ma,
kʋ ŋ n'a zɛ madɩɩrɔ m, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a zɛ gər, b'a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ."
Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n hɔsɩ jɩ ma y. Mim naa do a nyaakʋm da ŋ nɩ, ŋ n hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ jɩ dɔ y.
K'a ta, an n'a zɔm Zeriko ma bɩ, bʋʋ deem ɩ nyɩnta zaa lezi b'ʋ, an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm.
Zamaa k'a bʋr an nɩ cenim an a ma bɩ, a laaka da kʋ bɔ m gɛ.
N n a hɩ m, n ʋ: "Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu nɩ cenim."
A n zee da, a ʋ: "Davɩd Nyɩ, Yeezuu, m cicir zɛ!"
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyaa bam kan kɩ ŋ ʋ, an zɛ pi. A n a banka an zee da an lɛ da biisi ra, a ʋ: "Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ cicir zɛ!"
Yeezuu n jɩm, an lɛ ka kʋ ŋ n'a gaa, ŋn'ɩ bʋr m. K'a a zɔ bɩ, Yeezuu a lar, a ʋ:
"Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ kʋ mɔɔ n a ba ɩbɩɩ minto?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, a ka kʋ m mɩm n a ya an lɛɛ yɩ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'ɩ mɩm n a ya an lɛɛ yɩ! Ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʋmbɔ."
Lɛɛm bɩ, a mɩm a gʋ, an nɩ lɛɛ yɩm, an zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ. Zamaa bɩ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ sɔ.
Yeezuu gasʋ Zeriko ʋ, an nɩ kʋ bɩ zɛm la.
Gʋaa nɩ b'ʋ a tɔ m Zasee, yawʋrsinno cir m, arzakazaa m sɔ.
A n n'a kam Yeezuu ma k'a yɩ, kʋ nka m, k'a a dɔ. Zamaa bɩ minto, kʋ gʋaa kutiim m bɩ, a b'a dam ma, a n a yɩ y.
A n bra si an ta lɛɛ, an aa der gɔ ra, kʋ Yeezuu bʋr an nɩ cenim b'ʋ, k'a yɩ.
Kʋ Yeezuu lee ku bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, a a bɔɔta an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zasee, a ba zɔɔ ɩ zer, bala, mɔɔ cɩnta kʋ m zer ɩbɩɩ har ʋ her."
Zasee n zer zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an a si kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Kʋ zamaa bɩ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋn'ɩ kukur barɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Zer a ʋ mimbʋnyaabər har ʋ."
Zasee n a zɔ Zuuba ma an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɩga, Zuuba, mɔɔ yɩ m arzaka bɩ haay, zɛkumbir sam, m a ka cicirzannɔ ʋ, bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ mim zu ʋ gʋaa ma, mɔɔ y'a sompim nʋ gallɛm si."
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋmbɔrɛ gasʋ har naa do ʋ her, bala, gʋaa naa do Abraham yaŋŋa m sɔ.
Bala, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ bʋr a ʋ, an b'a ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ ma, an ŋ bʋmbɔ."
Kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'a tʋr kam a meerbaarɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ. Bala, a a zɔ Zerizalɛm ma. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ dɩgam ma, ŋ ʋ, Woso cirbəə bɩ y'a hɩnkarɛ a m b'ʋ lɛɛm.
Bɩ y'a ka Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Cir nyɩ deem ɩ ta kʋ laatʋ ʋ k'a yaa cirbəə bɩ, k'a bɔ a bʋr.
A n a zibəənyɩnɔ bir bu, an busoo jir ŋ nɩ minnɩ deem-deem, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: 'K'a zi ba m, k'an ta an mɔɔ wusigəre dɔmɩm ku.'
B'a gʋrgazannɔ wɔɔ sɔ m, ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ a jɛ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a a hɩ cirbəə karɛzaa bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Wɔɔ lɛ baa k'an a so wɔɔ ʋ y.'
K'a yaa cirbəə bɩ bɩ an bʋr bɩ, a a ka ŋnɩ zibəənyɩnɔ k'a busoo jinjir ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ bir a taa, k'a dɩga a kʋ bɔ zi ŋ y'a ba m gɛ.
Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n bʋr, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, minnɩ deem k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, minnɩ bu y'a da ra.'
A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa n'ɩbɩɩ m, bala, ɩbɩɩ noonhubaa hɩnka hɔ poorero nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ cirbəə karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ so tara bu ʋ.'
A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n b'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ busoo bɩ nyɩ da minnɩ soor.
A n a hɩ bɩ m sɔ, a ʋ: Ɩ so tara soor ʋ.'
A vanta n bʋr, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, ba ɩbɩɩ busoo bɩ n na, pɛɛra mɔɔ burgu ma, m a nyaakʋm da.'
Mɔɔ ɩ nyi barɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ heer kʋsɩrabaa bɩ minto. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n a cɩnta bɩ ɩbɩɩ n n'a sam. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n a duu bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n n'a dam.
A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa meerbaa bɩ mɔɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ dʋdɔ yarm ma, zibəənyɩ bʋnyaa. 'Ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʋ: gʋaa kʋsɩ m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ nɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n a cɩnta bɩ sam, m nɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n a duu bɩ dam.
Bɔ minto, ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ busoo bɩ cɩnta busoo cɛ ʋ y? Kʋ mɔɔ m bɔ, m bʋr kʋ m bɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩ?'
A n a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'K'a busoo bɩ yɔ m, a ka gʋaa k'an ta m bu b'ʋ.'
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: 'Zuuba, a lɛɛ ka an a yɩ bu.'
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, gʋaa biyəə k'an ta hɔ m bɩ, n y'a kaŋ ʋ, gʋaa k'a ba m bɩ, baa k'a ta m poore bɩ, n y'a yɔm nɩ.
Mɔɔ jɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ ŋʋa kan cirbəə kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a bʋr ŋ nɩ mɔɔ taa naa ʋ, a ŋ zɩnzɛ."
Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ bɩ, a ka ŋ lɛɛ an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʋ.
K'a ta an n'a zɔm Bɛtfazee ma kan Betanii kɩ, Oliviyee ci bɩ zeezi bɩ, a a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta kʋ k'a nɩ lɛɛ naa ʋ. K'awɔɔ ta an nɩ gasʋm, awɔɔ brapoo yɩm n n'a kʋsɩ, bɩ gɔsɩ n da ʋ cɩna y. K'a hʋr a bʋr m.
Bɩ kʋ gʋaa awɔɔ lar, a ʋ: Bɔ m awɔɔ n'a hʋrlɛ? K'a hɩ m, a ʋ: Zuuba lɛ n taa."
Gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ ŋ ta bɩ, ŋ yaa hɔ haay bɩ yɩ amba Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ m.
Kʋ ŋn'ɩ brapoo bɩ hʋrm bɩ, a zannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ n'a hʋrlɛ?"
Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba lɛ n taa."
Ŋ n brapoo bɩ gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a huuro ka ra, ŋn'a ka Yeezuu n da ʋ.
K'a nɩ tam bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n'a huuro kam zaa bɩ ra.
K'a a zɔ Oliviyee ci bɩ zerjɩ bɩ ma bɩ, heernyɔɔ gasʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, zamaa bɩ haay, ŋn'a leer busu, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ hoserlo haay kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ minto.
Ŋ ʋ: "Cir k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba Woso tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ. Kʋ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta arzana ʋ, kʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ n nyɩnta brama."
Farizɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a hɩ Yeezuu m zamaa bɩ bire ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, a ka k'ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zɛ pi."
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʋ ŋ zɛ pi, jaarɔ n nɩ zee dam."
K'a a zɔ Zerizalɛm kʋnɔ bɩ ma, an a to an a yɩ bɩ, a nyi ka a minto.
A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ sɔ, k'a dɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ her, kʋ nka n nɩ laafɩɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ! Bɩ naa ma bɩ, a a nyaakʋm da ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma, ɩ yɩ y.
Sɩra m, dɔmɩnnɔ ɩ zɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ minto, ɩbɩɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ tee kɩnkarɛ ɩbɩɩ pəŋŋə bɩ ma, ŋ bɩrlɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, k'a ɩbɩɩ da, ŋn'a so bɩncɛ haay ʋ.
Ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ wurgəm haay, ɩbɩɩ kan ɩ zamaa kɩ. Ŋ bɩ jaa deem taan••• tore, an bɩr a mim burə ʋ y, bala, ɩbɩɩ n dɔmɩm kʋ Woso bʋr k'a b'a da ɩ han bɩ dɔ y."
Yeezuu gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ, an nɩ lam hɔheenno wɔɔ ra.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N y'a gʋrsɩra ba, ŋ ʋ: 'Mɔɔ cɛ bɩ nyɩntam yaadarɛ cɛ.' B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ sa a ba konno bɩncɛ."
Yeezuu ɩ hɔ dɩndam dɔmɩm haay Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, tara cinno kɩ y'a karɛ a zɛrɛ zaa ma.
Bɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta k'a ba bɩ, ŋn'a zaa yɩ y, bala, zamaa bɩ haay y'a tʋr karɛ a meerbaa ma kan bʋraama gʋta kɩ.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ hindeem ʋ, Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔ dɩndam zamaa bɩ m Wosocɛ ʋ, an nɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta pa dam bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ bʋr zi.
Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Lɛ kara ɩbɩɩ n ta m ɩ nɩ naa bam nɩ, gɛɛ, bɔ a ʋ, nka lɛ ʋ, k'ɩ hɩ wɔɔ m?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa sɔ, mɔɔ laaka darɛ awɔɔ han, k'a hɩ mɔɔ m:
Zaan batɛm bɩ, a to a ʋ brama gɛɛ gʋɔɔ zi?"
Ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ: A to a ʋ brama, a y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Bɔ minto m awɔɔ n a mim si gɛ?
Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ: A to a ʋ gʋɔɔ zi, zamaa bɩ haay wɔɔ gʋngʋɛɛnm jaarɔ m, bala, ŋ sɩra ka, ŋ ʋ Zaan bɩ nyɩnta wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa."
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n a dɔ k'a to a ʋ ka y."
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ sɔ, mɔɔ b'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ nka ɩ lɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ naa barɛ y."
A n nɩ hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do dam zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa ɩ dɩvɛnsɩra da ʋ, an a ka a zibənno ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a zi ba, an ta zaa jintə ra.
K'a dɔmɩm a ku bɩ, a a zibəənyɩ deem nyɔɔ dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ zi, k'an aa a hɔ si an b'a ka a ʋ. Bɩ, dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ a nyasʋ ŋn'a zɛ, ŋn'a ka an doo a wɔ m tu.
A n a ya, an a zibəənyɩ vanta nyɔɔ, ŋn'aa bɩ nyasʋ ŋn'a zɛ sɔ, ŋn'a sʋnsɔ wʋ, ŋn'a ka an doo a wɔ m tu.
A n a ya, an a vanta nyɔɔ a kaakʋ hɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩ zɛ, ŋnɩ yaaba da ma, ŋnɩ la ra.
Dɩvɛnsɩrazaa bɩ n a hɩ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: Kʋ m a ba lɔ? Mɔɔ yɩ m nyɩ ŋʋarɛ bɩ nyɔɔm. Ŋ bɩ daŋ ʋ barɛm.
Kʋ ŋ y'a nyɩ bɩ yɩ bɩ, dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ n a dɩnda kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: Naa do n nɩ zɛm b'a so ʋ. Ʋ a nyasʋ ʋ a zɛ gər k'ʋ ʋ so arzaka b'ʋ.
Ŋ n a nyasʋ, ŋnɩ bɔ m dɩvɛnsɩra ʋ b'ʋ toore ma, ŋn'a zɛ gər. Bɔ dɩvɛnsɩrazaa bɩ n n'a barɛ ŋ nɩ?
A zɛm bɩ bʋr, an b'a ka ŋnɩ dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, an dɩvɛnsɩra bɩ ka a vantɔɔ ʋ." Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ayy•••, kʋ naa bɩ ba y!"
Yeezuu n a nya ŋ lɛ an dɩga ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Wosoci bɩ gʋrsɩra naa do jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Jaa kʋ cɛdonno a bɔ ʋ ŋn'a zo bɩ, bɩ y'a ba cɛ bɩ jaa wɩsɩ.
Kʋ gʋaa a do jaa bɩ do ra, hɩsɩga a zaa nawʋm. Bɩ, kʋ jaa bɩ do a da gʋaa ra, a hɔɔnsɩ an nawʋm."
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kɩ y'a karɛ a nyasʋrɛ ma b'ʋ lɛɛm, bɩ ŋ yɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m. Ŋ y'a jɩ ma mɩŋŋa, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom naa do da a ʋ awɔɔ tɔ ma.
Ŋ nɩ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ dundom Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ zi, ŋnɩ tɩrgabaa ka a ra. K'a ku a nyasʋ a meerbaa nɔ ʋ, a ka tara lɛɛzannɔ ʋ kan kʋzaa bɩ kɩ ʋ.
Ŋ laaka naa do da han: "Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ meer bam, ɩ nɩ hɔ dɩndam kan sɩra kɩ, ɩ bɩr nyi bam gɔsɩ nɩ y, ɩ nɩ Woso zaa hɔ dɩndam kan a sɩra kɩ.
A a ga m k'ʋ Rɔm cir yawʋr ka gɛɛ, a n a ga nɩ?"
Yeezuu k'a ŋ zambʋ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a ʋ:
"K'a busoo ka m ʋ deem naa ʋ. Nka meer kan a tɔ kɩ nɩ busoo bɩ burə ʋ naa?" Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Rɔm cir hɔ m."
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a Rɔm cir tɔ hɔ ka ʋ, k'a hɔ kʋ Woso a so ʋ bɩ ka ʋ sɔ."
Ŋ n a da ma, ŋnɩ Yeezuu nyasʋ a meerbaa nɔ ʋ zamaa bɩ lɛɛ y. A nyɩbɔʋrɛ bɩ k'a a ka ŋ n zɛ kədə bɩ, ŋ zɛ pi.
Sadisɛɛnrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ma bɩ, ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ:
"Karɩnsaamba, Moyiisi a gʋrsɩra ba wɔɔ minto, a ʋ: 'Kʋ gʋaa ga an a gʋ a lʋ ma b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y, k'a danyɩ n a si an nyɩnɔ yɩ kan kɩ a minto.'
Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta, a nyɩnɔ saanhɩna: Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n lʋ sa an ga an a gʋ ma b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y.
A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n lʋ bɩ si,
a kaakʋ hɔ bɩ maam sɔ, an ta an nyɩnɔ saanhɩna rɔ wɔɔ ku. Ŋ haay gɩnga bɩ ŋ nɩ nyɩ yɩ kan lʋ bɩ kɩ y.
A nyarɛ ma bɩ, lʋ bɩ ga sɔ.
Bɩ, lʋ naa do, gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, nka hɔ m lʋ bɩ nɩ? Kʋ ŋ haay lʋ bɩ si bɩ?"
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zamaa naa do gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔ sam.
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ga mɩmbɔʋrɛ m Woso mɩm ʋ, ŋnɩ zɛm bɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba durnya k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ lʋ gɛɛ yar sam b'ʋ y.
Ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ ga dɔ y, bala, ŋ bɔm kʋ ʋ kan malɛɛkarɔ kɩ. Woso nyɩnɔ m, kʋ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ minto.
Moyiisi gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ hɩnka mɩŋŋa, bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ Wosoci nɩ tutugu mim dɩndaŋ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ Zuuba Woso birm Abraham Woso, Izakkɩ Woso, Zakɔɔb Woso.
Bɩ Woso bɩ, gəəno Woso bɛɛ y, mɩsɩɩrɔ Woso m, bala, hɔ haay mɩsɩr a minto."
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ meerbaa bɩ si, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, ɩ meer ba mɩŋŋa."
Ŋ bɩr yɛm dɔ k'a laaka da han mim sɩ ma y.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ: 'Krista bɩ, Davɩd Nyɩ' nɩ?
Kʋ Davɩd mɩŋŋa n'a hɩm laarɔ ci nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ Zuuba m: nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʋ,
an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ bam gankarahɔ, k'ɩ gam ka ŋ la bɩ ku.
Naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Davɩd y'a birm 'Zuuba'. A nyɩnnɩ m lʋnlɔ kɛɛrɛ?"
Kʋ zamaa bɩ haay n'a tʋr kam bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ:
"K'a dundo a zi kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩmbɩr zabarɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Ŋ gʋɔɔ yaadarɛ ŋʋa daasɩrɔ bire ʋ. Ŋ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ ŋʋa yaadarɛcɛrɔ ʋ, ŋ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ ŋʋa sɔ hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.
Ŋ nɩ zonno hɔ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋn'ɩ yaa jintoo dam, kʋ ŋ n'a yɩ. N yɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yarm, ŋnɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩ gʋta an lɛ da."
Yeezuu k'a a mɩm busu bɩ, a arzakazannɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ busoo dam ganwʋrɛ mɔr ʋ.
A n zoro yɩ sɔ cicirzaa m, an tamma hɩɩya da ʋ.
A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zoro cicirzaa naa do a da ʋ an lɛ da ŋ nɩ haay.
Bala, nawɔnnɔ haay busoo k'an ta ŋ ʋ gʋta bɩ ŋ y'a bɔ ʋ ŋn'a da ganwʋrɛ mɔr b'ʋ, bɩ zoro bɩ busoo k'a n'a wɔ ʋ b'a ka haay."
Gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosocɛ bɩ mim dɩndam, ŋn'a lɛ bɔrɛ a gʋɛrɛ ʋ, a jaarɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋabaa ʋ, kan ganwʋrɛ kʋ ŋ y'a bankam bɩ kɩ bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"Dɔmɩm ta ʋ an nɩ zɛm, hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a yɩm naa, jaarɔ wɔɔ bɩ gɔɔtam kʋ burə ʋ y, ŋ haay wurgəm."
Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, naa zɛm brɔ? Bɩ makra kara n nɩ naa dɔmɩm hɩnkarɛ?"
A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka ŋnɩ braba a nɩ y, bala, gʋɔɔ gʋta zɛm b'a hɩ mɔɔ tɔ m, ŋ ʋ: Awɔɔ m Krista, gɛɛ: Dɔmɩm a ku. A bɩ zu ŋ ʋ y.
K'awɔɔ bɩ yar barɛ mim ma, tara gʋɔɔ n wuti kan a cinno kɩ, a da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. Bala, pakra m kʋ bɩ n lɛɛ ka an bʋr, b'a nyarɛ bɛɛ m bɩ lɛɛm y."
A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Tararɔ wutim kan kʋ kɩ yar m, tara cinno n wuti kan kʋ kɩ.
Tara hinkəre gʋta zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ, yaaba bʋnyaarɔ kan nɔ kɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ bɩncɛ-bɩncɛ. Hɔɔrɔ bam ŋnɩ nyibəə gʋta da gʋɔɔ ma, kan makrarɔ gʋtɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to brama kɩ."
"Bɩ, an nɩ lɛɛ kam naa haay lɛɛ bɩ, n y'awɔɔ gʋrm, n nɩ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma, n y'a karɛ, n n'awɔɔ dʋdɔ ka sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, n n'awɔɔ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, n tarɛ awɔɔ m cinno kan lɛɛzannɔ kɩ taa mɔɔ tɔ ma.
Bɩ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ dɔmɩm mɔɔ minto.
Bɩ, a bɩ lɛɛ ka a a hɔɔn da minno nɔɔn duro nyɩbɔʋrɛ ma y.
Bala, mɔɔ meerbaa dɔrɛ kan hɔɔn kɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ, b'awɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem b'a dam ma an awɔɔ meerbaa nyɩ bɔ ʋ, gɛɛ, an bɩsɩ ka ma y.
Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ zɩrɔ kan a dɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ danyɩnɔ kɩ, awɔɔ dogʋɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ gʋaasɩbɔɔ kɩ, n n'awɔɔ nyasʋrɛ, bɩ, ŋ y'awɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛm.
Gʋaa haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, awɔɔ minkə deem taan••• bɩ nyaanɩm awɔɔ mim ʋ y.
Awɔɔ tʋntɔʋrɛ n nɩ mɩsɩrbaa karɛ awɔɔ ʋ."
"K'awɔɔ bɩ Zerizalɛm yɩ yarbənno n bɩr ma, k'a dɔ a ʋ, a wurgəre dɔmɩm a zɔ.
Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n a si, ŋnɩ ta ciro ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tara nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n bɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ gasʋ tara nɔ ʋ y!
Woso heerbusu dɔmɩm m dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro m, bɩ hɔ haay kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ bɩ n nɩ kʋ yɩŋ ʋ.
A pakra bam lannɔ jɩsɩzannɔ kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɔ karɛ a nyɩnɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, bala, cicir gʋta y'a dam tara bɩ ra kan heerbusu gʋta kɩ zamaa bɩ minto.
N gʋɔɔ gʋta zɩnzɛm kargʋrɔ m, ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ gʋrm lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ do haay bire ʋ, do vantɔɔ tʋntɔm Zerizalɛm la an ta an do vantɔɔ wɔɔ dɔmɩm bɩ nyarɛ ku."
"Makrarɔ nyɩntaŋ ʋ woso kan mom kɩ monyaarɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ. Tara burə ʋ, do haay gʋɔɔ nyɩntam kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ, ŋ b'a banjɩ dɔrɛ y, higʋta paŋŋa kan a kurəro tatʋr kɩ tɔ ma.
Gʋɔɔ n'a mom, hoonsi n ta ŋ lɛ hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm tara burə ʋ bɩ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ. Bala, n brama paŋŋazannɔ hinkəm.
Bɩ kur bɩ, ŋ Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an bɩr zɛm warkʋ nɔ ʋ kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ, cirbəə kɩ."
"Kʋ minno nɔɔn duro haay bʋr ŋn'ɩ barɛ, k'a a bɔɔta a dɩga brama, awɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ a zɔ."
A n hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a dɩga sɔɔn kan gɔrɔ haay kɩ ma.
K'awɔɔ yɩ ŋn'ɩ lɛɛ daa darɛ, awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, siire a zɔ.
A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ bɩ naa yɩ an nɩ zɛrɛ, k'a dɔ a ʋ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zamaana naa do bɩ cenim kʋ nawɔnnɔ haay bɛɛ ba y.
Brama kan tara kɩ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ bɩ cenle y."
"K'a dundo a zi, a b'a heer gore da ʋ kan bɛɛ mire waasɩ kɩ, hɔ bɩ gʋta kɩ, kan durnya minno hɔɔndarɛrɔ kɩ y, kʋ dɔmɩm naa do bɩ daata zɛ awɔɔ ra y,
amba zaŋŋa hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Bala, a y'a kum gʋaa haay k'a nɩ tara burə ʋ ra.
A b'a zuu ʋ y, k'a yaa da dɔmɩm haay, k'a a da ma, a bɔ lɛm hɔ haay k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ma, k'a jɩm brama, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ lɛɛ."
Dɔmɩm haay Yeezuu tɩr ta an aa hɔ dɩnda Zerizalɛm Wosocɛ ʋ. Bɩ, yirbəə haay a tɩr bɔ, an ta ci kʋ n n'a birm Oliviyee ci bɩ ra, dɔ n tɩr mɩ m b'ʋ.
Bɩ wutigʋta nɩ, zamaa bɩ tɩr ta zi Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'aa a tʋr ka ma.
Bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma cibsa kʋ n a birm pakkɩ bɩ y'a zɔm.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ y'a kam zaa k'a n'a sam k'a a ku a zɛ bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ yɩ nyi bam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ, Sʋtaana gasʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem heer ʋ. Zidas m, gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Iskarɩyɔtɩ bɩ m.
A n ta, an aa a dɩnda kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cinno wɔɔ kɩ, hɔ k'a n'a bam k'a Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka ŋ ʋ.
Bɩ ŋ heer nyɔɔ gʋta ŋn'a dɩnda kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: k'a busoo ka ʋ.
Bɩ, Zidas yɛ sɔ, an n'a kam dɔmɩm k'a n'a dam ma, an Yeezuu nyasʋ a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ ma, kʋ zamaa bɩ b'a dɔ y.
Bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma cibsa, n nɩ pakkɩ sinnyɛɛm mannɩ bam ma bɩ dɔmɩm a zɔ.
Yeezuu n Pɩyɛɛr nyɔɔ kan Zaan kɩ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ta, a yaa pakkɩ cibsa hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka k'ʋ b'a bɩ."
Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ʋ aa hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka ka?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ n'ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a dɩga a, k'awɔɔ gasʋ tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, awɔɔ gʋaayar deem zɛŋ ʋ, an gər busu kan hi kɩ, k'a zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ, a gasʋ har k'a nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ b'ʋ.
K'a hɩ har bɩ zaa m, a ʋ: Karɩnsaamba y'ɩbɩɩ larm: saanɔɔcɛ ɩ ka, kʋ m bɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kan m karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ?
A cɛ gʋta hɩnkarɛ awɔɔ m mim ʋ, n nɩ mɔrlɔ wɔɔ banka haay, bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, awɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bankaŋ ʋ."
Ŋ n ta, ŋn'a hɔ haay k'a a hɩ bɩ yɩ, ŋnɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba.
Wakatɩ bɩ k'a a ku bɩ, Yeezuu yaa nyɩnta kan a zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ŋʋa gʋta kʋ m pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ naa do bɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, kʋ m bɔkarɛ m fɩr yɩ.
Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m hɔbɩrɛ naa do bɩ fɩɩga y, k'a mim m tolle ba an kʋ yɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ."
A n hɔmire sa, an yaa da Woso m barka, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a si a a mi kan kʋ kɩ.
Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a nya her mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m dɩvɛn mi dʋntɔ y, an ta an Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ku."
A n bɔkarɛ an bur sa, k'a yaa da Woso m barka an a nya bɩ, a a zɩnzɛ ra an a ka ŋ ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ mɛ m naa, [mɔɔ n a ka awɔɔ minto. K'a naa ba mɔɔ tɔdaanɔʋ minto."
Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kur bɩ, a hɔmihɔ sa an a ba maam sɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔmire naa do gʋaasɩbabaa daa hɔmire m. Mɔɔ ma m, an a lo awɔɔ minto.]"
"K'a tʋr ka, gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ, a ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ naa ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Sɩra m, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ zɛm bɩ ga, amba Woso lɛɛ ka an a hɩ bɩ m. Bɩ, kʋsɩ ɩ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʋm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ kɩ."
Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a sɩŋŋɩda sa ŋn'ɩ kʋ larm: "Wɔɔ bireyaa ʋ naa ʋ, nka n nɩ mim naa do barɛ?"
Ŋ wuti bɩsɩkarɛ vanta m kan kʋ kɩ, k'a a dɔ nka m jɩtaarɛ gɛ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Do vantɔɔ cinno ɩ cirbəə bɩm ŋn'a so a tarazannɔ ʋ, bɩ cinno wɔɔ y'a kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ birm: mimmɩŋŋabənno.
B'awɔɔ kan kʋ kɩ, a b'a ba maam y. Bɔ n jɩtaarɛ awɔɔ bireyaa ʋ bɩ, k'an a ba awɔɔ dam poore. Bɔ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, k'an a ba awɔɔ zibəənyɩ.
Nka m jɩtaarɛ paan•••? Bɔ ɩ nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm bɩ m gɛɛ, bɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ sa an n'a kam bɩ nɩ? Mɔɔ ʋ: bɔ ɩ nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm bɩ m. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bireyaa ʋ am zibəənyɩ hɔ bɩ m."
Awɔɔ, awɔɔ gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay m cicir nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ cirbəə bɩncɛ bankam awɔɔ minto, amba mɔɔ Zɩ a banka mɔɔ minto bɩ m.
K'a a da ma, a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan mɔɔ kɩ a hɔ bɩ, a hɔ mi mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʋ. K'a a da ma sɔ a nyɩnta cirbəəduuro ra, a Israyɛl do bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yar.
Bɩ, Zuuba a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, Sɩmɔɔn, Sʋtaana a yɛ k'awɔɔ daŋŋa am hɔyaa hɔ bɩ m.
Bɩ mɔɔ yaa da ɩbɩɩ minto k'ɩbɩɩ sɩrakarɛ b'a da jɩm ʋ y. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi, k'ɩ danyɩnɔ heer ba kookoo."
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ yɛ kʋ m ta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Baa kʋ zɛ m sɔ, mɔɔ yɛrɛ m ga kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ."
Bɩ Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʋ: "Pɩyɛɛr, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam gum naa ʋ, ɩ ʋ: ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ dɔ y, gallɛm kaakʋ, koo n bɔkarɛ an baa da."
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ awɔɔ nyɔɔ, awɔɔ n busoohɛra sa y kan bɔɔn kɩ, kʋsɔrɔ kɩ bɩ, bɔ ɩ kʋrɔ awɔɔ ʋ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Hɔsɩ."
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ busoohɛra m bɩ, k'an a sa; Gʋaa k'a nɩ bɔɔn m bɩ, k'an a sa sɔ. Gʋaa k'a ba kargʋ m bɩ, k'an a huu hɛɛ an a si m.
Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: mim niŋŋə kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ mɔɔ minto bɩ kʋ yɩm: 'N y'a lɛ sa n a da mimbʋnyaabənno barla.' Bɩ sɩra m, hɔ niŋŋə kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ minto bɩ kʋ yɩm."
Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, kargʋrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ba n na." A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "A bʋrbɔ."
Yeezuu bɔ an ta Oliviyee ci mim ʋ, amba a tɩr a bam bɩ m. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ.
K'a lee ku bɩncɛ b'ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a yaa da, a yaa n a do makra nɔ ʋ."
A n a jɛ bɔ ŋ ma, an ta lɛɛ poore, an a kukurə zɛ, an nɩ yaa darɛ, a ʋ:
"M Zɩ, k'ɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ fɩr naa do gʋ mɔɔ ma, kan bɩ kɩ haay ɩ bɩ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y, ɩ hɔ ba!" [
Bɩ ma bɩ, malɛɛka y'a to arzana ʋ, an b'a hɩnka m, an a paŋŋa da ra.
Yeezuu nɩ zoo kaŋŋɩda bam a heer ʋ, an n'a tʋntɔŋ ʋ kan yaadarɛ kɩ, a lɛɛmaa n'a ba am macina hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ surm tara ʋ.]
K'a yaa bɩ da bɩ, a wuti, an bʋr a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an bɩ dɩga a ŋ hinceem ba heerzarlɛ nɔ ʋ.
A n ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ nɩ hinceem barɛ? K'a wuti, a yaa da k'a b'a do makra nɔ ʋ y!"
Kʋ Yeezuu gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, gʋaa cir gʋta bʋr. Iskarɩyɔtɩ Zidas bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem b'ɩ nyɩnta gʋaa cir gʋta bɩ lɛɛ, an a zɔ Yeezuu ma k'a yaa da m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zidas, yaa ɩ n'a dam Gʋaanyɩ bɩ m kan daʋrɛ kɩ, k'ɩ zambʋ ba ma gɛ?"
Bɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔ k'a n'a bam k'a nyɩnta ʋ bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, ʋ ŋ zɛ kargʋ m gɛ?"
Bɩ ŋ gʋaa deem wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ zibəənyɩ sakʋ an a bɩsɩ tʋr gʋ ma.
Bɩ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a to maam." A n bɔkarɛ an a wɔ da gʋaa bɩ tʋr bɩ ma, an a waa.

Yeezuu n a bɔ, an a hɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m, kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cinno kɩ, kan gʋɔɔgusinno kʋ ŋ bʋr k'a b'a nyasʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ bʋr kan kargʋrɔ kɩ, bannɔ kɩ, ɩ ʋ, ta awɔɔ nawʋm koor nyasʋ jɩ ʋ.
Bɩ mɔɔ nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay Wosocɛ ʋ, b'awɔɔ n a wɔ da mɔɔ ma y. Naa ma bɩ, awɔɔ wakatɩ m kan monsigə cir bɩ hɔ kɩ."
Kʋ ŋ Yeezuu nyasʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʋ. Pɩyɛɛr n zu a jɛ ʋ laatʋ, an ta.
N nɩ sɛ hɛ hallu bireyaa ʋ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ. Pɩyɛɛr n ta, an aa nyɩnta ŋ bireyaa ʋ sɔ.
Zibəənyɩlʋ k'a a yɩ an nɩ nyɩntam sɛ bɩ lɛ ma b'ʋ bɩ, a dɩga a sɩɩ•••, a ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do nyɩnta kan kɩ sɔ!"
Bɩ Pɩyɛɛr bɩsɩ ka, a ʋ: "Lʋ, mɔɔ n a dɔ y."
K'a yɩ poore bɩ, gʋaa vanta n a yɩ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "ɩbɩɩ sɔ, ŋ gʋaa deem n'ɩbɩɩ m!" Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ gʋaa bɩ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ayy•••, ŋ gʋaa deem bɛɛ n mɔɔ nɩ y!"
K'a maasɩrɛ ba an wakatɩ deem ku bɩ, gʋaa vanta a ya, an a hɩ, an so ra, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, gʋaa naa do nyɩnta kan kɩ! Galilee gʋaa m."
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa, mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ hɩ y!" Lɛɛm bɩ, k'a gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, koo n baa da.
Zuuba n a bɔ, an dɩga Pɩyɛɛr ma. Pɩyɛɛr n mim niŋŋə kʋ Zuuba a hɩ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma her gallɛm kaakʋ, ɩ ʋ: ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ dɔ y, koo n bɔkarɛ an baa da.
A n bɔ garga ra, an nyi ka kan heerzarlɛ kɩ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔm Yeezuu ma rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa wʋm ma, ŋn'a zɛm.
Ŋ n pɛɛra sa, ŋn'a ku a meer la, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʋ: "Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa n'ɩ mɩ. Nka y'ɩbɩɩ zɛ, a hɩ?"
Ŋ n bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ sʋnsɔ do haay wʋ Yeezuu ma.
Woso k'a haan bɩ, tara bɩ jɩtannɔ kan wosocɛmannɩbənno kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ a so kʋ ma, ŋnɩ Yeezuu gaa, ŋnɩ bʋr m a dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ Krista n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ hɩ ʋ m!" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ b'a sim mɔɔ nɩ y.
Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ laaka da awɔɔ han sɔ, awɔɔ b'a nyɩ bɔm mɔɔ nʋ y.
Bɩ, naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Gʋaanyɩ bɩ y'aa nyɩnta Woso paŋŋazaa bɩsɩ ʋ."
Ŋ haay n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɩ minto bɩ, Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m na?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ hɩ, a m mɔɔ m."
Bɩ, ŋ haay a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Kasɛtɩzannɔ zibəə ta wɔɔ ma ra! Wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a lɛ mim bɩ ma."
Bɩ sokʋma zannɔ wɔɔ wuti, ŋnɩ Yeezuu gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Pɩlatɩ taa.

Ŋ nɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋnɩ mim ka ra, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ sʋr gʋaa naa do ra, an nɩ wɔɔ tara gʋɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ, an n'a tarɛ ŋ nɩ tolle, a ʋ: ŋ bɩ Rɔm cir yawʋr ka y. A n a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Awɔɔ m Krista, cir n'awɔɔ m."
Pɩlatɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m nɩ?" Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ."
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m kan zamaa bɩ kɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n gʋaa naa do kʋrɔma yɩ y."
Bɩ, ŋ so ra, ŋ n'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A mɩŋŋa nɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ a hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ. A sɩŋŋɩda a sa Galilee ʋ, an bɔ Zidee ʋ, an bɔkarɛ an lee ku naa ʋ."
Pɩlatɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a laaka da, a ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ Galilee gʋaa m gɛ?"
K'a a dɔ a ʋ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ gʋrga gʋaa m bɩ, a a nyɔɔ Hɩrɔɔdɩ zi. Bɩ nyɩnta Zerizalɛm ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ.
Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a heer nyɔɔ gʋta, bala, a a ŋʋa k'a yɩ a dɔmɩm laatʋ. Bala, a a mim ma, an n'a hɔɔn dam k'an hoser ba k'a yɩ.
A hɔ gʋta laaka da han, bɩ Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ y.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋʋaar ba, ŋn'a karɛ a lɛ m kan a paŋŋa jire kɩ.
Bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a zɛ kʋ ra kan a dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ, ŋnɩ yaa wʋ ma, ŋnɩ cicir ka ma, ŋnɩ cinno huu du ma. Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a ka, ŋn'a wusigəm ŋnɩ ta m Pɩlatɩ zi.
Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, Pɩlatɩ kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ kɩ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta kʋ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ, ŋ gʋaasɩbabaa da kʋ ma.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Pɩlatɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bir, kan cinno vantɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ,
an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ gʋaa naa do gaa a b'a ka mɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ: gʋɔɔ an nɩ ŋ nyʋnnyɔɔm. Bɩ mɔɔ lar awɔɔ taa naa ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɩ, an a ba, an bʋnyaa amba awɔɔ hɩ bɩ nɩ y.
Hɩrɔɔdɩ n hɔsɩ yɩ sɔ y, an a wusigə mɔɔ zi. Gʋaa bɩ n hɔsɩ ba an a ga zɛ nɩ y.
Bɩ k'a yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, mɔɔ y'a kam ŋn'a hʋnhʋr mɩŋŋa, m bɔkarɛ, m a to." [
Pakkɩ cibsa haay, pakra m kʋ Pɩlatɩ n ŋ hɔɔnhɔ lɔ deem bɔ an a ka ŋ ʋ.]
Bɩ y'a ka, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a zɛ kʋ ra haay, ŋn'ɩ zee dam: "K'a gʋaa naa do zɛ, k'a Barabas bɔ a ka wɔɔ ʋ."
Barabas bɩ nyasʋ ŋ y'a ʋ, ŋn'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, nyaa k'a zɛ an a da tara nɔ ʋ, an gər zɛ bɩ minto.
Pɩlatɩ n a ya, an meer ba kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ k'a Yeezuu to.
Ŋ haay n zee da, ŋ ʋ: "K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma! K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!"
Pɩlatɩ a ya, an ŋ lar a gallɛm kaakʋ hɔ ma, a ʋ: "Bɔ a ba an bʋnyaa? Kʋ mɔɔ m, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɩ an a ba, an a ga zɛ nɩ y. K'a maam nɩ, mɔɔ y'a kam, ŋn'a hʋnhʋr, m bɔkarɛ m a to."
Ŋ n a gu, ŋn'a hɩ ŋn'ɩ som la kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!" Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ bʋgʋr bɩ n maam-maam bɩ, ŋ bʋr Pɩlatɩ la.
Pɩlatɩ n dʋdɔ bɩ yar amba ŋ lɛ n taa bɩ m.
Bɩ, a gʋaa niŋŋə k'a yar ba, an gər zɛ, ŋn'a nyasʋ, ŋn'a du bɩ to, amba ŋ y'a yɛ bɩ m. A n bɔkarɛ an Yeezuu to yarbənno m, kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔnmim ba m.
Kʋ yarbənno wɔɔ Yeezuu nyasʋ, ŋn'ɩ tam nɩ bɩ, ŋ Sirɛnnɩ gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn bɩ zɛ ʋ, an a to poo ʋ an nɩ zɛm, ŋn'a nyasʋ, ŋn'a da gɔdarkʋra bɩ busure ʋ k'an zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ.
Zamaa gʋta zu a jɛ ʋ kan lannɔ kɩ. Lannɔ wɔɔ n zɛnyi da ʋ Yeezuu tɔ ma.
Yeezuu n a bɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zerizalɛm lannɔ, a bɩ nyi ka mɔɔ tɔ ma y. K'a nyi ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ tɔ ma an lɛ da, kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ.
Bala, dɔmɩm ta ʋ an nɩ zɛm, n nɩ zɛm b'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m lannɔ kʋ cɩnarɔ m, kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr nyɩnɔ yɩm cɩna rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, kan bɔɔ ɩ nɩ nyɔ ka nyɩnɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, n y'a hɩm ciro m: K'a da wɔɔ ra, ŋn'a hɩ dimbirlɔ m: K'a ku wɔɔ ra.
Bala, kʋ n y'a bam gɔ butur m ncɩnaaʋ, a zɛm bɩ nyɩnta gɔ gər ma lɔ?"
Ŋ bibiiro gaa hɩɩya k'a yaa nɩ ŋ zɛ kan kɩ.
Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma: 'Minkorgo' bɩ, yarbənno yaa a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma b'ʋ kan bibiiro hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Deem a bɩsɩ, deem a jɩsa.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, sugur ka ŋ ʋ, bala hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bam bɩ, ŋ n a jɩ dɔ y." Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, ŋ n pʋɛɛga da a huuro wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ jir kan kʋ kɩ.
Zamaa bɩ n jɩm b'ʋ, an nɩ dɩgam. Tara cinno wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʋm ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "A gɔsɩnnɔ bʋmbɔ. Kʋ Krista kʋ Woso a bɔ ʋ bɩ n'awɔɔ nɩ, k'an a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ a zim."
Yarbənno wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʋm ma sɔ. Ŋ y'a zɔ, ŋnɩ bɛɛ hɛɛnr ka ʋ, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ:
"Kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ ɩ zim."
Ŋ nɩ warga deem zeŋŋə a mim la, ŋn'a gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir m naa."
Bibii deem k'a nɩ zeŋŋəm gɔdarkʋra ma kan kɩ bɩ y'a sʋnsɔ wʋm, a ʋ: "Krista bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m na? Ɩ mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ, k'ɩ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ sɔ."
Deem bɩ n nyaa ba kan kɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩr nyi bam Woso m na? Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ nɔ ʋ am a hɔ bɩ m.
Kʋ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ, a a ga m, k'ʋ hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩ an a ga wɔɔ mim barɛ m, bɩ kʋ naa zaa nɩ, a mim ba ʋ y."
A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Yeezuu, k'ɩ yaa lee ku ɩ cirbəə bɩncɛ ʋ, k'ɩ mɔɔ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: her naa ʋ, ɩbɩɩ nyɩntam kan mɔɔ kɩ arzana ʋ."
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ sinsebir da, monsigə gʋta n zɛ tara burə ʋ jilli, woso n ter, lɛɛ n'a ba bimm••• an ta an wakatɩ kaakʋ ku. Wosocɛ pɛɛra bɩ n kaansʋ a bire ʋ.
Yeezuu n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m nyi darɛ ɩbɩɩ wɔ ʋ." K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a ga.
