Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nyi karɛ, a zee da, durnyazannɔ n bɩr a heer nyɔɔm. Awɔɔ heer y'a zarm, b'awɔɔ heerzar y'a bam heernyɔɔ.
Kʋ lʋ ɩ nyɩ yɩrɛ, a ɩ busum ma, a dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ minto. Bɩ k'a nyɩ bɩ yɩ, a fɩr yɩrɛ bɩ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ. Heernyɔɔ gʋta ɩ kan kɩ k'a nyɩ yɩ durnya ʋ bɩ minto.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, awɔɔ nɩ heerzar nɔ ʋ naa ma, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ, m awɔɔ yɩ heernyɔɔ nɔ ʋ, bɩ, heernyɔɔ bɩ do, gʋaa b'a dam ma, an a zar y.
Ncɩnaaʋ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ lar hɔsɩ minto y. Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ hɔ yɛ mɔɔ Zɩ han mɔɔ tɔ ma, a y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
A n ta, an dɩɩtaa ku, awɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɛ mɔɔ tɔ ma y. K'a hɔ yɛ, a y'a yɩrɛ, k'awɔɔ heernyɔɔ bɩ n bɩr mɩŋŋa paan•••."
"Naa haay hɩ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ m hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom m, bɩ wakatɩ ɩ zɛm mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ, m meer ba kan awɔɔ kɩ ncɩnaaʋ y. Mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ mim hɩrɛ awɔɔ m paan•••.
Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ hɔ yɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ n a hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ yaa dam Zɩ m awɔɔ tɔ ma y.
Bala, Zɩ b'awɔɔ ŋʋa. K'awɔɔ mɔɔ ŋʋa, a si sɔ, a ʋ, m to mɔɔ ʋ Woso zi bɩ minto.
M to mɔɔ ʋ Zɩ zi, m bʋr durnya ʋ. Bɩ naa ma bɩ, bɔ mɔɔ nawʋm durnya ʋ, m n nɩ tam Zɩ zi."
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ba ɩbɩɩ nɩ meer bam paan••• kɛɛrɛ ɩ wɔ saa hɔbɔkʋrɛnoom darɛ haay ma na.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ ɩbɩɩ hɔ haay dɔ, ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa kʋ gʋaa n ɩ lar y. Bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ n a dɔ mɩŋŋa wɔɔ ʋ, ɩ to ɩbɩɩ ʋ Woso zi."
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Dɩɩtaa awɔɔ bɔkarɛ an n'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, awɔɔ sɩra ka kɛɛrɛ ra?
Ba wakatɩ n nɩ zɛm na, b'a lee ku kɛɛrɛ, awɔɔ hɩsɩga dam, gʋaa biyəə n bɩr tarɛ a lɛ a lɛ, a mɔɔ to m deem. Bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m deem nɩ y, Zɩ ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Naa hɩ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ m k'a laafɩɩ yɩ mɔɔ zi. Awɔɔ ɩ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ durnya naa do nɔ ʋ. Bɩ k'a heer ba kookoo, mɔɔ bʋr durnya ra."
Kʋ Yeezuu meer ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a a bɔɔta an dɩga brama, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "M Zɩ, wakatɩ a ku, ɩ Nyɩ bɩ tɔ busu, k'ɩ Nyɩ bɩ n a da ma, an ɩ tɔ busu sɔ.
Paŋŋa k'ɩbɩɩ ka ʋ gʋaa haay burə ʋ bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ kam gʋɔɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Bala, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ, kʋ ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ dɔ bɩ m, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m Woso a deem paan••• kan gʋaa k'ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔ Yeezuu Krista bɩ kɩ.
Mɔɔ m lɛ bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ tara burə ʋ. Zibəə k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ kʋ ma ba bɩ, mɔɔ ba, m a nya.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Zɩ, mɔɔ da ʋ ɩ zi, cirbəə niŋŋə kʋ mɔɔ n ta m ɩ zi, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya n nyɩnta ʋ bɩ m."
"Gʋɔɔ niŋŋoo k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ bɔ ʋ durnya nɔ ʋ, ɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ tɔ hɩnka ŋ nɩ. Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ, ɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ, bɩ ŋ zu ɩbɩɩ lemim b'ʋ.
Ŋ y'a dɔ kɛɛrɛ, ŋ ʋ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, a to a ʋ ɩbɩɩ zi.
Lemim kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ m. Ŋ y'a si, ŋn'a dɔ sɩra paan••• ŋ ʋ, bɔ mɔɔ ʋ ɩbɩɩ zi, ŋn'a si, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
Mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ŋ minto. Mɔɔ bɩr yaa dam durnya minto y, yaa mɔɔ n'a dam gʋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto. Ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ m.
Bɩ, hɔ haay k'an mɔɔ hɔ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ m sɔ, amba hɔ haay k'a n'ɩbɩɩ hɔ bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ m. Mɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ ŋ gʋr zi.
Bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ maasɩrɛ bam durnya nɔ ʋ dɔ y, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ ŋ n bɩr durnya nɔ ʋ. Zɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi. M Zɩ mɩŋŋa, dɔ ŋ ma ɩ tɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr deem, amba wɔɔ n deem bɩ m.
Kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ bɩ, dɔ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ŋ ma ɩbɩɩ tɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto. Mɔɔ ku ŋ la, bɩ ŋ gʋaa deem n nyaam nɩ y, kʋ n bɩ m, nyaanlɛzaa bɩ m, kʋ Wosoci meerbaarɔ wɔɔ n kʋ yɩ."
"Zɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi kɛɛrɛ, bɩ meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba mɔɔ nawʋm durnya nɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ heernyɔɔ yɩ haay.
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ lemim bɩ ka ŋ ʋ, durnya n sɔ ŋ nɩ, kʋ durnya hɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ, amba durnya hɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ minto.
Mɔɔ n a yɛ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ ŋ bɔ durnya ʋ y, bɩ, k'ɩ dɔ ŋ ma Sʋtaana minto.
Durnya hɔɔ bɛɛ y, amba durnya hɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ m.
A ka k'ɩ sɩra bɩ n ŋ ba a hɔ. Ɩbɩɩ lemim bɩ sɩra m.
Amba ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ durnya nɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋm durnya nɔ ʋ sɔ.
Ŋ minto, mɔɔ yɩ m mɩŋŋa kam, kʋ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka sɩra minto."
"Yaa bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a darɛ ŋ minto bala y. Yaa mɔɔ n'a dam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ minto sɔ.
Zɩ, kʋ ŋ haay n bɩr deem amba ɩbɩɩ n nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ m. Kʋ ŋ n nyɩnta kan wɔɔ kɩ sɔ, kʋ durnya n a si, a ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
Bɩ mɔɔ, mɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr deem amba wɔɔ n deem bɩ m.
Kʋ mɔɔ n bɩr kan ŋ kɩ amba ɩbɩɩ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ m. Kʋ ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra deem kʋ durnya n a dɔ a ʋ, ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ, ɩ ŋ ŋʋa amba ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ m."
"Zɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa bɩncɛ kʋ mɔɔ n ta ʋ bɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n bɩ nyɩnta kan mɔɔ kɩ b'ʋ sɔ, kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ bɩ yɩ, bala, ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ ka ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ ma bɩ, durnya n nyɩnta ʋ y.
M Zɩ k'an tɩrga, durnya k'a n ɩbɩɩ dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ dɔ. Bɩ, nawɔnnɔ a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
Mɔɔ ka ŋn'ɩbɩɩ dɔ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m a ka ŋn'ɩ dɔ, kʋ ŋʋarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ ŋʋam bɩ m nyɩnta ŋ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n bɩr kan ŋ kɩ."
Kʋ Yeezuu meer bɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a a hʋr kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an bra Sedrɔn bɔrkɔ bɩ ma. Gɔsɩra nɩ b'ʋ, an gasʋ ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Zidas k'a n'a nyasʋm k'a ka bɩ bɩncɛ bɩ dɔ, bala, Yeezuu tɩr ta b'ʋ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Zidas ka Rɔm sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ŋ ka rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bʋr gɔsɩra ʋ b'ʋ kan yar mɔr kɩ, fɩtɩrɛrɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ sɛ gungu.
Yeezuu k'a hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a zɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Nka awɔɔ n'a kam ma?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu." A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "A m mɔɔ m." Bɩ, Zidas k'a n'a nyasʋm k'a ka bɩ yɩ ŋ barla.
Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ a kur m, ŋn'a dundo.
Yeezuu n a ya, an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "Nka awɔɔ n'a kam ma?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu."
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ, a m mɔɔ m. K'a ka awɔɔ nawʋm mɔɔ ma, k'a nawɔnnɔ to, ŋnɩ cem."
Meerbaa kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ, kʋ an n'a yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ: "Gʋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ n deem to, an nyaam y."
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr nyɩnta kargʋ m, an a gaa ʋ, an wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ zɛ an a bɩsɩ tʋr gʋ ma. Zibəənyɩ bɩ do tɔ m Malkus.
Yeezuu n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɔ, ɩ ɩ kargʋ bɩ du a caan ʋ. Mɔɔ bɩ fɩryɩrɛ niŋŋə kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ yɩm na?"
Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ kan a cir bɩ kɩ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ Yeezuu nyasʋ, ŋn'a wɔrɔ sur.
Lɛɛ ŋ y'a ka, ŋnɩ ta m Hannɩ zi. Bɩ, Hannɩ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ zim m Kayiifʋ m. Kayiifʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m dɔɔraa bɩ do ʋ.
Kayiifʋ deem-deem bɩ do ɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ dʋndɔ, a ʋ: kʋ gʋaa deem ga gʋaa haay minto, a jɩra bɩ.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr kan karɩndanyɩ vanta kɩ zu Yeezuu jɛ ʋ. Bɩ, kʋ wosocɛmannɩbər bɩ karɩndanyɩ deem bɩ dɔ bɩ, a gasʋ kan Yeezuu kɩ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʋ b'ʋ.
Pɩyɛɛr n jɩm garga ra, hallɛ ma, karɩndanyɩ deem kʋ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ b'a dɔ bɩ bɔ, an meer ba kan lʋ k'a nɩ dɔm har bɩ lɛ ma bɩ kɩ, an Pɩyɛɛr gaa, an gasʋ m.
Zibəənyɩlʋ k'a nɩ dɔm hallɛ ma bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ ra?" Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ayy•••, a bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y."
Zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɛ hɛ, ŋn'ɩ nyɩ kam ma, bala, nyɛɛm ɩ barɛ. Pɩyɛɛr nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ, an nɩ nyɩ kam ma sɔ.
Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɩ Yeezuu larm a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma kan a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ kɩ.
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ pa da gʋaa haay m, mɔɔ hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m dɔmɩm haay sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ kan Wosocɛ ʋ kɩ, bɩncɛ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ haay n'a som kʋ ma ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ n hɔsɩ nyaakʋm da, m a hɩ y.
Bɔ minto m, ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ larlɛ? Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ lar. Ŋ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa."
Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ bɩ, Wosocɛ dɔmazaa deem k'a nyɩnta b'ʋ b'a wɔ ta rɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto m, ɩbɩɩ n'a nyɩ bɔm wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m ncɩnaaʋ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ ŋʋaar mɔɔ ba, k'ɩ hɩ m m. Bɩ kʋ sɩra mɔɔ hɩ, bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ mɔɔ zɛrɛ?"
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Hannɩ a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu sur, ŋnɩ ta m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Kayiifʋ zi.
Bɩ ma bɩ, Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr ɩ nyɩ kam sɛ ma. N n a hɩ m, n ʋ: "A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m na?" Pɩyɛɛr n bɩsɩ ka, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ bɛɛ y!"
Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ kʋ Pɩyɛɛr a tʋr gʋ ma bɩ danyɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n ɩbɩɩ yɩ gɔsɩra ʋ b'ʋ kan kɩ ra?"
Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an bɩsɩ ka. Lɛɛm bɩ, koo n baa da.
Ŋ bɔ Yeezuu m Kayiifʋ har ʋ, ŋnɩ ta m dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ. Bɩ ma bɩ, wutigʋta m. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ta m nɔ wɔɔ n gasʋ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ y, a y'a dintim ka a ma, a n a da ma a pakkɩ cibsa bɩ bɩ y.
Bɩ minto bɩ, Pɩlatɩ n bɔ an ta ŋ zi garga ra b'ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Bɔ mim awɔɔ n'a kam gʋaa naa do ra?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa naa do, kʋ zibʋnyaa bɛɛ a a ba, wɔɔ y'a nyasʋrɛ ʋ a ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ ra?"
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a gaa a dʋdɔ ka a zim amba awɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ m." Zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "N n lɛ ka wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ gər zɛ y!"
Meerbaa kʋ Yeezuu a ba, a zɛ zaa minto bɩ, yɩ an nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, an kʋ yɩ.
Pɩlatɩ n gasʋ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an Yeezuu bir an a lar, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m nɩ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ nɩ naa hɩrɛ ɩ zim gɛ? Gɛɛ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ mɔɔ mim hɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ?"
Pɩlatɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Ɩbɩɩ dogʋɔɔ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ y'ɩbɩɩ nyasʋ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ! Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ba?"

Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ, durnya naa do hɔ bɛɛ y. Kʋ mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ durnya naa do hɔ nɩ, mɔɔ dɔmazannɔ yar bam kʋ ŋ bɩ mɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋnɩ mɔɔ ka zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. Bɩ mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ, durnya naa do hɔ bɛɛ y."

Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'a maam cir n'ɩbɩɩ m wa?" Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩ, ɩ zim, cir m mɔɔ m. Yɩ mɔɔ ʋ m bʋr durnya ʋ, kʋ m bɩ sɩra kasɛtɩ ka. Gʋaa k'a sɩra ŋʋa bɩ, a y'a tʋr kam mɔɔ leer ma."
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ m sɩra?" K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a a ya, an ta garga ra b'ʋ, an aa zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ yɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ n mim kʋ gʋaa naa do a zar bɩ yɩ y.
K'a mim ka awɔɔ m, kʋ pakkɩ cibsa a zɔ, kʋ m gʋaa bɔ, m wɔ saa bɩ, awɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m zɩɩfʋrɔ cir bɩ bɔ, m wɔ saa gɛ?"
Ŋ n'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Naa do bɛɛ y, k'a Barabas bɔ!" A n bɔkarɛ, Barabas bɩ do, gərzer m.
Pɩlatɩ n a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ madɩɩrɔ m.
Rɔm sʋrdaarɔ n laa waa, ŋn'a ku a mim ma, ŋnɩ cinno huu kʋ n y'a ba pɛɛra piinə m sa, ŋn'a da ra,
ŋn'a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m, zɩɩfʋrɔ cir!" Ŋ n'a wɔ tɩntam lɛ.
Pɩlatɩ n a bɔ, an bɔ garga ra, an a hɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ yɩ ra, mɔɔ y'a gaarɛ, m bɔ m garga ra naa ʋ. Awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ a ʋ, mɔɔ n mim k'a a zar bɩ yɩ y."
Yeezuu n bɔ garga ra b'ʋ, kan laa bɩ kɩ, cinno huu bɩ kɩ a ra. Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ba gʋaa bɩ n na."

Kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, k'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!" Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a gaa a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma a zim. Bala, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɩ, an a ba, an bʋnyaa y."
Zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ɩ lɛ m, bɩ kan wɔɔ lɛ bɩ kɩ, a a ga zɛ m, bala, a a mɩŋŋa sa, an a ba Woso Nyɩ!"
Kʋ Pɩlatɩ mim naa do ma bɩ, dabɔʋ a nyasʋ an lɛ da biisi m.
A n a bɔ, an ta dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Ɩ to ɩbɩɩ ʋ ka?" Yeezuu n hɔsɩ nyɩ bɔ nʋ y.
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ bɩr a nyɩ bɔm mɔɔ nʋ ra? Ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ m da ma, m wɔ saa ɩbɩɩ ma ra, gɛɛ, mɔɔ m da ma, m a ka, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma ra?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ hɔsɩ ba mɔɔ m k'a a to bɛɛ n y'a ʋ brama, n n lɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ y. Bɩ minto y'a ka sɔ, gʋaa k'a mɔɔ nyasʋ an mɔɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ, mimbʋnyaa gandaara a a ba!"
Bɩ tɛkka ma, Pɩlatɩ y'a kam ma k'a wɔ saa ma, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nɩ zee darɛ ŋ ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ wɔ saa ma, Rɔm cir gʋaasɩba bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m dɔ y! Bala, gʋaa k'a mɩŋŋa ba cir bɩ, cir bɩ jɩm m."
Pɩlatɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a a ka, ŋnɩ bɔ Yeezuu m. Pɩlatɩ n nyɩnta dʋdɔkarɛ gɔ bɩ ra, bɩncɛ kʋ n'a birm ebree lemim m Gabata b'ʋ.
Pakkɩ cibsa bankarɛ hinni m, sinuu ʋ. Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ cir bɩ ba n nɩ!"

Ŋ n'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a zɛ gər! K'a zɛ gər! K'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma!" Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "M awɔɔ cir bɩ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma ra?" Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ba cir vanta m kʋ Rɔm cir bɛɛ y."
Pɩlatɩ n Yeezuu ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma. Ŋ n Yeezuu nyasʋ.
Yeezuu n a gɔdarkʋra busu a zim, an bɔ, an ta bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm Minkorgo, n n'a hɩm ma ebree lemim m Golgotaa b'ʋ.
Bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, ŋ y'a wɔ ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma kan gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kɩ, deem jɩsa, deem bɩsɩ, Yeezuu nɩ ŋ bire ʋ.
Pɩlatɩ n gʋrsɩra ba warga ma, an a wɔ gɔdarkʋra b'ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Yeezuu Nazarɛtɩ gʋaa, zɩɩfʋrɔ cir.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔ gʋta warga bɩ karɩnda ba, bala, bɩncɛ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ bɩ laatʋ tara nɔ bɩ ma y. B'a gʋrsɩra ba n y'a ʋ ebree lemim m, grɛkkɩ lemim m, kan latɛn lemim kɩ m.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ Pɩlatɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩ b'a gʋrsɩra ba zɩɩfʋrɔ cir y, a gʋrsɩra ba: A a hɩ, a ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ cir n a mɩ."
Pɩlatɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ gʋrsɩra ba bɩ, a ba mɔɔ ʋ."
Kʋ Rɔm sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a huuro gʋr, ŋn'a jir lɛ si. Gʋaa biyəə a yɩ deem. Zaba b'ɩ gɔɔta. A ba n y'a ʋ deem jilli.

Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ b'a kaansʋ y, ʋ pʋɛɛga da ma, ʋ dɩga a, kʋ nka n n'a yɩrɛ." Kʋ Wosoci bɩ meerbaa naa do n kʋ yɩ: 'Ŋ mɔɔ huuro jinjir kan kʋ kɩ, ŋnɩ pʋɛɛga da mɔɔ zaba ma.' Hɔ kʋ sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ a ba bɩ n naa.
Yeezuu gɔdarkʋra bɩ jɩr ʋ bɩ, a da ɩ jɩnɩm b'ʋ kan a da bɩ dam kɩ, Klopas lʋ Maarii kɩ, kan Magdalaa kʋ Maarii kɩ.
K'a a da bɩ yɩ kan a karɩndanyɩ k'a ŋʋa bɩ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ a da bɩ m, a ʋ: "M naa, ba ɩ nyɩ n na!"
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, an a hɩ a karɩndanyɩ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ba ɩ da n na!" Wakatɩ bɩ do ma, karɩndanyɩ b'a da bɩ gaa, an doo m.
Yeezuu k'a a dɔ kɛɛrɛ a ʋ, hɔ haay ba an nya, kʋ Wosoci meerbaarɔ wɔɔ n kʋ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɩsɩ nɩ mɔɔ zɛm."
Gər ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ bɛɛ hɛɛnr n a han. Ŋ n hizɔp gɔ sa ŋnɩ hɔ k'an mafʋ-mafʋ kʋsɩ ma, ŋn'a nyɔɔ bɛɛ hɛɛnr ma, ŋn'a ka Yeezuu ʋ.
Kʋ Yeezuu bɩ mi bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔ haay ba an nya." A n a mim zuutə, an ga.

Kʋ pakkɩ cibsa bankarɛ hinni m bɩ, nyibəə gasʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋ lɛ baa kʋ gəəno wɔɔ n gɔɔta gɔdarkʋrarɔ wɔɔ ma sabaa hinni ʋ b'ʋ y. Sabaa bɩ do, cibsa gʋta m. Ŋ y'a yɛ Pɩlatɩ han, k'a ŋ gannɔ yɩnyar, k'a ŋ zer gɔdarkʋrarɔ wɔɔ ma.
Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ gannɔ yɩnyar: lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ kan a nyaʋrɛzaa bɩ kɩ.
Kʋ ŋ lee ku Yeezuu zi bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a, a ga kara, bɩ ŋ n a gannɔ yɩnyar y.
Bɩ sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem a hɔn sɔɔn m a boon ma, ma n bɔ kan hi kɩ.
Gʋaa k'a yɩ b'a kasɛtɩ ka, b'a kasɛtɩ bɩ sɩra m. B'a dɔ, a ʋ, sɩra an n'a hɩm, k'awɔɔ n a si sɩra sɔ.
Sɩra m, ba naa haay ʋ, kʋ Wosoci meerbaa naa do n kʋ yɩ: 'A yaarɔ wɔɔ haay deem taan••• bɩ yarlɛ y.'
Wosoci bɩ bɩncɛ niŋŋə ta ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Ŋ zɛm bɩ gʋaa kʋ ŋ y'a hɔn bɩ yɩ.'

Minno nɔɔn duro kʋ ŋ cem bɩ, Arimatee kʋ gʋaa Zozɛf k'a nyɩnta Yeezuu karɩndanyɩ sɛɛrɛ, nyi k'a n'a bam zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ minto. A bɩ zaa yɛ Pɩlatɩ han k'a Yeezuu gər bɩ sa. Pɩlatɩ n zaa ka, an bʋr an b'a gər bɩ sa.
Nikodɛm bʋr sɔ. A ɩ nyɩnta an ta Yeezuu zi gunuu ʋ bɩ. A mɩɩr war kʋ ma kan tidəər kʋ n n'a birm alʋɛsɩ kɩ, n a a zɔ a cilo bukərku ma.
Ŋ n Yeezuu gər bɩ sa, ŋnɩ pɛɛrarɔ bumburgu ma kan tidəər kɩ amba zɩɩfʋrɔ gər birle m.
Brikə nɩ bɩncɛ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma ʋ b'ʋ, brikə bɩ do nɔ ʋ, yaa daa nɩ b'ʋ, n n gər bir ʋ cɩna y.
Bɩ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n'a bankarɛ sabaa k'a n'a bam k'a sɩŋŋɩda sa minto bɩ, bɩ yaa bɩ do k'an jɩnjɛɛm sɔ bɩ, ŋ Yeezuu bir ʋ.
Hatʋ hinni b'ʋ wutigʋta m, bɩ ma bɩ dɔ n mɛ y, Magdalaa Maarii ta yaa ra b'ʋ, a yaa dɩga a, n jaa bɩ gʋ yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ.
A n bra si, an aa Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr yɩ, kan karɩndanyɩ deem kʋ Yeezuu a ŋʋa bɩ kɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "N Zuuba bɔ yaa b'ʋ, bɩ wɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ ta n y'a ʋ m ka y."
Pɩyɛɛr n bɔ kan karɩndanyɩ deem bɩ kɩ, ŋnɩ ta yaa ra b'ʋ.
Ŋ hɩɩya haay bra si, karɩndanyɩ deem bɩ bra si, an cem Pɩyɛɛr han, an lɛɛ ka yaa ra b'ʋ.
A n zerga an pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ kuntəm b'ʋ. Bɩ, a n gasʋ y.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr k'a zu a jɛ ʋ bɩ, a lee ku sɔ. A n gasʋ yaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, an pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ kuntəm b'ʋ,
kan pɛɛra kʋ n y'a burgu a mim ma bɩ kɩ. Bɩ, bɩ n nyɩnta kan pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ kɩ y. A huŋŋu n y'a ʋ, n n a cɩnta bɩncɛ vanta ʋ.
Karɩndanyɩ k'a lɛɛ ka an lee ku bɩ gasʋ yaa ʋ b'ʋ kɛɛrɛ. A n a yɩ, an sɩra ka.
Bɩ ŋ gɔɔta, ŋ n Wosoci bɩ jɩ ma y. Bala, a a hɩ, a ʋ, Yeezuu y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a wusigə, ŋnɩ doo.
Maarii gɔɔta garga ra yaa bɩ jɩr ʋ, an nɩ nyi kam. K'a nɩ nyi bɩ kam bɩ, a zerga, an dɩga yaa b'ʋ,
an malɛɛkarɔ yɩ hɩɩya, ŋn'ɩ huu furo m a ma, ŋnɩ nyɩnta bɩncɛ kʋ ŋ Yeezuu gər bɩ wʋta ʋ b'ʋ. Deem n'a mim ma, deem n'a gannɔ ma.
Ŋ n a hɩ lʋ bɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ nyi ɩbɩɩ n'a karɛ?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Zuuba n y'a busu, bɩ kʋ ta n y'a ʋ m ka, mɔɔ n a dɔ y."
K'a nɩ meer bɩ bam bɩ, a a bɔ an dɩga, an Yeezuu yɩ an nɩ jɩnɩm b'ʋ, b'a n a dɔ, a ʋ, Yeezuu nɩ y.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Lʋ, bɔ minto ɩ nɩ nyi karɛ? Nka ɩbɩɩ nɩ kam ma?" Lʋ bɩ hɔɔn ʋ bɩ, brikə bɩ dɔmazaa m, a ʋ: "Zuuba, k'ɩbɩɩ y'a busu, k'ɩ bɩncɛ hɩnka mɔɔ m, mɔɔ yaa busu."
Yeezuu n a hɩm, a ʋ: "Maarii". A n a wusigə, an a hɩ m ebree lemim m, a ʋ: "Rabuni" bɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ mɔɔ da jɩm ʋ y, mɔɔ n ta m Zɩ zi cɩna y. Bɩ, ta ɩ yaa hɩ mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ tarɛ m Zɩ k'a n'awɔɔ Zɩ bɩ zi, mɔɔ Woso k'a n'awɔɔ Woso bɩ zi."
Magdalaa kʋ Maarii bɩ n b'a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Zuuba yɩ, hɔ k'a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ!"

Hinni bɩ do yirbəə m, k'a nyɩnta hatʋ hinni bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ cɛlɛrɔ tɩnta a ma nyi kʋ ŋ n'a bam zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ minto. Yeezuu n bʋr, an bɩ jɩm ŋ bire ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ."
K'a nɩ meer bɩ bam bɩ, a a wɔrɔ wɔɔ hɩnka ŋ nɩ kan a boon bɩ kɩ. Kʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ Zuuba yɩ bɩ, ŋ haay heer nyɔɔ.
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ. Kʋ mɔɔ Zɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ nyɔɔm sɔ."
K'a meer ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a hoon si ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a Sɛnt-Ɛspri si.
Gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ n nɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ sugur yɩrɛ. Gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ bɩr ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ sugur yɩrɛ y."
Bɩ ma bɩ, bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem Toma kʋ n n'a birm Didim bɩ n nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ Yeezuu hɩnkarɛ dɔmɩm b'ʋ y.

Karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ Zuuba yɩ!" A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ n karɔ wɔɔ yaarɔ yɩ a wɔrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n m nyʋkʋm nyɔɔ ka yaa deem ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n m wɔ du a boon b'ʋ, mɔɔ b'a sire y."
Dɔmɩm sinnyə kur bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ya, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra har ʋ b'ʋ, Toma nɩ kan ŋ kɩ. Yeezuu n bʋr, bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ tɩnta, an bɩ jɩm ŋ bire ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ."
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, an a hɩ Toma m, a ʋ: "Ɩ zɔ, ɩ ɩ nyʋkʋm nyɔɔ naa ʋ, k'ɩ dɩga mɔɔ wɔrɔ ma, ɩ wɔ bɩ da mɔɔ mɛ ma, k'ɩ nyɔɔ mɔɔ boon ʋ, k'ɩ sɩra ka kɛɛrɛ, k'ɩ ba sɩrakarɛzaa."
Toma n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Zuuba, mɔɔ Woso."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ yɩ bɩ y'a ka, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ. Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n a yɩ, bɩ ŋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ m."
Yeezuu hoserlo ba gʋta karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ mɩm ʋ bɩ n n a gʋrsɩra ba ci naa do nɔ ʋ y.
Nawɔnnɔ gʋrsɩra ba n y'a ʋ, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka, a ʋ, Yeezuu m Krista, a m Woso Nyɩ. Bɩ, k'awɔɔ sɩra ka, k'a mɩsɩrbaa yɩ a tɔ ma.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩnka a karɩndanyɩnɔ m Tiberiyaadɩ kɔ lɛ ra. A hɩnkarɛ bɩ ba n nɩ.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr kan Toma kʋ n n'a birm Didim bɩ kɩ, Galilee kʋ Kanaa gʋaa Natanayɛl kɩ, Zebedee nyɩnɔ kɩ, kan karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ hɩɩya, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Ta mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ m aa zɔnɔ ba." Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ tam kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ." Ŋ n bɔ, ŋnɩ gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, bɩ gum bɩ do ʋ, ŋ n hɔsɩ nyasʋ y.
Bɩ ma bɩ, dɔ mɛ. Yeezuu n jɩm kɔ lɛ ra b'ʋ, bɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu nɩ y.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Hey! Nyɩnɔ, zɔnɔ b'awɔɔ ʋ ra?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Ayy•••"
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a zaŋŋa bɩ zo kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bɩsɩ ra, awɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ." Ŋ n zaŋŋa bɩ zo, an zɔ gʋr gʋta, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋn'a gaa y.
Karɩndanyɩ kʋ Yeezuu a ŋʋa bɩ n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Zuuba m!" Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr k'a a ma, n ʋ, Zuuba m bɩ, a huu sa, an a du a ma, nyɩnta a ʋ dɩgɩ, an a da hi b'ʋ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʋr kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ m, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋa bɩ gaam, zɔnɔ n a han, ŋ bɩ laatʋ kɔ bɩ lezi ma y. A gakʋ ʋ a ba kan mɛtɩr zɔrɔ kɩ.
Kʋ ŋ zer tara ʋ bɩ, ŋ sɛcɩna yɩ zɔ n ta ra kan bur kɩ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr zɔnɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ gʋr dɩɩtaa rɔ wɔɔ m."
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a bɔ, an gasʋ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, an zaŋŋa bɩ gaa tara ʋ, zɔ gʋta-gʋta n a han zɔrɔ busoor yaa kaakʋ, bɩ kan bɩ kɩ haay zaŋŋa bɩ n kaansʋ y.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr a hɔ bɩ." Bɩ karɩndanyɩ deem taan••• n laaka da han, a ʋ: "Nka n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ y?" Ŋ y'a dɔ mɩŋŋa, ŋ ʋ, Zuuba m.
Yeezuu n a zɔ kɛɛrɛ, an bur bɩ sa, an a ka ŋ ʋ. A n a ba zɔ bɩ m maam sɔ.
Yeezuu k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ, a gallɛm kaakʋ hɔ a hɩnka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m naa.

Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, Zaan nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ ŋʋa an lɛ da nawɔnnɔ ra ra?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn••• Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ ŋʋarɛ." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɔ mɔɔ sinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ ma."
Yeezuu n a hɩ m a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a ʋ: "Zaan nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋam na?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn••• Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ ŋʋarɛ." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɔ mɔɔ seero ma."

A kaakʋ hɔ ma bɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩmɔɔn, Zaan nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋam na?" Pɩyɛɛr heer a zar kan hɔ kʋ Yeezuu a hɩ m a kaakʋ hɔ ma bɩ kɩ. "Ɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʋam na?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔ haay dɔ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ ŋʋarɛ." Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Dɔ mɔɔ seero ma.

Sɩra paan••• mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta nyukumbueere bɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bankam, ɩ nɩ tarɛ ɩ hɔɔnhɔ bɩncɛ ʋ. K'ɩbɩɩ bɩ gusi, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ zarɔ hʋrm, gʋaa vanta n n'ɩbɩɩ banka, an ɩbɩɩ gaa, an ta ɩbɩɩ m bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa ʋ b'ʋ."
Yeezuu bɩ meer naa do ba a ʋ k'a zɛ niŋŋə k'a nɩ Pɩyɛɛr zɛm, an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ bɩ hɩnka. K'a meer naa do ba bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Zu mɔɔ ʋ."
Pɩyɛɛr k'a a bɔ, an dɩga bɩ, a karɩndanyɩ kʋ Yeezuu a ŋʋa bɩ yɩ a jɛ ʋ. A ɩ nyɩnta hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, an zerga Yeezuu cɩ ra, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, nka n n'ɩbɩɩ nyasʋm, k'a ɩbɩɩ ka bɩ?"
Pɩyɛɛr k'a yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʋ: "Bɩ naa, Zuuba, bɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ naa yɩ?"
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ ʋ k'an gɔɔta an ta an mɔɔ wusigəre ku, kara y'ɩbɩɩ ku? Ɩbɩɩ, zu mɔɔ ʋ."

Meerbaa naa do minto y'a ka, n n so ra danyɩnɔ wɔɔ barla, ŋ ʋ, karɩndanyɩ naa do bɩ garɛ y. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʋ, a bɩ garɛ y. A a hɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ mɔɔ lɛ taa k'an gɔɔta, an ta an mɔɔ wusigəre ku, kara y'ɩbɩɩ ku?"
Karɩndanyɩ bɩ do nɩ minno nɔɔn duro kasɛtɩ kam, an nɩ ŋ gʋrsɩra barɛ, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʋ, a kasɛtɩ bɩ sɩra m.
Yeezuu a ya, an hɔɔ gʋtɔɔ ba. K'a gʋrsɩra n n'a bam deem-deem, mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ, durnya haay b'a dam ma, an ciro kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ gʋrsɩra bam nɔ wɔɔ si y.
Teofil, m lɛɛkarɛ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ Yeezuu zibəə haay k'a ba kan hɔ haay k'a dɩnda bɩ da ʋ, an a sa a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ,
an ta, an hinni k'a zibəəzannɔ bɔ ʋ, an a lɛrɔ ka ŋ ʋ, kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ, an ta an a dɔmɩm k'a der ʋ arzana ʋ bɩ ku.

Brɔɔ a a hɩnka ŋ nɩ mɩsɩr a zɛ bɩ kur, kan makrarɔ gʋtɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩsɩkarɛ ba ʋ kɩ, a ʋ: a a mɩm bɔ ʋ, a m mɩsɩr. A kasɛtɩ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta. Dɔmɩm busi nɔ ʋ, a a hɩnka ŋ nɩ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
A nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ hindeem ʋ, an lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, a ʋ: ŋ bɩ bɔ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ y, bɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta ŋnɩ dɔ Zɩ Woso lerbɔrɛ bɩ ma. "Hɔ niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma, mɔɔ n a hɩ m lɛ m bɩ.
Zaan hi batɛm ka denter, b'awɔɔ, naa kan dɔmɩm poore kɩ, awɔɔ batɛm sim Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ."
Ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋnɩ laaka naa do da han, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba, naa ma ɩbɩɩ n nɩ Israyɛl cirbəə bɩ bankaŋ ʋ gɛ?"
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ n a ga m k'a dɔmɩnnɔ kan wakatɩrɔ kɩ kʋ Zɩ Woso a cɩnta a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa m bɩ dɔ y.
Bɩ, awɔɔ paŋŋa yɩrɛ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔ m, an nɩ zɛm bɩ zer awɔɔ mim ʋ, a paŋŋa karɛ awɔɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ nyɩntam mɔɔ kasɛtɩzannɔ Zerizalɛm ʋ, Zidee haay kan Samarii kɩ haay, kan tara lɛ cɩnta jɩ kɩ."
Kʋ Yeezuu minno nɔɔn duro hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, a der ŋ mɩnyaa m, warkʋ bʋr an b'a nyaam ŋ lɛɛ.
Kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ dɩgam brama ma bɩ, gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ bʋr ŋnɩ huu fu du a ma, ŋnɩ bɩ jɩm ŋ jɩr ʋ.
Ŋ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Galilee gʋɔɔ ra, bɔ minto m, awɔɔ n gɔɔta an nɩ dɩgam brama ncɩnaaʋ? Yeezuu naa do kʋ n y'a bɔ awɔɔ bire ʋ an der brama bɩ y'a bɔrɛ an bʋr maam, amba awɔɔ yɩ an der brama bɩ m."
Kʋ ŋ zer ci kʋ n n'a birm Oliviyee ci bɩ ra bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ. Bɩ ci bɩ do, a ga a ʋ sabaa dɔmɩm tarɛ m, amba n lɛ ka bɩ m.

Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku bɩ, ŋ der cɛ k'a nɩ mim ʋ b'ʋ, amba ŋ tɩr a ba biisi bɩ m. Bɩncɛ bɩ do, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ, Zakkɩ kɩ, Andɩr kɩ, Filipi kan Toma kɩ, Bartelemii kan Matiyee kɩ, Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ kan Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n n'a birm Zelɔtɩ bɩ kɩ, kan Zakkɩ nyɩ Ziidi kɩ tɩr kʋ zɛ ʋ.
Ŋ haay a zɛ kʋ ra lɛ deem ŋn'a tɔŋ ʋ kan yaadarɛ kɩ, kan lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ Yeezuu da Maarii kɩ, kan Yeezuu danyɩnɔ kɩ.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, gʋɔɔ a so kʋ ma b'ʋ, ŋ lɛ n a zɔ zɔrɔ buhɩra ma. Pɩyɛɛr n wuti a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ:
"M danyɩnɔ, a ga a wʋm kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri mim k'a hɩ Davɩd lɛ m Wosoci nɔ ʋ Zidas k'a ka lɛɛ, ŋnɩ Yeezuu nyasʋ bɩ minto bɩ n kʋ yɩ.
A nyɩnta wɔɔ bire ʋ, an a hɔ jirle hɔ yɩ, wɔɔ zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, gʋaa bɩ do, zibəə bʋnyaa k'a a ba bɩ, a bɩ busoo bɩ sa, an tara si m. A do a ʋ a nɔ ra, a nɔ bɩ n haan, a nɔbaarɔ haay n bɔ, ŋnɩ sur tara ʋ.
Zerizalɛm gʋɔɔ haay a dɔ. Bɩ y'a ka ŋn'ɩ tara bɩ birm a lemim m Hakɛldamaa, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Ma tara.
Sɩra m, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʋ laarɔ ci nɔ ʋ: K'a har n gɔɔta zer, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩnta ʋ y. Bɩ, a a ya an a hɩ, a ʋ: Kʋ gʋaa vanta n a zibəə bɩ sa.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ wɔɔ da zaa ʋ lɛɛ haay ʋ dɔmɩm kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu mɩsɩrbaa ba ʋ wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ,
an a sa Yeezuu batɛm k'a a si Zaan zi bɩ ma, an ta an dɔmɩm k'a der ʋ arzana ʋ bɩ ku bɩ, a a ga m, kʋ ŋ gʋaa deem n a ba kan wɔɔ kɩ a mɩmbɔʋrɛ kasɛtɩzaa."
N ŋ hɩnka hɩɩya, Zozɛf kʋ n n'a birm Barsabas, n nɩ so ra, n n'a tɔ ka Zistus bɩ m kan Matɩyas kɩ.
Ŋ n yaa da ncɩnaaʋ: "Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ gʋaa haay heer dɔ, dɩga gʋaa hɩɩya naa bire ʋ ɩ gʋaa k'ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʋ bɩ hɩnka wɔɔ m,
k'an nyɩnta lemim nyɩnta zibəəzaa, bɩncɛ kʋ Zidas a to an ta a bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ."
Ŋ n pʋɛɛga da, an jɩm Matɩyas mim ʋ. Bɩ y'a da kristazibəəzannɔ bueeredeenno wɔɔ barla.
Pantɩkɔtɩ dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'a so kʋ ma haay bɩncɛ deem ʋ.
Lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ bʋgʋr ma am hɩnhɛr gʋta hɔ bɩ m, an a to brama, an bɩ har kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ bɩ han haay.
Ŋ n hɔ yɩ an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sɛ nɛɛm kɩ, an a jinjir, an a cɩnta gʋaa biyəə mim ʋ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ ŋ haay han, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'ɩ lemim vantɔɔ hɩm amba Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩ bɩ m.
Bala, zɩɩfʋrɔ wosohɔɔnhɔbarɛzannɔ y'a to durnya kʋrɔ haay ʋ, ŋnɩ bʋr, ŋn'ɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ.
Bʋgʋr bɩ k'a ba bɩ, zamaa b'a so kʋ ma, bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, bala, gʋaa biyəə nyɩnta an nɩ ŋ mam, ŋn'ɩ meer barɛ a do lemim m.
Hɔ k'a nɩ bam b'a ka ŋnɩ zɛ kədə, gʋaa biyəə n a lɛ gu, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay kʋ ŋ nɩ meer bam naa, Galilee gʋɔɔ bɛɛ ra?
Bɩ, a ba a ʋ lɔ, wɔɔ gʋaa biyəə nɩ ŋ marɛ a do lemim nɩ?
Partɩ zannɔ kan Mɛɛdɩ zannɔ kɩ, Elamitɩ kan Mezopotamii zannɔ kɩ, Zidee zannɔ kan Kapadɔs zannɔ kɩ, Pɔn zannɔ kan Azii zannɔ kɩ,
Frizii zannɔ kan Panfilii zannɔ kɩ, Eziptɩ zannɔ kan Libii Sirɛnnɩ zannɔ kɩ, kan Rɔm zannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ m Zɩɩfʋrɔ, kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Krɛtɩ zannɔ kan Araabɩrɔ kɩ, wɔɔ y'a mam, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso zibəə mɩŋŋa b'ʋ, wɔɔ do lemim m."
Mim naa do k'a ba bɩ cem ŋ han haay, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kʋ ma, ŋn'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Naa lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʋ lɔ?"
Gɔsɩnnɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ yaa wʋrɛ ŋ ma, ŋ ʋ: "Bɛɛ yɩ ŋ ka."

Pɩyɛɛr n wuti meerbaa m bueeredeenno kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ: "Zidee zannɔ, kan awɔɔ haay k'a nɩ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a hɔ k'a nɩ bam bɩ jɩ ma mɩŋŋa, k'a tʋr gʋ mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma.
Ayy•••, gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n bɛɛ mi amba awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ nɩ y. Dɔ k'a mɛ naa, wakatɩ kaakʋ wɔɔ n ta ma cɩna.
Bɩ naa do naa, hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zowɛl a hɩ bɩ n naa:

Ba hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ bɩ n na: Dɔmɩnnɔ jɛzannɔ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ yɩ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri zerm gʋaa haay mim ʋ, awɔɔ gʋɔɔ yaarɔ kan lannɔ kɩ Woso lɛ sire ŋnɩ so ra, awɔɔ gʋɔɔ pooro hɔhɩnkarɛrɔ yɩm, awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gusinno hɔɔ yɩrɛ nɩnnarɛrɔ nɔ ʋ.
Sɩra m, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nɔ ʋ, yaarɔ kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ zi bam nɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ yɩ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ zerle ŋ la, ŋn'ɩ Woso lɛ si ŋnɩ so ra.
Mɔɔ hɔɔ gʋtɔɔ bam brama, m makrarɔ ba tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, ma kan sɛ kɩ, siŋŋə kɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ.
Woso gure y'a lʋrm an a ba am monsigə hɔ bɩ m, mom n a lʋr am ma hɔ bɩ m, kʋ Zuuba dɔmɩm gʋta kan a cirbəə kɩ bɩ n bɔkarɛ, an lee ku.
Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ Zuuba birm yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ n nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm."

"Israyɛl zannɔ, k'a tʋr ka mɔɔ meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ma: Amba awɔɔ dɔ bɩ nɩ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ, gʋaa bɩ do Woso a kasɛtɩ ka ʋ awɔɔ zi, an nɩ hoserlo bam, kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n a yɩ cɩna bɩ kɩ, kan makrarɔ kɩ awɔɔ bire ʋ.
Gʋaa bɩ do, awɔɔ nyasʋ a da gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔ ʋ, ŋn'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, amba Woso lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta a zim a hɔdɔrɛ nɔ ʋ k'an ba bɩ m.
Bɩ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ, an a bʋmbɔ zɛ kaʋdabaa ma, bala, zɛ b'a dam ma an gɔɔta m a cirbəə nɔ ʋ y.
Sɩra m, Davɩd a hɩ a minto, a ʋ: Mɔɔ ɩ Zuuba yɩrɛ m lɛɛ dɔmɩm haay, bala, a ɩ mɔɔ bɩsɩ ra, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ m da ma, m m do y.
Mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ sɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛm nɩ heernyɩnta laa lɔm, mɔɔ mɛ nɩ mɛnyɔɔ dam taaheerlɛ nɔ ʋ an lɛ da.
Bala, mɔɔ dɔ ɩbɩɩ bɩ mɔɔ nyi to m gəəno bɩncɛ ʋ y. Ɩbɩɩ gʋaa paan••• m mɔɔ m, ɩ bɩ mɔɔ tore m vɔn y.
Ɩbɩɩ mɩsɩrbaa zaa hɩnka mɔɔ m, ɩbɩɩ y'a kam mɔɔ m heernyɔɔ yɩ ɩ zi."
"M danyɩnɔ, zaa ta ʋ kʋ m a hɩ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, m a bɔ kʋ zi: Wɔɔ yaaba Davɩd ga, n n a bir, a yaa gɔɔta an nɩ wɔɔ zi naa ʋ her.
B'a nyɩnta wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa, an a dɔ, a ʋ: Woso a wer si m, a do gʋaa bɔrɛ, an nyɩnta a cirbəəduu ra.
A lɛɛ ka an Krista mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ yɩ, bɩ, a minto y'a ka an a hɩ, a ʋ: N n a to gəəno bɩncɛ ʋ y, b'a mɛsim n vɔnrɛ dɔ y.
Woso Yeezuu bɩ do mɩm bɔ ʋ, wɔɔ haay, a kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m.
Woso a busu a bɩsɩ ʋ a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a Zɩ a ler bɔm bɩ, a a yɩ, an a jir, amba awɔɔ n'a yɩm, an n'a mam sɔ bɩ m.
Bala, Davɩd k'an der paan••• arzana ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ: Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ Zuuba m: nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʋ
an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ bam ɩ gankarahɔ bɩ ku."
"Kʋ Israyɛl do haay n a dɔ mɩŋŋa: Yeezuu niŋŋə k'awɔɔ wɔ gɔ ma bɩ, bɩ Woso a ba Zuuba kan Krista kɩ."
Kʋ ŋ heer a zɛ kʋ ma kan minno nɔɔn duro marɛ kɩ bɩ, ŋ Pɩyɛɛr lar kan kristazibəəzannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ a ba lɔ, ʋ danyɩnɔ?"
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a a bɔ a mimbʋnyaarɔ ʋ, kʋ gʋaa biyəə m batɛm si Yeezuu tɔ ma a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto. B'awɔɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri yɩm ganwʋrɛ.
Lerbɔrɛ naa do, awɔɔ hɔ m kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ laatʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ Zuuba wɔɔ Woso n nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ kɩ."
Pɩyɛɛr meer ba gʋta, an n'a kasɛtɩ kam, an nɩ ŋ heer bam kookoo, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a a gʋ her gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɔɔn ma."
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a meerbaarɔ wɔɔ si rɔ wɔɔ ŋ batɛm si. Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ lɛ a zɔ tisi kaakʋ ma.
Ŋ yɛ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ karɩnda bɩ ma, ŋn'ɩ tam lɛɛ dɔmɩm haay, ŋn'a zɛm kʋ ra, ŋn'ɩ Zuuba zɛkʋra hɔbɩrɛ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ yaa darɛ.
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hoserlo bam gʋta kan makrarɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ haay zɛ kədə.
Gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ haay a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'a hɔ haay zɛm kʋ ra.
Ŋ y'a wɔhɔɔ hɛɛrɛ kan a arzakarɔ kɩ, k'a bɩ ŋ jir kan kʋ kɩ amba gʋaa biyəə lɛ n taa bɩ m.
Dɔmɩm haay, ŋ y'a zɛm kʋ ra Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'a zɛm kʋ ra a harlɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu zɛkʋra hɔ bɩrɛ kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, noonhubaa kɩ.
Ŋ n'ɩ Woso daŋ ʋ, do bɩ haay n a lɛ bɔrɛ ŋ ʋ. Dɔmɩm biyəə, Zuuba a ka gʋɔɔ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ, sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ lɛ n'a dam la.
Yirbəə deem m wakatɩ kaakʋ hɔ ma bɩ, yaadarɛ wakatɩ m bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ ta Wosocɛ ʋ.
Gʋaa n nɩ b'ʋ, an yɩ lʋgɔ, n n tɩr a busu dɔmɩm haay, n n aa nyɩnta Wosocɛ lɛ kʋ n n'a birm "cɛlɛ gʋɛrɛ-gʋɛrɛ" bɩ ma, k'an hɔ yɩnyɛ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋm Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ han.
K'a Pɩyɛɛr yɩ kan Zaan kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam k'a gasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a hɔ yɛ ŋ han.
Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ n dɩga a sɩɩ••• ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Dɩga wɔɔ ma!"
Gʋaa bɩ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma, bala, dɔ an nawʋrɛ ŋ ma kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ ka a ʋ.
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ba sarma m gɛɛ wanzur nɩ y. Bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ: Yeezuu Krista, Nazarɛtɩ gʋaa bɩ tɔ ma, wuti ɩ ta!"
A n a sa a bɩsɩ wɔ ma, an a ka an wuti. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋaa bɩ gannɔ kan a gankʋyɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ a bɔ kʋ zi.
A n wuti brama vugur, an nɩ tam. A n gasʋ kan ŋ kɩ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ tam, an nɩ hinherm, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
Zamaa bɩ haay n a yɩ an nɩ tam, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
N y'a dɔ: A mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta Wosocɛ lɛ gʋɛrɛ-gʋɛrɛ bɩ lɛ ma an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm bɩ. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋ da n bɔ ʋ, hɔ k'a ba gʋaa bɩ m bɩ tɔ ma.
Gʋaa bɩ n a ya, an n'a gʋm Pɩyɛɛr ma kan Zaan kɩ y. Zamaa bɩ haay n a si ŋnɩ ta ŋ zi laŋŋa kʋ n n'a birm "Salomɔɔn laŋŋa" bɩ taa. Hɔ k'a ba b'a ka ŋnɩ zɛ kədə.

Pɩyɛɛr k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Israyɛl zannɔ, bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ zɛm kədə hɔ k'a ba naa ma? Gɛɛ bɔ minto m, awɔɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʋ, gʋaa naa k'a nɩ tam bɩ, wɔɔ paŋŋa gɛɛ wɔɔ mɩŋŋabaa y'a ka, an nɩ tarɛ?
Abraham, Izakkɩ, kan Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso k'a m wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso bɩ y'a lɛ bɔ a Zibəənyɩ Yeezuu b'ʋ. Bɩ, awɔɔ nyɩnta a nyasʋ a ka Pɩlatɩ ʋ, an a ŋʋa k'a wɔ saa, awɔɔ n a gu bɩ.
Awɔɔ, Gʋaa mɩŋŋa k'an tɩrga bɩ, awɔɔ kaanm bɩ m, a yɛ kʋ n nɩ wɔ saa gərzer bɩ ma.
Mɩsɩrbaa cir b'awɔɔ zɛ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, a kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m.
Sɩrakarɛ minto y'a ka Yeezuu tɔ ma, wɔɔ n tɔ naa do hɩ, ʋ yaabazaa k'awɔɔ n nɩ dɩgam ma a dɔ sɔ naa waa. Bɩ, sɩrakarɛ k'a a to Yeezuu zi bɩ y'a ka gʋaa naa n a waa awɔɔ haay bire ʋ."
"Sɩra m, m danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ badɔ y'a ka awɔɔ n a ba ncɩnaaʋ haay, awɔɔ kan a cinno wɔɔ kɩ.
Woso mɩŋŋa lɛɛ ka an a hɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lɛ m, a ʋ: A Krista bɩ fɩr yɩrɛ, b'a kʋ yɩ maam sɔ.
K'a a bɔ a mimbʋnyaarɔ ʋ, k'a a bɔ a bʋr Woso zi, k'a a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ.
Zuuba Woso mɛnyɔɔ dɔmɩnnɔ kam, an Yeezuu bʋmbɔrɛzaa niŋŋə k'a banka wɔɔ minto bɩ nyɔɔ.
K'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ, nyɩnta an nawʋm b'ʋ, an dɔ hɔ haay bankarɛ dɔmɩm ma, dɔmɩm niŋŋə kʋ Woso a hɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛ m biisi bɩ m.
Moyiisi lɛɛ ka an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba Woso y'a lɛsinnɩsorazaa bɔŋ ʋ awɔɔ danyɩnɔ bire ʋ awɔɔ minto, amba mɔɔ m. K'a tʋr ka hɔ haay k'a n'a hɩm bɩ ma.
Gʋaa k'a n a tʋr ka wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ do lemim ma, kʋ n n a bɔ do barla, n n'a zɛ gər.'
Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ haay, an a sa Sanwɛl ma kan a jɛzannɔ kɩ dɔmɩnnɔ kʋ wɔɔ n ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nɔɔn mim hɩ.
Awɔɔ m wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kan gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ Woso a cɩnta kan awɔɔ zɩrɔ kɩ bɩ hɔyɩrɛzannɔ, dɔmɩm k'a hɩ ʋ Abraham m, a ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ yaŋŋɔɔ minto, do haay k'a nɩ tara burə ʋ barka yɩm.'
Woso k'a Zibəənyɩ bɩ bɔ ʋ bɩ lɛɛ ka an a nyɔɔ awɔɔ zi an a barka zer awɔɔ mim ʋ, an n'a kam awɔɔ gʋaa haay n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ tore."
Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan zamaa bɩ kɩ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cir bɩ kɩ, kan Sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ bʋr ŋ zi.
Ŋ heer busu kan ŋ kɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ karɩnda dɩndam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu mim hɩm gʋɔɔ m kan gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ kɩ bɩ minto.
Ŋ nɩ ŋ gʋr, ŋnɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, bala, gum da, ŋn'a to dɔ n mɛ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ, gʋta a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ. Ŋ lɛ wuti an a zɔ tisi soor ma.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, cinno kʋ ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ kan tara bɩ gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a zɛ kʋ ra.
Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Hannɩ nyɩnta ʋ kan Kayiifʋ kɩ, Zaan kan Alɛsandɩr kɩ, kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay.
Ŋ n a ka, ŋnɩ Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zaan kɩ, ŋnɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ a taa, ŋn'ɩ ŋ larlɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ paŋŋa m, gɛɛ nka tɔ awɔɔ yu ma an nɩ naa barɛ?"
Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a Pɩyɛɛr han bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"Kʋ lɛɛzannɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ, her naa ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ lar awɔɔ nawʋm hɔ mɩŋŋa kʋ wɔɔ ba lʋgɔ naa do m bɩ minto. Kʋ a hɩ, k'a ba wɔɔ ʋ lɔ gʋaa naa do n a waa gɛ?

K'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, awɔɔ haay kan Israyɛl do haay kɩ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu Krista tɔ minto m. Awɔɔ y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma, Woso n a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, a minto y'a ka gʋaa naa do n a waa, an n'awɔɔ lɛɛ naa ʋ.
Amba Wosoci a hɩ bɩ m, 'jaa k'awɔɔ cɛdonno, wɔɔ a bɔ ʋ a zo bɩ, a y'a ba cɛjɩr jaa.'
Bʋmbɔrɛzaa vanta ba ʋ bɩncɛ vanta ʋ k'a bɛɛ y. Tɔ vanta ba ʋ durnya nɔ ʋ n n a ka gʋɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ ʋ da ma ʋ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ k'a bɛɛ y."
Kʋ ŋ Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ heerkoodəbaa bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, ŋ n karɩnda ba y, targarɔ m bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə. Ŋ y'a dɔ kɛɛrɛ, ŋ ʋ Yeezuu zukuuzannɔ m,
ŋn'ɩ dɩgam gʋaa k'a waa bɩ ma a jɩr ʋ, ŋ n hɔ k'a n'a hɩm bɩ dɔ y.
Ŋ n lɛ ka, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta k'a dɩga ŋ mim ma.
Ŋ n'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'ʋ a ba gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n lɔ? Kʋ sɩra nɩ, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, ŋ hoser ba, bɩ wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ bɩsɩ ka ma y.
Ʋ ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ da jɩm ʋ, k'a bɩ lee ku lɛɛ haay ʋ y. Ʋ bɔ ŋ lɛɛ, kʋ ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ meer ba kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ tɔ naa do minto y."
Ŋ n a ka, ŋnɩ ŋ bir, ŋnɩ lɛ ka ŋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ Yeezuu tɔ hɩ, gɛɛ, ŋn'a mim dɩnda y.
Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ m mɩŋŋa Woso mɩm ʋ? Ʋ ʋ tʋr ka awɔɔ ma gɛɛ, ʋ ʋ tʋr ka Woso ma? K'a a hɔɔn da ma, a dɩga a.
Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ yɩ, ʋ a ma bɩ hɩrɛ to y."
Kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ hɔsɩ ba ŋ nɩ y. Ŋ n a ya, ŋnɩ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ to. Bala, gʋaa haay y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ hɔ k'a ba bɩ minto.
Bɩ, gʋaa k'a waarɛ yɩ hoser naa do barɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, a dɔɔraa lɛ da busi m.
Kʋ ŋ wɔ saa ŋ ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ ta a muno wɔɔ zi, ŋn'aa hɔ kʋ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan tara gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ a hɩ bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ.
N n a tʋr ka ŋ ma. Ŋ haay n a zɛ kʋ ra deem, ŋn'a hɩ Woso m, ŋ ʋ: "Karɩnsaamba, ɩbɩɩ 'brama da kan tara kɩ, hi kɩ, kan hɔ haay k'an a nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ.'
Ɩbɩɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa da ɩ zibəənyɩ Davɩd wɔɔ yaaba bɩ lɛ ʋ, minno nɔɔn duro minto: Bɔ minto kʋrɔ nɩ həən sire ncɩnaaʋ, zamaa n'a hɔɔn dam, hɔɔndarɛ vam-vam nɩ?
Durnya cinno n a zɔ kʋ ma, kʋrɔ cinno n a so kʋ ma k'a yar ba kan Zuuba Woso kɩ, a Krista kɩ.
Sɩra m, Hɩrɔɔdɩ kan Pɔns Pɩlatɩ kɩ a zɛ kʋ ra tara naa do nɔ ʋ, kan do vantɔɔ kɩ Israyɛl zannɔ kɩ, k'a yar ba kan Yeezuu ɩbɩɩ zibəəzaa mɩŋŋa k'ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ.
Naa ba ŋ y'a ʋ, k'ɩbɩɩ paŋŋa, ɩ hɔɔnhɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ ka ɩ cɩnta bɩ n kʋ yɩ.
Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Zuuba, ɩ tʋr ka ŋ nyaabarɛ meerbaa bɩ ma, k'ɩ ka k'ɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n'ɩ lemim bɩ hɩ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ.
Ɩ wɔ hʋr, ɩ ka kʋ yaabazannɔ m waarɛ yɩ, kʋ makrarɔ m ba, kan hoserlo kɩ ɩbɩɩ Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa Yeezuu tɔ ma."
Kʋ ŋ yaa bɩ da ŋn'a nya bɩ, bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ bɩ hinkə. Sɛnt-Ɛspri gasʋ ŋ ʋ an ŋ han haay. Ŋ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ pa dam kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ.
Zamaa bɩ kʋ ŋ y'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ, ŋ heer a ba deem, nyi deem, gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ hɔ m, a ʋ, awɔɔ y'a so ʋ y. Hɔ haay bɩ zɛ ŋ nawʋm kʋ ra deem.
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ɩ Zuuba Yeezuu mɩmbɔʋrɛ kasɛtɩ karɛ kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ. Ŋ haay nɩ zi bam Woso barka gʋta kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ m.
Gʋaa ba ʋ ŋ bire ʋ an cicirzaa y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tararɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, gɛɛ, ŋ nɩ harlɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ hɛɛ ŋ nawʋrɛ, ŋn'ɩ zɛrɛ a busoo kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ m,
ŋnɩ b'a ka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Gʋaa biyəə k'a lɛ taa daahan ma bɩ, a y'a yɩrɛ amba a lɛ taa bɩ m.
Amba Zozɛf kʋ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a tɔ ka Barnabas bɩ, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʋ "muno heeryurezaa" bɩ n nɩ hɔsɩra m. Levii do gʋaa m, an a to Siipɩr ʋ.
A n a hɔsɩra bɩ hɛɛ, an a busoo bɩ sa, an b'a ka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Gʋaa deem n ta ʋ, a tɔ m Ananɩyas, an kʋ ma kan a lʋ Safɩɩra kɩ ŋn'a tara hɛɛ.
A n kʋ ma kan a lʋ bɩ kɩ, an busoo bɩ bɔ ʋ an a cɩnta, an a mɩsɩ bɩ sa an aa a ka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ananɩyas, bɔ m Sʋtaana n'ɩbɩɩ heer han? Ɩbɩɩ ŋʋaar ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, ɩ tara k'ɩbɩɩ hɛɛ bɩ busoo bɩ bɔ ʋ.
Ɩbɩɩ n ɩ da ma ɩ tara bɩ hɛɛrɛ to, ɩ ba ɩ hɔ ra? Gɛɛ, k'ɩ hɛɛ, ɩ busoo bɩ sa ɩ hɔ k'ɩ lɛ n taa bɩ bam na? A ba ɩbɩɩ ʋ lɔ, ɩ naa da ɩ heer ʋ? Ŋʋaar bɛɛ ɩbɩɩ ba gʋɔɔ nɩ y, a ba ɩbɩɩ ʋ Woso m."
Ananɩyas k'a naa ma bɩ, an a do, an ga. Nyibəə gʋta gasʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ minno nɔɔn duro ma rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ pooro n bʋr, ŋnɩ b'a gər bɩ sa, ŋnɩ pɛɛra burgu ma, ŋn'aa a bir.
A maasɩrɛ ba, an a zɔ wakatɩ kaakʋ ma, a lʋ bɩ n bɩ gasʋ, an a dɔ kʋ bɔ ɩ ba y.
Pɩyɛɛr n a lar, a ʋ: "Tara bɩ k'awɔɔ hɛɛ bɩ, a lɛ paan••• m naa ra?" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn•••, a lɛ n bɩ bala."
Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an a lar, a ʋ: "A ba awɔɔ lɔ a a lɛ ba deem k'a Zuuba Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ makra ba? Ɩ tʋr ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yaa ɩbɩɩ zim bɩ bir lɔ wɔɔ gam heer ma hallɛ ma, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ busum sɔ."
Lɛɛm bɩ, Safɩɩra a do Pɩyɛɛr jɩr ʋ, an ga. Kʋ gʋɔɔ pooro wɔɔ bʋr bɩ, ŋ bɩ dɩga a a ga, ŋn'a busu k'a yaa bir a zim bɩ jɩr ʋ.
Dabɔʋ gʋta sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ haay, kan gʋaa haay k'a minno nɔɔn duro ma bɩ kɩ.
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ɩ makrarɔ kan hoserlo kɩ bam gʋta zamaa bɩ bire ʋ. Ŋ haay a zɛ kʋ ra deem Salomɔɔn laŋŋa taa b'ʋ.
Bɩ, gʋaa k'a n sɩra ka Woso ʋ paan••• bɩ bɩr yɛm an n'a zɛm kʋ ra kan ŋ kɩ y. Kan bɩ kɩ, zamaa bɩ n n'a lɛ bɔrɛ ŋ ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ cir gʋta, yaarɔ kan lannɔ kɩ ɩ sɩra kam Zuuba ʋ, ŋn'a zarlɛ ŋ la.
N n bʋr yaabazannɔ m zaarɔ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ wʋta gargʋrɔ ʋ gɛɛ gʋraŋŋarɔ ʋ, kʋ Pɩyɛɛr bʋr an nɩ cenim b'ʋ gɛɛ a hinni y'a kam niŋŋoo ra gɛ.
Gʋɔɔ gʋta n a to yaabazannɔ m Zerizalɛm gʋrgarɔ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ zinəro nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ, ŋn'a waa haay.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kan a jɛzannɔ kɩ, Sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ, wuti kan jɩmbaa heerbusu kɩ.
Ŋ n a ka, ŋnɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ gʋr gʋɔɔ mɩm m, ŋnɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
Gunuu ʋ bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka bʋr, an bɩ lɔnnɔcɛ bɩ lɛ rɔ wɔɔ gʋngʋ, an ŋ bɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"K'a ta a yaa jɩm Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, a mɩsɩrbaa daa naa do minno nɔɔn duro haay hɩ zamaa bɩ m."

Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, ŋ ta Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ k'a yaa dɩnda gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n lee ku kan a jɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ. A n a ka ŋnɩ dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ bir haay, Israyɛl gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ haay, an nyɔɔ da kʋ n aa kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, n nɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ ta bɩ, kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ n ŋ yɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ y. Ŋ n a wusigə ŋn'aa a hɩ, ŋ ʋ:
"Wɔɔ yaa lɔnnɔcɛ bɩ yɩ ŋn'a ta mɩŋŋa, a dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ n nɩ jɩnɩm cɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ ma. Kʋ wɔɔ gʋ bɩ, wɔɔ n gɔsɩ yɩ a nɔ ʋ y."
Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cir bɩ k'a naa ma kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ minto, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa larm naa k'a ba ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a jɩ nyɩntam lɔ?
Gʋaa n bʋr an b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ n gʋr a ŋ du rɔ wɔɔ ɩ Wosocɛ ʋ ŋn'ɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m."
Wosocɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n ta kan a zibəəzannɔ kɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zi, an aa ŋ gaa an bʋr ŋ nɩ. Ŋ n paŋŋa ba ŋ ma y, bala, ŋ y'ɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m, ŋ y'a a gʋngʋɛɛn jaarɔ m.
Ŋ n ŋ gaa, ŋnɩ bɩ ŋ hɩnka dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ m. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n ŋ lar, a ʋ:
"Wɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, ʋ ʋ: A b'a ya, a tɔ naa do hɩ a karɩnda nɔ ʋ y, awɔɔ karɩnda bɩ n bɔkarɛ an Zerizalɛm han, a lɛ n taa k'a gʋaa naa do ma bɩ ka wɔɔ mim la."
Pɩyɛɛr kan kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "A a ga m, k'ɩ Woso lɛ si, k'ɩ gʋɔɔ to.
Wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso, Yeezuu k'awɔɔ zeŋŋə gɔ ma a zɛ gər bɩ, mɩm bɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, Woso a busu a bɩsɩ ʋ arzana ʋ, an cirbəə ka ʋ, an a ba bʋmbɔrɛzaa, k'an a ka kʋ Israyɛl gʋɔɔ n a bɔ a taam, ŋnɩ ŋ sugur yɩ.
Minno nɔɔn duro kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m, wɔɔ kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri kʋ Woso a ka gʋɔɔ kʋ n n'a lɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ ʋ kɩ."
Minno nɔɔn duro ŋ heer busu, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ zɩnzɛrɛ ma.
Gʋaa deem n wuti dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ bire ʋ. Farizɛn m, a tɔ m Gamalɩyɛl, wosocikarɩnsaamba m, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n'a daŋ ʋ. A n lɛ ka kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m cɩna,
an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Israyɛl zannɔ, k'a dundo a zi mɩŋŋa kan hɔ k'awɔɔ k'a ba gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro m bɩ kɩ.

Dɔɔraarɔ kʋ ŋ cem dɩɩtaa rɔ nɔɔn nɔ ʋ, Tedas a hɩnka wɔɔ m, a ʋ: Gʋaa gʋta n'awɔɔ m. A n gʋɔɔ gaa, an ŋ so kʋ ma, ŋ lɛ n a zɔ zɔrsi ma. Ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa zɛ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay hɩsɩga da. Gɔsɩ n gɔɔta y.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ, lɛsarɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, Galilee gʋaa Zidas a hɩnka wɔɔ m. Gʋɔɔ gʋta nɩ zure a jɛ ʋ. Bɩ mɩŋŋa ga sɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zure a jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n hɩsɩga da.
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ, k'a gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro to kʋ ŋ nɩ cem, a bɩ hɔsɩ ba ŋ nɩ y. Meerbaa naa do kan zibəə naa do kɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ hɔɔ nɩ, ŋ nyaanlɛ a zim.
Bɩ kʋ Woso hɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a ka, ŋ n nyaam nɩ y. K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka, a bɩ yar ba kan Woso kɩ y." Ŋ yɛ Gamalɩyɛl meerbaa bɩ ma.
Ŋ nɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ bir, ŋn'a ka, ŋnɩ ŋ zɛ madɩɩrɔ m, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ, ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ Yeezuu tɔ hɩ y, ŋnɩ wɔ saa ŋ ma.
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n bɔ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, kʋ Woso yɛ ŋn'a ga fɩryɩrɛ m Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ minto.
Dɔmɩm biyəə, amba Wosocɛ ʋ gɛɛ har ʋ, ŋ bɩr Yeezuu Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ dɩndarɛ kan a padarɛ kɩ tore y.

Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ y'a dam la, zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ grɛkkɩ lemim hɩm nɔ wɔɔ n wuti kukur barɛ m kan kʋ bɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Bala, ŋ dɔmɩm haay hɔ jirle bɩ, ŋ bɩr a karɛ ŋ zonno wɔɔ ʋ y.
Bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ n zamaa sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A n a ga m k'ʋ wɔ saa Woso lemim nyɩnta pa darɛ ma, k'ʋ hɔbɩrɛ jir y.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a ka gʋɔɔ yaarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma a bire ʋ saanhɩna, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n ŋ heer han kan mindɔrɛ kɩ, k'ʋ zibəə naa do ka ŋ ʋ.
Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ba n bɩr ʋ tɔŋ ʋ kan yaadarɛ kɩ, ʋ bɩr Woso lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam."

Zamaa bɩ haay yɛ meerbaa naa do ma: ŋ n Etɩyɛnnɩ bɔ ʋ, gʋaa m, sɩrakarɛ n a heer han kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri kɩ, kan Filipi kɩ, Prokɔɔr kɩ, Nikanɔɔr kɩ, Timɔn kan Parmenas kɩ, kan Antɩyɔs gʋaa Nikola k'a nɩ zum zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ.
Ŋ nɩ ŋ hɩnka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m, ŋnɩ yaa da, ŋn'a wɔ ka ŋ mim la.
Woso lemim bɩ padarɛ n'a dam la, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ n'a dam la gʋta Zerizalɛm ʋ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno gʋta nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ zum sɩrakarɛ zaa b'ʋ.
Barka kan paŋŋa kɩ kʋ ŋ Etɩyɛnnɩ han bɩ, a nyɩnta an nɩ hoserlo kan makrarɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ bam zamaa bɩ bire ʋ.

Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n wuti meerbaa m kan Etɩyɛnnɩ kɩ: Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ lɔnnɔ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa ŋ ma, ŋ sokʋmacɛ bɩ n a hɔ. Sirɛnnɩ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ nyɩnta ŋ barla kan Alɛsandrii zannɔ kɩ, Silisii zannɔ kɩ, Azii zannɔ kɩ. Ŋ n a sɩŋŋɩda sa ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan Etɩyɛnnɩ kɩ,
Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a a ka Etɩyɛnnɩ nɩ meer bam kan mindɔrɛ kɩ bɩ, ŋ bɩr a dam ma ŋn'a meerbaa bɩ nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ y.
Ŋ n zambʋ ba, ŋn'a ka gʋɔɔ ma kʋ ŋ n'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ma, an nɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋm kan Moyiisi kɩ."
Nyɩnta a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, ŋnɩ zamaa bɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ, kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ nyʋnnyɔɔta ŋnɩ bɩ daata zɛ Etɩyɛnnɩ la, ŋn'a nyasʋ ŋnɩ ta m dʋdɔkənno taa.
Bɩ ŋ yaa kasɛtɩ ŋʋaarzannɔ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do bɩr wɔɔ Wosocɛ bɩ kan lɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ tore y.
Wɔɔ ʋ ya, ʋ a ma an n'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu naa do n nɩ zɛm bɩ bɩncɛ naa do wurgə, an Moyiisi lɛrɔ k'a ŋ ka wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lʋr."
Gʋaa haay k'a nɩ nyɩntam dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, dɩga ŋ nawʋm ma, ŋn'a meer yɩ an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan malɛɛka hɔ kɩ.
Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a lar, a ʋ: "Sɩra m naa gɛ?"
Etɩyɛnnɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a a tʋr ka, m danyɩnɔ kan ŋ zɩrɔ kɩ. Woso k'a a so cirbəə ʋ b'a hɩnka wɔɔ yaaba Abraham m, dɔmɩm k'a nyɩnta ʋ Mezopotamii ʋ, an bɔkarɛ an ta Haaran ʋ b'ʋ.
A n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Ɩ gʋ ɩ kʋ bɩ ma, kan ɩ harzannɔ kɩ, ɩ ta tara kʋ mɔɔ n n'a hɩnkarɛ ɩbɩɩ m b'ʋ.'
Abraham n a gʋ Kalde zannɔ kʋ bɩ ma, k'a yaa nyɩnta Haaran ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, a zɩ garɛ kur bɩ, Woso n a bɔ kʋ bɩ do nɔ ʋ, an bɩ nyɩnta kʋ k'awɔɔ n ta ʋ heer naa ʋ.
A n tara ka ʋ k'an a so ʋ kʋ bɩ do ʋ y, b'a gam cɩnta jɩ ba ʋ y. B'a a ler bɔ m k'a ka ʋ k'an a so ʋ kan a yaŋŋarɔ kɩ, baa k'a n nyɩ yɩ bɩ kɩ.
Woso n a hɩ, a ʋ: 'A dogʋɔɔ nyɩntam do vanta tara ra, bɩ ŋ gasʋm lɔmbaa ʋ, ŋ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma dɔɔraa zɔrsi.'
Woso n a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Do niŋŋə k'a ŋ ba lɔnnɔrɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ yɩ m dʋdɔ kam. Bɩ kur kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ŋ bɔm, ŋnɩ yaa da mɔɔ m bɩncɛ naa do ʋ.'

A n gʋaasɩbabaa da kan kɩ baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ minto y'a ka, Abraham k'a Izakkɩ yɩ bɩ, an a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ a yɩrɛ dɔmɩm sinnyə hɔ ma, Izakkɩ n a ba maam sɔ kan Zakɔɔb kɩ. Zakɔɔb n a ba a nyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ m maam sɔ."
"Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ sɔ Zozɛf m, ŋn'a hɛɛ. N n a gaa n nɩ ta m Eziptɩ ʋ. Bɩ, Woso nyɩnta kan kɩ.
A n a bɔ a fɩr do haay nɔ ʋ, an hɔɔn ka ʋ kan barka kɩ Eziptɩ cir Farawɔn taa. Bɩ m Zozɛf ba Eziptɩ lɛɛzaa, an a so Eziptɩ ʋ kan a har kɩ haay.
Nɔ gʋta n b'a da Eziptɩ kʋ ʋ haay ʋ, kan Kanaan kʋ kɩ ʋ. Fɩryɩrɛ bɩ paŋŋa nyɩnta ʋ, wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n hɔbɩrɛ yɩ ŋn'a bɩrɛ y.
Kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʋ hɔbɩrɛ ɩ Eziptɩ tara ra bɩ, Zakɔɔb a nyɩnɔ, wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ nyɔɔ ŋ lɛɛkarɛ hɔ ma.
A hɩɩya hɔ ma bɩ, Zozɛf a hɩnka a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m. Bɩ Farawɔn a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ dɔ ma ʋ.
Bɩ m, Zozɛf n nyɔɔ da, ŋn'aa a zɩ Zakɔɔb gaa kan a dogʋɔɔ kɩ. Ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra haay gʋaa busaanhɩna a yaa soor.
Zakɔɔb n ta Eziptɩ ʋ, an aa ga b'ʋ kan wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Ŋ n ŋ gʋr, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ Sikɛm ʋ ŋn'aa ŋ bir yaa kʋ Abraham a si busoo m Emɔɔr nyɩnɔ zi, Sikɛm tara ra b'ʋ."
"Woso lerbɔrɛ k'a ba kan Abraham kɩ kan kʋ yɩ bɩ dɔmɩm k'a n'a zɔm bɩ, zamaa bɩ lɛ a da ra, ŋn'a ba gʋta Eziptɩ tara ra,
an ta an Eziptɩ cir vanta k'a bɩ cirbəə bɩ, b'a n Zozɛf dɔ bɩ ku.
Cir bɩ do nyɩnta bʋnyaa, an zambʋ ba wɔɔ do bɩ ma. A paŋŋa ba wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ ma, an a ka ŋn'a a nyɩnɔ poorero gʋr, ŋn'aa ŋ lo kʋ ŋ nɩ gɩnga.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do Moyiisi yɩ ʋ. A gʋɛrɛ nyɩnta ʋ Woso mɩm ʋ. A tʋr n y'a ʋ mom kaakʋ a zɩ har ʋ.
Bɩ kʋ ŋ y'a zo bɩ, Farawɔn nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ bɩ y'a busu an a tʋr, an a ba a nyɩ.
Moyiisi n Eziptɩ zannɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn dɩnda haay, a meerbaarɔ kan a zibəəro kɩ paŋŋa nyɩnta ʋ."
"K'a dɔɔraa busi ku bɩ, a a hɔɔn da a ʋ, k'a dɩga a danyɩnɔ Israyɛl zannɔ wɔɔ ma.
K'a deem yɩ Eziptɩ gʋaa nɩ fɩr kam ma bɩ, k'a ʋ k'a a da a danyɩ k'a nɩ fɩr yɩm bɩ han a bʋmbɔ bɩ, an Eziptɩ gʋaa bɩ zɛ, an ga.
A hɔɔn a da a ʋ a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ ŋ ʋ, Woso y'a bɔ ʋ k'a bɩ ŋ bʋmbɔ, bɩ ŋ n a jɩ ma y.
A dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a a danyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ yɩ ŋnɩ kʋ zɛm, an a zɔ k'a ŋ bʋmbɔ kʋ ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'M hannyɩnɔ, danyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m kan kʋ kɩ, bɔ minto, awɔɔ nɩ kʋ zɛrɛ?'
Bɔzaa nɩ fɩr karɛ a mim bɩ ma bɩ n a wɔ nya Moyiisi cɩ ʋ, an kaanm m, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Nka y'ɩbɩɩ ba wɔɔ cir, k'ɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ dʋdɔkarɛzaa?
Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ mɔɔ zɛ amba ɩbɩɩ Eziptɩ zannɔ gʋaa bɩ zɛ jim bɩ m na?'
Moyiisi k'a naa ma bɩ, an a si, an aa a nyaakʋm da kʋ vanta ʋ, Madɩyan tara ra. B'a nyɩnɔ yɩ ʋ hɩɩya."
"Dɔɔraa busi kur bɩ, malɛɛka a hɩnka m Sinayii ci poohɔɔn ʋ tutugu ʋ, sɛ nɔ ʋ.
Moyiisi k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a zɛ kədə, an a zɔ k'a dɩga a. A Zuuba Woso leer ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
'Ɩbɩɩ zɩrɔ Abraham kan Izakkɩ kɩ Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso m mɔɔ m.' Moyiisi da n bɔ ʋ, a mɛ nɩ nyiŋŋəm, a n yɛ k'a a ya, a a mɩm busu a dɩga y.
Zuuba n a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Ɩ kʋsɔrɔ bɔ ɩ gam ʋ, bala, bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n nɩ jɩnɩŋ ʋ naa, bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa m, bala mɔɔ ɩ naa ʋ.
Mɔɔ m gʋɔɔ wɔɔ cicir yɩ Eziptɩ tara ra, mɔɔ ŋ zeedarɛ ma, mɔɔ n zer kʋ m ŋ bʋmbɔ. Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m ɩ nyɔɔ Eziptɩ kʋ ʋ.' "
"Moyiisi bɩ do ŋ kaanm m ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: 'Nka y'ɩbɩɩ ba cir, dʋdɔkarɛzaa sɔ?' Bɩ, Woso a nyɔɔ k'an bɩr cir, bʋmbɔrɛzaa sɔ kan malɛɛka k'a hɩnka m tutugu nɔ ʋ bɩ daahan kɩ.
Bɩ yɩ ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ kan hoserlo barɛ kɩ, makrarɔ kɩ Eziptɩ tara ra, higʋta piinə bɩncɛ ʋ, poohɔɔn ʋ, dɔɔraa busi.
Moyiisi mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ Israyɛl zannɔ m, a ʋ: 'Woso y'a lɛsinnɩsorazaa bɔŋ ʋ awɔɔ danyɩnɔ bire ʋ, amba mɔɔ m, an a ka awɔɔ ʋ.'
A mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta kan Israyɛl zannɔ wɔɔ kɩ poohɔɔn ʋ, malɛɛka n meer ba kan kɩ Sinayii ci mim ʋ. A n mɩsɩrbaa lemim si an a ka wɔɔ ʋ.
Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n yɛ k'a lɛ si y. Ŋ kaanm m, ŋn'a ŋʋa k'a a bɔ a ta Eziptɩ tara ra."
"Ŋ n a hɩ Aarɔn m, ŋ ʋ: 'wosoro ba ɩ ŋ ka wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr ʋ lɛɛ. Bala, Moyiisi naa do k'a wɔɔ gaa an bɔ wɔɔ m Eziptɩ ʋ naa, wɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ bɔ ɩ ba nɩ y.'
Ŋ n hɔ ba an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan dinnyɛɛm kɩ, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, ŋnɩ mannɩ ba ma, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba bɩ cibsa ba kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Woso n kaanm ŋ nɩ, an ŋ to ŋn'ɩ brama monyaarɔ daŋ ʋ, amba ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ci ʋ bɩ m: Israyɛl zannɔ, mɔɔ awɔɔ ganwʋrɛ gɛɛ mannɩhɔ ka m ʋ dɔɔraa busi nɔ ʋ, poohɔɔn ʋ ra?
Awɔɔ wosobaawɔm Molok cɛ kʋ n y'a ba huu m bɩ busu kan awɔɔ woso Refan monyaa kɩ, hɔɔbarɛrɔ, awɔɔ ŋ ba, k'a bɩr ŋ daŋ ʋ. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ tarɛ awɔɔ m lɔmbaa ʋ laatʋ Babɩlɔnnɩ ma."
"Wɔɔ zɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta poohɔɔn ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ nyɩnta Woso taʋrɛ kasɛtɩ cɛ m. Ba a ʋ, amba Woso meer ba kan Moyiisi kɩ an a hɩ m bɩ m. A ʋ: 'A ba amba hɔ niŋŋə k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ bɩ m.'
Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a si bɩ, ŋ gasʋ m tara kʋ Zoziye ka ŋ lɛɛ, ŋnɩ yar ba ʋ Woso m la do vantɔɔ ra ŋn'a so ʋ naa ʋ. Bɩ, a gɔɔta ʋ, an ta, an Davɩd dɔmɩm ku.
Davɩd barka yɩ Woso taa, Zakɔɔb Woso bɩ, an zaa yɛ han k'a cɛ dɔ a ka ʋ.
Salomɔɔn ɩ cɛ bɩ dɔ an a ka ʋ.
Bɩ Woso k'a lɛ da haay bɩ bɩr nyɩntam cɛrɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ ŋ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. Amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa a da a ci nɔ ʋ bɩ m:
Zuuba Woso a hɩ: Mɔɔ nyɩntajɩ bɩncɛ m arzana m, tara m mɔɔ gankarahɔ. Cɛ kara awɔɔ k'a dɔ a ka mɔɔ ʋ? Mɔɔ mɛnyɔɔdarɛ bɩncɛ m kara?
Mɔɔ wɔ bɛɛ hɔ haay naa ba ra?"
"Tʋrgarɛ zannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ heer kan awɔɔ tʋr kɩ bɩr Woso mim sire y. Awɔɔ nɩ bɩsɩ kam Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma dɔmɩm haay. Awɔɔ kan a zɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ hɔdeem.
Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ kara ɩ nyɩnta ʋ awɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n fɩr ka ma? Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ Gʋaa tɩrga bɩ zɛrɛ bɩ hɩ rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, gʋaa bɩ do awɔɔ zambʋ ba ma, a zɛ.
Woso malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔ ŋnɩ bɩ Woso lɛrɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n zu ʋ y."
Minno nɔɔn duro ŋ heer busu, ŋn'a sɔ sʋrɛ Etɩyɛnnɩ minto.
Bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a Etɩyɛnnɩ han bɩ, an a bɔɔta, an dɩga brama, an Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, Yeezuu nɩ jɩnɩm Woso bɩsɩ ʋ.
A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ba mɔɔ arzana yɩ an a gʋ, mɔɔ n Gʋaanyɩ bɩ yɩ an nɩ jɩnɩm Woso bɩsɩ ʋ na."
Ŋ n zee da, ŋn'a wɔ tɩnta a tʋʋrɔ rɛ. Ŋ haay wuti, ŋnɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ nyasʋ,
ŋnɩ bɔ m tara bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a gʋngʋɛɛnm jaa m. Kasɛtɩzannɔ wɔɔ, a huuro wɔɔ kuntə ŋ y'a ʋ gʋaa poo kʋ n n'a birm Sol bɩ jɩr ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ nɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ gʋngʋɛɛnm bɩ, a ɩ yaa darɛ an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Zuuba Yeezuu mɔɔ nyi si!"
A n sʋnta, an zee gʋta da, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ɩ bɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaa naa do taar ka ŋ ʋ y." Naa k'a hɩ bɩ, an ga.

Sol y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, Etɩyɛnnɩ garɛ bɩ mɩŋŋa. Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ fɩr ka Zerizalɛm sokʋma bɩ ma. Sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay hɩsɩga da ŋnɩ ta Zidee kan Samarii kɩ gʋrgarɔ ʋ, kʋ bɩ m, kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m bala.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʋ paan••• rɔ wɔɔ ɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ busu ŋn'a bir, ŋnɩ nyi ka gʋta a minto.
Sol bɩ, sokʋma bɩ wurgə an nawʋm, an nɩ gasʋm harlɔ ʋ, an nɩ yaarɔ gʋrm kan lannɔ kɩ, an nɩ ŋ dum lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
Bɔɔ y'a hɩsɩga rɔ wɔɔ ɩ tam kʋrɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam.
Filipi ta Samarii kʋ deem nɔ ʋ, an nɩ Krista pa dam.
Zamaa bɩ haay n a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'a tʋr kam Filipi meerbaa bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ y'a hoserlo k'a nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ mam, ŋn'a yɩrɛ.
Zinəro gʋta ɩ bɔm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gasʋ ŋ ʋ rɔ mɛ ʋ kan zee gʋta darɛ kɩ. Lʋgɔrɔ kan paŋŋawarzannɔ kɩ a waa.
Heernyɔɔ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta tara bɩ do nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta kʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, a tɔ m Sɩmɔɔn, nyɩsɩzaa m, an nɩ nyibəə dam Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ ma. A y'a hɩrɛ a zi m, a ʋ gʋaa gʋta naa a mɩ.
Gʋaa haay nɩ tam zi, gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ poorero kɩ. Ŋ n a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa bɩ do, Woso paŋŋa kʋ n n'a birm paŋŋa gʋta bɩ m."
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a tʋr karɛ a lemim ma, bala, a ka k'a ʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ zɛm kədə a nyɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a dɔmɩm laatʋ.
Bɩ, kʋ ŋ Filipi Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta padarɛ bɩ si kan Yeezuu Krista tɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ batɛm si, lannɔ kan yaarɔ kɩ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Sɩmɔɔn mɩŋŋa n a ba sɩrakarɛzaa sɔ, an batɛm si, an nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan Filipi kɩ. Hoserlo kan makrarɔ kɩ k'a nɩ ŋ yɩm bɩ, a n zɛ kədə.
Kʋ ŋ y'a ma ŋ ʋ Samarii zannɔ Woso lemim bɩ si bɩ, kristazibəəzannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ Pɩyɛɛr nyɔɔ kan Zaan kɩ.
Kʋ ŋ lee ku b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ yaa da Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ minto kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer, kʋ ŋ n a da ma ŋn'a si.
Sɩra m, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer ŋ gʋaa deem taan••• ra cɩna y. Batɛm ŋ y'a si Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma bala.
Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ n'a wɔ kam Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ ra, ŋn'ɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sim.
Sɩmɔɔn k'a yɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ kam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ mim la, ŋnɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sim bɩ, a a cɩnta k'a busoo ka ŋ ʋ.
A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a paŋŋa naa do ka m ʋ sɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm, kʋ m bɩ m wɔ ka ŋ la rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ ŋ nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri si."
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ busoo bɩ n a zar kan ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa kɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ ɩ hɔɔn da ɩ ʋ, n y'a dam ma, ŋnɩ Woso ganwʋrɛ si busoo m bɩ minto.
Hɔ k'a nɩ bam naa ʋ naa, ɩbɩɩ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩrɛ a nɔ ʋ y, bala, ɩbɩɩ heer bɩ tɩrga Woso taa y.
Ɩ bɔ ɩ taam ɩ kʋsɩrabaa bɩ minto, k'ɩ yaa da Zuuba m. Hɔɔndarɛ k'a bʋr ɩbɩɩ heer ʋ bɩ, n y'a sugur karɛ ɩ ʋ barɛm.
Sɩra m, mɔɔ yɩ, jɩmbaa heerbusu kan mimbʋnyaa lɔmbaa kɩ nɔ ɩbɩɩ n ta ʋ."
Sɩmɔɔn n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a yaa da Zuuba m mɔɔ minto, hɔ k'awɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ, kʋ hɔsɩ bɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ y."
Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ kʋ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ ka, ŋnɩ Zuuba lemim bɩ pa da bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋn'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam Samarii gʋrgarɔ ʋ gʋta.
Zuuba malɛɛka deem meer ba kan Filipi kɩ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Wuti ɩ ta jɩsa zeezi, ɩ zaa k'a bɔ Zerizalɛm ʋ an nɩ tam Gazaa ʋ bɩ sa. Zaa bɩ do, poohɔɔn m."
Filipi n wuti lɛɛm an ta. Bala, Etiyopii gʋaa deem, lannɔdɔmazaa, k'a m Etiyopii zannɔ lʋcir Kandasɩ arzaka dɔmazaa bɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, an aa yaa da,
an a bɔ an nɩ doom. Nyɩnta a ʋ a tɛrkʋ nɔ ʋ, an nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci karɩnda bam.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩ Filipi m, a ʋ: "Ta zɔɔ, ɩ tɛrkʋ bɩ ku."
Filipi n bra si, an wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci karɩnda barɛ ma Etiyopii gʋaa bɩ lɛ ʋ, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a karɩnda bam naa, ɩbɩɩ y'a jɩ mam paan••• ra?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Kʋ m a ba lɔ m a jɩ ma, kʋ gʋaa ba ʋ an n'a jɩ dɩndam mɔɔ nɩ?" A n Filipi bir, a ʋ, an bɩ nyɩnta a jɩr ʋ.
Wosoci bɩ bɩncɛ naa do an n'a karɩnda barɛ: Amba, serda kʋ n bʋr m k'a b'a bʋkɔ bɔ ʋ, amba, sinnyɛɛm bəətir kʋ n n'a ka zɩnzɛm la, ncɩnaaʋ a bɩr meer barɛ y.
Kʋ n y'a da nyannɩ ʋ bɩ, a n gumə yɩ dʋdɔkənno zi y. Nka n nɩ naa do mim dɩndarɛ? Bala, n y'a mɩsɩrbaa bɔ durnya ʋ.
Etiyopii gʋaa bɩ n a hɩ Filipi m, a ʋ: "Nka wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ n n'a mim dɩndarɛ? K'ɩ hɩ m m. A hɔ an n'a dɩndam gɛɛ, gʋaa vanta hɔ nɩ?"
Filipi n a lɛ gʋ, an zu Wosoci bɩ meerbaa b'ʋ, an Yeezuu lemim nyɩnta bɩ hɩ m.
Kʋ ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ yaa hi ku, Etiyopii gʋaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ba hi m na. Bɔ n n'a tam mɔɔ m tolle kʋ m bɩ batɛm si?" [
Filipi n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "K'ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma ɩ batɛm si." Gʋaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ n'ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ sɩra ka, mɔɔ ʋ: Yeezuu Krista bɩ, Woso Nyɩ m."]
A n lɛ ka, n nɩ tɛrkʋ bɩ da jɩm ʋ. Filipi kan Etiyopii gʋaa bɩ kɩ, ŋ hɩɩya haay gasʋ hi b'ʋ, Filipi n batɛm ka ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ bɔ hi bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri Filipi gaa an cenim, Etiyopii gʋaa bɩ n a ya, an n'a yɩrɛ y, an a zaa sa kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Kʋ Filipi nɩ, a yɩ n yaa ʋ Azɔttɩ kʋ ʋ, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam kʋrɔ haay ʋ an nɩ cenim, an nɩ tam Sezaree kʋ ʋ.
Sol k'a gɔɔta an nɩ fɩr kam Zuuba karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, a lɛ n taa k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ bɩ, a ta wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zi,
an aa yɛ han, k'an ciro ba Damas zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ minto, k'a yaa gʋɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ zum zaa daa b'ʋ, kʋ lʋ m gɛɛ yar nɩ, k'a nyasʋ a sur, a bʋr m Zerizalɛm ʋ.
A zaa sa, an nɩ tarɛ, an aa a zɔ Damas ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, lɛɛgure a to mim ʋ, an yɔ, an a ku ra.
A n a do tara ʋ, an a to, an leer ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Sol, Sol, bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma?"
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, Zuuba?" "Mɔɔ m Yeezuu, gʋaa k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ fɩr kam ma bɩ.
Bɩ, wuti, ɩ gasʋ tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, n hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ ba bɩ hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m."
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ jɩm, dabɔʋ bɩ n a ka, ŋ n a dɔ kʋ bɔ an n'a hɩrɛ y. Ŋ yɩ leer bɩ mam, bɩ ŋ bɩr gɔsɩ yɩrɛ y.
Sol n wuti tara ʋ b'ʋ, baa kan a mɩnyaa gaa ra bɩ kɩ haay, a bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y. A zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ n a gaa a wɔ ma, ŋnɩ gasʋ m Damas ʋ.
A n gɔɔta b'ʋ kan mɩm war bɩ kɩ dɔmɩm kaakʋ, a n hɔsɩ bɩ, b'a n hi mi sɔ y.
Karɩndanyɩ deem ɩ nyɩnta Damas ʋ b'ʋ, a tɔ m Ananɩyas. Zuuba n a bir hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ: "Ananɩyas!" A n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, ba mɔɔ n na!"
Zuuba n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ zaa kʋ n n'a birm 'Zaa tɩrga' bɩ sa, ɩ ta Zidas har ʋ, ɩ gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Sol bɩ laaka da. Tarsɩ gʋaa m. A ɩ b'ʋ, an nɩ yaa dam,
a gʋaa k'a tɔ m Ananɩyas bɩ yɩ hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ, an gasʋ, an a wɔ ka ra k'a mɩm n lɛɛ yɩ."
Ananɩyas n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Zuuba, mɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa, gʋɔɔ nɩ gʋaa naa do mim dɩndam, ŋn'a zibəəro bʋnyaarɔ k'a ŋ ba ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m bɩ mim dɩndam sɔ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zaa ka ʋ an bʋr naa ʋ, k'a bɩ gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ sur."
Bɩ, Zuuba a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ta bala, gʋaa naa do makra hɔ m, mɔɔ n a bɔ ʋ k'an mɔɔ tɔ hɩ kɩfɩɩrɔ kan cinno kɩ, Israyɛl zannɔ kɩ bire ʋ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa fɩryɩrɛ do haay k'a n'a yɩm mɔɔ tɔ minto bɩ hɩnkam nɩ."

Ananɩyas n ta, an aa gasʋ har ʋ b'ʋ, an a wɔrɔ ka ra, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "M danyɩ Sol, Zuuba Yeezuu niŋŋə k'a hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ zaa sa, ɩ nɩ zɛm b'ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ, kʋ m b'a ka k'ɩ mɩm n lɛɛ yɩ, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'ɩbɩɩ heer han."
Lɛɛm bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ zɔ kapra y'a to a mɩm ʋ an sur tara ʋ, a mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm. A n wuti, an batɛm si.
Bɩ, Sol k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ, a a ya, an paŋŋa yɩ. A gɔɔta an dɔmɩnnɔ ba kan karɩndanyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Damas nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ poore,
bɩ, a a hɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ lɛɛm, a ʋ Yeezuu bɩ Woso Nyɩ m.

Gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam ma rɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do bɛɛ nyɩnta an nɩ fɩr kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa dam tɔ naa do minto Zerizalɛm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ ra? Bʋr bɛɛ a ʋ tɔkkɛ k'a bɩ ŋ gʋr, a ŋ sur a ta ŋ nɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zi ra?"
Bɩ, Sol paŋŋa y'a dam la, an nɩ bʋr m zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Damas ʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ra kan a meerbaa bɩ kɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Yeezuu bɩ, a m Krista.
K'a maasɩrɛ ba bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ duro a dɩnda kan kʋ kɩ, k'a Sol zɛ k'an ga.
Sol n hɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ k'a ba bɩ dɔ. Ŋ nɩ dɔ tara bɩ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ ma sinuu ʋ kan gunuu ʋ kɩ, k'a a da ma, a ku a zɛ.
Bɩ, gunuu deem ʋ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a da kasɩ ʋ, ŋn'a busu, ŋn'a zer bar m pəŋŋə bɩ kur.
Sol k'a lee ku Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, a a ŋʋa k'a a zɛ kʋ ra kan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, ŋ haay ɩ nyi bam nɩ, bala ŋ n yɛ, ŋn'a si paan••• karɩndanyɩ y.
Barnabas n a gaa, an ta m kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zi, an Zuuba k'a hɩnka m hɔ niŋŋə zaa bire ʋ bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, kan meerbaa niŋŋə k'a ba bɩ kɩ. A Yeezuu tɔ dɩnda Damas ʋ kan sɩra kɩ.
Bɩ kur kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Sol ɩ minkarɛ ŋ nɩ, an nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ, an nɩ Zuuba tɔ hɩm kan nyɛɛsʋm kɩ.
A tɩr kan zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ grɛkkɩ lemim hɩm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ bɩr bɩsɩ kam kan kʋ kɩ. Brɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋn'a kam ma k'a zɛ gər.
Danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Sezaree ʋ, b'ʋ bɩ ŋ y'a ka, an ta Tarsɩ ʋ.
Sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʋ kan Galilee kɩ, Samarii kɩ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam kan laafɩɩ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ paŋŋa yɩm, ŋn'ɩ tam kan Zuuba nyibəə kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa minto y'a ka, ŋ lɛ n n'a dam la.
Pɩyɛɛr k'a nɩ bɩrm lɛɛ haay ʋ bɩ, a ta wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Lida ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zi.
A n aa gʋaa yɩ b'ʋ a tɔ m Enee. Yɩnyar a ʋ an nɩ wʋtam kan mɛgarɛ kɩ a gargʋ burə ʋ dɔɔraa sinnyə.
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Enee, Yeezuu Krista y'ɩ waam. Wuti, ɩ ɩ wʋtarahɔ bɩ gʋr ɩ zi m." A n wuti lɛɛm sɔ.
Lida gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay kan Sarɔɔn kʋ bɩncɛ fapɩda zannɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ kʋ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ a taam, ŋnɩ zu Zuuba ʋ.
Lʋ ɩ nyɩnta ʋ Zoppee ʋ, karɩndanyɩ m, a tɔ m Tabɩta, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Dɔrkas' grɛkkɩ lemim m. (A jɩ k'a hɩ a ʋ: 'Mee'). A ziro mɩŋŋɔɔ ba gʋta, an n'a dam cicirzannɔ han sɔ.
Bala, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, a yaaba zɛ, an ga. Kʋ ŋ y'a gər bɩ zʋr, ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ yaa a wʋta cɛ nɔ k'a nɩ mim ʋ b'ʋ.
Lida k'an jɩnjɛɛm Zoppee ma bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ma ŋ ʋ, Pɩyɛɛr ta b'ʋ. Ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ yaarɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nyɔɔ ma kʋ ŋ n'aa a bir ncɩnaaʋ: "Ɩ tɔ ʋ ɩ wɔɔ zɛ ʋ dɩɩtaa-dɩɩtaa."

Lɛɛm bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr wuti, an zu kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ. K'a yaa lee ku bɩ, ŋ y'a ka an ta cɛ k'a nɩ mim ʋ b'ʋ, zonno wɔɔ haay n jɩm a lɛɛ, ŋn'ɩ nyi karɛ. Ŋ nɩ huuro kan gɔbgarɔ kɩ kʋ Dɔrkas nyɩnta an nɩ bam dɔmɩm k'a nyɩnta ʋ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ hɩnka m.
Pɩyɛɛr n a ka gʋaa haay n bɔ, an sʋnta, an yaa da. A n a wusigə an a nya gər bɩ rɛ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Tabɩta, wuti!" A n a mɩm gʋ, k'a Pɩyɛɛr yɩ bɩ, a wuti an nyɩnta.
Pɩyɛɛr n a wɔ dɔ rɛ, an wuti an jɩm. A n wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ bir kan zonno wɔɔ kɩ, an a hɩnka ŋ nɩ mɩsɩr.
Zoppee zannɔ haay a ma, gʋɔɔ gʋta n sɩra ka Zuuba ʋ.
Pɩyɛɛr gɔɔta an maasɩrɛ ba Zoppee ʋ, zappa kʋ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn bɩ har ʋ.
Gʋaa ɩ nyɩnta Sezaree ʋ, a tɔ m Kɔrnɛy. Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa m. Sʋrdaarɔ zɔrsɔddɩ zɛkʋra kʋ n n'a birm "Italik" bɩ barla an ta ʋ.
Gʋaa m an sɩra ka Woso ʋ paan•••, an nɩ nyi bam Woso m kan a har zannɔ kɩ haay. A y'a dam zɩɩfʋrɔ cicirzannɔ gʋtɔɔ han, an nɩ yaa dam Woso m dɔmɩm haay.
Hindeem ʋ, wakatɩ kaakʋ zeezi yirbəə n bɩ, a Woso malɛɛka yɩ paan••• Makra nɔ ʋ, an gasʋ a har ʋ, an n'a birm, a ʋ: "Kɔrnɛy!"
Kɔrnɛy n dɩga ma sɩɩ•••, dabɔʋ n a nyasʋ, an a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A lɔ, Zuuba?" Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛrɔ kan ɩ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ba rɔ wɔɔ kɩ minto, Woso a hɔɔn da ɩbɩɩ ma.
Bɩ, naa ma bɩ, gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ Zoppee ʋ kʋ ŋ n'aa Sɩmɔɔn, gʋaa niŋŋə kʋ n so ra, n n'a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ gaa ŋnɩ bʋr m.
Zer a ʋ Sɩmɔɔn vanta k'an zappa bɩ har ʋ higʋta lɛ ra."
Malɛɛka k'a meer ba kan kɩ bɩ k'a nyaam bɩ, Kɔrnɛy a zibəənyɩnɔ bir hɩɩya kan a sʋrdaarɔ gʋaa deem k'a sɩra ka Woso ʋ paan••• bɩ kɩ,
an mim haay k'a ba bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, an ŋ nyɔɔ Zoppee ʋ.
Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, kʋ ŋ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ y'a zɔ kʋ bɩ ma. Bɩ ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr der cɛ bɩ bɛŋŋʋ ra k'a yaa da. Nyɩnta a ʋ sinuu zeezi.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ, nɔ a nyasʋ, an nyɩnta an a ŋʋa k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ. N nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bam k'a ka ʋ. Lɛɛm bɩ, a hɔhɩnkarɛ yɩ.
A n brama yɩ an a gʋ, hɔ niŋŋə n a to brama, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan pɛɛra gʋta kɩ, n n a bɔ kʋ ʋ, an b'a cɩnta tara ʋ.
A nɔ ʋ bɩ, hɔmɩsɩr do haay n ta ʋ: hɔ gam si, bɔɔ n n'a gaatam tara ʋ, kan bɔɔ n nɩ werm brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Leer n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Pɩyɛɛr, aya, ŋ zɩnzɛ, ɩ ŋ bɩ!" Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ:
"Ayo Zuuba, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ n hɔ bʋnyaa kan dintim hɔ kɩ bɩ cɩna y. Wɔɔ do sɩhɔ m."
Leer n a ya, an a hɩ m a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a ʋ: "Hɔ kʋ Woso dintim gʋ ma bɩ, ɩ b'a bir dintim hɔ y."
Naa do ba gallɛm kaakʋ, hɔ bɩ n a bɔ, an ta brama lɛɛm.
Pɩyɛɛr n a mɩŋŋa lar a hɔɔn ʋ gallɛm hɔka hɔhɩnkarɛ naa do jɩ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, Kɔrnɛy zibəəzannɔ kʋ ŋ laaka da jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ Sɩmɔɔn har ma rɔ wɔɔ lee ku hallɛ ma.
Ŋ nɩ bir darɛ, k'a a dɔ kʋ Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n so ra, n n a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ, zer a ʋ har bɩ do ʋ gɛ.
Pɩyɛɛr n gɔɔta an n'a hɔɔn dam hɔhɩnkarɛ k'a a yɩ bɩ ma. Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ba gʋɔɔ kaakʋrɔ n n'a karɛ ɩ ma na.
Zer zɔɔ-zɔɔ ɩ zaa sa kan ŋ kɩ, ɩ bɩ bɩsɩ ka y. Bala, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ."
Pɩyɛɛr n zer, an gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ ʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ba n nɩ. Mɔɔ awɔɔ n'a karɛ m ma bɩ. Bɔ minto y'a ka awɔɔ n bʋr naa ʋ?"

Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa Kɔrnɛy k'an gʋaa tɩrga, an nɩ nyi bam Woso m, a tɔ n nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩm zɩɩfʋrɔ do barla bɩ, Woso malɛɛka a hɩnka m, a ʋ, an a ka, k'ɩbɩɩ m bʋr a har ʋ, k'a b'a tʋr ka ɩ ma."
Pɩyɛɛr n ŋ si, an a ka ŋnɩ gasʋ, an wʋtaʋrɛcɛ ka ŋ ʋ. Bɩ, dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a cem kan ŋ kɩ, kan Zoppee danyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ.
Ŋ lee ku Sezaree ʋ, dɔmɩm hɩɩya hinni ʋ. Kɔrnɛy n a banka, an nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma. A a do gʋɔɔ bir kan a gʋaasɩbɔɔ paan•••rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Dɔmɩm kʋ Pɩyɛɛr lee ku ma bɩ, Kɔrnɛy wuti, an a zɛ ʋ, an sʋnta a taa, an a da ʋ.
Pɩyɛɛr n a wɔ dɔrɛ, an a busu brama, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Wuti! Gʋaa m mɔɔ m sɔ."
Ŋ n sʋʋra ba kan kʋ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ gasʋm. K'a bɩ sʋr gʋɔɔ ma, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra gʋta bɩ,
a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ a cisə ba kan zɩɩfʋ kɩ k'an a zɛ kʋ ra kan saana kɩ, gɛɛ an gasʋ a har ʋ ra! Bɩ, Woso a hɩnka mɔɔ m, a ʋ, mɔɔ n m ga m, kʋ m dɩga gɔsɩ ma, m a ba hɔ bʋnyaa gɛɛ dintim zaa y.
Bɩ y'a ka, k'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ bir bɩ, mɔɔ n bɩsɩ ka zɛrɛ ma y. Bɩ naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m m birle bɩ jɩ dɔ."
Kɔrnɛy n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A dɔmɩm kaakʋ her, ncɩnaaʋ nyi m, mɔɔ n nɩ yaa darɛ m har ʋ yirbəə wakatɩ kaakʋ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋaa n a hɩnka mɔɔ lɛɛ, a huuro n nɩ gum,
an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Kɔrnɛy, n y'ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛ si, bɩ Woso ɩbɩɩ ganwʋrɛrɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka cicirzannɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ minto bɩ, gʋaa nyɔɔ Zoppee ʋ k'an aa gʋaa k'a tɔ m Sɩmɔɔn n nɩ so ra, n n a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ bir, k'an bʋr naa ʋ. Zer a ʋ Zoppee zappa k'a tɔ m Sɩmɔɔn bɩ har ʋ, higʋta lɛ ra.
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n nyɔɔ da lɛɛm kʋ n n'ɩbɩɩ bir, ɩbɩɩ yɛ sɔ, k'ɩ bʋr wɔɔ zi. Ba wɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ taa naa ʋ haay na, k'ʋ ʋ tʋr ka hɔ haay kʋ Zuuba a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m k'ɩ hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ ma."
Pɩyɛɛr n bɔkarɛ, an a lɛ gʋ, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, mɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ mɔɔ ʋ, Woso bɩr gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.
Bɩ do haay nɔ ʋ, gʋaa k'a nɩ nyi bam nɩ, an nɩ tɩrgabaa zi bam bɩ, a y'a sire a jɩr ʋ.
Woso a mɩŋŋa lemim nyɔɔ Israyɛl zannɔ ma, an Yeezuu Krista k'an gʋɔɔ haay Zuuba bɩ laafɩɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ hɩ.
Awɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə k'a ba Zidee kʋ haay ʋ bɩ dɔ. A sɩŋŋɩda a sa Galilee ʋ Zaan batɛm lemim hɩrɛ bɩ jɛ ʋ.

Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ do, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, bɩ Woso a bɔ ʋ, an Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan a paŋŋa kɩ zer a mim ʋ. A bɔ lɛɛ haay ʋ, an mɩŋŋabaa zi ba, an nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Sʋtaana lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ waam, bala, Woso ɩ kan kɩ.
A zibəə haay k'a a ba zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ʋ, kan Zerizalɛm kɩ ʋ bɩ, a kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m. Ŋ y'a zeŋŋə gɔ ma, ŋn'a zɛ gər.
Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hɔ ma, an lɛ ka ʋ k'an a taʋrɛ hɩnka.
Gʋaa haay bɛɛ a a hɩnka nɩ y, a hɩnka a ʋ kasɛtɩzannɔ kʋ Woso lɛɛ ka an ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, wɔɔ k'ʋ hɔ bɩ, ʋ hɔ mi kan kɩ a mɩmbɔʋrɛ kur gəəno bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
A lɛ ka wɔɔ ʋ kɛɛrɛ k'ʋ a hɩ do bɩ m, k'ʋ a kasɛtɩ naa do ka, ʋ ʋ: A mɩŋŋa Woso a bɔ ʋ kan nyɩnta mɩsɩɩrɔ kan gəəno kɩ dʋdɔkər.
A mɩŋŋa wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ n'a kasɛtɩ kam, ŋ ʋ: Gʋaa haay k'a sɩra ka ʋ bɩ y'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ, a tɔ ma."
Kʋ Pɩyɛɛr gɔɔta an nɩ meer bɩ bam bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ zer gʋaa haay k'a nyɩnta an n'a tʋr kam meerbaa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ra.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ Pɩyɛɛr da zaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, kʋ ŋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛ yɩ an zer do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ gʋta ra sɔ bɩ minto.
Ŋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro ma, ŋn'ɩ meer bam do y'a hʋnhɔ lemim m, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ. Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ:
"Gʋaa y'a dam ma, an a ta tolle, a ʋ, ŋ bɩ batɛm ka hi m gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ ra? Ŋ y'a ba, am wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m, ŋnɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri yɩ ra!"
A n lɛ ka, kʋ n nɩ batɛm ka ŋ ʋ Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, ŋn'a yɛ han k'a n a ya, an gɔɔta kan a kɩ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ.
Kristazibəəzannɔ kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta Zidee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a ma ŋ ʋ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ Woso lemim bɩ si kɛɛrɛ.
Kʋ Pɩyɛɛr a bɔ an ta Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kɩ, ŋ ʋ:
"Ɩbɩɩ gasʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zi, ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kan ŋ kɩ!"
Pɩyɛɛr n a bɔ, an mim bɩ sa a jɩ ma deem-deem, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"Nyɩnta mɔɔ ʋ Zoppee kʋ nɔ ʋ, m nɩ yaa dam, mɔɔ m hɔhɩnkarɛ yɩ. Hɔ niŋŋə y'a to brama, an nɩ zerm, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan pɛɛra gʋta kɩ, n n a bɔ kʋ ʋ, an bɩ lee ku mɔɔ zi.
Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ••• bɩ, mɔɔ tara burə hɔɔ yɩ, ŋ gam n si-si, poohɔɔ, bɔɔ n'a gaatam nɔ, kan bɔɔ nɩ werm brama rɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ leer ma, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Pɩyɛɛr, wuti, ɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ, ɩ ŋ sʋ.
Mɔɔ n a hɩ, mɔɔ ʋ: Fɩɩgaa Zuuba, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, hɔ bʋnyaa gɛɛ dintim hɔ n gasʋ mɔɔ lɛ ʋ y.
Leer bɩ n a ya, an a to brama, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a ʋ: Hɔ kʋ Woso dintim gʋ ma bɩ, ɩ b'a bir dintim hɔ y.
Naa do ba gallɛm kaakʋ, a haay n a bɔ, an ta brama.
Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋaa kaakʋ a hɩnka har kʋ wɔɔ n ta ʋ b'ʋ. Ŋ bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ Sezaree ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ nyɔɔ mɔɔ ma.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ, m ta kan ŋ kɩ, bɩ, m bɩ bɩsɩ ka y. Danyɩnɔ sɔrdɩrɔ nɔɔn duro mɔɔ da zaa ʋ, wɔɔ n aa gasʋ gʋaa kʋ n y'a hɩ ma bɩ har ʋ.
A n malɛɛka bɩ k'a a hɩnka hɔ niŋŋə a har ʋ bɩ sa, an a dɩnda wɔɔ m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Gʋaa nyɔɔ Zoppee ʋ k'an a ka kʋ Sɩmɔɔn kʋ n so ra, n n a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ n bʋr.
A minno kʋ ŋ n'a kam ɩbɩɩ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ kan ɩ har gʋɔɔ kɩ bɩ dɩndarɛ ɩbɩɩ m.
Kʋ mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ sa bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer ŋ la, amb'a a ba wɔɔ m a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ hɔ kʋ Zuuba a hɩ bɩ tɔ da m nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: Zaan hi batɛm ka denter, b'awɔɔ, awɔɔ batɛm sim Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ Woso ganwʋrɛ deem ka gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ ncɩnaaʋ amb'a a ka wɔɔ ʋ, dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ sɩra ka Zuuba Yeezuu Krista ʋ bɩ, nka m mɔɔ m kʋ m m ta Woso m tolle k'a b'a zi ba?"
Naa k'a a hɩ bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ heer a da, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Woso heerlʋrlɛ k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam bɩ ka do vantɔɔ haay ʋ sɔ."
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a si, ŋnɩ hɩsɩga da fɩr kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ garɛ kur bɩ, ŋ ta Fenisii ʋ kan Siipɩr kɩ, Antɩyɔs kɩ ʋ. Ŋ bɩr Woso lemim bɩ pa dam gɔsɩ vanta m, kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ bala y.
Bɩ, Siipɩr zannɔ kan Sirɛnnɩ zannɔ kɩ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ ŋ barla, kʋ ŋ lee ku Antɩyɔs ʋ, ŋnɩ Zuuba Yeezuu lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da grɛkkɩ zannɔ wɔɔ m sɔ.
Zuuba paŋŋa nyɩnta an nɩ kan ŋ kɩ, hallɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ zu Zuuba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ n'a dam la gʋta.
Zerizalɛm sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ mim naa do dɩndarɛ ma, n n Barnabas nyɔɔ Antɩyɔs ʋ.
K'a lee ku, an Woso barka bɩ yɩ, an nɩ zi bam bɩ, a heer yɩ nyɩnta, an ŋ dʋndɔ haay, kʋ ŋ heer n gɔɔta an bɩr kan Zuuba kɩ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Nyɩnta a ʋ gʋaa tɩrga, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a han kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ. Gʋɔɔ gʋta n zu Zuuba zaa ʋ.
Barnabas ta Tarsɩ ʋ k'a yaa a ka Sol ma.
A n aa a yɩ, an a gaa, an bʋr m Antɩyɔs ʋ. Ŋ nɩ dɔɔraa deem ba kan kʋ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zi bam sokʋma bɩ do ʋ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ gʋta m. Antɩyɔs ʋ n lɛɛ ka ʋ, n nɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir kristagʋɔɔ.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a to Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Antɩyɔs ʋ.
Ŋ gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Agabus bɩ wuti, an a hɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m, a ʋ: nɔ gʋta n'a dam tara burə ʋ jilli. A nyɩnta ʋ denter, cir Kloodɩ dɔmɩm ʋ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a cɩnta kan kʋ kɩ, gʋaa biyəə kan a wɔhɔ kɩ, k'a nyɔɔ a danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ daahan minto.
Bɩ ŋ y'a ba, ŋnɩ Barnabas kan Sol kɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ nyɔɔ gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ ma kan daahan bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ ma bɩ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ka, ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum Yeezuu ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gʋr, k'a fɩr ka ŋ ma.
A a ka, n n Zaan danyɩ Zakkɩ bɩ zɛ kargʋ m.
K'a dɩga a zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ heer nyɔɔ mim naa do ma bɩ, a a ya, an a ka, ŋnɩ Pɩyɛɛr nyasʋ. Nyɩnta a ʋ, bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma cibsa dɔmɩm ʋ.
K'a a ka, ŋn'a nyasʋ, ŋn'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ bɩ, a a ka sʋrdaarɔ n dɔ ma gʋaa bueeresɔrdɩ, ŋn'a sinsim kʋ m si-si, k'a b'a dʋdɔ ka pakkɩ cenle kur gʋɔɔ lɛɛ.
Dɔmɩm kʋ Pɩyɛɛr nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ bɩ, sokʋma bɩ y'a tɔŋ ʋ kan Woso yaadarɛ kɩ kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ a minto.
N Pɩyɛɛr kʋsɩ baŋŋarɔ m hɩɩya. A dɔ k'a nɩ mɛm kʋ Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a bɔ bɩ, gum bɩ do ʋ, Pɩyɛɛr ɩ hinceem bam sʋrdaa hɩɩya bire ʋ, sʋrdaarɔ nɩ dɔm lɔnnɔcɛ bɩ lɛ ma.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka sʋr zɛ, lɛɛgure n cɛ bɩ han haay. Malɛɛka bɩ n Pɩyɛɛr zɛ pa-pa a boon ma, an a gu, a ʋ: "Wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ!" Baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ n a hʋnhʋr Pɩyɛɛr wɔrɔ wɔɔ ma.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ hɔsoaʋ bɩ sa, ɩ so ɩ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ kʋsɔrɔ wɔɔ da ʋ!" A n a ba maam. Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ zaba bɩ sa, ɩ da ɩ ra, k'ɩ zu mɔɔ ʋ!"
Pɩyɛɛr n bɔ, an zu a jɛ ʋ. B'a n a dɔ a ʋ, hɔ kʋ malɛɛka b'a ba bɩ, sɩra nɩ y, a ɩ dɩgam ma a ʋ makra awɔɔ yɩ.

Ŋ n lɛɛ ka, ŋnɩ cem lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛ bɩ han kan a dɔmazannɔ kɩ, ŋn'a ya, ŋnɩ cem a hɩɩya hɔ bɩ han, ŋn'a lee ku pɔyaa cɛlɛ k'a nya kʋ bɩ rɛ bɩ ma. A n a gʋ a zim ŋ lɛɛ. Kʋ ŋ bɔ garga ra bɩ, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'aa zada bɩ ku, lɛɛm bɩ, malɛɛka b'a gʋ Pɩyɛɛr ma.
Pɩyɛɛr hɔɔn n zer kɛɛrɛ. A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ. Sɩra m, Zuuba a malɛɛka nyɔɔ, an bɩ mɔɔ bɔ Hɩrɔɔdɩ wɔ ʋ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ kɩ, kan hɔ haay kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta k'a ba mɔɔ m bɩ kɩ."
K'a hɔɔn bɩ zer bɩ, a a hʋr, an ta Zaan kʋ n so ra, n n a tɔ ka Markɩ bɩ da Maarii har ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ gʋta nyɩnta b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam.
K'a cɛlɛ bɩ zɛ bɩ, Zibəənyɩlʋ k'a tɔ m Rode bɩ bʋr k'a bɩ dɩga a.
A Pɩyɛɛr leer dɔ, kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, cɛlɛ bɩ gʋrɛ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ, an a wusigə an bra si, k'a yaa hɩ a ʋ, Pɩyɛɛr bʋr, an nɩ cɛlɛ ma.
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ mim y'a wusigə ra?" A n gɔɔta, an n'a hɔ bɩ ra, a ʋ sɩra m. Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: A malɛɛka bɛɛ ra?
Pɩyɛɛr n gɔɔta, an nɩ cɛlɛ bɩ zɛm. Ŋ n kɔ ŋn'a gʋ, kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ n zɛ kədə.

A n meer ba a wɔ m, a ʋ, ŋnɩ zɛ pi. Hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba, an a bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ bɩ, a bɩ jɩsa an n'a dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, an b'a nyambʋr, a ʋ: "K'a ta, a yaa hɩ Zakkɩ m kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ." A n bɔ, an ta bɩncɛ vanta ʋ.
Dɔmɩrɛ ma bɩ, tatʋr gʋta nyɩnta ʋ sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ. Ŋ n a dɔ kʋ Pɩyɛɛr a ba lɔ y?
Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a ka, ŋn'a ka ma, bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y. A n a ka, ŋnɩ sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ lar, an lɛ ka a ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr a to Zidee ʋ, an ta Sezaree ʋ, an aa gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ.

Hɩrɔɔdɩ heer wuti kan Tiir zannɔ kɩ, Sidɔn zannɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ n a lɛ ba deem, ŋnɩ bʋr k'a b'a yɩ. Ŋ n gʋaasɩbabaa da cirhar dɩgamazaa Blastus ma, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋnɩ bʋr k'a bɩ kʋ ma. Bala, ŋ kʋ bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, bɔ a nawʋm cir bɩ kʋ b'ʋ.
Dɔmɩm kʋ ŋ y'a bɔ ʋ bɩ k'a a ku bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a cirbəəhuu da a ra, an nyɩnta duu burə ʋ, an nɩ gʋtabaa meer bam kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ,
ŋn'ɩ zee dam Hɩrɔɔdɩ mim ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Woso leer n naa, gʋaa hɔ bɛɛ y!"
Lɛɛm bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka Hɩrɔɔdɩ zɛ, k'a n a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ bɩ minto. Mukuno n a bɩ, an ga.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, Woso lemim y'a dam la, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ n n'a zum la.
Barnabas kan Sol kɩ kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, a zi bɩ ba an nya Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ ŋn'ɩ tam Antɩyɔs ʋ. Ŋ Zaan kʋ n so ra ŋn'a tɔ ka Markɩ bɩ gaa kan a kɩ, ŋnɩ ta m.

Sokʋma kʋ n y'a cɩnta Antɩyɔs ʋ bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ kan karɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ: Barnabas, Sɩmɩnyɔɔ kʋ n n'a birm Nizɛɛr bɩ kɩ, Sirɛnnɩ Lusiyus kɩ, kan cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ Antipas nyɩbaa zukuuzaa Manayɛn kɩ, Sol kɩ.
Hindeem ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa dam Zuuba m, ŋn'a lɛ kʋsɩm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a Barnabas kan Sol kɩ bɔ ʋ a hɔ, zibəə kʋ mɔɔ ŋ bir ma bɩ minto."
Kʋ ŋ y'a lɛ kʋsɩ, ŋnɩ yaa da ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a wɔ ka ŋ la, ŋnɩ ŋ da zaa ra.
Kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ŋ nyɔɔ bɩ, Barnabas kan Sol kɩ zer Selesii ʋ, ŋnɩ da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ ta Siipɩr ʋ, kʋ m bɩ, hi m bɩr ma.
Kʋ ŋ lee ku Salamin ʋ bɩ, ŋ Woso lemim pa da zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ. Zaan nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ, an n'a darɛ ŋ han.
Kʋ ŋ y'a da tara kʋ hi bɩr ma haay bɩ zi, ŋnɩ lee ku Pafɔs ʋ bɩ, ŋ yaa nyɩsɩzaa deem zɛ ʋ. Ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazaa m, zɩɩfʋ m, ŋn'a birm Bar-Yeezuu.
A nyɩnta tara bɩ do lɛɛzaa Sɛrziyus Polus, k'a nyɩnta gʋaa hɔɔnzaa bɩ jɩrmazannɔ wɔɔ barla. Tara bɩ lɛɛzaa bɩ m Barnabas kan Sol kɩ bir, bala, a nyɩnta an a ŋʋa k'a Woso lemim bɩ ma.
Nyɩsɩzaa bɩ do kʋ n n'a birm Elimas, grɛkkɩ lemim bʋʋrɔzaa, bɩ n yɛ ŋ nɩ y, an n'a kam ma k'a a ka kʋ tara bɩ lɛɛzaa bɩ bɩ sɩra ka y.
Sol kʋ n n'a birm Pol bɩ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a han b'ɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ•••,
an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔɔn bʋnyaa ka, kan ŋʋaarbaa kɩ bɩ, Sʋtaana nyɩ ra, sɩra jɩm naa, ɩbɩɩ bɩ Zuuba zaa tɩrga bɩ zarlɛ tom na?
Ba Zuuba wɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ ra na: ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bam bʋʋ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ yarɛ ɩ woso gure yɩ y." Lɛɛm bɩ, monsigə kan gunuu kɩ a ku ra, an n'a bɩrm lɛɛ haay ʋ, an n'a kam gʋaa ma k'an a gaa.
Tara bɩ lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a a ba sɩrakarɛzaa, bala, Zuuba karɩnda bɩ gasʋ a hɔɔn ʋ paan•••.
Pol kan a zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a hʋr Pafɔs ʋ, ŋnɩ da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Panfilii kʋ Pɛrzee ʋ. Bɩ, Zaan a gʋ ŋ ma, an a wusigə Zerizalɛm ʋ.
Ŋ n a hʋr Pɛrzee ʋ, ŋn'a zaa sa, ŋn'aa lee ku Pisidii Antɩyɔs ʋ. Ŋ n gasʋ sokʋmacɛ ʋ sabaa hinni ʋ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta.
Kʋ ŋ lɛrɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ ciro karɩnda ba, ŋn'a nya bɩ, sokʋmacɛ cinno wɔɔ a ka, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ ɩ dʋndɔ m k'a ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m, zaa ta ʋ!"
Pol n wuti, an a wɔ busu, a ʋ: "Israyɛl zannɔ kan awɔɔ k'a nɩ nyi bam Woso m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma.
Wɔɔ do Israyɛl Woso bɩ wɔɔ zɩrɔ bɔ ʋ. Do k'a nyɩnta Eziptɩ ʋ bɩ, a a da ra gʋta, bɩ, kan a wɔ paŋŋa kɩ, a a ka ŋnɩ bɔ,
a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ poohɔɔn ʋ dɔɔraa busi nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a do saanhɩna zɩnzɛ Kanaan kʋ ʋ, an a ka, ŋna so ŋ tararɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
A ga kʋ ʋ naa haay a ba kan dɔɔraa zɔrsi busoor kɩ. Bɩ kur bɩ, a dʋdɔkənno ka ŋ ʋ an ta, an wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Sanwɛl ku.
Ŋ n cir yɛ, Woso n Bɛnzamɛn do gʋaa Kis nyɩ Sol ka ŋ ʋ. A cirbəə bɩrɛ dɔɔraa busi ku.
Woso n wɔ saa bɩ ma, an Davɩd bɔ ʋ, an a ka ŋ ʋ k'an yɩ cir. A n a kasɛtɩ ka b'ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ Zesee nyɩ Davɩd yɩ, mɔɔ heer gʋaa m, an nɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa haay bɩ bam.'
Amba Woso k'a ler bɔ bɩ, a Yeezuu bɔ Davɩd do nɔ ʋ k'an yɩ Israyɛl bʋmbɔrɛzaa.
K'a n bʋr cɩna bɩ, Zaan lɛɛ ka an bɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ tore batɛm pa da Israyɛl zannɔ m haay.
Zaan zibəə k'a bʋr an nɩ nyam bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam a ʋ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ? Gʋaa k'awɔɔ nɩ dɔm ma bɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, gʋaa ɩ zɛm mɔɔ kur, bɩ mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʋsɔrɔ bar hʋr y."
"M danyɩnɔ, Abraham donyɩnɔ, kan bɔɔ nɩ nyi bam Woso m awɔɔ bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, bʋmbɔrɛ lemim naa do nyɔɔ n y'a ʋ wɔɔ minto.

Zerizalɛm zannɔ kan a cinno kɩ n Yeezuu dɔ y. Ŋ n wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lemim kʋ n n'a karɩnda bam sabaa biyəə hinni ʋ bɩ jɩ ma sɔ y. Bɩ, kʋ ŋ y'a nyasʋ, ŋn'a ka zɛ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a ka wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lemim bɩ n kʋ yɩ.
Kʋ ŋ n mim yɩ a gʋr zi an a ga zɛ m bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ Pɩlatɩ han k'an a ka kʋ n n'a zɛ gər.
Bɩ, kʋ ŋ hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba a minto bɩ ba an nya bɩ, gʋɔɔ a zer gɔ bɩ ma, ŋn'a da yaa ʋ.
Bɩ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ.
Bɩ, a a hɩnka dɔmɩm gʋta nɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ Galilee ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, brɔɔ m kasɛtɩzannɔ kɛɛrɛ gʋɔɔ lɛɛ."
"Bɩ wɔɔ sɔ, lemim nyɩnta naa do, wɔɔ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m, lerbɔrɛ kʋ Woso a bɔ wɔɔ zɩrɔ m bɩ,
Woso a ba wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ minto, wɔɔ k'ʋ nɩ ŋ nyɩnɔ bɩ minto, a Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʋ amb'a n y'a gʋrsɩra ba laarɔ ci ʋ, laa hɩɩya hɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ m: Mɔɔ nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, her naa, mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ.
Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, k'a b'a da ma, an vɔn y, a mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ Davɩd hɔɔmɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ paan••• rɔ wɔɔ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, an n'a hɩm lɛɛ vanta ʋ laarɔ ci ʋ: A b'a gʋaa mɩŋŋa bɩ tore, an vɔn y.
Bala, Davɩd k'a Woso zi bɩ ba a dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, a bɩ ga, ŋn'a bir a zɩrɔ zi, a mɛsim n vɔn.
Bɩ gʋaa kʋ Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ, a mɛsim n vɔn y.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, gʋaa bɩ do minto y'a ka mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur pa n nɩ dam awɔɔ bire ʋ.
A mɩŋŋa minto, gʋaa biyəə k'a nɩ sɩra kaŋ ʋ bɩ, a y'a mimbʋnyaarɔ haay sugur yɩrɛ, bɩ lɛ kʋ Moyiisi a ka bɩ b'a dam ma an a ka awɔɔ ʋ y.
K'a dundo a zi, kʋ hɔsɩ bɩ ba awɔɔ m amba hɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a hɩ bɩ nɩ y. Ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ:
K'a dɩga a, sɔ gʋɔɔ m zannɔ, k'a zɛ kədə, k'a nyaam! Mɔɔ zi bam awɔɔ dɔmɩm ʋ, zibəə m, awɔɔ n nɩ bɩsɩ kam ma, baa kʋ gʋaa a dɩnda awɔɔ m."
Pol kan Barnabas kɩ kʋ ŋ bʋr ŋn'ɩ bɔm bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ ŋ han gʋta, kʋ ŋ nɩ so minno nɔɔn duro ra sabaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ma.

Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɩsɩga da bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋta kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Pol kan Barnabas kɩ da zaa ʋ. Sʋʋra kʋ ŋ n'a bam bɩ, ŋ yɩ ŋ dʋndɔm, kʋ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta Woso barka nɔ ʋ.
Sabaa k'a nya ʋ bɩ k'a ku bɩ, tara bɩ zannɔ haay a zɛ kʋ ra k'a a tʋr ka Woso lemim ma.
