Zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ gʋta ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, jɩmbaa ŋ heer han, ŋn'ɩ Pol meerbaarɔ wɔɔ nyɩ bʋmbɔŋ ʋ, ŋn'a sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ.

Pol kan Barnabas kɩ a heer ba kookoo, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Awɔɔ Woso lemim b'a ga m, an lɛɛ ka, an hɩ awɔɔ m! K'awɔɔ kaanm Woso lemim bɩ m bɩ, awɔɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ dʋdɔ yar kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ kɩ, a hɩnka a ʋ: awɔɔ lɛ baa k'a yɩ y. Kɛɛrɛ naa, ʋ wusigə wɔɔ nawʋm do vantɔɔ zi.
Bala, lɛ kʋ Zuuba a ka wɔɔ bɩ n naa: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʋ k'ɩ yɩ lɛɛgure do gʋta minto, k'ɩ bʋmbɔrɛ ganwʋrɛ bɩ sa, ɩ ta m durnya lɛ cɩnta jɩ ʋ."
Kʋ ŋ minno nɔɔn duro ma bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ, kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔm Zuuba Woso lemim ʋ. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ sɩra ka.
Zuuba lemim bɩ lee ku lɛɛ haay ʋ.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ lannɔ tɔzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ paan••• rɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔta kan tara gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ k'a fɩr ka Pol ma kan Barnabas kɩ, k'a la ŋ la, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔ a tara bɩ ra.
Brɔɔ n taanyisi gʋngʋ a gannɔ ma ŋ minto, ŋnɩ ta Ikonɩyɔm ʋ.
Kʋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan heernyɔɔ kɩ ŋ heer han.
Ikonɩyɔm ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a ba am biisi hɔ bɩ m. Pol ta kan Barnabas kɩ, ŋn'aa gasʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ. Ŋ meerbaa b'a ka, gʋɔɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ nɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ n a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ.
Bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ niŋŋoo kʋ ŋ n yɛ sɩrakarɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔta, ŋ heer nɩ busum kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

Pol kan Barnabas kɩ gɔɔta b'ʋ tee•••, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ Zuuba minto. Zuuba a kasɛtɩ ka ŋ ʋ. Bala, a mɩŋŋa yɩ ŋ meerbaa sɩra hɩnka, an a ka, ŋn'a da ma, ŋn'ɩ hoserlo bam kan makrarɔ kɩ.
Tara nɔ zannɔ wɔɔ n a jir lɛ hɩɩya: gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ kan kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a cinno kɩ, lɛ sa k'a zibəə bʋnyaa ba kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m, k'a ŋ gʋngʋɛɛn jaarɔ m.
Kʋ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ hɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ k'a ba bɩ dɔ bɩ, ŋ y'a si, ŋnɩ ta Likawonii kʋrɔ ʋ, Listɩr kan Derbe kɩ, kan ŋ bɔlɛɛmarɔ kɩ.
B'ʋ sɔ bɩ, ŋ y'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ.
Listɩr kʋ gʋaa deem n ta ʋ, a b'a dam ma an jɩm a gannɔ ra y. Yɩ a ʋ lʋgɔbaa bɩ m, a n ta fɩɩgaa y.
Hindeem ʋ, an nyɩnta an n'a tʋr kam Pol meerbaa ma. Pol nɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ•••. K'a yɩ a nɩ sɩrakarɛ m k'a laafɩɩ yɩ bɩ,
a a hɩ kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Wuti ɩ jɩm, ɩ gannɔ ra!" Gʋaa bɩ n wuti lɛ deem, an nɩ tam.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔ kʋ Pol a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a leer busu brama, ŋn'a hɩm Likawonii lemim m, ŋ ʋ: "Wosoro y'a ba gʋɔɔ, ŋnɩ zer wɔɔ bire ʋ."
Ŋ n'ɩ Barnabas birm 'Zes', ŋn'ɩ Pol birm 'Hermɛs', bala, a ɩ nyɩnta meerbaazaa.

Zes yaadarɛcɛ bɩ, pəŋŋə kʋ n y'a bɩr kʋ bɩ ma bɩ lɛ ma n ta ʋ. A mannɩbər b'a ka ŋnɩ ta ŋʋannɔ m, ŋnɩ lɛɛrɔ waa, ŋn'a dɩnda ŋ wer, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ kʋ bɩ lɛ ma. A n a zɛ kʋ ra kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a mannɩ ba.
Kristazibəəzannɔ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ kʋ ŋ mim naa do ma bɩ, ŋ heer a zar gʋta, ŋn'a huuro kɩnkaansʋm, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋn'ɩ tam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zi kan zee kɩ.

Ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ ra, bɔ awɔɔ n'a bam naa? Wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m sɔ am awɔɔ hɔ bɩ m! Lemim nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m naa, k'a wɔ saa hɔbaarɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ nɔɔn duro ma, k'a zu Woso k'an mɩsɩr, an brama da kan tara kɩ, higʋta kɩ kan hɔ haay k'an a nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ b'ʋ.
Kʋ biisi bɩ nɩ, a do haay to, ŋn'ɩ zure a zaarɔ ʋ,
b'a hɔ mɩŋŋa ba awɔɔ m, bala, a lahi ka awɔɔ ʋ, kan mɔsa kɩ, a hɔbɩrɛ ka awɔɔ ʋ, an n'awɔɔ heer nyɔɔm."
Meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro bʋraama ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ. B'a n nyɩnta naanaa k'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da jɩm ʋ kʋ ŋ bɩ mannɩ bɩ ba y.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ y'a to Antɩyɔs ʋ kan Ikonɩyɔm kɩ, ŋnɩ bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔta. Ŋ n Pol gʋngʋɛɛn jaarɔ m, ŋn'a gɩngaata, ŋnɩ bɔ m tara nɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ dɩgam ma, ŋ ʋ, ga a ʋ.
Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋnɩ bɩr ma bɩ, a wuti, an gasʋ tara nɔ ʋ. Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a a hʋr kan Barnabas kɩ, ŋnɩ ta Derbe ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da Derbe ʋ ŋnɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ yɩ gʋta bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ, ŋnɩ bɔ Listɩr ʋ, Ikonɩyɔm kan Pisidii Antɩyɔs kɩ ʋ.
Ŋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ heer yo, ŋnɩ ŋ dʋndɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta a sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "A a ga m, wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ gʋta, k'ʋ bɔkarɛ, ʋ gasʋ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʋ."
Ŋ lɛɛzannɔ bɔ ʋ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma biyəə nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ yaarɔ da ŋn'a lɛ kʋsɩ, ŋnɩ yaa da lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ da Zuuba kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ wɔ ʋ.
Ŋ bɔ Pisidii ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Panfilii ʋ,
ŋnɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da Pɛrzee ʋ, ŋnɩ cem, ŋnɩ ta Atalɩyaa ʋ.
Ŋ n a to b'ʋ, ŋnɩ da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ŋnɩ ta Antɩyɔs ʋ, tara niŋŋə kʋ ŋ y'a yɛ ʋ Woso han, k'a nɩ ŋ barka da ʋ zibəə kʋ ŋ y'a ba naa minto b'ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ lee ku bɩ, ŋ sokʋma bɩ bir, ŋnɩ hɔ haay kʋ Woso a da ŋ han ŋn'a ba bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, hɔ kʋ Woso a ba, do vantɔɔ ŋn'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ bɩ.
Ŋ maasɩrɛ ba b'ʋ kan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a to Zidee ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ karɩnda ba danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'awɔɔ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ b'ʋ, a zu Moyiisi yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəə b'ʋ, awɔɔ bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y."

Mim naa do wuti bʋgʋr gʋta m kan bɩsɩkarɛ kɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kan Pol kɩ Barnabas kɩ bire ʋ. Danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a cɩnta kʋ Pol kan Barnabas kɩ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ n ta Zerizalɛm ʋ kʋ ŋ n'aa kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ yɩ kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim naa do minto.
Antɩyɔs kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ n dɩga ŋ zaa sarɛ mim ma. Ŋ bɔ Fenisii ʋ kan Samarii kɩ, ŋn'ɩ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ heerlʋrlɛ mim dɩndam, b'a yɩ heernyɔɔ gʋta kan ʋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay.
Kʋ ŋ lee ku Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, sokʋma a nya ŋ zi, an ŋ si, kristazibəəzannɔ kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Woso a da ŋ han ŋn'a ba bɩ sa, ŋn'a dɩnda ŋ nɩ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wuti ŋn'a hɩ ŋ ʋ, a a ga m kʋ ŋ nɩ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛ ka, kʋ ŋ nɩ zu Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a so kʋ ma, k'a dɩga mim naa do ma.
Kʋ ŋ bɩsɩ bɩ ka tee••• bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr wuti an a hɩ, a ʋ: "M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ, Woso mɔɔ bɔ ʋ awɔɔ bire ʋ, kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma mɔɔ lɛ m, kʋ ŋ n'a si.
Woso k'a heerlɔ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ, a kasɛtɩ ka ŋ ʋ, an Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ ka ŋ ʋ, amba a a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Woso n ŋ gʋ wɔɔ ma poore tɔkkɛ y, sɩrakarɛ minto y'a ka an ŋ heerlɔ wɔɔ sʋrgɔ.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, bɔ minto y'a ka, an nɩ Woso makra barɛ? A n nɩ mɔr gorezaa bɩ kam karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ra, bɩ wɔɔ zɩrɔ kan wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ n a da ma, ʋ n'a busure?
Bɩ, wɔɔ si wɔɔ ʋ, Zuuba Yeezuu barka minto y'a ka wɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, am ŋ hɔ bɩ m."
Ŋ haay n zɛ pi, ŋn'a tʋr kam Pol kan Barnabas kɩ ma, brɔɔ nɩ hoserlo kan makrarɔ kɩ kʋ Woso a ka ŋ nɩ ba haay do vantɔɔ kʋ ʋ bɩ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
Kʋ ŋ y'a nya bɩ, Zakkɩ meerbaa bɩ si, a ʋ: "M danyɩnɔ, k'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma.
Sɩmɩnyɔɔ hɔ kʋ Woso a ba a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ, k'a dɩga a do ma, a bɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ tɔ da wɔɔ nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ yɛ bɩ ma sɔ, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ:
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ zɛm bɩ Davɩd har k'a a da bɩ banka m a dɔ, zeero kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ, m ŋ dɔ, m ŋ jɩm brama.
Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ n a ka Zuuba ma, kan do vantɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ mɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Zuuba ɩ naa hɩ, a y'a ka ŋnɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro dɔ biisi hɔɔ tee•••.
Bɩ minto y'a ka mɔɔ m hɔɔn da, mɔɔ ʋ, a n a ga m, wɔɔ n fɩr ka do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɛ Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ ma y.
Ʋ ci ba ŋ ma, ʋ a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ʋ ʋ, ŋ bɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩbarɛ sim sʋ y, ŋ bɩ jaan da y, ŋ bɩ hɔ gər sim sʋ, kan ma kɩ sɔ y.
Sɩra m, a dɔɔraa laatʋ, gʋɔɔ ɩ tara nɔ biyəə ʋ, ŋnɩ Moyiisi lɛrɔ karɩnda bam sabaa hinni haay ʋ ŋ sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ."

Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, sokʋma bɩ kɩ, a cɩnta k'a gʋɔɔ bɔ ʋ a barla a ŋ nyɔɔ kan Pol kɩ Barnabas kɩ Antɩyɔs ʋ. Nyɩnta a ʋ Ziidi kʋ n n'a birm Barsabas, kan Silas kɩ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋ nɩ daʋrɛ m danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ.
Ŋ n ci naa do ka ŋ ʋ: "Kristazibəəzannɔ kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, ʋ danyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ a danyɩnɔ do vantɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Antɩyɔs ʋ kan Siirii kɩ, Silisii kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Wɔɔ ma ŋ ʋ, wɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ b'awɔɔ wʋnwar kʋ ma, ŋn'awɔɔ heer zar, ŋnɩ dabɔʋ da awɔɔ ma kan a meerbaarɔ kɩ, bɩ wɔɔ n ŋ nyɔɔ y.
Wɔɔ ʋ lɛ ba deem, ʋ a cɩnta k'ʋ gʋɔɔ bɔ ʋ, ʋ ŋ nyɔɔ kan ʋ gʋaasɩbɔɔ paan•••rɔ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ.
Gʋɔɔ m, ŋn'a mɩsɩrbaa ka zɛ ma, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, wɔɔ n nɩ Ziidi kan Silas kɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ ma, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ minno nɔɔn duro hɩ awɔɔ m a lɛ m.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ ʋ hɔɔn da, ʋ ʋ, a n a ga m, k'ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ mɔr gorezaa vanta ka awɔɔ ra, kʋ mim pakrarɔ nɔɔn duro bɛɛ y:
A bɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩbarɛ sim sʋ y, kan ma kɩ, hɔɔ gəəro kɩ, b'a bɩ jaan da sɔ y. K'awɔɔ zu naa haay ʋ, awɔɔ ba mɩŋŋa. Woso y'a darɛ a han."
Gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a leer so, ŋn'a hʋr, ŋnɩ ta Antɩyɔs ʋ, ŋn'aa gʋɔɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, ŋnɩ ci bɩ ka ŋ ʋ.
Ci bɩ karɩnda bɩ barɛ ŋ heer nyɔɔ, kʋ ŋ dʋndɔrɛ ncɩnaaʋ yɩ bɩ minto.
Ziidi kan Silas kɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ, ŋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ dʋndɔ kan meerbaarɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ paŋŋa da ra.
Ŋ gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm poore, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n bɩ zaa ka ŋ ʋ, ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ ta gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ zi.
Kʋ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ nɩ, ŋ gɔɔta Antɩyɔs ʋ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ, ŋn'ɩ Zuuba lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam kan gʋɔɔ gʋta kɩ sɔ.
K'a yɩ poore bɩ kur bɩ, Pol a hɩ Barnabas m, a ʋ: "Ʋ ʋ wusigə, ʋ aa dɩga ʋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma kʋ biyəə kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba lemim nyɩnta pa da ʋ b'ʋ. K'ʋ dɩga a kʋ ŋ y'a bam lɔ gɛ."
Barnabas n a ŋʋa k'a Zaan kʋ n n'a birm Markɩ bɩ gaa a ta m.
Bɩ, Pol n yɛ k'a gaa y, bala, a nyɩnta an nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ, an a gʋ ŋ ma Panfilii ʋ, a n a ya, an zi ba kan ŋ kɩ y.
Ŋ bɩsɩ ka kan kʋ kɩ maam-maam, bɩsɩ bɩ n bɩ ŋ gʋngʋ kʋ ma gʋaa biyəə n ta a lɛ, a lɛ. Barnabas Markɩ gaa, an da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ an ta Siipɩr ʋ.
Pol n Silas gaa, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n yaa da, kʋ Zuuba n a barka ka ŋ ʋ. Ŋ n cem.
Pol bɔ Siirii kan Silisii kɩ kʋrɔ ʋ, an nɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa dam la.
Pol kan Silas kɩ ta ŋn'aa lee ku Derbe ʋ, ŋnɩ cem ŋnɩ ta Listɩr ʋ. Karɩndanyɩ deem n nɩ b'ʋ, a tɔ m Timote, a da bɩ zɩɩfʋ m, an a ba sɩrakarɛzaa, a zɩ bɩ grɛkkɩ m.
A danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Listɩr ʋ kan Ikonɩyɔm kɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a lɛ bɔrɛ a tɔ ʋ.
Pol n a ŋʋa k'a gaa. A n a gaa, an a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto, bala, ŋ haay a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, a zɩ bɩ grɛkkɩ m.
Tara nɔ rɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ yɩ lɛrɔ kʋ Zerizalɛm kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta kan kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋn'a yɛrɛ ŋ han kʋ ŋ nɩ zu ŋ ʋ mɩŋŋa.
Kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa n'a dam la, ŋ lɛ n'a dam la dɔmɩm biyəə.
Pol kan Silas kɩ bɔ Frizii ʋ kan Galasii kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ta ŋ nɩ tolle, kʋ ŋ bɩ lemim bɩ pa da Azii ʋ y.
Kʋ ŋ lee ku Mizii jireyaa ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a ŋʋa k'a ta Bitinii ʋ, bɩ, Yeezuu Ɛspri bɩ ŋ da jɩm ʋ.
Ŋ n cem, ŋnɩ bra Mizii ʋ, ŋn'aa lee ku Trowas ʋ.
Gum deem ʋ, Pol Woso hɔhɩnkarɛ yɩ: Masedʋan gʋaa deem y'a hɩnka m, an jɩm brama, an n'a wɔ zɩnzɛm nɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋr Masedʋan ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da wɔɔ han!"
Pol hɔhɩnkarɛ bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'ʋ ta Masedʋan ʋ, bala, wɔɔ si wɔɔ ʋ Woso n nɩ wɔɔ birm kʋ aa lemim nyɩnta pa da b'ʋ.
Da kʋ wɔɔ ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ Trowas ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ta tɩrga kan Samotrasɩ kɩ. A dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ ta Neyapolis ʋ.
Ʋ ʋ to b'ʋ, ʋ ta Filipii ʋ, ʋ gam ma, Masedʋan kʋrɔ haay tara nɔ gʋta m bɩ. A gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a so a mɩŋŋa ʋ am Rɔm zannɔ paan•••rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m. Wɔɔ dɔmɩm poore ba tara nɔ bɩ do ʋ.
Sabaa hinni ʋ, wɔɔ bɔ tara nɔ ʋ, ʋ ta bɔrkɔ lɛ ra. Bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ hɔɔn da, ʋ ʋ, yaadarɛ bɩncɛ nyɩntam b'ʋ. Kʋ wɔɔ nyɩnta bɩ, wɔɔ Yeezuu mim dɩnda kan lannɔ kʋ ŋ y'a so kʋ ma b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Ŋ gʋaa deem k'a tɔ m Lidii, garhuuro hɛɛrɛzaa m, bɩ nyɩnta, an n'a tʋr kam wɔɔ ma. Tɩyatɩɩr kʋ nyɩ m, an nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ. Zuuba a heer gʋ k'an bʋr a ma, an a tʋr ka Pol meerbaa bɩ ma.
K'a batɛm si bɩ, a mɩŋŋa kan a har gʋɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a a yɛ wɔɔ han, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ zum Zuuba ʋ, k'a bʋr, a bɩ wʋta mɔɔ har ʋ." A n ma wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ n kɔ ʋ yɛ.
Hindeem ʋ, wɔɔ nɩ tam yaadarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, lʋpoo n bɩ wɔɔ zɛ ʋ, lɔ m, bʋʋrɔzaa m. A wɔ bɩ kure ɩ busoo karɛ a zuubɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
A n nɩ zum wɔɔ jɛ ʋ, Pol kan wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ zee darɛ, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro Woso k'a lɛ da haay zibəənyɩnɔ m. Bʋmbɔrɛ zaa ŋ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m."
A ba a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ dɔmɩm gʋta nɔ ʋ. Pol n bɩ kɔ, an a bɔ, an a hɩ zinə bɩ m, a ʋ: "Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, mɔɔ lɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ: bɔ lʋ naa do mɛ ʋ!" Lɛɛm bɩ, a bɔ a mɛ ʋ.
A zuubɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ a busoo bɩ yɩrɛ n a zɛ ra bɩ, ŋ Pol nyasʋ kan Silas kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ gɩngaata, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ daasɩ ʋ, jɩtannɔ taa.
Brɔɔ n ŋ gaa, ŋn'aa ŋ hɩnka dʋdɔkənno m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ wɔɔ kʋ naa nyankʋrɛ. Zɩɩfʋrɔ m.
Ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a bɩr zum wɔɔ Rɔm zannɔ lɛrɔ ʋ bɩ dɩndam."
Zamaa n wuti nyaa m kan Pol rɔ kɩ. Dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ n lɛ ka, ŋnɩ ŋ huuro bʋmbɔ ŋ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ zɛ madɩɩrɔ m.
Ŋ zɛ kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ gʋta bɩ, ŋ bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Ŋ n lɛ ka lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa b'ʋ kan dɩga ŋ ma mɩŋŋa.
Gʋaa kʋ ŋ lɛ naa do ka ʋ bɩ, a yɩ ŋ du cɛnɔzaa b'ʋ, an ŋ da gɔ ʋ.
Dibsir k'a da bɩ, Pol kan Silas kɩ ɩ yaa dam, ŋn'ɩ Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ laa lɔm, lɔnnɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ ma.
Tara n nyiŋŋə lɛ deem, a nyiŋŋəre bɩ paŋŋa n cɛ jɩr bɩ yinyi. Cɛ bɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay n gʋngʋ lɛɛm, lɔnnɔ wɔɔ haay baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ n sur pəŋŋə bɩ ma.
Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n wuti hinceem ma, a lɔnnɔcɛ lɛrɔ wɔɔ yɩ ŋn'ɩ gʋm, a hɔɔn ʋ bɩ lɔnnɔ wɔɔ a si ŋ y'a ʋ. A n a kargʋ gaa ʋ, k'a a mɩŋŋa zɛ m.
Pol n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ hɔsɩ ba ɩ mɩŋŋa nɩ y. Wɔɔ haay ta ʋ."
Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n sɛ yɛ, an bra si, an gasʋ, an aa sʋnta Pol kan Silas kɩ taa mɛhinkə m.
A n ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ garga ra, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ ra, mɔɔ y'a bam lɔ kʋ m bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ?"
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Sɩra ka Zuuba Yeezuu ʋ, ɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm, ɩbɩɩ kan ɩ har gʋɔɔ kɩ."
Ŋ n Zuuba lemim bɩ dɩnda m, kan gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ n'a har ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n ŋ gaa gunuu ʋ b'ʋ lɛɛm, k'a yaa ŋ nyinno sʋrgɔ. Wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ sɔ bɩ, a batɛm si kan a har gʋɔɔ kɩ haay.
A n ŋ gaa, an ta ŋ nɩ a cɛ ʋ, an hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ, an n'a heer nyɔɔm kan a har gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a sɩra ka Woso ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ a dɔmazannɔ nyɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'aa a hɩ lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ m, kan wɔ saa gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma.
Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n mim naa do hɩ Pol m, a ʋ: "Dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ nyɔɔ da, ŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa awɔɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, k'a bɔ a doo kan laafɩɩ kɩ."

Bɩ Pol a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ŋ y'a ka, ŋnɩ wɔɔ zɛ zamaa bire ʋ, bɩ ŋ n wɔɔ dʋdɔ ka y, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ n Rɔm zannɔ, ŋn'a ka, ŋnɩ wɔɔ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a ŋʋam k'a a kʋna, a wɔɔ bɔ. Bɩ bɩ kʋ yɩrɛ y. Ŋ n bʋr a zim, ŋnɩ bɩ wɔɔ bɔ."
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a wusigə, ŋn'aa naa haay hɩ dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ m, nyibəə n gasʋ ŋ ʋ, kʋ y'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ Rɔm zannɔ n a mɩ bɩ minto.
Ŋ n bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ sugur yɛ ŋ han, ŋnɩ ŋ bɔ, ŋn'a yɛ ŋ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔ tara bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, Pol kan Silas kɩ ta, ŋn'aa Lidii yɩ, ŋnɩ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ yɩ ŋnɩ ŋ heer ba kookoo, ŋnɩ cem.
Ŋ bɔ Anfipolis ʋ kan Apolonii kɩ, ŋn'aa lee ku Tesaloniki ʋ. Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ sokʋmacɛ n nɩ b'ʋ.
Amb'a tɩr a ba biisi bɩ, Pol ta, an aa ŋ yɩ, an sʋʋra ba kan ŋ kɩ sabaa hinni ʋ, an a ta kʋ rɛ gallɛm kaakʋ, an nɩ Wosoci bɩ
bɔrɛ ŋ nɩ kʋ zi, a ʋ Krista a ga m, an fɩr yɩ, an ga, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ. A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Krista kʋ mɔɔ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m bɩ, Yeezuu m."
Zɩɩfʋrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɛ, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra kan Pol kɩ Silas kɩ, kan grɛkkɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ gʋta, kan lannɔ tɔzannɔ kɩ gʋta.

Zɩɩfʋrɔ wuti kan jɩmbaa heerbusu kɩ, ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ gaa zaa bire ʋ, ŋn'a ka tara bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n yar, ŋnɩ taranɔ bɩ nya kʋ rɛ. Ŋ n ta Zasɔn har ʋ, ŋn'a kam Pol ma kan Silas kɩ, k'a ŋ gaa a ta ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ taa.
Kʋ ŋ n ŋ yɩ bɩ, ŋ Zasɔn gaa kan danyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ dʋdɔkənno taa, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ durnya bɩ dam, ŋnɩ cem ŋnɩ bʋr naa ʋ kɛɛrɛ,
Zasɔn n ŋ si a har ʋ. Ŋ haay kaanm Rɔm cir lɛ m, ŋ ʋ, cir vanta n ta ʋ, a tɔ m Yeezuu."
Zeero nɔɔn duro gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da bɔ ʋ, kan dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ,
ŋnɩ busoo si Zasɔn kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ han, ŋn'a cɩnta, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa ŋ ma.
Lɛɛm bɩ, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ka Pol kan Silas kɩ n cem kan Beree kʋ kɩ gunuu ʋ. Kʋ ŋ lee ku bɩ, ŋ ta zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋa, an lɛ da Tesaloniki zannɔ wɔɔ ra. Ŋ lemim bɩ si kan a heer kɩ haay. Dɔmɩm haay, ŋ yɩ dɩgam Wosoci b'ʋ, k'a dɩga a hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩm bɩ sɩra m gɛ.
Gʋta a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ ŋ bire ʋ kan grɛkkɩ lannɔ tɔzannɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔyaarɔ kɩ gʋta.
Tesaloniki zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʋ, Pol ɩ Beree ʋ an nɩ Woso lemim pa dam bɩ, ŋ lee ku b'ʋ, k'a a ya, a gʋɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔta.
Danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a ba zɔɔ, ŋnɩ Pol da zaa ra an ta kan higʋta bɩ lɛ ra kɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, Silas kan Timote kɩ gɔɔta b'ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Pol da zaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a gaa ŋnɩ ta m Atɛnnɩ ʋ, ŋn'a wusigə kan Pol lɛ kɩ, kʋ Silas kan Timote kɩ n a jɩ sa zɔɔ-zɔɔ.
Pol k'a nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma Atɛnnɩ ʋ bɩ, a heer a zar kan wosobaawɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tara bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ minto.
A n gasʋ sokʋmacɛ deem ʋ, an nɩ meer bam kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, dɔmɩm haay daasɩrɔ ʋ, a y'a bam kan gʋaa haay k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ kɩ.

Hɔɔnkamazannɔ, Epikiriyɛɛnrɔ kan Stoyisɛɛnrɔ kɩ, nyɩnta b'ʋ ŋn'ɩ sʋʋra bam kan kɩ. Gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Para-paradarɛzaa naa do ʋ lɔ?" Gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ: "Wosoro daarɔ an nɩ ŋ pa darɛ!" Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Pol ɩ Yeezuu pa dam, kan a mɩmbɔʋrɛ kɩ.
Ŋ n a nyasʋ k'a ta m ci kʋ n n'a birm Arewopaazɩ bɩ mim ʋ. Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ karɩnda daa k'ɩbɩɩ n'a bam naa jɩ dɩnda wɔɔ n na?
Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ minno daarɔ dɩndam wɔɔ m, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʋ ŋ jɩ dɔ."
Atɛnnɩ zannɔ wɔɔ kan saanarɔ kɩ bɩr hɔsɩ bam, kʋ minno daarɔ dɩndarɛ kan a tʋr ka ma kɩ bɛɛ y.
Pol n jɩm brama Arewopaazɩ ʋ b'ʋ, a ʋ: "Atɛnnɩ zannɔ, dɩga kʋ mɔɔ nawʋm awɔɔ ma naa, sɩrakarɛzannɔ gʋtɔɔ n'awɔɔ m.

Kʋ mɔɔ m da awɔɔ kʋ bɩ zi bɩ, hɔ haay k'a n'awɔɔ yaadarɛ mɔr bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ. Mɔɔ yɩ, n n a gʋrsɩra ba mannɩduu niŋŋə ma ncɩnaaʋ: 'Woso kʋ gʋaa n a dɔ minto.' Hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a daŋ ʋ, b'awɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ bʋr kʋ m b'a pa da awɔɔ m naa.
Woso k'a durnya da, kan hɔ haay k'a n'a nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ, a m brama kan tara kɩ Zuuba. A bɩr gasʋm wosocɛrɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ a dɔ a wɔ m nɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y.
Hɔsɩ zibəə ba ma y. A bɩr a kam ma kʋ gʋaa n a da a han hɔ niŋŋə ma y. Bala, a n nɩ mɩsɩrbaa, hoonsi, kan hɔ haay kɩ kam gʋaa haay ʋ.
K'an gʋaa deem mɛ kɩ, a do haay da kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr tara burə lɛɛ haay ʋ. A dɔmɩnnɔ bɔ kʋ zi gʋɔɔ minto, kan ŋ tararɔ jirə kɩ,
kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a wɔ dɩnda, ŋn'a ka Woso ma, gɛɛ ŋ y'a yɩm gɛ, an bɔkarɛ a bɩ laatʋ wɔɔ gʋaa biyəə ma y.
Bala, A mɩŋŋa zi wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa n ta ʋ, ʋ nɩ tarɛ, ʋ nɩ meeyaa m. Amba awɔɔ gʋrsɩrabənno gɔsɩnnɔ a hɩ bɩ m: 'A dogʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m.'
Kʋ Woso dogʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ, wɔɔ n ʋ ga m, ʋ ʋ hɔɔn da, ʋ ʋ, Woso bɩ sarma nɩ, gɛɛ wanzurfu, gɛɛ jaa kʋ gʋaa a banka, an a bɔ ʋ a hɔɔn ʋ bɩ nɩ y.
Bɩ, Woso n a ya, an nɩ dɩgam dɔmɩm kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ badɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ ma y. A y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ kɛɛrɛ, kʋ ŋ haay n a bɔ a mimbʋnyaarɔ ʋ bɩncɛ haay ʋ.
A dɔmɩm deem bɔ ʋ, an a cɩnta, kʋ gʋaa k'a bɔ ʋ bɩ n bɩ durnya dʋdɔ ka kan sɩra kɩ. Bɩ, a a kasɛtɩ hɩnka gʋɔɔ haay m, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ."
Gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ mim kʋ ŋ b'a ma bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ yaa wʋm Pol ma, niŋŋoo n n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "K'ʋ mim naa do minto m, wɔɔ y'ʋ yarɛ, ʋ tʋr ka ɩbɩɩ ma dɔmɩm vanta ʋ."
A yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, Pol n a gʋ ŋ ma.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ yɛ a meerbaa bɩ ma, ŋn'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ. Arewopaazɩzaa Denii nyɩnta ʋ, kan lʋ deem kʋ n n'a birm Damariisi bɩ kɩ, kan gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ sɔ.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Pol a hʋr Atɛnnɩ ʋ, an ta Korɛntɩ ʋ.
B'ʋ bɩ, a zɩɩfʋ deem zɛ ʋ, a tɔ m Akilas. Pɔn kʋ gʋaa m, an a to Italii ʋ lɛɛm an bʋr kan a lʋ Prisil kɩ. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, cir Kloodɩ lɛ ka, kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ haay n bɔ Rɔm ʋ. Pol n kʋ ma kan ŋ kɩ,
bɩ, kʋ wɔzibəə deem ŋ n'a bam bɩ, (zappabaa m,) a zer ŋ har ʋ, ŋn'ɩ zi bɩ bam kan kʋ kɩ. Huucɛrɔ pɛɛrarɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ barɛ.
Sabaa hinni haay, a ɩ karɩnda dɩndam zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ b'ʋ, an n'a tɔŋ ʋ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ grɛkkɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a si.
Silas kan Timote kɩ kʋ ŋ y'a to Masedʋan ʋ, ŋnɩ lee ku bɩ, ŋ bɩ dɩga a Pol ɩ karɩnda bam, an n'a hɩm zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ Krista bɩ, Yeezuu m.

Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ bɩsɩ ka kan Pol kɩ, ŋnɩ meerbaa bʋnyaa ba. Pol n a huuro zɛ fər, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, a taar y'awɔɔ mim ʋ. Mɔɔ mim bɛɛ m bɩ dɔ y. Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ta mɔɔ nawʋm do vantɔɔ zi."
A n a hʋr bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ, an ta gʋaa kʋ n n'a birm Titiyus Zistus bɩ har ʋ. Woso daʋrɛzaa m, a har bɩ n jɩnjɛɛm sokʋmacɛ bɩ ma.
Krispus k'a m sokʋmacɛ bɩ cir b'a ba sɩrakarɛzaa kan a har gʋɔɔ kɩ haay. Korɛntɩ zannɔ gʋtɔɔ, kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam Pol ma rɔ wɔɔ, a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ sɔ, ŋnɩ batɛm si.
Gum deem ʋ, Zuuba a hɩ Pol m, a hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, ɩ bɩr a hɩm, ɩ bɩ zɛ pi y.
Kʋ sɩra nɩ, mɔɔ ɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ, an n'ɩbɩɩ nyasʋm k'a fɩr ka ɩ ma y, bala, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ ta ʋ gʋta tara naa do nɔ ʋ."
Pol dɔɔraa ba b'ʋ deem kan a kur kɩ, an nɩ Woso lemim dɩndarɛ ŋ bire ʋ.
Dɔmɩm kʋ Galɩyɔn nyɩnta ʋ Akayii tara lɛɛzaa bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a lɛ ba deem, ŋnɩ wuti jɩmbaa m kan Pol kɩ, ŋn'a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Galɩyɔn dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ:
"Gʋaa naa do, karɩnda an n'a bam gʋɔɔ m, a ʋ, gʋɔɔ n yaa da Woso m kan yaadarɛ k'a n a gaakʋmba kan wɔɔ lɛrɔ kɩ."
Pol ʋ k'a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, Galɩyɔn n a nyɩ bɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Zɩɩfʋrɔ ra, kʋ zi niŋŋə a ba a bɩ tɩrga, gɛɛ zibəə bʋnyaa a ba, mɔɔ yɩ m tʋr karɛ awɔɔ ma, bala, a a yɔ.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bɩsɩ bɩ karɛ bɩ, meerbaa m, gɛɛ tɔrɔ m, gɛɛ awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛrɔ m bɩ, pakra a ba awɔɔ m. Mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m nyɩnta minno nɔɔn duro dʋdɔkər y."
A n la ŋ la dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
Ŋ haay n Sɔstɛn, sokʋmacɛ cir bɩ nyasʋ, ŋn'a zɛ dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, bɩ, Galɩyɔn n a war hɔbaa naa do ma y.
Pol a ya, an maasɩrɛ ba Korɛntɩ ʋ. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a a gʋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, an da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, k'a ta Siirii ʋ. Akilas kan Prisil kɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ. Pol a mim zɩnzɛra Sɛnkrɛs ʋ, bala, a ler bɔ Woso m.
Ŋ lee ku Efɛɛzɩ ʋ. B'ʋ bɩ, Pol a gʋ a zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ ma. A ta, an aa gasʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ sokʋmacɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ bɩsɩ kam kan ŋ kɩ.
Brɔɔ n a yɛ han kan a dɔmɩm bɩ zu ra, an a gu,
an a gʋ ŋ ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zɛm bɩ bʋr awɔɔ zi dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʋ, kʋ Woso yɛ." A n da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, Efɛɛzɩ ʋ.
K'a lee ku Sezaree ʋ an bɔ kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a cem an ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, an aa yaa da danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, an cem an ta Antɩyɔs ʋ,
an aa maasɩrɛ ba b'ʋ poore. A n cem, an ta Galasii kan Frizii kɩ gʋrgarɔ haay ʋ, an nɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay heer bam kookoo.
Zɩɩfʋ deem kʋ n n'a birm Apolɔs, an yɩ Alɛsandrii ʋ bɩ lee ku Efɛɛzɩ ʋ. Hɔɔn zaa m, an mim dɔ. A n Wosoci bɩ dɔ sɔ.

Zuuba zaa b'a dɩnda zʋr-zʋr, a y'a pa darɛ kan a heer kɩ haay, an nɩ karɩnda dɩndam gʋɔɔ m, an nɩ hɔ haay k'a ba Yeezuu minto bɩ dɩndam, an nɩ zure a zaa ʋ. Bɩ, batɛm kʋ Zaan nyɩnta an a kam b'a dɔ bala.
A n nɩ meer bam kan wɩsɩrabaa kɩ sokʋmacɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Prisil kan Akilas kɩ kʋ ŋ y'a meerbaa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ Woso zaa bɩ dɩnda m zʋr-zʋr, ŋn'a paŋŋa da ra.

K'a nyɩnta, an n'a ŋʋam k'a ta Akayii ʋ bɩ, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʋ: A a ga m. Ŋ n ci ba karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, kʋ ŋ n'a si mɩŋŋa. K'a lee ku b'ʋ bɩ, a daahan gʋta ka gɔsɩnnɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso barka minto ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
Bala, a meerbaa bɩ paŋŋa bʋr zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ ra gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, a ɩ Wosoci bɩ jɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ sɩrɩɩ-sɩrɩɩ, a ʋ: Krista bɩ, Yeezuu m.
Dɔmɩm kʋ Apolɔs nyɩnta ʋ Korɛntɩ ʋ bɩ, Pol bɔ kʋ bɩ gʋrgarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cigaarɔ wɔɔ ʋ, an ta Efɛɛzɩ ʋ, an karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ b'ʋ,
an ŋ lar, a ʋ: "K'awɔɔ a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ bɩ, awɔɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri si ra?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n Sɛnt-Ɛspri mim ma cɩna y."
Pol n laaka da, a ʋ: "Batɛm kara awɔɔ si kɛɛrɛ?" Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Zaan batɛm bɩ m."
Pol n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Zaan nyɩnta, an nɩ heerlʋrlɛ batɛm kam, an n'a hɩm gʋɔɔ m kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr awɔɔ jɛ ʋ b'ʋ. A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: Yeezuu."
Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ batɛm si Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma.
Pol n a wɔrɔ ka ŋ la, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer ŋ la, ŋn'ɩ meer bam leminno vantɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ Woso lɛ si ŋn'ɩ som la.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ a zɔ bueerehɩɩya ma.
Pol tɩr ta sokʋmacɛ ʋ, an bɩr Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩndam kan wɩsɩrabaa kɩ, an ta an mom kaakʋ ku. Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam nɔ wɔɔ n a si sɩra.

Gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ heer ka, ŋ bɩr yɛm k'a si bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu zaa bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋm gʋɔɔ bire ʋ. Pol n bɔ ŋ bire ʋ, an karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gaa a hɔ, an ta ŋ nɩ Tiranɔsɩ karɩndacɛ ʋ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ dɔmɩm haay.
A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ an ta, an dɔɔraa hɩɩya ku, bɩ minto y'a ka Azii zannɔ, zɩɩfʋrɔ, kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ n a ku, ŋnɩ Zuuba lemim bɩ ma.
Woso n nɩ hoserlo kʋ ŋ lɔɔ ba ʋ bam kan Pol kɩ.
Baa kʋ n pɛɛra gɛɛ huu a nɔ a mɛ ma, n a nɔ yaabazannɔ ma, ŋ yɩ laafɩɩ yɩrɛ, zinəro wɔɔ nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ mɛ ʋ.

Zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔ n ta ʋ ŋnɩ bɩmbɩrm, ŋn'a dam ma, ŋn'ɩ lam zinəro ra. Hindeem ʋ ŋ n'a ŋʋa k'a la zinəro ra gʋɔɔ mɛ ʋ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ m. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m Yeezuu kʋ Pol n n'a pa dam bɩ tɔ ma, k'a bɔ!"
Zɩɩfʋrɔ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ deem kʋ n n'a birm Seva b'ɩ nyɩnɔ m saanhɩna, ŋn'ɩ zibəə naa do barɛ.
Zinə n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Yeezuu dɔ, kʋ nka m Pol m, mɔɔ dɔ. B'awɔɔ, nkɔɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ?"
Gʋaa kʋ zinə n a mɛ ʋ bɩ n der ŋ ma haay, an a da ŋ ma, an fɩr ka ŋ ma, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋnɩ bɔ har ʋ b'ʋ dɩgɩ, kan nyinno kɩ.
Efɛɛzɩ kʋ jilli, zɩɩfʋrɔ kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ haay mim naa do ma. Nyibəə n gasʋ ŋ haay ʋ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla, gʋta bʋr, ŋn'a leer busu brama, ŋn'a minno bɔrɛ a lɛ ma.
Gʋɔɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ gɔɔta, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa ka wɔkure ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a ciro wɔɔ gʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ ŋ so kʋ ra, ŋnɩ sɛ nya ŋ ʋ, gʋaa haay taa. Ciro wɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a busoo lɛ zɛ bɩ, a wanzurfu busoo ma waa busoor.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kan Zuuba paŋŋa kɩ, lemim bɩ nɩ tam lɛɛ, a paŋŋa n'a dam la.
Minno nɔɔn duro kʋ ŋ cem bɩ, Pol a cɩnta a hɔɔn ʋ, k'a bɔ Masedʋan ʋ kan Akayii kɩ ʋ, a ta Zerizalɛm ʋ. A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a lee ku b'ʋ, k'a cem a ta Rɔm ʋ."
A a daahanzannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ Timote kan Erastɩ kɩ nyɔɔ Masedʋan ʋ, a mɩŋŋa n gɔɔta Azii ʋ an maasɩrɛ ba poore.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ, nyaarɔ gʋtɔɔ bɩ wuti ŋnɩ ba Zuuba zaa bɩ minto.
Nyɔkka deem n nɩ b'ʋ a tɔ m Demetrus, an nɩ Artemis yaadarɛcɛ nyʋgɔrɔ bam wanzurfu m kan nyɔkkarɔ vantɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ busoo yɩm gʋta.
A nyɔkkarɔ wɔɔ duro so kʋ ma kan tar deem zibəəzannɔ kɩ, a ʋ: "M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ wɔzibəə naa do nɩ hɔbɩrɛ kam wɔɔ ʋ.
B'awɔɔ yɩ, an n'a mam: Efɛɛzɩ nɔ bɛɛ m bala y, Azii ʋ haay Pol naa do n'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ haay m, a ʋ, wosoro kʋ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ barɛ ʋ wɔ m nɔɔn duro, wosoro bɛɛ y. Gʋɔɔ gʋta ŋn'ɩ zure a hɔ b'ʋ.
Wɔɔ zibəə bɩ zarlɛ minto bɩ bɛɛ wɔɔ nɩ nyi bam nɩ bala y, wɔɔ wosolʋ gʋta Artemis cɛ bɩ bɔʋrɛ m. Bala, Artemis kʋ Azii zannɔ kan durnya naa haay kɩ n'a daŋ ʋ bɩ, a bɩ daʋrɛ yɩm dɔ y."
Kʋ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ heer busu, ŋnɩ zee da, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Efɛɛzɩ zannɔ Artemis n gʋta!"
Mim naa do a kərgu kʋnɔ bɩ haay ra, an a zɛ kʋ ma, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋnɩ ta sarbarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ Masedʋan zannɔ Gayus kan Aristarkɩ kɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ Pol zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ.
Pol n a cɩnta, k'a ta sokʋma bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ. Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a to an ta y.
Azii cinno gɔsɩnnɔ k'a gʋaasɩbɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ nyɔɔ da kʋ n n'a hɩ m, ŋ ʋ: a b'a ka a mim ma, a ʋ, ta a ʋ sarbarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ y.
Lɛɛ bɩ n a ba bʋrgʋ. Gʋaa biyəə n'a hɔɔnhɔ hɩm, tatʋr ŋ n'a bam bala, gʋɔɔ gʋta n a dɔ kʋ bɔ minto m, a a so kʋ ma y.
Gʋɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta sokʋma bɩ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ mim bɩ dɩnda Alɛsandɩr kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a bɔ ʋ n a ka lɛɛ bɩ m. Alɛsandɩr n a wɔ busu, k'a meer ba kan zamaa bɩ kɩ.
Kʋ ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ zɩɩfʋ m bɩ, ŋ haay a lɛ ba deem, ŋn'ɩ zee dam. Ŋ zee bɩ darɛ wakatɩ hɩɩya ku. Ŋ ʋ: "Efɛɛzɩ zannɔ Artemis n gʋta!"
Gʋrsɩrabər b'a gu an a da ma, an gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da bar ʋ, a ʋ: "Efɛɛzɩ zannɔ, gʋaa ta ʋ, a n a dɔ, a ʋ, Efɛɛzɩ kʋ zannɔ nɩ dɔm Artemis gʋta cɛ bɩ ma, kan a jaa k'a a to brama an a da bɩ kɩ ra?
Kʋ ŋ n bɩsɩ ka hɔ naa do ma bɩ, a a ga m, awɔɔ m bʋr a ma, a b'a ka, a ba zɔɔ-zɔɔ y.
Awɔɔ bʋr gʋɔɔ m naa ʋ, ŋ n mim zu ʋ wɔɔ wosolʋ bɩ ma y, ŋ n a sʋnsɔ wʋ sɔ y.
Kʋ Demetrus kan zibənno wɔɔ kɩ ɩ mim m kan gʋaa kɩ, dʋdɔkarɛ dɔmɩm ta ʋ. Taralɛɛzannɔ ta ʋ. K'a ta kʋ m dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.
Kʋ minno gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʋ kʋ kʋ bɩ gʋɔɔ a so kʋ ma, ŋ dɩgam minno wɔɔ duro ma.
Her naa, mim b'a da ma, an yɩ bʋnyaa kan wɔɔ kɩ. Bala, n y'a da ma, n nɩ mim ka wɔɔ ra sokʋma naa do minto. Sokʋma naa do jɩ ba ʋ y, kʋ n wɔɔ lar wɔɔ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩm ʋ a hɩ y."
Bɩ, naa k'a hɩ bɩ, a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra.
Bʋgʋr bɩ k'a b'a da bar ʋ bɩ, Pol karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma, a nɩ ŋ dʋndɔ. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a a leer so ŋ nɩ, an Masedʋan zaa sa.
A a da a gʋrgarɔ zi, an danyɩnɔ wɔɔ dʋndɔ gʋta, an bɔkarɛ an lee ku Grɛsɩ ʋ,
an aa nyɩnta b'ʋ mom kaakʋ. Dɔmɩm k'a nɩ daŋ ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ k'a ta Siirii ʋ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ kʋ ma k'a nyasʋ bɩ, a a hɔɔn da, an a bɔ an bɔ Masedʋan ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, Beree kʋ gʋaa Piirus nyɩ Sopatrɔs kan Tesaloniki kʋ gʋɔɔ Aristarkɩ kan Sekundus kɩ, Derbe kʋ gʋaa Gayus kɩ, kan Timote kɩ, kan Azii kʋ gʋɔɔ Tisikkɩ kɩ, Trofim kɩ sɔ.
Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro lɛɛ ka lɛɛ, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'ɩ dɔm wɔɔ ma Trowas ʋ.
Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ʋ hʋr Filipii ʋ, bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ kur, ʋ da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ k'ʋ aa n ŋ ku. Dɔmɩm soor jɛ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ lee ku Trowas ʋ. Wɔɔ n gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm saanhɩna.
Hatʋ hinni ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra, k'ʋ bur zɩnzɛ ra. A dɔ k'a nɩ mɛm kʋ Pol n a hʋr bɩ, a meerbaa sa, an n'a bam kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, meerbaa bɩ maasɩrɛ ba, an ta an a zɔ dibsir zeezi ma.
Fɩtɩrɛrɔ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta cɛmim kaakʋ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ so kʋ ma ʋ b'ʋ.

Nyukumbueere deem k'a tɔ m Etikɩ bɩ nyɩnta cɛ bɩ tokoro lɛ ra, hinceem gʋta n a nyasʋ. Bɩ ma bɩ, Pol meerbaa bɩ n nya y. Hinceem bɩ k'a a nyasʋ gʋta bɩ, a bra cɛmim kaakʋ hɔ b'ʋ, an a da tara ʋ. Kʋ ŋ bʋr k'a b'a busu bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a a ga.
Pol n zer, an bra si an ta zi, an aa a busu a za ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "A da bɩ bɔ ʋ y. A mɩsɩr!"
Pol k'a a bɔ an der bɩ, a bur bɩ zɛ ra, an a bɩ. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a meerbaa bɩ maasɩrɛ ba an ta an wutigʋta ku. Bɩ kur bɩ, a cem.
Bɩ, nyukumbueere k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ doo m. B'a yɩ heernyɔɔ gʋta, ŋ haay minto.
Wɔɔ kɔɔlʋʋ sa, ʋ lɛɛ ka lɛɛ, k'ʋ aa zer Asɔs ʋ, kʋ aa Pol k'a zaa sa a gam ma bɩ zɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ʋ a busu, amba a cɩnta bɩ m.
K'a wɔɔ zɛ ʋ Asɔs ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ busu kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ k'ʋ ta Mitilɛnnɩ ʋ.
B'ʋ bɩ, dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, ʋ ʋ zɔ Kiyo ma. A dɔmɩm hɩɩya hinni ʋ, wɔɔ bɔ Samɔs ʋ, bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ jɩm poore Trogiliyɔn ʋ, ʋ cem, ʋ lee ku Milɛ ʋ.
Pol a cɩnta k'a bɩ jɩm Efɛɛzɩ ʋ y, k'a lɛ baa k'a maasɩrɛ ba Azii ʋ bɩ minto. Nyɩnta a ʋ, an n'a bam zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'a a da ma, k'a lee ku Zerizalɛm ʋ, Pantɩkɔtɩ dɔmɩm bɩ minto.
Pol a to Milɛ ʋ, an Efɛɛzɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ bir.
Kʋ ŋ b'a zɛ ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa kʋ mɔɔ ba dɔmɩm haay, mɔɔ leekure sɩŋŋɩda ʋ Azii ʋ bɩ dɔ.
Mɔɔ Zuuba zi ba kan mɩŋŋa zerle kɩ, kan nyifeer kɩ, kan fɩryɩrɛ do haay kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ a cɩnta k'a mɔɔ nyasʋ, a mɔɔ zɛ bɩ kɩ.
Mɔɔ n hɔsɩ k'a zibəə m ta awɔɔ ma bɩ nyaakʋm da awɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta pa da, m hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m gʋɔɔ bire ʋ, amba harlɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ kasɛtɩ ka, m zɩɩfʋrɔ kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ bir, kʋ ŋ n'a bɔ a taam ŋnɩ zu Woso ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu ʋ.
Bɩ naa ma bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri mɔɔ ba a lɔ, kʋ m zaa sa, m ta Zerizalɛm ʋ. Mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ bɔ n n'aa ba mɔɔ m b'ʋ y.
Kan bɩ kɩ haay, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ mɔɔ m, kʋ haay kʋ mɔɔ nɩ bɔŋ ʋ, a ʋ, baŋŋarɔ kan fɩryɩrɛ kɩ ɩ dɔm mɔɔ ma.
Bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr kɔm sɩ ma, m mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa minto y. Mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, kʋ m zu m zaa ʋ mɩŋŋa, kan zibəə kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ. Kʋ m Woso barka lemim nyɩnta bɩ kasɛtɩ ka."
"Mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa kɛɛrɛ, mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ meer yɩ y, awɔɔ haay, awɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ bɔ, m Woso cirbəə pa da a m nɔ wɔɔ.
Mɔɔ m da ma, m a hɩ awɔɔ taa her: Awɔɔ gɔsɩ taar ba mɔɔ mim ʋ y.
Mɔɔ n hɔsɩ nyaakʋm da awɔɔ m fɩɩga y. A n lɛ da bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ kʋ Woso a cɩnta haay k'a ba bɩ hɩ awɔɔ m.
Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a dundo a mɩŋŋɔɔ zi, kan bakʋ bɩ haay kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri awɔɔ ba a dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a nyɩnta Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma k'a cɩnta kan a mɩŋŋa ma kɩ bɩ dundonno.
Mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hʋrlɛ jɛ ʋ, poojino bʋnyaarɔ gasʋrɛ awɔɔ zi, ŋnɩ bakʋ bɩ zar.
Baa gʋɔɔ bɔrɛ awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ barla, ŋnɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn lʋr kan meerbaa bʋnyaarɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ da a tar la.
Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a dundo a zi, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: Dɔɔraa kaakʋ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə dʋndɔ gunuu ʋ kan a sinuu ʋ kɩ, m nyifeer nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ n mɛnyɔɔ da y.
Bɩ naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ awɔɔ ka Woso ʋ kan a meerbaa barka k'a paŋŋa n ta ʋ, an n'a dam ma, an awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ da ra, k'a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ hɔjirle nɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ hɔɔn n a ka gɔsɩ wanzurfu zi, gɛɛ sarma, gɛɛ huu y.
Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a dɔ a ʋ, m wɔ naa mɔɔ zi ba m, m a yɩ, an a ga mɔɔ m kan m zukuuzannɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ hɔ haay hɩnka awɔɔ m, k'ɩ zi ba ncɩnaaʋ, ɩ hɔ yɩrɛ, ɩ ɩ dam paŋŋawarzannɔ han, k'a Zuuba Yeezuu minno k'a ŋ hɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ sɔ: Hɔ ka gʋaa ʋ jɩra gʋaa n'a ka ɩ ʋ m."
K'a minno nɔɔn duro hɩ bɩ, a sʋnta kan ŋ kɩ haay an yaa da.
Ŋ haay n zɛ nyi da ʋ, ŋn'a burgu Pol wer ma.
K'a hɩ, a ʋ, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ meer yɩ bɩ, yɩ ŋ heer zar an lɛ da. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, ŋnɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan kɩ, ŋn'aa a da zaa ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ jir ʋ.
Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ gʋ ŋ ma bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ʋ ta tɩrga kan Kɔɔs kɩ. Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ ta Rodɛs ʋ, ʋ ʋ to b'ʋ, ʋ ta Pataraa ʋ.
Kʋ wɔɔ kɔɔlʋʋ yɩ an nɩ tam Fenisii ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ da ʋ, ʋ cem.
Kʋ wɔɔ ta, ʋ n'ʋ zɔm Siipɩr ma bɩ, wɔɔ da, ʋ jɩsa ʋ, ʋ ta Siirii ʋ, ʋ aa zer Tiir ʋ bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ n'a mɔr bɩ zerŋ ʋ b'ʋ.
Wɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔmɩm saanhɩna, bala, wɔɔ sʋr karɩndanyɩnɔ ma b'ʋ. Kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ, brɔɔ a hɩ Pol m, ŋ ʋ, a bɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ y.
Wɔɔ cenle dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ wusigə. K'ʋ wɔɔ nɩ tam bɩ, ŋ haay wɔɔ da zaa ʋ, lannɔ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bɔ tara nɔ b'ʋ. Wɔɔ n sʋnta hi bɩ lɛ ra, ʋ yaa da.
Ʋ ʋ leer so kʋ m kɛɛrɛ, ʋ da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'a wusigə, ŋnɩ doo.
Kʋ wɔɔ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ sa Tiir ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ yaa lee ku Potolemayiisi ʋ. Kʋ wɔɔ yaa da danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ʋ a nya bɩ, wɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʋ kan ŋ kɩ dɔmɩm deem.
A dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ hʋr, ʋ ta Sezaree ʋ, ʋ aa zer lemim nyɩnta padarɛzaa Filipi har ʋ. Saanhɩnarɔ kʋ n nyɩnta n nɩ ŋ bɔ ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem m. Wɔɔ n gɔɔta kan kɩ b'ʋ.
A nyɩmbɔnnɔ si, ŋ n yar dɔ y. Ŋ n'ɩ wosolɛ sire ŋn'ɩ som la.
Kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʋ an maasɩrɛ ba bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem bɩ lee ku, Zidee kʋ gʋaa m, a tɔ m Agabus.

K'a bɩ wɔɔ yɩ bɩ, a Pol hɔsoaʋ bɩ sa, an a gannɔ sur m kan a wɔrɔ kɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm bɩ ba n nɩ. Ba hɔ kʋ n n'a bam hɔsoaʋ naa do zaa bɩ m Zerizalɛm ʋ na: Zɩɩfʋrɔ y'a nyasʋm, ŋn'a sur, ŋn'a da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ!"
Wɔɔ kan kʋ bɩ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ yɛ Pol han k'a bɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ b'ʋ y.
A n a nyɩ bɔ wɔɔ nʋ, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto awɔɔ nɩ nyi karɛ, an nɩ mɔɔ heer zarlɛ? Mɔɔ surle bɛɛ mɔɔ yɛ ma bala y. Baa kʋ garɛ m Zerizalɛm ʋ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma, mɔɔ yɛ."
K'a bɩr yɛm kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋr a la bɩ, wɔɔ n yɛ, ʋ ta mim bɩ m laatʋ y, ʋ n n'a hɩrɛ, ʋ ʋ: "Kʋ Zuuba hɔɔnhɔ n ba!"
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nyarɛ ma bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ banka ʋ nya bɩ, wɔɔ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ.
Sezaree karɩndanyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tam k'a yaa wɔɔ da zaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ta wɔɔ m ʋ aa zer Siipɩr gʋaa Mɩnasɔɔn har ʋ. Karɩndanyɩ m, a dɔmɩm laatʋ.
Kʋ wɔɔ lee ku Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ wɔɔ si kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Pol ta kan wɔɔ kɩ Zakkɩ har ʋ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta ŋn'a so kʋ ma ʋ sɔ.
Pol k'a yaa da ŋ nɩ bɩ, a hɔ haay kʋ Woso a ka, an a ba do vantɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ jɩ sa deem-deem, an n'a dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam Pol ma rɔ wɔɔ, y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, ŋn'a hɩm nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Ʋ danyɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ tisi-tisi a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ, bɩ ŋ haay lɛrɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Bɩ, ŋ y'a ma ŋn'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩndam, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ dɩndam zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ do vantɔɔ bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, kʋ ŋ nɩ wɔ saa Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma, kʋ ŋ b'a ya, ŋn'a nyɩnɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ y, kʋ ŋ nɩ yɩnnɩbayɩ bɩ to.
Kʋ a ba lɔ? Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a marɛ, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ bʋr.
Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m bɩ ba. Wɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔyaarɔ m si, ŋnɩ ler bɔ Woso m.

Ŋ gaa, ɩ dintim gʋ ɩ ma kan ŋ kɩ, k'ɩ da ŋ han kan busoo kɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a lerbɔrɛ nyambʋr m, ŋn'a a da ma, ŋn'a mim bɔ. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋaa haay y'a dɔrɛ ŋ ʋ, hɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a ma ɩbɩɩ minto bɩ, ŋʋaar m, b'ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa ɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ɩ nɩ ŋ sim mɩŋŋa.
Kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ cɩnta bɩ ci ba ŋ ma: 'Ŋ bɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩbarɛ sim sʋ y, kan ma kɩ, kan hɔ gər sim kɩ, bɩ ŋ bɩ jaan da y.' "

Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Pol gʋɔɔ wɔɔ gaa, an dintim gʋ a ma sɩŋŋɩda sa hɔdeem kan ŋ kɩ. A n ta Wosocɛ ʋ, k'a dintim gʋ a ma bɩ nyarɛ dɔmɩm cɩnta, k'an yɩ hindeem ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yaa ler bɔ Woso m nɔ wɔɔ ganwʋrɛ karɛ kɩ.
Kʋ dɔmɩm saanhɩna b'a zɔ nyarɛ ma bɩ, Azii zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ka a hɔɔn zi ŋn'a yɩ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, ŋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ, ŋnɩ Pol nyasʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ.

Ŋ n'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Israyɛl zannɔ, k'a bʋr a da wɔɔ han! Ba gʋaa k'a bɩmbɩr lɛɛ haay ʋ, an n'a dɩndam zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ, ŋn'ɩ kaanm a do m kan lɛrɔ kɩ, Wosocɛ naa do kɩ bɩ n na. A bɔɔla m, an gasʋ grɛkkɩrɔ m Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ dintim kam bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa naa do ma ncɩnaaʋ."
Bala, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋnɩ Efɛɛzɩ kʋ gʋaa Trofim yɩ tara nɔ ʋ b'ʋ kan Pol kɩ. Ŋ n'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʋ Pol bɩ, a gaa a ʋ, an gasʋ m Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
Tara bɩ n yar jilli, gʋɔɔ n bra si, ŋnɩ bʋr yuu•••. Ŋ n Pol nyasʋ, ŋnɩ bɔ m Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋnɩ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ tɩnta lɛɛm.
Ŋ n'a kam ma k'a zɛ gər, sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n mim naa do ma, ŋ ʋ: "Zerizalɛm haay a zɛ kʋ ma."
A n sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ bir lɛɛm, an ŋ so kʋ ma kan sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an a ka ŋnɩ la gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ra ŋnɩ bɔ. Kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ yɩ kan a sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ Pol zɛrɛ to.
Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a zɔ, an Pol nyasʋ, an lɛ ka, a ʋ, ŋn'a sur baŋŋa m hɩɩya. A n a lar a ʋ, kʋ nka n'awɔɔ m, bɩ, kʋ bɔ a ba sɔ.
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, gʋaa biyəə nɩ zee darɛ, ŋ bɩr mim zaa deem hɩrɛ y. Kʋ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ bɩr hɔsɩ jɩ mam paan••• bʋgʋr bɩ minto bɩ, a lɛ ka a ʋ, ŋnɩ Pol gaa ŋnɩ ta m sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ ʋ b'ʋ.
Kʋ Pol yaa lee ku derlɛ bɩncɛ bɩ ra bɩ, sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ a busu, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tɔŋ ʋ k'a ku bɩ minto.
Bala, zamaa bɩ haay ɩ zure a jɛ ʋ kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a zɛ gər."
Dɔmɩm kʋ ŋ ʋ, k'a gasʋ m sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ ʋ bɩ, Pol a hɩ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n da ma, m meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ ra?" Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ ɩ grɛkkɩ lemim mam na?

Ɩbɩɩ bɛɛ m Eziptɩ gʋaa niŋŋə k'a gʋɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ zannɔ gaa dɔmɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ cem dɩɩtaa-dɩɩtaa rɔ nɔɔn nɔ ʋ, gʋaa tisi si, ɩ ta ŋ nɩ poohɔɔn ʋ bɩ ra?" Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ gɛɛ? Zɩɩfʋ n mɔɔ m, m to mɔɔ ʋ Silisii kʋ Tarsɩ ʋ. Tara gʋta nyɩ n mɔɔ m.
K'ɩ sugur ba, ɩ zaa ka m ʋ, kʋ m meer ba kan zamaa bɩ kɩ."
A n zaa ka ʋ, Pol n wuti an jɩm brama zerjɩ bɩ ra, an a wɔ busu zamaa bɩ m, ŋnɩ zɛ sɩɩ•••, an meerbaa bɩ sa ebree lemim m, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ:
"M danyɩnɔ, kan m zɩrɔ kɩ, k'a tʋr ka, kʋ m m gumə mim dɩnda awɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ."
Kʋ ŋ Pol ma an ebree lemim sa k'a hɩ bɩ, ŋ bʋgʋr bɩ to haay.

"Zɩɩfʋ n mɔɔ m, yɩ mɔɔ Silisii kʋ Tarsɩ ʋ, bɩ tʋr mɔɔ ʋ naa ʋ, tara naa do nɔ ʋ. Gamalɩyɛl ɩ wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɩnda mɔɔ m zʋr-zʋr. Mɔɔ nyɩnta m Woso zuure nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ, amba awɔɔ haay m her naa m.
Mɔɔ nyɩnta, m fɩr ka gʋɔɔ ma karɩnda naa do zuure ma, m gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛ, m gɔsɩnnɔ sur, m ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, lannɔ kan yaarɔ kɩ.

Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kan do bɩ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a da ma, ŋn'a kasɛtɩ ka. Ciro mɔɔ ŋ si ŋ han wɔɔ danyɩnɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Damas ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto. Bɩ mɔɔ ɩ tam Damas ʋ, kʋ m aa sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ sur, m bʋr ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ fɩr ka ŋ ma.
Mɔɔ m zaa sa, m nɩ tarɛ, m m zɔ Damas ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, sinuu zeezi, lɛɛgure gʋta n a to brama an b'a ku mɔɔ ra.
Mɔɔ n m do tara ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ leer marɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Sol, Sol, bɔ minto ɩ nɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma?'
Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, Zuuba?' Leer bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ nɩ fɩr karɛ m ma.'
Mɔɔ zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ lɛɛgure bɩ yɩ mɩŋŋa, bɩ ŋ bɩr leer k'a nɩ meer bam kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ marɛ y.
Mɔɔ n laaka da: 'Bɔ mɔɔ m ga m, m a ba Zuuba?' Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ mɔɔ nʋ, a ʋ: 'Wuti, ɩ ta Damas ʋ. K'ɩ lee ku b'ʋ, hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ ba bɩ, n y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m deem-deem.'
Bɩ, kʋ lɛɛgure naa do mɔɔ mɩm bɩ ta bɩ, mɔɔ zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ a wɔ dɔ mɔɔ rɛ, mɔɔ n lee ku Damas ʋ.
Gʋaa niŋŋə n nɩ b'ʋ, a tɔ m Ananɩyas. A nyɩnta gʋaa mɩŋŋa, an nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ sim mɩŋŋa, zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ.
A n bʋr, an bɩ mɔɔ yɩ, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'M danyɩ Sol, k'ɩ mɩm n lɛɛ yɩ!' Lɛɛm bɩ, mɔɔ mɩm a gʋ, m a yɩ.
A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'Wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso ɩ bɔ ʋ, k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ dɔ, k'ɩ Gʋaa tɩrga bɩ yɩ, k'ɩ mɩŋŋa lɛ meerbaa ma.
Sɩra m, ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ bɩr kasɛtɩzaa a minto gʋaa haay taa kan hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ, ɩ ma sɔ bɩ kɩ.
Bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ sɩnsɩm karɛ? Aya! Wuti ɩ batɛm si, k'ɩ tɔ bir, ɩ ɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ dintim gʋ ɩ ma.'
Kʋ mɔɔ m wusigə Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, hindeem ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ yaa dam Wosocɛ ʋ,
mɔɔ n Zuuba yɩ hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'A ba zɔɔ, ɩ ɩ hʋr Zerizalɛm ʋ, bala, ŋ bɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a kam bɩ sire y.'
Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Zuuba, ŋ y'a dɔ mɩŋŋa, ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta, m nɩ tam sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, m nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gʋrm, m a ka, ŋn'ɩ ŋ dum lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ ŋ zɛm madɩɩrɔ m.
Ɩbɩɩ kasɛtɩzaa Etɩyɛnnɩ ma k'a bra tara ra bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa nyɩnta b'ʋ sɔ, m m zɛ kʋ ra kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a zɛm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, m dɔ ŋ huuro ma.'
A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: 'Ta, ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋm do vantɔɔ kʋrɔ ʋ.' "
Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a tʋr ka Pol ma, an ta an meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ku bɩ, ŋ wuti, ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʋ: "K'a gʋaa ncɩnaaʋ bɩ bɔ durnya ʋ! A n a ga m, an bɩr mɩsɩr y."
Kʋ ŋ nɩ zee dam bɩ, ŋ y'a huuro bɔ a ra, ŋnɩ taa gʋr, ŋn'a nyɔɔm brama,
sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n lɛ ka, kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋ Pol m, sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ b'ʋ, ŋn'a zɛ, k'a laaka da han a dɔ, kʋ bɔ minto m zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nɩ zee darɛ awɔɔ ma gɛ.
Kʋ ŋ n'a bankam k'a Pol wʋta k'a zɛ bɩ, a a hɩ sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa k'a nɩ zibəə ʋ b'ʋ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Rɔm zannɔ gʋaa kʋ ŋ n'a dʋdɔ ka bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m a zɛ madɩr m na?"
Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa k'a naa ma bɩ, a ta an aa hɩ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ ba naa? Gʋaa bɩ, Rɔm zannɔ gʋaa m!"
Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a bɔ, an bɩ Pol lar, a ʋ: "Rɔm zannɔ gʋaa n'ɩbɩɩ m paan••• ra, k'ɩ hɩ m m?" Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Ɩɩn•••"
Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ busoo bɔ gʋta kʋ m bɔkarɛ, m m ba Rɔm zannɔ gʋaa." Pol n a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ naa, yɩ mɔɔ a nɔ ʋ."
Lɛɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta k'a Pol zɛ rɔ wɔɔ a to. Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a a dɔ a ʋ, Rɔm zannɔ gʋaa m Pol m, awɔɔ n a sur bɩ, dabɔʋ a nyasʋ.

Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a lɛ n taa k'a a dɔ paan••• kʋ bɔ minto m, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nɩ mim kam Pol ra bɩ, a a ka, ŋnɩ baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ ma. A n a ka, ŋnɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bir kan dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ, an ŋ so kʋ ma, an a ka Pol n bʋr ŋ taa.
Pol n dɩga dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ ma sɩɩ•••, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ba kan noom fu kɩ Woso mɩm ʋ, an ta, an her naa ku."
Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Ananɩyas lɛ ka a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a jɩr ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ, ŋn'a zɛ a lɛ ma. Pol n a hɩ m, a ʋ:
"Ɩbɩɩ Woso n n'ɩ zɛm, noonkundəzaa ra! Nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ ʋ naa ʋ, ɩ zu lɛrɔ ʋ, k'ɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ ka, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ kaanm lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, ɩ lɛ ka kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ zɛ ra?"
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n həən si ma, ŋ ʋ: "Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ b'ɩbɩɩ n'a sʋnsɔ wʋm naa ra?" Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ:
"Mɔɔ n a dɔ mɔɔ ʋ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ nɩ y, m danyɩnɔ. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: 'Ɩ b'ɩ do cir sʋnsɔ wʋ y.' "

Pol k'a b'a dɔ, a ʋ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sadisɛɛnrɔ m kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ bɩ, a a leer busu brama dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ bire ʋ, a ʋ: "Farizɛn m mɔɔ m, m danyɩnɔ, farizɛɛnrɔ nyɩ m mɔɔ m. Kʋ mɔɔ si mɔɔ ʋ gəəno y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ bɩ y'a ka ŋn'ɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ kam."
K'a meer naa do ba an a nya bɩ, nyaa wuti farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Zamaa bɩ n a gʋngʋ.
Sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ y, malɛɛka ba ʋ, nyi ba ʋ sɔ y. Farizɛɛnrɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a sim, ŋ ʋ, ŋ ta ʋ.
Bʋgʋr paan••• nyɩnta ʋ. Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wuti farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ ŋnɩ meer ba kan heerbusu kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ n gʋaa naa do kʋrɔ ma yɩ y. Kʋ nyi ɩ meer ba kan kɩ, gɛɛ malɛɛka, wɔɔ n a dɔ y."
Kʋ nyaa bɩ nɩ paŋŋa yɩm bɩ, sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa b'ɩ nyi bam, ŋ y'a Pol kɩnkaansʋ. A lɛ ka kʋ gʋɔɔ n a bɔ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ ta m sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ ʋ b'ʋ.
Gunuu bɩ do ʋ, Zuuba a hɩnka Pol m, a ʋ: "Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ, amba ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ ka Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam Rɔm ʋ maam sɔ."
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a dɩnda ŋn'a zɛ kan kʋ kɩ, ŋn'a wer si k'a bɩ hɔ bɩ, a hɔ mi k'a n Pol zɛ gər y.
Kutim-kutim naa do nɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ lɛ lɛ da busi ra, ŋn'a wer bɩ si.
Ŋ n ta, ŋn'aa wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ yɩ kan jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ʋ wer si, ʋ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n Pol zɛ gər y, wɔɔ bɩ hɔ bɩrɛ y.

Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ kan dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ, k'a kʋ yɩ, k'a hɩ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ m k'an a gaa, an a ka a ʋ, ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ lɛ n taa k'a b'a banka a lar. Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n n'a bam, ʋ a ku, ʋ a zɛ b'a n lee ku bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ bɩ dɔ."
Pol danlʋ nyɩ n minno nɔɔn duro ma. A n ta sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ ʋ, an aa gasʋ, an a hɩ Pol m.
Pol n sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa deem bir, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Nyukumbueere naa gaa, ɩ ta m sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ zi, a lɛ n taa k'a meer ba kan kɩ."

Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ n a gaa, an ta m sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ zi, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Lɔ Pol b'ɩ mɔɔ bir, an a yɛ mɔɔ han, kʋ m nyukumbueere naa do gaa, m bʋr m ɩbɩɩ zi. A lɛ n taa k'a meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ."
Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a gaa a wɔ ma, an bɔ m toore ma, an a lar, a ʋ: "Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ k'ɩ hɩ mɔɔ nɩ?" Nyukumbueere bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʋ:
"Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a dɩnda ŋn'a zɛ kan kʋ kɩ, k'a yɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ Pol gaa ɩ bʋrm booti m dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ taa, ɩ ʋ, ŋ lɛ n taa k'a banka a lar a mim bɩ jɩ ma mɩŋŋa k'a a dɔ.
Ɩ bɩ ŋ meerbaa bɩ si y. Ŋ lɛ dam gʋaa busi ra, ŋnɩ kunku ma. Ŋ y'a wer si k'a bɩ hɔsɩ bɩ, a bɩ hi mi k'awɔɔ n Pol zɛ gər y. Ŋ y'a banka, ŋnɩ nya, ŋn'ɩ dɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zaakarɛ ma."
Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n nyukumbueere bɩ da zaa ra, an a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ hɔ naa do hɩ mɔɔ nɩ y."
Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzannɔ bir hɩɩya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a a banka, k'a ta Sezaree ʋ yirbəə wakatɩ nɛɛhʋ ma, sʋrdaarɔ zɔɔhɩra, siirozannɔ busaanhɩna, kannɩzannɔ zɔɔhɩra.
K'a siiro banka, kʋ Pol n da ŋ ʋ an lee ku kan laafɩɩ kɩ tara lɛɛzaa Feligsi zi."
A n ci ba, an a hɩ ncɩnaaʋ:
"Mɔɔ Klodiyus Liziyas nɩ yaa dam tara lɛɛzaa mɩŋŋa Feligsi m.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ ɩ gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi naa nyasʋ ŋn'a ŋʋam k'a zɛ. Kʋ mɔɔ b'a ma ŋ ʋ Rɔm gʋaa m bɩ, mɔɔ ta kan m sʋrdaarɔ kɩ, m aa yɔ.
Kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m mim kʋ ŋ y'a ka ra bɩ dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ ka ŋnɩ ta m ŋ dʋdɔkənno taa.
Mɔɔ bɩ dɩga a, bɩsɩ ŋ n'a kam, a lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ mim ka ra. B'a n hɔsɩ ba, an a ga zɛ m, gɛɛ ŋn'a sur baŋŋarɔ nɩ y.
Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ma ŋ ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ ɩ dundom zi k'a zɛ bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi zɔɔ-zɔɔ. Mɔɔ hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mim ka ra rɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋr ɩbɩɩ zi, ŋnɩ b'a gumə lemim hɩ."
Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n lɛ kʋ n y'a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ si, ŋnɩ Pol gaa, ŋnɩ ta m gunuu ʋ Antipatris ʋ.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, kannɩzannɔ wɔɔ m Pol to siirozannɔ wɔɔ m, ŋn'a wusigə, ŋnɩ bʋr sʋrdaarɔ wʋtajɩ ʋ b'ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ yaa lee ku Sezaree ʋ bɩ, siirozannɔ wɔɔ ci bɩ ka tara lɛɛzaa b'ʋ, ŋnɩ Pol hɩnka m sɔ.
Tara lɛɛzaa bɩ n ci bɩ karɩnda ba, an laaka da kʋ Pol bɩ, a to a ʋ gʋrga kara ʋ gɛ. K'a a dɔ a ʋ, a to a ʋ Silisii ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʋ:
"Gʋɔɔ k'ʋ ŋ mim ka ɩbɩɩ ra bɩ, kʋ ŋ bʋr, mɔɔ yɩ m tʋr karɛ ɩbɩɩ meerbaa ma." A n lɛ ka, a ʋ, ŋnɩ dɔ ma naa ʋ, hargʋta kʋ Hɩrɔɔdɩ a dɔ b'ʋ.
Dɔmɩm soor jɛ ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Ananɩyas kan jɩtannɔ kɩ, meerbaa dɔrɛzaa deem Tɛrtulus kɩ bʋr. Ŋ n ta Pol mim bɩ m tara lɛɛzaa Feligsi taa.
Bɩ m Pol bir, Tɛrtulus n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ mim karɛ a lɛ m, a ʋ: "Feligsi mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ minto y'a ka wɔɔ n laafɩɩ yɩ gʋta, lʋnlʋrlɛrɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ba wɔɔ bire ʋ wɔɔ do naa minto, bɩ tɔ ma.
Dɔmɩm haay, lɛɛ haay ʋ, Feligsi mɩŋŋa, wɔɔ ɩ barka darɛ ɩbɩɩ m zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ nɔɔn duro minto.

Kʋ mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m ɩbɩɩ kɔ gʋta bɩ, meerbaa bɩ bɩ gʋta y. Meerbaa nyɩntam poore, bɩ mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, kʋ bamɩŋŋazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ tʋr kam ma kan bʋraama k'ɩbɩɩ n tam wɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ kɩ.
Wɔɔ yɩ gʋaa naa do, minzaa m. A nyaa zɛ an n'a dam durnya naa zɩɩfʋrɔ haay bire ʋ. Nazarɛtɩ gʋngʋrɛzannɔ wɔɔ karɩnda jɩtaarɛ deem m.
A a ŋʋa k'a wɔɔ Wosocɛ bɩ zar, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ n a nyasʋ. [
Wɔɔ ʋ kʋ a dʋdɔ ka, ʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ. Sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa Liziyas n a ma, an b'a bɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ, an lɛ ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mim ka ra rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋr ɩbɩɩ zi.]
Ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ lar ɩ zim: Ɩbɩɩ hɔ niŋŋə k'a ka wɔɔ nɩ mim kam la bɩ jɩ dɔm."
Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n yo meerbaa naa do ra, ŋ ʋ, sɩra m.
Tara lɛɛzaa b'a wɔ busu, an zaa ka Pol ʋ, k'an meer ba. Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ so gʋrga naa do dʋdɔ karɛ ʋ a dɔɔraa laatʋ, mɔɔ heer nyɩnta sɔ, kʋ m m meer ba.
K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ laaka da. Ta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, a dɔmɩm n lɛ da bueerehɩɩya ra y, mɔɔ ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ m aa yaa da.
Gɔsɩ n mɔɔ yɩ m nɩ bɩsɩ kam Wosocɛ ʋ kan gʋaa kɩ, gɛɛ, m nyaa zɛ m a da sokʋmacɛ ʋ, gɛɛ, lɛɛ vanta ʋ tara nɔ ʋ y.
Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ hɔsɩ yɩ ŋn'a ka mɔɔ ra, ŋ ʋ sɩra nɩ y.

Ba hɔ kʋ mɔɔ dɔ bɩ n na: Wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso zi mɔɔ n'a bam, m nɩ zum Zuuba Yeezuu zaa kʋ ŋ ʋ gʋngʋrɛzaa m b'ʋ. Kʋ zaa bɩ do nɩ, mɔɔ ɩ hɔ haay kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba lɛrɔ ci nɔ ʋ bɩ sim kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ciro kɩ.
Mɔɔ ta Woso taafeerle naa do m, mɔɔ ʋ: Gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ. Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ maam sɔ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ m tɔŋ ʋ dɔmɩm haay kʋ m bɩ mim zu ʋ Woso ma kan gʋɔɔ kɩ y. Bɩ, naa minto bɩ, dabɔʋ ba mɔɔ ma y.
Mɔɔ bɔrɛ dɔɔraa laatʋ, m m bɔ, m bʋr kɛɛrɛ, kʋ m bɩ daahan ka m dogʋɔɔ cicirzannɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɩ mannɩ ba sɔ.
Bɩ, ŋ bɩ mɔɔ yɩ Wosocɛ ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, mɔɔ dintim gʋ m ma. Gʋaa cir n nyɩnta ʋ y, bɩ bʋgʋr n nyɩnta ʋ sɔ y,
kʋ Azii zɩɩfʋrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bɛɛ nyɩnta b'ʋ y. Brɔɔ y'a ga m, ŋn'a hɩnka ɩbɩɩ taa, ŋnɩ mim yɩ ŋn'a ka mɔɔ ra, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ba bɩ minto.
Gɛɛ k'a bɛɛ m bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a da ma, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ba, ŋnɩ ta mɔɔ m dʋdɔkənno wɔɔ taa bɩ hɩ.
Hɔ deem naa mɔɔ jɩm brama, m zee da, m a hɩ ŋ bire ʋ: Gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ minto y'a ka, ŋn'ɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ karɛ awɔɔ taa her."
Bala, Feligsi Zuuba Yeezuu zaa bɩ mim dɔ. N gʋɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Kʋ sʋrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa Liziyas bɩ bʋr naa ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim bɩ dʋdɔ karɛ."
A n lɛ ka sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa b'ʋ, a ʋ, an dɔ Pol ma, b'a b'a du y. A b'a ta a gʋaasɩba sɩ m tolle, a nyasʋm minto y.
Dɔmɩm k'a cem poore bɩ, Feligsi nyɩnta kan Drusil a lʋ kʋ zɩɩfʋ m bɩ kɩ. A n a ka, ŋnɩ Pol bir k'an Krista sɩrakarɛ mim dɩnda a m.

Bɩ, Pol k'a nɩ meer bɩ bam an nɩ tam tɩrgabaa, bʋraama, dʋdɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ kɩ bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, Feligsi da bɔ ʋ, an Pol meerbaa bɩ zɛ ra, a ʋ: "Naa ma bɩ, ɩ wusigə, ɩ ta ɩ bɩncɛ ʋ. Mɔɔ zɛm b'ɩ bir dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʋ."
Feligsi nyɩnta an n'a hɔɔn darɛ, a ʋ, Pol busoo karɛ a ʋ. Bɩ y'a ka an tɩr nyɔɔ da, ŋn'aa bir hallɩ gallɛm gʋta k'a bɩ sʋʋra ba.
Dɔɔraa hɩɩya k'a cem bɩ, Pɔrsiyus Fɛstus ɩ Feligsi bɩncɛ sa. Feligsi k'a lɛ n taa k'a bɩr mɩŋŋa zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ mɩm ʋ bɩ, a Pol to lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
Bala, Fɛstus k'a lee ku a gʋrga ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a dɔmɩm kaakʋ kur bɩ, a a hʋr Sezaree ʋ, an ta Zerizalɛm ʋ.
B'ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ bʋr k'a mim ka Pol ra a taa. Ŋ n a yɛ Fɛstus han, k'an sugur ba a m,
an zaa ka, kʋ n nɩ ta Pol m Zerizalɛm ʋ. Bala, ŋ y'a dɩnda, ŋn'a zɛ kan kʋ kɩ a minto, k'a bɩ daata zɛ ra, a ku a zɛ gər zaa ra.
Fɛstus n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ, Pol gɔɔtam Sezaree lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Bɩ, kan bɩ kɩ haay, k'a yɩ poore, a y'a bɔrɛ a ta b'ʋ.
"A a ya, an a hɩ a ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mim bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa, awɔɔ bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋnɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ, k'ʋ ta Sezaree ʋ, kʋ hɔ niŋŋə ta an ta ʋ gʋaa naa do minto, kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋr ŋnɩ mim ka ra."
Fɛstus n maasɩrɛ ba ŋ bire ʋ y, a n lɛ da dɔmɩm sinnyə m gɛɛ bu nɩ y. K'a lee ku Sezaree ʋ bɩ, a dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a yaa nyɩnta a dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, an a ka n n bʋr Pol m.
Bɩ k'a lee ku b'ʋ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to Zerizalɛm ʋ ŋnɩ bʋr lɔ wɔɔ bɩr ma, ŋnɩ ŋʋaar gʋta ba, ŋ n'a kam la kan minno gʋtɔɔ kɩ, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋn'a kasɛtɩ ka y.
Pol n a gumə mim hɩ sɔ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ n mim zu ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ lɛrɔ ma, gɛɛ ŋ Wosocɛ, gɛɛ Rɔm cir ma y."
Kʋ Fɛstus lɛ n taa k'a bɩr mɩŋŋa kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ Pol m, "Ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ɩbɩɩ m Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ m aa ɩ dʋdɔ ka gɛɛ?"
Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Rɔm cir dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ mɔɔ n ta ʋ naa, naa ʋ ŋn'ɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ kaŋ ʋ. Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa a dɔ paan•••, ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ n mim zu ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ ma y.

Kʋ mim mɔɔ zu ʋ paan•••, an a ga mɔɔ zɛ m, mɔɔ bɩ m bɔrɛ m kur y. Bɩ, kʋ minno kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro a ba, n n'a kam mɔɔ ra b'a jɩ ba ʋ rɔ nɔɔn nɩ, gʋaa ba lɛ m, an n'a dam ma, a n mɔɔ ka ŋ ʋ y. Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m ta Rɔm cir taa."
Fɛstus kʋ ma kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ an a hɩ Pol m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ yɛ k'ɩ ta Rɔm cir taa, ta ɩbɩɩ n nɩ zɛm b'a ʋ b'ʋ."
Dɔmɩm k'a cem poore bɩ, cir Agripaa kan a danlʋ Berenisi kɩ ta Sezaree ʋ, ŋnɩ ta k'a yaa yaa da Fɛstus m.
Kʋ ŋn'ɩ maasɩrɛ bam b'ʋ poore bɩ, Fɛstus Pol mim bɩ sa, an a dɩnda cir bɩ m, a ʋ: "Gʋaa n nɩ naa ʋ, Feligsi n a to lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
Dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ ta ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ kɩ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ mim ka ra, ŋn'a zɛrɛ yɛrɛ.
Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʋ, mɔɔ ʋ, Rɔm zannɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəə bɛɛ k'a gʋaa bɔ a ka kʋ ŋ n'a zɛ gər, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mim kam la rɔ wɔɔ ba ʋ, k'an aa a gumə mim dɩnda kan mim kʋ ŋ y'a ka ra bɩ kɩ y.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋnɩ bʋr naa ʋ, mɔɔ n m ya, m dɔ hɔsɩ ma y, a dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, mɔɔ n nyɩnta, m dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, m a ka, ŋnɩ bʋr gʋaa bɩ m.
Kʋ ŋ bʋr dʋdɔ bɩ ma bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mim kam la rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n mim sɩ gurezaa yɩ, ŋn'a ka ra, amba mɔɔ m hɔɔn da ma bɩ nɩ y.
Ŋ Woso zaa zuure minnɔ m bala, kan gʋaa deem kʋ n n'a birm Yeezuu k'a ga Pol n'a hɩm a ʋ, a mɩsɩr bɩ kɩ.
Kʋ mɔɔ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a bam bɩ dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ yɛ han, k'a lɛ taa k'a ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ m aa mim bɩ dʋdɔ ka b'ʋ.
Bɩ kʋ Pol a hɩ a ʋ, a lɛ n taa k'a gɔɔta lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, an ta an dɔmɩm kʋ cir gʋta n n'a mim bɩ dʋdɔ kam ma bɩ ku bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ ka, kʋ ŋ nɩ dɔ ma, an ta, an dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔŋ ʋ Rɔm cir zi bɩ ku."
Agripaa n a hɩ Fɛstus m, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ n gʋaa naa do meerbaa ma sɔ." Fɛstus n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "Booti m bala, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ tʋr karɛ a meerbaa ma."
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Agripaa kan Berenisi kɩ lee ku dʋdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ kan cirbəə gʋta kɩ, sʋrdaarɔ jɩtannɔ yɩ ŋ da zaa ʋ kan tara bɩ gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ. Fɛstus n lɛ ka, ŋnɩ bʋr Pol m.

Fɛstus n meerbaa sa, a ʋ: "Cir Agripaa kan awɔɔ haay woo•••, k'a nɩ naa ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ gʋaa naa do yɩrɛ. Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ haay bɩ mɔɔ yɩ a minto Zerizalɛm ʋ, an ta an lee ku naa ʋ kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʋ, ŋ b'a ya, ŋn'a to mɩsɩr y.
Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ n zibəə bʋnyaa yɩ, an a ba, an a ga a zɛ nɩ y. Bɩ, k'a ʋ, k'a lee ku Rɔm cir zi bɩ, mɔɔ cɩnta, kʋ m a nyɔɔ b'ʋ.

Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ ba meerbaa m paan•••, kʋ m a gʋrsɩra ba cir gʋta ma k'an Pol mim bɩ dɔ bɩ, bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ n a ka, an bʋr awɔɔ taa, an lɛ da ɩbɩɩ taa naa ʋ cir Agripaa, kʋ wɔɔ lar, naa jɛ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔsɩ yɩrɛ, m a gʋrsɩra ba Rɔm cir ma.
Kʋ mɔɔ lɔ nyɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ, bɩ mɔɔ n a kʋrɔma k'an a mim ʋ bɩ yɩ, yarmabaa zibəə m."
Agripaa n a hɩ Pol m, a ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ k'ɩ meer ba kɛɛrɛ, ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔ." Pol n a wɔ busu, an a gumə lemim hɩ, a ʋ:
"Mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ, cir Agripaa, kʋ mɔɔ zaa yɩ kʋ m meer ba ɩbɩɩ taa her, kʋ m m gumə mim dɩnda, mim haay kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ mɔɔ a ka wɔɔ ra bɩ minto.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ minkə ŋ bɩsɩkarɛ gʋta m kan ŋ yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəə kɩ. Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ tʋr ka mɔɔ meerbaa ma kan bʋraama kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyɩnta hɔ niŋŋə, m nyɩbaa ma, kan nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ hɔ niŋŋə, m dogʋɔɔ bire ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ kɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ haay a dɔ.
Kʋ ŋ lɛ taa, ŋ y'a da ma, ŋn'a kasɛtɩ ka, ŋ y'a dɔ a dɔɔraa laatʋ, ŋ ʋ, farizɛn m mɔɔ m. Gʋɔɔ niŋŋoo kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm wɔɔ Woso zaa zuure ma paan•••, an lɛ da ŋ haay ra rɔ wɔɔ.
Bɩ her naa, kʋ mɔɔ Woso lerbɔrɛ k'a ba wɔɔ zɩrɔ m bɩ si bɩ, bɩ y'a ba mɔɔ dʋdɔ her.

Wɔɔ do haryaa bueerehɩɩya b'ɩ yaa dam Woso m sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, ŋ bɩr a tore y. Kʋ ŋn'ɩ dɔm lerbɔrɛ bɩ do ma bɩ minto. Kʋ mɔɔ lerbɔrɛ naa do ta m heer lɛ bɩ y'a ka, m cir Agripaa, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ nɩ mim kam mɔɔ ra.
Bɔ minto m, b'awɔɔ n a si a ʋ, Woso ɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʋ?
Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta m a si mɩŋŋa mɔɔ ʋ lɛ m, kʋ m yar ba kan Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ tɔ bɩ kɩ, paŋŋa do haay m.
Bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ ba Zerizalɛm ʋ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ɩ lɛ naa do ka mɔɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa sɩrakarɛzannɔ gʋr gʋta, m m du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ ʋ, a a ga m.
Gallɛm gʋta, mɔɔ ta sokʋmacɛrɔ ʋ, m fɩr ka ŋ ma, m paŋŋa ba ŋ ma, kʋ ŋ nɩ Yeezuu sʋnsɔ wʋ. Bɩ, kan jɩmbaa heerbusu gʋta kɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ jɩ bɔm tararɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ra, m nɩ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, hindeem ʋ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n zaa ka mɔɔ ʋ kan paŋŋa haay kɩ, kʋ m ta Damas ʋ mim naa do minto.
Cir, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ tam bɩ, kʋ sinuu b'a zɔ bɩ, mɔɔ lɛɛgure yɩ, an a to brama, a gure n lɛ da wosogure ra, an b'a ku mɔɔ ra kan m zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Wɔɔ haay, wɔɔ ʋ dundo tara ʋ, mɔɔ n leer ma, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m ebree lemim m, a ʋ: Sol, Sol, bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma? A ba ɩbɩɩ nawʋrɛ, ɩ mɩŋŋa m!
Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ʋ: 'Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, Zuuba?' Zuuba n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Yeezuu m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ n nɩ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma.

Bɩ, wuti ɩ jɩm! Ba hɔ k'a ka mɔɔ n m hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m bɩ n na: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʋ k'ɩ nyɩnta mɔɔ zibəənyɩ, mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa kan hɔ niŋŋə k'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ yɩ ʋ naa kɩ, kan a vantɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ m hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ lɛɛ kam m ɩbɩɩ bʋmbɔ ɩ do kan do vantɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ wɔ ʋ,

k'ɩ yaa nɩ ŋ mɩm gʋ, k'ɩ ŋ bɔ monsigə nɔ ʋ, ɩ ta ŋ nɩ lɛɛgure ʋ, k'ɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ Sʋtaana lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ, ɩ ta ŋ nɩ Woso zi, kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, bɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔjirle yɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.'
Bɩ tɛkka ma, cir Agripaa, mɔɔ n bɩsɩ ka hɔ kʋ Zuuba a hɩ mɔɔ m hɔhɩnkarɛ naa do nɔ ʋ bɩ ma y.

A sa mɔɔ ʋ Damas zannɔ ma kan Zerizalɛm zannɔ kɩ, an lɛ da, Zidee jilli kʋ zannɔ kɩ, bɩ jɛ ʋ kan do vantɔɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ kɩ, m a dɩnda kʋ ŋ n'a bɔ a taam, ŋnɩ yɛ Woso ma, kʋ ŋ n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba, k'an zu kʋ ʋ kan ŋ heerlʋrlɛ bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ Wosocɛ ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n bɩ mɔɔ nyasʋ, ŋn'a gɩnga k'a mɔɔ mee bɔ ʋ.

Woso n ku mɔɔ ra mɩŋŋa, an ta an dɔmɩm naa do ku. Mɔɔ gɔɔta m nɩ kasɛtɩ kam gʋɔɔ poorero kan gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ taa. Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kan Moyiisi kɩ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ hɩ. Mɔɔ bɩr hɔsɩ vanta hɩrɛ, an lɛ da bɩ ra y.
Ŋ ʋ: 'Krista fɩr yɩrɛ, b'a lɛɛ kam an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, an nɩ lɛɛgure pa dam zɩɩfʋrɔ m kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kɩ.' "
Pol k'a lee ku bɩncɛ naa do ʋ a meerbaa nɔ ʋ bɩ, Fɛstus a leer busu, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔɔzaa n'ɩbɩɩ naa Pol! Ɩbɩɩ hɔdɔrɛ maam-maam bɩ y'ɩbɩɩ bam hɔɔzaa!"
Pol n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Hɔɔzaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y, Fɛstus mɩŋŋa, sɩra meerbaa mɔɔ n'a bam, hɔɔntaʋrɛ m.

Cir Agripaa bɩ minno nɔɔn duro dɔ mɩŋŋa haay, bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ m dam ma, m meer ba a lɛɛ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ. Mɔɔ si mɔɔ ʋ, hɔsɩ n ba a mɩm ma sɛɛrɛ y. Bala, minno nɔɔn duro n ba gʋrga k'a nyaakʋm da ʋ y.
Cir Agripaa, ɩbɩɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ mim si ra? Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ŋ mim si"
Agripaa n a hɩ Pol m, a ʋ: "Kan ɩbɩɩ meerbaa bɩ kɩ, gɔɔta a ʋ poore, k'ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ ba kristagʋaa ra?"

Pol n a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a a ŋʋa, an gɔɔta poore gɛɛ gʋta, mɔɔ ŋʋa, kʋ Woso yɛ, a bɩ nyɩntarɛ ɩbɩɩ bala y, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam mɔɔ meerbaa ma her lɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a bam amba mɔɔ m, bɩ baŋŋarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ wɔ ma rɔ nɔɔn duro bɩ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ wɔ ma y."
Cir bɩ n wuti kan tara lɛɛzaa bɩ kɩ, Berenisi kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɩntam kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Kʋ ŋn'a hʋrm bɩ, ŋ sʋʋra ba kan kʋ kɩ ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do n hɔsɩ ba, an a ga zɛ m gɛɛ baŋŋarɔ nɩ y."
Agripaa n a hɩ Fɛstus m, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa naa do bɛɛ y'a ŋʋa k'a ta mim bɩ m Rɔm cir taa, a a ga m, ŋnɩ wɔ saa."
Kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta kʋ wɔɔ n da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ, ʋ ta Italii ʋ bɩ, ŋ Pol kan lɔnnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ da sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa k'a tɔ m Zuliyus bɩ wɔ ʋ, sʋrdaarɔ zɔrsɔddɩ zɛkʋra kʋ n n'a birm Ogista zɛkʋra, bɩ y'a so ʋ.
Wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋ ʋ k'a a to Adramitɩyɔm an nɩ tam Azii kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hi lɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Aristarkɩ ɩ nyɩnta kan wɔɔ kɩ. Masedʋan kʋ Tesaloniki gʋaa m.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ lee ku Sidɔn ʋ, bɩ kʋ jɩnlɛ poore m bɩ, Zuliyus a ba Pol m mɩŋŋa. A zaa ka ʋ, k'an aa dɩga a gʋaasɩbarɔ ma, brɔɔ n nyasʋ m.
Kʋ wɔɔ bɔ b'ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ, ʋ bɔ Siipɩr jɩr ʋ, k'a n'a ta wɔɔ m hɩnhɛr bɩ k'a nya wɔɔ rɛ bɩ minto.
A m bɩ, wɔɔ n higʋta k'a nɩ Silisii kan Panfilii kɩ jɩr ʋ bɩ zɛ ra, ʋ aa lee ku Lisii kʋ Miir ʋ.
Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a Alɛsandrii kɔɔlʋʋ yɩ b'ʋ an nɩ tam Italii ʋ bɩ, a a ka wɔɔ n da ʋ.

Kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ n ta poore-poore dɔmɩm gʋta nɔ ʋ, ʋ aa lee ku kan kɔrɛ kɩ Kinɩdɩ ʋ. Hɩnhɛr bɩ k'a nya wɔɔ rɛ bɩ, wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ ta tɩrga bɩ, wɔɔ bɔ Salmonɛ jɩr ʋ, ʋ aa bɔ Krɛtɩ jɩr ʋ, k'a n'a ta wɔɔ m hɩnhɛr bɩ minto.
Wɔɔ fɩr yɩ kan kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ kɩ, ʋ bɔkarɛ ʋ aa lee ku bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm Jɩnjɩ-Mɩŋŋa b'ʋ, Lazaya kʋ jɩr ʋ.
Dɔmɩnnɔ cem gʋta, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ tarɛ nyibəə n ta ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, lɛkʋsɩrɛ dɔmɩm cem. Pol n ŋ dʋndɔ, a ʋ:
"M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ tarɛ naa do hɔ zarm gʋta, a nyaanɩm gʋɔɔ gʋta m, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bɛɛ bala kan mɔr bɩ kɩ y, wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ sɔ."
Sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ, a tʋr an n'a kam gʋaa k'a nɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bram bɩ ma kan kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zaa hɔnyɩ kɩ ma, an lɛ da Pol meerbaa bɩ ra.

Bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʋ wɔɔ jɩm ʋ bɩ, k'a bɩ bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, ŋ gʋɔɔ gʋta a zɛ kʋ ra, ŋn'a lɛ ba deem k'a zu zaa ʋ, kʋ dɩga a, k'ʋ lee kum jɩnjɩ k'a nɩ Krɛtɩ kʋ Fenigsi ʋ b'ʋ, k'an a ta wɔɔ m nyɛɛm hɩnhɛr minto. K'ʋ nyɩnta b'ʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʋ.
Hɩnhɛr poore wuti jɩsa, bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋn'a hɔɔn da, ŋ ʋ, a y'a dam ma, a zaa sa. Ŋ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ hʋr, ŋn'a na Krɛtɩ gəm b'ʋ, ŋn'ɩ tam.
K'a yɩ poore bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʋta kʋ n n'a birm Erakilɔn bɩ wuti tara bɩ zeezi, an bʋr kan paŋŋa kɩ, an b'a ku ŋ la.
A n kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ gaa an cenim, wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ a bɔ y. Wɔɔ n a to an a gaa, an nɩ tam nɩ, kʋ lɛɛ ka m, ʋ n a dɔ y.

K'a nɩ tam zɔɔ-zɔɔ bɩ, wɔɔ yaa lee ku tara poore k'a nɩ hi bire ʋ, n n'a birm Koda bɩ jɩr ʋ, an a ta wɔɔ m hɩnhɛr bɩ minto. Wɔɔ ʋ tɔ ʋ kan kɔrɛ gʋta kɩ, ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ kɔɔlʋʋ poore bɩ gaa, ʋ a bɔ hi b'ʋ, ʋ a da kɔɔlʋʋ gʋta b'ʋ.

Kʋ ŋ kɔɔlʋʋ poore bɩ gaa ŋn'a da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ an nya bɩ, ŋ bar sunso kɔɔlʋʋ gʋta b'ʋ kɛɛrɛ. Kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi bam kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ yaa wɔ Sɩrtɩ nyɩntaa b'ʋ bɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋsɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ jɛ ma, ŋn'a da hi b'ʋ, k'a n'a tarɛ bɩ bɔrɛ, ŋn'a to an nɩ tarɛ a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʋta bɩ k'a nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma tee••• bɩ, ŋ mɔrlɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ da kɔɔlʋʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ waa ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ zar higʋta b'ʋ.
A dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ bɩ, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ zar hi b'ʋ a zim.
Woso kan monyaarɔ kɩ n a hɩnka dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y, bɩ hɩnhɛr bɩ hɔnrɛ bʋnyaabaa gɔɔta an nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma. Wɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ wɔɔ bɔrɛ y.

A dɔmɩm laatʋ, ŋ n hɔbɩrɛ bɩ y. Pol n wuti an jɩm brama ŋ bire ʋ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ yɩ ra, gʋɔɔ, kʋ mɔɔ dʋndɔrɛ b'awɔɔ si, ʋ n ʋ hʋr Krɛtɩ ʋ, fɩr kʋ wɔɔ yɩ naa kan mɔr k'a zar naa kɩ bɩ wɔɔ yɩrɛ y.
Bɩ naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han, k'a heer ba kookoo. Awɔɔ gʋaa deem taan••• bɩ garɛ y, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ y'a deem n n'a zarm bala.
Woso k'a a so mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ n'a zi bam bɩ malɛɛka a hɩnka mɔɔ m gum naa ʋ bala, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ:
Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, Pol. A a ga m, ɩbɩɩ m ta Rɔm cir taa, bɩ Woso gʋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ meeyaa da ɩbɩɩ wɔ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, yaarɔ, k'a heer ba kookoo! Mɔɔ sɩra ka Woso ʋ, a bam amba a a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m.
Wɔɔ yaa nʋ lo tara niŋŋə k'a nɩ hi bire ʋ bɩ ra."
A gunuu bueeresi hɔ, wɔɔ nyaam ʋ higʋta bɩ burə ʋ. Dibsir k'a a zɔ bɩ, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a dɔ a hɔɔn ʋ, ŋ ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ zɔ tara ma.
Ŋ n higʋta bɩ nɔ makra ba mɛtɩr busi, kʋ ŋ ta lɛɛ poore bɩ, ŋ y'a ya, ŋn'a makra ba ŋn'a yɩ mɛtɩr bukərku.
Kʋ ŋn'ɩ nyi bam kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ yaa a zɛ ci ma bɩ, ŋ pɔyaa gorezannɔ zo si, ŋn'a kʋsɩ baŋŋarɔ m jɛ ʋ, ŋn'a yɛm kʋ dɔ n mɛ zɔɔ.
Kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zibəəzannɔ hɔ ba ɩ ʋ, a hɩ ŋ y'a ʋ k'a baŋŋarɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zo hi bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'an kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nyasʋ, ŋn'a nyaakʋm da k'a bra si kan kɔɔlʋʋ poore bɩ kɩ.
Pol n a hɩ, sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ m kan sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n gɔɔta kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ, awɔɔ bɩ bɔrɛ y."
Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n kɔɔlʋʋ poore bɩ barlɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ ra, ŋn'a to an ta an cem.
Kʋ ŋn'ɩ dɔm dɔmɩrɛ ma bɩ, Pol gʋaa haay bir, an a yɛ ŋ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ dɔmɩm bueeresi her, awɔɔ n hɔ bɩ y. A n nɩ dɔm ma kʋ hɩnhɛr bɩ n a da jɩm ʋ.
Bɩ minto bɩ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han k'a hɔ bɩ, awɔɔ laafɩɩ minto m. Bala, minkə deem taan••• bɩ nyaanɩm gʋaa mim ʋ naa ʋ y."
K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a bur sa, an barka da Woso m gʋaa haay mɩm m, an a zɛ ra, an n'a sʋrɛ.
Ŋ haay heer n ka bɩ jɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ.
Wɔɔ haay wuti, gʋaa zɔɔhɩra busaanhɩna yaa sɔrdɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ŋ ka bɩ, ŋ hɔyaa bɩ waa kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a zar hi b'ʋ, k'a gore bɩ n a bɔrɛ.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a ya, ŋnɩ tara bɩ dɔ y. Bɩncɛ ŋ y'a yɩ hi bɩ lɛ ra, an zerle bɩncɛ. Ŋ lɛ n taa k'a a da ma, k'a kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ da jɩm ʋ b'ʋ.

Ŋ n baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, ŋnɩ pɔyaarɔ wɔɔ to hi b'ʋ, kʋ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ n a da ma, an ta. Ŋ n kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bɩrlɛ hɔ bɩ ba yɔhɔ-yɔhɔ, ŋnɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ pɛɛra poore bɩ busu, ŋnɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ to, an nɩ tam bɩncɛ gər zeezi.
Kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ n aa der nyɩntaa dimbir la, lɛɛ bɩ n wɔ, a b'a dam ma a n bɔ y. Bɩ ma bɩ, hikurero wɔɔ b'a jɛ bɩ zɛ, an a kɩnkaansʋ.
Sʋrdaarɔ wɔɔ n a ŋʋa k'a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, kʋ ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ darɛ dɔ ŋ yaa a si hi bɩ burə ʋ.
Bɩ, sʋrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a ŋʋa k'a Pol bʋmbɔ bɩ, a n yɛ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ y. A lɛ ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ darɛ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka, ŋn'a da hi b'ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'aa tara gər bɩ ku.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ dam gɔrɔ ʋ gɛɛ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ kəəro wɔɔ ʋ. A yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, ŋ haay n lee ku tara ʋ kan laafɩɩ kɩ.
Kʋ wɔɔ bɔ mim pakra bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ma ŋ ʋ, tara k'a nɩ hi bire ʋ bɩ tɔ m Maltɩ.
Tara bɩ zannɔ wɔɔ wɔɔ si kan daʋrɛ gʋta kɩ. Ŋ sɛ gʋta hɛ, ŋnɩ wɔɔ gaa, ŋnɩ wɔɔ zɔ ma, bala, la a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ barɛ, nyɛɛm n ta ʋ.
Pol n nyʋkɔ gər gʋr a zangʋrga ʋ, an b'a da sɛ bɩ rɛ. Kʋ sɛ bɩ nɩ nyʋkɔ bɩ bɩm bɩ, cɩrka bɔ sɛ b'ʋ, an a sɔ wɔ Pol wɔ ʋ.
Tara bɩ zannɔ kʋ ŋ cɩrka bɩ yɩ, an nɩ zeŋŋəm Pol wɔ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩm kʋ m, ŋ ʋ: "Gʋaa naa do nyɩntam gərzer paan••• A bɔ hi bɩ nɔ ʋ kan laafɩɩ kɩ, bɩ Woso tɩrgabaazaa lɛ baa a mɩsɩrbaa ma y."
Pol n a wɔ vɩga zɛ, cɩrka bɩ n a da sɛ b'ʋ, b'a n busu ma y.
Ŋ n jɩm, ŋn'ɩ dɩgarɛ a wɔ bɩ ma, a hanrɛ gɛɛ, a y'a dore, an ga lɛɛ nɩ? Bɩ, kʋ ŋ dɩgarɛ bɩ maasɩrɛ ba, bɩ ŋ n hɔsɩ yɩ an ba bɩ, ŋ y'a hɔɔndarɛ bɩ lʋr, ŋ ʋ: "Woso m!"
Lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, tararɔ nyɩnta ʋ, lɛɛkarɛ dʋdɔkər Publiyus y'a so ŋ ʋ. A wɔɔ si, an nyasʋ wɔɔ m mɩŋŋa dɔmɩm kaakʋ.
A zɩ nyɩnta an nɩ wʋtam kan mɛmarɛ kɩ, yoor kɩ. Pol n ta, an aa dɩga a, an aa a wɔ busu, an a ka ra, an yaa da, an a waa.
Naa do minto bɩ, tara bɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ yaaba m nɔ wɔɔ ɩ zɛm zi, ŋ n'a waam sɔ.
Wɔɔ daʋrɛ yɩ gʋta, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ bɔ, ʋ n nɩ cenim bɩ, ŋ hɔ haay k'a zibəə n ta wɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ka wɔɔ ʋ.
Mom kaakʋ jɛ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʋʋ k'a gɔɔta tara bɩ do ra b'ʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʋ. Alɛsandrii kɔɔlʋʋ m, a tɔ m Diyoskiir.
Wɔɔ zer Sirakɩɩzɩ ʋ k'ʋ hoon si dɔmɩm kaakʋ.
Kʋ wɔɔ cem b'ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ da higʋta bɩ lezi, ʋ aa lee ku Regiyo ʋ. Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, hɩnhɛr wuti jɩsa, dɔmɩm hɩɩya hinni ʋ, wɔɔ yaa lee ku Puzɔl ʋ.
Wɔɔ ʋ danyɩnɔ yɩ b'ʋ, ŋn'a yɛ wɔɔ han k'ʋ gɔɔta kan a kɩ dɔmɩm saanhɩna. Nyɩnta a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, ʋ bɔkarɛ, ʋ lee ku Rɔm ʋ.
Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ wɔɔ zɛrɛ bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ wɔɔ zɛ ʋ bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm Apiyus-Daasɩ kan Tavɛrnɩ-Kaakʋ kɩ ʋ. Pol k'a ŋ yɩ bɩ, a barka da Woso m, a heer paŋŋa n a da ra.
Kʋ wɔɔ lee ku Rɔm ʋ bɩ, n zaa ka Pol ʋ, k'an a ka a mɩŋŋa har ma, kʋ sʋrdaa deem n bɩr dɔm ma.

Dɔmɩm kaakʋ k'a cem bɩ, a Rɔm zɩɩfʋrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bir, kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋ zɛ ʋ. Kʋ ŋ y'a so kʋ ma bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ ba m dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, mɔɔ n wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəəro zar sɔ y. Ŋ mɔɔ ba lɔ Zerizalɛm ʋ, ŋnɩ mɔɔ da Rɔm zannɔ wɔ ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ laaka dɩnda ŋ nɩ mim bɩ jɩ dɔ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ŋ y'a ŋʋa k'a wɔ saa mɔɔ ma, bala, ŋ n hɔsɩ yɩ mɔɔ gʋr zi an a ga zɛ nɩ y.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, a bɩ yɛm bɩ, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n a yɛ kʋ Rɔm cir n mɔɔ dʋdɔ ka. Mɔɔ bɛɛ y'a hɩ, kʋ m mim ka m do ra y.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n a yɛ kʋ m awɔɔ yɩ, kʋ m sʋʋra ba kan awɔɔ kɩ. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, Israyɛl taaheerlɛ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ baŋŋarɔ nɔɔn duro m."
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ n ci sɩ yɩ, an a to Zidee ʋ, an n'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩndarɛ y, bɩ, wɔɔ danyɩ sɩ n a to an b'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩnda, gɛɛ tɔbɔrɛ bʋnyaa y.
Wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ɩbɩɩ n hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ hɔɔn dam ma bɩ hɩ k'ʋ a ma, bala, lɛɛ haay ʋ, wɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa ŋ bɩr yɛm gʋngʋrɛ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ zuŋ ʋ naa ʋ y."

Ŋ n dɔmɩm cɩnta kan kʋ kɩ, ŋnɩ bʋr gʋta, ŋnɩ b'a yɩ a har ʋ. Pol sʋʋra ba kan ŋ kɩ dɔgta m an ta an yirbəə ku. Woso cirbəə bɩ mim a sa an a dɩnda, an Moyiisi lɛrɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim dɩnda ŋ nɩ, k'a a da ma, kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ, ŋ ʋ, Krista bɩ Yeezuu m.
Gɔsɩnnɔ hɔ k'a dɩnda bɩ si, niŋŋoo n a si y.
Kʋ ŋ bʋr ŋn'ɩ cenim bɩ, ŋ n kʋ ma y: Pol n mim deem hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "Sɛnt-Ɛspri meer k'a ba kan Ezayii kɩ awɔɔ zɩrɔ minto bɩ, sɩra m. A a hɩ, a ʋ:
Ta ɩ yaa do naa do yɩ, ɩ hɩ m, ɩ ʋ: Awɔɔ y'a tʋr kam mɩŋŋa, b'awɔɔ b'a jɩ marɛ y. Awɔɔ dɩgam mɩŋŋa, b'awɔɔ b'a yɩrɛ y.

Bala, do naa do heer b'ɩ monsigə ʋ, ŋ tʋr ga, ŋ lɛ baa k'a lɛɛ yɩ a mɩm nɩ y, ŋ lɛ baa k'a tʋr n mim ma y, ŋ lɛ baa k'a heer n a jɩ dɔ y, ŋ lɛ baa k'a a bɔ a taam k'a zu mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n ŋ waa y. Woso n a hɩ bɩ n naa.
K'a dɔ kɛɛrɛ, a ʋ, Woso bʋmbɔrɛ naa do nyɔɔ n y'a ʋ do vantɔɔ ma, bɩ ŋ y'a sim." [
Pol k'a meer naa do ba bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a hʋr ŋnɩ bɩsɩ kam gʋta kan kʋ kɩ.]
Pol mɩsɩrbaa ba ncɩnaaʋ dɔɔraa hɩɩya tɔr b'ʋ, an a mɩŋŋa busoo bɔ, an n'a mɩsɩrbaa ba n nɩ. Gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm zi rɔ wɔɔ, a yɩ ŋ sim mɩŋŋa,
an nɩ Woso cirbəə pa darɛ, an nɩ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mim dɩndam kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, bɩ gɔsɩ bɩr a tam nɩ tolle y.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa, Pol, Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ ɩ ci naa do ba awɔɔ ma. Woso mɔɔ bir kʋ m m ba a zibəəzaa, a mɔɔ bɔ ʋ m hɔ, k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʋ m aa lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do Woso nyɩnta an a ler bɔ tee••• Wosoci nɔ ʋ, a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lɛ m bɩ.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do bɩ, a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista, wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ mim an n'a dɩndam. K'a mɛsim nɔ ʋ nɩ, Davɩd do gʋaa m.
Bɩ, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri zibəə nɩ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, hɔ bɩ do n a hɩnka a ʋ, Woso Nyɩ m an nɩ paŋŋa m.
Yeezuu Krista minto m mɔɔ n barka yɩ, m m ba a zibəəzaa, kʋ m a ka kʋ do haay gʋɔɔ m sɩra ka ʋ, ŋnɩ zu ʋ.
Awɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro barla, bala, Yeezuu Krista y'awɔɔ bir k'a so awɔɔ ʋ.
Awɔɔ haay kʋ sɩrakarɛzannɔ n'awɔɔ m, an nɩ Rɔm ʋ, Woso awɔɔ ŋʋa, an awɔɔ bir k'a nyɩnta a gʋɔɔ barla. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ m barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
A n lɛɛ ka bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso kʋ mɔɔ n'a zi bam bɩ m barka, Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ haay minto, bala, durnya nɔ ʋ jilli n y'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ mim dɩndam.
Woso zi mɔɔ n'a barɛ kan m heer kɩ haay, a Nyɩ bɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ nɔ ʋ, a m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, a a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm haay yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ tɔ darɛ m nɔ ʋ,
m n'a yɛm han, k'a hɔɔnhɔ m, kʋ m kɔ, m zaa yɩ, m bʋr awɔɔ zi.
Mɔɔ lɛ taa paan••• kʋ m awɔɔ yɩ, kʋ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ jir kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'awɔɔ paŋŋa n a da ra gʋta,
gɛɛ, k'ʋ kʋ paŋŋa da ra, awɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, sɩrakarɛ deem kʋ wɔɔ n ta m bɩ nɔ ʋ.

M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ gɩnga gallɛm hɔka kʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi, bɩ, an ta an her ku naa, mɔɔ n m da ma y. A ŋʋa mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, kʋ m zibəə n nyɩ da, amba a a da kʋrɔ vantɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Hɔɔngʋrɛzannɔ kan bahɔɔngʋrɛzannɔ kɩ mim pakra ba mɔɔ ma, mindonno kan bamindonno kɩ mim pakra ba mɔɔ ma sɔ.
Naa y'a ka mɔɔ lɛ n taa paan••• kʋ m lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m sɔ, awɔɔ k'a nɩ Rɔm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Nyannɩ bɩr mɔɔ zɛm lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma y, bala, Woso paŋŋa m, an nɩ gʋaa haay k'a sɩra ka bʋmbɔm. Zɩɩfʋrɔ a lɛɛ ka ŋ ma, an bɔkarɛ an lee ku do vantɔɔ wɔɔ zi.

Wɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ denter, lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɔ ʋ Woso tɩrgabaa n'a hɩnkaŋ ʋ, Woso ɩ gʋaa k'a sɩra ka bɩ bam tɩrga, sɩra k'a a ka Woso ʋ bɩ minto bala, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'an tɩrga sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam.'
Woso a to brama an a heerbusu hɩnka, kʋ gʋɔɔ bɩr a daŋ ʋ, mimbʋnyaarɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ bam, ŋ bʋnyaabaa n a ka, sɩra bɩr dɔm dɔ sɔ y.
Denter m, hɔ k'a n'a karɛ ŋnɩ Woso dɔ n a nyaakʋm da y, Woso a hɩnka kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ mɩŋŋa.

Paŋŋa kʋ Woso n ta m b'a jirə ba ʋ bɩ, kan Woso mɩŋŋa taʋrɛ kɩ bɩ, gɔsɩ bɩr ŋ yɩrɛ y, bɩ durnya darɛ tɛkka ma, gʋaa a da ma an ŋ yɩ hɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ da rɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, naa minto bɩ, gʋɔɔ bɩ gumə yɩm fɩɩga y.
Ŋ Woso dɔ, bɩ ŋ bɩr Woso daŋ ʋ, ŋn'a barka darɛ amba Woso a ga m bɩ nɩ y. Naa n a ka, ŋ hɔɔndarɛ n'a ba daŋŋada, ŋ n kʋrɔ hɔɔn ma, ŋn'ɩ monsigə ʋ.
Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ a ma mindɔrɛzannɔ, an bɔkarɛ taajɛmzannɔ m,

a ga kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ m, kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso k'a nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa m tee••• bɩ da ʋ bɩ, bɩ to ŋ y'a ʋ ŋn'ɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ ga m kɩ, bɛnnɔ kɩ, hɔɔgansiro kɩ, tara burə hɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a gaatam nɔ kɩ daŋ ʋ.
Naa minto m, Woso n ŋ to ŋn'ɩ dintim zibəəro kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa rɔ wɔɔ barɛ a hɔɔnhɔ ma, ŋn'a mɛ gore bɔŋ ʋ mim k'a nyannɩ n ta ʋ barɛ nɔ ʋ kan kʋ kɩ.
Bala, ŋ Woso sɩra minno wɔɔ to ŋnɩ ŋʋaar sa, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam hɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ da rɔ wɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ zure ŋ ʋ, an bɔkarɛ Woso ŋ y'a ga m, ŋn'a da ʋ, a m hɔ haay darɛzaa. Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay! Amina!
Naa minto m, Woso n ŋ to, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr a nyannɩ minno lɛtaamarɔ bam. Ŋ lannɔ wɔɔ bɩr a kam ma sɔ, k'a bɩr kan yar kɩ y, wʋta ŋ nawʋm lannɔ kan kʋ kɩ, an bɔkarɛ, naa barɛ n a ga nɩ y.

Yaarɔ wɔɔ maam sɔ, ŋ bɩr a kam ma, k'a bɩr kan lʋ kɩ y, a ŋʋa ŋ nawʋm paan•••, k'a bɩr wʋtam kan a muno yaarɔ kɩ. Yaarɔ kan yaarɔ kɩ nɩ nyannɩ zi bam kan kʋ kɩ, naa n a ka sɔ, ŋn'a nyaanlɛ zibəə fɩryɩrɛ k'a a ga m yɩrɛ a mɛ ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ n a ŋʋa k'a Woso dɔ bɩ, Woso n ŋ to a hɔɔn daŋŋada bɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a n'a ga barɛ m bɩ ba.

Zibəə k'a n a ga barɛ m do haay ba ŋ nawʋm, mimbʋnyaa do haay, gʋɔɔ lɛtaama bʋnyaa do haay, bʋnyaabaa do haay, jɩmbaa n ŋ heer han, gərzɛrɛ ba n nɩ, nyaabarɛ ba n nɩ, zambʋbarɛ ba n nɩ, zibəə daŋŋada haay,
ŋn'ɩ tɔ bɔm, ŋn'ɩ gʋɔɔ tɔ zaar barɛ, ŋnɩ sɔ Woso m, ŋ bɩr gʋɔɔ daŋ ʋ y, ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busum, ŋn'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ bɔm mimbʋnyaa daarɔ barɛ m, ŋ bɩr yɛm a zɩrɔ lɛ ma y,
ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ y, ŋ bɩr jɩnlɛ a lɛ ra y, gʋaa mim bɩr ŋ kɔrɛ y, gʋaa cicir bɩr ŋ zɛrɛ y.

A n bɔkarɛ, ŋ y'a dɔ mɩŋŋa ŋ ʋ, Woso lɛ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, gʋaa k'a nɩ ziro nɔɔn duro barɛ a ga zɛ m. Kan naa kɩ haay ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ tam lɛɛ kan minno nɔɔn duro barɛ kɩ. A n a na ma bɩ, kʋ ŋ gʋaa yɩ sɔ, an nɩ minno nɔɔn duro barɛ, bɩ ŋ nɔ yɩ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n'ɩ gʋɔɔ dʋdɔ yarlɛ? Ɩbɩɩ bɩ gumə yɩrɛ y, gʋɔɔ dʋdɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a yarm bɩ, ɩ mɩŋŋa dʋdɔ ɩ n'a yarm, bala, ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yarm, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ zi kʋ ŋ n'a bam bɩ bam sɔ.
Wɔɔ dɔ denter m, ʋ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ minno nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ, Woso yɩm dʋdɔ yarm sɩra m, amba ŋ zibəə bʋnyaa b'a ga m bɩ m.
Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ minno nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm bɩ, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a barɛ, am ŋ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, ɩ hɔɔn ɩbɩɩ da ɩ ʋ, ɩ bɔm lɛm Woso dʋdɔyarlɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ ra?

Gɛɛ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr dɩgam Woso ŋʋarɛ gʋta k'an ta m ɩbɩɩ minto, an nɩ bʋrlɛ a ma, k'a mɩŋŋa ba ɩbɩɩ m bɩ ma hɔsɩ ra? Ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ ɩ ʋ, a ba k'a nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ m mɩŋŋa bɩ, a hɩ a ʋ, k'ɩbɩɩ m toore yɩ, ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam la?
B'ɩbɩɩ da bɩr bɔŋ ʋ y, ɩ lɛ baa k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam y, bɩ, a ba k'ɩbɩɩ n nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ naa, hʋnhʋrlɛ gʋta ɩbɩɩ n'a bankarɛ ɩ minto, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso n n'a heerbusu hɩnkaŋ ʋ, an dʋdɔ ka kan sɩra kɩ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, a gʋaa biyəə zibəə nyɔɔdʋ kaŋ ʋ, amba a a ga m bɩ m.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tɔŋ ʋ, k'a mɩŋŋa ba tee•••, ka Woso nɔ yɩ, ŋn'a kam Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ ma, kan a daʋrɛ kɩ ma, kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a bɩr a zaar bam kɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ, Woso mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ karɛ ŋ ʋ.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam Woso ma, ŋ bɩr zum sɩra ʋ y, ŋn'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Woso y'a nɔmaa kan a heerbusu kɩ hɩnkarɛ ŋ nɩ.
Kʋsɩ kan fɩr kɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ yɩm, zɩɩfʋrɔ n nɩ lɛɛ kam, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ n a nya ŋ ʋ.
Bɩ, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ, daʋrɛ, kan laafɩɩ kɩ kam gʋaa haay k'a n'a mɩŋŋa bam b'ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ n nɩ lɛɛ kam, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ n a nya ŋ ʋ.
Bala, Woso bɩr gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.

Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mimbʋnyaa bam, ŋ n Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ gɩngam sɔ, bɩ Moyiisi lɛrɔ bɛɛ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ dʋdɔ karɛ zaa y, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ, ŋn'a gu ŋn'ɩ mimbʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ dʋdɔ karɛ zaa.
Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma bala rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ y, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zure ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.

A a da ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y, ŋ n Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, nɔɔ m hɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ ba, bɩ ŋ n a dɔ y. A ba kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ ŋ n lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ, naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, ŋ lɛ cɩnta a mɩŋŋɔɔ m.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ ʋ, hɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba a heer ʋ, ŋ heer ɩ kasɛtɩ kam, kan ba ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ tɩr a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a mɩŋŋa ba gɛɛ a bʋnyaa ba bɩ kɩ.
Nyɩnta a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ, amba lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ m, Woso zaa kam Krista Yeezuu ʋ k'an hɔ haay k'a nyaakʋm da gʋɔɔ heer ʋ bɩ dʋdɔ ka.
Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n'a hɩrɛ ɩ ma zɩɩfʋ, ɩ nɩ yom lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ n'ɩ lɛ bɔrɛ ɩ mɩŋŋa ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ Woso dɔ,
ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ dɔ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ k'a ga barɛ m bɩ dɔ ɩ bɔ kʋ la m.
Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ hɔɔn darɛ ɩ ʋ, zaa hɩnka bʋʋrɔ m zaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ nɩ lɛɛ gum monsigəzannɔ m,
ɩ ʋ, bahɔdonno dʋndɔrɛzaa n'ɩ mɩ, gʋɔɔ poorero karɩnsaamba, a gɩnga ɩbɩɩ nawʋm ɩ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ dɔ, ɩ sɩra dɔ mɩŋŋa lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto.
A lɔ ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m, ɩ bɩr a dɩndarɛ ɩ mɩŋŋa nɩ? Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩm gʋɔɔ m, ŋ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ nɩ koor barɛ.
Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ n'a darɛ, ɩbɩɩ sɔ wosobaawɔnnɔ daʋrɛ m, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ nɩ gasʋrɛ ŋ daʋrɛ cɛrɔ ʋ, ɩ nɩ ŋ bɔm.
Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ heer nyɔɔm lɛrɔ wɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ dɔ bɩ tɔ ma, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ Woso gore bɔŋ ʋ, k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ bɩsɩ kam lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʋ bɩ, n ʋ: 'Awɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ, awɔɔ y'a kam, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋm.'
K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, gasʋ k'ɩbɩɩ ʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ jɩ ta ʋ, bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ gum lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure ma, baa k'ɩbɩɩ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, a bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa k'a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ ɩ hɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ barɛ, Woso bɩ dɩgarɛ a zaa ma ɩ ʋ, gasʋ a ʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ ra?
Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ b'a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ, a y'ɩbɩɩ dam nyannɩ ʋ, bala, ɩbɩɩ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, ɩ nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, bɩ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr zure ŋ ʋ y.
Zɩɩfʋ paan••• bɩ, gʋaa k'a m zɩɩfʋ gʋɔɔ mɩm ʋ bɩ bɛɛ y, mɛsim gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɛɛ m baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ paan••• y.

Bɩ, zɩɩfʋ paan••• bɩ, heer an ta ʋ, baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ paan••• bɩ, heer hɔ bɩ m. A to a nawʋm Sɛnt-Ɛspri zi, a bɩr a tom Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y. Zɩɩfʋ bɩ do lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩr a tom gʋɔɔ zi y, a to a nawʋm Woso zi.
Ncɩnaaʋ naa, k'ɩ zɩɩfʋ, bɔ ɩ n'a yɩrɛ a nɔ ʋ, baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ nyɔɔdʋ m bɔ nɩ?
A nyɔɔdʋ ta ʋ gʋta denter. Bala, a lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ Woso a lemim da ŋ wɔ ʋ.
K'ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ lɔ? Ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ n sɩra ba minto b'a da ma, an a ka Woso bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a sɩrabarɛ nɔ ʋ ra?
Fɩɩga! Baa, kʋ gʋaa haay ŋʋaarzaa, Woso gɔɔta an nɩ sɩra m, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Kʋ n n'ɩ dɔ tɩrga ɩ meerbaa nɔ ʋ, bɩ k'ɩ bʋr ɩ jɩnnɔ ra dʋdɔkarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ batɩrgabaa ɩ Woso tɩrgabaa hɩnkarɛ, bɔ wɔɔ k'ʋ a hɩ? K'ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ, Woso gumə ba ʋ kan wɔɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ kɩ a nɔmaa nɔ ʋ ra? Meer naa do kʋ wɔɔ ba naa, gʋɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ meerbaa m.
A bɩ ncɩnaaʋ y, kʋ n bɛɛ m, Woso y'a bam lɔ k'a durnya dʋdɔ ka?
Gɛɛ, gʋaa a da ma, an a hɩ a ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ ŋʋaarbarɛ y'a kam Woso sɩra n'a hɩnkam paan••• a lɛbɔʋrɛ minto, bɔ m kɛɛrɛ, an mɔɔ ba mimbʋnyaazaa, an nɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ karɛ?
A lɔ wɔɔ bɩr mimbʋnyaa barɛ, k'a mɩŋŋa m nyɩnta ʋ? Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ wɔɔ tɔ bʋnyaa hɩm, ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, naa wɔɔ n'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ m. Kʋ Woso bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro dʋdɔ yar, a gumə ta ʋ.
Ʋ a nyambʋr ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ lɔ? Wɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ, lɛ wɔɔ da gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ m na? Fɩɩga! Wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ʋ a hɩnka, ʋ ʋ, gʋaa haay, kʋ zɩɩfʋ m, gɛɛ zɩɩfʋ bɛɛ, ŋ yɩ mimbʋnyaa lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ.
Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ bɩ m, n ʋ: Gʋaa tɩrga ba ʋ y, baa deem taan••• tɔkkɛ,
Woso mindor ba ʋ y, baa deem taan••• ba ʋ, an n'a kam Woso ma y.
Ŋ haay, ŋ y'a nyʋnnyɔɔ, ŋ haay jilli, a bʋnyaa ŋn'a bam. Ŋ barla bɩ, a mɩŋŋabarɛzaa ba ʋ y, baa deem taan••• tɔkkɛ.
Ŋ lɛ meerbaa ɩ gʋɔɔ zaar bam. Bra ŋn'a bɩmbam gʋɔɔ m, a lɛ meerbaa m, ŋ nɛɛm ɩ busum am cɩrka sɛ m.
Ler kʋsɩ bɔrɛ yɩ ŋ lɛ han, kan meerbaa k'a nɩ busum gʋɔɔ ma kɩ.
Ŋ kaarɛ kan gərzɛrɛ kɩ.
Kʋ ŋ bɔ lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ, lɛɛ zaarbarɛ kan kʋsɩ kɩ ŋn'a tore a jɛ ʋ.
Ŋ n laafɩɩ zaa dɔ y.
Ŋ mɩm ʋ bɩ, Woso daʋrɛ jɩ ba ʋ y.
A n bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, hɔ haay kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, a hɩ a nawʋm gʋɔɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m. Kʋ gɔsɩ b'a da ma, an gumə ka a mɩŋŋa ʋ y, kʋ durnya haay m kʋrɔ gumə ma Woso taa.
Bɩ y'a ka, 'gɔsɩ b'a bam tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ', lɛrɔ wɔɔ zi k'a ŋ ba minto y, lɛrɔ wɔɔ, gʋaa mimbʋnyaa ŋn'a hɩnkam nɩ bala.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso hɔ k'a a ba, an wɔɔ ba tɩrga, bɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ mim b'a nɔ ʋ bɩ hɩnka, amba lɛrɔ wɔɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ ciro nyɩnta ŋn'a hɩ bɩ m.
Woso ɩ gʋɔɔ bam tɩrga, kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʋ minto, a ba a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, bala, ŋ hɔdeem, a bɩr ŋ jirə bɔrɛ y.
Ŋ haay mimbʋnyaa ba, ŋ y'a do Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ gasʋʋrɛ ma.
Bɩ, Woso ŋ ba tɩrga nɩbɩr, a cicirzɛrɛ nɔ ʋ, Krista Yeezuu k'a nɩ ŋ bʋmbɔm mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
A mɩŋŋa Woso a bɔ ʋ, k'an ga gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra kaŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto, k'a tɩrgabaa hɩnka, bala, a nyɩnta an bʋr a ma biisi, a n gʋɔɔ hʋnhʋr ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma y.
Bɩ her naa, Woso ɩ zaa k'a n'a sam, an nɩ gʋɔɔ bam tɩrga bɩ hɩnkam, bala, a lɛ taa k'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ba tɩrga, k'a gɔɔta a tɩrgabaa nɔ ʋ sɔ.
Lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ zaa ta ʋ dɔ ra? Fɩɩga! Bɔ minto? Bala, a n ta ʋ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure bɛɛ y, sɩrakarɛ m.
Sɩra m, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, n nɩ gʋaa bam tɩrga, bɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
Gɛɛ, Woso bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ Woso m bala ra? Do vantɔɔ wɔɔ Woso bɛɛ sɔ ra? Ɩɩn•••, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ Woso m sɔ.
Bala, Woso deem taan••• n ta ʋ, an nɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ bam tɩrga ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, an nɩ do vantɔɔ bam tɩrga sɔ, ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
Wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ ba a nawʋm hɔ k'a jɩ ba ʋ ra? A bɛɛ m bɩ y, lɛrɔ wɔɔ gore an n'a daŋ ʋ paan•••.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, bɔ mim wɔɔ n'a hɩm ʋ yaaba Abraham bɩncɛ ʋ? Bɔ hɔ a a yɩ a zi nɩ?
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Abraham ba n y'a ʋ tɩrga, a zibəə tɔ ma, a a da ma an a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ, b'a bɩ ncɩnaaʋ y, a b'a dam ma an a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ Woso taa y.
Bala, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʋ, am naa Woso n a ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.'
Kʋ gʋaa zi ba, a yawʋra n n'a bam, yawʋra bɩ do, ganwʋrɛ bɛɛ y, hɔ k'a zaa b'a ga m bɩ m bɩ.
