Bɩ gʋaa k'a n hɔsɩ zi ba y, an sɩra ka Woso k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaabər bam tɩrga b'ʋ bɩ, Woso ɩ dɩgam bɩ zaa ma tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ minto.
Davɩd ɩ gʋaa kʋ Woso dɩga a tɩrga b'a zibəə tɔ ma bɛɛ b'ɩ heernyɩnta mim hɩm sɔ, a ʋ:
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʋ, an ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa kʋ Woso bɩr a mimbʋnyaa darɛ a heer ʋ bɩ m.
Mimbirenyɩnta naa do zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ hɔ m a minto ra, gɛɛ do vantɔɔ wɔɔ a da ma ŋn'a yɩ sɔ ra? Wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ʋ ʋ: 'Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʋ, Woso n a ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ minto.'
Ba naa a ʋ brɔ dɔmɩm ʋ? Gasʋ k'a b'a ʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ m gɛɛ, gɛɛ a lɛɛ ka a baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ bɩ nɩ? Gasʋ k'a b'a ʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ dɔmɩm bɛɛ y, a lɛɛ ka, bɩ ma bɩ, a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y.

Dɔmɩm kʋ Abraham n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ, Woso a ba tɩrga, bɩ jɛ nɩ, Woso n bɔkarɛ, an a da ʋ, k'an gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. Kʋ bɩ m nyɩnta makra, an a hɩnka a ʋ, Woso Abraham ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, Abraham n a ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra kam Woso ʋ haay yaaba, baa kʋ ŋ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y. Kʋ Woso n brɔɔ ba tɩrga sɔ, ŋ sɩrakarɛ minto.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ yaaba m sɔ, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ ŋnɩ sɩra ka Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, amba Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ bɩ m.
Woso k'a durnya soʋre ler bɔ Abraham m kan a yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ m bɩ, lɛrɔ zuure minto bɛɛ y, k'a Abraham ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ m.
Kʋ hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ n nawʋm lɛrɔ zuure tɔ ma, sɩrakarɛ jɩ ba ʋ dɔ y, lerbɔrɛ bɩ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ sɔ y.
Bala, lɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ zɛm Woso nɔmaa m, bɩ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lɛrɔ ba ʋ y, lɛrɔ bɩsɩkama ba ʋ sɔ y.

Naa y'a ka sɩrakarɛ n nɩ hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm, k'an yɩ Woso ganwʋrɛ k'a n'a kam, kʋ lerbɔrɛ bɩ n nyɩnta Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ haay hɔ. Yaŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m a deem nɩ y, yaŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka am Abraham hɔ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, ʋ woo•••, ʋ zɩ m Abraham m.
Denter m, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ cɩnta mɔɔ ʋ, k'ɩ yɩ doro gʋta zɩ.' Wɔɔ zɩ m Abraham m, Woso k'a sɩra ka ʋ bɩ taa. Woso k'a nɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, an n'a kam hɔ k'a ba ʋ nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ m.

Abraham sɩra ka an a ta a heer lɛ a ʋ, a hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm, baa kʋ hɔsɩ ba ʋ, an nɩ yom ma k'a a dɔ a ʋ, a hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm bɩ, a a gu an sɩra ka, an b'a ba doro gʋta yaaba, amba Woso a hɩ m, a ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ yaŋŋɔɔ zɛm bɩ yɩ gʋta' bɩ m.
Abraham dɔɔraa k'a bɩ ta an zɔrɔ ku, Saara n gusi sɔ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ nyɩ yɩ dɔ bɩ, Abraham sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa gɔɔta a n a bɔrɛ y.
A n sɩnsɩm ka Woso lerbɔrɛ bɩ ma y, bɩ, sɩrakarɛ bɩ paŋŋa ka ʋ, an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ.
A n a nyasʋ a heer ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ a ʋ, kʋ Woso hɔ ler bɔ, a ɩ paŋŋa m sɔ, k'a ka k'an kʋ yɩ.
Naa minto m, Woso n Abraham ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
Kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Woso Abraham ba tɩrga' bɩ, Abraham y'a deem tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
Wɔɔ tɔ ma n sɔ, bala, n wɔɔ bam tɩrga, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ sɩra kam, Woso k'a wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʋ b'ʋ.
Woso a ka n n'a zɛ gər wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ, k'a wɔɔ ba tɩrga.
Woso wɔɔ ba tɩrga, wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ minto, wɔɔ n laafɩɩ yɩ kan Woso kɩ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.

Yeezuu Krista minto m, wɔɔ n b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ Woso cicirzɛrɛ yɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, cicirzɛrɛ bɩ do wɔɔ jɩm ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ, bɩ wɔɔ y'ʋ heer nyɔɔm, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ taaheerlɛ m, ʋ ʋ, ʋ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
A n lɛ da bɩ, wɔɔ y'ʋ heer nyɔɔrɛ ʋ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ, bala, wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, fɩryɩrɛ n nɩ zɛm tʋntɔʋrɛ m,
tʋntɔʋrɛ n nɩ zɛm mim dama m, mim dama n nɩ zɛm taaheerlɛ m.
Taaheerlɛ naa do bɩ wɔɔ dam nyannɩ ʋ y, bala, Woso a ŋʋarɛ k'an ta m wɔɔ minto bɩ da wɔɔ heer ʋ an a han, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Sɩra m, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a ku bɩ, wɔɔ n nɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, ʋ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ ʋ yɔ bɩ, Krista ga wɔɔ mimbʋnyaazannɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
A wer ta ʋ, kʋ gʋaa n yɛ, an ga gʋaa tɩrga tɔ ma. A a da ma gʋaa n yɛ, an ga gʋaa mɩŋŋa tɔ ma barɛ m.
Hɔ kʋ Woso a ba k'a wɔɔ ŋʋa k'a nawʋm bɩ hɩnka bɩ ba n nɩ: Wɔɔ nyɩnta mimbʋnyaabənno, Krista n a gu an ga wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Woso k'awɔɔ ba tɩrga, Krista k'a ga wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ minto bɩ, an lɛ da haay bɩ, a wɔɔ bɔ lɛ m Woso heerbusu nɔ ʋ.
Bala, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ Woso jɩnnɔ bɩ, a zu kʋ ʋ kan a Nyɩ bɩ garɛ kɩ, an wɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ. K'a wɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, a wɔɔ bʋmbɔm sɔ a Nyɩ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa m.
Naa bɛɛ n'a deem nɩ y, wɔɔ y'ʋ heer nyɔɔm sɔ Woso nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, a ɩ wɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ.
Gʋaa deem taan••• y'a ka mimbʋnyaa n gasʋ durnya ʋ, Adam m. Mimbʋnyaa bɩ do m bʋr zɛ m. Yɩ a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ, zɛ n a kərgu gʋɔɔ haay ra, bala, ŋ haay mimbʋnyaa ba.
Mimbʋnyaa lɛɛ ka an nɩ durnya ʋ, Woso n bɔkarɛ an lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka Moyiisi ʋ, bɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ba ʋ bɩ, Woso bɩr gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaa taar karɛ ŋ la y.
Kan bɩ kɩ, an a sa Adam dɔmɩm bɩ ma, an ta Moyiisi dɔmɩm ra bɩ, zɛ a so gʋɔɔ ʋ, baa gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Adam mimbʋnyaa bɩ lɔɔ ba rɔ wɔɔ, zɛ brɔɔ zɛ sɔ. Adam nyɩnta Krista k'a a ga m, an bʋr bɩ bɔkʋʋrɛzaa.

Bɩ, Woso ganwʋrɛ k'a n'a kam vam bɩ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Adam kʋrɔma bɩ kɩ y. Sɩra m, gʋaa deem kʋrɔma ɩ bʋr gʋaa cir zɛ m, bɩ Woso ganwʋrɛ bɩ gʋtabaa lɛ da, Woso ganwʋrɛ bɩ do ka gʋɔɔ ʋ, gʋaa deem taan••• tɔ ma, Yeezuu Krista m, bɩ tɔ ma m, Woso n barka ka gʋaa cir ʋ gʋta.

Hɔ kʋ Woso ganwʋrɛ bɩ n nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ bɩ hɔdeem kan hɔ kʋ gʋaa deem kʋrɔma n nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ kɩ y. Bala, Adam deem taan••• kʋrɔma kʋ Woso a dʋdɔ yar b'a ka, gʋaa haay nɩ mimbʋnyaa kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ. A n bɔkarɛ, mimbʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba gʋta bɩ kur bɩ, Woso ganwʋrɛ bɩ ŋ ba tɩrga.

A yɩ sɩra, gʋaa deem mimbʋnyaa y'a ka, zɛ n a so gʋaa haay ʋ gʋaa deem bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ Yeezuu Krista deem tɔ ma, gʋɔɔ ɩ hɔ yɩm Woso zi gʋta, a y'a ganwʋrɛ gʋta bɩ karɛ ŋ ʋ nɩbɩr, an nɩ ŋ bam tɩrga. Krista tɔ ma, ŋ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ, ŋnɩ cirbəə bɩ.
K'a yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, gʋaa deem kʋrɔma k'a a ka, gʋaa haay nɩ mimbʋnyaa kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, gʋaa deem tɩrgabaa zibəə gʋaa haay bʋmbɔ an ŋ ba tɩrga, kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba.
Gʋaa deem bɩsɩkarɛ k'a ka gʋɔɔ haay n a ba mimbʋnyaabənno Woso mɩm ʋ bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, gʋaa deem k'a yɛ Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma b'a ka, gʋɔɔ gʋta n a ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ.
A n bɔkarɛ, bʋr kʋ lɛ b'ʋ bɩ, a a ka mimbʋnyaa n a ba gʋta, bɩ, lɛɛ kʋ mimbʋnyaa pasɩ ʋ bɩ, Woso barka nyɩnta ʋ gʋta an lɛ da.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, amba mimbʋnyaa a so gʋɔɔ ʋ zɛ tɔ ma bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, Woso barka y'a som gʋɔɔ ʋ tɩrgabaa tɔ ma, k'a ka, kʋ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ yɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
Bɔ wɔɔ k'ʋ a hɩ kɛɛrɛ? Ʋ gɔɔta ʋ bɩr mimbʋnyaa bam, kʋ Woso cicirzɛrɛ n a da ra gɛ?
Ayy•••, fɩɩga! Kʋ mimbʋnyaa mim bɩncɛ nɩ, gəəno m wɔɔ m, wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ kɛɛrɛ k'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ba mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ?
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, batɛm kʋ wɔɔ si bɩ, ʋ ba wɔɔ ʋ deem kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ a garɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ ra?
Batɛm bɩ sire nɔ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ bir n y'a ʋ kan kɩ a zɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ Krista a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ Zɩ paŋŋa m bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa daa ba.
Bala, ʋ ba kʋ wɔɔ ʋ deem kan kɩ a zɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ y'ʋ bam deem kan kɩ sɔ a mɩmbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
Ʋ a dɔ mɩŋŋa, ʋ ʋ, mɩsɩrbaa kʋ wɔɔ n ta m biisi bɩ, n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma kan Krista kɩ. Kʋ mimbʋnyaa k'a nɩ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ paŋŋa n a da, k'ʋ bɩ nyɩnta mimbʋnyaa lɔnnɔ dɔ y.
Denter m, gʋaa k'a ga bɩ, mimbʋnyaa paŋŋa ba zi dɔ y.
Bala, kʋ wɔɔ ga kan Krista kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ sɩra ka, ʋ ʋ, ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bam kan kɩ sɔ.
Bala, Krista k'a a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ, a bɩ gam dɔ y, zɛ paŋŋa ba zi dɔ y.
Krista ga gallɛm deem, an a gʋ kʋ ma kan mimbʋnyaa kɩ, dɔmɩm haay minto. Dɩɩtaa naa, a mɩsɩr, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba a nawʋm Woso tɔ ma.
Awɔɔ sɔ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ gɩnga, a a gʋ kʋ ma kan mimbʋnyaa kɩ, bɩ awɔɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam kɛɛrɛ Woso tɔ ma, Yeezuu Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
A b'a ya, a ka kʋ mimbʋnyaa n a so a mɛ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ga b'ʋ y, a yaa a ka awɔɔ n zu a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ʋ.
A b'a mɛ vəŋŋəro sa, a ŋ ka mimbʋnyaa ʋ, k'an ŋ sa an ŋ ba a zibəə mɔr y. Awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ sa a ka Woso ʋ, a mɩm awɔɔ bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, k'a mɛ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ sa, a ŋ ba zi mɩŋŋa barɛ mɔr.
Mimbʋnyaa bɛɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ dɔ y, bala, awɔɔ ba lɛ nɔ ʋ y, Woso barka nɔ awɔɔ n ta ʋ.
Naa jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Kʋ lɛ bɛɛ y'a so wɔɔ ʋ dɔ, bɩ Woso barka wɔɔ n'a nɔ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a nam bɩ lɛ m, k'ʋ mimbʋnyaa ba ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga!

Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, k'awɔɔ a mɩŋŋa sa, a ka gʋaa ʋ k'a zu a hɔɔnhɔ ʋ, gʋaa k'awɔɔ nɩ zure a hɔɔnhɔ ʋ bɩ lɔnnɔ n'awɔɔ m na? A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ mimbʋnyaa lɔnnɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ, bɩ mimbʋnyaa a ka awɔɔ n gɩnga, gɛɛ kʋ Woso hɔɔnhɔ awɔɔ nɩ zuŋ ʋ, bɩ Woso mɩsɩrbaa k'an tɩrga ka awɔɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, ʋ Woso barka da. Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ biisi mimbʋnyaa lɔnnɔ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ bɩ zu hɔdɩndarɛ kʋ ŋ y'a dɩnda awɔɔ m b'ʋ kan a heer kɩ haay.
Awɔɔ yɔ kʋ n y'a ʋ mimbʋnyaa wɔ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ a ba tɩrgabaa lɔnnɔ.

Makrarɔ yaargarɛrɔ mɔɔ ŋ sa meerbaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ ma, bala, awɔɔ bɩr a dam ma, an nɩ minno wɔɔ jɩ marɛ y. Amba awɔɔ nyɩnta biisi, a a mɩŋŋɔɔ ba dintim kan zibʋnyaa do haay kɩ zibəə lɔnnɔ, a a ba Woso bɩsɩkamazannɔ bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ba tɩrgabaa zibəə lɔnnɔ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba Woso mɩm m.
Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ mimbʋnyaa lɔnnɔ rɔ wɔɔ, tɩrgabaa zibəə mim n nyɩnta awɔɔ ma y.
Bɔ awɔɔ yɩ, zibəəro wɔɔ duro nɔ ʋ? Ŋ nyannɩ ta awɔɔ m her, bala, ŋ nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, zɛ m.
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, n y'awɔɔ yɔ mimbʋnyaa wɔ ʋ, a a ba Woso lɔnnɔ, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩrɛ a nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ m, a nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩrɛ m.
Bala, mimbʋnyaa yawʋra bɩ, zɛ m, bɩ ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso n'a kam nɩbɩr bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a ŋʋam kʋ m a hɩ awɔɔ m naa dɔ mɩŋŋa, bala, awɔɔ lɛrɔ dɔ. Ba gʋaa gɔɔta an mɩsɩr bɩ lɛ tɩr a so ʋ. K'a zaa bɩ ga, lɛ n a so ʋ dɔ y.

Ʋ makra sa: lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, n y'a cɩnta kʋ lʋ b'a gʋ a zim ma k'a zim bɩ bɛɛ bɩ ga y, bɩ k'a zim bɩ ga, lɛ k'a so lʋ b'ʋ k'an gɔɔta an bɩr kan a zim bɩ kɩ a mɩsɩrbaa dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ n a ya, an a so lʋ b'ʋ dɔ y.
Bɩ, kʋ lʋ bɩ gʋaa vanta sa a zim bɩ nɩ meeyaa m, lʋ bɩ bir n nawʋm jaandər. Bɩ k'a zim bɩ bɩ ga, lɛ bɩ n a ya, an a so ʋ dɔ y, a a da ma an gʋaa vanta sa, bɩ n b'a dam ma n a hɩ ma jaandər y.

M danyɩnɔ, a maam sɔ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ biisi. Kɛɛrɛ naa, a zɛ awɔɔ ʋ kʋ ra kan Krista k'a ga wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ kɩ, lɛ n a ya, an a so awɔɔ ʋ dɔ y, awɔɔ gɩnga sɔ. Gʋaa vanta y'a so awɔɔ ʋ kɛɛrɛ, gʋaa k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ m, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma ʋ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ ba Woso tɔ ma.
Bala, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ biisi, ʋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto bɩ, lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ wɔɔ mɛ jilli bɩ dam zi bʋnyaarɔ barɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ tam wɔɔ m zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.

Biisi bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ba n y'a ʋ a lɔnnɔ, ŋn'a so wɔɔ ʋ, kɛɛrɛ naa, lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ, gɩnga wɔɔ ʋ, Woso wɔɔ bɔ ŋ wɔ ʋ. Kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ ʋ da ma, ʋ Woso zi ba zaa daa nɔ ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zaa m, lɛrɔ zaa gusire k'a nɩ Moyiisi ci ʋ bɩ bɛɛ dɔ y.

Naa jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Mimbʋnyaa m, lɛrɔ wɔɔ m na? Ayy•••, fɩɩga! Bɩ, kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m, mɔɔ b'a dɔm kʋ bɔ m mimbʋnyaa y. Bala, mɔɔ bɩ gʋaa hɔ lɛtaamarɔ dɔrɛ, kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y'a cɩnta, ŋ ʋ: 'Ɩ b'a ka ɩ lɛ m bɩr gʋaa hɔ zi y.'
A m naa, mimbʋnyaa n a na lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta rɔ wɔɔ ma, an zaa yɩ mɔɔ gʋr zi, an mɔɔ lɛ ka gʋaa hɔ lɛtaama do haay zi. Bala, kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ba ʋ, mimbʋnyaa bɩ, hɔ gər m.
Biisi bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ mɩsɩr. Bɩ, lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ bɩ bʋr bɩ, mimbʋnyaa n a mɩm bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ m ga.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa mim bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ler bɔm mɔɔ m, brɔɔ a ka mɔɔ n ga.
Bala, a na mimbʋnyaa b'ʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ m, an bra ba mɔɔ m, an a ka, lɛrɔ wɔɔ n mɔɔ zɛ gər.
Bɩ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a to ŋ y'a ʋ Woso zi, lɛ biyəə mɩŋŋa, a tɩrga, hɔ mɩŋŋa m.

Bɩ, hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n ga ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga! Mimbʋnyaa ɩ mɔɔ zɛ, hɔ mɩŋŋa a a sa, an mɔɔ zɛ m gər. Yɩ a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ mimbʋnyaa bʋnyaabaa n a hɩnka. Lɛrɔ wɔɔ y'a ka, mimbʋnyaa bʋnyaabaa gʋtabaa n a hɩnka paan•••.
Wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ a to ŋ y'a ʋ Woso zi. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, gʋaa m mɔɔ m bala, mimbʋnyaa n mɔɔ si, an mɔɔ ba a lɔ.
Mɔɔ bɩr m zi kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam jɩ dɔrɛ y, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m a ba bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr bɩ barɛ y, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m a ba bɩ, mɔɔ n'a bam.
Bɩ, k'a nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ baa bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, mɔɔ yɛ kɛɛrɛ m ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋa.
A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔ bʋnyaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, mɔɔ bɛɛ n'a barɛ y, mimbʋnyaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ n'a bam.
Bala, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ gʋr zi, (b'ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ: mɔɔ mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ) hɔ mɩŋŋa ba ʋ y. Mɔɔ ɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ lɛtaama m, bɩ mɔɔ ba a barɛ paŋŋa nɩ y.
Mɔɔ bɩr zi mɩŋŋa kʋ mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam bɩ barɛ y, zi bʋnyaa kʋ mɔɔ bɩr a ŋʋam bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam.
Kʋ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ baa bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa bɛɛ n'a barɛ y, mimbʋnyaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ tɩr a yɩm, kʋ mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ba a paŋŋa nɩ y. Zi bʋnyaa barɛ paŋŋa mɔɔ m ta m bala.
A ɩ yɩrɛ ʋ, mɔɔ heer nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa,

bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ lɛ vanta yɩrɛ an nɩ zi bam mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, an nɩ zoo bam kan lɛrɔ niŋŋoo kʋ mɔɔ hɔɔn nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Lɛ vanta bɩ do k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ n'a kam, mɔɔ nɩ m bam mimbʋnyaa paŋŋa k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ lɔ.
Cicirzaa m mɔɔ m! Nka nɩ mɔɔ yɔm mɛ k'a nɩ tam mɔɔ m zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ wɔ ʋ?
Woso m, Yeezuu Krista wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ tɔ ma, Woso m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ! Naa haay tɔ ma, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa nɩ, mɔɔ hɔɔn mɔɔ ba Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɔ, mɔɔ mɛsim n bɔkarɛ an mɔɔ ba mimbʋnyaa lɔ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso b'a yarɛ an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yar y.
Bala, Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʋ, lɛ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a sa k'a mɩsɩrbaa ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, a mɔɔ bʋmbɔ lɛ k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaa m k'a nyɩnta k'a mɔɔ gaa a ta mɔɔ m zɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ wɔ ʋ.

Hɔ kʋ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ n a da ma ŋn'a ba, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a da ma ŋnɩ zu ʋ bɩ minto bɩ, Woso hɔ bɩ do ba. Woso k'a a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ mɛsim nɔ ʋ, an bʋr mimbʋnyaabənno mɛsim m k'a bɩ ŋ yɔ mimbʋnyaa wɔ ʋ bɩ, a mimbʋnyaa dʋdɔ yar.
Naa do ba Woso ʋ, kʋ tɩrgabaa kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta bɩ n kʋ yɩ, wɔɔ gʋr zi. Wɔɔ k'ʋ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa bam dɔ mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʋ m.
Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɛsim mɩsɩrbaa bam nɔ wɔɔ, hɔ kʋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do lɛ n taa ŋn'a kam ma, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri lɛ n taa bɩ ŋn'a kam ma.
Mɛsim hɔɔnhɔrɔ kama bɩ, ta a nawʋm gʋaa m zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔɔnhɔ kama bɩ, ta a nawʋm gʋaa m mɩsɩrbaa kan laafɩɩ kɩ bɩncɛ ʋ.
Bala, Woso jɩnnɔ m mɛsim hɔɔnhɔrɔ wɔɔ m, bala, mɛsim bɩr zum Woso lɛ ʋ y, a b'a dam ma sɔ an zu ʋ y.
Maam sɔ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ Woso nɔ yɩ y.
K'awɔɔ nɩ, mɛsim bɛɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a so awɔɔ ʋ, bala, Woso Ɛspri b'ɩ y'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ. Kʋ gʋaa ba Krista Ɛspri bɩ nɩ, Krista gʋaa bɛɛ n'a zaa nɩ y.
Bɩ, Krista y'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, sɩra m, awɔɔ mɛ bɩ zɛm bɩ ga mimbʋnyaa tɔ ma. Bɩ, kʋ n y'awɔɔ ba tɩrga minto bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri mɩsɩrbaa y'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ Woso k'a Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ Ɛspri y'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, Woso bɩ do, k'a Yeezuu Krista mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ zum kʋ ʋ kan a Ɛspri bɩ kɩ, an mɩsɩrbaa ka awɔɔ mɛ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ga b'ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, pakra bɛɛ m, kʋ wɔɔ n zu mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ b'ʋ dɔ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a ŋʋam bɩ wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ a ba.
Bala, k'awɔɔ y'a mɩsɩrbaa bam a mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ gɩngarɛ, bɩ k'awɔɔ a mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ zibəəro wɔɔ da jɩm ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bam.
Bala, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ Woso Ɛspri n nɩ karɛ ŋ lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ m Woso nyɩnɔ.
Ɛspri kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ bɩr awɔɔ bam lɔnnɔ, k'awɔɔ n a ya a bɩr nyibəə nɔ ʋ y, Ɛspri bɩ do, awɔɔ ba a nawʋm Woso nyɩnɔ, an n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ Woso birm, ʋ ʋ: 'Aba', a jɩ k'a hɩ a ʋ: 'Baaba'.
Ɛspri bɩ do n n'a kam wɔɔ n n'a dɔrɛ ʋ heer ʋ mɩŋŋa, ʋ ʋ, Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m.
Kʋ Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ, wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'ʋ so hɔnta k'a cɩnta wɔɔ m b'ʋ, wɔɔ zɛm b'ʋ so ʋ kan Krista kɩ, bala, kʋ wɔɔ fɩr yɩ kan kɩ, wɔɔ nyɩntam kan kɩ a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ sɔ.
Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʋ, fɩr k'ʋ n'a yɩm her naa b'a dam ma fɩɩgaa, an a makra ba kan lɛbɔʋrɛ kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a hɩnka wɔɔ m bɩ kɩ y.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, durnya nɩ dɔm Woso nyɩnɔ hɩnkarɛ dɔmɩm ma, kan a heer kɩ haay.
Durnya bɩ haay a ba hɔ vam, a bɛɛ y'a ŋʋa maam nɩ y, Woso k'a a da vambaa ma bɩ minto m, bɩ durnya gɔɔta an n'a gɩngam k'a bɩ bɔ vambaa bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Bala, Woso durnya bɩ yɔm vambaa lɔmbaa bɩ wɔ ʋ sɔ k'an zɛkʋra yɩ kan Woso nyɩnɔ wɔɔ soamɩŋŋaʋ kɩ, kan ŋ lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ kɩ sɔ.
A n bɔkarɛ wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, durnya bɩ jilli ɩ fɩr yɩm, an nɩ kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ dɩɩtaa, amba lʋ k'a nɩ nyoosi bam bɩ m.

Durnya bɩ bɛɛ n'a deem nɩ y, wɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm ʋ heer ʋ, dɔ kʋ wɔɔ nawʋm dɔmɩm kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm bɩ wɔɔ ba a nyɩnɔ paan•••rɔ, an wɔɔ mɛ bʋmbɔ bɩ ma. Woso Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka wɔɔ ʋ lɛɛkarɛ ganwʋrɛ, k'ʋ bɔkarɛ ʋ bɩ ganwʋrɛrɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ yɩ.
Bala, wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, bɩ gɩnga nɔ ʋ m. Kʋ gʋaa ɩ hɔ k'a n'a gɩngam k'a b'a yɩ bɩ yɩrɛ a mɩm m, gɩnga bɛɛ m bɩ dɔ y, nka n'a yarɛ an hɔ k'a n'a yɩrɛ a mɩm m gɩnga?
Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ bɩr a yɩrɛ ʋ mɩm m bɩ gɩngarɛ, dɔ wɔɔ nawʋm ma kan bʋraama kɩ.

Maam sɔ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ zɛm sɔ, an n'a dam wɔɔ han, ʋ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ. Bala, kʋ wɔɔ n yaadarɛ dɔ an a ga kʋ ʋ ba bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri mɩŋŋa ɩ yaa dam wɔɔ tɔ ma, hoonsibɔɔrɛ kʋ gʋaa b'a dam ma an a jɩ hɩ nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, Woso k'a hɔ k'a nɩ gʋaa heer ʋ dɔ bɩ, a hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ. Bala, yaa kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a dam wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a da a nawʋm amba Woso n lɛ n taa bɩ m.
Wɔɔ dɔ sɔ, ʋ ʋ, Woso n n'a kam mim haay woo••• nɩ kʋ zɛŋ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ yɩm mɩŋŋa gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ bir amba a a cɩnta bɩ m.
Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso lɛɛ ka, an ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a a cɩnta sɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan a Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, k'a Nyɩ bɩ m yɩ Nyɩ jɩtaarɛ danyɩnɔ cir bireyaa ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso lɛɛ ka an ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a ŋ bir sɔ, ŋ bir k'a ʋ bɩ, a ŋ ba tɩrga, k'a ŋ ba tɩrga bɩ, a ŋ tɔ busu a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ sɔ.
Bɔ wɔɔ n'ʋ yarɛ ʋ a hɩ? Kʋ Woso ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, nka m nɩ bʋrm wɔɔ ra?
Woso n a mɩŋŋa Nyɩnnɩ bɩ bɔ lɛ m y, a a ka ŋn'a zɛ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma. K'a a yo an yɛ naa do ma bɩ, a hɔ haay kam wɔɔ ʋ kan a Nyɩ bɩ kɩ.
Nka m nɩ mim kam gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ra? Gɔsɩ, bala, Woso nɩ ŋ bam tɩrga.
Nka m nɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yarlɛ? Gɔsɩ, bala, Yeezuu Krista ɩ ga, an lɛ da bɩ, a a mɩm bɔ ʋ, an nɩ nyɩntam Woso bɩsɩ ʋ, an nɩ yaa dam wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Nka m nɩ wɔɔ gʋm ŋʋarɛ kʋ Krista n ta m wɔɔ minto bɩ ma? Fɩryɩrɛ m gɛɛ heerzɛkʋma nɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cicir kam wɔɔ ma rɔ m gɛɛ nɔ nɩ, ta dɩgɩbaa m gɛɛ mim kʋsɩ nɩ, gɛɛ zɛ nɩ?
Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ bɩ m, n ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma m, n nɩ wɔɔ zɩnzɛm wakatɩ haay nɔ ʋ, n yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, am seero kʋ ŋ nɩ tam k'a yaa n ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
Bɩ, naa haay nɔ ʋ, damazannɔ paan•••rɔ m wɔɔ m, a zaa k'a wɔɔ ŋʋa bɩ tɔ ma.
Bala, mɔɔ dɔ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, m ʋ: zɛ, gɛɛ mɩsɩrbaa, malɛɛkarɔ gɛɛ paŋŋasoʋrezannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ, hɔ k'an ta ʋ her, gɛɛ an nɩ zɛm booti m, paŋŋazannɔ haay,
mim ʋ paŋŋazannɔ, gɛɛ paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tara ʋ, gɛɛ hɔ kʋ Woso a da haay, sɩ b'a dam ma an wɔɔ gʋ ŋʋarɛ kʋ Woso n ta m, wɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ ma y.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩm, Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ bɩr ŋʋaar barɛ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a zɛ kʋ ra kan mɔɔ heer kɩ, ŋnɩ mɔɔ sɩra bɩ hɩrɛ kasɛtɩ karɛ.
Mɔɔ ɩ heerzaarbarɛ gʋta m, m heer nɩ busum dɔmɩm haay.
Mɔɔ y'a ŋʋam k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Woso kaanm mɔɔ m, m bɩr laatʋ Krista ma, m danyɩnɔ, m zɩrɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ do gʋɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ, naa yɩm ŋ bʋmbɔrɛ.
Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ m Israyɛl zannɔ, Woso n ŋ bɔ ʋ k'a ŋ ba a nyɩnɔ, an a lɛbɔʋrɛ ka ŋ ʋ kan a gʋaasɩbabaa zaarɔ kɩ, a lɛrɔ kɩ, a Woso daʋrɛ zaa kɩ, lerbɔrɛrɔ kɩ.
Ŋ yaabɔɔ m Abraham m, Izakkɩ kan Zakɔɔb kɩ m. Kʋ yɩrɛ nɔ ʋ nɩ, Krista bɩ, ŋ do gʋaa m. Krista mɩŋŋa nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ. A m Woso, a tɔ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ. Amina!
A bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, jɩra Woso ʋ ler k'a bɔ bɩ ra wa, bɩ, Israyɛl yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ haay bɛɛ m Israyɛl do gʋɔɔ paan•••rɔ y,
Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ haay bɛɛ n a nyɩnɔ paan•••rɔ y, bala, Woso a hɩ Abraham m, a ʋ: 'Izakkɩ n n'ɩ nyɩnɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ler bɔ ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ yɩrɛ.'
Naa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: nyɩnɔ kʋ gʋaa nɩ ŋ yɩrɛ, am gʋaa haay hɔ bɩ m bɩ, brɔɔ bɛɛ m Woso nyɩnɔ y, bɩ nyɩnɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ n nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma yaŋŋɔɔ paan•••rɔ.
Ler kʋ Woso a bɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: 'Kʋ dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ cɩnta b'a ku, mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m bʋr, Saara m nyɩyar yɩ.'
Naa bɛɛ n a deem nɩ y, cirgərenyɩnɔ kʋ Rebeka ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ zɩ deem, wɔɔ yaaba Izakkɩ m.

A n bɔkarɛ, Woso y'a mɩŋŋa zaa m, an n'a gʋaa bɔŋ ʋ a hɔɔnhɔ ma, a bɩr dɩgam zi kʋ gʋɔɔ a ba bɩ ma y, dɩga a nawʋm a mɩŋŋa lɛtaama ma, an nɩ gʋɔɔ birm. Woso k'a lɛ n taa kʋ zaa naa do n gɔɔta an bɩr ta ʋ bɩ, an a to nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m yɩ y. Maam bɩ, ŋ n a da ma ŋnɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa, gɛɛ hɔ bʋnyaa ba y.
A n lɛɛ ka nyɩnɔ wɔɔ yɩrɛ ma bɩ, a a hɩ Rebeka m, a ʋ: 'Nyɩnɔ wɔɔ poore bɩ n n'a som jɩtaarɛ b'ʋ.'
Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ Zakɔɔb ŋʋa, m Eso bɔ m jɛ m' bɩ m.
Bɔ wɔɔ kʋ a hɩ? Kʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ, Woso bɩr a zi bam tɩrga ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga!
Bala, Woso a hɩ Moyiisi m, a ʋ: 'Gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, mɔɔ nɩ m ŋʋarɛ zi bam kan kɩ, gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, mɔɔ n'a cicir zɛ m.'
Woso mɩŋŋabaa bɩ bɩr zum kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa hɔɔnhɔ kɩ y, b'a ba a zibəə ma sɔ y. Woso deem an ta ma, kʋ nka a lɛ n taa b'a bɩ zaa cicir zɛ.
Naa minto m Wosoci bɩ n'a hɩ Eziptɩ cir m, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ cɩnta cir kʋ m m paŋŋa bɩ hɩnka, bɩsɩ k'ɩ n'a kam mɔɔ ma bɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ tɔ m bɔ durnya lɛɛ haay ʋ.'
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ nka Woso lɛ n taa, b'a cicir zɛ, kʋ nka a lɛ n taa sɔ, b'a ka sɔ a zaa n a ba bɩsɩkər heerkarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Gʋaa a da ma an a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, bɔ m Woso n a ya, an nɩ həən sim gʋɔɔ ma? Bala, nka n'a dam ma an bɩsɩ ka a hɔɔnhɔ ma?"
Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m gʋaa, bɔ zaa n'ɩbɩɩ m k'ɩ bɩsɩ ka kan Woso kɩ? Taanm y'a hɩm a dɔrɛ zaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ dɔ ncɩnaaʋ gɛ?"
Mɔrdor y'a so ji k'a nɩ zi bam nɩ b'ʋ, a a da ma, an ji deem-deem bɩ yɔɔ an mɔr dɔ m cibsa tɔ ma, an mɔr dɔ m sɔ, dɔmɩm haay zibəə tɔ ma.
Woso a ŋʋa k'a a nɔmaa hɩnka, a a ŋʋa sɔ kʋ n n'a paŋŋa dɔ, an bɔkarɛ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ga dʋdɔyarlɛ m Woso nɔ k'a ma ʋ kan ŋ kɩ bɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ, Woso a gu an bʋr a mɩŋŋa ma, an ŋ dʋdɔ yar y.
K'a lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋtabaa hɩnka gʋɔɔ k'a nɩ ŋ cicir zɛm nɔ wɔɔ m. Lɛɛ a ka an brɔɔ banka k'a lɛbɔʋrɛ ka ŋ ʋ.
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro m wɔɔ m, a n wɔɔ bir zɩɩfʋrɔ barla bala y, wɔɔ bir a ʋ sɔ doro vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ barla.
Naa Woso a hɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ozee ci ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: Do kʋ mɔɔ do bɛɛ m bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩm ma, m do, do kʋ mɔɔ bɩr a ŋʋam biisi bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩm ma, m ŋʋarɛ do.
Lɛɛ kʋ n y'a hɩm nɩ hɔɔ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ do bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m bɩ,' lɛɛ bɩ do n ŋ birŋ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ nyɩnɔ.'
Ezayii Israyɛl do bɩ mim hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: 'Baa kʋ Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ pasɩ, an higʋta lɛ ra nyɩntaayaa m bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ ŋ barla rɔ wɔɔ, bɩ yɩm gʋta y.
Bala, Zuuba hɔ k'a nyɩnta an a hɩ haay bɩ bam tara burə ʋ zɔɔ-zɔɔ.'
Amba Ezayii a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: Kʋ hɔ haay Zuuba bɩ bɛɛ yaŋŋɔɔ to wɔɔ m poore y, bɔ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ ʋ kan Sodɔm kʋ kɩ, ʋ ʋ ba am Gomɔɔr kʋ hɔ bɩ m.
Naa jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ n nyɩnta ŋ n'a ka tɩrgabaa ma rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ tɩrgabaa yɩ, tɩrgabaa k'a a to sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ m.
A n bɔkarɛ, Israyɛl gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam lɛro kʋ ŋ nɩ tɩrgabaa karɛ ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋ n zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ y.
Bɔ minto nɩ? A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Israyɛl n a ka ma k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa Woso mɩm ʋ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ y, a ka a ʋ ma, k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, ŋn'a gəm zɛ, gənzɛrɛ jaa bɩ ma,
amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ bɩ m, n ʋ: K'a dɩga a, mɔɔ ɩ gənzɛrɛ jaa cɩntam Siyɔn ʋ, jaa m, an nɩ gʋaa dom. Bɩ kʋ gʋaa sɩra ka ʋ, a bɩ nyannɩ bɩrɛ y.
M danyɩnɔ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa, m n'a yɛm Woso han bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Bala, mɔɔ m da ma, m a hɩ, m ʋ, ŋ y'a tʋntɔŋ ʋ Woso kama nɔ ʋ, bɩ hɔdɔrɛ ɩ jɩra tʋntɔʋrɛ bɩ do nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ ŋ n Woso k'a nɩ gʋaa bam tɩrga bɩ zaa jɩ dɔ bɩ, a mɩŋŋɔɔ m tɩrgabaa zaa ŋ y'a cɩnta, naa do a ka ŋ n zu zaa kʋ Woso nɩ gʋaa bam tɩrga b'ʋ y.
Bala, Krista hɔ kʋ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta bɩ ba haay an a nya, kɛɛrɛ naa, gʋaa haay k'a sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʋ bɩ, Woso ɩ bɩ zaa bam tɩrga.
Moyiisi tɩrgabaa k'a n'a tom lɛrɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ mim hɩ, a ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'a nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay ʋ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.'
Tɩrgabaa kʋ sɩrakarɛ n'a kam bɩ mim ba n nɩ: 'Ɩ b'a hɩ ɩ heer ʋ, ɩ ʋ, nka n nɩ tam brama?' Naa do naa, a hɩ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, k'ɩ ʋ, nka n nɩ tam brama an a ka Krista m zer?
Ɩ b'a hɩ sɔ, ɩ ʋ, 'nka n nɩ zerm tara noom ʋ?' Ncɩnaaʋ naa, a hɩ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, k'ɩ ʋ, nka n nɩ zerm an a ka Krista m bɔ gəəno bire ʋ?
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ lɔ kɛɛrɛ? A y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: 'Lemim bɩ y'ɩ jɩr ʋ, ɩbɩɩ lɛ kan ɩ heer kɩ an ta ʋ.' A n bɔkarɛ, sɩrakarɛ lemim bɩ do wɔɔ n n'a pa dam naa.
K'ɩbɩɩ bɔ ɩ lɛ ma gʋaa haay lɛɛ, ɩ ʋ, Yeezuu Krista m Zuuba, k'ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka ɩ heer ʋ, ɩ ʋ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, ɩbɩɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ.
Bala, kʋ gʋaa sɩra ka a heer ʋ, bɩ Woso a ba tɩrga. Kʋ gʋaa a sɩrakarɛ bɔ a lɛ ma gʋaa haay lɛɛ, bɩ Woso a zaa bʋmbɔ.
Bala, Wosoci a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Kʋ gʋaa sɩra ka ʋ, a bɩ nyannɩ bɩrɛ y.'
Naa minto bɩ, zɩɩfʋ kan do vanta gʋaa kɩ b'a hʋnhɔ y, ŋ haay Zuuba deem, an nɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bam gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa dam nɩ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Bala, gʋaa biyəə k'a nɩ Zuuba tɔ birm bɩ, a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm.
Bɩ, ŋ y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a bir, kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka ʋ? Ŋ y'a bam lɔ ŋnɩ sɩra ka ʋ, kʋ ŋ n a mim ma? Ŋ y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a mim ma, kʋ gʋaa n a pa da ŋ nɩ?
Bɩ, gʋaa y'a bam lɔ k'a mim pa da, kʋ n n'a nyɔɔ? Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da rɔ wɔɔ leekure ɩ heernyɩnta kam.'
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay bɛɛ lemim nyɩnta bɩ si y. Amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, nka ɩ sɩra ka lemim kʋ wɔɔ pa da b'ʋ?'
Naa minto bɩ, bɔ sɩrakarɛ n nawʋm lemim kʋ gʋaa n'a tʋr kam ma bɩ nɔ ʋ, bɩ lemim bɩ do k'a n'a mam bɩ, Krista lemim m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ laaka dam kɛɛrɛ wa, Israyɛl do bɩ n lemim bɩ ma ra? Ŋ y'a ma sɩɩn! Bala, n y'a da Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Ŋ leer lee ku tara burə haay ra, ŋ meerbaarɔ m ta durnya lɛzojɩ ʋ.'

Mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m laaka da sɔ, Israyɛl do bɩ, an lemim bɩ jɩ ma ra? A lɛɛkarɛ hɔ, Moyiisi a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ y'a karɛ awɔɔ m jɩm ba do kʋ mɔɔ do paan••• bɛɛ m bɩ minto, mɔɔ y'a karɛ awɔɔ nɔ n ma ʋ, do k'a hɔɔn ba ʋ tɔ ma.'
Ezayii n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr a kam mɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ yɩ, mɔɔ m hɩnka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n hɔsɩ yɛ mɔɔ han rɔ wɔɔ m.'
Kʋ Israyɛl mim nɩ, Woso a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Dɔmɩm haay, mɔɔ m wɔ nyɔɔ do k'a bɩr yɛrɛ y, an nɩ bɩsɩ kam bɩ zi.'
Kʋ m m ya, m laaka da wa, Woso bɩ a bɔ a ʋ, a do b'ʋ ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga, mɔɔ n a gɩnga y! Bala, Israyɛl gʋaa m mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m, Abraham yaŋŋa m mɔɔ m, m to mɔɔ ʋ Bɛnzamɛn do bɩ barla.
'Woso n a bɔ a do k'a lɛɛ ka an a bɔ ʋ b'ʋ y.' Awɔɔ hɔ kʋ Wosoci bɩ n'a hɩm Elii k'a bʋr an bɩ Israyɛl mimbʋnyaarɔ k'a ŋ ba rɔ wɔɔ dɩnda Woso m bɩ dɔ.
A a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Zuuba, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ mannɩjaarɔ wɔɔ wurgə, mɔɔ ɩ gɔɔta m deem, ŋn'a kam ma k'a mɔɔ mee bɔ ʋ.'
Bɩ, bɔ Woso a hɩ nɩ? A a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ m gʋɔɔ bɔ ʋ tisi saanhɩna, m hɔ, ŋ n kukurə zɛ, ŋ n yaa da wosobaawɔm Baal nɩ y.'
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, her dɔmɩm naa nɔ ʋ sɔ naa, gʋɔɔ ta ʋ poore, Woso n ŋ bɔ ʋ a hɔɔn n'a ŋʋa tɔ ma.
Ŋ bɔ a ʋ, a hɔɔn n'a ŋʋa tɔ ma, ŋ zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y, kʋ m bɛɛ m, Woso hɔɔn bɔʋrɛ bɩ bɩ yɩm hɔɔn bɔʋrɛ paan••• y.
Kʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ lɔ? Hɔ kʋ Israyɛl n'a kam ma bɩ, an a yɩ y, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a yɩ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ heer karɛ ba, k'a bɩ hɔsɩ jɩ ma y.
Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Woso a ka ŋ hɔɔn n a ta, ŋ mɩm n ta ʋ, bɩ ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y, ŋ tʋr n ta ʋ, bɩ ŋ bɩr mim marɛ y, an ta an her dɔmɩm ku.'
Davɩd a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: 'Kʋ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ n nyɩnta ŋ ma am baŋŋa k'a nɩ hɔ sam bɩ m, am zaŋŋa hɔ bɩ m, kʋ ŋ n'a dundo, ŋnɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩ a n'a gakʋ ʋ kan ŋ zibəəro kɩ.
Kʋ monsigə n ka ŋ mɩm la, kʋ ŋ bɩ lɛɛ yɩ dɔ y, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr kuntəm tee•••.'

Mɔɔ m ya, m nɩ laaka dam, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gəm zɛ naa, a do ŋ y'a ʋ fɩɩga ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga, mɔɔ n a gɩnga y! Bɩ, ŋ kʋrɔma bɩ minto bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, kʋ bɩ n a ka kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m jɩm ba ŋ ma.
A n bɔkarɛ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, ŋ kʋrɔma a ka durnya m hɔnta yɩ, kʋ ŋ terma b'a ka do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m hɔnta yɩ, kʋ ŋ bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, bɩ bɛɛ nɩ zɛm hɔ m an lɛ da ra?
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, m ʋ: kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, an mɔɔ nyɔɔ do vantɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma. Maam bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m zibəə bɩ tɔ busure.
A gɩnga mɔɔ nawʋm maam, kʋ m do gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m jɩm ba, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gɔsɩnnɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Ŋ bɔ kʋ Woso ʋ a rɛ b'a ka durnya n a zɛ kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ, k'a a ya, an ŋ gaa, bɔ n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ? Nyɩnta a nawʋm mɩsɩrbaa, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Woso hɔ m lɛbiisi bur bɩ nɩ, bur bɩ haay Woso hɔ m sɔ. Kʋ Woso hɔ m gɔ bɩ nyim nɩ, Woso y'a so gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro haay ʋ sɔ.

Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gɔ kʋ n n'a bankam mɩŋŋa kɩ, n n'a vəŋŋəro gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛ ra. Kʋ zɩɩfʋ bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ kʋ rɛ kan pooyaa gɔ vəŋŋə kʋ n y'a sa, n n'a naasʋ gɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ bɩncɛ ma kɩ. Maam bɩ, gɔ kʋ n y'a banka bɩ nyinno wɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ tʋrm sɔ.
Naa minto bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ ga m, ɩ gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ gore bɔ ʋ y. Ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ k'ɩ lɛ bɔ ɩ mɩŋŋa ʋ? Ɩbɩɩ bɛɛ m ta gɔ bɩ nyinno wɔɔ nɩ y, gɔ bɩ nyinno wɔɔ m ta ɩbɩɩ m.
A a da ma, ɩbɩɩ n a hɩ mɔɔ m, ɩ ʋ: "Bɩ, gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro zɩnzɛ n y'a ʋ ra, kʋ mɔɔ n ŋ bɩncɛ sa wa."
Sɩra m, n zɩnzɛ n y'a ʋ ra kʋ n y'a do sɩrakarɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma, ɩbɩɩ n ŋ bɩncɛ sa, ɩ sɩrakarɛ minto. Bɩ, dundo ɩ zi, ɩ bɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa busu y, nyi ba.
Bala, zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro paan•••rɔ, bɩ Woso n ŋ to gɔ bɩ ma y, a a da ma an a ba ɩbɩɩ m maam sɔ, a b'ɩbɩɩ tore y.

Dɩga Woso ŋʋarɛ kan a nyaa kɩ zaa ma. A nyaa ta ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩrakarɛ to rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an bɔkarɛ an mɩŋŋa kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ. Bɩ, pakra m k'ɩbɩɩ m gɔɔta a ŋʋarɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɛɛ m, n y'ɩbɩɩ zɛm la, am vəŋŋəro wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
Kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ a bɩsɩkarɛ bɩ to, n y'a yarɛ, n nɩ ŋ cɩnta a bɩncɛ gusire b'ʋ. Bala, Woso a da ma, an a ya an ŋ cɩnta lɛɛ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ʋ hɔɔ b'ʋ.

Ɩbɩɩ kʋ zɩɩfʋ bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʋ kʋ ʋ kan pooyaa gɔ vəŋŋə kʋ n y'a zɛ ra n n'a naasʋ har gɔ kʋ n n'a bankam bɩ kɩ ma, an bɔkarɛ a n a ga m y. Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ, har gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro m, a naanaa an cem kʋ n n'a ya, n nɩ ŋ naasʋ gɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan kɩ hɔɔ bɩ ma.

M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ mim k'a nyaakʋm da naa n nyɩnta awɔɔ ma yirgu y, k'awɔɔ bɩ dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma mindɔrɛzannɔ y. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Israyɛl gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a ba heerkarɛzannɔ, bɩ nyɩnta a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ m tolle ba ŋnɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay ŋ zɛm bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ y'a tom Siyɔn ʋ, a Zakɔɔb yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋrɛ ŋ ma,
gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a darɛ ŋ ma bɩ n naa. Dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ ŋ ma bɩ m.
Kʋ gʋaa k'a dɩga Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gu lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma bɩ ma, a a da ma an a hɩ a ʋ, Woso jɩnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, bɩ, awɔɔ daahan m bɩ, bɩ kʋ Woso gʋaa bɔʋrɛ bɩ nɔ nɩ, Woso ŋ ŋʋa ŋ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Bala, Woso bɩr hɔ k'a a ka bɩ sire y, a bɩr a hɔɔn lʋrm sɔ gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ y.
Biisi bɩ, awɔɔ nyɩnta bɩsɩ ka Woso ma zannɔ, bɩ her naa, Woso awɔɔ cicir zɛ, kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɩsɩ ka ma bɩ tɔ ma.
Her sɔ naa, brɔɔ bɩsɩ ka Woso ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ cicir kʋ n y'a zɛ bɩ jɛ ʋ, kʋ n nɩ ŋ cicir zɛ sɔ.
Bala, Woso a ka gʋɔɔ haay nɩ bɩsɩkarɛ nɔ ʋ, k'a ŋ haay cicir zɛ.
Woso hɔnta, a mindɔrɛ kan a hɔdɔrɛ kɩ nɔyaa ta ʋ gʋta maam-maam! Gɔsɩ b'a dam ma, an hɔ k'a a cɩnta nɔ dɔ y, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma, an a zaarɔ jɩ dɔ y.
Wosoci y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Nka ɩ Zuuba hɔɔndarɛ dɔ? Gɛɛ, nka ɩ nyɩnta a dʋndɔrɛzaa?
Gɛɛ, nka ɩ lɛɛ ka an hɔ ka ʋ, k'an a zɩm ka a zaa ʋ?
Bala, hɔ haay bɩ, a to a ʋ a zi, an ta ʋ a paŋŋa tɔ ma, an ta ʋ a mɩŋŋa tɔ ma. Woso m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay! Amina!
M danyɩnɔ, k'a yo Woso n a ŋʋarɛ zi ba kan awɔɔ kɩ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka Woso ʋ, amba mannɩ k'an mɩsɩr, Woso n a so ʋ, an mɩŋŋa ma bɩ m. Daʋrɛ naa do nɩ Woso nɔ yɩm.
A bɩ zu her durnya naa mɩsɩrbaa zaarɔ ʋ y, bɩ k'a yɛ a zu Woso zaarɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ n a lʋr jilli, an awɔɔ banka. Maam bɩ, awɔɔ Woso hɔnhɔ, hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa, an a nɔ yɩ, an mɩŋŋa paan••• bɩ dɔrɛ.

Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma, mɔɔ m da ma m a hɩ awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə m, m ʋ: a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ m busu a heer ʋ y. Bɩ, gʋaa biyəə n dɩga a mɩŋŋa ma, amba Woso sɩrakarɛ hɔ jir a n'a hɔ ka ʋ bɩ m. B'a b'a ka an bra ba a mɩŋŋa m y.
Gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋə bɩ deem nɩ y, ŋ gʋta, ŋn'a hʋnhɔ sɔ, wɔɔ mɛ vəŋŋəro bɩr zi deem barɛ y.
Ncɩnaaʋ sɔ bɩ, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ m gʋta bɩ, mɛ deem m wɔɔ m Krista zɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ, ʋ nɩ zɛkʋra m kan kʋ kɩ, gʋaa biyəə kan a bɩncɛ kɩ.
Gʋaa biyəə nɩ ganwʋrɛ do m a hʋnhɔ, an a ga kʋ ʋ kan barka kʋ Woso a ka ʋ bɩ kɩ m. Kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʋrɛ nɩ, k'a zaa m bɩr zi bam nɩ, k'an a ga kʋ ʋ kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ.
Kʋ gʋaa vanta ɩ daahan ganwʋrɛ nɩ, k'an bɩr a daahan zi bam, k'a vanta ɩ hɔdɩndarɛ ganwʋrɛ nɩ, k'an a hɔdɩndarɛ zi ba.
Kʋ gʋaa vanta ɩ dʋndɔrɛ ganwʋrɛ nɩ, k'an a zi ba. Gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ kam, k'an a ka kan a heer kɩ haay. Kʋ lɛɛzannɔ n a zi ba mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa, kʋ gʋaa cicirzɛrɛzaa n a cicirzɛrɛ zi ba kan heernyɩnta kɩ.
K'a kʋ ŋʋa sɩra m. K'a sɔ hɔ bʋnyaa m, a zi mɩŋŋa barɛ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ.
K'a bɩr a kam kʋ ŋʋarɛ ma kan a heer kɩ haay, amba danyɩnɔ nɩ kʋ ŋʋam bɩ m. K'a bɩr lɛ zɛm kʋ daʋrɛ ma.
K'a yakʋ to, a Zuuba zi ba kaarɛ-kaarɛ.
K'a heernyɔɔ ba taaheerlɛ nɔ ʋ, a bʋr a ma cicir nɔ ʋ, k'a a yo ʋ yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ.
K'a da wosogʋɔɔ kʋ hɔ jɩra ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ han, k'a bɩ kɔ saanɔɔ sire ma y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ cicir karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ Woso han k'an hɔ mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ. K'a lɛ nyɩnta da gʋɔɔ nʋ, a b'a bʋnyaa da ŋ nʋ y.
K'a heer nyɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a heernyɔɔm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a nyi ka kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi kam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
K'a kʋ ma mɩŋŋa, a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu y. 'A b'a gu zibəə poore barɛ ma y, a bɩ dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma mindonno y.'
A bɩ zi bʋnyaa ba a sompi gʋaa nʋ y. 'K'a a ka ma k'a mɩŋŋa ba gʋɔɔ haay mɩm ʋ.'
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ an ta a ma, k'a a yo ʋ k'a bɩr laafɩɩ m kan gʋɔɔ haay kɩ.
M danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, a b'a zɩm bɔ a zim nɩ y, bɩ k'a to kʋ Woso n a nɔmaa zi ba, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Mɔɔ m Zuuba, mɔɔ nɩ zɩm bɔm, mɔɔ n nɩ gʋaa biyəə hɔ k'a a ga m kaŋ ʋ.'
N y'a ya n a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: 'Bɩ kʋ nɔ y'ɩ jɩm zɛrɛ, k'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʋ k'an a bɩ. Kʋ mɩsɩ y'a zɛm, k'ɩ hi ka ʋ k'an a mi. Bala, a ba k'ɩbɩɩ nawʋm maam bɩ, sɛkɩna ɩbɩɩ n'a karɛ a mim la bɩ.'
Ɩ b'a to mimbʋnyaa m bʋr ɩ ra y, b'a mɩŋŋa ba k'ɩ bʋr a bʋnyaa ra.
Gʋaa haay a ga m, an zu lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɩgam kʋ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʋ. Bala, lɛɛzaa ba ʋ, k'a a to bɛɛ ʋ Woso zi y. Kʋrɔ lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ haay rɔ nɔɔm, Woso yɩ ŋ cɩncɩnta.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ gʋaa bɩsɩ ka lɛɛzannɔ ma, bɩsɩ a ka lɛ kʋ Woso a cɩnta bɩ ma. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ karɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔyarlɛ yɩrɛ.
Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa bam nɔ wɔɔ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ nyi ba lɛɛzannɔ nɩ y, bɩ, a bʋnyaabənno wɔɔ nyi barɛ ŋ nɩ. K'ɩ lɛ baa k'ɩ nyi ba lɛɛzannɔ m, k'ɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔrɛ ɩ ʋ,

bala, Woso zi ŋ n'a bam, k'a ka k'ɩbɩɩ n a mɩŋŋa ba. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ y'a bʋnyaa barɛ, k'ɩ nyi ba ŋ nɩ. Bala, paŋŋa kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m k'a gʋaa hʋnhʋr bɩ, a bɩ vam nɩ y. Woso zi ŋ n'a bam, k'a Woso nɔmaa hɩnka a bʋnyaabarɛzaa m.
Bɩ minto nɩ, gʋaa n a ga m, an zu kʋ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʋ. Kʋ Woso nɔmaa n b'a yɩ minto bɛɛ n'a deem nɩ y. Kʋ heer kɔrɛ bɩ nyɩnta ʋ sɔ y.
Naa tɔ ma m sɔ, awɔɔ n nɩ yawʋrlɔ kam, bala, a sirezannɔ wɔɔ, Woso yɩ ŋ da ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a ba mɩŋŋa.
K'a gʋaa biyəə hɔ k'awɔɔ m ta m ka ʋ. Kʋ yawʋr m, k'a ka a zaa ʋ. Kʋ hɔhɛɛrɛ gɛɛ a sire yawʋr m, k'a ka sɔ. Kʋ gʋaa k'awɔɔ a ga m a lɛ si bɩ nɩ, k'a lɛ si. A n a ga m awɔɔ n a da ʋ bɩ, k'a da ʋ.
Awɔɔ, a b'a ka kʋ gʋaa zɩm m bɩr ta awɔɔ ra y, kʋ bɩ m kʋ ŋʋarɛ m. Gʋaa k'a mim ŋʋa bɩ, a zaa hɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta bɩ ba haay.

Bala, lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ: 'Ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ b'a ka ɩ lɛ m bɩr gʋaa hɔ zi y.' Nawɔnnɔ haay kan lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, a zɛ ŋ yaa ʋ kʋ ra lɛ naa do nɔ ʋ: 'Ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa ŋʋa bɩ m.'
Gʋaa k'a n'a mim ŋʋam bɩ, a bɩr hɔsɩ bʋnyaa bam nɩ y. Bɩ y'a ka, kʋ gʋaa ɩ ŋʋarɛ m, a zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay.
K'awɔɔ dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ m ta ʋ naa mim dɔ bɩ, wakatɩ m, an a ga m k'awɔɔ n gu hinceem ma. Her naa, bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ jɩnjɛɛm wɔɔ ma, an lɛ da dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ sɩŋŋɩda sa ʋ, ʋ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ ma.
Gum da gʋta, dɔmɩrɛ a zɔ, bɩ minto bɩ, ʋ monsigə zibəəro to, ʋ lɛɛgure yarmɔr da ʋ ma.

Ʋ ta sɩra nɔ ʋ, amba a a ga m n nɩ ta sinsebir ʋ bɩ m. Ʋ b'ʋ zɛ kʋ ra k'ʋ hɔ bɩ maam-maam y, k'ʋ hɔ mi maam-maam sɔ y. Ʋ bɩ jaan da y, ʋ bɩ mɛsim zi daŋŋadɔɔ ba y, ʋ bɩ nyaa ba kan kʋ kɩ y, ʋ bɩ jɩmbaa da kʋ ma y.
K'a mɩsɩrbaa daa kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mɩsɩrbaa m bɩ ba, a b'a ya, a a hɔɔn da a mɩŋŋɔɔ m mɛsim mɩsɩrbaa gusire bɩ ma, k'a lɛtaamarɔ ba y.
K'a gʋaa kʋ paŋŋawarzaa m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ si, b'a ba hɔɔndarɛrɔ mim dɩnda bʋnyaa y.
Makra ba n nɩ, gʋaa deem y'a gɩngarɛ a ʋ, a a da ma a hɔ haay bɩ, deem n bɔkarɛ, a sɩrakarɛ paŋŋawar minto bɩ, dʋlɛɛrɔ an ŋ bɩrɛ.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ haay bɩm bɩ n a ga m, an gʋaa k'a bɩr a bɩm bɩ gore bɔ ʋ y, bɩ gʋaa k'a bɩr a bɩm bɩ, a bɩ gʋaa k'a n'a bɩm bɩ dʋdɔ ka y, bala, Woso a zaa si a zi.
Nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ gʋaa vanta zibəənyɩ dʋdɔ ka? K'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, gɛɛ k'a do, a zuuba bɩ mim m bɩ. B'a jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɔ, bala, Zuuba ɩ paŋŋa m k'a ka k'an jɩm.
Makra vanta ba n nɩ sɔ: Gʋaa niŋŋə zi, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ lɛ da kʋ m, a vanta zi, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ hɔdeem. A a ga m kʋ gʋaa biyəə n hɔ k'an ta m a heer ʋ bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa.

Gʋaa k'a nɩ dɩgarɛ a ʋ, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ lɛ da kʋ m bɩ, a ba a nawʋm Zuuba tɔ ma, gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ haay bɩm bɩ, Zuuba tɔ ma m sɔ, bala, a ɩ Woso barka darɛ. Gʋaa k'a bɩr hɔ haay bɩm bɩ, Zuuba tɔ ma m sɔ, an nɩ Woso barka darɛ.
Bala, wɔɔ gʋaa deem ba ʋ, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam a mɩŋŋa minto y, bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ sɔ, an nɩ gam a mɩŋŋa minto sɔ y.
Bala, kʋ wɔɔ mɩsɩr, Zuuba tɔ ma m wɔɔ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam, kʋ wɔɔ gɩnga, gɩnga wɔɔ ʋ Zuuba tɔ ma sɔ. Kʋ wɔɔ mɩsɩr gɛɛ kʋ wɔɔ gɩnga, Zuuba ɩ gɔɔta an a so wɔɔ ʋ.
Bala, a hɩ Krista ʋ k'a nyɩnta gəəno kan mɩsɩɩrɔ kɩ Zuuba, bɩ minto m an ga an a ya an a mɩm bɔ ʋ.
B'ɩbɩɩ, bɔ m ɩ n'ɩ danyɩ dʋdɔ karɛ? B'ɩbɩɩ, bɔ minto m sɔ, ɩ n n'ɩ danyɩ gore bɔŋ ʋ? Wɔɔ haay naa, Woso wɔɔ birm a dʋdɔkarɛ duu bɩ taa, k'a bɩ wɔɔ dʋdɔ ka.
Bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Amba mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zuuba m mɩsɩr denter naa m, mɔɔ y'a hɩ m ʋ: Gʋaa haay kukurə zɛrɛ m taa, gʋaa biyəə yaa darɛ, an a leer busu an a hɩ, a ʋ, mɔɔ m Woso.
Maam bɩ, wɔɔ gʋaa biyəə y'a mɩŋŋa mim nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ Woso taa.
Ʋ b'ʋ ya, ʋ kʋ dʋdɔ yar y. Bɩ, k'a ka ma k'a bɩ hɔsɩ ba fɩɩga k'an a ka, k'a danyɩ n a do, gɛɛ an mimbʋnyaa ba y.
Zuuba Yeezuu zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa m heer ʋ, m ʋ, hɔsɩ ba ʋ an dintim nɩ y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a hɔɔn da, a ʋ, hɔ naa do dintim m, a ba a nawʋm dintim a mɩŋŋa ma.
K'ɩbɩɩ ka ɩ danyɩ heer n a zar hɔbɩrɛ tɔkkɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a bɩm tɔ ma, ɩbɩɩ bɩr tam ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ dɔ y. Ɩ b'a ka kʋ gʋaa kʋ Krista ga a tɔ ma bɩ m nyaam ɩ hɔ k'ɩ n'a bɩm bɩ tɔ ma y.
A b'a ka hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa awɔɔ ma bɩ m bʋr tɔ bɔrɛ m awɔɔ jɛ ʋ y.
Bala, Woso cirbəə bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ kan hɔmire kɩ mim bɛɛ y, tɩrgabaa kan laafɩɩ kɩ, heernyɩnta kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ kɩ mim m.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ Krista zi barɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Woso nɔ ɩ yɩm la, gʋɔɔ n'a ŋʋam sɔ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʋ ʋ ka hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm laafɩɩ m kan wɔɔ haay sɩrakarɛ talɛɛ kɩ bɩ ma.
Ɩ bɩ Woso zibəə zar hɔbɩrɛ tɔ ma y. Hɔ haay mɩŋŋa, sɩra m, bɩ, kʋ gʋaa hɔ niŋŋə k'a nɩ zɛm gʋaa vanta dore m bɩ bɩ, a bʋnyaa.
Hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ ba n nɩ: Kʋ sim sʋrɛ, gɛɛ bɛɛ mire, gɛɛ hɔ vanta barɛ y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ danyɩ n'a do, ɩ b'a ba y.
Ɩ sɩrakarɛ k'ɩ n ta m hɔ bɩ do minto bɩ to ɩ zi, Woso lɛɛ. Heernyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a n'a ŋʋam k'a mim ba b'a heer bɩr a dʋdɔ yarm bɩ m.
Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ bɩm an bɔkarɛ a heer nɩ sɩnsɩm kam hɔ bɩ do ma bɩ, Woso a dʋdɔ yar, bala, a zibəə bɩ n a to heer sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ y. A n bɔkarɛ hɔ haay k'a n a to heer sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, mimbʋnyaa m.
Wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ paŋŋa m ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ʋ b'ʋ ka ʋ hɔɔnhɔ lɛtaama barɛ ma y. Bɩ, k'ʋ ʋ da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba paŋŋa bɩ do m nɔ wɔɔ han a paŋŋawar bɩ nɔ ʋ.
A a ga m kʋ gʋaa biyəə n a ka ma k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa a mim tɔ ma, a daahan kan a sɩrakarɛ kɩ dara minto.
Bala, Krista n a ka hɔ k'a mɩŋŋa nɔ yɩ ma y, bɩ, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: 'Ɩbɩɩ sʋnsɔrɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a wʋm nɔ wɔɔ a ba mɔɔ sʋnsɔrɔ.'
A n bɔkarɛ, hɔ kʋ n lɛɛ ka n n'a gʋrsɩra ba haay bɩ, a ba n y'a ʋ kʋ wɔɔ m hɔ dɔ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, bʋraama kan heerwʋtarɛ kʋ Wosoci bɩ n'a kam bɩ tɔ ma, wɔɔ ʋ da ma ʋ nyasʋ taaheerlɛ m.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ Woso k'a a so bʋraama ʋ kan heerwʋtarɛ kɩ bɩ n a ka k'awɔɔ m bɩr hɔɔndarɛ deem m kan kʋ kɩ, amba Krista Yeezuu lɛ n taa bɩ m,
k'a a da ma, a a lɛ bɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Zɩ kʋ Woso m b'ʋ, zɛkʋra deem nɔ ʋ, leer deem m.
K'a bɩr kʋ sim mɩŋŋa, amba Krista awɔɔ si bɩ m, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ tɔ ma.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m paan••• Krista bɩ, a ba a ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ zibəənyɩ, k'a a da ma a ka kʋ Woso lerbɔrɛrɔ ŋ yaabɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ŋ kʋ yɩ, k'a Woso sɩra hɩnka maam.
Bʋr a ʋ sɔ, kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, a mɩŋŋabaa tɔ ma, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ doro bire ʋ, mɔɔ laa lɔm m ɩ tɔ da ʋ.
Wosoci b'a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: Doro vantɔɔ, k'a a heer nyɔɔ kan Zuuba do bɩ kɩ.
A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: Doro haay, k'a a lɛ bɔ Zuuba ʋ. Kʋrɔ haay gʋɔɔ, k'a lɛ bɔ ʋ sɔ.
Ezayii ci a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Yese yaŋŋa bɩ zɛm, a wutire an ka doro lɛɛ, doro wɔɔ n yo ma.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ Woso k'a so taaheerlɛ ʋ bɩ n a ka, k'awɔɔ n'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka ʋ, bɩ k'a n'a ka sɔ, kʋ heernyɔɔ kan laafɩɩ kɩ n'awɔɔ han gʋta, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa tɔ ma.
M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa m ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ mɩŋŋabaa m gʋta, a hɔ k'a a ga dɔrɛ m haay dɔ, an n'a dam ma a kʋ dʋndɔ.
A n bɔkarɛ, ci naa do nɔ ʋ naa, mɔɔ lɛɛ niŋŋoo gʋrsɩra ba kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔɔ niŋŋoo tɔ da awɔɔ nɔ ʋ. A ba mɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, barka niŋŋə kʋ Woso a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto.

Woso a k'a mɔɔ n Krista Yeezuu zi ba, amba wosomannɩbər hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ zibəə bɩ do, lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ m. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ ka ŋ ʋ mannɩ ganwʋrɛ, kʋ bɩ n Woso nɔ yɩ, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer la, k'an yɩ mɩŋŋa.
Krista Yeezuu zɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ m da ma, m m heer nyɔɔ, Woso zi kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ tɔ ma.
Kʋ mɔɔ kʋ m hɔ niŋŋə mim hɩ, hɔ kʋ Krista a ka mɔɔ n a ba kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m zu Woso ʋ bɩ m. Naa ba a ʋ, meerbaarɔ kan zibəəro kɩ nɔ ʋ,
hoserlo kan makrarɔ paŋŋa kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ nɔ ʋ. Yɩ a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ, mɔɔ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da lɛɛ haay ʋ mɩŋŋa, an a sa Zerizalɛm ma an ta Iliiri kʋrɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, lɛɛrɔ kʋ n nɩ Krista mim ma ʋ cɩna rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da ŋ ʋ. A ba mɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m zi ba lɛɛ kʋ gʋaa lɛɛ ka an zibəə sɩŋŋɩda sa ʋ tɔ ma.
Hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ mɔɔ ba, n ʋ: Gʋɔɔ kʋ n n'a mim dɩnda ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a yɩm, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n hɔsɩ ma a mim nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ y'a mim jɩ dɔrɛ.'
Naa do ɩ tɩr a nya mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ bɩr m dam ma m nɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi y.
Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ zibəə nya kʋrɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ. A dɔɔraa laatʋ mɔɔ n n'a ŋʋam kʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi.
Kʋ mɔɔ bʋr m nɩ tam Ɛspanyɩ ʋ, mɔɔ bɔm b'ʋ. A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ m bɩ dɩga awɔɔ ma. Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ zer awɔɔ ra, m nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ m a ga m tɛkka m, k'awɔɔ m dɩga mɔɔ zaa bɩ sarɛ mim ma, kʋ m cem.
Her-her naa, ta mɔɔ nawʋm Zerizalɛm ʋ, daahan m, wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Bala, Masedʋan kʋ bɩ kan Akayii kʋ bɩ kɩ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ lɛ sa, k'a busoo zɩnzɛ kʋ ra, a ka Zerizalɛm wosogʋɔɔ ŋʋazannɔ wɔɔ ʋ.

Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ɩ lɛ bɩ sa a zim, bɩ sɩra nɔ ʋ, cicirzannɔ wɔɔ duro a ga hɔ naa do yɩrɛ m ŋ zi, bala, Krista gʋɔɔ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ n ŋ mɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a Woso dɔrɛhɔ jir kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ Krista gʋɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ a ga m ŋn'a da ŋ han kan hɔnta kʋ ŋ nɩ tam bɩ kɩ sɔ.
Kʋ mɔɔ zi naa do ba m a nya, m zɩnzɛkʋra busoo bɩ ka ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ bɔrɛ awɔɔ zi, m cem m ta Ɛspanyɩ ʋ.
Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ bʋr m nɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi, zɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kan Krista barka gʋta kɩ.
M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, kan ŋʋarɛ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n n'a kam bɩ kɩ minto, k'a yar ba kan mɔɔ kɩ a yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ.
K'a yaa da, kʋ basɩrakarɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ b'a da mɔɔ ma y. Bɩ, kʋ wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m daahan kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ tam nɩ bɩ si mɩŋŋa.
K'a n bɩr yɩrɛ ʋ, kʋ Woso yɛ sɔ, mɔɔ lee kure awɔɔ zi heernyɔɔ gʋta m, m hoon si awɔɔ bire ʋ.
Kʋ Woso k'a nɩ laafɩɩ kam bɩ m bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ. Amina!
Wɔɔ danlʋ Febe k'a nɩ zi bam Sankre kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ n'a hɩ m, a kasɛtɩ mɩŋŋa.
K'a si a zi Zuuba tɔ ma, amba a a ga barɛ m wosogʋɔɔ kan kʋ kɩ bire ʋ bɩ m, k'a bʋr a lɛ n taa awɔɔ daahan ma, k'a a da han a mim haay nɔ ʋ. A mɩŋŋa a da gʋɔɔ han gʋta, a a da mɔɔ mɩŋŋa han sɔ.
K'a yaa da Priska kan Akilas kɩ m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ m Krista Yeezuu zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Ŋ y'a mɩŋŋɔɔ mee ka zɛ ma, k'a mɔɔ bɔ lɛm. Mɔɔ yɩ m deem bɛɛ nɩ ŋ barka darɛ y, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ haay yɩ ŋ barka dam sɔ.
K'a yaa da sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ n'a som kʋ ma ŋ har ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m. K'a yaa da mɔɔ gʋaasɩba Epayinɛtɩ bɩ m, a ɩ lɛɛ ka an sɩra ka Krista ʋ Azii kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
K'a yaa da Maarii k'a zi ba gʋta awɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ m.
K'a yaa da Andronikus kan Zuniyas kɩ m, mɔɔ danyɩnɔ m, bɩ, n nyɩnta n nɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ. Kristazibəəzannɔ wɩsɩrɔ m, ŋ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m ŋn'a ba kristagʋɔɔ.
K'a yaa da Ampliyatus m, mɔɔ ŋʋarɛzaa m Zuuba zuure nɔ ʋ.
K'a yaa da Urbɛn m, wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m Krista zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ, kan mɔɔ ŋʋarɛzaa Sɩtakɩs kɩ m.
K'a yaa da Apelɛs m, a a sɩra ka Krista ʋ hɩnka hɔ gʋta nɔ ʋ. K'a yaa da Aristobul hargʋɔɔ m.
K'a yaa da Herodɩnyɔ m, mɔɔ danyɩ m. K'a yaa da Narsis hargʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Zuuba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
K'a yaa da Trifɛn kan Trifozɩ kɩ m, Zuuba zi ŋn'a bam. K'a yaa da Pɛrzidɩ m mɩŋŋa, a zi ba gʋta Zuuba tɔ ma.
K'a yaa da Rufus m, Zuuba zibəənyɩ wɩsɩ m. K'a yaa da a da bɩ m, mɔɔ da m sɔ.
K'a yaa da Asɩnkritɩ m, Flegɔn m, Hermɛs m, Patrobas m, Hermas m, kan danyɩnɔ vantɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m.
K'a yaa da Filolɔg kan Zuli kɩ m, Neere kan a danlʋ kɩ m, Olɩmpas kan wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m haay.
K'a yaa da kʋ m mɩŋŋa danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ, kan kʋ daʋrɛ kɩ, ŋʋarɛ kɩ. Krista sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'a dundo a zi, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ gʋngʋ kʋ ma zi bam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ sɩrakarɛzannɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ m, bɩsɩ kʋ ŋ n'a kam hɔdɩndarɛ k'awɔɔ yɩ bɩ ma. K'a gʋ ŋ ma laatʋ.
Bala, gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ, Zuuba Krista zi bɛɛ ŋ n'a barɛ y, a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɔ zi ŋn'a bam. Bra ŋ n'a bam bahɔdonno m, meerbaarɔ nyɩntɔɔ kan a ŋʋaar mindɩndarɛrɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ.

Gʋaa haay a dɔ, a ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm Zuuba ma. Mɔɔ heer nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ naa tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ m yɩ mindɔrɛzannɔ, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ nɔ ʋ. K'a yɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ mim bɩr zar darɛ ŋ ma zannɔ, mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ.
Woso k'a a so laafɩɩ ʋ bɩ Sʋtaana hɔɔnsɩrɛ awɔɔ gannɔ taa dɩɩtaa. Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu barka m bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn Timote ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ danyɩnɔ Lusiyus, Zasɔn, kan Sosipatɛɛr k'ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Tɛɛrtiyus, kʋ Pol a da ci naa do barɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m Zuuba k'a nɩ wɔɔ zɛm kʋ ra bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Gayus k'a mɔɔ si a har ʋ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ haay n nɩ kʋ zɛŋ ʋ a har ʋ b'ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. Erastɩ, kʋ bɩ busoocɩntər bɩ, kan Kaartus kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ a m. [
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka m nyɩnta kan awɔɔ haay kɩ. Amina!]

Woso ɩ paŋŋa m k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa da ra, amba lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ n n'a pa dam bɩ n n'a hɩm bɩ m, Yeezuu Krista lemim kʋ mɔɔ n'a pa dam, Woso hɔ k'a nyaakʋm da gɔsɩ n a dɔ y, an a hɩnka wɔɔ m, ʋ a dɔ bɩ m. Hɔ bɩ do Woso nyɩnta an a nyaakʋm da biisi tee••• bɩ,
kɛɛrɛ naa, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ciro wɔɔ a hɩnka lɛɛgure nɔ ʋ gʋaa haay m, amba Woso k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ lɛ ka bɩ m, a lɛ ka kʋ n nɩ ta m doro haay zi kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka, ŋnɩ zu ʋ.
Kʋ Woso y'a deem k'an ta mindɔrɛ m bɩ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, dɔmɩm haay! Amina!
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso ɩ mɔɔ bir a hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʋ kʋ m yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa, mɔɔ m kan wɔɔ danyɩ Sɔstɛn kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ bam.

A ba wɔɔ nawʋm Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma k'a nɩ Korɛntɩ ʋ bɩ ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ a hɔ Krista Yeezuu zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, an ŋ bir kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba rɔ wɔɔ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ haay ʋ, ŋnɩ yaa dam wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Yeezuu mɩŋŋa m brɔɔ Zuuba, a m wɔɔ Zuuba sɔ.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso, kan wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ m barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka dɔmɩm haay awɔɔ tɔ ma, barka k'a ka awɔɔ ʋ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ minto.
Bala, a tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ Woso ganwʋrɛrɔ do haay yɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ lemim, kan hɔdɔrɛ kɩ ganwʋrɛrɔ m.
A n ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, Krista kasɛtɩ bɩ paŋŋa yɩ awɔɔ zi,
bɩ n a ka Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛ sɩ n jɩra awɔɔ ma y, awɔɔ k'a nɩ dɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista hɩnkarɛ dɔmɩm ma rɔ wɔɔ.
A mɩŋŋa n nɩ paŋŋa karɛ awɔɔ ʋ k'an ta an dɔmɩnnɔ nyarɛ ku, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hinni kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ bɩ, kʋ hɔsɩ minsi bɩ nyɩnta awɔɔ gʋr zi y.
Woso k'a awɔɔ bir, k'awɔɔ m zɛkʋra yɩ kan a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba m bɩ kɩ bɩ, taalɛrazaa m.
M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, k'a kʋ ma, a b'a ka gʋngʋrɛ n nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʋ y, k'a zɛ kʋ ra a bɩr hɔɔn deem m, kan hɔɔndarɛ deem kɩ m.
Bala, m danyɩnɔ, Kolowe gʋɔɔ a dɩnda mɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ, awɔɔ bɩr kʋ marɛ y.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ: "Pol gʋaa n mɔɔ m, naa zaa a ʋ, Apolɔs gʋaa n mɔɔ m, naa ʋ, Sefas gʋaa n mɔɔ m. Naa a ya, a ʋ, Krista gʋaa n mɔɔ m."
Krista a gʋngʋ ra? Pol n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma awɔɔ minto ra? Pol tɔ minto m n nɩ batɛm ka awɔɔ ʋ ra?
Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka, bala mɔɔ n batɛm ka awɔɔ gɔsɩ ʋ, kʋ Krispus kan Gayus kɩ bɛɛ y.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, awɔɔ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a hɩ a ʋ, mɔɔ batɛm ka a ʋ, m tɔ ra y.
Mɔɔ batɛm ka Stefanas har gʋɔɔ ʋ sɔ, kʋ naa bɛɛ y, mɔɔ n batɛm ka gʋaa vanta ʋ m a dɔ y.
Bala, Krista n mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʋ m bɩ batɛm ka y, mɔɔ nyɔɔ a ʋ kʋ m bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da. Mɔɔ n yo mindɔrɛ ma m n'a pa bɩ darɛ y. A ba mɔɔ ʋ maam kʋ Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ bɩ bɔ vam y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ ɩ dɩgam lemim kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam, ʋ n'a hɩm, ʋ ʋ, Krista ga gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ ma hɔɔzaabaa lemim. Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Woso paŋŋa m gɔdarkʋra lemim bɩ m.
Bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Mɔɔ mindɔrɛzannɔ mindɔrɛ zaar bam, m hɔɔntaʋrɛzannɔ hɔɔn zaar ba."
Mindɔrɛzaa ɩ ka? Lɛrɔ karɩnsaamba ɩ ka? Her durnya naa do meerbaawaasɩzaa ɩ ka? Woso a ka durnya mindɔrɛ n a ba hɔɔzaabaa mim.
Bala, Woso hɔɔn bɔ ʋ a mɩŋŋa mindɔrɛ nɔ ʋ, kʋ durnya b'a da ma an a dɔ durnya mindɔrɛ nɩ y, bɩ, k'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra kam nɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ hɔɔzaabaa lemim padarɛ bɩ m.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ, a ka brɔɔ n nawʋm hoserlo ma, grɛkkɩrɔ wɔɔ n'a kam mindɔrɛ ma,
bɩ wɔɔ, Krista kʋ n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ wɔɔ n'a pa dam, zɩɩfʋrɔ ɩ dɩgam naa ma nyannɩ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma hɔɔzaabaa.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ m, gɛɛ grɛkkɩrɔ nɩ, Krista kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam b'ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Woso paŋŋa m, bɩ Woso mindɔrɛ m sɔ.
Bala, hɔ k'a bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, Woso hɔɔzaabaa m bɩ, hɔ bɩ do hɔɔntaʋrɛ lɛ da gʋɔɔ mindɔrɛ m, sɔ bɩ, hɔ k'a bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, Woso paŋŋawar m bɩ, a paŋŋa lɛ da gʋɔɔ paŋŋa m.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa k'a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ kʋ Woso a bir lɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ barla, gʋɔɔ ba ʋ gʋta ŋnɩ mindɔrɛzannɔ durnya mɩm ʋ y, ŋnɩ paŋŋazannɔ sɔ y, ŋnɩ har wɩsɩ gʋɔɔ y.
Bɩ, hɔ kʋ hɔɔzaabaa m durnya ʋ bɩ, Woso bɩ sa, k'a nyannɩ da mindɔrɛzannɔ ma, hɔ kʋ paŋŋawar m durnya nɔ ʋ bɩ, Woso bɩ sa, k'a nyannɩ da hɔ k'a nɩ paŋŋa m bɩ ma.
Hɔ k'a bɩ zore an yaarsɩ durnya ʋ bɩ, hɔ k'a nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ bɩ, Woso hɔ bɩ do sa, k'a nyaam hɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma hɔ bɩ m,
kʋ gɔsɩ b'a da ma an a mɩŋŋa busu Woso lɛɛ y.

Woso mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m, awɔɔ m zɛkʋra yɩ kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ, a mɩŋŋa y'a ba wɔɔ mindɔrɛ k'a a to Woso zi, a ɩ wɔɔ ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ, an n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Woso tɔ ma, an nɩ wɔɔ bʋmbɔm mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ n kʋ yɩ, n ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a ʋ, k'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ, a b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ y, an a lɛ bɔ hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba b'ʋ.
M danyɩnɔ, bʋr kʋ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi bɩ, mɔɔ n bʋr lɛmindɔrɛ m gɛɛ mindɔrɛ m kʋ m bɩ Woso kasɛtɩ bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ y.
Bala, mɔɔ hɔɔn bɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɩ hɔsɩ mim dɩnda awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, kʋ Yeezuu Krista mim bɛɛ y, an lɛ da bɩ a wɔ kʋ n y'a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ mim m.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, mɔɔ n nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʋ, paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, dabɔʋ nɔ ʋ, kan mɛhinkəre kɩ.
Mɔɔ meerbaa kan mɔɔ pa bɩ darɛ kɩ n nyɩnta lɛmindɔrɛ meerbaa nɔ ʋ y, bɩ nyɩnta ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa zibəə hɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Nyɩnta a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ bɩ yo gʋɔɔ mindɔrɛ ma y, bɩ k'an yo Woso paŋŋa ma.
A n bɔkarɛ, mindɔrɛ paan••• wɔɔ n'a dɩndam kristagʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩrakarɛ yaa ka rɔ wɔɔ m. Mindɔrɛ naa do n a to durnya naa do nɔ ʋ, b'a n a to durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ b'a zaar bam nɔ wɔɔ zi y.
Woso mindɔrɛ wɔɔ n'a dɩndam, hɔ k'a n dɔ biisi m, n n a nyaakʋm da, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta an a cɩnta, bɩ ma bɩ durnya ba ʋ y, kʋ wɔɔ n bɩ nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
Durnya naa do paŋŋazannɔ gɔsɩ n nyɩnta an a dɔ y, bala, k'a dɔ ŋ y'a ʋ, ŋ bɩ Zuuba k'a a so lɛbɔʋrɛ ʋ bɩ wɔm gɔdarkʋra ma y.
Bɩ, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Hɔ kʋ gʋaa mɩm n a yɩ cɩna y, a tʋr n a ma cɩna y, hɔ kʋ gʋaa n a hɔɔn da ma cɩna y, hɔ bɩ do haay Woso a cɩnta gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ m."
Denter m, wɔɔ, Woso hɔ bɩ do hɩnka wɔɔ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ. Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ hɔ haay taa zɛm, baa hɔ kʋ Woso a nyaakʋm da paan••• haay, a y'a taa zɛm sɔ.
Nka m nɩ gʋɔɔ barla, an gʋɔɔ mim dɔ? K'a maam, hɔɔn k'a nɩ kan kɩ bɩ m. Maam sɔ bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ Woso gʋr zi bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a dɔ kʋ Woso Ɛspri bɛɛ y.
Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ n durnya ɛspri yɩ y, bɩ, Woso Ɛspri wɔɔ yɩ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma ʋ Woso barka ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ.
Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ yɩ ŋ mim dɩndam, wɔɔ bɩr a dɩndam gʋaa mindɔrɛ nɩ y, bɩ, a dɩnda wɔɔ nawʋm Sɛnt-Ɛspri mindɔrɛ m, ʋ nɩ Woso hɔɔ jɩ dɩndam, Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔdɩndarɛ m.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ mɛsim hɔɔn m bala bɩ, a bɩr yɛm hɔ k'a a to Woso Ɛspri zi bɩ ma y. Hɔɔzaabaa m kan kɩ, a b'a dam ma an a jɩ ma y, bala, Woso Ɛspri n'a dam ma an a ka gʋaa n a dɔ.
Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso Ɛspri m bɩ, a ɩ hɔ haay dʋdɔ kam bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dʋdɔ karɛ y.
Bala, n y'a da Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Nka ɩ Woso hɔɔndarɛ dɔ, k'a hɔ dɩnda nɩ?" A n bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ, Krista hɔɔndarɛ wɔɔ n ta m.

M danyɩnɔ, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ n wɔ ʋ m meer ba kan awɔɔ kɩ amba n tɩr a ba kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso Ɛspri m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɩ y, bɩ meer bɩ ba mɔɔ ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ amba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ durnya mɩsɩrbaa bam nɔ wɔɔ m, bala, awɔɔ gɔɔta a m banfinnirɔ Krista sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Nyonhi mɔɔ ka awɔɔ ʋ, hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɛɛ y, bala, awɔɔ b'a dam ma cɩna a hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩ y. Baa kan dɩɩtaa dɔmɩm kɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩ y.
Bala, awɔɔ gɔɔta an nɩ durnya mɩsɩrbaa bam. Jɩmbaa kan nyaa kɩ y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, naa bɩr a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, awɔɔ gɔɔta an nɩ durnya mɩsɩrbaa bam, an nɩ tam am gʋaa k'an Woso dɔ m naa?
K'awɔɔ gʋaa deem tɩr a hɩ, a ʋ: "Pol gʋaa m mɔɔ m", gʋaa vanta ʋ: "Apolɔs y'a so mɔɔ ʋ", naa k'awɔɔ n'a bam naa, gʋaa k'an Woso dɔ zibəə bɛɛ awɔɔ n'a bam naa?
Nka m Apolɔs nɩ? Nka m Pol nɩ? Zibəənyɩnɔ m, Woso nɩ ŋ nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka Krista ʋ, n gʋaa biyəə a zi ba amba Zuuba a da ʋ bɩ m.
Apolɔs kan mɔɔ kɩ, bɔ wɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ kan danwunno kɩ. Mɔɔ ɩ Woso lemim bɩ duu, Apolɔs n hi da ra, Woso y'a ka an ma.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m gʋaa k'a n'a duum bɩ nɩ y, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m gʋaa k'a nɩ hi dam la bɩ m sɔ y, Woso k'a ka hɔ bɩ nɩ mam b'ɩ lɛ da haay.
Gʋaa k'a n'a duum kan gʋaa k'a nɩ hi dam la bɩ kɩ, ŋ hɔdeem, bɩ, gʋaa biyəə y'a yawʋra yɩm an a ga kʋ ʋ kan a mɩŋŋa zibəə kɩ.
Bala, zi wɔɔ n'a bam kan kʋ kɩ Woso zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ, b'awɔɔ m hɔsɩra kʋ Woso n'a wʋm. Awɔɔ m cɛ kʋ Woso n n'a dɔ m.

Amba cɛdɔrɛzaa mɩŋŋa m bɩ, mɔɔ cɛ bɩ jɩr cɩnta an a ga kʋ ʋ kan ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ, gʋaa vanta m bɔkarɛ an n'a dɔm lɛ. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa biyəə n dundo a zi kan zaa k'a sa an nɩ cɛ bɩ dɔm nɩ m bɩ kɩ.
Kʋ cɛ bɩ jɩr bɩ nɩ, gʋaa b'a dam ma, an cɛjɩr vanta da fɩɩga y, cɛjɩr k'an ta ʋ hɔɔ tee••• bɩ nɩ gɔɔtarɛ a bɩncɛ ʋ, cɛjɩr bɩ do, Yeezuu Krista m.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa cɛ dɔ cɛjɩr bɩ rɛ sarma mɔr m, gɛɛ wanzurfu m, gɛɛ jaa tɔzannɔ m, gɛɛ gɔ m, gɛɛ bur m, gɛɛ haaʋ m,
Woso y'a zaa zibəə makra barɛ an dɩga a dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ. Woso gʋaa biyəə zibəə makra bam sɛ m, sɛ nɩ gʋaa biyəə zibəə k'an lʋnlɔ hɩnkarɛ, bɩ gʋaa biyəə n n'a zibəə mɩŋŋabaa gɛɛ a bʋnyaabaa dɔm ma.
Gʋaa kʋ sɛ bɩ b'a zibəə bɩm bɩ, bɩ zaa y'a zibəə ganwʋrɛ yɩm.
Bɩ gʋaa kʋ sɛ bɩ n'a zibəə bɩm bɩ, a b'a zibəə ganwʋrɛ yɩrɛ y, a mɩŋŋa bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm, bɩ, bɔ a nawʋm kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, bɔ a ʋ sɛ nɔ ʋ.
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, Wosocɛ n'awɔɔ m, Woso Ɛspri bɩ nɩ kan a kɩ ra?
Kʋ gʋaa Wosocɛ bɩ zaar ba, Woso bɩ zaa zaar bam sɔ. Bala, Wosocɛ bɩ Woso hɔ m, bɩ cɛ bɩ do bɩ n'awɔɔ m.
Gɔsɩ bɩ bra ba a mɩŋŋa nɩ y. K'awɔɔ gʋaa deem ʋ, a hɔɔn ka amba durnya naa do hɔ bɩ nɩ, k'a n'a ba hɔɔzaa k'an bɔkarɛ an hɔɔn ka.
Bala, durnya naa do mindɔrɛ bɩ, hɔɔzaabaa m Woso mɩm ʋ. Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ sɔ, n ʋ: "Woso ɩ mindɔrɛzannɔ kum hɔɔnkarɛ zi kʋ ŋ n'a bam bɩ nɔ ʋ."
N y'a ya, n n a gʋrsɩra ba sɔ, n ʋ: "Zuuba mindɔrɛzannɔ hɔɔndarɛrɔ dɔ. A a dɔ a ʋ, ŋ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y."
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ, gʋɔɔ tɔ ma y, bala, awɔɔ hɔ m hɔ haay m.
Kʋ Pol m, gɛɛ Apolɔs m, gɛɛ Sefas m, awɔɔ hɔɔ m, kʋ durnya m gɛɛ mɩsɩrbaa m, gɛɛ zɛ m, kʋ her-her dɔmɩm naa m, gɛɛ bootirɔ dɔmɩnnɔ m, woo••• naa awɔɔ hɔ m.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ nɩ, Krista y'a so awɔɔ ʋ, Woso n a so Krista ʋ.
A a ga m, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a dɔ ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ kan Apolɔs kɩ bɩ, Krista zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m, Woso n a minno k'a ŋ nyaakʋm da biisi bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n ŋ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m.
Kʋ n hɔ da gʋaa wɔ ʋ k'a n dɩga a mim ma, hɔ kʋ n'a kam ma k'a zaa bɩ n a ba kɛɛrɛ bɩ, sɩrabarɛ m.
Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m kan mɔɔ kɩ k'awɔɔ mɔɔ dʋdɔ yar, gɛɛ gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ mɔɔ dʋdɔ yar y. Mɔɔ bɩr m mɩŋŋa dʋdɔ yarlɛ m zim sɔ y.
Sɩra m, mɔɔ n kʋrɔma yɩ m heer ʋ an nɩ mɔɔ kɔrɛ y, bɩ naa bɛɛ n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, mim ba mɔɔ ma wa. Gʋaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ dʋdɔ kam bɩ, Zuuba m.

Bɩ minto bɩ, a bɩ lɛɛ ka a gɔsɩ dʋdɔ ka y, k'a to kʋ Zuuba n a bɔ an bʋr, k'a b'a bɔ an bʋr, a hɔ gaam hɔ k'a nyaakʋm da monsigə ʋ ra, an bɔ hɔ haay kʋ gʋɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ a nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m garga ra. Maam bɩ, Woso y'a lɛ bɔm gʋaa biyəə ʋ, amba a a ga m bɩ m.

M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma m, mɔɔ n naa dɩnda, m makra sa Apolɔs kan mɔɔ kɩ ma, k'awɔɔ n wɔɔ hɔbaa sa, a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu a cem hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ han y. Awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ yo gʋaa vanta ma k'a a mɩŋŋa busu, a gʋaa vanta gore bɔ ʋ y.
Bala, gʋaa ra, nka y'a ka ɩbɩɩ m lɛ da ɩ muno nɩ? Bɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ ɩ zim k'a ka bɛɛ n y'a ʋ ɩbɩɩ ʋ? Bɩ k'a ka n y'a ʋ ɩbɩɩ ʋ, bɔ m, ɩ n'ɩ mɩŋŋa busurɛ ɩ ʋ, a yɩ ɩ ʋ ɩ zim nɩ?
Ʋn'hʋʋn•••, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ haay m kaka an bʋrbɔ, hɔnyɩzannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ a ba cinno, bɩ cinno bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y. A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n'a ba cinno paan•••rɔ, kʋ wɔɔ m nyɩnta cinno sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ.

Mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ m kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ, Woso bɩ, wɔɔ da ʋ gʋaa haay jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma. Bɔ wɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yar n nɩ tarɛ ŋ nɩ k'a yaa ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ kɩ. Ɩ ʋ wɔɔ nyɔɔ n y'a ʋ saa, am hɔɔnɩbɩɩrɔ hɔ bɩ m durnya haay mɩm ʋ, malɛɛkarɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma sɔ.

Hɔɔzannɔ n wɔɔ m, Krista kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ minto. B'awɔɔ, mindɔrɛzannɔ n'awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista kɩ bɩ tɔ ma. Paŋŋawarzannɔ n wɔɔ m, awɔɔ m paŋŋazannɔ, n y'awɔɔ gore daŋ ʋ, bɩ n yɩ wɔɔ gore bɔŋ ʋ.
A n ta an wakatɩ naa do ku naa, wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ nɩ fɩr yɩm, nɔ m kan mɩsɩ kɩ m, huu jɩra wɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ ba ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ har nɩ y, lɛɛ wɔɔ n'a sam tee•••.
Zi wɔɔ n'a bam kɔɔkɔɔ k'ʋ lɛɛmaa hɔ yɩ, ʋ a bɩ. Kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋ, bɩ wɔɔ ŋ barka da ʋ. Kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ yɛ fɩryɩrɛ bɩ ma.
Kʋ gʋɔɔ y'a bʋnyaa hɩm wɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ meerbaa nyɩnta ba kan ŋ kɩ. Kan a her kɩ naa, n gɔɔta n nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ɩ ʋ, durnya gumə m wɔɔ m, ɩ ʋ, durnya dintim m wɔɔ m.
Mɔɔ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ gʋrsɩra ba naa ʋ naa ba, kʋ m awɔɔ da nyannɩ ʋ y. A ba mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m awɔɔ bɔ zaa ʋ, bala, mɔɔ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, m n'awɔɔ ŋʋam.
Baa k'awɔɔ karɩnsaambɔɔ yɩ tisi-tisi Krista nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ zɩ bɩ hɔka y, a deem. Mɔɔ n'awɔɔ zɩ, bala, mɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ ka m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʋ.
Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ dʋndɔ mɔɔ nawʋm, k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa.

Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mɔɔ hɔbaa sa, bɩ minto m, mɔɔ n Timote nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma, k'an bɩ mɩsɩrbaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam Krista zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ zaarɔ tɔ da awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, amba mɔɔ n'a dɩndam lɛɛ haay ʋ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ haay m bɩ m. K'a dɔ a ʋ, Timote bɩ mɔɔ nyɩ m am awɔɔ hɔ bɩ m sɔ, mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam, an a kʋsɩ mɔɔ ma.
Awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu, ŋn'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ bɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ y.
Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba yɛ, mɔɔ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ zɔɔ, bɩ mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ wɔɔ meerbaarɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma kʋ m a ma y, bɩ, m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ m a dɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ paŋŋa m gɛ.
Bala, Woso cirbəə bɩ, meerbaarɔ mim bɛɛ y, zi paŋŋazaa k'a n'a bam bɩ mim m.
N kara awɔɔ lɛ n taa? Awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ mɔɔ n bʋr a zi bara m m wɔ ʋ kʋ m nyaa ba kan a kɩ gɛɛ, kʋ m bʋr a zi ŋʋarɛ m kan nyɩntabaa kɩ nɩ?

Mɔɔ ma n n'a dɩndam lɛɛ kar ʋ, n ʋ, gʋaa ɩ jaan da awɔɔ barla, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɛɛ m nɔ wɔɔ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋn'ɩ jaandarɛ naa do lɔɔ da y, k'an bʋnyaa maam-maam bɩ tɔ ma. A dɩnda n nawʋrɛ, n ʋ, awɔɔ gʋaa deem nɩ kan a zɩ lʋ kɩ.
A ga a wʋm k'awɔɔ heer n a zar, a nyi ka mimbʋnyaa k'an awɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ minto, a gʋaa k'a naa ba bɩ bɔ a zi, an bɔkarɛ, awɔɔ bɩ to an n'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busum.
Mɔɔ ba b'ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ heer ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, mɔɔ gʋaa k'a mim naa do ba bɩ dʋdɔ yar, ɩ ʋ b'ʋ mɔɔ n ta ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ.
K'awɔɔ b'a so kʋ ma k'a mim naa do dɩnda, mɔɔ heer nyɩntam kan awɔɔ kɩ, wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, k'a gʋaa bɩ do dʋdɔ yar Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ kan a paŋŋa kɩ m.
K'a gʋaa bɩ do da Sʋtaana wɔ ʋ, k'a mɛsim n a zaar ba, k'a nyi bɩ n a da ma an bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ hinni kʋ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ b'ʋ.
Awɔɔ n a ga m hɔɔ, a a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu y. N ʋ: "Nyʋnyɔɔ poore tɔkkɛ ɩ nyisi derm haay." Awɔɔ n bɔɔr naa do dɔ ra?

Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mimbʋnyaa haay k'ɩ ʋ nyʋnyɔɔ gusire m bɩ bɔ a bire ʋ, k'a a da ma, a yɩ mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa ɩ ʋ, nyisi daa kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma bɩ m. Bala, sɩra nɔ ʋ, Woso awɔɔ hu bɔ, Yeezuu Krista zɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Yeezuu Krista bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm kʋ n tɩr a zɛ mannɩ pakkɩ cibsa ma bɩ kɩ.

Ʋ ʋ pakkɩ cibsa bɩ bɩ, bɩ, ʋ b'a bɩ bur kʋ nyʋnyɔɔ gusire n ta ma bɩ nɩ y. Nyʋnyɔɔ gusire bɩ do bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, mimbʋnyaabarɛ m kan mɩsɩrbaa bʋnyaa barɛ kɩ. Bɩ, ʋ ʋ cibsa bɩ bɩ bur kʋ n n nyʋnyɔɔ da ma m, naa k'a hɩ a ʋ, heer hu nɔ ʋ, sɩra nɔ ʋ.
Ci kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta m a ba awɔɔ ma bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m mɔɔ ʋ, a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan jaandər kɩ y.

Durnyazannɔ kʋ jaandənno m, mɩnyɔɔzannɔ m, ŋnɩ konno, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam wosobaawɔnnɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ ʋ a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan ŋ kɩ y. Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, a b'a lɛ dam nawɔnnɔ ʋ, pakra m k'an bɔ durnya ʋ, kʋ n bɛɛ m a wer ta ʋ.

Ayy••• durnyazannɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ ma y, bɩ gʋaa k'a ʋ danyɩ n a mɩ Krista zuure nɔ ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, jaandər m, gɛɛ mɩnyɔɔzaa, gɛɛ an nɩ yaa dam wosobaawɔnnɔ m, gɛɛ tɔzarlɛzaa, gɛɛ bɛɛmirewaasɩzaa, gɛɛ hɔyɔrɛzaa bɩ. Bɩ zaa mɔɔ hɩ ma, baa kʋ hɔbɩrɛ m, a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ y.
Mɔɔ bɛɛ n nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yarlɛ y. B'awɔɔ a ga m, a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ sokʋma nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yar.
Kʋ durnyazannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Woso n nɩ brɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm. K'a hɔ kʋ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ ba, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "K'a la gʋaa k'a n'a bʋnyaa bam bɩ ra a bɔ a barla."
A a ba lɔ, k'awɔɔ gʋaa deem ɩ mim m kan a mim kɩ, ta a tɩr a ʋ durnya dʋdɔkənno zi kʋ ŋ nɩ dʋdɔ bɩ ba, a lɔ a bɩr mim bɩ dam wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a dɩnda?
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ durnya dʋdɔ ka ra? Bɩ, k'awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ durnya dʋdɔ ka, bɔ m awɔɔ bɩr a dam ma an nɩ minno poorero nɔɔm dɩndarɛ?
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ zɛm bɩ malɛɛkarɔ dʋdɔ ka ra? Bɩ, bɔ m kɛɛrɛ wɔɔ bɩ her mɩsɩrbaa naa minno dʋdɔ karɛ?
Kan naa kɩ haay, kʋ minno nɔɔn duro b'a da ʋ, b'awɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɩr dɩgarɛ ŋ ma hɔsɩ a sokʋma nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ sa a ŋ ba a dʋdɔkənno.
Naa do nyannɩ ba awɔɔ m na? Awɔɔ k'a m danyɩnɔ Krista nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ gʋaa deem taan••• ba ʋ, mindɔrɛzaa, k'a mim banka awɔɔ barla ra?
A n a ga m, kʋ danyɩnɔ n ta kʋ m dʋdɔkənno taa y, an lɛ da bɩ, a bɩ zore kʋ ŋ nɩ ta kʋ m basɩrakənno taa y.

Sɩra nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ kʋrɔ ma maam-maam, ta k'awɔɔ nawʋm kʋ m dʋdɔkənno taa bɩ minto. Kʋ hɔ k'a bɩ tɩrga n y'a ba awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩrɛ, a jɩra ta b'ʋ bɩ m. Kʋ hɔ n n'a yɔrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n yɛ ma, k'a jɩra sɔ.
Bɩ, awɔɔ bɩr yɛm hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ma y, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ hɔ k'a bɩ tɩrga bam, an nɩ koor bam, bɩ, naa ba awɔɔ nawʋrɛ a danyɩnɔ m.

Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ bɩ nyɩntam Woso cirbəə b'ʋ ra? A bɩ bra bɩmba a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ y. K'a dɔ a ʋ, jaandənno, kan wosobaawɔnnɔ yaadənno kɩ, muno lannɔbənno, muno zinobənno, yaarɔ wʋta kan kʋ kɩ zannɔ,
konno, mɩnyɔɔzannɔ, bɛɛmirewaasɩzannɔ, gʋɔɔ tɔzarlɛzannɔ, hɔyonno, ŋ bɩncɛ bɩ nyɩntam Woso cirbəə b'ʋ y.

Awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro bam biisi. Bɩ, Woso awɔɔ hu bɔ, an mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro gʋ awɔɔ ma, an awɔɔ bɔ ʋ a hɔ, k'a a so awɔɔ ʋ, a awɔɔ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʋ, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʋ.

Gʋaa a da ma an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ kʋ mɔɔ n hɔ haay woo••• ba." Sɩra m, bɩ, hɔ haay bɛɛ n mɩŋŋa gʋaa n'a bam wa. Mɔɔ m da ma, m a hɩ, m ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ kʋ m hɔ haay ba." Bɩ, mɔɔ b'a tom hɔ niŋŋə n mɔɔ ba a lɔ y.

Gʋaa bɩ do a da ma an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: "Hɔbɩrɛ da n y'a ʋ gʋaa nɔ tɔ ma, n nɩ gʋaa nɔ da hɔbɩrɛ tɔ ma sɔ. Bɩ, Woso zɛm bɩ hɔbɩrɛ kan gʋaa nɔ bɩ kɩ zaar ba." Sɩra m, bɩ, n nɩ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ da jaandarɛ minto y, wɔɔ mɛ bɩ, ta an a wʋ ʋ Zuuba hɔ, Zuuba n ta ʋ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ daahan minto.
Bɩ, Woso k'a Zuuba Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ, a wɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʋ sɔ a paŋŋa bɩ m.
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ mɛrɔ wɔɔ Krista mɛ vəŋŋəro m na? Mɔɔ yɛrɛ m Krista mɛ vəŋŋə sa m a ba lʋmɩŋŋahɛɛrɛzaa mɛ vəŋŋə ra? Ayy•••, fɩɩga!
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, kʋ gʋaa a zɛ kʋ ra kan lʋmɩŋŋahɛɛrɛzaa kɩ, a zaa bɩ kan lʋ bɩ kɩ a ba n y'a ʋ deem na? Bala, Wosoci a hɩ a ʋ: "Ŋ hɩɩya haay a ba gʋaa deem."
Bɩ, gʋaa k'a a zɛ kʋ ra kan Zuuba kɩ bɩ, a a ba ɛspri deem kan kɩ.
Naa minto bɩ, k'a a si jaandarɛ lɛɛ. Mimbʋnyaarɔ vantɔɔ kʋ gʋaa nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ n a so a mɛ ʋ jilli y. Bɩ, jaandarɛzaa bɩ, mimbʋnyaa an n'a barɛ a mɛ bɩ m.
Gɛɛ, awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ mɛ bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri cɛ m, Woso n a ka awɔɔ ʋ, an n'awɔɔ heer ʋ ra? Bɩ minto bɩ, awɔɔ bɛɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ dɔ ra? Woso y'a so awɔɔ ʋ.
Bala, Woso hɔ bɔ gʋta an awɔɔ bʋmbɔ m. Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a hɔ k'a n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ bɩ ba a mɛ bɩ m.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, kʋ m minno k'awɔɔ mɔɔ lɩnlar ma ci ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nyɩ bɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ ʋ: "A mɩŋŋa kʋ gʋaa b'a zɔ lʋ ma y."
Bɩ, kʋ jaandarɛ n a ga m bɩ, gʋaa biyəə a ga m an bɩr a mɩŋŋa lʋ m, lʋ biyəə n bɩr a mɩŋŋa zim m.
Bɩ, gʋaa yar b'a ga m an hɔ k'a lʋ b'a ga m bɩ ba a lʋ bɩ m, lʋ bɩ maam sɔ, a a ga m an hɔ k'a zim b'a ga m bɩ ba a zim bɩ m.
Bala, lʋ bɩ bɛɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋa mɛ b'ʋ y, a zim bɩ y'a so ʋ. Gʋaa bɩ bɛɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋa mɛ b'ʋ sɔ y, a lʋ bɩ y'a so ʋ.

A b'a gu kʋ ma y, k'a maam kʋ awɔɔ ma, k'a zɛkʋra da jɩm ʋ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, k'a a da ma a toore yɩ a yaa da gʋta, bɩ, a b'a to dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ a zɛkʋra da jɩm ʋ bɩ n maasɩrɛ ba y. K'a a ya, a a bɔ a bɩr kan kʋ kɩ, kʋ m bɛɛ m awɔɔ bɩ zɛm b'a da ma a bʋr a ma y, bɩ Sʋtaana yom bɩ ma an awɔɔ makra ba k'awɔɔ n a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ naa, lɛ bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ y, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ a da ma, a naa ba.
Kʋ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ m, kʋ gʋaa haay do m mɔɔ m, bɩ, Woso gan wʋ gʋaa biyəə ma a hʋnhɔ, a a ka gʋaa niŋŋə nɩ lʋ m, an a ka gʋaa vanta n'a dam ma, an mɩsɩrbaa ba bazabaa nɔ ʋ.
Naa y'a ka mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lannɔ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ m, kan zonno wɔɔ kɩ m, m ʋ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta a deem maam amba mɔɔ m.
Bɩ, kʋ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ bʋr a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, kʋ yaarɔ wɔɔ n lannɔ ka cɛ ʋ, kʋ zonno wɔɔ n zino sa. Kʋ ŋ y'a ba ncɩnaaʋ a jɩra, kʋ lʋ gɛɛ zim yɩrɛ lɛtaama n a so ŋ ʋ, an bɩr bɩrɛ am sɛ hɔ bɩ m.
Lɛ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a cɩnta lannɔzannɔ wɔɔ m kan zinzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ m bɩ ba n nɩ: "Lʋ b'a gʋ a zim ma y." Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa bɛɛ lɛ bɩ cɩnta y, Zuuba m.
Kʋ lʋ a gʋ a zim ma, a b'a ya an zim sa y, k'a lɛ taa zim ma k'an a bɔ an aa kʋ ma kan a zim bɩ kɩ, an nyɩnta kan kɩ. Lʋ zim n a ga m sɔ an la a lʋ ra y.

Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan ŋ kɩ, Zuuba bɛɛ y, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: "Kʋ kristagʋaa ta lʋ m, bɩ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ m lʋ bɩ nɩ, lʋ bɩ m bɔkarɛ an yɛ k'a nyɩnta kan kɩ, a bɩ la lʋ bɩ ra y."
A n ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, kʋ lʋ kʋ kristagʋaa m zim ta ʋ, bɩ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ y, an bɔkarɛ an yɛ k'a nyɩnta kan lʋ bɩ kɩ, lʋ bɩ b'a bɔ ʋ y.

Bala, zim kʋ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ b'a ba Woso hɔ a lʋ bɩ tɔ ma, lʋ kʋ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ b'a ba Woso hɔ sɔ a zim bɩ tɔ ma. Kʋ ncɩnaaʋ bɛɛ, bɔ an nawʋm kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, ŋ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ, dintim nyɩnɔ m Woso mɩm ʋ, an bɔkarɛ ŋ y'a ba wosogʋɔɔ.

Kʋ basɩrakarɛzaa bɩ lɛ taa k'a gʋ a mim bɩ ma, k'an a gʋ ma. Zim kʋ kristagʋaa m bɩ, gɛɛ lʋ kʋ kristagʋaa m bɩ, a so a mɩŋŋa ʋ mim naa do nɔ ʋ. A n bɔkarɛ, Woso k'a awɔɔ bir bɩ, awɔɔ bir a ʋ, k'awɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba laafɩɩ nɔ ʋ.

Bala, lʋ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m kristagʋaa bɩ, a a da ma ɩbɩɩ n a ka ɩ zim bɩ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a dɔm na? Gʋaa yar bɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m kristagʋaa bɩ, a a da ma, ɩbɩɩ n a ka ɩ lʋ bɩ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a dɔm sɔ ra?

Mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m hɔ vanta naa do hɩ awɔɔ m sɔ, hɔ naa do mɔɔ n'a dɩndam kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ m lɛɛ haay ʋ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gʋaa biyəə a ga m an mɩsɩrbaa niŋŋə kʋ Woso a ka ʋ dɔmɩm k'a a bir ma kan bɩ zu a ʋ bɩ ba.
Kʋ Woso gʋaa bir, bɩ ma bɩ a zaa gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, a b'a baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ bɩ nyaakʋm da y. Kʋ gʋaa vanta Woso a bir, bɩ ma bɩ, a zaa n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, a b'a ka ma k'a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y.
Kʋ gʋaa gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, gɛɛ k'a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ n bɩ y. Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure n hɔ.
Gʋaa biyəə n gɔɔta mɩsɩrbaa kʋ Woso a ka ʋ, a birle dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ m.
Kʋ nyɩnta ɩ ʋ lɔ, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso ɩ bir ʋ bɩ ma, ɩ bɩ ɩ hɔɔn kɔ a tɔ ma y, bɩ kʋ zaa ta ʋ k'ɩ ɩ da ma ɩ bɔ lɔmbaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'ɩ zaa bɩ do sa.
Bala, lɔ kʋ Woso a bir k'an bɩ zu Zuuba ʋ bɩ, a ba b'ʋ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa Zuuba nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, soamɩŋŋaʋzaa kʋ Woso a bir sɔ bɩ, a ba b'ʋ Krista lɔ.
Woso hɔ bɔ gʋta an awɔɔ bʋmbɔ m, a b'a ya a yɛ, a a ba gʋɔɔ lɔnnɔ y.
M danyɩnɔ, amba mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ bɩ, gʋaa biyəə a ga m, an gɔɔta an bɩr mɩsɩrbaa kʋ Woso a ka ʋ dɔmɩm k'a a bir ʋ bɩ bam Woso mɩm ʋ.
Kʋ bazanɔ wɔɔ mim nɩ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ naa, Zuuba bɛɛ y'a cɩnta a ʋ, mɔɔ n a hɩ y, m hɔɔndarɛ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ, bɩ Zuuba barka ma bɩ, gʋaa kʋ n n'a dam ma, n n a mim si sɩra bɩ m mɔɔ m.
Mɔɔ yɩ m hɔɔn dam mɔɔ ʋ, her-her dɔmɩm naa kɔrɛ minto bɩ, a mɩŋŋa kʋ baza n gɔɔta maam.
K'ɩ ɩ jaan m sɔ, ɩbɩɩ ka ma k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ʋ y, k'ɩ ba jaan m, ɩbɩɩ ka ma k'ɩ jaan zɛ y.

Bɩ, k'ɩ ɩ jaan bɩ sa, mimbʋnyaa bɛɛ ɩ ba y, kʋ nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ a jaan sa sɔ, an mimbʋnyaa ba sɔ y. Bɩ, kʋ m a hɩ a m, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lannɔ ka cɛ ʋ, kan nyɩmbɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ zino sa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ fɩr yɩrɛ a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ gʋta, mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n fɩr bɩ do yɩ y, bɩ minto m mɔɔ nɩ meerbaa naa do bam.
M danyɩnɔ, kʋ m a hɩ a m denter, dɔmɩm n gɔɔta wɔɔ m gʋta y. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, an a sa naa ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ n a mɩsɩrbaa ba ɩ ʋ, ŋ ba lannɔ nɩ y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi kam nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʋ, ŋ heer n a zar y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a heer nyɔɔm nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʋ, ŋ heer n nyɔɔ y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ sim nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʋ, ŋ ba hɔsɩ nɩ y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya naa hɔ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʋ, ŋ bɩr a yɩrɛ y. Bala, durnya naa do k'a nɩ yɩm naa, cem an nawʋm naa.
Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ hɔɔn n bɩr kɔrɛ y. Gʋaa k'a n lʋ sa bɩ, a hɔɔn an n'a dam Zuuba hɔɔnhɔrɔ ma, an n'a kam ma kʋ Zuuba nɔ n yɩ a ra.
Bɩ gʋaa k'a lʋ n ta ʋ bɩ, a hɔɔn nɩ kɔm durnya minno ma, a ka a nawʋm ma k'a laarɛ nɔ n yɩ a ra,

a hɔɔn m hɩɩya-hɩɩya. Maam sɔ bɩ, lʋ k'a ba zim nɩ y, kan nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ k'a n zim sa kɩ, a hɔɔn ŋn'a dam Zuuba hɔɔnhɔrɔ ma. Ŋ n'a kam ma kʋ Woso n a so a ʋ jilli, a mɛ, kan a nyi kɩ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ lʋ k'a zim n ta ʋ bɩ, a hɔɔn an n'a dam durnya minno ma, a ka a nawʋm ma k'a zim nɔ n yɩ a ra.
Naa hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan minto. M ka bɛɛ mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ m awɔɔ hɔɔn kɔ y. A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ m hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da bɩ ba, k'a hɔɔn bɩ nyɩnta hɩɩya-hɩɩya y, k'a kʋsɩ Zuuba ma bala.
Kʋ gʋaa jaan ta ʋ, a hɔɔn nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ gʋta, b'a bɩr a da ra a mɩŋŋa ma y, an a hɔɔn da a ʋ, a yaa a zɔ ma an yɩ mim, a a da ma, an a jaan bɩ sa. K'a naa ba, a n mimbʋnyaa ba y, kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋ sa.
Bɩ gʋaa k'a a hɔɔn da, an hɔɔn bɔ ʋ a zim, bɩ pakra bɛɛ m kan kɩ, an a da a mɩŋŋa lɛtaama ma, an a cɩnta a heer ʋ a zim, a ʋ, a bɩ lʋ sarɛ y, a a ba mɩŋŋa.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋaa k'a nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ sa bɩ, a a ba mɩŋŋa, bɩ gʋaa k'a n a sa bɩ, a a ba mɩŋŋa an lɛ da.
Kʋ lʋ zim ta ʋ, gɔɔta a nawʋm an bɩr gʋaa bɩ do lʋ tee•••, gʋaa bɩ mɩsɩrbaa tɛkka ma. Bɩ, k'a zim bɩ bɩ ga, a a so a mɩŋŋa ʋ kɛɛrɛ, a a da ma, an bɔ an gʋaa vanta sa, bɩ kristagʋaa an n'a sam bala.
Bɩ, mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ, k'a gɔɔta a n a ya an zim sa, a heer nyɔɔrɛ an lɛ da, mɔɔ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ, Woso Ɛspri ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ sɔ, bɩ minto bɩ, k'a mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ si.
Ʋ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩrɔ sinno wɔɔ mim dɩnda kɛɛrɛ. Awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ʋ haay ʋ ta hɔdɔrɛ m." Denter m, bɩ hɔdɔrɛ ɩ gʋaa dam mɩŋŋabusure ma. A n bɔkarɛ ŋʋarɛ y'a kam gʋɔɔ sɩrakarɛ n'a dam la.
Kʋ gʋaa y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, a hɔ dɔ, k'an a dɔ a ʋ, a n hɔ dɔ amba a a ga m bɩ nɩ y.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa Woso ŋʋa, Woso bɩ zaa dɔ a gʋaa.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ ʋ ga m ʋ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ sim sʋ gɛɛ? Wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, wosobaawɔm deem taan••• ba ʋ an mɩsɩr durnya ʋ y, bɩ Woso vanta ba ʋ, kʋ Woso k'an ta ʋ deem bɩ bɛɛ y.
Bala, baa kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ hɔɔ niŋŋoo kʋ ŋ nɩ brama gɛɛ tara ʋ birm wosoro, ŋnɩ ŋ ba denter sɔ wosoro kan zuubɔɔ kɩ,

a bɩ ncɩnaaʋ wɔɔ zi y, wɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ, Woso deem taan•••, Zɩ bɩ m, a to hɔ haay ʋ a mɩŋŋa zi, wɔɔ n ta ʋ a tɔ ma. Bɩ Zuuba bɩ deem sɔ, Yeezuu Krista m, a mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m hɔ haay woo••• n ta ʋ, a tɔ ma m sɔ wɔɔ n ta ʋ.

Bɩ, kristagʋɔɔ haay bɛɛ naa dɔ y. Gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ mim ka wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩrɔ sinno wɔɔ m bɩ, ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ ŋ sʋm, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ ka n nawʋm wosoro paan•••rɔ ʋ. Naa minto bɩ, kʋ ŋ sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa ba ʋ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, a kʋrɔ ma Woso mɩm ʋ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ sinno wɔɔ sʋrɛ tɔ ma.
Wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, hɔbɩrɛ bɛɛ nɩ wɔɔ zɔm Woso ma y, kʋ wɔɔ n a bɩ, a b'a dam ma an wɔɔ ba laatʋ Woso ma y, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ sɔ a bɛɛ n n'a dam ma an wɔɔ zɔ Woso ma sɔ y.
Bɩ, k'a dundo a zi, awɔɔ ɩ soamɩŋŋaʋ m k'a a hɔɔnhɔ bɩ, b'a ba ka k'awɔɔ soamɩŋŋaʋ bɩ n a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba paŋŋa m cɩna Woso zuure bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ y.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔ dɔ bɩ, kʋ gʋaa kʋ paŋŋawarzaa m Woso zuure nɔ ʋ b'ɩbɩɩ yɩ ɩ nɩ nyɩntam wosobaawɔm cɛ ʋ, ɩ n'a mannɩ sim sʋrɛ, naa y'a dam han denter la? A bɩ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ sim sʋm, bɩ n a heer kɔ ra?
Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔ dɔ bɩ minto, paŋŋawarzaa n a dom Woso ma, b'ɩbɩɩ danyɩ m, Krista mɩŋŋa n ga a tɔ ma.
K'awɔɔ ɩ naa bam, a bʋnyaa awɔɔ n'a barɛ a danyɩnɔ paŋŋawarzannɔ wɔɔ m, an nɩ ŋ heer warm kʋ ma, bɩ mimbʋnyaa naa do ba awɔɔ nawʋm Krista m sɔ.
Naa minto bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ danyɩ y'a dom mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bɩm tɔ ma, k'a maam mɔɔ bɩ n yarɛ m sim sʋ fɩɩga y, kʋ m danyɩ b'a do y.
Mɔɔ n m so m mɩŋŋa ʋ ra? Kristazibəəzaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ m na? Mɔɔ n wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu yɩ m mɩm m na? Zi kʋ mɔɔ ba Zuuba nɔ ʋ, bɩ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m na?
Kan gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ, kʋ kristazibəəzaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ, kan awɔɔ kɩ, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m. Bala, hɔ k'a n'a hɩnkam, a ʋ, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ m, Zuuba nɔ ʋ.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ m nɩ m gumə dɩndam, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mim kam mɔɔ ra rɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ bɩ ba n nɩ:
Mɔɔ n m ga m, kʋ gʋɔɔ m hɔbɩrɛ kan hɔmire kɩ ka m ʋ, m zibəə bɩ tɔ ma ra?
Mɔɔ n m ga m, m lʋ sɩrakər sa k'an bɩr kan mɔɔ kɩ, m zaakʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, amba kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ, Zuuba dannɔ wɔɔ kan Pɩyɛɛr kɩ n'a bam bɩ m na?
Gɛɛ, mɔɔ kan Barnabas kɩ, wɔɔ y'ʋ ga m ʋ minto kʋ zi ba, ʋ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ tʋr m na?

Awɔɔ ma cɩna, n ʋ, sʋrdaa tɩr a mɩŋŋa tʋr a zim k'a bɩr sʋrdaabaa bam na? Gɛɛ kʋ gʋaa dɩvɛn gɔ sɔɔn a ba zaa m k'a dɩvɛn gɔ bɩ nyɩ bɩ ra? Gɛɛ hɔbɩsɩrɔ dundor b'a lɛ m k'a hɔbɩsɩrɔ k'a nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyonhi mi ra?
A b'a hɔɔn da a ʋ, yo mɔɔ nawʋm hɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a bam tee••• bɩ makrarɔ ma y. Bala, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm naa hɩm sɔ.
Bala, n y'a da lɛrɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, n ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ hɔ du der k'a nɩ hɔyaa zɔm bɩ lɛ ma y." A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ, Woso bɩ kɔ a nawʋm dono ma,

gɛɛ meer naa do ba a ʋ wɔɔ tɔ ma ra? Sɩra m, wɔɔ minto m n nɩ hɔ naa do gʋrsɩra ba. Bala, a a ga m, kʋ gʋaa k'a nɩ dam wʋm bɩ kan gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔyaa zɔm bɩ kɩ n bɩr a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʋ, a y'a hɔ yɩm hɔyaa bɩ jirle nɔ ʋ sɔ.
Amba danwur nɩ hɔyaa duum bɩ, wɔɔ lemim nyɩnta duu awɔɔ m. Amba gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔyaa zɔm bɩ, an n'a hɔjirle yɩm bɩ, a hɩ awɔɔ ʋ kʋ wɔɔ ɩ durnya hɔnyɩ yɩrɛ awɔɔ zi, a bʋnyaa ra?

K'awɔɔ ɩ nyasʋm gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ m, k'a a ga m bɩ minto bɩ, wɔɔ bɛɛ awɔɔ nɩ nyasʋm wɔɔ m an lɛ da ra? Bɩ, kʋ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ ga m bɩ m bɩ. Bɩ wɔɔ n'ʋ ka ma k'awɔɔ m naa ba wɔɔ nɩ y. Yɛ wɔɔ ʋ kɔrɛ do haay ma, kʋ hɔsɩ b'a ta Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ m toore y.
Awɔɔ dɔ, a ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosocɛ gʋta bɩ zi bam nɔ wɔɔ, hɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ nɩ zɛm nɩ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ bɩ nɩ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosocɛ mannɩrɔ zi bam nɔ wɔɔ, mannɩhɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ.
Maam sɔ bɩ, Zuuba lɛ ka kʋ n nɩ nyasʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa dam nɔ wɔɔ m.

Bɩ, mɔɔ nɩ m ka ma kʋ gʋɔɔ n a ba m m ncɩnaaʋ y. Mɔɔ n ci naa do ba kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ ka m ʋ y. Kʋ mɔɔ ga, a jɩra mɔɔ m kʋ mɔɔ n hɔ yɛ, m zi kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam naa minto. Gɔsɩ bɩ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʋrɛ naa do yɔm mɔɔ nɩ y.
Bala, kʋ mɔɔ m, lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ bɩ, lɛbɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ hɔ bɛɛ y. Pakra m kʋ mɔɔ n a pa da, bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ n a pa da, kʋ kʋsɩ n m yɩ.
Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ hɔɔn bɔ ʋ m zim, kʋ m zi naa do ba, mɔɔ ba n tɩr m mɩm dam kʋ Woso m ganwʋ m ma. Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ da n y'a ʋ bɩ, zi kʋ n mɔɔ da ʋ bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam, mɔɔ bɩr dɔm hɔsɩ ma y.
Bɔ mɔɔ n'a yɩrɛ a nɔ ʋ kɛɛrɛ? Lemim nyɩnta bɩ kʋ mɔɔ n n'a pa dam vam bɩ m mɔɔ hɔ. Mɔɔ bɩr m kam ma kʋ nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ m ga m ka m ʋ y.
Soamɩŋŋaʋzaa m mɔɔ m, gɔsɩ lɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, mɔɔ m mɩŋŋa ba gʋaa haay lɔ, kʋ m m da ma m a ka, kʋ gʋɔɔ gʋta n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ sɩra ka Krista ʋ nɔ ʋ.

Kʋ mɔɔ ta m nɩ zi bam zɩɩfʋrɔ barla, bɩ mɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ mɩsɩrbaa sa, kʋ m a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Krista ʋ. Baa kʋ mɔɔ bɩr zum Moyiisi lɛrɔ ʋ bɩ, m mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋm ɩ ʋ, zu mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ŋ ʋ. Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ zi bam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zure ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bireyaa ʋ, a ba mɔɔ nawʋm maam, kʋ m m da ma m bʋr ŋ nɩ Krista sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ.

Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ barla, bɩ mɔɔ m ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, mɔɔ bɩr zum Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ y, kʋ m a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Krista ʋ. A bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ bɩr zum Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ y, mɔɔ ɩ zure ŋ ʋ, bala, mɔɔ ɩ zum Krista lɛ ʋ.

Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ paŋŋawarzannɔ m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla, bɩ mɔɔ m ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, ɩ ʋ, paŋŋawarzaa m mɔɔ m, kʋ m a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Krista ʋ. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ ŋkɔɔ m, bɩ mɔɔ m ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, kʋ m a ka, baa kʋ bɔ m, kʋ ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Naa woo••• naa ba mɔɔ nawʋm lemim nyɩnta bɩ minto, kʋ m m hɔ yɩ sɔ.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ bra sim brasire zaŋŋa ʋ, ŋ haay ɩ bra bɩ sim, bɩ deem taan••• nɩ bra bɩ sire ganwʋrɛ yɩm. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a bra bɩ si mɩŋŋa k'a a ganwʋrɛ yɩ.
Brasinno haay y'a mɛ tʋntɔm gʋta, k'a a da ma a yɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa, a ganwʋrɛ yɩ. Bɩ, ŋ ganwʋrɛ bɩ, hɔ m an n'a zarm. Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ tʋntɔ ʋ, wɔɔ ganwʋrɛ bɩ nyɩntam hɔ k'a bɩr a zaar barɛ y.
Bɩ minto bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ bra bɩ sim, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr a sim yaarsɩ y. Mɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ, kan zoobər kɩ, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr zoo bɩ bam kan lɛɛ tu kɩ y.
Bɩ, m mɛ bɩ mɔɔ n'a tʋntɔm, m n'a dam bar ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ, bala, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m lemim nyɩnta pa da gʋɔɔ nɩ, kʋ Woso n bɔkarɛ an bɩ mɔɔ bɔ a jɛ m, m bɔ vam nɩ y.
M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mim k'a wɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ, wɔɔ yaabɔɔ yɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ʋ poo ʋ ŋn'ɩ zum Moyiisi ʋ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Woso a ka warkʋ n dɔ ŋ ma jilli, ŋ bra higʋta ma sɔ,
a bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, ŋ haay batɛm si warkʋ bɩ kan higʋta bɩ kɩ ʋ, k'a zu Moyiisi ʋ.
Ŋ haay hɔbɩrɛ k'a a to Woso zi bɩ bɩ.
Ŋ nɩ hi k'a a to Woso zi sɔ bɩ mi, bala, ci deem ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, ci bɩ do hi ŋ y'a mi. Ci bɩ, Woso y'a ka ŋ ʋ, an nɩ zure ŋ jɛ ʋ. Bɩ, ci bɩ do bɩ, Krista m.
Baa kan naa kɩ haay, ŋ gʋɔɔ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta Woso nɔ n yɩ ŋ la y, bala, ŋ gɩnga, n ŋ bir poo b'ʋ.
Ba minno nɔɔn duro ʋ, k'a hɔɔn dɩnda wɔɔ m, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ nyɩnta hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ lɛtaama nɩ, amba ŋ nyɩntam bɩ nɩ y.
A bɩ yɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ daʋrɛzannɔ amba ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ y, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta k'a hɔ bɩ, k'a hɔ mi, ŋnɩ bɩ wuti k'a sar ba."
Amba ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ jaan da bɩ, ʋ bɩ jaan da y. Bala, jaan bɩ darɛ a ka, ŋ gʋɔɔ bam tisi-tisi buhɩra a yaa n kaakʋ n gɩnga hindeem taan••• nɔ ʋ.
Amba ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ Zuuba makra ba bɩ, ʋ bɩ Zuuba makra ba y. Bala, naa kʋ ŋ y'a ba b'a ka mɩnnɔ m sakʋ dɩnda ŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
Amba ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kukur ba bɩ, ʋ bɩ kukur ba y. Bala, naa kʋ ŋ y'a ba bɩ, Woso malɛɛka k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ zɩnzɛ m bɩ, bʋr an bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Minno nɔɔn duro wɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ, k'an nyɩnta makra, bɩ y'a ka n ŋ da ci ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ m hɔɔn yɩ ʋ ŋ tɔ ma, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bam jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
Naa minto bɩ, gʋaa k'a n'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, a b'a barɛ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, k'an dundo a zi k'a b'a do y.
Makrarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ yɩ bɩ, bɩ taalɛrazaa m Woso m, a b'a tore awɔɔ n makra yɩ k'an cem awɔɔ paŋŋa han y. Kʋ makra awɔɔ yɩ, a y'a karɛ awɔɔ m bɔ ʋ, k'a a da ma a bʋr la.
M danyɩnɔ, naa minto bɩ, k'a ba wosobaawɔnnɔ daʋrɛ ma laatʋ.
Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, hɔɔntaʋrɛzannɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma m mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a a hɔɔn da hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ ma a dɩga a.

Ba wɔɔ tɩr ʋ so kʋ ma kʋ Zuuba tɔdaanɔʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ bɩ, wɔɔ tɩr barka hɔmire bɩ barka da ʋ, ʋ a dɔ ʋ a mi, barka hɔmire bɩ kʋ wɔɔ n'a mim bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ zɛkʋra yɩm kan Krista kɩ a ma bɩ tɔ ma. Kʋ wɔɔ bur bɩ jinjir ʋ a bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ zɛkʋra yɩm sɔ kan Krista kɩ a mɛ bɩ tɔ ma.
Kʋ bur bɩ n deem bɩ, wɔɔ haay, mɛ deem zannɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, bala, bur deem bɩ wɔɔ ʋ da kʋ ʋ haay ʋ n'a bɩm.
K'a dɩga Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋ tɩr hɔɔ zɩnzɛ k'a mannɩ ba ŋ nɩ Woso ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro sim sʋm nɔ wɔɔ, a zɛ ŋ nawʋm kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ jɩ n bɔ nɩ? A hɩ mɔɔ ʋ, hɔsɩ m wosobaawɔm kan a mannɩ sim kɩ n na?
Ayy•••! Mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ m ʋ, basɩrakənno wɔɔ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ ba ŋ nawʋm zinəro ma, a ka bɛɛ ŋ nawʋm Woso ʋ y. Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n'a zɛ kʋ ra kan zinəro kɩ y.
A n a ga m, k'awɔɔ n Zuuba hɔmire mi, k'a a ya, a zinəro hɔ mi y. A n a ga m sɔ, k'awɔɔ n Zuuba hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, k'a a ya, a zinəro hɔ bɩ y.
Gɛɛ, a ŋʋa wɔɔ nawʋm k'ʋ Zuuba da nɔmaa ma ra? A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ wɔɔ paŋŋa lɛ da m na?
