Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ, k'ʋ hɔ haay ba." Denter m, bɩ hɔ haay bɛɛ n'a dam wɔɔ han wa. Kʋ ŋ bɩ to ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ: "Zaa ta ʋ, k'ʋ hɔ haay ba", kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, hɔ haay bɛɛ n'a kam wɔɔ n ta lɛɛ Woso zuure nɔ ʋ wa.
Kʋ gʋaa biyəə n bɩr a kam hɔ k'a n'a dam a mim han bɩ ma, a b'a ka a mɩŋŋa daahan ma y.
Awɔɔ a da ma a hɔ haay k'a nɩ daasɩ ʋ si a bɩ, b'a bɩ laaka da a mim ma y, k'a b'a heer kɔ y.
Bala, Zuuba y'a so tara burə ʋ kan hɔ haay k'a n a nɔ ʋ kɩ ʋ.
Kʋ basɩrakakristaʋzaa awɔɔ bir a har ʋ k'a bɩ hɔ bɩ, k'awɔɔ yɛ a birle ma k'a ta, k'a yaa lee ku, kʋ bɔ n y'a ka a ʋ, k'a bɩ bala, a bɩ laaka da ma y, a yaa n'a heer kɔ.
Bɩ kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a m, a ʋ: "Sim naa do mannɩ sim m", a ba sʋ y, gʋaa k'a naa hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ minto, kʋ heer kɔrɛ bɩ yɩ ʋ y.
Bɩ, awɔɔ heer kɔrɛ bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma y, gʋaa k'a sim bɩ mim hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ heer mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma. Bala, a n a ga m, kʋ gʋaa vanta heer m mɔɔ dʋdɔ yar y.
Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ Woso barka darɛ m nɩ hɔ niŋŋə bɩrɛ, bɔ m gʋaa vanta nɩ mɔɔ tɔ zarlɛ an bɔkarɛ mɔɔ Woso barka da, m n'a bɩrɛ?
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ hɔ awɔɔ n'a bɩrɛ, gɛɛ hɔ awɔɔ n'a mire, baa kʋ bɔ awɔɔ n'a barɛ, k'a hɔ haay ba Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ minto.
A b'a ka, k'awɔɔ tɔ ma kʋ gʋɔɔ n a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ y. Kʋ zɩɩfʋ m, gɛɛ grɛkkɩ m, gɛɛ kristagʋɔɔ kʋ Woso y'a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a b'a ka kʋ gɔsɩ n a do y.

Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa nɩ m yoŋ ʋ, kʋ m yɩ mɩŋŋa gʋaa haay ma, hɔ haay nɔ ʋ. A ba kʋ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr m kam m mɩŋŋa daahan ma y. M ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ gʋɔɔ cir gʋta n daahan yɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Amba mɔɔ nɩ Krista hɔbaa dɩndam bɩ, k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa sɔ.
Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʋ, bala, awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʋ hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, an nɩ zum mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛrɔ haay ʋ, amba mɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mim naa do dɔ: Yeezuu Krista m gʋaa yar haay lɛɛzaa, gʋaa yar m lʋ lɛɛzaa, Woso m Krista lɛɛzaa.
Gʋaa yar haay k'a hɔ ku a mim ma, k'a yaa da, gɛɛ an nɩ Woso lɛ sim k'a so ra bɩ, a lɛɛzaa kʋ Krista m bɩ an n'a bɔŋ ʋ.
Bɩ, lʋ niŋŋə k'a n hɔ ka a mim la, an bɔkarɛ a ʋ k'a yaa da, gɛɛ Woso lɛ an n'a sim k'a so ra bɩ, a lɛɛzaa an n'a gore bɔŋ ʋ, bala, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, a mim a a bɔ.
Kʋ lʋ lɛ baa k'a hɔ ka a mim la, k'a n'a minkə zɩnzɛra. Bɩ k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, nyannɩ m kʋ lʋ n a minkə zɩnzɛra gɛɛ an a mim bɔ, k'a maam, k'an hɔ ka a mim la.
Gʋaa yar bɩ n a ga m an hɔ ka a mim la y. Bala, Woso bɔkʋʋrɛzaa m, a m Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ sɔ, bɩ gʋaa yar lɛbɔʋrɛ m lʋ m.
Bala, gʋaa yar n a to lʋ mɛ ʋ y, lʋ n y'a bɔ gʋaa yar mɛ ʋ.
Bɩ, Woso n gʋaa yar da lʋ tɔ ma y, lʋ a a da gʋaa yar tɔ ma.
Naa minto nɩ, lʋ n a ga m, an hɔ ka a mim la k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a zim n'a lɛɛzaa, malɛɛkarɔ tɔ ma.
Kan naa kɩ haay, gʋaa b'a dam ma an a hɩ a ʋ, lʋ zibəə ba gʋaa yar ma y, b'a b'a dam ma sɔ an a hɩ a ʋ, gʋaa yar zibəə ba lʋ ma, Zuuba mɩm ʋ y.
Bala, k'a nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lʋ bɔ n y'a ʋ gʋaa mɛ ʋ bɩ, lʋ nɩ gʋaa yɩm. Bɩ naa haay a to a ʋ Woso zi.
K'a hɔɔn da ma a zim a dɩga a, a a ga m kʋ lʋ n yaa da Woso m b'a n hɔ ka a mim la ra?
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, nyannɩ m kʋ gʋaa yar minkə n bɩr jintə ra? Gʋaa woo••• naa dɔ.
A n bɔkarɛ kʋ lʋ minkə jintə bɩ n a lɛbɔʋrɛ, bala, minkə jintə bɩ ka n y'a ʋ lʋ ʋ, k'a mim bɩ gɔɔta vam y.
Kʋ gʋaa a ʋ, k'a bɩsɩ ka hɔdɩndarɛ naa do ma, k'an a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ kan kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ n minkə hɔ vanta m kʋ yɩnnɩbayɩ naa do bɛɛ y.
Hɔ k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʋ y. Bala, k'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʋ ma k'a yaa da Woso m, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a bam sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ bɩr a darɛ awɔɔ han y, awɔɔ bɔ a nawʋrɛ a jɛ m.
Mim lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ, n y'a hɩ mɔɔ m, n ʋ, k'awɔɔ a so kʋ ma, b'awɔɔ a gʋngʋ a hʋnhɔ. Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʋ, a a da ma an yɩ sɩra.
Denter sɔ, k'awɔɔ a gʋngʋ a hʋnhɔ, bɩ n n'a kam n nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ taalɛrazannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ dɔ.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ a so kʋ ma, Zuuba hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩrɛ tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
Bala, sokʋma bɩ wakatɩ ʋ, gʋaa biyəə nɩ larɛ a mɩŋŋa hɔbɩrɛ ra, maam bɩ, nɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zɛrɛ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ bɛɛ mire an nɩ ŋ zɛm.

Awɔɔ har ba ʋ, awɔɔ nɩ hɔ bɩŋ ʋ, a nɩ hɔ miŋ ʋ ra? Gɛɛ a hɩ awɔɔ ʋ, k'a Krista gʋɔɔ wɔɔ gore bɔ ʋ, k'a a ya a nyannɩ da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba hɔsɩ m nɔ wɔɔ ma ra? Bɔ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʋ ra? Fɩɩgaa! Mɔɔ bɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʋ naa nɔ ʋ y.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta m a dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ, a ma mɔɔ ʋ Zuuba Yeezuu zi: Gum niŋŋə kʋ n'a bam k'a Zuuba nyasʋ a ka kʋ n a zɛ bɩ, gunuu ʋ bɩ do ʋ, a mɩŋŋa bur sa,
an barka da Woso m, an bɔkarɛ an a zɩnzɛ an a jinjir, an a hɩ a ʋ: "Naa do naa, mɔɔ mɛ m, mɔɔ n a ka awɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a tɩr naa ba, a mɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ."
Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a a ba maam sɔ hɔmire bɩ m, an a hɩ a ʋ: "Hɔmire naa do gʋaasɩbabaa daa k'an ta ʋ kɛɛrɛ mɔɔ ma minto bɩ m. K'awɔɔ bʋr an nɩ hɔmire bɩ mim, k'a tɩr a ba, a mɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ."
Bala, wakatɩ haay, k'awɔɔ nɩ Zuuba tɔdaanɔʋ bur bɩ bɩŋ ʋ, an nɩ tɔdaanɔʋ hɔmire bɩ mim bɩ, Zuuba mɩŋŋa zɛ awɔɔ n'a pa darɛ, k'an tolle ba an bʋr.
Bɩ y'a ka gʋaa k'a nɩ Zuuba tɔdaanɔʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩm, gɛɛ an n'a hɔmire bɩ mim, an Zuuba bɔ ʋ bɩ, mim ɩ kan kɩ, bala, a n dɩga Zuuba mɛ bɩ kan a ma bɩ kɩ ma, hɔsɩ y.
Gʋaa biyəə a ga m, an a mɩŋŋa lar an dɩga a k'a jɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa gɛ, k'an a dɔ an bur bɩ bɩ, an hɔmire bɩ mi.
Bala, kʋ gʋaa bur bɩ bɩ, an hɔmire bɩ mi, b'a n a hɔɔn da mɩŋŋa an a dɔ a ʋ, Zuuba mɛ nɩ, a bɩ k'a ʋ, an a mi bɩ, a mɩŋŋa dʋdɔ yarlɛ a ka ma bɩ.
Naa tɔ ma m, awɔɔ barla gʋɔɔ n ta ʋ gʋta, ŋ bɩ laafɩɩ y, gɔsɩnnɔ n a ba yir, nɔɔn n gɩnga.
Kʋ wɔɔ y'ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ m heer daasɩrɛ ʋ zim, Woso bɩ wɔɔ dʋdɔ karɛ y.
Bɩ kʋ Woso wɔɔ dʋdɔ ka, a hɩ a ʋ, k'awɔɔ bɔ zaa ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ nyɩnta durnya gʋɔɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yar, an ŋ da kɔrɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ y.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ a so kʋ ma k'a Zuuba tɔdaanɔʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ, k'a dɔ kʋ ma.
Kʋ nɔ ɩ gʋaa zɛm, k'an lɛɛ ka an hɔ bɩ a har ʋ, k'a b'a so kʋ ma, a a ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ dʋdɔyarlɛ ma y. Kʋ minno kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ bʋr, mɔɔ brɔɔ bɔm kʋ zi.
M danyɩnɔ, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n hɔ k'an ta a nɔ ʋ bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ basɩrakənno biisi bɩ, wosobaawɔnnɔ daʋrɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n a da ma an n'a bɔrɛ ŋ ʋ y.

Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ mɩŋŋa, a ʋ, kʋ Woso Ɛspri a so gʋaa ʋ, a zaa nɩ meer bam, a zaa b'a dam ma an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ ɩ kan Yeezuu kɩ y." Bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma sɔ an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Zuuba m Yeezuu m," kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɛɛ y'a ka y.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ y'a hʋnhɔ, bɩ Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ nɩ ŋ karɛ.
Zibəəro y'a hʋnhɔ n ta ʋ Zuuba nɩ gʋɔɔ darɛ ŋ barɛ ʋ, bɩ Zuuba deem-deem bɩ zibəə m.
Zibəəro zaarɔ y'a hʋnhɔ ta ʋ, bɩ Woso deem-deem bɩ n'a kam gʋɔɔ n'a dam zibəəro wɔɔ duro barɛ ma.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ zi bam kan gʋaa biyəə kɩ ganwʋrɛrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ m, bɩ naa ba an nawʋm k'a a da gʋɔɔ haay han.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ mindɔrɛ meerbaa ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa deem ʋ. A n hɔdɔrɛ meerbaa ganwʋrɛ ka gʋaa vanta ʋ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ do ɩ sɩrakarɛ ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa ʋ, a ɩ waarɛ ganwʋrɛrɔ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ sɔ.

A ɩ hoserlo barɛ ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ, an nɩ Wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ sɔ. A ɩ ɛsprirɔ dɔ n a bɔ kʋ zi ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ, an nɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ, a ɩ leminno wɔɔ duro wusigəre ganwʋrɛ kam gʋaa vanta ʋ sɔ.
Bɩ, naa woo••• naa, Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ zibəə m, an nɩ ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ jinjirm gʋaa biyəə m, a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ gʋaa mɛ deem, an bɔkarɛ a vəŋŋəro m hɔka, bɩ, gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋəro k'a bɩ to an hɔka naa, mɛ deem m bala, Krista maam sɔ.

Bala, wɔɔ haay woo••• naa, Zuuba batɛm ka wɔɔ ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'ʋ yɩ mɛ deem zannɔ, kʋ zɩɩfʋ m wɔɔ m, gɛɛ do vantɔɔ m wɔɔ m, kʋ lɔnnɔ wɔɔ m, gɛɛ soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ m wɔɔ m, ʋ ʋ ba deem, Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ n y'a ka wɔɔ ʋ, an wɔɔ han an bra wɔɔ ra.
Gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋə bɩ deem y, ŋ hɔka.
Kʋ gʋaa gam a hɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ wɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ ba mɛ bɩ barla y," naa do a da ma an a ka, a bɩ nyɩntam mɛ bɩ barla dɔ ra?
Kʋ gʋaa tʋr a hɩ a ʋ: "Kʋ mɩnyaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ ba mɛ bɩ barla y," naa a da ma an a ka a bɩ nyɩntam mɛ bɩ vəŋŋə dɔ ra?
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gʋaa mɛ bɩ jilli, mɩnyaa nɩ, gʋaa tʋr nyɩntam lɛɛ ka ra ʋ? Kʋ gʋaa mɛ bɩ jilli, tʋr nɩ, gʋaa meeyaa nyɩntam lɛɛ ka ra ʋ?
Bɩ sɩra nɔ ʋ, Woso gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋəro haay cɩncɩnta a bɩncɛ ʋ, a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
Kʋ gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ jilli, vəŋŋə deem nɩ, mɛ bɩ nyɩntam ka?
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ hɔka bɩ mɛ deem m.
Gʋaa mɩnyaa b'a dam ma an a hɩ a wɔ m a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ zibəə ba mɔɔ ma y." Gʋaa mim b'a dam ma an a hɩ a gannɔ m sɔ a ʋ: "Awɔɔ zibəə ba mɔɔ ma y."
A n lɛ da bɩ, gʋaa mɛ vəŋŋəro k'ɩ ʋ, ŋ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ fɩɩgaa rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ zibəə n ta ʋ gʋta karɛ.
Wɔɔ mɛ vəŋŋəro kʋ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma ɩ ʋ, ŋ bɩ wɩsɩ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyasʋrɛ ŋ nɩ gʋta, niŋŋoo k'ɩ ʋ nyannɩ bɩncɛrɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyasʋrɛ ŋ nɩ paan•••.
Wɔɔ mɛ vəŋŋəro kʋ ŋ nɩ ta daʋrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ bɩr a kam nyasʋrɛ bɩ do ma y. Woso k'a gʋaa vəŋŋəro da bɩ, a zi bɩ ba a ʋ, kʋ vəŋŋəro kʋ ŋ ba daʋrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ n daʋrɛ yɩ gʋta.
A ba a ʋ maam, kʋ gʋngʋrɛ bɩ nyɩnta mɛ b'ʋ y, bɩ kʋ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ n bɩr nyasʋm kʋ m.
Kʋ mɛ vəŋŋə deem ɩ fɩr yɩm, vəŋŋəro mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ fɩr yɩm kan kɩ. Kʋ vəŋŋə deem daʋrɛ yɩ, vəŋŋəro mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ haay y'a heer nyɔɔm kan kɩ sɔ.
A n bɔkarɛ, Krista mɛ n'awɔɔ m, a mɛ bɩ vəŋŋə n'awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə m, gʋaa biyəə kan a bɩncɛ kɩ.

Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, Woso n gʋɔɔ bɔ ʋ an zibəə ka ŋ ʋ, kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla. Lɛɛkarɛ ma bɩ, kristazibəəzannɔ a ŋ cɩnta. A hɩɩya hɔ ma bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a ŋ cɩnta. A kaakʋ hɔ bɩ, hɔdɩndagʋɔɔnzannɔ a ŋ cɩnta. Bɩ jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hoserlo barɛ ganwʋrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ m, kan yaabarɔ waarɛ ganwʋrɛrɔ zannɔ kɩ, kan daahanzannɔ kɩ, kan lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm zannɔ kɩ.
K'awɔɔ dɩga a naa, awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, ŋ woo••• bɛɛ m kristazibəəzannɔ ra? Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ m wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ sɔ y. Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ m hɔdɩndagʋɔɔnzannɔ y. Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ nɩ hoserlo barɛ y.
Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ nɩ yaabarɔ waarɛ ganwʋrɛrɔ nɩ y. Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ nɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ y. Ŋ woo••• bɛɛ nɩ leminno wɔɔ wusigəre y.
K'a ka ganwʋrɛrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa an lɛ da rɔ wɔɔ ma, kan a heer kɩ haay. Bɩ, kʋ m zaa k'an mɩŋŋa an cem haay bɩ hɩnka a m kɛɛrɛ.
Baa kʋ mɔɔ ɩ leminno haay hɩm, gʋɔɔ hɔ kan malɛɛkarɔ hɔ kɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ba ŋʋarɛ m, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɔ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ kan lɔmbɩr k'a nyi nɩ bɔm kɩ, gɛɛ bɔ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ, kan sɩsaka k'a nyi nɩ bɔm kɩ.

A a da ma mɔɔ m wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ yɩ, m bɩr hɔdɔrɛ m haay, m hɔ k'a a nyaakʋm da haay dɔ, a a da ma mɔɔ m bɩr sɩrakarɛ m haay, m m dam ma m n'a kam ciro n'a gaarɛ a bɩncɛrɔ ʋ, lɛ meerbaa tɔkkɛ ma, kʋ mɔɔ ba ŋʋarɛ m hɔsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y.
Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ to m m hɔnyɩ haay jir cicirzannɔ m, m m da ma sɔ m yɛ fɩr ma, n m da sɛ rɛ, kʋ mɔɔ ba ŋʋarɛ m, naa woo••• naa, vam m.
Kʋ gʋaa ɩ ŋʋarɛ m, a ɩ bʋrlɛ a ma, a ɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bam gʋɔɔ m, a bɩr jɩm barɛ y, a bɩr a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋa ʋ y, a bɩr a mɩŋŋa busure y.
Kʋ gʋaa ɩ ŋʋarɛ m, a bɩr zi daŋŋada barɛ y, a bɩr a karɛ a mɩŋŋa daahan ma y, a nɔ bɩr maŋ ʋ zɔɔ-zɔɔ y, a bɩr mim cɩntarɛ a heer ʋ kan gʋaa kɩ y,
kʋ gʋaa ɩ ŋʋarɛ m, a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm zibʋnyaa barɛ ma y, a heer a n'a nyɔɔm sɩra ma.
Kʋ gʋaa ɩ ŋʋarɛ m, a ɩ sugur bam hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, a ɩ sɩra kam dɔmɩm haay, a ɩ taaheerlɛ m tee•••, a ɩ yɛm kɔrɛ do haay ma.
Ŋʋarɛ nyarɛ ba ʋ y. Wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaarɔ ganwʋrɛ nyarɛ, leminno y'a hʋnhɔ rɔ wɔɔ hɩrɛ nyarɛ, hɔdɔrɛ nyam sɔ.
Bala, wɔɔ n hɔ haay dɔ y, wosolɛsinnɩsora zibəə kʋ wɔɔ n'a bam sɔ bɩ, wɔɔ bɩr a barɛ an n'a gam kʋ ʋ haay y.
Bɩ, kʋ hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa paan••• bɩ bɩ bʋr, hɔ k'a jirə n ta ʋ bɩ nyarɛ.
Nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ nyɩ bɩ, nyɩnzɛɛmbaa meer mɔɔ n'a barɛ, m nɩ m hɔɔn darɛ am nyɩ hɔ bɩ m, m nɩ nyɩbaa hɔɔn m. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ bɩ m ba gʋaa burgu bɩ, mɔɔ nyɩbaa zibəəro wɔɔ to.

Her-her naa, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, dɩga wɔɔ nawʋm jɛtɩga ʋ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma bɩ bɩr yɩm fasɩ y, bɩ dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm wɔɔ m b'a yɩm garga ra haay. Her-her naa, mɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ jirə ta ʋ, bɩ hinni bɩ do ʋ, mɔɔ hɔ haay dɔm, amba Woso mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ m.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, hɔɔ kaakʋrɔ nɔɔn duro n ta ʋ, bɩ ŋ nyarɛ ba ʋ y: Sɩrakarɛ m, bɩ taaheerlɛ m kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, bɩ ŋʋarɛ ɩ lɛ da ŋ nɩ haay.
K'a a ka kʋ ŋʋarɛ ma paan•••, a a ka Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ kan a heer kɩ haay, an lɛ da bɩ, k'a a ka wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ bɩ ma.

Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm bɩ, a hɩ bɛɛ a nawʋm kan gʋɔɔ kɩ y, meer bɩ ba a nawʋm kan Woso kɩ. Gɔsɩ bɩr hɔ k'a n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ marɛ y, hɔɔ kʋ n y'a nyaakʋm da, an nɩ ŋ hɩm Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m.
Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la bɩ, meer bɩ ba a nawʋm kan gʋɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ ŋ paŋŋa dam la, an nɩ ŋ heer yom, an nɩ ŋ heer wʋtam.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm bɩ, a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa an n'a dam la, bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la bɩ, sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ an nɩ ŋ paŋŋa dam la.

Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ haay n bɩr lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm, bɩ mɔɔ n a ŋʋa an lɛ da bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la, bɩ m jɩra. Gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la bɩ, a lɛ da gʋaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm bɩ m, k'a maam lemim bɩ wusigə a ʋ, sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a jɩ ma, an ŋ paŋŋa da ra.

M danyɩnɔ, k'a hɔɔn da a dɩga a. Kʋ mɔɔ bʋr awɔɔ zi, m nɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ, bɩ Woso n hɔ hɩnka mɔɔ m, mɔɔ n a jɩ dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ n awɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ da ra y, bɩ mɔɔ n Woso lɛ si m so ra y, bɩ mɔɔ n hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y, ncɩnaaʋ bɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ nyɔɔdʋ y'awɔɔ ma ka?
A do m naa sɔ kan sarbarɛ mɔdrɔ kɩ. Kɔnnɩ gɛɛ hir, kʋ ŋ nyi bɩr bɔm mɩŋŋa, gʋaa y'a bam lɔ k'a a tʋr ka kɔnnɩ bɩ, gɛɛ hir bɩ ma?
Kʋ n huure hɛ kʋ gʋɔɔ n bɔ ŋnɩ ta yar ma, kʋ huure bɩ nyi bɩr bɔm zore, gʋɔɔ y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a bir n nawʋm yarbarɛ ma, k'a banka a ta?
A do m bɩ sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩ, bɩ lemim bɩ do jɩ bɩr marɛ y, ŋ y'a bam lɔ k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ dɔ? A bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, meer awɔɔ n'a bam vam.
Leminno ɩ durnya naa ʋ gʋta ŋn'a hʋnhɔ, bɩ ŋ woo••• naa, ŋ jɩ ta ʋ.
Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩr lemim kʋ gʋaa n'a hɩm kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ marɛ, a zaa ɩ dɩgam mɔɔ ma saana kan a kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ a zaa ma saana sɔ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, k'awɔɔ nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋʋam paan••• bɩ, k'a ka ganwʋrɛrɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ n ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n ŋ yɩ gʋta.
Bɩ y'a ka, gʋaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm b'a ga m, an a yɛ Woso han, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n leminno wɔɔ wusigəre ganwʋrɛ ka a ʋ sɔ.
Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m lemim vanta m, mɔɔ heer ɩ yaa bɩ darɛ nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ marɛ y.
Ncɩnaaʋ naa, bɔ mɔɔ n n'a barɛ? Mɔɔ yaa dam lemim y'a hʋnhɔ bɩ m, bɩ mɔɔ yaa dam lemim kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a mam bɩ m sɔ. Mɔɔ laa lɔm lemim y'a hʋnhɔ bɩ m, bɩ mɔɔ laa lɔm lemim kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a mam bɩ m sɔ.

Bala, k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka lemim y'a hʋnhɔ nɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɩntam sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla, bɩ ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ naa nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ k'a hɩ a ʋ "Amina" ɩ barka yaa bɩ darɛ ma? Bala, ŋ bɩr hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ marɛ y.
A a da ma, ɩbɩɩ barka yaa bɩ darɛ bɩ m bɩr mɩŋŋa gʋta, b'a bɩr a dam gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ han sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ y, kʋ ŋ bɩr hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm bɩ mam bɩ tɔ ma.
Mɔɔ ɩ Woso barka dam, kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm gʋta, an cem awɔɔ haay han bɩ minto.
Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ta m nɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma barla, kʋ mɔɔ meerbaanyɩ ba soor gʋɔɔ n a ma an a da ŋ han, a jɩra kʋ mɔɔ n meer ba yɔɔgʋ lemim vanta m.
M danyɩnɔ, a bɩ tɩr a hɔɔn da am nyɩnzɛɛnnyɩnɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y, k'a tɩr a hɔɔn da am gʋɔɔ burgurɔ hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ kʋ mimbʋnyaa bɩncɛ nɩ, k'a yɩ am nyɩnzɛɛnnyɩnɔ hɔ bɩ m.
N y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: Do k'a nɩ lemim vanta hɩm mɔɔ n'a sarɛ, m meer ba kan Israyɛl do bɩ kɩ, saanɔɔ mɔɔ nɩ ŋ sarɛ, m meer ba kan ŋ kɩ, baa kan naa kɩ haay ŋ b'a tʋr kam mɔɔ ma y.

Naa minto bɩ, leminno y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ bɩ, makra a n'a hɩnkam basɩrakənno wɔɔ m, a bɩr hɔsɩ hɩnkam sɩrakənno wɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ bɩ, makra a n'a hɩnkam sɩrakənno wɔɔ m, b'a bɩr hɔsɩ hɩnkam basɩrakənno wɔɔ nɩ y.
K'awɔɔ a so kʋ ma haay, a a da kʋ ʋ haay an nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔsɩ dɔ a nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ gɛɛ basɩrakənno bɩ gasʋ awɔɔ zi, ŋ b'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, hɔɔzannɔ n'awɔɔ m na?

Bɩ k'awɔɔ haay ɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la, kʋ basɩrakər, gɛɛ gʋaa k'a n hɔsɩ dɔ naa nɔ ʋ bɩ, gasʋ awɔɔ zi, a y'a dɔrɛ a heer ʋ a ʋ, a y'a bʋnyaa bam, hɔ k'a n'a mam bɩ y'a karɛ an a dɔ a ʋ, a kʋrɔ ma, gʋaa haay n'a dʋdɔ yarm.
Hɔ k'a n'a heer ʋ haay bɔm garga ra, bɩ n a ka an kukurə zɛ Woso taa, an Woso da ʋ, an kasɛtɩ ka, a ʋ, Woso y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, denter.

Bɔ y'a ga barɛ m kɛɛrɛ? K'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʋ ma, kʋ gʋaa ʋ k'a laa lɔ, gʋaa vanta k'a hɔ dɩnda, Woso n hɔ hɩnka gʋaa vanta m k'a n'a hɩ, kʋ gʋaa vanta ɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ m sɔ, deem nɩ lemim bɩ wusigəre nɩ, naa woo••• naa, a a ga m an ba sokʋmagʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay sɩrakarɛ talɛɛ tɔ ma.
K'awɔɔ tɩr meer ba lemim y'a hʋnhɔ nɩ, kʋ gʋaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ bala n meer bɩ ba lemim y'a hʋnhɔ bɩ m, deem-deem, kʋ gʋaa deem n a si an bɩr a wusigəre.
Kʋ gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ bɩ wusigəm sokʋma bɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩrɛ zannɔ wɔɔ n ze pi, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɩrɛ a heer ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr meer bam kan Woso kɩ.
Kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ bɩ nɩ, kʋ gʋaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ m Woso lɛ bɩ si, ŋnɩ so ra. Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ n a tʋr ka ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ dɩga a Woso meerbaarɔ m denter gɛ.
Kʋ Woso hɔ hɩnka gʋaa vanta m gʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla k'a n'a hɩ, kʋ gʋaa k'a lɛɛ ka an nɩ meer bam bɩ n ze pi, kʋ bɩ n a hɔ bɩ hɩ.
Awɔɔ a da ma a Woso lɛ si a so ra haay, bɩ k'a bɩr a bam deem-deem, kʋ gʋaa haay m daahan yɩ a nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ paŋŋa yɩ ŋnɩ ta lɛɛ.
Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a da ma, ŋn'a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma,
amba kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ haay n'a bam bɩ m. Bala, Woso lɛ baa warkʋma ma y, hɔ haay n ba laafɩɩ an a ga kʋ ʋ bɩ an n'a ŋʋam.
K'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʋ ma, kʋ lannɔ wɔɔ n ze pi, ŋ ba lɛ m k'a meer ba sokʋma nɔ ʋ y, ŋnɩ nyɩnta sɩɩ••• ŋnɩ bɩr a tʋr kam amba Moyiisi lɛrɔ a hɩ bɩ m.
Kʋ ŋ lɛ taa k'a laaka da hɔ niŋŋə ma k'a jɩ dɔ, kʋ ŋ n'a to ŋn'aa laaka da a zino han har ʋ. A bɩ zore kʋ lʋ m meer ba sokʋma nɔ ʋ y.
A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ Woso lemim bɩ, a to a ʋ, awɔɔ zi ra? Gɛɛ, a gɩnga awɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n ta m a minto ra?
Kʋ gʋaa y'a gɩngarɛ a ʋ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa n a mɩ, gɛɛ a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʋ, k'a n'a dɔ a ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ gʋrsɩra ba awɔɔ ma naa, Zuuba mɩŋŋa lɛ m.
Kʋ gʋaa a ʋ, a bɩ yɛm hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ naa ma, k'a dɔ a ʋ, Woso n a zaa dɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa barɛ zaa y.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, k'a ka wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʋrɛ bɩ ma kan a heer kɩ haay, b'a b'a ta gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lemim y'a hʋnhɔ hɩm nɔ wɔɔ m toore y.
Bɩ k'a ka ma, kʋ hɔ haay woo••• n ba an a ga kʋ ʋ, warkʋma bɩ yɩ ʋ y.
M danyɩnɔ, lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n a si, a gɔɔta a sɩra ka ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ bɩ, mɔɔ n'a tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʋ.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do n'awɔɔ bʋmbɔm, k'awɔɔ nyasʋm amba mɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ m. Bɩ k'awɔɔ n nyasʋm mɩŋŋa, sɩra k'awɔɔ ka bɩ bɔm vam.
Lɛɛ mɔɔ ka m hɔ kʋ n y'a dɩnda mɔɔ m bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Krista ga wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, amba n y'a da Wosoci ʋ bɩ m.
N y'a bir, an a mɩm bɔ ʋ a dɔmɩm kaakʋ hinni ʋ, amba Wosoci a hɩ bɩ m.
A a hɩnka Sefas m, bɩ jɛ ʋ an a hɩnka bueerehɩɩyɔɔ k'a ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Dɔmɩm vanta ʋ, an a hɩnka wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kristagʋɔɔ bam zɔrsoor m lɛ deem, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro gɔsɩnnɔ gɩnga, gʋta gɔɔta ŋnɩ mɩsɩr.
Naa jɛ ʋ, a a hɩnka Zakkɩ m, an b'a hɩnka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m haay.
Nawɔnnɔ woo••• jɛ ʋ, an b'a a hɩnka mɔɔ m sɔ, mɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan nyɩ k'a yɩ b'a dɔmɩm n a ku bɩ kɩ bɩ.
Bala, mɔɔ m kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ haay poore, mɔɔ n m ga m, kʋ n nɩ m bir kristazibəəzaa y, bala, mɔɔ fɩr ka Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma ma.
Bɩ, m ba kʋ mɔɔ ʋ gʋaa niŋŋə her naa, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, b'a barka bɩ n bɔ vam mɔɔ gʋr zi y. Bɩ mɔɔ zi ba, m lɛ da ŋ haay ra, bɩ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa bɛɛ y, Woso barka k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ m.
Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ, gɛɛ zibəəzannɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ, bɩ bɛɛ pakra ba y. Lemim deem wɔɔ n'a pa dam, bɩ lemim bɩ do awɔɔ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ.
Wɔɔ y'a pa dam ʋ ʋ, Krista a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, b'a a ba lɔ awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, gəəno b'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ?
Kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ, k'a maam, Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʋ wa.
Bɩ k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʋ, wɔɔ pa bɩ darɛ jɩ ba ʋ wa. B'awɔɔ sɩra bɩ karɛ vam sɔ wa.
Bɩ, kʋ ncɩnaaʋ m, ŋʋaar kasɛtɩ zannɔ m wɔɔ m Woso mim bɩ nɔ ʋ. Bala, wɔɔ hɩ ʋ ʋ, Woso Krista mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, bɩ kʋ gʋɔɔ bɩr a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, k'a maam Woso n Krista mɩm bɔ ʋ y.
Kʋ gəəno bɩr a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, k'a maam Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʋ y.
Bɩ kʋ Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʋ, sɩra awɔɔ ka nɩbɩr, awɔɔ gɔɔta an n'a mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ tee•••.
Naa k'a hɩ sɔ a ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʋ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ ɩ nyaanlɛ nɔ ʋ.
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, her mɩsɩrbaa naa daahan tɔ ma m bala wɔɔ n sɩra ka Krista ʋ, yaanda barɛ paan••• zannɔ m wɔɔ m, an cem gʋɔɔ haay han.
B'a bɩ ncɩnaaʋ y, Krista a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ paan•••. Lɛɛ a ka an a mɩm bɔ ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ n b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ sɔ.
Bala, gʋaa deem y'a ka zɛ n bʋr durnya ʋ, gʋaa deem tɔ ma m sɔ, gəəno n'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ.
Adam minto y'a ka gʋɔɔ n ta ʋ, bɩ y'a ka gʋɔɔ nɩ gɩngam sɔ. Bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista kɩ rɔ wɔɔ haay y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ, Krista tɔ ma sɔ.
Bɩ, mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ, yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ: Krista m lɛɛkarɛzaa, a lɛɛ ka an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ. K'a b'a bɔ an bʋr kɛɛrɛ, gʋɔɔ k'a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ.

Naa jɛ ʋ, Yeezuu Krista zinəro wɔɔ kan a cinno kɩ paŋŋa zaar bam, a paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya ʋ haay paŋŋa zaar bam. K'a ŋ paŋŋa zaar ba, bɩ jɛ ʋ, durnya nyarɛ, an bɔkarɛ an cirbəə kʋ Woso a ka ʋ bɩ da Zɩ Woso wɔ ʋ.
Bala, a a ga m, k'an a so cirbəə ʋ, kʋ Woso n tolle ba, an a ka an bʋr a jɩnnɔ ra, an tʋntɔ ŋ la.
Jɩm k'a nɩ gɔɔtam jɛ ʋ, n n'a zaar bam bɩ n zɛ m.
Bala, n y'a da Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Woso a ka hɔ woo••• n'a gannɔ taa." Bɩ Wosoci bɩ k'a hɩ a ʋ, hɔ haay woo••• y'a taa bɩ, a ba Woso mɩŋŋa burə ʋ wa, bala, Woso mɩŋŋa y'a ka an nɩ hɔ haay woo••• burə ʋ.

Bɩ, kʋ Woso b'a ka Krista nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ, Krista mɩŋŋa k'a m Woso Nyɩ bɩ y'a mɩŋŋa zerm Woso taa, bala a y'a ka an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ. Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, Woso mɩŋŋa m bɩ nyɩntam hɔ haay soʋrezaa, gʋɔɔ haay burə ʋ.
Kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ, bɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ batɛm sim gəəno tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ n'a barɛ? Kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ denter, bɔ tɔ ma m ŋnɩ batɛm sire ŋ minto?
Bɩ bɔ m sɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, wɔɔ nɩ yɛm wɔɔ zibəə bɩ nɩ wɔɔ dam mim kʋsɩ lɛ ʋ?
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa, dɔmɩm biyəə mɔɔ ɩ zɛ lɛ ʋ. M danyɩnɔ, naa hɩ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, kʋ mɔɔ heer nɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ minto Zuuba Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.

Gʋɔɔ fɩr ka mɔɔ ma Efɛɛzɩ ʋ naa ʋ, ɩ ʋ poohɔɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, mɔɔ m zoo ba kan ŋ kɩ kɔɔkɔɔ. Kʋ naa ba mɔɔ ʋ durnya naa do hɔ yɩrɛ tɔ ma, a nyɔɔdʋ m bɔ nɩ? Kʋ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ, k'a maam k'a ba amba bɔɔr naa do a hɩ bɩ m: "Ʋ ʋ da hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ lɛ ʋ bala, k'ʋ bɩr bɛɛ mim bala, bala, booti m, ʋ gɩngam."
A bɩ bra bɩmba a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ y. Bala, n ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ɩ kan zukuuro bʋnyaarɔ kɩ, a ba a nawʋm gʋaa bʋnyaa sɔ."
K'a a bɔ hɔɔn daŋŋada k'awɔɔ n ta m b'ʋ, k'a mimbʋnyaabarɛ to fasɩ. Awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n Woso dɔ cɩna y, awɔɔ nyannɩ n bɩ.
A a da ma gʋaa n laaka da a ʋ, gəəno y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a mɩm bɔ ʋ? Kʋ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, ŋ mɛ bɩ yɩm lʋnlɔ?
Hɔɔnwarzaa ra, hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a duum bɩ, k'an ga a bɔm na?
Bɩ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a duum bɩ, kʋ yɩryaa m gɛɛ hɔ vanta m, hɔ bɩ yaa ɩbɩɩ n'a duum, a gɔ bɛɛ ɩbɩɩ n'a sɔɔn wa.
Ba ɩbɩɩ duu bɩ, bɩ Woso a ka an bɔ, a do n a hɔ kan hɔyaa do vantɔɔ kɩ, amba Woso mɩŋŋa lɛ n taa bɩ m, hɔyaa do biyəə y'a hɔ.
Hɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ rɔ nɔɔm, biyəə mɛ y'a hɔ. Gʋɔɔ mɛrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ, poo kan harhɔɔ kɩ, bɛnnɔ kɩ, zɔnɔ kɩ mɛrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ sɔ.
Hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kan hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tara burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ y'a hʋnhɔ, ŋ gʋɛrɛ y'a hʋnhɔ sɔ.
Wosogure lɛɛgure y'a hɔ, mom hɔ y'a hɔ, monyaarɔ lɛɛgure y'a hʋnhɔ sɔ, monyaarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛɛgure lɛ dɩnda kʋ m.
Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ ma. Kʋ n ta k'a yaa gər bir, a do m ba n tɩr hɔyaa duu bɩ m. Gər bɩ hɔ vɔnrɛzaa m, bɩ k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, a bɩ vɔnm dɔ y.
Gər ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔ nyɔɔdʋwarzaa m, paŋŋawarzaa m sɔ n n'a birm maam, an bɔkarɛ an n'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ an nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m kan paŋŋa kɩ m gʋta.
Gər birle ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, tara burə hɔ n n'a birm bala, an bɔkarɛ k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, a mɛ b'a ba arzana mɛ. K'ʋ n nɩ tara burə ʋ naa ʋ naa, kʋ mɛ ta ʋ, arzana ʋ, mɛ nyɩntaŋ ʋ sɔ.
Naa tɔ ma m, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: "Gʋaa lɛɛkarɛzaa Adam a ba gʋaa mɩsɩr. Bɩ Krista bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, Adam hɩyaazaa m, bɩ bʋr a ʋ, jɛ ʋ, b'a m Ɛspri k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa karɛ."
Bɩ lɛɛkarɛ mɛ k'an ta ʋ bɩ, mɛ kʋ Woso Ɛspri a ka bɩ bɛɛ m bɩ, durnya hɔ m bɩ. Woso Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ, zɛ bɩ n nawʋm jɛ ʋ.
Gʋaa lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ, durnya gʋaa m bɩ, a bɔ n y'a ʋ taa ʋ. Gʋaa hɩɩyazaa bɩ, a to b'ʋ arzana ʋ.
Gʋaa kʋ durnya gʋaa m bɩ, durnya gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɔ bɩ rɛ, gʋaa kʋ arzana gʋaa m bɩ, arzana gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɔ bɩ rɛ sɔ.
Dɩɩtaa naa, wɔɔ bɔ durnya gʋaa bɩ rɛ, Bɩ, dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm, wɔɔ n bɩ zɛm bɩ bɔ arzana gʋaa bɩ rɛ sɔ.
M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ m ʋ, gʋaa b'a dam ma an gasʋ Woso cirbəə b'ʋ, a mɛsim nɩ y. Hɔ k'a nɩ vɔnm bɩ b'a dam ma an hɔ k'a bɩr vɔnm bɩ yɩ y.
K'a dɩga a, kʋ m hɔ kʋ gɔsɩ n a dɔ hɩ a m. Ʋ woo••• naa, ʋ bɩ gɩngam haay y, bɩ ʋ da ʋ nawʋm kʋ ʋ haay ʋ ʋ lʋr.
Ba naa do n nawʋm, huure jɛzaa bɩ hɛrɛ ma, ʋ lʋr ʋ n nawʋm lɛɛm-lɛɛm, am mɩm nɩfɩ zɛrɛ m. Bala, kʋ n bɩ huure bɩ hɛ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʋ mɛ k'a bɩ vɔnm dɔ m, wɔɔ n'ʋ lʋr.
Bala, wɔɔ k'ʋ nɩ gɩngam, ʋ nɩ vɔnm naa, pakra m kʋ wɔɔ n mɛ k'a bɩ gam fɩɩga y, b'a bɩ vɔnm sɔ sa.
Kʋ wɔɔ mɛrɔ b'a lʋr ncɩnaaʋ, hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ kʋ yɩm, n ʋ: Zɛ ba ʋ dɔ y, n bʋr zɛ ra.
Zɛ ra, ɩ dama bii? Ɩ paŋŋa bii?
Zɛ paŋŋa bɩ m mimbʋnyaa m, mimbʋnyaa paŋŋa bɩ m Moyiisi lɛrɔ m.
Ʋ yaa da Woso m barka, an n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ bʋrm hɔ haay ra, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a b'a ka hɔsɩ n a da a ma y, k'a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee••• Zuuba zibəə nɔ ʋ, bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, kɔ k'awɔɔ nawʋm Zuuba zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ, a bɩ zɛm bɩ bɔ vam nɩ y.
Kʋ busoo zɩnzɛkʋra n a ka kristagʋɔɔ ʋ bɩ bɩncɛ nɩ, k'a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ Galasii kʋrɔ wɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ba sɔ.

Hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ ba n nɩ: Hatʋ hinni biyəə ʋ, k'awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə n dɩga busoo k'an ta m ma an a bɔ ʋ an a cɩnta a hɔ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku, k'awɔɔ b'a ya a ka ma k'a busoo zɩnzɛ kʋ ra y.
Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku, mɔɔ ci bam m a ka gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ ŋ bɔŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta a ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ m ŋn'aa ŋ ka Zerizalɛm kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m kan busoo bɩ kɩ.
K'a bʋr an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, a a ga m kʋ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa n ta, ŋ tam kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Ta mɔɔ nawʋm Masedʋan kʋ ʋ, m a dɔ m lee ku awɔɔ zi, bra mɔɔ nawʋm b'ʋ, m bʋr awɔɔ zi.
A a da ma, mɔɔ n nyɩnta awɔɔ zi b'ʋ poore, gɛɛ m nyɩnta b'ʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʋ, k'awɔɔ n a da mɔɔ han, m zaa bɩ sarɛ ma, baa kʋ ta mɔɔ nawʋm ka.
Naa do ma naa, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m dɩga awɔɔ ma cenle ma y, mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m bɩ gɔɔta kan a kɩ poore, kʋ Zuuba yɛ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ gɔɔtam Efɛɛzɩ kʋ ʋ naa ʋ, an ta an pantɩkɔtɩ cibsa dɔmɩm ku.
Bala, Woso a ka mɔɔ nɩ m dam ma m zi ba naa ʋ gʋta, bɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ gʋta sɔ.
Kʋ Timote bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, k'a nyasʋ m mɩŋŋa, k'a heer n nyɔɔ, bala, Zuuba zi an n'a bam sɔ am mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
Gɔsɩ b'a gore bɔ ʋ y. K'a a da han k'an a bɔ an bʋr mɔɔ zi laafɩɩ, bala, mɔɔ y'a mɩm dam, kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Kʋ wɔɔ danyɩ Apolɔs nɩ, mɔɔ hɩ m gallɛm hɔka k'an bʋr awɔɔ zi kan ʋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, b'a lɛ baa fɩɩgaa k'a ta awɔɔ zi b'ʋ dɩɩtaa y, k'a bɩ toore yɩ, a zɛm.
K'a dundo a zi, a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, a bɩr heer koodə m, a bɩr paŋŋa m.
K'a hɔ haay woo••• ba ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Stefanas kan a hargʋɔɔ kɩ ɩ lɛɛ ka ŋn'a ba sɩrakənno Akayii kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Ŋ y'a tʋntɔ ʋ paan••• ŋn'a da kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ han Woso zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ a m,
k'a yɛ gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zi bam, ŋn'ɩ kɔrɛ yɩm kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ.
Mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm gʋta, Stefanas k'a nɩ naa ʋ, kan Fɔrtɩnatus kɩ, Akayikus kɩ bɩ tɔ ma, kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Bala, ŋ minto bɩ, mɔɔ heer koodə yɩ, ŋ y'awɔɔ heer ba kookoo sɔ. Gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ a ga daʋrɛ m paan•••.
Azii kʋrɔ wɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. Akilas kan Priska kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m danyɩbaa Zuuba nɔ ʋ minto. Kristagʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a som kʋ ma ŋ har ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m sɔ.
Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. K'a yaa da kʋ m mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa kan daʋrɛ kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ leersore naa do gʋrsɩra bam.
Kʋ gʋaa n Zuuba ŋʋa y, Woso lerbɔrɛ bʋnyaa ɩ kan a zaa kɩ. "Maranata" a jɩ k'a hɩ a ʋ, Zuuba n bʋr.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ Zuuba n'awɔɔ barka da ʋ.
Mɔɔ y'awɔɔ woo••• ŋʋam Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʋ.

Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ m ba Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa, mɔɔ kan wɔɔ danyɩ Timote kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ bam, a ba wɔɔ nawʋm Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma k'a nɩ Korɛntɩ ʋ bɩ ma. A ba wɔɔ nawʋm wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Akayii kʋrɔ vantɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma haay sɔ.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm wɔɔ Zɩ Woso, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka a ʋ.
Ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ bɩ, wɔɔ Zɩ m, an n'a mɩŋŋa bam gʋɔɔ m tee•••, an nɩ ŋ heer wʋtam mim haay nɔ ʋ.
A ɩ wɔɔ heer wʋtam wɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ haay nɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma, ʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr do haay yɩm nɔ wɔɔ heer wʋta sɔ, heerwʋtarɛ kʋ wɔɔ yɩ a mɩŋŋa zi bɩ m.
Denter m, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩm gʋta amba Krista fɩr yɩ bɩ m bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, Woso ɩ wɔɔ heer wʋtam gʋta Krista tɔ ma.
Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm, fɩr bɩ yɩ wɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n heerwʋtarɛ yɩ, a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ. Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ heerwʋtarɛ yɩrɛ, a yɩ wɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n a da ma a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ lɔɔrɔ nɔ ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma m wɔɔ heer n kookoo awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ, bala, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ nɩ fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ heerwʋtarɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta m bɩ m sɔ.
Wɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n'a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ fɩr yɩ gʋta Azii kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ fɩr yɩ maam-maam an cem wɔɔ paŋŋa han. Wɔɔ n a gɩnga, ʋ ʋ, ʋ lam fɩr naa do nɔ ʋ y.
Ɩɩn••• yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ karɛ, a gɩnga wɔɔ ʋ, ʋ ʋ, wɔɔ dʋdɔ n y'a yar k'a wɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ. Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, wɔɔ n ʋ da ma dɔ, ʋ yo ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma y, wɔɔ n yo Woso ma, bala, an nɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʋ.
A wɔɔ yɔ karɛ fɩryɩrɛrɔ maam-maam kʋ ŋ y'a yo k'a wɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʋ. Wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, a ba n nɩ wɔɔ yɔm tee••• ŋ wɔ ʋ.

Awɔɔ y'a dam wɔɔ han sɔ, yaa k'awɔɔ n n'a dam wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ minto. Yɩ an nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, wɔɔ n daahan yɩ Woso zi gʋta, gʋɔɔ cir kʋ ŋ yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ minto. Naa n'a kam sɔ gʋɔɔ gʋta n yaa da m barka.

Hɔ k'a nɩ wɔɔ heer bam nyɩnta kan ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ noom k'an fu an nɩ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam mɩŋŋa bɩ m. Bala, wɔɔ ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ba kan gʋaa haay kɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, kan awɔɔ kɩ sɩra nɔ ʋ, kan ʋ heer kɩ haay. Woso y'a da wɔɔ han, a barka bɩ tɔ ma m wɔɔ n wɔ ʋ, ʋ naa ba, wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ mindɔrɛ bɛɛ y.
Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a gʋrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma biyəə bɩ, a ba wɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʋ, a karɩnda ba, a jɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam, m ʋ, awɔɔ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a hɩ naa jɩ mam mɩŋŋa fasɩ.
Dɩɩtaa naa, awɔɔ y'a jɩ mam poore a ʋ, wɔɔ nɩ yɩm awɔɔ heernyɔɔ, b'awɔɔ yɩm wɔɔ heernyɔɔ sɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu wusigəre hinni ʋ.
Mɔɔ naa nyasʋ m heer ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ hɔɔ, m a cɩnta kʋ m lɛɛ ka m bɔ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, m awɔɔ heernyɔɔ da ra gallɛm hɩɩya.
Kʋ m m to awɔɔ zi b'ʋ m ta Masedʋan ʋ, kʋ m bɩ m to Masedʋan ʋ, m bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ k'awɔɔ n b'a da m han kʋ m ta Zidee ʋ.

A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ gɩnga naa do kʋ mɔɔ wʋ bɩ, dɔ mɔɔ ka ra? Gɛɛ a hɩ awɔɔ ʋ, m gɩngarɔ wɔɔ wʋ mɔɔ nawʋm amba durnya gʋɔɔ hɔ bɩ m na? M n'a hɩm m ʋ, ɩɩn••• mɔɔ naa bam, m m ya m jɩm b'ʋ, m ʋ, ayy••• mɔɔ bɩ naa barɛ y.
Sɩrazaa m Woso m, a m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, meer kʋ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a n nyɩnta hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya nɔ ʋ y.
Bala, Yeezuu Krista kʋ Woso Nyɩ m bɩ lemim kʋ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ kan Silas kɩ, Timote kɩ bɩ, lemim bɩ do n nyɩnta "Ɩɩn••• kan Ayy••• kɩ" nɔ ʋ y. Nyɩnta a ʋ, sɩra nɔ ʋ.
Bala, Yeezuu mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m, Woso n nɩ hɔ k'a ler bɔ haay barɛ. Bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ nɩ "Amina" dam Yeezuu tɔ ma, ʋ n'ʋ lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ.
Woso nɩ wɔɔ paŋŋa dam la, awɔɔ kan wɔɔ kɩ Krista zuure nɔ ʋ. A ɩ wɔɔ bɔ ʋ, ʋ hɔ,
an a wɔjɩ da wɔɔ ʋ a Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a zɛm bɩ hɔ k'a ler bɔ wɔɔ m haay ka wɔɔ ʋ.
Woso mɔɔ n'a barɛ m kasɛtɩzaa, kʋ mɔɔ ga a jɩra mɔɔ m ŋʋaarbarɛ m. Kʋ mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m awɔɔ heer kɔ bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n m ya m bʋr awɔɔ zi Korɛntɩ ʋ y.
Wɔɔ bɩr ʋ kam ma kʋ minno niŋŋoo dɩnda awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka ŋ ʋ paŋŋa nɩ y. Awɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩra ka Krista ʋ nɔ ʋ kara. Bɩ, ʋ da wɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'awɔɔ n heernyɔɔ yɩ.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ cɩnta m heer ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: Mɔɔ bɩ n bɔrɛ m bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ heerzar nɔ ʋ y.
Kʋ mɔɔ awɔɔ heer zaar ba, nka nɩ heernyɔɔ kam mɔɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ awɔɔ heer zaar ba rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ?

Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ n lɛɛ ka m ci ba awɔɔ ma ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi k'awɔɔ n mɔɔ da heerzar ma, an bɔkarɛ awɔɔ y'a ga m a mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ bɩ tɔ ma m. Bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ paan••• m ʋ, awɔɔ haay, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ heernyɔɔ m, awɔɔ heernyɔɔ m sɔ.
Ci bɩ do kʋ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma naa, a n yɩ mɔɔ ma naanaa y, a ba mɔɔ ʋ kan heerzar kɩ, m nyi ka. Mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m awɔɔ heer zar y, ci bɩ ba mɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ ŋʋam gʋta.
K'awɔɔ gʋaa nyɩnta an bʋr heerzar nɩ, mɔɔ bɛɛ a m heer zar y, awɔɔ haay a a heer zar, gɛɛ awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ m.
A da k'awɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ a hʋnhʋr bɩ, a a zaa bɔ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a sugur ka ʋ, a heer wʋta, k'a heer b'a zar an bɔɔlam ba y.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han k'a a ŋʋarɛ hɩnka m.
Bala, ci bɩ kʋ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma bɩ, m ka mɔɔ ʋ ma kʋ m dɩga a k'awɔɔ ɩ mim sim fasɩ-fasɩ gɛ.
K'awɔɔ sugur ka gʋaa ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ sugur karɛ a zaa ʋ sɔ. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ sugur ka gʋaa ʋ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ a ga a ʋ m kʋ m sugur ka ʋ, a ba mɔɔ nawʋm awɔɔ tɔ ma, Krista mɩm m.
A ba wɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, k'ʋ bɩ zaa ka Sʋtaana ʋ, k'an wɔɔ ku y. Bala, gɩngarɔ k'an ta m nɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ŋ dɔ mɩŋŋa.
Mɔɔ m hʋr m ta Trowas ʋ, kʋ m aa Krista lemim nyɩnta pa da, kʋ mɔɔ yaa lee ku bɩ, mɔɔ yaa dɩga a Zuuba zaa banka gʋta, kʋ m lemim bɩ pa da.
Bɩ, heerkɔrɛ gʋta mɔɔ nyɩnta a nɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n wɔɔ danyɩ Tiitɩ yɩ bɩ tɔ ma. A m naa, mɔɔ n zaa yɛ Trowas gʋɔɔ wɔɔ han m m len so ŋ nɩ, m m hʋr, m ta Masedʋan ʋ.
Krista a da a jɩnnɔ haay ma, an nɩ ŋ gɩngaatarɛ an nɩ yirbə sire ŋ nɩ. Woso tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, k'a nɩ wɔɔ gaam Krista da ma naa do nɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay, an n'a kam gʋɔɔ nɩ Krista dɔm lɛɛ haay ʋ bɩ minto.
Bala, wɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan tidəər ji nyɩnta kɩ, Krista n'a kam Woso ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ zaa ra rɔ wɔɔ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'ɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ k'ɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma tidəər.

Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'ɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kan brɔɔ kɩ zɛ wɔɔ nɩ zɛm nɩ, ŋn'ɩ gɩngarɛ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ zaa ra rɔ wɔɔ, kan brɔɔ kɩ, mɩsɩrbaa wɔɔ nɩ zɛm nɩ, ŋn'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩm sɔ. Bɩ, kʋ Woso bɛɛ m, nka ɩ wɔ ʋ, an nɩ zi naa do barɛ?
Wɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Woso lemim bɩ sa, ŋn'ɩ ter bam nɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ y. Bɩ kʋ Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ, a lemim bɩ pa wɔɔ n'a dam kan sɩra kɩ, a mɩm m, kʋ Krista zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ tɔ ma.

Awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, a hɩ wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ, ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ ra? Wɔɔ bɩr ʋ kam ci ma kʋ a hɩnka gʋɔɔ m k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ kristazibəəzannɔ paan•••rɔ m wɔɔ nɩ y. Wɔɔ bɩr a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han sɔ k'a ci ba a ka wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a hɩnka gʋɔɔ m, amba gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ n'a bam bɩ nɩ y.
Wɔɔ ci bɩ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ m wɔɔ ci, n n a gʋrsɩra ba wɔɔ heerlɔ ʋ. Gʋaa haay n a dɔ an n'a karɩnda bam.

Gʋaa woo••• a dɔ a ʋ Krista ci k'a ba bɩ n'awɔɔ m, an a da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ k'ʋ a ka. Ci bɩ ba bɛɛ n y'a ʋ, gʋrsɩra ba hɔ nɩ y, a ba n y'a ʋ Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ Ɛspri m, n n a ba jaa wargarɔ ma sɔ y, a ba n y'a ʋ gʋɔɔ heerlɔ ma.
Wɔɔ heer k'an kookoo bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ nɩ naa hɩm, Krista barka tɔ ma, Woso taa.
Wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma, ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ, wɔɔ wɔŋ ʋ, ʋ zi naa do ba ʋ zim nɩ y. Woso n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ wɔrɛ a barɛ ʋ.
A y'a ka wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma, ʋ ʋ ba Gʋaasɩbabaa daa bɩ zibəənyɩnɔ. Gʋaasɩbabaa naa do n a to lɛrɔ ci b'ʋ y, a to a ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zi. Bala, lɛrɔ ci b'ɩ zɛ a nawʋm zɛ m, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ n'a kam.

Lɛrɔ wɔɔ gʋrsɩra n y'a ba deem-deem jaa wargarɔ ma, a gʋrsɩra bɩ barɛ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ a hɩnka, Moyiisi meer nɩ yɔm kan paŋŋa kɩ. A yɔrɛ bɩ k'an maam-maam b'a ka Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr a dam ma n n'a mɩm nyam Moyiisi rɛ y. A n bɔkarɛ pakra m, kʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ do n nya. K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zibəə bɩ, zɛ a nɩ zɛm nɩ, an bɔkarɛ a ɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m ncɩnaaʋ,
k'a maam, zibəə kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a bam b'ɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m gʋta an cem haay.
Kʋ zibəə k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm bɩ nyɩnta lɛbɔʋrɛ m, k'a maam, zibəə k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ bam tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ b'ɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m an lɛ da.
Wɔɔ ʋ da ma ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ, lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a nyɩnta ʋ biisi bɩ b'a dam ma an a makra ba kan lɛbɔʋrɛ k'an ta ʋ her bɩ kɩ y, her hɔ bɩ lɛ da soyy•••.
Bala, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔ k'a nɩ cenim bɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, k'a maam hɔ k'a nɩ gɔɔtam tee••• bɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩrɛ an lɛ da.
Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ taaheerlɛ naa do m bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ heer n kookoo.
Wɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Moyiisi kɩ y, bɩ nyɩnta an nɩ pɛɛra karɛ a meer ma, kʋ Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɩ dɩga Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a n'a meer ma an nɩ nyam bɩ ma y.

Israyɛl gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ʋ biisi rɔ wɔɔ n wɔ ʋ ŋnɩ hɔsɩ jɩ ma y. Israyɛl gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ her sɔ nɔɔm maam sɔ, kʋ ŋ yɩ gʋaasɩbabaa gusire ciro wɔɔ karɩnda barɛ, ŋ bɩr ŋ jɩ marɛ y. Ɩ ʋ pɛɛra n y'a ka a meer ma, am Moyiisi hɔ bɩ m, pɛɛra bɩ n gaa ŋ meer la y. Bala, sɩra ka Krista ʋ bala n'a kam pɛɛra bɩ do n gaa gʋaa meer la, a zaa n hɔ k'an ta ʋ jɩ ma.
Denter m, baa kan her kɩ, kʋ ŋ yɩ Moyiisi ciro wɔɔ karɩnda barɛ, ŋ bɩr a jɩ marɛ y, ɩ ʋ pɛɛra nɩ karɛ ŋ hɔɔn ra.
Ba gʋaa a bɔ a ta a m, an sɩra ka Zuuba ʋ bɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ pɛɛra bɩ tɩr gaa a zaa meer la.
Bɩ, Zuuba kʋ n y'a hɩ ma bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, bɩ lɛɛ kʋ Zuuba Ɛspri n ta ʋ bɩ, soamɩŋŋaʋ ɩ lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ.

Bɩ, wɔɔ haay k'ʋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ, pɛɛra n a ka wɔɔ meer la y, bɩ, Zuuba lɛbɔʋrɛ nɩ yɩm wɔɔ ma, a lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ nɩ wɔɔ lʋrm kʋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan kɩ. Ncɩnaaʋ m wɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ n'a dam la tee••• zi kʋ Zuuba n'a bam bɩ n naa. A m Sɛnt-Ɛspri.
Woso a ba wɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, a zibəə naa do da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ bɩr ʋ heer zaar barɛ y.

Wɔɔ bɩr yɛm kutim-kutim kan nyannɩ zibəəro wɔɔ kɩ ma y. Wɔɔ bɩr bra bɩmbam gʋɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ wɔɔ bɩr ŋʋaar warm Woso lemim bɩ ma sɔ y. Bɩ, sɩra wɔɔ n'a hɩm garga ra Woso mɩm m, kʋ gʋaa haay n a dɔ a heer ʋ a ʋ, sɩrazannɔ m wɔɔ m.
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lemim nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ jɩ a nyaakʋm da kan gʋɔɔ niŋŋoo kɩ, k'a maam, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ m.
Durnya naa do woso kʋ Sʋtaana m bɩ yɩ ŋ hɔɔn ta, kʋ ŋ bɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ jɩ ma, ŋ nɩ sɩra ka ʋ y. Ŋ hɔɔn a ta kʋ ŋ bɩ wɔ ʋ sɔ, ŋ nɩ Krista lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a nɩ yɔm lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ yɩ y.
K'a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ bɩr ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ mim pa darɛ y, bɩ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista wɔɔ n'a pa darɛ. Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma awɔɔ zibəənyɩnɔ Yeezuu tɔ ma.

Bala, Woso k'a hɩ a ʋ, kʋ lɛɛgure n nyɩnta monsigə nɔ ʋ bɩ, Woso bɩ do y'a ka a mɩŋŋa lɛɛgure n gu wɔɔ heerlɔ ʋ, k'a ka kʋ wɔɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ k'an ta m, an nɩ yɔm Krista meer ma bɩ yɩ. Bɩ, kʋ Woso lʋnlɔ Krista maam sɔ.

Bɩ, wɔɔ, a hɔ gʋta naa do ka wɔɔ ʋ, k'ʋ a hɩnka gʋɔɔ m, an bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gedre tɔkkɛ kɩ, ʋ nɩ hɔ gʋta naa do m ʋ gʋr zi. Ncɩnaaʋ m kʋ gʋaa woo••• n a dɔ a ʋ, paŋŋa gʋta naa do n a to wɔɔ zi y, a to a ʋ Woso zi.
Wɔɔ ɩ fɩr do haay yɩm, bɩ bɩ n a da wɔɔ ma y, wɔɔ hɔɔn ɩ kɔm minno gʋtɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ hɔɔn n a zar y.
Gʋɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma gʋta, bɩ Woso n a bɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. Ŋ yɩ wɔɔ nam tara ma, bɩ ŋ bɩr wɔŋ ʋ ŋnɩ wɔɔ zaar barɛ y.
Dɔmɩm haay, wɔɔ ɩ zɛ m ʋ mɩm la, ɩ ʋ ga wɔɔ nawʋrɛ am Yeezuu hɔ bɩ m, ncɩnaaʋ m, kʋ Yeezuu mɩsɩrbaa bɩ n a hɩnka wɔɔ gʋr zi.
Wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ m mɩsɩr, bɩ dɔmɩm haay n y'a kam ma k'a wɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ Yeezuu tɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, wɔɔ zɛm bɩ gɩnga. Bɩ kan naa kɩ haay, Krista mɩsɩrbaa y'a hɩnkam wɔɔ gʋr zi.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, wɔɔ nɩ zɛ lɛ ʋ dɔmɩm haay, bɩ n a ka awɔɔ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam.
N y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: "Sɩra mɔɔ ka, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n meer ba." Sɩrakarɛ deem-deem naa do wɔɔ n ta m sɔ, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ nɩ meer bam.
Wɔɔ dɔ denter m, ʋ ʋ, Woso Zuuba Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, a wɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʋ sɔ kan kɩ. A n a ka wɔɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ, ʋ nyɩnta kan kɩ lɛɛ deem ʋ.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay ba wɔɔ nawʋm awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma, kʋ gʋɔɔ cir n Woso barka bɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩ sɔ, maam bɩ, gʋɔɔ cir gʋta Woso barka darɛ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma m, wɔɔ bɩr ʋ heer zaar barɛ y. Bala, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ paŋŋa y'a bɔŋ ʋ poore-poore k'a bɩ nya, wɔɔ nyi bɩ paŋŋa y'a dam la dɔmɩm haay.

Bala, fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ yɩm dɩɩtaa naa, ŋ zɛm bɩ nya, wɔɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta yɩ, ŋ tɔ ma. Lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ do gʋta maam-maam, a nyarɛ ba ʋ sɔ y. Kʋ wɔɔ dɩga lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ do ma, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ hɔsɩ bɛɛ m fɩryɩrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ y.
Hɔ kʋ gʋaa n'a yɩrɛ a mɩm m bɩ bɛɛ wɔɔ n'ʋ kam ma y, hɔ kʋ gʋaa bɩr a yɩrɛ a mɩm m bɩ wɔɔ n'ʋ kam ma. Bala, hɔ k'a nɩ yɩm mɩm m bɩ, cenlezaa m, bɩ hɔ k'a bɩr yɩm mɩm m bɩ, a nyarɛ ba ʋ y.
Wɔɔ mɛ naa do bɔ kʋ ʋ kan pɛɛracɛ kɩ. Wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, k'a b'a zaar ba, Woso mɛ vanta kam wɔɔ ʋ arzana ʋ. Mɛ bɩ do garɛ ba ʋ y, gʋaa wɔzibəə bɛɛ m bɩ y.
Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, wɔɔ ɩ pɛn wʋm, ɩ ʋ, mɔr wɔɔ busu, bala, a ŋʋa wɔɔ nawʋm paan••• k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ y'ʋ mɛ daa b'ʋ, mɛ kʋ Woso n b'a kam wɔɔ ʋ arzana ʋ bɩ.
Bala, kʋ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ do sa, wɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam dɩgɩ fɩɩga y.

Kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ n'ʋ mɛ naa do ʋ naa, wɔɔ ɩ pɛn wʋm, ɩ ʋ mɔr wɔɔ busu, bɩ, a ŋʋa bɛɛ wɔɔ nawʋm k'ʋ mɛ naa do to wa, wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʋ mɛ daa bɩ ka a gusire naa ra, kʋ mɛ k'a garɛ ba ʋ bɩ n nyaam mɛ k'a nɩ gam bɩ m.
Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ banka k'a bɩ naa woo••• ka wɔɔ ʋ. A Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka wɔɔ ʋ, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a zɛm bɩ hɔ k'a ler bɔ wɔɔ m naa ba.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, wɔɔ heer n kookoo dɔmɩm haay, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta, ʋ n'ʋ mɛ naa do ʋ, wɔɔ n'ʋ mɛ daa bɩ yɩ cɩna bɩ, wɔɔ ba Zuuba har ʋ b'ʋ cɩna sɔ y.
Bala, ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʋm sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɩnyaa n a yɩm bɩ bɛɛ wɔɔ nɩ yom ma y.
Sɩra m, wɔɔ heer kookoo, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ bɔ ʋ mɛ naa do ʋ, ʋ ta ʋ nɩ kan Zuuba kɩ, a jɩra wɔɔ m.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ y'ʋ mɛ naa do ʋ, gɛɛ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ bɔ ʋ, a bɩ mim y, ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma k'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ n a nɔ yɩ.

Bala, pakra m kʋ wɔɔ haay n bɩ jɩm Krista dʋdɔkarɛ duu bɩ taa, kʋ gʋaa biyəə n zi k'a nyɩnta an a ba a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ tara burə ʋ naa ʋ bɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩ, k'a mɩŋŋa ɩ ba ɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩ, k'a bʋnyaa nɩ a maam sɔ.
Naa tɔ ma m, kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba nyi ba m dɔ bɩ, wɔɔ n'ʋ kam ma kʋ gʋɔɔ n sɩra ka wɔɔ meerbaa ʋ, bɩ Woso wɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam sɔ m ʋ, awɔɔ mɔɔ dɔ sɔ mɩŋŋa a heerlɔ ʋ

A b'a hɩ a ʋ, a ŋʋa wɔɔ nawʋm k'ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa ʋ ko y. Ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma, k'awɔɔ n a heer nyɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a a da ma a mim yɩ a nyɩ bɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ mɩm m bala rɔ wɔɔ nʋ, hɔ zore ba ŋ heer ʋ y, ŋ leer ba b'ʋ y.
Kʋ hɔɔzannɔ m wɔɔ nɩ, Woso tɔ ma m, bɩ kʋ hɔɔntaʋrɛzannɔ m wɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma m.
Krista ŋʋarɛ y'a so wɔɔ ʋ. Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ hɔɔn da, ʋ ʋ, gʋaa deem kʋ Krista m ga gʋaa haay bɩncɛ ʋ, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, k'a maam, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ woo••• gɩnga sɔ.
Bɩ ga a ʋ denter gʋaa haay bɩncɛ ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ bɩncɛ sa rɔ wɔɔ b'a mɩsɩrbaa ba a mɩŋŋɔɔ tɔ ma dɔ y, kʋ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba a tɔ ma, a ɩ ga an a mɩm bɔ ʋ ŋ bɩncɛ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wɔɔ bɩr dɩgam gɔsɩ ma gʋɔɔ dɩgarɛ m bala y, biisi bɩ, wɔɔ dɩga Krista ma ncɩnaaʋ, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ bɩr dɩgam ma maam y.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a ba kristagʋaa, a ba a zaa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ n nawʋm mɩsɩrbaa daa. A mɩsɩrbaa k'a n'a bam biisi bɩ cem, hɔ woo••• a ba daa.
Naa haay naa, a to a ʋ Woso zi, a ɩ wɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ Krista tɔ ma, an a ya, an gʋɔɔ zɛkʋra zibəə bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
Hɔ k'an ta ʋ bɩ, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta an zu kʋ ʋ kan Krista kɩ an nɩ gʋɔɔ haay zɛm kʋ ra kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ. A bɩr ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ karɛ ŋ la y, a y'a ya an gʋɔɔ zɛkʋra lemim bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ kʋ wɔɔ n a pa da.

Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Krista ɩ wɔɔ bɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n meer ba a bɩncɛ ʋ, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ zu kʋ ʋ kan wɔɔ meerbaa kɩ, an nɩ gʋɔɔ birm kʋ ŋ nɩ b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ. Ʋ wɔ wɔɔ n'a zɩnzɛrɛ awɔɔ m Krista tɔ ma, k'a to kʋ Woso n awɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ.
Krista mɩŋŋa n mimbʋnyaa ba fɩɩga y, Woso n a ka an a ba ɩ ʋ mimbʋnyaa n a mɩŋŋa m wɔɔ tɔ ma, a ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ, Krista tɔ ma.
Kʋ zi wɔɔ n'a bam kan Woso kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han, ʋ ʋ, a b'a to Woso barka k'a yɩ bɩ n ta vam y.

Bala, Woso a hɩ, a ʋ: Dɔmɩm kʋ mɔɔ nɩ barka kam bɩ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛ si, hinni k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ ŋʋaŋ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ bʋr m bɩ m da ɩ han. Dɔmɩm kʋ Woso n'a barka kam bɩ n naa. Dɔmɩm k'a n'a bʋmbɔrɛ kam bɩ n naa sɔ.
Wɔɔ lɛ baa k'ʋ hɔsɩ ba k'an yɩ gʋaa ma bʋnyaa y, bala, wɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ gɔsɩ n wɔɔ zibəə bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ y.

A n ta ʋ bɩ, hɔ haay kʋ wɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, a ba wɔɔ nawʋm ʋ n'a hɩnkam ʋ ʋ, Woso zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩr do y'a hʋnhɔ nɔ ʋ, mim kʋsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ n'ɩ wɔɔ yɩm nɔ ʋ, cicir nɔ ʋ, dabɔʋ nɔ ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ madɩr m gʋta, ŋnɩ wɔɔ du, ŋn'a zɛ kʋ ra ŋnɩ zee da wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ nyɩnta kɔrɛrɔ nɔ ʋ, hinceem bɩr bam wɔɔ nɩ y, hɔbɩrɛ bɩr bɩm wɔɔ nɩ y.
Wɔɔ ɩ heer fu zi bam, Woso hɔdɔrɛ zi wɔɔ n'a bam, ʋ nɩ bʋraama zi bam. Ʋ nɩ mɩŋŋabaa bam, ʋ nɩ tam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m, ʋ nɩ ŋʋarɛ zi bam noom fu m.
Ʋ nɩ sɩra lemim hɩm, ʋ nɩ tam Woso paŋŋa nɔ ʋ, ʋ nɩ tɩrgabaa yar mɔrlɔ sam ʋ nɩ yar barɛ ŋ nɩ, k'ʋ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.
Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ wɔɔ daŋ ʋ, niŋŋoo nɩ wɔɔ bɔŋ ʋ, nɔɔrɔ y'a lɛ bɔm wɔɔ ʋ, nɔɔm nɩ wɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋm. N yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ŋʋaarbənno, an bɔkarɛ sɩrazannɔ m wɔɔ m.
Gʋɔɔ ɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʋ, gɔsɩ n wɔɔ dɔ y, an bɔkarɛ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ dɔ. N y'a gɩngarɛ n ʋ, gɩnga wɔɔ nawʋm, bɩ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ m mɩsɩr, n yɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma gʋta, bɩ wɔɔ n gɩnga y.
N yɩ wɔɔ heer zaar barɛ, bɩ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ nɩ heernyɔɔ m, n yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ŋʋazannɔ, an bɔkarɛ wɔɔ y'a kam gʋɔɔ n'a bam hɔzannɔ, n yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ɩ ʋ, hɔsɩ ba wɔɔ ʋ y, an bɔkarɛ wɔɔ nɩ hɔ haay m.
Awɔɔ Korɛntɩ zannɔ, wɔɔ ʋ heer gʋ ʋ meer ba kan awɔɔ kɩ fasɩ, ʋ ʋ ŋʋarɛ hɩnka awɔɔ m.
Wɔɔ awɔɔ si ʋ heer ʋ, awɔɔ n wɔɔ si a heer ʋ y.
Awɔɔ ba mɔɔ ʋ m nyɩnɔ, m nɩ meer bɩ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a a heer gʋ wɔɔ m, a wɔɔ ŋʋa sɔ, amba wɔɔ n'awɔɔ ŋʋam bɩ m.

A bɩ yɛ a a zɛ kʋ ra kan basɩrakənno kɩ y. A n a ga m, awɔɔ n a ba deem kan ŋ kɩ y. Hɔ tɩrga y'a dam ma an a zɛ kʋ ra kan hɔ bʋnyaa kɩ ra? Lɛɛgure y'a dam ma an a war kʋ ma kan monsigə kɩ ra? A n a ga nɩ y.
Krista y'a dam ma an kʋ ma kan Sʋtaana kɩ ra? Gɛɛ sɩrakarɛzaa y'a dam ma an a ba deem kan basɩrakarɛzaa kɩ ra?

Wosocɛ b'a dam ma an kʋ ma kan wosobaawɔnnɔ kɩ y. Bɩ, wɔɔ m Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ cɛ, amba a mɩŋŋa a hɩ bɩ m, a a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ ŋ bire ʋ, m bɩr kan ŋ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ yɩrɛ ŋ Woso, ŋnɩ yɩ mɔɔ gʋɔɔ."
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, Zuuba a ya, a ʋ: K'a bɔ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, a a gʋ a hɔ. A b'a wɔ da dintim hɔ ma y, maam bɩ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ sire m zi.
Mɔɔ yɩrɛ awɔɔ zɩ, awɔɔ n yɩ mɔɔ nyɩnɔ yaarɔ kan mɔɔ nyɩmbɔnnɔ kɩ, Zuuba k'a paŋŋa jirə ba ʋ y'a hɩ.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a a yo Woso n lerbɔrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro bɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, ʋ mim haay k'a nɩ dintim kam wɔɔ mɛ kan wɔɔ nyi kɩ ma gʋ ʋ ma, ʋ ʋ tɔ ʋ gʋta k'ʋ bɩr mɩŋŋa fasɩ Woso lɛsire nɔ ʋ.
K'a yɛ a wɔɔ ŋʋa, wɔɔ n a bʋnyaa ba gɔsɩ nɩ y, wɔɔ n gɔsɩ mim zaar ba y, wɔɔ n ʋ da gʋaa bir y.
Mɔɔ bɩr meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ kʋ m awɔɔ dʋdɔ yar y, amba mɔɔ hɩ dɩɩtaa bɩ, wɔɔ y'awɔɔ ŋʋam gʋta, hɔsɩ b'a dam ma an wɔɔ gʋ awɔɔ ma y, baa zɛ, baa mɩsɩrbaa.
Mɔɔ sɩra ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta, mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm awɔɔ tɔ ma gʋta. Wɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ haay nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ heer koodə m gʋta, m nɩ m heer nyɔɔm paan•••.
Bala, lee kʋ wɔɔ ku Masedʋan ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ n hoonsire yɩ baa poore tɔkkɛ y. Jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ a n yɩ wɔɔ ma naanaa y, gʋɔɔ ɩ nyaa bam kan wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ nɩ dabɔʋ m ʋ heer ʋ sɔ.
Bɩ Woso nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔɔn kaanm a mɩŋŋa m nɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa dam la, a a ka Tiitɩ n bʋr, naa n wɔɔ paŋŋa da ra.

Bɩ, naa bɛɛ n a deem y, hɔ kʋ Tiitɩ a hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ wɔɔ paŋŋa da ra sɔ, a a hɩ a ʋ, a heer koodə yɩ awɔɔ tɔ ma. A a hɩ sɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ lɛ taa paan••• k'a a ya, a mɔɔ yɩ, bala, awɔɔ heer a zaar ba kan mim k'awɔɔ ba bɩ kɩ, an n'a ŋʋam paan••• k'a a da mɔɔ han gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'ɩ mɔɔ tɔ zarm nɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ. Naa tɔ ma m sɔ mɔɔ heer n nyɩnta gʋta maam-maam kɛɛrɛ.
Baa kʋ ci kʋ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma biisi b'awɔɔ heer zaar ba, dɩɩtaa naa mɔɔ bɩr kʋrkʋr darɛ a tɔ ma y. K'a nyɩnta an awɔɔ heer zaar ba dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ bɩ, a a da ma mɔɔ n kʋrkʋr da.

Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, m heer mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔm, kʋ mɔɔ awɔɔ heer zaar ba bɩ tɔ ma bɛɛ y. Kʋ heerzar b'a ka awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam bɩ tɔ ma m. Woso awɔɔ heerzar bɩ sa, an a ba awɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, naa tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ n a bʋnyaa ba y.
Bala, heerzar k'a a to Woso zi bɩ zɛ a nawʋm heerlʋrlɛ m, an nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ kam, kʋrkʋrdarɛ ba a nɔ ʋ y. Bɩ, durnya naa do heerzar bɩ, zɛ bɩ n nawʋm zɛ m.

K'a dɩga a, heerzar k'a a to Woso zi b'a ka, awɔɔ n a ka ma ŋʋɩɩ••• k'a mim bɩ banka, a a ka awɔɔ n sugur yɛ, awɔɔ nɔ n ma ʋ kan a mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ n nyi ba hɔ kʋ mim bɩ n'a bam bɩ m, a a ka sɔ awɔɔ n n'a ŋʋam k'a a ya, a mɔɔ yɩ zɔɔ, a n'a kam ma k'a a da mɔɔ han paan•••, a a ka sɔ awɔɔ n yɛ k'a gʋaa k'a mim bɩ ba bɩ hʋnhʋr. A n ta ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ hɔ woo••• ba k'a hɩnka a ʋ, awɔɔ ba mim bɩ nɔ ʋ y.
Mɔɔ n ci bɩ ba awɔɔ ma gʋaa k'a mim bʋnyaa bɩ ba bɩ tɔ ma y, gɛɛ gʋaa kʋ n mim bɩ ba m bɩ tɔ ma y. A ba mɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ n a da ma a dɔ Woso mɩm ʋ a ʋ, a wɔɔ ŋʋa paan•••.
Naa tɔ ma m hɔ k'awɔɔ ba bɩ n wɔɔ heer ba kookoo. Heer koodə bɛɛ wɔɔ yɩ bala y, wɔɔ heernyɔɔ yɩ sɔ gʋta. Tiitɩ k'a b'a hɩ wɔɔ m a ʋ, awɔɔ a paŋŋa da ra, a ka a heernyɔɔ yɩ bɩ tɔ ma m sɔ.
Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka hɔɔ, m m lɛ bɔ awɔɔ ʋ a mɩm m, b'awɔɔ ka an a dɔ denter a ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ sɩra m. Amba wɔɔ nɩ sɩra hɩm tee••• bɩ, ʋ lɛ kʋ wɔɔ bɔ awɔɔ ʋ Tiitɩ zi bɩ yɩ sɩra sɔ amba wɔɔ hɩ bɩ m.
Bʋr k'a ʋ, awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, awɔɔ n a si mɩŋŋa kan nyibəə kɩ daʋrɛ kɩ, a yɛ a lɛ ma bɩ, a y'a tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʋ, an n'awɔɔ ŋʋam gʋta an cem biisi han.
Mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm gʋta, kʋ mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ m da ma m yo awɔɔ ma hɔ haay nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
Ʋ danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n barka kʋ Woso a ka Masedʋan kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ mim dɔ.

Kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ yɛ fɩr ma gʋta, kʋsɩ do y'a hʋnhɔ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta heernyɔɔ gʋta m, bɩ n a ka ŋnɩ yɛ ŋnɩ hɔ k'an ta m ka gʋta maam-maam kan a heer kɩ haay busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ, an bɔkarɛ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ɩ ŋʋazaabaa nɔ ʋ gʋta.
Mɔɔ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ, hɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m bɩ ŋ y'a ka, a ka ŋ y'a ʋ sɔ an lɛ da a paŋŋa ra a zim.
A yɛ ŋ y'a ʋ wɔɔ han ŋʋɩɩ••• k'a a hɔ na busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ ma a a da m wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ han.
Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n a gɩnga bɩ ŋ y'a ba, lɛɛ ŋ y'a ka ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka Zuuba ʋ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ yɛ ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ bam, Woso hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, wɔɔ n ma Tiitɩ ma, k'an a bɔ an bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ an bɩ daahan zibəə k'a sɩŋŋɩda sa kan awɔɔ kɩ, busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ ba an a nyambʋr.
K'a a yo hɔntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, Woso lemim padarɛ nɔ ʋ, Woso hɔdɔrɛ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n'a yoŋ ʋ kan a heer kɩ haay a n nɩ wɔɔ ŋʋam sɔ bɩ, k'a a yo ʋ sɔ paan••• busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ mim nɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ n naa hɩ, ɩ ʋ, lɛ mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ y. Kʋ mɔɔ gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ tʋntɔʋrɛ mim hɩ bɩ, a hɩ mɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ n a hɩnka a ʋ, ŋʋarɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ paan••• denter.
Awɔɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka k'a n'a kam wɔɔ ʋ bɩ dɔ. Hɔntazaa n a mɩŋŋa m, an bɔkarɛ a yɛ an a mɩŋŋa ba ŋʋazaa awɔɔ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n a ba hɔntazannɔ a mɩŋŋa ŋʋazaabaa tɔ ma.

Naa kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm naa, m hɔɔndarɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm. A gɩnga mɔɔ ʋ a mɩŋŋa k'awɔɔ n gɔɔta a ta lɛɛ kan zibəə k'awɔɔ sɩŋŋɩda sa zu ʋ bɩ kɩ. Awɔɔ ɩ yɩ lɛɛkarɛzannɔ, a busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ ka, awɔɔ ɩ lɛ sa a bɔ a lɛ m sɔ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, k'a ta lɛɛ kan a heer kɩ haay, amba awɔɔ sɩŋŋɩda sa bɩ m, a zi bɩ ba a nyambʋr, k'a busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ ka a paŋŋa tɛkka ma.
Bala, kʋ gʋaa hɔ ka Woso ʋ a zim, Woso ɩ hɔ bɩ do sim, dɩga a nawʋm hɔ k'a zaa bɩ n ta m bɩ ma, a bɩr dɩgam hɔ k'a ba m bɩ ma y.
Mɔɔ bɩr m kam ma kʋ m awɔɔ da ŋʋazaabaa ma, kʋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n hɔ yɩ wa, a ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ gakʋʋbarɛ n nyɩnta ʋ.

Dɩɩtaa naa, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ m gʋta, bɩ minto bɩ, awɔɔ a da ma, a a da gʋɔɔ kʋ hɔ jɩra ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ han. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ hɔ bʋr an bɩ jɩra awɔɔ ma sɔ, gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ a da ŋ han rɔ wɔɔ nɩ hɔ nɩ, ŋ y'a darɛ awɔɔ han sɔ. Maam bɩ gakʋʋbarɛ nyɩntaŋ ʋ.
Amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ m bɩ: Gʋaa k'a hɔ gʋr gʋta bɩ, a ba m an cem a bɩncɛ han y, gʋaa k'a gʋr poore bɩ, hɔ n jɩra bɩ zaa ma sɔ y.
Wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka, kʋ Tiitɩ lɛ n taa gʋta k'a a da awɔɔ han amba wɔɔ lɛ n taa sɔ bɩ tɔ ma, Woso ɩ naa da a heer ʋ.
A yɛ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ han k'an ta awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ, a yɛ, an lɛ da bɩ, a yɛ kan a heer kɩ haay, an hɔɔn bɔ ʋ a zim k'a ta awɔɔ zi b'ʋ.
Wɔɔ danyɩ vanta wɔɔ n'a nyɔɔm kan kɩ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ haay y'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ, k'a nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa dam mɩŋŋa bɩ tɔ ma.

A n lɛ da bɩ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ y'a bɔ ʋ, k'an wɔɔ da zaa ʋ, zɩnzɛkʋra zibəə naa do kʋ wɔɔ n'a bam Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ tɔ ma bɩ nɔ ʋ, zi naa do ba wɔɔ nawʋm sɔ k'ʋ a hɩnka, ʋ ʋ, ʋ lɛ taa k'ʋ ʋ da gʋɔɔ han.
Busoo kʋ n y'a da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ naa gʋta maam-maam, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ dundore ʋ zi, kʋ gɔsɩ b'a hɩ a ʋ, wɔɔ n nyasʋm mɩŋŋa y.
Wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ʋ hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa ba Woso mɩm ʋ, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ʋ a ba sɔ gʋɔɔ mɩm ʋ.
Wɔɔ gʋaa vanta nyɔɔm sɔ kan ŋ kɩ, wɔɔ tɩr a ka lɛɛ ʋ dɩga a, bɩ, wɔɔ yɩ gʋaa m, an nɩ Woso zibəə bɩ ŋʋam. Dɩɩtaa sɔ naa, a y'a tɔŋ ʋ paan•••, bala a sɩra ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta.
Kʋ Tiitɩ nɩ, mɔɔ zukuu m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m sɔ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ yɩ ŋ bɔ ʋ, ŋ zibəə bɩ y'a lɛ bɔm Krista ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a ŋʋarɛ hɩnka ŋ nɩ paan•••, kʋ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ ŋ ʋ, ʋ lɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ awɔɔ ŋʋarɛ gʋtabaa ʋ bɩ, sɩra m.
Pakra bɛɛ m kʋ mɔɔ nɩ m ya m ci ba awɔɔ ma, kʋ m daahan kʋ wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a ka Zidee gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ mim hɩ y.

A ŋʋa k'awɔɔ nawʋm paan••• k'a a da ŋ han bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ m lɛ bɔ awɔɔ ʋ Masedʋan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ, m a hɩ ŋ nɩ, m ʋ: "Akayii kʋ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ a banka zu ʋ kara, k'a a da Zidee kʋ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ han." Naa kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, a a ka ŋ gʋɔɔ gʋta nɩ lɛtaama m, k'a a da Zidee gʋɔɔ wɔɔ han sɔ.

Bɩ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma rɔ nɔɔm, ŋ nyɔɔ mɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ n busoo k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa k'a ka bɩ zɛ kʋ ra, amba mɔɔ hɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ m mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ a banka a nya bɩ m. K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ kʋ wɔɔ bɩ lee ku, gʋaa woo••• y'a dɔrɛ a ʋ, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ bɩ, sɩra m.

Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʋ kan Masedʋan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ʋ bɩ dɩga a awɔɔ n a banka a nya y, nyannɩ gʋta wɔɔ nyasʋm, bala, wɔɔ sɩra ka awɔɔ ʋ b'a n yɩ maam y. Bɩ, nyannɩ y'awɔɔ nyasʋm sɔ gʋta an lɛ da.

Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ n a gɩnga mɔɔ ʋ, a a ga m kʋ m a yɛ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ han kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m awɔɔ zi b'ʋ. K'awɔɔ n busoo k'awɔɔ ʋ k'a ka kan a heer kɩ haay bɩ zɩnzɛ kʋ ra a nya. Awɔɔ busoo bɩ do ler bɔ kara. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ mɔɔ zɛm bɩ dɩga a awɔɔ busoo bɩ zɩnzɛ kʋ ra a nya, naa y'a hɩnkam sɔ a ʋ, a ka awɔɔ nawʋm kan a heer kɩ haay, awɔɔ bɩr a kam pakra nɩ y.
K'a mim naa do tɔ da a nɔ ʋ: Gʋaa k'a hɔ duu poore bɩ, hɔ poore an n'a yɩm sɔ, gʋaa k'a duu gʋta bɩ, hɔ gʋta an n'a yɩm sɔ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a a ga m kʋ gʋaa biyəə n hɔ k'a gɩnga k'a ka bɩ ka, a b'a ka pakra nɩ, gɛɛ paŋŋa n y'a ba a ma tɔ ma y. Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ hɔ kam kan heernyɩnta kɩ bɩ, Woso ɩ bɩ zaa ŋʋam.
Bɩ, Woso a da ma an hɔ mɩŋŋa do y'a hʋnhɔ ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta, kʋ hɔsɩ bɩ jɩra awɔɔ ma y, bɩ kʋ hɔ n bɩr ta awɔɔ ʋ gʋta, k'a zi mɩŋŋɔɔ do haay ba m.
Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ bɩ m, n ʋ: A ɩ hɔ kam ŋʋazannɔ ʋ gʋta, a ba k'a nawʋm gʋɔɔ m mɩŋŋa bɩ nyarɛ ba ʋ y.
Woso nɩ hɔ kam hɔduurezaa ʋ an n'a duum, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ kaŋ ʋ an n'a bɩm. Woso bɩ do nɩ hɔ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ gʋta amba awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ m, an a ka an pasɩ yɔɔgʋ, k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʋ a ba gʋɔɔ m mɩŋŋa gʋta.
A y'a kam awɔɔ n hɔ yɩ gʋta dɔmɩm haay, k'awɔɔ n bɩr a bam gʋɔɔ m mɩŋŋa tee•••. K'a yɩ ncɩnaaʋ, gʋɔɔ cir gʋta y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, awɔɔ ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋ ʋ tɔ ma.
Bala, busoo zɩnzɛkʋra bɩ zibəə bɩ, a da bɛɛ a nawʋm wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ han bala y, a ka a nawʋm sɔ gʋɔɔ nɩ Woso barka dam gʋta maam-maam.

Zi naa do barɛ n'awɔɔ taalɛra zaa bɩ zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ hɩnkam. A a hɩnka a ʋ, awɔɔ sɩra ka Krista lemim nyɩnta b'ʋ denter, an nɩ yɛm ma karɛ. Gʋɔɔ gʋta y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ naa tɔ ma, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ sɔ k'awɔɔ n'a barɛ ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa, an n'a hɔnyɩ jirm kan ŋ kɩ kan gʋaa haay kɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
Ŋ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma, ŋ n'awɔɔ ŋʋa gʋta, kʋ Woso a barka ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta ncɩnaaʋ bɩ minto.
Bɩ kʋ Woso tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, a ganwʋrɛ gʋta k'a lɔɔ ba ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.

Awɔɔ y'a hɩm mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol ma, a ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, nyibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, bɩ kʋ mɔɔ laatʋ bɩ mɔɔ nɩ m darɛ m nyaa ma kan awɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han Krista bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdabaa m kan a ŋʋarɛ kɩ m, m ʋ:

A b'a ka kʋ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku awɔɔ bire ʋ, kʋ m m da m nyaa ma wa! Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʋ, ʋ zi woo••• ba wɔɔ nawʋm gʋaa hɔɔndarɛ m bala rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ mɔɔ m da ma, m m da m nyaa ma kan ŋ kɩ.
Sɩra m, wɔɔ mɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta m ʋ n'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bam nɩ naa, mɛsim m. Bɩ wɔɔ bɩr Woso zuure zoo bɩ bam gʋaa hɔɔndarɛ nɩ y.

Yar mɔdrɔ kʋ wɔɔ n ta m, ʋ nɩ yar bɩ barɛ ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ, durnya gʋɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y. Wɔɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ, Woso yar mɔdrɔ paŋŋazannɔ m ŋn'a dam ma ŋnɩ bʋr jɩnnɔ gʋtɔ-gʋtɔɔ ra. Wɔɔ ɩ hɔɔndarɛrɔ daŋŋadɔɔ zaar bam.
Wɔɔ ɩ hɔɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ ŋ sa mɩŋŋabusure nɔ ʋ ŋn'a ta m Woso dɔrɛ m toore rɔ wɔɔ zaar bam, wɔɔ ɩ hɔɔndarɛ haay dam jɩm ʋ, ʋ n'a karɛ a zannɔ nɩ yɛm Krista ma.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ hɩnka a ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a hɩm haay ma fasɩ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ banka ʋ a nya k'ʋ gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ bɩr yɛm nɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋr.
Gɛɛ dɩga awɔɔ nawʋm hɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a yɩrɛ a mɩm m bɩ ma bala ra? Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ gʋaa ʋ Krista hɔ n a mɩ fasɩ, k'an a hɔɔn da an a dɔ sɔ a ʋ, Krista y'a so wɔɔ ʋ, amba a a so a zaa ʋ bɩ m.

Baa kʋ mɔɔ m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ gʋta, lɛ kʋ Krista a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a nyannɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, lɛ kʋ mɔɔ m ta m naa, a ka Woso ʋ mɔɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʋ a ta lɛɛ, a sokʋma bɩ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ zaarbarɛ tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n a gɩnga a ʋ, m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ m awɔɔ da bɔ ʋ m ciro wɔɔ meerbaarɔ nɩ y.
Bala, n y'a hɩrɛ, n ʋ: "Mɔɔ ciro wɔɔ meerbaarɔ kʋsɩ, nyaa meerbaarɔ m sɔ, bɩ kʋ mɔɔ bʋr m nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, paŋŋawarzaa n mɔɔ m, bɩ mɔɔ n meerbaa dɔ sɔ y."
Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ naa hɩm bɩ, mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m a hɩ m, m ʋ: Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a gʋrsɩra barɛ ʋ ciro wɔɔ ʋ kʋ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, kan hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a bam kʋ wɔɔ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ hɔdeem, ŋ jirə ba ʋ y.

Sɩra m, wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma ʋ ʋ ga kʋ ʋ gɛɛ ʋ ʋ makra ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, a lɛ da gʋɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ma y. Hɔɔnwarzannɔ m brɔɔ m. Bɩ y'a ka ŋn'ɩ dɩgarɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma k'a a makra ba kan gʋɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a makra barɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma.

Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ bɩ yɛrɛ ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ, an cem jirə kʋ Woso a ka bɩ han y, wɔɔ y'ʋ lɛ bɔrɛ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ zibəə kʋ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a ba bɩ tɛkka ma, a ka k'a ʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma ʋ lee ku awɔɔ zi bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Bala, ta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ, cem bɛɛ wɔɔ ʋ ʋ jirə han y. Wɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ ka, ʋ bɩ Krista lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m.

Wɔɔ bɩr ʋ lɛ bɔrɛ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ zibəə tɔ ma y. Bɩ, wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ n a da ra, kʋ wɔɔ zibəə n paŋŋa yɩ gʋta awɔɔ barla sɔ, zibəə kʋ Woso wɔɔ da ʋ bɩ m naa, wɔɔ bɩ bɔrɛ a jirə la nɩ y.
Wɔɔ wɔŋ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ ʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ laatʋ awɔɔ kʋ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, bɩ wɔɔ b'ʋ lɛ bɔrɛ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ zi kʋ gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ a ba tɔ ma y, zi kʋ Woso a ka brɔɔ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a ba bɩ n bɩ.
Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a ʋ k'a a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ, a b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ y, an a lɛ bɔ hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba b'ʋ."
Bala, gʋaa k'a n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋa ʋ a zim bɩ bɛɛ Woso nɔ nɩ yɩm ma y. Gʋaa kʋ Woso mɩŋŋa n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʋ bɩ m.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ hɔɔzaabaa meer bam kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a yɛ ma. Ɩɩn••• a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'a yɛ mɔɔ hɔɔzaabaa meerbaa bɩ ma.
Awɔɔ ŋʋa kʋ mɔɔ nawʋm bɩ, jɩmbaa n ta mɔɔ m, a to a ʋ Woso zi. Bala, awɔɔ banka mɔɔ ʋ amba nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ k'a n yar dɔ bɩ m, kʋ m a ka Krista ʋ, k'a n yɩ awɔɔ zim.
Bɩ, mɔɔ da nɩ bɔŋ ʋ, mɔɔ ʋ, a a da ma gʋɔɔ n bra ba awɔɔ m ŋʋaarlɔ m awɔɔ n a bɔ Krista zuure ʋ paan•••, amba mɩm bɩ bra ba Ɛɛvɩ m ŋʋaarlɔ meerbaa m bɩ m.

Meer bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, bala, kʋ gʋaa bʋr an nɩ Yeezuu Krista vanta mim hɩrɛ, an nɩ meer bɩ bam ɛspri kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɛɛ m bɩ nɩ, an nɩ lemim vanta pa darɛ awɔɔ m, bɩ lemim nyɩnta k'awɔɔ zu ʋ biisi bɩ bɛɛ y, awɔɔ tɩr a gu a yɛ ma.
Gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma a ʋ, zibəəzannɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ da rɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam m ʋ ŋ n lɛ da mɔɔ nɩ y.
A a da ma mɔɔ bɩ wɔŋ ʋ, m meer ba wɩsɩ am ŋ hɔ bɩ nɩ y, bɩ kʋ Woso hɔdɔrɛ mim nɩ, ŋ bɩ jɩra mɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ m hɔdɔrɛ bɩ hɩnka hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, mim haay nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, a pa bɩ da mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ m vam, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ si awɔɔ han y. M mɩŋŋa mɔɔ zer, kʋ m awɔɔ gore da ʋ. A hɩ awɔɔ ʋ, a ba kʋ mɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ naa, kʋrɔ mɔɔ ʋ ma ra?
Nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ vantɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ yawʋra ba, mɔɔ brɔɔ wɔ nya, kʋ m m da awɔɔ han.

M da kʋ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han b'ʋ bɩ, kʋ busoo mim ta mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ bɩr awɔɔ kɔm k'a hɔsɩ kaŋ ʋ y. Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Masedʋan ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bʋr, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa haay bɩ ka mɔɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ n yɛ fɩɩgaa k'awɔɔ n kɔ mɔɔ mim ma y, naa mɔɔ nɩ gɔɔtarɛ m bɩr a bam.

Naa m mɔɔ goredaʋrɛ, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩm Krista k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ m, mɔɔ b'awɔɔ busoo sire y, m lɛ mɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ naa tɔ ma, bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma Akayii kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ jilli an a ta mɔɔ m toore naa nɔ ʋ y.
Bɔ m mɔɔ n naa hɩ? Mɔɔ bɩr awɔɔ ŋʋam gɛ? Ayy•••, Woso a dɔ a ʋ mɔɔ y'awɔɔ ŋʋam.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam naa, mɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ m bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ can, kʋ m a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ, a ʋ, a ɩ zi bam, am wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ n a da jɩm ʋ, kʋ ŋ b'a da ma ŋnɩ naa hɩ y.
Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro, zibəəzannɔ paan•••rɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y, ŋʋaar ŋn'a bam gʋɔɔ m a zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a hɔ barɛ ɩ ʋ, Krista zibəəzannɔ m.
Bɩ naa do naa, zɛkədə mim b'a nɔ ʋ y, bala, Sʋtaana mɩŋŋa a da ma an a mɩŋŋa ba ɩ ʋ, lɛɛgure malɛɛka m.

K'a yo Sʋtaana mɩŋŋa wɔ ʋ an naa ba bɩ, k'a maam wɔɔ b'a hɩm ʋ ʋ, a zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ ɩ ʋ zibəətɩrgazannɔ n a mɩ wa. Bɩ, ŋ nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, bɔ a nawʋm kʋ ʋ kan ŋ zibəə bɩ kɩ, a yɩrɛ ŋ ma bʋnyaa.
Kʋ m m ya, m so ra, awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma ɩ ʋ, hɔɔzaa n mɔɔ nɩ y. Gɛɛ k'awɔɔ ʋ hɔɔzaa n mɔɔ nɩ, k'a maam k'a yɛ mɔɔ ma amba awɔɔ nɩ yɛm hɔɔzannɔ ma bɩ m, kʋ m wɔ ʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ poore.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ba naa, Zuuba hɔɔnhɔ bɛɛ m kʋ mɔɔ n a ba ncɩnaaʋ y. Kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ naa, hɔɔzaabaa zibəə m.
K'a a yo gʋɔɔ gʋta n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ durnya minno ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ sɔ.
Awɔɔ kʋ mindɔrɛzannɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm hɔɔzannɔ ma naanaa.
Awɔɔ ɩ yɛm gʋɔɔ n'a sore awɔɔ ʋ am lɔnnɔ hɔ bɩ m, ŋn'ɩ hɔ yɔrɛ a m, ŋn'ɩ ŋʋaar barɛ a m, ŋn'awɔɔ gore bɔŋ ʋ, ŋn'awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋm.

Nyannɩ ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, bala, wɔɔ n wɔ ʋ, ʋ naa ba awɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ meer bɩ barɛ am hɔɔzaa hɔ bɩ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ hɔɔ niŋŋoo m nɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro m sɔ.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ ebree gʋɔɔ n'a mɩ, bɩ, ebree gʋaa n mɔɔ m sɔ. Ŋ ʋ, Israyɛl gʋɔɔ n'a mɩ, mɔɔ maam sɔ. Ŋ ʋ, Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ n'a mɩ, bɩ mɔɔ maam sɔ.

Ŋ ʋ, Krista zibəənyɩnɔ n'a mɩ, ʋnhʋʋn•••, mɔɔ hɔɔzaabaa meer bam fasɩ kɛɛrɛ, Krista zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m an lɛ da ŋ la. Mɔɔ zi ba an lɛ da ŋ hɔ ra. N mɔɔ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ an lɛ da ŋ la, n mɔɔ zɛ mawʋr m an lɛ da ŋ la sɔ, mɔɔ m mee ka zɛ ma gallɛm hɔka.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ lɛɛzannɔ mɔɔ nyasʋ gallɛm soor ŋnɩ mɔɔ zɛ mawʋr m, mɔɔ zɛ n tɩr a ʋ mawʋr bɩ m gallɛm bukərku a yaa n nɛɛhʋ.

Rɔm gʋɔɔ mɔɔ nyasʋ gallɛm kaakʋ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ zɛ bannɔ m, hindeem ʋ gʋɔɔ mɔɔ bɩmba jaarɔ m k'a mɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ m yo kʋ m ga kɔɔlʋʋ nyoobarɛ nɔ ʋ gallɛm kaakʋ, hindeem ʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta higʋta ʋ dɔmɩm deem, dɔ n mɩ n nɩ mɔɔ bɔ lɛm.

Mɔɔ zaakʋ gʋta, mɔɔ zaakʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, pɛrgʋrɔ kʋ ŋ tɩr yar lɔ wɔɔ a yo k'a mɔɔ bɩ, dazaamazannɔ a yo k'a mɔɔ zɛ sɔ, mɔɔ dogʋɔɔ a ŋʋa k'a mɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ sɔ. Doro vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ a yo k'a mɔɔ zɛ gər sɔ. Minno a yo k'a mɔɔ yɩ kʋnɔrɔ ʋ, kan poohɔɔnrɔ kɩ ʋ, higʋtɔɔ burə ʋ sɔ, ŋʋaar kristagʋɔɔ barla sɔ.
Mɔɔ zi kʋsɩrɔ ba, m makra kʋsɩrɔ yɩ, hinceem tɩr jɩra mɔɔ ma, nɔ n tɩr mɔɔ zɛ kan mɩsɩ kɩ, m tɩr m lɛ kʋsɩ pakra m, nyɛɛm mɔɔ zɛ, huu jɩra mɔɔ ma sɔ.
Mɔɔ bɩ m kɔrɛ m minno vantɔɔ hɩ y, dɔmɩm biyəə mɔɔ heer ɩ kɔm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ mim tɔ ma.
Kʋ paŋŋawarzaa m gʋaa nɩ, b'ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ m. Kʋ gʋaa a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ b'a busu mɔɔ ma gʋta, ɩ ʋ mɔɔ m.
Kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, m lɛ mɔɔ n n'a bɔrɛ m paŋŋawar minno ʋ.
Woso, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Zɩ bɩ, a a dɔ a ʋ, ŋʋaar bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a barɛ y. Bɩ, k'a tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay.
Nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ Damas kʋ ʋ bɩ, kʋ bɩ dɩgamazaa kʋ cir Aretas a so ʋ b'a ka yarbənno n jɩm kʋ bɩ lɛrɔ ma, k'a mɔɔ ku a mɔɔ nyasʋ.
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ mɔɔ da kasɩ ʋ, n n'a ka mɔɔ n bɔ kʋ bɩ pəŋŋə bɩ tokoro deem m, yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ kʋ bɩ dɩgamazaa bɩ n mɔɔ ku an mɔɔ nyasʋ y.
Mɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ ra? Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ a nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ hɔɔ kʋ Zuuba ŋ hɩnka mɔɔ m nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mim hɩm.
Mɔɔ kristagʋaa dɔ, Woso n a busu an ta m a zi arzana ʋ, a busure dɔɔraa bueeresi hɔ m naa. Mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ ta a ʋ arzana ʋ paan•••, gɛɛ hɔhɩnkarɛ a a yɩ y, Woso ɩ naa dɔ.
Denter m, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, Woso a busu an ta m arzana ʋ, a a da ma hɔhɩnkarɛ a a yɩ, a a da ma Woso a busu paan••• an ta m arzana ʋ b'ʋ, Woso ɩ naa dɔ mɔɔ n a dɔ y.
Arzana ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a meerbaarɔ niŋŋoo ma, gʋaa n a ga m an so ŋ la y, bɩ, zaa ba ʋ, gʋaa n ŋ mim hɩrɛ y.
M lɛ mɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, gʋaa ncɩnaaʋ bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʋ y. Kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, m paŋŋawar minno mɔɔ nɩ ŋ hɩm.

K'a hɩ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, mɔɔ bɩ yɩm hɔɔzaa y, bala, mɔɔ sɩra hɩm. Bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ y, bala, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ gʋaa n a hɔɔn da mɔɔ ma an lɛ da m bɩncɛ ra, zi kʋ mɔɔ ba an n'a yɩm nɔ ʋ, gɛɛ meer kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam an n'a mam nɔ ʋ y.

Hɔɔ gʋtɔɔ nɔɔn duro kʋ Woso ŋ hɩnka mɔɔ m b'a da ma an a ka mɩŋŋabusure n a so mɔɔ ʋ. Naa tɔ ma m Woso n yaaba da mɔɔ zi an nɩ mɔɔ kɔm, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ m mɩŋŋa busu y. Yaaba bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, Sʋtaana zibəəzaa deem zibəə m, an nɩ mɔɔ zɛm, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ m mɩŋŋa busu y.
Mɔɔ yaa da Woso m gallɛm kaakʋ k'an mɔɔ yɔ fɩryɩrɛ naa do wɔ ʋ.

A n a nyɩ bɔ mɔɔ n'ʋ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ barka b'ɩbɩɩ bɔ, bala, k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ barka b'a zi ba fasɩ." Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔm m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʋ, m paŋŋawarlɔ tɔ ma, kʋ Krista paŋŋa bɩ n nyɩnta mɔɔ gʋr zi fasɩ.

Naa y'a ka Krista tɔ ma mɔɔ nɩ m heer nyɔɔm, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawarlɔ nɔ ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ, kʋ minno a hʋnhɔ ɩ mɔɔ yɩrɛ, kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma, kʋ minno ɩ mɔɔ heer kɔm sɔ. Bala, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ paŋŋa n ta ʋ.

Mɔɔ ɩ meerbaa bɩ barɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔɔzaa m mɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ da ʋ paŋŋa m. Awɔɔ y'a ga m hɔɔ a mɔɔ nyaa ba. Bala, baa kʋ hɔsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ, gʋɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma zibəəzannɔ wɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n lɛ da mɔɔ m hɔsɩ nɔ ʋ y.
Zibəəro kʋ ŋ n'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ ʋ, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ziro wɔɔ duro ba mɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ bire ʋ kan bʋraama gʋta kɩ. Zibəəro wɔɔ duro, hoserlo do y'a hʋnhɔ m kan gɩngarɛ do y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ.
Bɔ n ta ʋ mɔɔ n a ba kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ m, mɔɔ n a ba awɔɔ nɩ? K'a maam kʋ mɔɔ n yɛ k'awɔɔ n dɩga mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa mim ma bɩ m. K'a kʋrɔma naa do sugur ka m ʋ.

Dɩɩtaa naa, mɔɔ m banka m a nya kʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, a gallɛm kaakʋ hɔ mɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'ʋ naa, bɩ kʋ mɔɔ bɩ bʋr, mɔɔ bɩ yɛm awɔɔ n dɩga mɔɔ mim ma y. Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ mɔɔ nɩ m karɛ a ma, awɔɔ busoo bɛɛ y. Bala, nyɩnɔ bɛɛ n'a kam busoo ma k'a nyasʋ a zɩrɔ nɩ y, zɩrɔ wɔɔ n'a kam ma ŋn'ɩ nyasʋrɛ a nyɩnɔ m.
Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, heernyɔɔ m kan mɔɔ kɩ, kʋ m hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n ta m haay sa kan m mɩŋŋa kɩ, m m da m awɔɔ han. Awɔɔ ŋʋa kʋ mɔɔ nawʋm gʋta ncɩnaaʋ naa y'a ka awɔɔ bɩr mɔɔ ŋʋam na?
Awɔɔ yɛ a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ n yɛ k'awɔɔ n kɔ mɔɔ nyasʋm tɔ ma y. B'a da ma gʋaa n a hɩ a ʋ, hɔɔnkarɛ zi mɔɔ ba kʋ m awɔɔ ku m wɔ ʋ, ŋʋaarlɔ m.
Mɔɔ ŋʋaar ba awɔɔ m kʋ m hɔ yɩ awɔɔ gʋr zi ra? Mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ nyɔɔ awɔɔ zi rɔ wɔɔ gʋaa deem da ʋ k'an ŋʋaar ba awɔɔ m na?

Mɔɔ yɛ Tiitɩ han an ta awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, kan wɔɔ danyɩ kʋ mɔɔ mim hɩ awɔɔ m biisi bɩ kɩ. Awɔɔ a da ma a hɩ a ʋ, Tiitɩ ŋʋaar ba awɔɔ m k'a hɔ yɩ ra? A mɩŋŋa kan mɔɔ kɩ, tar deem wɔɔ sa, ʋ ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba m, kan ʋ zibəə kɩ.

A hɔɔn k'awɔɔ n'a darɛ a ʋ, ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ gumə ka ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ lɛɛ bɩ, a dɔmɩm laatʋ. Ayy•••, ʋ meerbaa bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʋm Woso taa amba Krista n'a ŋʋam bɩ m, bɩ, ʋ gʋaasɩbɔɔ, naa haay hɩ wɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ.

Mɔɔ da ɩ bɔŋ ʋ, m ʋ, ɩ b'a ka mɔɔ n bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ m bɩ dɩga a hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a gɩngarɛ awɔɔ zi bɩ bɩ maam nɩ y, awɔɔ n a yɩ sɔ a ʋ, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a gɩngam mɔɔ zi bɩ, a bɩ maam sɔ y. Mɔɔ da ɩ bɔŋ ʋ, m ʋ, ɩ b'a ka nyaa n bɩ nyɩnta ʋ, kan jɩmbaa kɩ, nɔmaa kɩ, mɩmbɔkʋma kɩ, kan sʋnsɔwʋrɛ kɩ, gʋɔɔtɔzarlɛ kɩ, kan mɩŋŋabusure kɩ, warkʋma kɩ y.

Mɔɔ da ɩ bɔŋ ʋ sɔ, m ʋ, m ya kʋ mɔɔ ʋ m nɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ naa, ɩ b'a ka Woso n mɔɔ da nyannɩ ʋ awɔɔ bire ʋ wa. M m ya m nyi ka gʋɔɔ gʋta kʋ ŋ mimbʋnyaa ba hɔɔ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta ŋn'a bɔ a taam a dintim zibəəro wɔɔ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma wa, a a da ma ŋnɩ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ jaan dam, ŋn'a zibʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ bam.

Kʋ mɔɔ bɩ bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, a gallɛm kaakʋ hɔ m naa kɛɛrɛ. Amba Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, gʋaa vanta mim ba, pakra m kʋ mim bɩ kasɛtɩzannɔ n nyɩnta ʋ hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ, kʋ mim bɩ n yɩ sɩra", kʋ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku, naa wɔɔ n'a bam.

Kʋ m lɛɛ ka m a hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mimbʋnyaa ba hɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ m kan gʋɔɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, bʋr kʋ mɔɔ ʋ b'ʋ a hɩɩya hɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ ŋ bɔ zaa ʋ, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, kʋ mɔɔ ba b'ʋ naa, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ m ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ m ya m bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ, mɔɔ bɩ gɔsɩ tore y, mɔɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ karɛ ŋ haay ʋ.
Awɔɔ lɛ taa k'a a dɔ a ʋ, Krista a meerbaa da mɔɔ lɛ ʋ mɔɔ n'a bam, gɛɛ lɔ? K'a maam awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ. Paŋŋawarzaa bɛɛ m Krista m awɔɔ gʋr zi y. A y'a paŋŋa bɩ hɩnkarɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ.

Sɩra m, a zɛ kʋ n y'a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ, a nyɩnta paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, bɩ, a y'a mɩsɩrbaa bam kɛɛrɛ Woso paŋŋa tɔ ma. Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ sɔ, bɩ, ʋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʋm kan kɩ, ʋ n'ʋ zi bɩ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ Woso paŋŋa m.

K'a bɔ a dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma a zim, awɔɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ gɛ. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Yeezuu Krista y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, gɛɛ lɔ? K'awɔɔ n a dɔ, k'a maam, k'awɔɔ bɩ wɔŋ ʋ a a sɩrakarɛ zibəəro hɩnka bɩ tɔ ma m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ bɩ jɩra m sɩrakarɛ zibəəro hɩnkarɛ ra wa.

Yaa wɔɔ n'a dam Woso m, k'awɔɔ bɩ mimbʋnyaa ba y. Ʋ ka bɛɛ wɔɔ nawʋm ma, k'ʋ a hɩnka awɔɔ m, ʋ ʋ, ʋ gumə ta ʋ wa. Ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma k'awɔɔ n a mɩŋŋa ba, baa k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ bɩ gumə yɩm mim kʋ wɔɔ dɩnda naa nɔ ʋ y.
Bala, wɔɔ ba paŋŋa m k'ʋ sɩra da jɩm ʋ y. Paŋŋa wɔɔ n ta m k'ʋ a ka, kʋ sɩra n ta lɛɛ.
Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ nɩ paŋŋa m denter, wɔɔ y'ʋ heer nyɔɔm. Wɔɔ n'a yɛm Woso han bɩ n naa karɛ. A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ.

Naa tɔ ma m, kʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta m m laatʋ awɔɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ nɩ naa haay gʋrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma. K'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku awɔɔ bire ʋ, m bɩ m da m nyaa ma kan awɔɔ kɩ, lɛ kʋ Zuuba a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ nɩ y. Bala, lɛ kʋ Zuuba a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, a ka a ʋ mɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ bankarɛ tɔ ma, a n a ka mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m ŋ zaar ba y.

Kɛɛrɛ naa, m danyɩnɔ, m leer mɔɔ n'a sore awɔɔ m. K'a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm. A bɩr a tɔŋ ʋ k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ. K'a bɩr kʋ heer yom. A bɩr kʋ marɛ. A bɩr a mɩsɩrbaa bam laafɩɩ kan kʋ kɩ nɔ ʋ. Maam bɩ, kʋ ŋʋarɛzaa kan laafɩɩzaa kɩ m Woso m bɩ, a nyɩntam kan awɔɔ kɩ.
K'a yaa da kʋ m mɩŋŋa danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ. Wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
Bɩ kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka, kan Woso ŋʋarɛ kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zɛkʋra kɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ ci naa do bam, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ y, bɩ gʋaa bɛɛ mɔɔ nyɔɔ sɔ y, Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa, kan Zɩ Woso k'a a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ k'ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ kan danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ n'awɔɔ m, an nɩ Galasii kʋrɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm wɔɔ Zɩ Woso han, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
Yeezuu mɩŋŋa ɩ yɛ an ga, k'a wɔɔ bʋmbɔ ʋ mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ, k'a a da ma a wɔɔ yɔ durnya bʋnyaa naa do wɔ ʋ, amba wɔɔ Zɩ Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m.
Woso tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.
A bɔ k'awɔɔ nawʋm Woso k'a awɔɔ bir k'awɔɔ n yɩ a gʋɔɔ Krista barka minto b'ʋ, a ta k'a zu lemim nyɩnta vanta ʋ bɩ, a a ka mɔɔ n zɛ kədə.
A bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ lemim nyɩnta vanta n ta ʋ wa, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ warm kʋ ma, ŋn'a kam ma k'a Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ zaar ba.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa lemim nyɩnta vanta dɩnda awɔɔ m, an a hɔ kan lemim kʋ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ kɩ, baa kʋ wɔɔ m, baa kʋ malɛɛka y'a to arzana ʋ an bɩ naa ba, kʋ Woso nɔmaa n a kərgu a zaa ra.
Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m so ra, kʋ gʋaa lemim nyɩnta vanta pa da awɔɔ m, bɩ lemim k'awɔɔ si hɔɔ bɩ bɛɛ, kʋ Woso nɔmaa n a kərgu a zaa ra.

Ncɩnaaʋ naa, m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔ n yɩ kan m kɩ ra? Gɛɛ, kʋ Woso nɔ n yɩ kan m kɩ ra? A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ gʋɔɔ n m ŋʋa ra? Ayy•••, kʋ m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔ n yɩ m la, mɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam Krista zibəənyɩ dɔ y.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ n a to gʋɔɔ zi y.
Bala, a ma bɛɛ mɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ zi y, bɩ gʋɔɔ bɛɛ y'a dɩnda mɔɔ n sɔ y, Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa y'a hɩnka mɔɔ m, mɔɔ n a dɔ.
Nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ hɔ niŋŋə biisi, m nɩ zum zɩɩfʋrɔ wosozaa ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ mim ma. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ fɩr ka Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ ma gʋta maam-maam, kʋ m a zaar ba.
Zu kʋ mɔɔ nawʋm zɩɩfʋrɔ wosozaa b'ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ cem m muno zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ han zaa bɩ zuure nɔ ʋ gʋta, m nɩ m yoŋ ʋ gʋta m lɛ da ŋ la, m yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ zuure nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ Woso lɛɛ ka an mɔɔ bɔ ʋ a barka bɩ tɔ ma kʋ m a zi ba, bɩ ma bɩ, mɔɔ n yɩ cɩna y. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, an mɔɔ bir zibəə bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ k'a b'a ŋʋa kʋ mɔɔ n'a Nyɩ bɩ dɔ kʋ m a pa da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ n m ka ma kʋ m gʋaa lar ma y,
mɔɔ n ta Zerizalɛm ʋ sɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m ŋn'a ba kristazibəəzannɔ rɔ wɔɔ zi y, m hʋr mɔɔ ʋ lɛɛm m ta Araabɩrɔ kʋ ʋ, m m to b'ʋ, m bʋr Damas kʋ ʋ.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ dɔɔraa kaakʋ kur bɩ, mɔɔ n ta Zerizalɛm ʋ, kʋ m aa Sefas dɔ, mɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʋ kan kɩ dɔmɩm bueeresoor.
Mɔɔ n zibəəzaa vanta yɩ kʋ Zakkɩ bɛɛ y, Zuuba danzaa bɩ.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m ci b'ʋ naa, Woso n mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, ŋʋaar bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a barɛ y.
M hʋr kʋ mɔɔ ʋ Zerizalɛm ʋ bɩ jɛ ʋ, ta mɔɔ ʋ Siiri kʋrɔ ʋ, kan Silisii kʋrɔ ʋ kɩ.
Bɩ, Zidee kʋrɔ wɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ n mɔɔ yɩ deem y.
A ma ŋ y'a ʋ bala, n n'a dɩndarɛ, n ʋ: "Gʋaa k'a nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma biisi bɩ, a ɩ Krista zaa k'a nyɩnta an n'a zaar bam bɩ pa dam kɛɛrɛ."
Naa do n a ka, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ mɔɔ minto.
Dɔɔraa bueeresi cenle jɛ ʋ, mɔɔ m bɔ, m m ya, m ta Zerizalɛm ʋ kan Barnabas kɩ, mɔɔ Tiitɩ gaa m ta m kan m kɩ sɔ.

Woso y'a hɩ mɔɔ m hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʋ, a ʋ, mɔɔ n ta, bɩ minto m mɔɔ n ta. Kʋ wɔɔ yaa lee ku bɩ, mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ n'a pa dam do vantɔɔ barla bɩ sa, m a dɩnda ŋ nɩ. Mɔɔ sokʋma ba kan lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a minto m a dɩnda ŋ nɩ sɔ, kʋ zi kʋ mɔɔ ba kan zi kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ kɩ bɩ bɔ vam y.
Baa mɔɔ zukuuzaa Tiitɩ kʋ grɛkkɩ gʋaa m bɩ, ŋ n a ka ma k'a paŋŋa ba ma k'an gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y.

A n bɔkarɛ gʋɔɔ a da wɔɔ zi ŋn'a hɩrɛ a ma kristagʋɔɔ bɩ ŋʋaarzannɔ m, brɔɔ a nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ kʋ Tiitɩ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. A da ŋ y'a ʋ wɔɔ zi k'a soamɩŋŋaʋ kʋ Krista Yeezuu a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ sɩnsɩɩ, a ŋʋa ŋ y'a ʋ k'a a ya, a wɔɔ da lɔmbaa ma.
Wɔɔ n yɛ ŋ ma y, wɔɔ n'ʋ ka ma k'ʋ kʋ ma kan ŋ kɩ baa poore tɔkkɛ y, a ba wɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ sɩra k'a nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ m bɩr a bɩncɛ ʋ.
Kʋ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ lɛɛzaabaa mim n pakra ba mɔɔ ma y, bala, Woso bɩr gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ n mɔɔ da hɔsɩ vanta barɛ ma lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ nɔ ʋ y.
Bɩ, ŋ yɛ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, Woso mɔɔ da ʋ kʋ m lemim nyɩnta pa da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m, amba Woso Pɩyɛɛr da ʋ k'an a pa da zɩɩfʋrɔ m bɩ m.
Bala, Woso k'a Pɩyɛɛr bɔ ʋ, an a nyɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ ma bɩ, Woso bɩ do ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ sɔ, an mɔɔ nyɔɔ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ zi.

Kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ dɩgam Zakkɩ kan Sefas kɩ Zaan kɩ ma a lɛɛzannɔ, brɔɔ yɛ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ Woso a barka ka mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n zi bɩ ba denter. A m naa, ŋnɩ mɔɔ wɔ nyasʋ, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, kʋmarɛ ɩ wɔɔ bire ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ m ta do vantɔɔ wɔɔ zi, kʋ ŋ bɔɔm n ta zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ zi.
Bɩ, hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta bɩ, ŋ ʋ, ʋ ʋ da ŋʋazannɔ han, bɩ kʋ hɔ bɩ do nɩ, mɔɔ ba denter.
Bɩ, Sefas k'a bɩ bʋr Antɩyɔs ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ ba kan kɩ gʋaa haay lɛɛ, k'a kʋrɔ ma bɩ tɔ ma.

Bala nyɩnta a ʋ, an nɩ hɔ bɩm kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, Zakkɩ gʋɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ ŋnɩ lee ku cɩna y. Kʋ ŋ bɩ lee ku bɩ, an a da a ra, an a gʋ ŋ ma an jɩm a hɔ, nyi k'a n'a bam zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m bɩ minto.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ m ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʋ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ n a hɔbaa sa sɔ, naa n a ka Barnabas mɩŋŋa n gasʋ ŋ hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya zibəə b'ʋ.

Kʋ mɔɔ ŋ yɩ ŋ bɩr zum sɩra k'a nɩ lemim nyɩnta b'ʋ tɩrga bɩ, mɔɔ hɩ Sefas m gʋaa haay lɛɛ mɔɔ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n zɩɩfʋ bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam am do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, ɩ bɩr a bam am zɩɩfʋrɔ hɔ m bɩ, a a ba lɔ ɩbɩɩ n'a ŋʋam k'ɩ paŋŋa ba do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma kʋ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa ba am zɩɩfʋrɔ hɔ nɩ?"
Zɩɩfʋrɔ m wɔɔ m, wɔɔ zɩrɔ ɩ nyɩnta maam, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso lɛrɔ dɔ rɔ bɛɛ n wɔɔ nɩ y.

Bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, gʋaa b'a dam ma an yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ Moyiisi lɛrɔ zibəəro barɛ minto y, sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʋ nɩ gʋaa bam tɩrga bala. Sɩra wɔɔ ka Krista Yeezuu ʋ sɔ kʋ Woso n'ʋ ba tɩrga a tɔ ma, bɩ lɛrɔ zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y, bala, n bɩ gɔsɩ bam tɩrga lɛrɔ zuure tɔ ma y.
Wɔɔ, ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ n n'ʋ ba tɩrga Krista tɔ ma, an bɔkarɛ an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, ʋ ba wɔɔ ʋ mimbʋnyaabənno sɔ am do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m. K'a maam Krista bɩ mimbʋnyaa zi an n'a bam na? Ayy••• fɩɩga!
Bala, kʋ mɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure to k'a b'a dam ma an gʋaa ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ bɩ minto, kʋ mɔɔ n ya m m bɔ kʋ m zu ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ m bam lɛrɔbɩsɩkamazaa kɛɛrɛ.
Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m, lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr m mɩsɩrbaa bam lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma dɔ y, kʋ m m da ma m m mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba Woso tɔ ma. Kʋ n Krista wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ, mɔɔ ga kan kɩ.

Mɩsɩrbaa kʋ mɔɔ n ta m naa, mɔɔ bɛɛ m ta nɩ y, Krista n a mɩsɩrbaa bam mɔɔ ʋ. Mɩsɩrbaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam her-her naa, a ba mɔɔ nawʋm sɩra ka Krista ʋ nɔ ʋ, a m Woso Nyɩ, an mɔɔ ŋʋa an yɛ an ga mɔɔ tɔ ma.
Mɔɔ bɩr Woso barka bɩ bam hɔ nɩbɩr y, bala, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma gʋaa a da ma an yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ, k'a maam, Krista bɩ ga a ʋ vam.
Aba! Galasii zannɔ, hɔɔnwarzannɔ. Nka ɩ wɔ ʋ an awɔɔ hɔɔn wusigə ncɩnaaʋ? A n bɔkarɛ n y'a hɩnka awɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, a dɔ a ʋ, Yeezuu Krista ga gɔdarkʋra ma.
Kʋ m laaka da a han wa: Lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure minto y'a ka Woso n a Ɛspri bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ ra, gɛɛ zu k'awɔɔ ʋ sɩrakarɛ lemim b'ʋ bɩ minto nɩ?
Bɔ yarmabaa m naa? Woso zuure bɩ sɩŋŋɩda sa awɔɔ ʋ Woso Ɛspri paŋŋa m, a bɔkarɛ an n'a ŋʋam kɛɛrɛ k'a nyambʋr a mɛsim paŋŋa m na?
Ziro kʋ Woso ŋ ba awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ vam kan awɔɔ kɩ ra? Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʋ, ŋ bɩ vam kan awɔɔ kɩ sɩɩn!
Kʋ Woso y'a Ɛspri karɛ awɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ, naa ba an nawʋm lɛrɔ wɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ zure ŋ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma ra? Gɛɛ zu k'awɔɔ ʋ sɩrakarɛ lemim b'ʋ bɩ tɔ ma nɩ?
K'a a yo Abraham n sɩra ka Woso ʋ, Woso n dɩga ma tɩrga a mɩm ʋ bɩ,
k'a maam, k'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, sɩrakənno wɔɔ n Abraham nyɩnɔ.

A n ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ ka an a hɩ hɔɔ a ʋ, Woso do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bam tɩrga a mɩm ʋ ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, bɩ minto m Woso n lemim nyɩnta naa do hɩ Abraham m, a ʋ: 'Tara burə gʋɔɔ do haay barka yɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma.'
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ sɩrakənno m nɔ wɔɔ nɩ barka yɩm kan sɩrakarɛzaa Abraham kɩ.

Bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yom lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ ɩ kan ŋ kɩ, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'a bɩr hɔ haay kʋ n y'a da lɛrɔ wɔɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ bam tee••• bɩ, lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ ɩ kan kɩ.'
Sɩra nɔ ʋ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma y, bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'an tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa bam.'
Lɛrɔ wɔɔ zaa bɩ y'a hɔ kan sɩrakarɛ zaa bɩ kɩ, bala, n ʋ: 'Gʋaa k'a nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay bɩ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩm.'

Krista a mɩŋŋa ka n a zɛ wɔɔ tɔ ma, a ba a ʋ maam k'a wɔɔ bʋmbɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ nɔ ʋ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ sompi wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ an lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ bɩ yɩ, bala, Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: 'Lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ ɩ kan gʋaa kʋ n y'a zeŋŋə gɔ ma bɩ kɩ.'
Nyɩnta ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m barka kʋ Abraham a yɩ bɩ yɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
M danyɩnɔ, ʋ makra sa gʋɔɔ minkəm zibəə nɔ ʋ, kʋ gʋaa a hɔɔnhɔ da ci ʋ an a cɩnta, amba a a ga m bɩ nɩ, kʋ n a ba a zɛ kur, gɔsɩ bɩr hɔ k'a hɩ bɩ zaar barɛ, b'a bɩr hɔ nam ma sɔ y.
A do m bɩ sɔ, lerbɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ bɔ Woso ʋ Abraham m kan a nyɩ bɩ kɩ m. N n a hɩ, n ʋ: "A nyɩnɔ y," ɩ ʋ a hɩ n y'a ʋ nyɩnɔ hɔka ma y, ayy•••, nyɩ bɩ deem, bɩ nyɩ bɩ, Krista m, bɩ n ʋ, k'a hɩ ma.

Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Woso lɛɛ ka an a hɔɔnhɔ hɩ an a cɩnta, dɔɔraa zorsi bukərku kur bɩ, n nɩ bɔkarɛ n nɩ bɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, ncɩnaaʋ naa, lɛrɔ wɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Woso lɛɛ ka an a hɩ bɩ zaar ba, ŋnɩ ler kʋ Woso a bɔ bɩ zaar ba sɔ wa.
Bala, kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma m gʋaa nɩ hɔjirle yɩm Woso zi, k'a maam Woso lerbɔrɛ tɔ ma bɛɛ dɔ y. A n bɔkarɛ ler kʋ Woso a bɔ bɩ y'a ka Woso n a barka ka Abraham ʋ.

Kʋ ncɩnaaʋ m lɛrɔ wɔɔ zibəə n bɔ m kɛɛrɛ? Lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka Woso ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ hɩnkam wɔɔ m, kʋ nyɩ kʋ Woso ler bɩ bɔ a tɔ ma bɩ n tolle ba an yɩ. Malɛɛkarɔ ɩ bʋr lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, gʋaa deem ɩ nyɩnta malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ bire ʋ.
Lɛrɔ wɔɔ karɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, a yɩ pakra kʋ gʋaa n nyɩnta ʋ ŋ karɛ ma, bɩ ler bɩ bɔrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, Woso mɩŋŋa mim m bɩ a deem.

Naa k'a hɩ a ʋ, lɔ? Lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩsɩ ŋn'a kam Woso lerbɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma ra? Ayy•••, a bɛɛ m naa y. Bala, kʋ yɩ an nawʋrɛ ɩ ʋ, lɛ niŋŋə n ta ʋ, gʋɔɔ n'a dam ma ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩ a tɔ ma, k'a maam lɛ bɩ do n'a kam gʋɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ sɔ.
Bɩ, Wosoci b'a hɩ a ʋ, mimbʋnyaa paŋŋa y'a so durnya gʋɔɔ ʋ jilli. Maam bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ, sɩra kʋ ŋ y'a ka Yeezuu Krista ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
Dɔmɩm kʋ sɩrakarɛ zaa bɩ n bʋr cɩna bɩ, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ wɔɔ ba a lɔnnɔ ŋn'ɩ dɔm wɔɔ ma, kʋ Woso n tolle ba an sɩrakarɛ zaa bɩ hɩnka.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ, dɔ ŋ y'a ʋ wɔɔ ma, kʋ Krista n tolle ba an bʋr, kʋ Woso n wɔɔ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, sɩra ka Krista ʋ dɔmɩm m, lɛrɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ dɔm wɔɔ ma bɩ, ŋ bɛɛ y'a so wɔɔ ʋ dɔ y.
Bala, awɔɔ woo••• naa, Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, sɩra k'awɔɔ ka Krista Yeezuu ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
Denter m, awɔɔ haay k'a batɛm si Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa n n'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ʋ jilli.

Naa tɔ ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, kʋ zɩɩfʋ n'ɩ mɩ, gɛɛ do vanta gʋaa n'ɩ mɩ, minsi bɛɛ n bɩ y, kʋ lɔ n'ɩ mɩ, gɛɛ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa n'ɩ mɩ, minsi bɛɛ n bɩ sɔ y, kʋ yar n'ɩ mɩ, gɛɛ lʋ n'ɩ mɩ minsi bɛɛ sɔ y. Bala, awɔɔ woo••• naa, awɔɔ a ba deem Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ Krista y'a so awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a maam Abraham nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ hɔjirle kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm.
