Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Nyɩ k'a nɩ zɛm b'a so a zɩ hɔnyɩ ʋ bɩ, a nyɩbaa dɔmɩm ʋ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan lɔ kɩ, an bɔkarɛ a y'a so hɔnyɩ b'ʋ jilli.
A nyɩbaa dɔmɩm ʋ, gʋɔɔ nɩ nyasʋm nɩ, ŋnɩ dɩgarɛ a mim woo••• ma, kʋ dɔmɩm k'a zɩ b'a cɩnta k'an a so a hɔnyɩ b'ʋ bɩ n tolle ba an a ku.
A do m bɩ sɔ kan wɔɔ kɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ n Krista dɔ cɩna bɩ, bɔ wɔɔ ʋ kʋ ʋ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʋ gʋaa bɩr ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ y'a so wɔɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ wɔɔ ba lɔnnɔ.
Bɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a b'a ku bɩ, a a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ, lʋ y'a yɩ. Yɩ a ʋ, dɔmɩm kʋ Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ ma.
K'a a da ma a gʋɔɔ kʋ lɔnnɔ m lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto rɔ wɔɔ yɔ, kʋ Woso n wɔɔ ba a nyɩnɔ.
Kʋ Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ y'a ka, an a Nyɩ bɩ Ɛspri bɩ zer wɔɔ heerlɔ ʋ, wɔɔ n'ʋ dam ma Ɛspri bɩ tɔ ma, ʋ nɩ Woso birm, ʋ ʋ: "Ʋ Zɩ."
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, lɔnnɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m dɔ y, Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ k'a nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'a so a hɔjirle b'ʋ, Woso n nɩ naa barɛ.
Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ biisi awɔɔ n Woso dɔ bɩ, zu awɔɔ nawʋm hɔɔ kʋ n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ma wosoro, a a ba ŋ lɔnnɔ, bɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro, Woso bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y.

Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ Woso dɔ, an lɛ da bɩ, Woso awɔɔ dɔ, b'a a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ, a a ya, a a bɔ k'a zu durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʋ gʋaa bɩr ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ ʋ, k'a a ya, a a ba ŋ lɔnnɔ? Bɩ hɔɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, ŋ ba paŋŋa nɩ y.
Awɔɔ ɩ dɩgam dɔmɩnnɔ niŋŋoo ma dɔmɩm wɩsɩrɔ a yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ, an n'a bam maam sɔ kan monno niŋŋoo kɩ, hɔɔ niŋŋoo dɔmɩm kɩ, dɔɔraarɔ kɩ.
Awɔɔ mim naa ɩ mɔɔ da bɔŋ ʋ, ɩ b'a ka zi mɔɔ ba awɔɔ minto vam wa?
M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ n nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han gʋta, amba mɔɔ m ba awɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ, k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa sɔ. A zar bɛɛ awɔɔ ʋ mɔɔ ma y.
Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, mɔɔ yaaba zɛrɛ sabaabʋ y'a ka mɔɔ n lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m, m lɛɛkarɛ zɛrɛ ma awɔɔ zi b'ʋ.
K'awɔɔ bɩ to a kɔ mɔɔ yaaba bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ n mɔɔ bɔ ʋ y, b'awɔɔ n a si mɔɔ lɛɛ y. Bɩ mɔɔ si awɔɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa ɩ ʋ, Woso malɛɛka deem awɔɔ si, ɩ ʋ, Krista Yeezuu mɩŋŋa awɔɔ si.
Heernyɔɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m biisi b'ɩ ka? Mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa m ʋ, k'awɔɔ n'a dam ma, awɔɔ y'a mɩnyaarɔ waaŋ ʋ a ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ.
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, m ba mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ jɩm sɩra kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ minto ra?
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋʋaar hɔ dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ, tʋntɔʋrɛ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m kan awɔɔ kɩ naa, tʋntɔʋrɛ paan••• bɛɛ y, a ka ŋ nawʋm ma k'a awɔɔ gʋ mɔɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n a tɔ ʋ kan a kɩ.
A mɩŋŋa kʋ gʋɔɔ n bɩr ta tʋntɔʋrɛ m hɔ mɩŋŋa tɔ ma, b'a ga a ʋ m kʋ tʋntɔʋrɛ bɩ do n bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••, baa kʋ mɔɔ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, gɛɛ kʋ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ b'ʋ y.
Mɔɔ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, mɔɔ m ya m nɩ fɩr yɩm paan••• m heer ʋ awɔɔ tɔ ma, m nɩ nyoosi bam am lʋ jɩsɩzaa hɔ bɩ m, kʋ m a ka k'awɔɔ n Krista mɩsɩrbaa yɩ paan•••.
A ŋʋa mɔɔ nawʋm paan••• kʋ m bɩr awɔɔ bire ʋ b'ʋ dɩɩtaa, kʋ m m meerbaa bɩ lʋr m a ba, bala, mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ mɔɔ meer bɩ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ lʋnlɔ y.
Awɔɔ k'a n'a ŋʋam kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n a so a ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a hɩ m m wa. Awɔɔ n hɔ kʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ ma ra?
N y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ, Abraham nyɩnɔ yɩ hɩɩya, deem yɩ a ʋ kan Agaar kɩ, lɔ m bɩ, an deem yɩ kan Saara kɩ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa m bɩ.
Bɩ lʋ kʋ lɔ m bɩ nyɩ bɩ, yɩ b'ʋ amba gʋaa haay nɩ yɩm bɩ m, an bɔkarɛ, nyɩ kʋ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa b'a yɩ bɩ, Woso ɩ lɛɛ ka an a yɩrɛ ler bɔ.

Mim naa do naa, hɔ a ʋ k'a dɩnda wɔɔ m, a ba n nɩ: Lannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ, gʋaasɩbabaa hɩɩyɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ da rɔ wɔɔ makra nɩ ŋ mɩ. Lɛɛkarɛ gʋaasɩbabaa makra m Agaar m. Gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ Woso a da Sinayii ci burə ʋ bɩ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ do a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, lɔnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ.
Bala, Agaar bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, Sinayii ci bɩ m, Araabɩrɔ kʋ ci bɩ do n ta ʋ, a bɔ kʋ ʋ sɔ ɩ ʋ, Zerizalɛm kʋnɔ k'an ta ʋ her-her naa m, bala, a ɩ lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ.
Bɩ arzana Zerizalɛm bɩ, soamɩŋŋaʋzaa m bɩ, wɔɔ kʋnɔ bɩ m bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ da m.

Bala, n y'a gʋrsɩra ba Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n cɩna bɩ, ɩ heer nyɔɔ, bala, ɩbɩɩ bɩr nyɩnɔ yɩm biisi y, heernyɔɔ zee da, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n nyoosibarɛ fɩr yɩ biisi bɩ, bala, lʋ kʋ n kaanm m bɩ nyɩnɔ yɩm gʋta, an lɛ da lʋ k'a zim n ta ʋ bɩ nyɩnɔ ra.
B'awɔɔ, m danyɩnɔ, amba Izakkɩ m bɩ, ler kʋ Woso a bɔ bɩ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m.
Biisi bɩ, amba nyɩ k'a yɩ am gʋaa haay hɔ bɩ m bɩ nɩ fɩr kam nyɩ kʋ Woso Ɛspri a ka an yɩ bɩ ma bɩ, her sɔ naa, a maam sɔ.
Bɩ, bɔ n y'a hɩ Wosoci b'ʋ? N ʋ: 'La lʋ kʋ lɔ m bɩ ra kan a nyɩ bɩ kɩ, bala, a n a ga m kʋ lɔ bɩ nyɩ bɩ n hɔjirle yɩ kan soamɩŋŋaʋzaa bɩ nyɩ bɩ kɩ y.'
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, lɔ bɩ nyɩnɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y, lʋ kʋ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa n bɩ nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m.
Krista bɩ, wɔɔ yɔ a ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ so ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ paan•••. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a b'a ya a to gɔsɩ n'a ba hɔ niŋŋə lɔnnɔ y.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ a m, m ʋ, k'awɔɔ ʋ kʋ n a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, hɔ kʋ Krista a ba awɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ nyɔɔdʋ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ y.
Kʋ m m ya m so ra paan•••, kʋ gʋaa a bɔ an gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, k'an a dɔ a ʋ, pakra m k'an zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay.
Awɔɔ k'a n'a kam ma k'a yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ a gʋ Krista ma, a do awɔɔ ʋ Woso barka bɩ ma sɔ.
Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, a ta wɔɔ ʋ ʋ heer lɛ kʋ Woso n'ʋ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ n'a mɩm dam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m bɩ n naa.
Bala, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ, kʋ wɔɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, gɛɛ kʋ wɔɔ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m bɩ y, hɔ k'a a ga m bɩ, sɩrakarɛ m, an nɩ zi bam ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Biisi bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ tam lɛɛ mɩŋŋa Woso zaa bɩ ra, nka y'a ta awɔɔ m toore k'awɔɔ bɩ zu sɩra ʋ dɔ?
Woso k'awɔɔ bir bɩ bɛɛ nɩ naa barɛ awɔɔ nɩ y.
Bɔɔr deem y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ: "Nyʋnyɔɔ poore ɩ nyisi derm haay."
Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ heer kookoo Zuuba tɔ ma awɔɔ mim bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ yɩm deem kan mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ kɩ. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a n'awɔɔ warm kʋ ma bɩ, Woso bɩ zaa hʋnhʋrm, baa kʋ nka m.
M danyɩnɔ, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ bɩr baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ mim pa dam dɔ y, k'a pa mɔɔ n'a dam, gʋɔɔ bɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma dɔ y, bɩ ŋ bɩ kaanm Krista gɔdarkʋra zɛ bɩ m sɔ y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ warm kʋ ma rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ m, kʋ ŋ lɛ taa kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ŋn'aa mɩŋŋɔɔ bɔ am hɔbɩsɩ hɔ bɩ m, a pakra ba ŋ ma.
M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ bir Woso ʋ k'awɔɔ n a so a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ, b'a bɩ yo soamɩŋŋaʋ bɩ do ma k'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ zi ba y. Bɩ k'a yɩ kʋ zibəənyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Bala, lemim k'a so lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay bɩ ba n nɩ: "Ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa ŋʋa bɩ m."
Bɩ k'awɔɔ y'a hɔ barɛ ɩ ʋ poohɔɔ n'a mɩ, an nɩ sɔ dɩndam kʋ ʋ, an nɩ kʋ kɩnkaansʋrɛ, k'a dundo a zi, kʋ n bɛɛ a kʋ nyam.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ: K'a to kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n ka a lɛɛ a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, maam bɩ, awɔɔ b'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ barɛ y.
Hɔ kʋ mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ n'a ŋʋam bɩ bɩr yɛm Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a ŋʋam sɔ bɩ bɩr yɛm mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ y, jɩnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ kan kʋ kɩ, maam bɩ awɔɔ b'a dam ma a a mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y.
Bɩ, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ karɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʋ dɔ y.
Mɛsim zibəəro ɩ yɩm garga ra, ŋ ba n nɩ: Jaandarɛ m, lannɔ kan yaarɔ barɛ kɩ m, dintim zibəə haay m,
yaa da wosobaawɔnnɔ m, nyɩsɩrɔ bɩrɛ m, sɔkʋm m, bakʋmarɛ m, jɩmbaa m, kan nɔmaa kɩ, ka a mɩŋŋa daahan ma m, gʋngʋrɛ m, bazɛkʋra m,

kan mɩm bɩr gʋɔɔ hɔ ma kɩ, bɛɛmire waasɩ kɩ, kan hɔ bɩ maam-maam kɩ, kan zibəəro kʋ ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan nawɔnnɔ kɩ. Kʋ m m ya m so ra, amba mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m awɔɔ bɔ zaa ʋ bɩ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ gasʋm Woso cirbəə b'ʋ y.
Bɩ nyɩ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a dam gʋaa mɩsɩrbaa ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: ŋʋarɛ m, kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, laafɩɩ kɩ, bʋraama kɩ, mɩŋŋabaa kɩ, bamɩŋŋa kɩ, taalɛra kɩ,
kan bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdabaa kɩ, kan da a mɩŋŋa ma kɩ. Lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩr nyaa bam hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ma y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ Krista a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ wɔɔ kan a hɔɔnhɔrɔ kɩ wɔ gɔdarkʋra ma.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ ʋ, bɩ minto bɩ, a a ga m k'an ka wɔɔ lɛɛ, ʋ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ.
Ʋ b'ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ busu y, ʋ bɩ kʋ da nɔmaa ma y, ʋ bɩ jɩm ba kʋ ma y.

M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ gʋaa yɩ an nɩ mimbʋnyaa bam, awɔɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ karɛ a lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ, k'awɔɔ n dundo zi a bɔ zaa ʋ, bɩ kʋ m a hɩ awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə m, gʋaa biyəə n dundo a zi k'a bɩ gasʋ kʋrɔma bɩ do ʋ sɔ y.
K'a bɩr kɔm kʋ ma, a bɩr a dam kʋ han, k'awɔɔ y'a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, lɛ kʋ Krista a cɩnta b'awɔɔ nɩ zuŋ ʋ.
Kʋ gʋaa y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʋ, hɔsɩ n' a mɩ, an bɔkarɛ hɔsɩ bɛɛ n'a zaa nɩ, bra an n'a barɛ a mɩŋŋa m.
Bɩ kʋ gʋaa biyəə n a hɔɔn da a mɩŋŋa zibəə ma an dɩga a, kʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ y'a nɔ ʋ, k'a n'a heer nyɔɔ kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ, b'a ba gɩnga gʋaa ma k'a heer nyɔɔ y.
Bala, gʋaa biyəə n'a mɩŋŋa mim nyɩ bɔŋ ʋ Woso taa.
Gʋaa kʋ n nɩ Woso lemim dɩndam nɩ b'a ga m, an hɔ haay k'an ta m bɩ bɔ ʋ an a ka hɔdɩndarɛzaa b'ʋ.
A bɩ bra bɩmba a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ y, Woso bɩ yɛm gʋaa n yaa wʋ a ma y, bala, hɔ kʋ gʋaa a duu b'a n'a dam.
Kʋ gʋaa a mɩŋŋa lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ zibəəro duu, hɔ k'a n'a dam bɩ n zɛ m. Bɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔɔnhɔ zibəəro duum bɩ, hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ an n'a yɩm, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ m.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ bɩ kɔ kan zi mɩŋŋa barɛ kɩ y, ʋ bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••, bala, kʋ wɔɔ n kɔ y, wɔɔ y'ʋ zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩm, a dɔmɩm ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ toore n naa, ʋ zi ba gʋaa haay daahan minto, an lɛ da bɩ, ʋ a mɩŋŋa ba ʋ danyɩnɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ nɩ gʋrsɩra bɩ barɛ m zim, bɩ minto m gʋrsɩranyɩ bɩ n gʋta-gʋta.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ, a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a ka ŋ nawʋm ma kʋ gʋɔɔ n'a yɩ, mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ tɔ ma. Ŋ lɛ baa k'a fɩr yɩ Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ pa darɛ tɔ ma y.
Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋm baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bɩr zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. Ŋ nɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a ŋʋam k'awɔɔ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, k'a a da ma a a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ k'awɔɔ yɛ a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ.
Kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ ba ʋ kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ bɛɛ y. Kan mɔɔ kɩ durnya bɩ hɔgər m Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ tɔ ma, kan durnya bɩ kɩ sɔ, gər m mɔɔ m Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ tɔ ma sɔ.
Bala, kʋ gʋaa gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, gɛɛ k'a n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ n bɩ y, an lɛ da bɩ, yɩrɛdaa kʋ Woso n'a kam bɩ m.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ naa do ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, kan Woso gʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ, kʋ Woso n laafɩɩ kan cicirzɛrɛ kɩ ka ŋ ʋ.
A n a sa naa ma, gɔsɩ b'a ya an mɔɔ da kɔrɛ ma y, bala, mɔɔ ɩ fɩryɩrɛ jɩrɔ m m mɛ ma, an n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Yeezuu y'a so mɔɔ ʋ.
M danyɩnɔ, bɩ kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ. Amina.

Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ ci bɩ barɛ awɔɔ ma. Woso ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ kʋ m yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ kʋ wosogʋɔɔ n'a mɩ, [an nɩ Efɛɛzɩ ʋ,] an nɩ yɛm Krista Yeezuu ma, an nɩ zɛkʋra m kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
Ʋ Woso barka da, a m Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ. A Sɛnt-Ɛspri barka do haay ka wɔɔ ʋ arzana ʋ, Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
Woso lɛɛ ka an wɔɔ bɔ ʋ Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, a n durnya da y, wɔɔ bɔ a ʋ maam k'ʋ yɩ a gʋɔɔ, kʋ minsi bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ gʋr zi a mɩm ʋ y.
K'a nɩ wɔɔ ŋʋam bɩ minto bɩ, a a cɩnta hɔɔ tee••• kʋ wɔɔ n b'ʋ ba a nyɩnɔ Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, naa a lɛ n taa a ŋʋarɛ bɩ tɔ ma.
Ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, a barka k'an ta lɛbɔʋrɛ m bɩ tɔ ma, a ka an nawʋm wɔɔ ʋ vam, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ zɛkʋra m kan a Nyɩ ŋʋarɛzaa bɩ kɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
Bala, Krista ma bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, Woso wɔɔ bʋmbɔ, an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʋ. A barka bɩ gʋtabaa tɔ ma m.
A barka bɩ k'a ka wɔɔ ʋ gʋta bɩ minto bɩ, a a ka wɔɔ nɩ mindɔrɛ m kan hɔɔn kɩ m.
A a ka wɔɔ n a hɔɔnhɔ k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ dɔ, hɔ k'a cɩnta biisi tee••• k'a ba Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Hɔ kʋ Woso a cɩnta k'a ba a nyambʋr dɔmɩm k'a bɔ ʋ bɩ ma bɩ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔ k'a nɩ brama haay kan hɔ k'a nɩ tara burə ʋ haay kɩ bɩ, an n'a som kʋ ma kʋ Krista deem taan••• n yɩ ŋ soʋrezaa.

Hɔ woo••• ba Woso n nawʋm a hɔɔnhɔ ma, bɩ y'a ka an lɛɛ ka an wɔɔ bɔ ʋ, amba a lɛ n taa bɩ m, kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ a gʋɔɔ. Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ zɛkʋra m kan Yeezuu Krista kɩ bɩ tɔ ma m. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, an wɔɔ hɔjirle ka wɔɔ ʋ.
Naa ba a ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ a gʋtabaa ʋ wɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ʋ Krista ta ʋ heer lɛ rɔ wɔɔ.
A do n naa sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. Krista nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ sɩra lemim bɩ ma, lemim nyɩnta k'a n'awɔɔ bʋmbɔm bɩ m. Awɔɔ n sɩra ka Krista ʋ, a m bɩ Woso n Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a ler bɔ bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ ka a ʋ wɔɔ ʋ, k'a hɩnka a ʋ, a hɔ haay, k'a ler bɔ bɩ kam wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro yɩm, dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ n bɩ bɔlɛm yɩŋ ʋ fasɩ b'ʋ. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ Woso gʋtabaa ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma m, kʋ mɔɔ sɩra k'awɔɔ ka Zuuba Yeezuu ʋ bɩ mim ma bɩ, m a ma sɔ, n ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay ŋʋam bɩ,
kʋ mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m awɔɔ tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ n'a barka dam awɔɔ minto dɔmɩm haay.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Woso bɩ han, wɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m gʋta bɩ, k'an mindɔrɛ ka awɔɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a bɩr Woso dɔm, k'a b'a dɔ paan•••.

A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm han sɔ, k'a n'awɔɔ hɔɔn gu a lɛɛgure bɩ m, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a taaheerlɛ k'awɔɔ bir ma bɩ dɔ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a hɔnyɩ k'an a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ dɔ sɔ, hɔjirle hɔnyɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ m.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm sɔ, k'a n a ka k'awɔɔ n a paŋŋa gʋta k'a zi bam wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ dɔ, wɔɔ kʋ sɩrakarɛzannɔ m wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ. K'awɔɔ n a paŋŋa bɩ gʋtabaa k'a cem haay dɔ.
Paŋŋa bɩ do Woso zi ba m an a hɩnka, Yeezuu Krista mɩm k'a a bɔ ʋ bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ, an a ka an nyɩnta a bɩsɩ ra arzana ʋ.
A n a ka Yeezuu nɩ paŋŋazannɔ do haay burə ʋ, lɛɛzannɔ do haay, lɛɛsoʋrezannɔ haay, cirbəə do haay kɩ burə ʋ. A a ka an nɩ hɔ k'an ta ʋ her durnya naa ʋ gɛɛ booti m haay burə ʋ.
A a ka Krista n a so hɔ haay ʋ. A a ka an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ, an a ka an a ba a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma minzaa.
Kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ m Krista mɛ. A mɩŋŋa n'a mɩsɩrbaa barɛ a gʋr zi jilli, Woso mɩŋŋa n'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Krista mɩŋŋa gʋr zi jilli sɔ.
Biisi bɩ, gəəno n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ kan a mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ tɔ ma.
A mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba awɔɔ nawʋm am durnya gʋɔɔ hɔ bɩ m. A n nɩ zum paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ warkʋ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ cir b'ʋ. Cir bɩ do bɩ, zinəro cir k'a nɩ zi bam kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam Woso ma kɩ bɩ m.

Wɔɔ haay, wɔɔ nyɩnta ŋ barla sɔ, ʋ nɩ hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ wɔɔ mɛsim lɛ n taa rɔ wɔɔ bam. Ʋ nɩ zure ʋ mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ ʋ, kan ʋ hɔɔndarɛrɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ. Kʋ wɔɔ n maam bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso nɔmaa n n'a kərgure ŋ la rɔ wɔɔ m wɔɔ m, amba gʋɔɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ, Woso cicirzɛrɛ bɩ gʋta maam-maam, k'a nɩ wɔɔ ŋʋam gʋta bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ y'a ka, gɩnga kʋ wɔɔ ʋ, ʋ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ ʋ Krista zɛkʋra tɔ ma. Denter m, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ bɩ, Woso wɔɔ mɩm bɔ ʋ kan kɩ, an wɔɔ nyɩnta kan kɩ arzana ʋ, ʋ nɩ cirbəə bɩm kan kɩ.
A ba a ʋ wɔɔ m mɩŋŋa ncɩnaaʋ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, k'a barka gʋtabaa hɩnka gʋɔɔ m, wakatɩ haay k'a nɩ zɛm nɔ ʋ.
Bala, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ minto bɛɛ y'a ka awɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ y, Woso ganwʋrɛ m an a ka awɔɔ ʋ vam.
Awɔɔ zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y, ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ y.
Bala, Woso ɩ wɔɔ da, wɔɔ da a ʋ, Krista Yeezuu zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ba zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ gʋta, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ lɛɛ ka an zibəəro wɔɔ duro banka kʋ wɔɔ n bɩ ŋ ba.

Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: awɔɔ, kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, biisi bɩ, awɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ a ma ŋ ʋ, awɔɔ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ y. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma ŋ ʋ, a gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ makra n a mɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma.

Dɔmɩm kʋ ŋ nɩ naa hɩrɛ awɔɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ laatʋ Krista ma, awɔɔ ba gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla y, nyɩnta awɔɔ ʋ saanɔɔ. Gʋaasɩbabaarɔ kʋ Woso ŋ da a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma, an ler bɔ ŋnɩ bɩ, awɔɔ n nyɩnta ŋ nɔ ʋ y. Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ a n'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ bam durnya nɔ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ ba taaheerlɛ nɩ, b'awɔɔ n Woso dɔ sɔ y.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ k'a nyɩnta laatʋ Woso ma bɩ, Krista Yeezuu zɛkʋra bɩ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ a zɔ Woso ma, Krista ma bɩ tɔ ma.

Bala, Krista mɩŋŋa ɩ bʋr laafɩɩ m an ba ka wɔɔ ʋ, a zɩɩfʋrɔ kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kɩ zɛ kʋ ra an ŋ ba do deem. K'a yɛ an ga gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a sɔkʋm k'a nɩ ŋ bire ʋ am pəŋŋə hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ ŋ gʋngʋm kʋ ma bɩ zaar ba.
A zɩɩfʋrɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ, kan ŋ damarɔ kɩ, ŋ sʋfɔrɔ kɩ ci zɛ, k'a ka kʋ do hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔm n a ba do deem taan••• a mɩŋŋa zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ. A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, an ŋ zɛ kʋ ra laafɩɩ nɔ ʋ.
Krista sɔkʋm zaar ba, ga k'a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ. A zɛ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a do hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra, an ŋ ba mɛ deem, an ŋ zɛ kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, Krista n bʋr an laafɩɩ pa da awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ n'a mɩ, an laatʋ Woso ma biisi rɔ wɔɔ. Bʋr a ʋ sɔ k'a laafɩɩ bɩ pa da zɩɩfʋrɔ m, brɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ jɩnjɛɛm Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ.
Krista mɩŋŋa barka tɔ ma m, zɩɩfʋrɔ kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ n'ʋ dam ma, ʋ ʋ zɔ Woso ma Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ kʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, saanɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m dɔ, bɩ lɛɛ laatʋrɛ gʋɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m sɔ y. Awɔɔ ɩ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla, Woso hargʋɔɔ n'a mɩ.
Awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan cɛ kʋ n n'a dɔm kɩ, n n'a dɔm cɛjɩr kʋ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ n a cɩnta bɩ ra, cɛ bɩ jɩr jaa wɩsɩ bɩ m Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa m.
A mɩŋŋa n'a kam cɛ bɩ jaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ kʋ nyasʋm kɔɔkɔɔ, cɛ bɩ nɩ derm tee••• an bɩ zɛm b'a ba Wosocɛ, Zuuba zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
Zɛkʋra k'awɔɔ n ta m kan Yeezuu Krista kɩ b'a ka, cɛ kʋ n n'a dɔm bɩ, awɔɔ n sɔ, k'a b'a ba cɛ kʋ Woso n a nɔ ʋ a Sɛnt-Ɛspri m.
Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ nɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, awɔɔ kʋ do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ du n y'a ʋ Krista tɔ ma awɔɔ daahan minto.
Zibəə kʋ Woso mɔɔ da ʋ a barka tɔ ma, kʋ mɔɔ n a ba m m da awɔɔ han k'a hɔɔnhɔ n kʋ yɩ awɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ, awɔɔ zibəə bɩ do mim ma mɩŋŋa.
Gɩnga kʋ Woso n ta m an a nyaakʋm da bɩ, a a hɩnka mɔɔ m kʋ mɔɔ n a dɔ. A mim mɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m ci bɩ nɔ ʋ poore m cem bɩ.
K'awɔɔ ci kʋ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma naa karɩnda ba, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ a ʋ, mɔɔ Krista mim k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa.
Biisi bɩ, Woso n Krista mim k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ hɩnka gɔsɩ nɩ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso mim bɩ do hɩnka a zibəəzannɔ m, kan a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri m.

Krista mim k'a nyaakʋm da Woso n a hɩnka bɩ ba n nɩ: A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista kɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, brɔɔ hɔjirle kʋ Woso a cɩnta zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ m bɩ yɩm sɔ kan ŋ kɩ. Ŋ y'a ba hɔdeem kan zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ler kʋ Woso a bɔ Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ woo••• hɔ m.
Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ n ganwʋrɛ yɩ, m m ba lemim nyɩnta bɩ zibəənyɩ, Woso y'a paŋŋa zi ba an yɩ mɔɔ ma ncɩnaaʋ.
Mɔɔ m wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ poorero wɔɔ poore, baa kan naa kɩ haay, Woso gan wʋ mɔɔ ma. Kʋ mɔɔ m hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Krista nɔ ʋ, bɩ ŋ tɛkka ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ pa da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Kʋ m a ka, kʋ gʋɔɔ m hɔ kʋ Woso a nyaakʋm da biisi bɩ kʋ yɩrɛ zaa dɔ. Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ hɔ haay da, a ɩ hɔ naa do nyaakʋm da sɔ biisi tee•••.
Woso bɩ, naa do ba a ʋ, kʋ paŋŋazannɔ kan paŋŋasoʋrezannɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ n Woso mindɔrɛ k'a zaa n hɔka bɩ dɔ kɛɛrɛ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ tɔ ma.
Naa ba Woso ʋ, bala, a a cɩnta hɔɔ laatʋ, bɩ ma bɩ durnya ba ʋ y, k'a hɔɔnhɔ naa do ba wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan Krista kɩ ʋ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ lɛ m k'ʋ zɔ Woso ma kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'a b'a heer zar kʋ mɔɔ nɩ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ awɔɔ minto bɩ tɔ ma y. Mɔɔ fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ bɩ, a ka a nawʋm awɔɔ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ.
Naa tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ kukurə zɛm Zɩ Woso taa.
A mɩŋŋa har haay a to zi brama kan tara burə ʋ kɩ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm han, a lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋtabaa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a n'awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, k'a a da ma a bɩr paŋŋa m a heer nɔ ʋ.
K'an a ka sɔ, kʋ Krista n nyɩnta awɔɔ heer ʋ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm sɔ, k'awɔɔ m məsi da a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ kʋ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Maam bɩ, awɔɔ wɔŋ ʋ kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, a Krista ŋʋarɛ gʋtabaa kan a jintəbaa kɩ, a hɛ kɩ, kan a nɔyaa kɩ jɩ dɔ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n a ŋʋarɛ bɩ dɔ, baa kʋ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a dɔ haay bɩ kɩ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n a dɔ, kʋ Woso mɩsɩrbaa jilli n'awɔɔ heer han.
Woso mɩŋŋa a da ma an hɔ woo••• ba, an lɛ da hɔ haay kʋ wɔɔ n'a yɛm, gɛɛ ʋ n'ʋ hɔɔn dam ma bɩ ra, naa ba a nawʋm kan paŋŋa k'a nɩ zi bam wɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ kɩ m.
Bɩ k'a tɔ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ gʋr zi, Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma, wakatɩ haay nɔ ʋ, dɔmɩm haay. Amina!
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a yɛ awɔɔ han kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ba n nɩ: awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ du n y'a ʋ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ Krista zi bam bɩ tɔ ma. K'a mɩsɩrbaa ba amba Woso mɩŋŋa lɛ n taa, an awɔɔ bir ma bɩ m.
K'a bɩr a mɩŋŋɔɔ zerm tee•••, a bɩr bʋgʋ-bʋgʋ, a bɩr bʋraama m, k'a yɛ kʋ ma ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
K'a a yo ʋ, a bɩr deem Sɛnt-Ɛspri zɛkʋra bɩ tɔ ma, laafɩɩ kan kʋ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Krista mɛ bɩ deem, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ deem, taaheerlɛ hɔ kʋ Woso wɔɔ bir ma, k'ʋ b'a yɩ bɩ deem sɔ.
Wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ deem, sɩrakarɛ bɩ deem, batɛm deem wɔɔ n'a sim,
Woso deem, a m gʋaa haay Zɩ, a y'a so hɔ haay ʋ, an nɩ zi bam kan gʋaa haay kɩ, an nɩ gʋaa haay heer ʋ.
Bɩ Woso barka ka wɔɔ gʋaa biyəə ʋ, Krista n a jir a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
Naa do Wosoci b'a hɩ ma, a ʋ: K'a der mim ʋ bɩ, a lɔnnɔ gaa an ta ŋ nɩ, an gan wʋ gʋɔɔ ma.
N ʋ: 'A der.' Naa jɩ n bɔ nɩ? Naa ʋ k'a hɩ, a ʋ, lɛɛ a ka an zer tara noom ʋ paan•••.
Gʋaa k'a zer bɩ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ der brama laatʋ, k'a nyɩnta hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ.
A ɩ gan wʋ gʋɔɔ ma. A a ka gɔsɩnnɔ n a ba a zibəəzannɔ, an a ka gɔsɩnnɔ m wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ. A n a ka nɔɔ m lemim nyɩnta padənno, an nɔɔrɔ ba a gʋɔɔ dundonno, hɔdɩndagʋɔɔnzannɔ m sɔ.
A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a da ma ŋnɩ Woso zuure zibəə bɩ ba, kʋ Krista mɛ bɩ m ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Maam bɩ, wɔɔ tam lɛɛ haay. Ʋ sɩrakarɛ, kan Woso Nyɩ bɩ dɔrɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta m bɩ kɩ n yɩ deem. Ʋ ma Woso zaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, ʋ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Krista mɩŋŋa kɩ fasɩ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam nyɩnɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ to gʋɔɔ n bɩr ʋ yəŋŋəm jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ a hɔdɩndarɛ haay nɩ y, ŋʋaarzannɔ m, bɩ ŋ bɩ wɔŋ ʋ dɔ ŋnɩ ŋʋaar ba wɔɔ m, wɔɔ n fɔ y.
Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ sɩra hɩm ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ mam hɔ haay nɔ ʋ Woso zuure bɩ nɔ ʋ, ʋ tolle ba ʋ ʋ ba amba Krista m, a m minzaa.

A mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m, mɛ bɩ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ jilli n kʋ nyasʋ ŋnɩ deem. Gʋaa mɛ kunəro n'a kam mɛ bɩ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ nɩ kʋ nyasʋm, mɛ bɩ n deem. Maam bɩ, kʋ mɛ bɩ vəŋŋə biyəə y'a zi bam, bɩ n'a kam mɛ bɩ n bɩr tam lɛɛ tee••• an bɩr mam ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, m n'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: A b'a ya a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba am gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Woso dɔ rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y, zu ŋ nawʋrɛ a hɔɔndarɛrɔ ʋ, ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩm naa barɛ nɔ ʋ y.
Monsigə y'a so ŋ hɔɔn ʋ, ŋ laatʋ mɩsɩrbaa kʋ Woso n'a kam bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ y, kʋ ŋ y'a heer ta bɩ tɔ ma.
Nyannɩ bɩr ŋ zɛm fɩɩga y, a da ŋ y'a ʋ jaandarɛ lɛ ʋ, ŋnɩ dintim mɩsɩrbaa do haay bam, b'a nyannɩ ba ŋ nɩ y.
B'awɔɔ, mɩsɩrbaa naa do bɛɛ Krista a dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y.
A mɩŋŋa mim n y'a dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ, kʋ kristagʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, n nɩ sɩra k'a nɩ Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m.
Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m, a a biisi mɩsɩrbaa bɩ to, a a bɔ a mɛsim k'a lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɩ bra bɩmbarɛ awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ zaar ba b'ʋ.
K'a lʋrlɛ yɩ a heer kan a hɔɔn kɩ ʋ.
K'a mɩsɩrbaa daa kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ ba. Woso ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do da an bɔ a mɩŋŋa rɛ, bɩ y'a ka mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do n tɩrga, an Woso nɔ yɩ, an sɩra sɔ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a b'a ya, a ŋʋaar ba y. Gʋaa biyəə n sɩra hɩ a mim m, bala mɛ deem vəŋŋoo n wɔɔ m.
K'awɔɔ nɔ ma ʋ, a b'a ka a mimbʋnyaa ba y. A b'a nɔmaa bɩ to a nɔ ʋ gum n da nɩ y.
A bɩ zaa ka Sʋtaana ʋ, an bʋr a ra y.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ koor bam biisi bɩ, an a wɔ bɔ koorbaa b'ʋ k'an zi ba an a lɛɛmaa hɔ yɩ, maam bɩ, a y'a dam ma an hɔ yɩ, an n'a dam gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa daahan ma han.
Meerbaa bʋnyaa sɩ n a ga m an bɔ awɔɔ lɛ ʋ y, k'a meerbaa k'a n'a dam gʋɔɔ han, ŋnɩ ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ ba. K'a meerbaa mɩŋŋa ba, k'an a da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ han.
A b'a ka a Sɛnt-Ɛspri heer zɛ ma y, Woso bɩ, a ka a ʋ awɔɔ ʋ, k'a a jɩ da wɔɔ ʋ, bɩ n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Woso y'a so awɔɔ ʋ, an n'a hɩnkam sɔ a ʋ, dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm Woso n bɩ wɔɔ yɔm fasɩ-fasɩ.
A b'a to mim n bɩr a heer ʋ kan gʋaa kɩ y, a bɩ yɩ heerbusuzannɔ y, a bɩ nɔmaa ba y. A bɩ yɩ hany-hany zannɔ y, a bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ y, k'a zi bʋnyaabarɛ do haay to.
Bɩ, k'a bɩr mɩŋŋa kan kʋ kɩ, a bɩr kʋ ŋʋam gʋta, a bɩr sugur kam kʋ ʋ, amba Woso sugur ka awɔɔ ʋ Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
K'a Woso hɔbaa dɩnda, bala, a nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, an n'awɔɔ ŋʋam.
K'a mɩsɩrbaa ba ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ amba Krista m. A ɩ wɔɔ ŋʋa, an a meeyaa ka wɔɔ tɔ ma, a mɩŋŋa a ka amba n tɩr hɔ zɛ n a ka Woso ʋ, an Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ m.
Wosogʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, an a ga m kʋ jaandarɛ mim, dintim do haay mim, lɛ n bɩr gʋaa hɔ zi mim n nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʋ y, a bɩ sʋʋra ba ŋ ma sɔ fɩɩga y.
A n a ga m sɔ, kʋ meerbaarɔ yaarsɩrɔ n bɔ a lɛ ʋ y, hɔɔnwar kan dɔkarɛrɔ meerbaarɔ kɩ y. A ga a ʋ m k'awɔɔ n bɩr barka yaa dam Woso m.

K'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, jaandənno, lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔbənno, mɩnyɔɔzaa. Mɩnyɔɔzaa bɩ, wosobaawɔm yaadər m, bala, a hɔnyɩ ŋʋa an lɛ da Woso ra. Nawɔnnɔ haay, ŋ gɔsɩ bɩ gasʋm Krista kan Woso kɩ cirbəə b'ʋ fɩɩga y.
A n a ga m kʋ gʋaa n bra bɩmba awɔɔ m meerbaa vanvannɔ nɩ y. Naa woo••• tɔ ma m, Woso nɔmaa n'a kərgum gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɛm ma rɔ wɔɔ ra.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a b'a zɛ kʋ ra kan ŋ kɩ y.
Biisi bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ monsigə ʋ, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ ɩ leegure nɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra kan Zuuba kɩ bɩ tɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʋ naa, kʋ leegure gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a leegure mɩsɩrbaa ba.
Bala, hɔ kʋ leegure nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ, bamɩŋŋa m, kan tɩrgabaa zibəə kɩ, kan sɩra kɩ.
K'a a yo ʋ, a hɔ kʋ Zuuba lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ, a bɔ kʋ zi.
A bɩ monsigə zibəəro wɔɔ ba sɔ y, ŋ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y, k'a ŋ bʋnyaabaa bɩ hɩ garga ra.
Hɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro n'a bam sɛɛrɛ bɩ, a hɩrɛ mɩŋŋa nyannɩ ta ʋ.
Bɩ, hɔ haay k'ʋ n nɩ bɔrɛ a mim n garga ra bɩ, hɔ bɩ do ɩ yɩm fasɩ, ʋ n'a mim dɔm.
Bala, hɔ haay k'a nɩ bɔm garga ra bɩ, a ba a nawʋm leegure. Bɩ y'a ka n a hɩ, n ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ hinceem bam bɩ, gu hinceem ma, wuti gəəno gaa ʋ, kʋ Krista n lɛɛ gu ɩ m.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a dundo mɩsɩrbaa k'awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ zi mɩŋŋa. A b'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba hɔɔnwar nɔ ʋ y, bɩ k'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba hɔɔntaʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
Bʋnyaabaa y'a so her dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔ ʋ gʋta, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a a yo ʋ, a bɩr hɔ k'a ga barɛ m bɩ bam wakatɩ haay nɔ ʋ.
A bɩ yɩ hɔɔnwarzannɔ a mɩsɩrbaa barɛ nɔ ʋ y, bɩ k'a a ka ma a hɔ kʋ Zuuba lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ n a ba bɩ dɔ.
A bɩ dɩvɛn mi an a mɩm durgə y. Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa an n'a zaar bam. Bɩ, k'a to kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a a han.
K'a kʋ paŋŋa da ra Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ laarɔ m: K'a laa lɔ laarɔ ciro wɔɔ ʋ, kan mim ma laarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan laa haay kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a da a heer ʋ kɩ. K'a laarɔ wɔɔ lɔ a Zuuba da ʋ kan a heer kɩ haay.
Wakatɩ haay kan mim haay kɩ nɔ ʋ, k'a Zɩ Woso barka da, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
K'a yɛ kʋ ma, k'awɔɔ nɩ Krista daŋ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
Lannɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ a zino wɔɔ ma, amba awɔɔ nɩ yɛm Zuuba ma bɩ m.
Bala, lʋ minzaa n'a zim m, amba Krista n'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma bɩ minzaa bɩ m, Krista mɩŋŋa mɛ n'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma bɩ m, an a mɛ bɩ bʋmbɔrɛzaa.
Bɩ, amba kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma bɩ nɩ yɛm Krista mɩŋŋa ma bɩ, lannɔ wɔɔ k'a yɛ a zino wɔɔ ma sɔ hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
Yaarɔ wɔɔ, k'a lannɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa, amba Krista a gʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ ŋʋa an yɛ an a mɩŋŋa ka zɛ ma a tɔ ma bɩ m.
A a ba ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, k'a ka k'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ Woso mɩm ʋ. A gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma hu a bɔ hi m kan a lemim kɩ m.
A ŋʋa a ʋ, k'a gʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ n bɩ jɩm a lɛɛ lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ, hubɔrɛ nɔ ʋ, mɩŋŋabaa fasɩ nɔ ʋ, kʋ kʋrɔma sɩ, gɛɛ hɔ bʋnyaa sɩ bɩ yɩ ʋ a gʋr zi y, k'an bɩr Woso soʋhɔ fasɩ, minsi bɩ yɩ ʋ a gʋr zi y.
Yaarɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, n n'a lannɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa ncɩnaaʋ, amba ŋn'a mɛ ŋʋam bɩ m. Gʋaa k'a n'a lʋ ŋʋam bɩ, a mɩŋŋa a n'a ŋʋam.
Gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ sɔrɛ a mɩŋŋa mɛ nɩ y, nyasʋ a nawʋm nɩ, an n'a tʋrm, amba Krista n n'a barɛ a gʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ m bɩ m.
K'a mɛ bɩ vəŋŋəro n wɔɔ m bɩ tɔ ma m, an nɩ nyasʋm wɔɔ m maam.
N y'a da Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: 'Naa tɔ ma m, gʋaa n n'a gʋrɛ a zɩ kan a da kɩ ma, an a na a lʋ ma, ŋ gʋaa hɩɩya haay n a ba gʋaa deem.'
Mim naa do nɔyaa ta ʋ gʋta, mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ m ʋ, Krista kan a gʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ kɩ mim n y'a hɩ.
Bɩ, a hɩ n nawʋrɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ, gʋaayar biyəə n a lʋ ŋʋa amba a a mɩŋŋa ŋʋa bɩ m, kʋ lʋ biyəə n a zim da ʋ sɔ.
Nyɩnɔ wɔɔ k'a a zɩrɔ wɔɔ lɛ si, amba Zuuba lɛ n taa bɩ m, a ga a ʋ m.
Lɛɛkarɛ lɛ kʋ Woso ler bɔ an a na ma bɩ ba n nɩ: 'Ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʋ.
Maam bɩ, ɩ mɩsɩrbaa nyɩnta yɩm, ɩ meeyaa jintə yɩm tara burə ʋ.'
Awɔɔ k'a m nyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ, a bɩ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ da nɔmaa ma y, bɩ k'a ŋ tʋr, a ŋ bɔ zaa ʋ, dʋndɔrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to Zuuba zi m.
Awɔɔ kʋ lɔnnɔ n a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a zu a soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʋ daʋrɛ gʋta m, kan a heer kɩ m haay, amba awɔɔ nɩ yɛm Krista ma bɩ m.
A bɩ ŋ zi ba kʋ ŋ nɩ dundore awɔɔ zi bɩ tɔ ma y, ɩ ʋ a ka awɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔ n yɩ a ra y. Bɩ k'a ŋ zi bɩ ba, kʋ Zuuba zibəənyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m a n nɩ zum Woso hɔɔnhɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
K'a a zuubɔɔ wɔɔ zi ba kan a heer kɩ haay, ɩ ʋ, Zuuba zi awɔɔ n'a bam gʋɔɔ hɔ bɛɛ y.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, zi mɩŋŋa kʋ gʋaa n'a bam haay, Zuuba y'a zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʋ karɛ a zaa ʋ, baa k'a zaa bɩ lɔ m gɛɛ soamɩŋŋaʋzaa m.
Awɔɔ kʋ lɔnnɔ soʋrezannɔ n'awɔɔ n nɔ wɔɔ, k'a ba maam sɔ a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ m, a bɩ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ y. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ kan a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ Zuuba bɩ deem an nɩ brama, b'a bɩr gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.
Meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a nyambʋrm nɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: k'a a paŋŋa da ra Zuuba zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ, a paŋŋa gʋta bɩ nɔ ʋ.
K'a yarmɔdrɔ kʋ Woso nɩ ŋ karɛ a ʋ bɩ da a ma, k'a a da ma a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Sʋtaana hɔɔnkarɛrɔ zibəə bɩ lɛ ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ bɛɛ wɔɔ nɩ yar bɩ bam kan ŋ kɩ y. A ba wɔɔ nawʋm kan zinəro kɩ, kan lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ paŋŋa bam, ŋ n'a so lɛɛrɔ ʋ, ŋ n'a so durnya naa do kʋ monsigə n b'ʋ, ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a Woso yar mɔdrɔ wɔɔ da a ma. K'a wɔ ʋ, a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ dɔmɩm bʋnyaa hinni ʋ, a a da jɩm bɩ lɛ ʋ, a yar ba paan••• a a da ma, k'a gɔɔta a jɩm a gam la.
K'a a banka a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ. K'a sɩra so a mɔr ʋ, am hɔsoaʋ hɔ bɩ m, k'a bɩr tɩrgabaa m, goŋŋo kʋ n n'a dure a ma n bɩ, k'a du a ma.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɩ laafɩɩ kam, k'a pa da kaarɛ-kaarɛ, kʋsɔ n bɩ awɔɔ n'a daŋ ʋ.
K'a bɩr sɩrakarɛ m, goŋŋo kʋ n n'a tarɛ a m n bɩ sɔ, awɔɔ nɩ bʋnyaabarɛzaa bɩ karɔ kʋ sɛwurə n ta ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ linlihim nɩ.
Bʋmbɔrɛ kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, yarbarɛ firgə m, k'a ku a mim ma. K'a Woso lemim bɩ sa sɔ, yarbarɛ kargʋ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ.
K'a yaa da wakatɩ haay. K'a yaadarɛ do haay da Sɛnt-Ɛspri daahan nɔ ʋ. A bɩ kɔ kan yaa bɩ darɛ kɩ y, k'a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••. K'a yaa da wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma sɔ.
K'a yaa da mɔɔ tɔ ma sɔ, kʋ Woso n a lemim da m lɛ ʋ, kʋ m a pa da kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, kʋ m hɔ k'a nyaakʋm da lemim nyɩnta nɔ ʋ bɩ hɩ fasɩ-fasɩ.
Mɔɔ bɔ Woso ʋ kʋ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da, baa kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa. Naa minto bɩ, k'a yaa da Woso m mɔɔ tɔ ma, kʋ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da amba a a ga m bɩ m.
Tisikkɩ mɔɔ mim dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ dɔ. Wɔɔ danyɩ m, ʋ n'a ŋʋam, an nɩ Zuuba zi bam mɩŋŋa.
A nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ ma tɔkkɛ, k'an bɩ mɔɔ mim dɩnda awɔɔ m, an awɔɔ heer yo.
Bɩ kʋ Zɩ Woso, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ m laafɩɩ kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ ka ʋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista ŋʋam, ŋʋarɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ, kʋ Woso n ŋ barka da ʋ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol kan Timote kɩ bɩ, Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m, ci bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʋm wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ Filipii kʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, kan a lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ kan a daahanzannɔ kɩ ma.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka a ʋ.
Kʋ mɔɔ tɩr m hɔɔn da awɔɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ yaa da Woso m barka awɔɔ tɔ ma.
Kʋ mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma, a da mɔɔ n nawʋm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Bala, awɔɔ jɩm mɔɔ m paan••• lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ nɔ ʋ hallɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ an ta an her ku.
Mɔɔ dɔ fasɩ m ʋ: zi mɩŋŋa kʋ Woso a sɩŋŋɩda ba awɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ, a tam lɛɛ an tolle ba an zibəə bɩ do nyambʋr Krista Yeezuu wusigəre hinni ʋ.

A a ga m kʋ mɔɔ nɩ m hɔɔn da awɔɔ haay ma ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n'awɔɔ ŋʋam gʋta bɩ minto. Bala, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa ʋ naa, gɛɛ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa dam m n'a hɩnkam sɔ m ʋ, sɩra m bɩ, awɔɔ a na mɔɔ ma barka kʋ Woso a ka mɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Denter m, Woso m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, a a dɔ a ʋ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ gʋaa haay ŋʋam paan••• Krista Yeezuu ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a yɛm Woso han awɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ ŋʋarɛ n bɩr a dam la tee•••, k'awɔɔ m bɩr hɔdɔrɛ m, k'a a da ma a bɩr mim jɩ marɛ m.
K'a a da ma sɔ, a hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa dɔ a bɔ kʋ zi a ba. Maam bɩ, awɔɔ yɩm mɩŋŋa fasɩ, minsi bɩ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma hinni kʋ Krista n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ b'ʋ y.
Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, tɩrgabaa zibəəro y'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa hanm, an yɩ Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ kan a daʋrɛ kɩ.
M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, mim niŋŋə k'a mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, a da a ʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ ta lɛɛ han denter m.
Bala, mim bɩ do tɔ ma bɩ, Rɔm cir dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ haay kɩ sɔ a dɔ ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ du n y'a ʋ Krista tɔ ma.
Bɩ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa a da ra Zuuba zuure nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ dure bɩ tɔ ma, a a ka ŋ heer n kookoo gʋta, ŋn'ɩ Woso lemim bɩ pa dam bɩ nyibəə ba ŋ nɩ y.
Sɩra m, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam jɩmbaa kan bakʋmarɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ y'a pa dam noom hu m.
A pa bɩ da brɔɔ n nawʋm ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, ŋ y'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa, lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ tɔ ma m.
Bɩ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, pa bɩ da brɔɔ n nawʋm noom kundə m, jɩmbaa nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʋ, a mɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ bɩ gore daŋ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ b'ʋ.
Baa kʋ ŋ yɩ pa bɩ dam noom m gɛɛ sɩra nɩ, mɔɔ bɩr kɔm sɩ ma y, bala, Krista lemim bɩ n'a pa dam. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔrɛ, bɩ mɔɔ gɔɔtam m m heer nyɔɔ.
Bala, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, naa woo••• zɛm bɩ yɩ mɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ, awɔɔ yaadarɛ kan Yeezuu Krista Ɛspri daahan kɩ tɔ ma.

Bala, hɔ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ dɔm ma, m a ta m heer lɛ kan m paŋŋa kɩ haay bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ hɔsɩ nyannɩ n bɩ m nyasʋ y, mɔɔ gɔɔta m heerkoodəbaa m. Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ sɔ naa, amba dɔmɩm haay m bɩ, kʋ Krista n lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta yɩ m mɛ ʋ, m mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, gɛɛ m zɛ nɔ ʋ.
Bala, kan mɔɔ kɩ, Krista m mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa, zɛ b'ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔnyɩ m.
Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta tara burə ʋ kʋ m mɩsɩrbaa ba, a y'a kam m zi ba gʋɔɔ daahan tɔ ma. Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ n a dɔ kʋ kara mɔɔ n'a bɔŋ ʋ y.
Hɔ hɩɩya naa nɩ mɔɔ gaarɛ: Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m m hʋr, m ta m bɩr kan Krista kɩ. Bɩ n mɩŋŋa mɔɔ ma an lɛ da paan•••.
Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta tara burə ʋ naa ʋ sɔ, a yɩrɛ awɔɔ daahan gʋta.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ paan•••, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ gɔɔtam mɩsɩr, m bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ k'awɔɔ n ta lɛɛ, a bɩr heernyɔɔ m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ m bɔ m bʋr awɔɔ zi, awɔɔ y'a heer nyɔɔm a a lɛ bɔ Krista Yeezuu ʋ gʋta, mɔɔ tɔ ma.

Bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba amba Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ m. Maam bɩ kʋ mɔɔ wɔ ʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi, gɛɛ kʋ mɔɔ n m da ma, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim mam, m a dɔ m ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ a lɛ n deem, an nɩ zoo bam heer deem m, kʋ sɩrakarɛ kʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ n'a kam bɩ n ta lɛɛ.
A bɩ yɛ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ n nyibəə da a ma fɩɩga y. Bɩ n'a karɛ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a nyaam, b'awɔɔ ɩ bʋmbɔrɛ m. Bɩ naa do naa, a to a ʋ, Woso zi.
Bala, mimbirenyɩnta kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka ʋ bɛɛ n a deem y, bɩ k'awɔɔ n fɩr yɩ a tɔ ma sɔ.
Awɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, zoo deem wɔɔ m tara ʋ n'a bam. Zoo deem bɩ do mɔɔ ba biisi awɔɔ mɩm la bɩ, bɩ, awɔɔ dɔ, a mɩŋŋa mɔɔ gɔɔta m m ta ra.
Zɛkʋra k'awɔɔ n ta m kan Krista kɩ bɩ, a bɩr awɔɔ heerkoodəbaa dam la ra? Awɔɔ ŋʋa k'a nawʋm bɩ bɩr awɔɔ heer yom na? Awɔɔ n a zɛ kʋ ra Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʋ ra? Awɔɔ ɩ kʋ ŋʋam an nɩ kʋ cicir zɛm, gɛɛ lɔ?
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a kʋ ma, a a lɛ ba deem, a bɩr ŋʋarɛ deem m, a bɩr hɔɔn deem m. Maam bɩ, mɔɔ heernyɔɔ yɩm fasɩ.
A bɩ hɔsɩ ba jɩmbaa nɩ y, b'a bɩ hɔsɩ ba k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ hɩnka y, naa nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y. Bɩ, gʋaa biyəə n a mɩŋŋa zer a muno taa, a ʋ, ŋ lɛ da a m.
A b'a ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan ma bala y, k'a a ka a muno daahan ma sɔ.
K'a bɩr hɔɔn kʋ Krista Yeezuu n ta m bɩ m kan kʋ kɩ.
A mɩŋŋa kan Woso kɩ bɩ, ŋ deem, bɩ, a n a ka ma wʋɩɩn••• kan paŋŋa kɩ, k'a gɔɔta a a ga kʋ ʋ kan Woso kɩ y.
Bɩ, a yɛ an hɔ haay to, an a ba zibəənyɩ, a ba a ʋ gʋaa, am gʋaa woo••• hɔ bɩ m. A n yɩ amba gʋɔɔ n nɩ yɩm bɩ m.
A a mɩŋŋa ba poore, an yɛ Woso ma, an tolle ba an yɛ an ga, b'a zɛ bɩ, zɛ bʋnyaa m, ga a ʋ, gɔdarkʋra ma.
Naa k'a a ba bɩ minto bɩ, Woso a gore da ʋ, an cem haay, an tɔ k'a nɩ tɔrɔ haay woo••• burə ʋ bɩ ka ma.
A ba a ʋ maam kʋ Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ, kʋ kunkonno haay kʋ ŋ nɩ brama kan tara burə ʋ kɩ, tara noom kɩ ʋ, n kukurə zɛ.
Kʋ nɛɛm haay n a bɔ a lɛ ma a ʋ, Yeezuu Krista m Zuuba, bɩ nɩ yɩm Zɩ Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ.

M ŋʋarɛ gʋɔɔ, nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm Woso ma tee•••. Bɩ, dɩɩtaa naa, mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ b'ʋ y. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, k'a banka a yɛ ma gʋta. K'a bʋmbɔrɛ kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ zi ba, nyi ba Woso m, kan mɛhinkə kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa nɩ zi barɛ awɔɔ ʋ, an n'a kam awɔɔ nɩ lɛtaama m kan paŋŋa kɩ m, k'a hɔ k'a ga kʋ ʋ kan a hɔɔnhɔ kɩ bɩ ba.
Kʋ zibəə kara n ta ʋ, k'a ba, a bɩ kukur ba, b'a bɩ bɩsɩ ka a barɛ nɔ ʋ y.

Maam bɩ, awɔɔ yɩm noonhuzannɔ, gɔsɩ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩrɛ an a hɩ awɔɔ ma y. Awɔɔ yɩm Woso nyɩnɔ kʋ mim daŋŋada sɩ ba ŋ ma y, a n nɩ durnya naa do gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ vɔn, ŋnɩ zibʋnyaabənno nɔɔm bire ʋ. Awɔɔ a ga m, a yɔ ŋ bire ʋ am fɩtɩrɛrɔ m.

Bala, awɔɔ n ta mɩsɩrbaa lemim bɩ m, an n'a pa darɛ ŋ nɩ. K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ, bɩ n n'a kam awɔɔ n yɩ mɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ, hinni kʋ Krista n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ b'ʋ. Bala, bɩ n n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, mɔɔ zibəə bɩ, kan mɔɔ kɔrɛ bɩ kɩ n yɩ vam y.

Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, mannɩ awɔɔ n'a kam Woso ʋ. A a da ma, n nɩ mɔɔ zɛ gər, bɩ k'a yɩ maam m meeyaa bɩ mɔɔ na awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ mannɩ bɩ ma. Bɩ, a yɩm mɔɔ ma heernyɔɔ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔm kan awɔɔ kɩ.
A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a heer nyɔɔ, a heernyɔɔ ba kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Kan Zuuba Yeezuu daahan kɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam kʋ m Timote nyɔɔ awɔɔ zi zɔɔ. Maam bɩ, k'a b'a bɔ an bʋr, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim mam sɔ m heer koodə yɩ.
Gɔsɩ vanta ba naa ʋ, an n'a hɔɔn dam, an nɩ kɔrɛ awɔɔ mim ma kan mɔɔ kɩ y.
Ŋ woo••• naa, a ka ŋ nawʋrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan ma, ŋ bɩr a kam Yeezuu Krista hɔɔnhɔ ma y.
Bɩ, kʋ Timote nɩ, awɔɔ sɩra bɩ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, a nyɩnta kan mɔɔ kɩ amba nyɩ tɩr kan a zɩ kɩ bɩ m, ʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ zi ba.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ m mim bɩ zaa yɩ, a mɩŋŋa mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ ma zɔɔ-zɔɔ.
Mɔɔ sɩra ka Zuuba nɔ ʋ, m a dɔ m ʋ, mɔɔ zɛm sɔ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ zɔɔ.
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a gɩngam kɛɛrɛ mɔɔ ʋ, pakra m kʋ m Epafrodit da zaa ra awɔɔ m, mɔɔ danyɩ m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m, mɔɔ zoobarɛkɔɔn m sɔ. Awɔɔ y'a nyɔɔ mɔɔ ma, k'an b'a da mɔɔ han.
A y'a ŋʋam paan••• k'a a ya, a awɔɔ yɩ haay, a ma k'a ʋ, n ʋ, awɔɔ a yaaba bɩ ma bɩ, a heer a zar gʋta.
Denter m, a yaaba zɛ an a yo k'a ga, Woso a cicir zɛ, b'a deem bɛɛ Woso a cicir zɛ y, mɔɔ cicir a a zɛ sɔ, kʋ mɔɔ heerzarlɛ b'a da ra y.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a darɛ awɔɔ m zaa ra zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'awɔɔ n a yɩ, a heernyɔɔ ba, kʋ mɔɔ heerzar bɩ n'a bɔrɛ sɔ.
K'a bɩ lee ku, k'a si kan heernyɔɔ gʋta kɩ Zuuba nɔ ʋ. K'a gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ da ʋ.
Bala, a a yo k'a ga Krista zibəə bɩ tɔ ma, a a meeyaa ka zɛ ma, k'a a da ma, a zi k'awɔɔ a ga m a ba mɔɔ m bɩ ba awɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, m danyɩnɔ, k'a a heer nyɔɔ, k'awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra kan Zuuba kɩ bɩ tɔ ma. Meerbaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ mɔɔ m ya m nɩ sore ŋ la, bɩ naa bɩr mɔɔ kɔrɛ y, bala, a y'a darɛ awɔɔ han.
K'a dundo a zi kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, jino m, ŋʋaar baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ bɩ hɔdɩndarɛzannɔ m, k'a dundo a zi kan ŋ kɩ.
Wɔɔ nɩ baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ paan••• bɩ zi bam. Bala, zu wɔɔ nawʋm Woso ʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m. Krista Yeezuu n wɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ, wɔɔ bɩr yom zɩɩfʋrɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ ma k'ʋ lɛ bɔ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ y.
A n bɔkarɛ, mɔɔ m da ma m yo yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ duro ma sɔ. Kʋ gʋaa y'a gɩngarɛ a ʋ, a hɔ yɩm yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ zibəə nɔ ʋ, k'a maam mɔɔ ɩ lɛ da.

Mɔɔ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm sinnyə hinni ʋ, m mɔɔ gasʋ ʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ. Israyɛl gʋaa paan••• m mɔɔ m, Bɛnzamɛn do gʋaa m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ haay zɩɩfʋrɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ. Kʋ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure nɩ, nyɩnta mɔɔ ʋ farizɛn m nɩ zure ŋ ʋ paan•••.
Wɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ŋʋa gʋta bɩ, a a ka mɔɔ m fɩr ka kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ ma. Kʋ tɩrgabaa kʋ n n'a kam ma lɛrɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ nɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta mɩŋŋa fasɩ, gɔsɩ n mim yɩ k'a hɩ mɔɔ ma y.
A n bɔkarɛ, hɔɔ nɔɔn duro kʋ ŋ nyɔɔdʋ n ta mɔɔ ma biisi bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma dore hɔɔ kɛɛrɛ, Krista kʋ mɔɔ dɔ bɩ tɔ ma.

Sɩra m, mɔɔ ɩ dɩgam hɔ haay woo••• ma dore hɔ, mɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu dɔrɛ mɩŋŋabaa k'a lɛ da hɔ haay ra bɩ tɔ ma. A tɔ ma m mɔɔ m hɔ haay to, m nɩ dɩgam hɔɔ wɔɔ duro ma bʋtʋrɔ, kʋ Krista n yɩ mɔɔ hɔ haay.
K'an a so mɔɔ ʋ jilli sɔ. Mɔɔ bɩr a gɩngam dɔ, mɔɔ ʋ, m tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma y. Sɩra kʋ mɔɔ ka Krista ʋ b'ɩ mɔɔ ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ. Tɩrgabaa kʋ Woso n'a kam sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ m.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma bɩ, m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ m Krista mɩŋŋa dɔ, kʋ m a mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ paŋŋa dɔ. Kʋ m m na ma a fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ, kʋ m bɔ kʋ ʋ kan kɩ a zɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
K'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ bɩ m da ma sɔ, m bɩ m mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ.
Mɔɔ n a hɩ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma bɩ yɩ m wɔ ʋ wa. Gɛɛ, mɔɔ m ba mɩŋŋa fasɩ wa. Bɩ, m tɔ mɔɔ nawʋŋ ʋ, kʋ m brasire ganwʋrɛ bɩ ku m wɔ ʋ, bala, Krista-Yeezuu mɔɔ ku a wɔ ʋ.
Ayy••• m danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ bɩr a gɩngarɛ m ʋ, mɔɔ brasire ganwʋrɛ bɩ ku m wɔ ʋ y. Bɩ hɔ deem mɔɔ n'a bam, hɔ k'a ba an cem bɩ bɔ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ m nɔ ʋ, m nɩ m tɔŋ ʋ kʋ m hɔ k'a nɩ lɛɛ bɩ ku.
M tɔ mɔɔ nawʋŋ ʋ, kʋ m hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a cɩnta wɔɔ m lɛɛ bɩ ku. Brasire ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso wɔɔ bir ma Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, k'a b'a ka wɔɔ ʋ arzana ʋ bɩ m.
Wɔɔ gʋɔɔ k'ʋ yaa ka sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ʋ bɩr hɔɔndarɛ deem naa m. Bɩ, k'awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a hɔ, mim naa do nɔ ʋ, Woso y'awɔɔ hɔɔn gum ma.
Bɩ, hɔ k'an ta ʋ bɩ, ʋ gɔɔta ʋ bɩr tam lɛɛ kan kʋ kɩ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ haay k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa, k'a dɩga gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa bam am wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ hɔbaa ŋ y'a sa.
Gʋɔɔ gʋta, ŋn'a mɩsɩrbaa bam ɩ ʋ, Krista gɔdarkʋra bɩ jɩnnɔ m. Mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m hɔɔ gallɛm hɔka, m m ya m nɩ som la kɛɛrɛ kan nyikəre kɩ.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, nyaanlɛ m, ŋ nɔ nɩ ŋ woso, hɔ k'a nyannɩ n ta ʋ bɩ n ŋ lɛbɔʋrɛ, durnya naa do hɔ ŋn'a hɔɔn dam ma bala.
Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ kʋ bɩ m arzana m. Wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kʋ wɔɔ nɩ dɔm ma bɩ, a to a nawʋm arzana ʋ b'ʋ an bʋr.
K'a bɩ bʋr, a wɔɔ mɛrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ rɔ nɔɔm lʋrlɛ, an ŋ ba, an a mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʋrɛ mɛ bɩ m. Naa ba a nawʋm paŋŋa k'an ta m k'a a so hɔ haay ʋ bɩ m.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Zuuba nɔ ʋ. Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ m m ya m awɔɔ yɩ, mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm awɔɔ tɔ ma, awɔɔ m mɔɔ zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʋ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kan m heer kɩ haay Evodi kan Sɩntɩsɩ kɩ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋ ma mɩŋŋa, Zuuba nɔ ʋ.

Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn paan••• bɩ, ɩ da ŋ han, bala, ŋ y'a na mɔɔ ma ʋ zoo ba lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ nɔ ʋ. Lannɔ nɔɔn duro, kan Kleman kɩ, kan mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ y'a na mɔɔ ma ʋ zoo bɩ ba. Ŋ haay tɔrɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʋ.
K'a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm Zuuba nɔ ʋ, dɔmɩm haay. Kʋ m m ya m so ra, k'a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm.
K'a bɩr bʋgʋ-bʋgʋ kan gʋaa woo••• kɩ. Zuuba wusigəre dɔmɩm a zɔ.
A b'a heer kɔ hɔsɩ mim ma y, bɩ mim haay nɔ ʋ, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa ma bɩ yɛ Woso han, a a wɔ zɩnzɛ m, bɩ, k'a yaa dam barka sɔ.
Maam bɩ, Woso y'a laafɩɩ k'a cem hɔ haay kʋ gʋaa n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ han bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ. Bɩ laafɩɩ bɩ do dɔrɛ awɔɔ heerlɔ kan awɔɔ hɔɔndarɛrɔ kɩ ma Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ.

M danyɩnɔ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ: K'a a tɔ ʋ a bɩr hɔ k'an sɩra, an ta daʋrɛ m, an tɩrga m. A a tɔ ʋ a bɩr hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa, an a ga ŋʋarɛ m, a goredaʋrɛ n ta ʋ, hɔ kʋ zorebaa m fasɩ, an a ga lɛbɔʋrɛ m bɩ m.
Hɔ haay k'awɔɔ dɩnda mɔɔ zi, a si, a ma, gɛɛ a yɩ mɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ, k'a sa a zi ba m. K'awɔɔ ba maam, Woso k'a nɩ heer laafɩɩ kam wɔɔ ʋ bɩ bam bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ m heernyɔɔ gʋta Zuuba nɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ a ya, a a da mɔɔ han bɩ tɔ ma. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam mɔɔ ma hɔɔ, bɩ, daahan bɩ dɔmɩm b'ɩ n'a a zaa ka y.
Hɔ bɛɛ ɩ jɩra mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʋ y. Bala mɔɔ minkə m, m nɩ m zergam hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n ta m bɩ rɛ, k'a gʋta gɛɛ k'a poore, a bɩ mim kan mɔɔ kɩ y.

Mɔɔ wɔ ʋ, m nɩ m mɩsɩrbaa bam ŋʋazaabaa nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ wɔ ʋ, m n'a bam sɔ hɔtaʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. Lɛɛ haay ʋ, wakatɩ haay nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ m da ma m mɩsɩrbaa ba, kʋ mɔɔ hɔ bɩ an m ka, gɛɛ kʋ nɔ ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, hɔtaʋrɛ nɔ ʋ, gɛɛ hɔjɩrarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ m da ma, m naa haay ba, Krista k'a nɩ paŋŋa kam mɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, a da k'awɔɔ ʋ mɔɔ han m kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ naa, awɔɔ ba mɩŋŋa.
Filipii zannɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, m hʋr kʋ mɔɔ ʋ Masedʋan kʋ ʋ, lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ sɩŋŋɩda dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a deem ɩ nyɩnta kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ barla, a a da mɔɔ han, hɔ ka kʋ ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Baa kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta Tesaloniki ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ daahan nyɔɔ mɔɔ ma gallɛm hɔka, hɔ k'a jɩra mɔɔ ma dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ.
M ka bɛɛ mɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ n nɩ bɩr hɔ karɛ m ʋ y. Bɩ, m ka mɔɔ nawʋm ma, k'awɔɔ n hɔ k'awɔɔ ba bɩ nyɔɔdʋ yɩ gʋta.

Hɔ k'awɔɔ ka haay bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ, a bɔ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ la m. Hɔ k'awɔɔ ka Epafroditɩ ʋ k'an b'a ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ, hɔsɩ n jɩra mɔɔ ma dɔ y. Ganwʋrɛrɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ bɩ, bɔ ŋ y'a a ʋ kʋ rɛ kan mannɩ k'a ji n nyɩnta Woso ma, an a ŋʋa an a si kɩ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ Zɩ Woso hɔnyɩ gʋtabaa cem haay, a hɔ k'a jɩra awɔɔ ma haay karɛ awɔɔ ʋ gʋta, Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma.
Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.
K'a yaa da wosogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm Krista Yeezuu ma rɔ wɔɔ m. Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ a m.
Wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ yaa darɛ a m, an lɛ da bɩ, Rɔm cir hargʋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ kʋ m yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa. Mɔɔ kan wɔɔ danyɩ Timote kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ barɛ awɔɔ ma.
Awɔɔ, kʋ wosogʋɔɔ n'a mɩ, an nɩ Kolɔɔsɩ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ danyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m Krista nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ tarɛ a lɛ ra. A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m awɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam nɩ barka dɔmɩm haay.
Wɔɔ ma denter n n'awɔɔ sɩra ka Krista Yeezuu ʋ mim hɩm, kan ŋʋarɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma bɩ mim kɩ.
Awɔɔ ɩ sɩrakarɛ m, a n nɩ ŋʋarɛ m, bala, Woso hɔ cɩnta awɔɔ m arzana ʋ, awɔɔ n a ta a heer lɛ. Bɩ lemim nyɩnta kʋ n y'a pa da awɔɔ m, a m sɩra lemim b'ɩ taaheerlɛ bɩ do ka awɔɔ ʋ.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do ɩ tam durnya lɛɛ haay ʋ, an nɩ nyɩ dam, an n'a kərgum lɛɛ ra, amb'a a ba awɔɔ zi, Woso barka mim k'awɔɔ ma bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ saa•••, a b'a dɔ a ʋ, barka paan••• m bɩ.
Wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn Epafras naa do dɩnda awɔɔ m, wɔɔ gʋaasɩba m, Krista zibəənyɩ m, a m taalɛrazaa, zi bɩ ba a nawʋm kan awɔɔ kɩ wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ.
A ɩ ŋʋarɛ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a da awɔɔ heer ʋ bɩ mim hɩ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ y'a ka, hinni kʋ wɔɔ naa ma ʋ bɩ tɛkka ma, wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma dɔmɩm haay. A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm Woso han, k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n a hɔɔnhɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, a bɩr Sɛnt-Ɛspri mindɔrɛ m kan a hɔdɔrɛ kɩ m.
Maam bɩ, awɔɔ y'a dam ma, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a Zuuba nɔ yɩ bɩ ba, a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ. Naa n'a kam awɔɔ n zi mɩŋŋa do haay ba, a ta lɛɛ Woso dɔrɛ nɔ ʋ.
Wɔɔ y'a yɛm han sɔ k'an awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra, a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa k'a cem hɔ haay han bɩ m. K'awɔɔ n a da ma a bɩr a tʋntɔŋ ʋ, a bʋr a ma hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
K'a Zɩ Woso barka da kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, a ɩ zaa ka k'awɔɔ n hɔjirle yɩ kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛgure nɔ ʋ.
A wɔɔ yɔ monsigə paŋŋa wɔ ʋ, an ta wɔɔ m a Nyɩ k'a n'a ŋʋam bɩ cirbəə nɔ ʋ.
A Nyɩ bɩ tɔ ma m, Woso wɔɔ bʋmbɔ, an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʋ.
Gɔsɩ bɩr Woso yɩrɛ y, bɩ kʋ gʋaa Yeezuu yɩ, k'a lʋnlɔ Woso maam. A m lɛɛkarɛzaa an nɩ hɔ haay kʋ Woso a da bɩ burə ʋ.

Bala, zu Woso ʋ kʋ ʋ kan kɩ an hɔ haay da, brama ʋ kan tara burə ʋ kɩ, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɩm mɩm ʋ kan hɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɩm kɩ, cirbəəro, kan lɛɛsoʋrezannɔ kɩ, lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, paŋŋazannɔ kɩ. Zu Woso ʋ kʋ ʋ kan kɩ an hɔ haay da, an a ka ʋ, an a so ʋ.
A ɩ lɛɛ ka an ta ʋ, hɔ haay lɛɛ, a tɔ ma m hɔ haay n gɔɔta an a bɩncɛ ʋ.
A mɩŋŋa n a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ sokʋma bɩ minzaa. A m lɛɛkarɛzaa, a ɩ lɛɛ ka an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr hɔ haay lɛɛ, hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa y'a ŋʋa k'an yɩ an a mɩŋŋa m jilli.
Woso a cɩnta, k'a hɔ haay zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ a Nyɩ bɩ tɔ ma, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama kan tara burə ʋ kɩ, ga k'a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ tɔ ma.
B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ nyɩnta biisi a m laatʋ Woso ma, zibəə bʋnyaarɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma, a nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ a ka, awɔɔ n a ba a jɩnnɔ.

Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso awɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan a kɩ a Nyɩ bɩ k'a ga mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma. A ba a ʋ maam, k'awɔɔ n bɩ jɩm a lɛɛ, k'awɔɔ n bɩr mɩŋŋabaa nɔ ʋ, kʋ minsi bɩ nyɩnta awɔɔ gʋr zi y. Kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ mim yɩ k'a hɩ awɔɔ ma y.

Bɩ, a y'awɔɔ ma k'awɔɔ n gɔɔta a bɩr sɩra kam, a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a b'a to kʋ hɔsɩ n awɔɔ gʋ taaheerlɛ kʋ lemim nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ma b'a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ ma y. N lemim nyɩnta bɩ do pa da gʋaa haay m durnya nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, m ba mɔɔ ʋ a zibəənyɩ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔm fɩr kʋ mɔɔ n'a yɩm k'awɔɔ n daahan yɩ a nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma. Bɩ, mɔɔ gɔɔta m nɩ Krista fɩryɩrɛ bɩ yɩrɛ m mɛ ʋ, a mɛ bɩ tɔ ma, naa k'a hɩ a ʋ, a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ so kʋ ma.
Zibəə kʋ Woso a da mɔɔ wɔ ʋ kʋ m a ba k'awɔɔ n daahan yɩ bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ m ba kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ zibəənyɩ, kʋ m Woso lemim bɩ pa da jilli, gʋaa haay m.
Lemim bɩ do bɩ, hɔ kʋ Woso a nyaakʋm da biisi tee••• bɩ m. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso a hɩnka a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.

A ŋʋa a ʋ, k'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m hɔ k'a a nyaakʋm da, am gʋta, a gore n ta ʋ, k'a ka do vantɔɔ haay ʋ bɩ dɔ. Hɔ bɩ do ba n nɩ: Krista y'awɔɔ heer ʋ, k'a maam, awɔɔ ɩ taaheerlɛ m, a ʋ, a nyɩntam Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, wɔɔ nɩ Krista pa dam gʋaa haay m. Ʋ nɩ gʋaa biyəə bɔ n zaa ʋ, ʋ nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋaa biyəə m, mindɔrɛ haay nɔ ʋ. K'a ka kʋ gʋaa biyəə n yɩ amba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m Krista zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
Naa mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ zi bam, m nɩ zoo bam Krista paŋŋa k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ zi bam mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ʋ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n zoo kɔɔda kʋ mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma, kan Lawodisee zannɔ kɩ tɔ ma, kan gʋɔɔ cir kʋ ŋ n mɔɔ yɩ a mɩm m fɩɩgaa rɔ wɔɔ kɩ tɔ ma bɩ dɔ.
Zoo bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ ŋ nɩ heer koodə yɩ, kʋ ŋ lɛ n bɩr deem ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra dɔ fasɩ, ŋnɩ heer koodə yɩ a nɔ ʋ. Maam bɩ, ŋ hɔ kʋ Woso a nyaakʋm da biisi bɩ dɔm. Hɔ bɩ do bɩ, Krista m.
A mɩŋŋa n ta mindɔrɛ hɔnyɩ haay woo••• kan hɔdɔrɛ haay woo••• kɩ m.
Naa hɩ mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ bra bɩmba awɔɔ m meerbaa nyɩntɔɔ nɩ y.
Sɩra m, mɔɔ ba b'ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ heer ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, m nɩ m heer nyɔɔm k'awɔɔ nɩ jɩnɩm kan kʋ kɩ kɔɔkɔɔ a sɩra ka Krista ʋ nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, k'awɔɔ Krista Yeezuu si k'an yɩ a Zuuba bɩ, k'a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee••• kan kɩ a zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
K'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ a yaa ka a nɔ ʋ, a a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ dɔ ra am cɛ hɔ bɩ m. A nyasʋ a sɩrakarɛ bɩ m kɔɔkɔɔ, amba n y'a dɩnda awɔɔ n bɩ m, a bɩr yaa dam Woso m barka kan a heer kɩ haay.
K'a a dundo a zi, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ bra bɩmba a m, gʋɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ yaarsɩ nɩ y. Gʋɔɔ minkəm hɔdɔrɛ m, durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ hɔ m, a n a to Krista zi y.
Bala, Woso k'an lʋnlɔ haay bɩ, Krista maam sɔ a mɛsim nɔ ʋ.
K'awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ haay m, a mɩŋŋa nɩ lɛɛzannɔ kan paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɩm mɩm m nɔ wɔɔ burə ʋ.
K'awɔɔ a zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ bɩ, n y'awɔɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ, bɩ gʋɔɔ baŋŋʋgasʋrɛ bɩ bɛɛ y, Krista y'awɔɔ gasʋ baŋŋʋ bɩ do ʋ, awɔɔ yɔ k'a ʋ mɛsim k'an awɔɔ dam mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma bɩ wɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Batɛm kʋ n y'a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ bir n y'a ʋ kan Krista kɩ, awɔɔ n a mɩm bɔ ʋ kan kɩ sɔ, k'awɔɔ sɩra ka Woso paŋŋa k'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ tɔ ma m.
Biisi bɩ, gəəno n'awɔɔ m a mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ ba zɩɩfʋrɔ do barla bɩ tɔ ma sɔ. Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso awɔɔ mɩm bɔ ʋ kan Krista kɩ, an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ haay sugur ka wɔɔ ʋ.
Biisi bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ kʋrɔma nɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n zu Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ Krista bɩ, a mim k'a nɩ wɔɔ yɩm wɔɔ kʋrɔmarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ ciro wɔɔ zaar ba, a wɔ a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma.
A lɛɛzannɔ kan paŋŋazannɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ bɩr ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa da, an nyannɩ da ŋ ma garga ra, kʋ gʋɔɔ n ŋ yɩ, a bʋr ŋ la, an ŋ gɩngaata a jɛ ʋ, an yirbə si ŋ nɩ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a b'a to gɔsɩ n'awɔɔ dʋdɔ yar, hɔbɩrɛ, gɛɛ hɔmire, gɛɛ cibsarɔ bɩrɛ mim ma, gɛɛ mom daarɔ kan sabaa dɔmɩnnɔ kɩ mim ma y.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay bɩ, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ga m ŋnɩ bʋr lɔ wɔɔ ŋn'a hɩnkam, hɔɔ paan•••rɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y. Hɔ paan••• bɩ, Krista m.

A b'a to gɔsɩ n a ka a ter bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ ma y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɛ dam kɔrɛ ma, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam malɛɛkarɔ m, ŋn'ɩ hɔhɩnkarɛrɔ mim dɩndam can rɔ wɔɔ m. Mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ vam, a hɔɔn ŋ n'a darɛ am gʋɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
Ŋ n gɔɔta n a kʋsɩ Krista ma y, an bɔkarɛ, bɩ m minzaa. Krista tɔ ma m, mɛ bɩ jilli nɩ tʋrlɛ yɩm, an n'a kam mɛ bɩ n deem, mɛ bɩ məsiro kan a kunəro kɩ tɔ ma, an nɩ mam amba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m.
K'awɔɔ gɩnga kan Krista kɩ bɩ, durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ n a so awɔɔ ʋ dɔ y, bɔ m kɛɛrɛ awɔɔ n'a mɩsɩrbaa bam ɩ ʋ, durnya gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ? Bɔ m awɔɔ nɩ yɛrɛ gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ dam lɛrɔ zuure ʋ?
N n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: Ɩ bɩ hɔ naa do sa y, ɩ bɩ naa da ɩ lɛ ma y, ɩ b'ɩ wɔ da naa do ma y.
Lɛrɔ nɔɔn duro haay gʋɔɔ hɔɔ m, hɔɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ nɩ zi barɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋnɩ nyam mim ŋn'a dɩndam.

Sɩra m, kʋ gʋaa dɩga lɛrɔ nɔɔn duro ma, b'a ʋ hɔɔntaʋrɛ hɔɔ m, bala, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, gʋɔɔ n yaa da, ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer, ŋnɩ fɩr ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, an bɔkarɛ, nawɔnnɔ haay naa, ŋ bɩr a dam gʋaa han k'an bʋr a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ma y.
K'awɔɔ a mɩm bɔ ʋ kan Krista kɩ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ, k'a ka hɔɔ kʋ mim ʋ hɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ma, lɛɛ kʋ Krista n ta ʋ Woso bɩsɩ ra ʋ bɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ.
K'a bɩr a hɔɔn dam arzana hɔɔ ma, a b'a hɔɔn da durnya hɔɔ ma y.
Bala, awɔɔ gɩnga, awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa n'a nyaakʋm da Woso zi kan Krista kɩ.
Kʋ Krista n'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ, k'a b'a hɩnka, a y'awɔɔ hɩnkam sɔ kan a kɩ, a nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.

Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, k'a hɔ kʋ tara burə hɔ m an awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ʋ bɩ zɛ. Hɔɔ wɔɔ duro ba n nɩ: Jaandarɛ m, lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔ barɛ m, lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ n'a som gʋɔɔ ʋ m, mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ kama m, mɩnyɔɔ m, mɩnyɔɔ bɩ, wosobaawɔnnɔ yaadarɛ do vanta m bɩ.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ zɛm Woso nɔmaa m gʋɔɔ [kʋ ŋ bɩr yɛm Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ] zi.
Naa awɔɔ n'a bam biisi a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, k'a a bɔ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ haay. A bɩ nɔmaa ba y, a b'a heer der y, a bɩ bʋnyaabaa ba y, a bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ y, a bɩ dintim meerbaarɔ ba y.
A bɩ ŋʋaar ba kʋ nɩ y, bala, awɔɔ a bɔ a mɩsɩrbaa gusire b'ʋ, kan a zibəəro bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ.
Mɩsɩrbaa daa awɔɔ n ta m kɛɛrɛ, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do, a lʋr a nawʋm tee••• an nɩ bɔm kʋ ʋ kan a darɛzaa bɩ kɩ. Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ n Woso bɩ dɔ fasɩ.

Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, jirəbɔrɛ ba ʋ dɔ, zɩɩfʋrɔ bire ʋ kan do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ kɩ y, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ kɩ bire ʋ y, jirebɔrɛ bahɔdonno kan pooyaa gʋɔɔ kɩ bire ʋ sɔ y, b'a ba lɔnnɔ kan soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ kɩ bire ʋ y. Bala, Krista ɩ lɛ da haay, an nɩ gʋɔɔ k'a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ haay heer ʋ.
K'awɔɔ nɩ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ, Woso y'awɔɔ ŋʋa, an awɔɔ bɔ ʋ k'a a so awɔɔ ʋ. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a bɩr kʋ ŋʋarɛ m, a bɩr mɩŋŋabaa bam kʋ m, a bɩr mɩŋŋazerle m, kan bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdabaa kɩ m, bʋraama kɩ m.
K'a bɩr yɛm kʋ ma, bɩ kʋ gʋaa ɩ mim m kan a mim kɩ, k'a sugur ka kʋ ʋ. Amba Zuuba sugur ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a ba maam sɔ.
A n cem woo••• bɩ, k'a bɩr ŋʋarɛ m, bala, ŋʋarɛ nɩ hɔ haay nam kʋ ʋ paan•••.
K'a ka kʋ heer laafɩɩ kʋ Krista n'a kam bɩ n a so awɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ bir Woso ʋ naa tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n yɩ deem. K'a bɩr yaa dam Woso m barka.

K'a Krista lemim bɩ da a heer ʋ jilli. K'a bɩr hɔ dɩndam kʋ m, a bɩr kʋ bɔm zaa ʋ, hɔɔntaʋrɛ m. K'a bɩr laa lɔm, laarɔ ciro wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, kan mim ma laarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, laa kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a da a heer ʋ haay kɩ. A laa bɩ lɔ ncɩnaaʋ, a Woso barka da kan a heer kɩ haay.
Kʋ bɔ awɔɔ n'a bam, gɛɛ kʋ bɔ awɔɔ n'a hɩm, k'a ba Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma, a bɩr Woso barka dam a tɔ ma.
Lannɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ a zino wɔɔ ma, amba a ga m Zuuba zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Zino wɔɔ, k'a a lannɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa, a bɩ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ y.
Nyɩnɔ wɔɔ, k'a a zɩrɔ wɔɔ lɛ si hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, hɔ kʋ Zuuba n'a ŋʋarɛ awɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ n naa.
Awɔɔ k'a m zɩrɔ wɔɔ, a b'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ da nɔmaa ma y, ŋ heer y'a a zar.
Lɔnnɔ wɔɔ, k'a zu a soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʋ, hɔ haay nɔ ʋ. A bɩ ŋ zi ba dundo kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ a zi tɔ ma, kʋ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔ a ʋ y. Bɩ, k'a ŋ zi ba kan a heer kɩ haay, k'awɔɔ nɩ Zuuba gore daŋ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
Kʋ bɔ zi awɔɔ n'a bam, k'a ba kan a heer kɩ haay, ɩ ʋ, Zuuba zi awɔɔ n'a bam, gʋɔɔ hɔ bɛɛ y.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Zuuba nɩ ganwʋrɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ hɔ k'a cɩnta a gʋɔɔ m arzana ʋ bɩ yɩm. Awɔɔ Minzaa bɩ n Krista m, a zi awɔɔ n'a bam.
Gʋaa k'a n'a bʋnyaa bam bɩ, Zuuba y'a zi bʋnyaa bɩ yawʋra bam nɩ, a bɩr gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.
Awɔɔ, kʋ lɔnnɔ soʋrezannɔ n'awɔɔ n nɔ wɔɔ, k'a tɩrgabaa kan sɩra kɩ zi ba kan a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ soʋrezaa ta ʋ, an nɩ arzana ʋ.
K'a bɩr yaa dam tee••• a b'a zu a ʋ y, k'a bɩr Woso barka dam.
K'a yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma sɔ, kʋ Woso n a ka k'ʋ toore mɩŋŋa yɩ, ʋ a lemim bɩ pa da gʋɔɔ m. K'ʋ Krista mim k'a n dɔ biisi bɩ pa da, bɩ tɔ ma m mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ.
Kʋ m a pa da kʋ n a jɩ ma paan•••, amba mɔɔ m ga m, m a ba bɩ m.
K'a dundo a mɩsɩrbaa barɛ zi gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɛɛ n ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ. K'a a tɔ ʋ kan hɔ k'a a ga barɛ m kɩ wakatɩ haay.
K'a ka k'a meerbaa n bɩr mɩŋŋa, yɛ n bɩr ta ma. Kʋ laakarɔ gʋɔɔ n'a darɛ a han, k'a nyɩbɔʋrɛ dɔ a bɔ ŋ nʋ, amba a ga m bɩ m.
Kʋ mɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, wɔɔ danyɩ ŋʋarɛzaa Tisikkɩ zɛm b'a dɩnda awɔɔ m haay. Zuuba zi a n'a bam taalɛra m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m Zuuba zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ.
A nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ ma tɔkkɛ k'an bɩ wɔɔ mim dɩnda awɔɔ m, an awɔɔ heer yo.
Wɔɔ danyɩ Onezim, awɔɔ gʋaa deem m, a zɛm kan Tisikkɩ kɩ sɔ. Taalɛrazaa m, wɔɔ n'a ŋʋam. Ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a nɩ naa ʋ haay dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m.
Aristarkɩ k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa ʋ b'ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. Barnabas danyɩ Markɩ b'ɩ yaa darɛ a m sɔ. Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ awɔɔ m m ʋ, k'a lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʋ k'a si mɩŋŋa, k'a ba maam denter.

Yeezuu kʋ n so ra n n'a birm Zistus b'ɩ yaa darɛ a m. Gʋɔɔ kaakʋrɔ nɔɔm y'a minto n zɩɩfʋrɔ, ŋn'ɩ zi bam kan mɔɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ tɔ ma. Zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla, ŋ yɩ mɔɔ heer wʋtam gʋta.
Awɔɔ kʋrɔ gʋaa Epafras ɩ yaa darɛ a m. Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩ m an nɩ zoo bam awɔɔ tɔ ma yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ. K'awɔɔ n jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a ma Woso zaa bɩ ra, K'a Woso hɔɔnhɔ haay dɔ a ba.
Mɔɔ sɩra bɩ, m a dɔ m ʋ, a ɩ kɔm gʋta awɔɔ tɔ ma, kan Lawodisee zannɔ kɩ, Hierapolis zannɔ kɩ tɔ ma sɔ.
Wɔɔ gʋaasɩba Likki k'a m lɔɔtɔr bɩ, kan Demas k'ɩ yaa darɛ a m.
K'a yaa da wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Lawodisee ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, kan Nɩnfa kɩ m, kan kristagʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a som kʋ ma a har ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
K'awɔɔ mɔɔ ci bɩ karɩnda ba, k'a ka Lawodisee kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma b'ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a karɩnda ba sɔ. K'awɔɔ n ci k'a n'a tom Lawodisee ʋ bɩ karɩnda ba sɔ.
K'a hɩ Arsip m a ʋ, an dundo a zi kan zibəə kʋ Zuuba a ka ʋ bɩ kɩ, an a tɔ ʋ an zi bɩ ba mɩŋŋa.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ leersore yaa bɩ darɛ gʋrsɩra nyambʋrlɛ m zim, a ba n nɩ: K'a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, a dɔ a ʋ, lɔnnɔcɛ mɔɔ n ta ʋ. Bɩ kʋ Woso barka n bɩr kan a kɩ.

Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, kan Silas kɩ Timote kɩ, wɔɔ nɩ ci naa do barɛ awɔɔ ma. Awɔɔ k'a m Tesaloniki kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ, Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n'a so awɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ Woso m barka, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
Wɔɔ yaa darɛ nɔ ʋ haay, wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam awɔɔ tɔ ma, ʋ nɩ Woso barka dam dɔmɩm haay awɔɔ minto.
Wɔɔ y'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ zibəə tɔ darɛ ʋ nɔ ʋ tee••• wɔɔ Zɩ Woso lɛɛ, kan ŋʋarɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ tʋntɔʋrɛ zibəə kɩ, kan taaheerlɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m kɔɔkɔɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ.
Ʋ danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ Woso awɔɔ ŋʋa, an awɔɔ bɔ ʋ k'a a so awɔɔ ʋ.

Bala, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, a n yɩ lɛ meerbaa m bala y, yɩ a ʋ, kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ wɔɔ n'a kasɛtɩ m ʋ heer ʋ, ʋ ʋ sɩra lemim m. Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa kʋ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ bire ʋ awɔɔ daahan minto bɩ dɔ.
Awɔɔ wɔɔ hɔbaa sa, wɔɔ kan Zuuba kɩ, bala, awɔɔ nyɩnta fɩryɩrɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ, a a gu a Woso lemim bɩ si heernyɔɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, Masedʋan kan Akayii kɩ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ haay n a ba awɔɔ hɔbaa dɩndarɛ zannɔ.

Bala, Zuuba lemim b'a to awɔɔ zi an ta Masedʋan kan Akayii kɩ kʋrɔ ʋ, bɩ, kʋrɔ wɔɔ duro bɛɛ m bala y, sɩra k'awɔɔ ka Woso ʋ bɩ mim ta lɛɛ haay ʋ, an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, pakra bɛɛ m dɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ ya ʋ a dɩnda ŋ nɩ y.
Bala, ta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi awɔɔ m wɔɔ si mɩŋŋa bɩ, gʋaa haay ɩ bɩ mim dɩndam, a bɔ k'awɔɔ ʋ wosobaawɔnnɔ yaadarɛ ʋ, a a bɔ a taam k'a zu Woso k'a m mɩsɩr a m sɩra b'ʋ bɩ, n yɩ bɩ mim dɩndam sɔ.
A n nɩ dɔrɛ a Nyɩ Yeezuu kʋ Woso mɩŋŋa a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, an n'a tom brama k'a bʋr bɩ ma, an nɩ wɔɔ yɔm Woso nɔmaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ wɔ ʋ.
Ʋ danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a zim a ʋ, ta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi bɩ, a n bɔ vam y.

Awɔɔ dɔ sɔ a ʋ, fɩr kʋ ŋ y'a ka wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ wɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋ Filipii ʋ bɩ wɔɔ ʋ hʋr ma lɛɛ m, ʋ bʋr awɔɔ zi. Bɩ Woso heerkoodəbaa ka wɔɔ ʋ, baa kʋ jɩnnɔ nyɩnta ʋ gʋta bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ da ma, ʋ lemim nyɩnta k'a a to zi bɩ pa da awɔɔ m.
Nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ pa bɛɛ wɔɔ n'a darɛ y, gɩnga bʋnyaa bɛɛ wɔɔ n ta m sɔ ʋ nɩ pa bɩ darɛ y, wɔɔ bɩr ʋ kam ma sɔ k'ʋ ŋʋaar ba gʋɔɔ nɩ y.

Bɩ, kʋ Woso wɔɔ ka lɛɛ an dɩga wɔɔ ma, an a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m bɩ, an a lemim nyɩnta bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʋ. Naa y'a ka kʋ wɔɔ ɩ meer bam, wɔɔ bɩr ʋ kam ma kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔ n yɩ ʋ ra y, ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm ma kʋ Woso nɔ n yɩ ʋ ra, bala, a mɩŋŋa nɩ hɔ k'a nɩ wɔɔ heer ʋ yɩm.
Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʋ, wɔɔ n yɛ fɩɩgaa k'ʋ bra bɩmba gʋɔɔ nɩ y, wɔɔ n meer ba ʋ n'a gɩngam k'awɔɔ m hɔ ka wɔɔ ʋ y, naa woo••• naa, Woso m wɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa.
Wɔɔ n'ʋ ka ma fɩɩgaa kʋ gʋɔɔ m wɔɔ da ʋ y, wɔɔ n'ʋ ka ma awɔɔ zi, wɔɔ n'ʋ ka ma gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ zi sɔ y.

A n bɔkarɛ, a ga k'a ʋ m kʋ wɔɔ m daʋrɛ kʋ Krista zibəəzannɔ a ga m, ŋn'a yɩ bɩ yɩ bɩ, wɔɔ n ʋ ka ma k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ gʋr zi y. Bɩ, nyɩntabaa wɔɔ ba awɔɔ m gʋta, amba nyɩnɔ da tɩr nyasʋrɛ a nyɩnɔ m nyɩnta bɩ m.
Awɔɔ ŋʋa kʋ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto bɩ, wɔɔ n a ŋʋa k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, lemim nyɩnta bɩ wɔɔ ka awɔɔ ʋ a minto y, wɔɔ ŋʋa sɔ k'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ka awɔɔ tɔ ma. Bala, wɔɔ awɔɔ ŋʋa maam-maam.
Ʋ danyɩnɔ, ziro kʋ wɔɔ ŋ ba, ʋ kɔrɛ yɩ bɩ, ŋ tɔ y'awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ zi ba sinuu ʋ kan gunuu ʋ kɩ, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ kɔ wɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ mim tɔ ma y, a ba wɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, ʋ Woso lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da awɔɔ m.

Awɔɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ kan Woso kɩ sɔ, a dɔ a ʋ, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ k'a m sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ, mɩsɩrbaa kʋ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ zi bɩ, nyɩnta a ʋ mɩŋŋabaa kan tɩrgabaa kɩ nɔ ʋ, mim n nyɩnta wɔɔ gʋr zi y.
Awɔɔ a ya a dɔ sɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ nyasʋ awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə m, amba nyɩnɔ zɩ tɩr nyasʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ m:
Ʋ a dʋndɔ, ʋ awɔɔ heer yo, ʋ a hɩ awɔɔ m karɛ, paan••• ʋ ʋ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ ba, a y'awɔɔ bir k'awɔɔ n nyɩnta kan a kɩ a cirbəə kan a lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ.

Wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka sɔ dɔmɩm haay, bala, Woso lemim kʋ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ si a dɔ a ʋ, Woso lemim m, gʋaa lemim bɛɛ y, bɩ Woso lemim m denter paan•••, an n'a zi bam awɔɔ gʋɔɔ k'a sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ heer ʋ.

Ʋ danyɩnɔ, mim kʋ Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, Zidee kʋrɔ wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a yɩ bɩ, awɔɔ yɩ sɔ. Bala, awɔɔ danyɩnɔ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma sɔ, amba brɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ fɩr ka ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ m.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ duro ɩ Zuuba Yeezuu zɛ gər, ŋ yɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, ŋ yɩ fɩr ka wɔɔ ma sɔ. Woso heer bɩ nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ y, gʋɔɔ haay jɩnnɔ n ŋ mɩ.
Ŋ y'a tam wɔɔ m toore, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ m kʋ ŋ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ y, a ba kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ naa, a mimbʋnyaa ŋn'a dam la tee••• bɩ naa haay jɛ ʋ, Woso a nɔmaa kərgu ŋ la.

Bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ʋ ba awɔɔ ma laatʋ, a maasɩrɛ ba poore. Ʋ n ʋ ya, ʋ n nɩ kʋ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ wɔɔ heer gɔɔta an nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ ŋʋa paan••• k'ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ awɔɔ yɩ, naa tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ tʋntɔ ʋ gʋta k'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ awɔɔ yɩ.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, wɔɔ n a ŋʋa k'ʋ ʋ wusigə ʋ ta awɔɔ zi. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, mɔɔ m tɔ ʋ gallɛm hɔka kʋ m ta awɔɔ zi, bɩ Sʋtaana wɔɔ zaa tii, wɔɔ n'ʋ da ma y.
Sɩra nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ taaheerlɛ m, awɔɔ tɔ ma m wɔɔ nɩ zɛm bɩ heernyɔɔ yɩ, ʋ ʋ da ma ʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu taa, a zɛrɛ hinni ʋ.
Denter m, awɔɔ m wɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ kan wɔɔ heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n'a ŋʋam kʋ awɔɔ yɩ, bɩ wɔɔ bɩr ʋ dam ma bɩ, wɔɔ n kɔ ʋ lɛ sa, ʋ ʋ k'ʋ gɔɔta ʋ minto Atɛnnɩ ʋ.
A m bɩ, wɔɔ n'ʋ danyɩ Timote nyɔɔ, wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m an nɩ Woso zi bam Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ nɔ ʋ. A nyɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ ma k'an awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra, an awɔɔ heer yo a sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ,
k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, awɔɔ gɔsɩ b'a bɔ a jɛ m fɩr k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm naa minto y. Bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Woso zaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, pakra m kʋ wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ.
Nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ ser ka ʋ a hɩ awɔɔ m, ʋ ʋ, pakra m kʋ wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ, b'awɔɔ dɔ, a ʋ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ hɩ b'ɩ ba bɩ.

Naa tɔ ma m, kʋ mɔɔ n m da ma dɔ, m bʋr m ma kʋ m awɔɔ mim dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ n Timote nyɔɔ, k'an awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ mim dɔ, k'an b'a hɩ m m. Bala, mɔɔ da bɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ʋ, ɩ b'a ka Sʋtaana n awɔɔ makra ba, awɔɔ m sɩrakarɛ to, zi kʋ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ zi bɩ n bɔ vam y.

Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Timote a to awɔɔ zi b'ʋ an bʋr, a lemim nyɩnta hɩ wɔɔ m, awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ kan awɔɔ ŋʋarɛ kɩ mim bɩncɛ ʋ, a a hɩ, a ʋ, wɔɔ tɔ gɔɔta an awɔɔ nɔ ʋ nyɩnta, bɩ amba wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ awɔɔ yɩ bɩ, awɔɔ lɛ taa k'a a ya, awɔɔ yɩ sɔ.
Ʋ danyɩnɔ, yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ minto bɩ, wɔɔ n heerkoodəbaa yɩ, ʋ fɩryɩrɛ kan ʋ makrarɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Bala, wɔɔ ɩ heernyɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ ɩ ʋ, mɩsɩrbaa daa wɔɔ yɩ, k'awɔɔ nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Zuuba zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ minto.
Awɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ b'ʋ dam ma ʋ Woso barka da, ʋ a nya y, heernyɔɔ gʋta k'awɔɔ n'a kam wɔɔ ʋ a taa bɩ minto.
Sinuu ʋ kan gunuu ʋ kɩ wɔɔ y'a yɛm han gʋta, k'an a ka k'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ awɔɔ yɩ k'ʋ hɔ k'a jɩra awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ ma bɩ na awɔɔ m ma.
Wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ n'a yɛm wɔɔ Zɩ Woso mɩŋŋa kan wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu kɩ han, kʋ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ zaa banka k'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ bʋr awɔɔ zi.
Wɔɔ y'a yɛm kʋ Zuuba n a ka k'awɔɔ ŋʋarɛ kan kʋ kɩ kan gʋɔɔ haay kɩ bɩ n a da ra an bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••, amba wɔɔ n'awɔɔ ŋʋam bɩ m.
K'an a ba maam, an awɔɔ heer yo, k'awɔɔ m bɩr mɩŋŋa, mim ba awɔɔ gʋr zi wɔɔ Zɩ Woso taa y, hinni kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ kan a gʋɔɔ kɩ haay bɩ tɔ ma.

M danyɩnɔ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ʋ awɔɔ dʋndɔ m wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: Biisi bɩ, wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'awɔɔ n'a bam an Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do awɔɔ n'a bam, bɩ k'a ta lɛɛ tee••• kan mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do kɩ a da ra.
Awɔɔ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ awɔɔ dʋndɔ m wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ra bɩ dɔ.
Hɔ kʋ Woso lɛ n taa bɩ ba n nɩ: A lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa k'an mɩŋŋa a mɩm ʋ ba, k'a a gʋ jaandarɛ do haay ma.
Awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə a ga m, an a da a mɛsim ma dɔ, k'an a da ma, an mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba kan daʋrɛ kɩ.
K'a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ to kʋ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ n a so awɔɔ ʋ, amba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Woso dɔ rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y.
Mim naa do nɔ ʋ, a b'a ka gɔsɩ n kʋrɔma kan a danyɩ kɩ an zambʋ ba ma y, bala, Zuuba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ minno nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋrm, amba wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ʋ a hɩ awɔɔ m, ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ so ra paan••• bɩ m.
Sɩra nɔ ʋ, Woso n wɔɔ bir kʋ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ y, bɩ kʋ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba mɩŋŋabaa nɔ ʋ.
Naa minto bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ kaanɩm hɔdɩndarɛ naa do m bɩ, gʋaa bɛɛ a nɩ kaanɩm nɩ y, Woso k'a n'a Sɛnt-Ɛspri karɛ awɔɔ ʋ b'a kaanm m.
M danyɩnɔ Krista nɔ ʋ, kʋ kʋ ŋʋarɛ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, pakra bɛɛ m kan awɔɔ kɩ kʋ mɔɔ n ci ba awɔɔ ma, m a mim dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y. Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ m bɩr kʋ ŋʋam.
Bɩ, amba n ŋʋarɛ mim dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ danyɩnɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ Masedʋan kʋ b'ʋ jilli rɔ wɔɔ ŋʋarɛ. Bɩ, kʋ a yɛ awɔɔ han k'a ta lɛɛ tee••• kan ŋ ŋʋarɛ kɩ a da ra.
K'a a yo ʋ kʋ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta awɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ kɩ bire ʋ, gʋaa biyəə n a zerga a mɩŋŋa mim lɛ, an zi ba an a mɩsɩrbaa ba m, amba wɔɔ lɛɛ ka, ʋ a hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ m.
K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ gore daŋ ʋ, awɔɔ bɩ gɔsɩ mɩm kam sɔ y.
M danyɩnɔ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, wɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n gɔɔta badɔ nɔ ʋ, a bɩr heerzarlɛ m amba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ba taaheerlɛ m nɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
Kʋ wɔɔ sɩra ka, ʋ ʋ Yeezuu ga an a mɩm bɔ ʋ bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ, Woso brɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʋ ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba kan Yeezuu kɩ.
Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ kʋ a hɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Zuuba ɩ nyɩnta an a dɩnda. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ gʋɔɔ k'ʋ gɔɔta ʋ m mɩsɩr naa, Zuuba zɛrɛ hinni ʋ, wɔɔ bɩ lɛɛ kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.

Bala, kʋ Woso bɩ zaa ka, malɛɛka jɩtaarɛ deem n a leer busu, n nɩ Woso huure bɩ hɛ, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa y'a tom arzana ʋ, an zer. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʋ ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ n lɛɛ ka ŋn'a mɩm bɔ ʋ.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ kɛɛrɛ, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ m mɩsɩr hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, n wɔɔ nam kʋ ʋ kan ŋ kɩ n nɩ wɔɔ busu warkʋ nɔ ʋ, kʋ aa Zuuba zɛ ʋ brama, yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ wɔɔ n nyɩnta kan Zuuba kɩ dɔmɩm haay.
K'a meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba kan kʋ kɩ, a bɩr kʋ heer yom.
Ʋ danyɩnɔ, pakra bɛɛ m kʋ n nɩ ci ba awɔɔ ma n nɩ dɔmɩm gɛɛ wakatɩ kʋ minno nɔɔn duro n nɩ baŋ ʋ bɩ mim dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y.
Bala, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a dɔ a zim a ʋ, hinni kʋ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ bɩ, nyɩnta a nawʋm amba koor tɩr bʋr gunuu ʋ gʋaa n a wakatɩ dɔ bɩ m.
Kʋ gʋɔɔ bʋr ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ: "Laafɩɩ dɔmɩm wɔɔ n ta ʋ kɛɛrɛ, minsi ba ʋ y." Dɔmɩm bɩ do fɩryɩrɛ n nɩ daata zɛrɛ ŋ la amba nyoosibarɛ tɩr daata zɛ lʋ jɩsɩzaa ra bɩ m, ŋ gɔsɩ bɩ bɔm lɛ nɩ y.
Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, ʋ danyɩnɔ, monsigə bɛɛ awɔɔ n ta ʋ, kʋ dɔmɩm bɩ do n bɩ daata zɛ awɔɔ ra, amba koor tɩr daata zɛ gʋaa ra bɩ nɩ y.
Bala, awɔɔ haay, lɛɛgure gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, sinuu gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m. Gunuu gʋɔɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ, bɩ monsigə gʋɔɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ m sɔ y.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʋ bɩ hinceem ba am gʋɔɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, ʋ b'a to kʋ hɔsɩ n'ʋ zu ʋ y, ʋ ʋ da ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma.
Hinceem zannɔ wɔɔ a ba ŋ nawʋm gunuu ʋ, gunuu ʋ ŋnɩ bɛɛ miŋ ʋ sɔ an nɩ ŋ zɛm.

Bɩ, wɔɔ kʋ sinuu gʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ʋ ʋ da ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, k'ʋ gɔɔta ʋ sɩra ka, ʋ bɩr ŋʋarɛ m, ɩ ʋ pɔyaa goŋŋo wɔɔ ka ʋ ma, ʋ bɩr bʋmbɔrɛ kʋ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm ba yɩ bɩ taaheerlɛ m, ɩ ʋ, pɔyaa firgə wɔɔ ku ʋ mim ma.
Bala, Woso n wɔɔ bɔ ʋ k'a bɩ fɩr ka wɔɔ ma a nɔmaa nɔ ʋ y, bɩ wɔɔ bɔ a ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa ɩ ga wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʋ m mɩsɩr, gɛɛ gɩnga wɔɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ m mɩsɩrbaa ba kan kɩ a zɛrɛ hinni ʋ.
Naa minto bɩ, k'a kʋ heer yo, a kʋ sɩrakarɛ da ra, amba awɔɔ n'a bam kara bɩ m.
M danyɩnɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso zi bam awɔɔ barla ŋnɩ karɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ, ŋn'awɔɔ bɔm zaa ʋ Zuuba zaa nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a yɛ wɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han k'a ŋ gore da ʋ.
K'a ŋ da ʋ gʋta kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, ŋ zibəə bɩ minto. Awɔɔ haay, k'a bɩr laafɩɩ kan kʋ kɩ.
Ʋ danyɩnɔ, kʋ a yɛ a han, k'a həən si gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa zore bam nɔ wɔɔ ma, k'a heerkoodəwarzannɔ heer yo, k'a a da paŋŋawarzannɔ han, k'a bɩr bʋraama m kan gʋaa haay kɩ.
K'a dundo a zi kʋ gɔsɩ b'a bʋnyaa sompi gʋaa n'ʋ y, bɩ k'a bɩr a karɛ a mɩŋŋa barɛ ma tee•••, awɔɔ kan kʋ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ haay kɩ bire ʋ.
K'a bɩr heernyɔɔ m dɔmɩm haay,
k'a bɩr yaa dam tee•••.
Mim woo••• nɔ ʋ, k'a Woso barka da, bala, naa Woso lɛ n taa awɔɔ gʋr zi Krista Yeezuu zuure bɩ nɔ ʋ.
A b'a ta Sɛnt-Ɛspri zibəə m toore y,
a bɩ wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʋrɛ meerbaarɔ gore bɔ ʋ y.
Bɩ, mim haay nɔ ʋ, k'a a hɔɔn da ma, a dɩga hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa a nɔ ʋ bɩ ma, a nyasʋ hɔ bɩ do m.
K'a a gʋ mimbʋnyaa do haay ma laatʋ.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ wɔɔ Woso kʋ laafɩɩ karɛzaa m bɩ n'awɔɔ hu bɔ jilli, k'an dɔ awɔɔ hɔɔn ma, kan awɔɔ nyi kɩ a mɛ kɩ ma haay, kʋ minsi bɩ nyɩnta awɔɔ gʋr zi wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛrɛ hinni ʋ y.
Woso mɩŋŋa y'awɔɔ bir, jɩnalɛrazaa m, an nɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ yɛ naa barɛ.
Ʋ danyɩnɔ, k'a yaa da Woso m wɔɔ minto sɔ.
K'a yaa da danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay m, amba a a ga m bɩ m.
Zuuba tɔ ma, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han paan•••. K'a ci naa do karɩnda ba danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay lɛɛ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, kan Silas kɩ Timote kɩ, wɔɔ nɩ ci naa do barɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ k'a m Tesaloniki kristagʋɔɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n'a so awɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋm kʋ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ.
M danyɩnɔ, a a ga m, kʋ wɔɔ n yaa da Woso m barka, awɔɔ tɔ ma tee•••. A ga a ʋ m, kʋ wɔɔ n a ba ncɩnaaʋ, bala awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ y'a dam la, awɔɔ kʋ ŋʋarɛ nɩ tam lɛɛ tee•••.

Naa minto m, kʋ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim dɩndam Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ vantɔɔ lɛɛ, a dɩnda wɔɔ nawʋm ʋ n'ʋ mim kam brama, bala, gʋɔɔ sɔ awɔɔ m, ŋnɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ nɩ yɛm naa haay ma, an n'a tʋntɔŋ ʋ a gɔɔta an nɩ sɩrakarɛ m.

Naa woo••• n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, dʋdɔ kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a ka bɩ yɩm tɩrga, fɩryɩrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro k'awɔɔ nɩ yɛrɛ ŋ ma naa n n'a karɛ awɔɔ n'a ga Woso cirbəə gasʋrɛ m, Woso cirbəə bɩ do tɔ ma m awɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩm.
Sɩra m, hɔ k'an tɩrga bɩ Woso n n'a bam, a y'awɔɔ zɩm bɔm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma, an fɩryɩrɛ ka ŋ ʋ.
Bɩ, awɔɔ k'a nɩ fɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ, a mɛnyɔɔ karɛ awɔɔ ʋ kan wɔɔ kɩ, naa ba a nawʋm hinni kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu n'a tom brama an zer kan a malɛɛkarɔ paŋŋazannɔ kɩ bɩ ma.
Zer a nawʋm sɛwurə nɔ ʋ, k'a bɩ fɩr ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Woso dɔ, bɩ ŋ bɩr yɛm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma.
Fɩryɩrɛ kʋ ŋ n'a yɩm bɩ, zaarbarɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ m, n nyɔɔ n nawʋm laatʋ Zuuba taʋrɛ kan a cirbəə paŋŋa kɩ ma.

Zɛ k'a nawʋm dɔmɩm gʋta bɩ do hinni ʋ bɩ, naa n nɩ baŋ ʋ. Zɛ a nawʋm k'a bɩ nyɩnta lɛbɔʋrɛ m a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zi, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ a ʋ. Awɔɔ nyɩntam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro barla, bala, awɔɔ sɩra ka lemim kʋ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m b'ʋ.

Bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ nɩ yaa dam Woso m awɔɔ tɔ ma tee•••, k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n a ga mɩsɩrbaa k'a mɩŋŋa awɔɔ bir k'awɔɔ m b'a ba bɩ m. K'an a ka, a paŋŋa bɩ minto bɩ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma, a hɔ mɩŋŋa haay k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa k'a ba bɩ ba, kʋ zi k'awɔɔ n'a bam sɩra k'awɔɔ ka bɩ tɔ ma bɩ m nyɩ da.
Naa n'a kam wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ awɔɔ gʋr zi, awɔɔ m lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ a gʋr zi, wɔɔ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ barka tɔ ma.
M danyɩnɔ, kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛrɛ hinni bɩ nɩ, kan ba wɔɔ n'ʋ som kʋ ma kan kɩ bɩ mim nɩ, hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a yɛ awɔɔ han bɩ ba n nɩ:

A a da ma, n ʋ, wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʋrɛ meerbaa niŋŋə, gɛɛ Woso lemim padarɛ niŋŋə, gɛɛ ci niŋŋə y'a to wɔɔ zi an n'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, Zuuba zɛrɛ hinni bɩ lee ku, a b'a hɔɔn war kʋ ma a nyi ba naanaa, naa do tɔ ma y.
A b'a to kʋ gɔsɩ n bra bɩmba a m fɩɩga y. Bala, pakra m kʋ gʋɔɔ cir gʋta m wuti ŋnɩ bɩsɩ ka Woso ma, kʋ gʋaa bʋnyaa kʋ Woso n n'a dam sɛhar ʋ bɩ n a hɩnka, bɩ jɛ ʋ, Zuuba dɔmɩm bɩ n n'a kuŋ ʋ.
Gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ do bɩ yɛm, gʋɔɔ n yaa da hɔsɩ m dɔ y, baa Woso mɩŋŋa, a y'a mɩŋŋa cɩntam hɔ haay burə ʋ, baa Woso burə ʋ. A gasʋm Wosocɛ gʋta mɩŋŋa ʋ, an aa nyɩnta an a hɩ a ʋ, Woso n'a mɩ.
Nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, mɔɔ naa mim dɩnda awɔɔ m, a tɔ ba awɔɔ nɔ ʋ ra?
Dɩɩtaa naa, hɔ n'a tam gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ m toore, k'a b'a da ma, an a hɩnka k'a dɔmɩm bɛɛ y'a ku y, awɔɔ hɔ bɩ do dɔ.
Denter m, gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ paŋŋa a nyaakʋm da an nɩ zi bam kara, bɩ pakra m kʋ gʋaa k'a n'a tam gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ m toore bɩ n'a gaa toore.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ, gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ y'a hɩnkam kɛɛrɛ, bɩ Zuuba Yeezuu y'a zɛm gər a lɛ hoonsire m, an a hɔɔnsɩ a hɩnkarɛ leegure paŋŋa gʋtabaa m.
Gʋaa bʋnyaa bɩ, a hɩnka a nawʋm kan Sʋtaana paŋŋa kɩ, a zi paŋŋazannɔ do haay bam, an makrarɔ ba kan hoserlo kɩ, k'a gʋɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ.
A yom zi bʋnyaa do haay ma, an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ, brɔɔ nyaanɩm, bala, sɩra k'a n'a dam ma an ŋ bʋmbɔ bɩ, ŋ n a ŋʋa, bɩ, ŋ n yɛ ma y.
Bɩ y'a ka, Woso n a ka nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ paŋŋa nɩ zi bam kan ŋ kɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka ŋʋaar ʋ.
Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, Woso m bɩ zɛm bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n yɛ sɩra ma y, bɩ zibʋnyaa barɛ ŋn'a ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yar.

M danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ yaa da Woso m barka awɔɔ tɔ ma tee•••, awɔɔ kʋ Zuuba n'a ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ. Bala, Woso awɔɔ bɔ ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya ba ʋ cɩna y. Sɛnt-Ɛspri zibəə tɔ ma, kan yɛ k'awɔɔ ʋ sɩra ma bɩ kɩ minto, k'awɔɔ n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, a yɩ Woso soʋre hɔɔ.
Bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ tɔ ma m, an zu kʋ ʋ kan lemim nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ kɩ, an awɔɔ bir, k'awɔɔ m bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, danyɩnɔ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a hɔ haay kʋ wɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m meerbaa nɔ ʋ gɛɛ ci ʋ bɩ nyasʋ mɩŋŋa.
Wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa, kan wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kɩ wɔɔ ŋʋa, ŋnɩ heerwʋtarɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ, kan taaheerlɛ mɩŋŋa kɩ ka wɔɔ ʋ.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʋrɛ ŋ han, kʋ ŋ n'a ka kʋ heerwʋtarɛ n'awɔɔ heer han, kʋ ŋ nɩ paŋŋa ka awɔɔ ʋ k'a bɩr hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa haay bam tee•••, zibəə kan meerbaa kɩ nɔ ʋ.
M danyɩnɔ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ, k'a yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma, kʋ Zuuba lemim n gɔɔta an bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••, k'an daʋrɛ yɩ amba a nyɩnta ʋ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ m.
K'a yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma sɔ, kʋ Woso n wɔɔ yɔ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋsɩ rɔ wɔ ʋ, bala, gʋɔɔ haay bɛɛ nɩ sɩra karɛ y.
Bɩ, jɩnalɛrazaa m Zuuba m, a y'awɔɔ paŋŋa dam la, an dɔ awɔɔ ma kan a bʋnyaabarɛzaa bɩ kɩ.
K'awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, Zuuba a ka wɔɔ heer n kookoo ʋ a dɔ, ʋ ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bam b'awɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ a ta lɛɛ kan a barɛ kɩ.
Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba n a ka k'awɔɔ n Woso ŋʋa kan a heer kɩ, k'a a da ma sɔ, a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee•••, baa kʋ bɔ m, amba Krista a ba bɩ m.
Ʋ danyɩnɔ, a yɛ wɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ han, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, danyɩnɔ haay kʋ yakʋzannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, k'a gʋ ŋ ma laatʋ, brɔɔ bɩr yɛm hɔ haay kʋ wɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ ma y.
Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, awɔɔ hɔ k'a n'a bam a wɔɔ hɔbaa dɩnda bɩ dɔ. Bala, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ n nyɩnta yakʋzannɔ y.
Wɔɔ n gɔsɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ vam y. Bɩ, zi wɔɔ ba ʋ kɔ, wɔɔ zi ba sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ kɔ wɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ mim tɔ ma y.
Sɩra nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ daahan yɩ awɔɔ zi, bɩ, wɔɔ y'a ŋʋa ʋ zim k'ʋ lɛɛmaa hɔ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n zu wɔɔ hɔbaa ʋ.
Bala, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ zi b'ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, wɔɔ ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, a lɛ baa zibəə ma, k'a bɩ hɔ bɩ sɔ y."
A n bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ y'a marɛ n n'a hɩrɛ n ʋ, awɔɔ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n ta ʋ, ŋn'ɩ yakʋ bam, ŋ bɩr zi barɛ y, a war ŋ nawʋm gʋɔɔ minno ma.
Lɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a cɩntam gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro m, ʋ nɩ ŋ dʋndɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: K'a a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ zibəə lɛ ʋ zɛny•••, a a lɛɛmaa hɔ bɩ.
Ʋ danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ nɩ, a bɩ kɔ kan zi mɩŋŋa barɛ kɩ y.
Kʋ gʋaa n zu hɔ kʋ wɔɔ dɩnda ci naa do nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, k'a zaa da lɛ ʋ, a b'a ya, a a zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ y, kʋ nyannɩ n a nyasʋ.
Bɩ, a b'a zaa ba a jɩm y, k'a dʋndɔ, amba n tɩr a danyɩ dʋndɔ bɩ m.
Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba mɩŋŋa k'a nɩ laafɩɩ kam bɩ n laafɩɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay, hɔ haay m. Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba m bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ leersore yaa kʋ mɔɔ n'a darɛ awɔɔ m naa gʋrsɩra barɛ m zim, ciro haay kʋ mɔɔ tɩr ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ, m wɔjɩ mɔɔ tɩr a daŋ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa gʋrsɩra n naa.
Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ ci naa do barɛ. Woso kʋ wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ kan Krista Yeezuu k'an wɔɔ taaheerlɛ bɩ k'ɩ zaa ka, mɔɔ nɩ m ba Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa.
Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, Timote, mɔɔ nyɩ paan••• sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ kʋ Zɩ Woso kan wɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu kɩ n barka, kan cicirzɛrɛ kɩ, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka ɩ ʋ.
Amba mɔɔ yɛ ɩ han, m hʋrlɛ ma, kʋ m ta Masedʋan ʋ bɩ, gɔɔta ɩ nyɩnta Efɛɛzɩ ʋ, k'ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋʋaar hɔ dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ da jɩm ʋ.
A hɩ ŋ nɩ sɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ biisi minno kan yaabɔɔ tɔrɔ gaandarɛrɔ sʋʋra jintoo wɔɔ kɩ to. Minno wɔɔ duro, bɩsɩkarɛ ŋn'ɩ zɛm nɩ bala, ŋ bɩr a dam Woso hɔɔnhɔ barɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a dɔm sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ han y.
Meerbaa naa do ba ɩbɩɩ nawʋm kan ŋ kɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋnɩ heer hu yɩ, kʋ ŋʋarɛ n nyɩnta ŋ heer ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa yɩ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka paan•••.
Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a gʋ zaa kʋ wɔɔ hɩnka naa ma, ŋnɩ nyaam, meerbaa yaarsɩrɔ nɔ ʋ.
Ŋ ʋ, Woso lɛrɔ hɔdonno n a mɩ, an bɔkarɛ hɔ kʋ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n'a hɩm, ŋn'ɩ som la kan paŋŋa kɩ bɩ, ŋn'a jɩ dɔ y.
Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋa, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gʋaa ɩ zuŋ ʋ amba a a ga m bɩ m.

Ʋ a tɔ da ʋ nɔ ʋ, ʋ ʋ, n nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ tɔ ma y, a ka n y'a ʋ bayɛrɛzannɔ tɔ ma, kan bɩsɩkənno kɩ, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ, mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr Woso daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso hɔ gore bɔŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a zɩrɔ kan a dɔɔ kɩ meeyaa bɔŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ kan gərzenno kɩ,
jaandənno kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ yaarɔ wʋta kan kʋ kɩ zannɔ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋna ŋnɩ ŋ hɛɛ zannɔ kɩ, ŋʋaarzannɔ kɩ, kan ŋʋaarkasɛtɩzannɔ kɩ. Lɛ bɩ ka n y'a ʋ sɔ mim haay k'a nɩ hɔdɩndarɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ zarm tɔ ma.
Hɔdɩndarɛ naa do a ga kʋ ʋ kan lemim nyɩnta kʋ Woso a da mɔɔ wɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ. Lemim bɩ do nɩ Woso k'a a so heernyɔɔ ʋ bɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ hɩnkarɛ.
Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam wɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu m barka, k'a paŋŋa ka mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a zi ba bɩ minto. Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam nɩ barka k'a gɩnga a ʋ, mɔɔ n ga a zibəə bɩ m an mɔɔ da ʋ bɩ minto.
A n bɔkarɛ biisi bɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta n meerbaa bʋnyaa ba ma, m fɩr ka a gʋɔɔ ma, m a sʋnsɔ wʋ. Bɩ, a mɔɔ cicir zɛ, bala, badɔ ɩ mɔɔ da naa haay barɛ ma, kʋ mɔɔ n sɩra ka bɩ tɔ ma.
Wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ barka ka mɔɔ ʋ gʋta, an a ka mɔɔ n sɩra ka, m nɩ ŋʋarɛ m Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ.
Meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ ma ba naa, sɩra m, gʋaa haay a ga m, an a si mɩŋŋa: "Krista Yeezuu bʋr durnya ʋ, k'a bɩ mimbʋnyaabənno bʋmbɔ." Bɩ, mɔɔ mimbʋnyaa barɛ ɩ lɛ da.

Bɩ, Woso mɔɔ cicir zɛ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Krista Yeezuu a bʋraama gʋta hɩnka mɔɔ gʋr zi mɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ m mimbʋnyaabər gʋta k'a lɛ da bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ m yɩ makra gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ sɩra ka ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, ŋn'a da ʋ dɔmɩm haay, an cir an nɩ cirbəə m dɔmɩm haay, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa m tee•••, gʋaa bɩr a mɩŋŋa yɩrɛ y, a deem m Woso. Amina.
M nyɩ Timote, ɩ b'ɩ dʋndɔ mɔɔ nawʋm, amba wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʋrɛ meerbaa zannɔ nyɩnta ŋ n'ɩbɩɩ mim hɩ bɩ m, hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a hɩ bɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ, ɩ sa ɩ zoobarɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ bam.
Zoo bɩ ba sɩrakarɛ m, kan hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa kɩ m. Hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ do, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a to, a tore bɩ n a ka ŋ sɩrakarɛ n a zar.
Yimene kan Alɛsandɩr k'ɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro barla, mɔɔ wɔ daa ŋ ma Sʋtaana wɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔɔn ka, kʋ ŋ b'a ya ŋnɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋ y.
Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m n'a yɛm bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ, kʋ gʋɔɔ n yaa da Woso m gʋɔɔ haay tɔ ma, a ŋ mim haay da Woso wɔ ʋ, a yaa da m barka ŋ tɔ ma.
K'a yaa da cinno wɔɔ tɔ ma, kan lɛɛzannɔ haay kɩ tɔ ma sɔ, k'ʋ nyɩnta laafɩɩ nɔ ʋ, ʋ bɩr zum Woso ʋ zenyy•••, mɩsɩrbaa zore nɔ ʋ kan daʋrɛ kɩ.
Naa m mɩŋŋa, an Woso kʋ wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ nɔ yɩ,
a lɛ taa kʋ gʋɔɔ haay n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋnɩ sɩra dɔ.
Bala, Woso deem n ta ʋ, gʋaa deem taan••• nɩ gʋɔɔ zɛm kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ, Krista Yeezuu m.
A ɩ yɛ an a mɩŋŋa ka zɛ ma, kʋ gʋɔɔ haay n bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ. Dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a b'a ku an naa ba bɩ, a yɩ kasɛtɩ, an a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Woso lɛ taa k'a gʋaa haay bʋmbɔ.
Naa mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m Woso n mɔɔ bɔ ʋ kʋ m yɩ a lemim padər, an mɔɔ ba kristazibəəzaa, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩm, mɔɔ bɩr ŋʋaar barɛ y, mɔɔ cɩnta a ʋ, kʋ m sɩrakarɛ kan sɩra kɩ dɩnda do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ gʋɔɔ yaarɔ wɔɔ n yaa da Woso m, lɛɛ haay ʋ, ŋn'a wɔrɔ busu brama kʋ mimbʋnyaa bɩ nyɩnta ŋ gʋr zi y, ŋ bɩ nɔmaa kan nyaa kɩ to a heer ʋ ŋnɩ yaa bɩ da y.

Kʋ lannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa, kʋ ŋ nɩ huu k'a ga kʋ ʋ ba du a ma, ŋnɩ bɩr sappɩ, mɩŋŋahɩnkarɛ ba ŋ zi y, ŋ b'a ka mim kʋsɩrɛ waasɩ ma, gɛɛ sarma nyɛɛnnɔ ma y, gɛɛ busoo gʋta huu ma, gɛɛ mɩŋŋabankarɛ waasɩ ma y.
Bɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a ka zi mɩŋŋa barɛ ma, bala, lannɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, a ɩ zum Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a ga a wʋm kʋ ŋ n'a ba ncɩnaaʋ.
Hɔdɩndarɛ wakatɩ ʋ, lannɔ wɔɔ a ga m, ŋnɩ zɛ sɩɩ•••, ŋnɩ yɛ hɔ haay ma.
Mɔɔ bɩ yɛm kʋ lannɔ n hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ yaarɔ m, ŋn'a so ŋ ʋ y, a a ga m, ŋnɩ zɛ sɩɩ•••.
Bala, Adam Woso lɛɛ ka an a da, Ɛɛvɩ n bɔkarɛ an a nya ʋ.
Adam bɛɛ Sʋtaana bra ba nɩ y, Ɛɛvɩ a bra ba m, an yɛ, an bɩsɩ ka Woso lɛ ma.
