Bɩ, k'a yɛ nyɩdazaambaa ma an a tʋntɔ ʋ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, mɩŋŋabaa kɩ, mɩŋŋazerle kɩ, a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm.
Sɩra m, meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ba naa m, kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa k'a ka wosogʋɔɔ lɛɛ, zibəə mɩŋŋa a ʋ k'a ba.

Bɩ, kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzaa a ga m, an bɩr gʋaa kʋ n bɩ mim yɩrɛ n a hɩ ma y, a lʋ m bɩr deem, an bɩr gʋaa k'a a da a mɩŋŋa ma zaa, hɔɔndamimmazaa, nyasʋ a mɩŋŋa m zaa, an bɩr saanɔɔ sim mɩŋŋa a har ʋ, an n'a dam ma an hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m.
A bɩ yɩ bɛɛmirezaa waasɩ y, a bɩ yɩ wɔkaarɛzaa nyaa bɩncɛ ʋ y, bɩ k'an yɩ kʋmarɛzaa, laafɩɩkamazaa, a bɩ yɩ busooŋʋarɛzaa y.
K'an dɩga a har mim ma mɩŋŋa, an a da a nyɩnɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr zuŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr a daŋ ʋ hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
Bala, kʋ gʋaa n a da ma an nyasʋ a har mim m mɩŋŋa, a y'a bam lɔ k'a a da ma, a nyasʋ Woso gʋɔɔ sokʋma nɩ?
Kʋ gʋaa k'a yɩ kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzaa, a n a ga m, an yɩ sɩrakarɛzaa daa y, kʋ m bɛɛ m, a y'a mɩŋŋa busum, an dʋdɔyarlɛ kʋ Sʋtaana a yɩ bɩ yɩ.
A a ga m sɔ, k'a kasɛtɩ m bɩr mɩŋŋa gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr zum Krista ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zi, kʋ n b'a da ma, n a gore bɔ ʋ y, k'a b'a da Sʋtaana baŋŋa ʋ y.
Daahanzannɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, ŋnɩ yɩ mɩsɩrbaa zore zannɔ, sɩrazannɔ, ŋ bɩ yɩ bɛɛmirezannɔ waasɩ y, ŋ bɩ yɩ zambʋ hɔkamazannɔ y.
Ŋ y'a ga m, ŋnɩ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩra kʋ sɩrakarɛ a hɩnka bɩ nɔ ʋ, hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa m.
K'a lɛɛ ka a ŋ ka lɛɛ, a dɩga ŋ ma, kʋ mim ba ŋ gʋr zi, k'a bɔkarɛ a ŋ da daahanbaa zibəə b'ʋ.
Daahanzannɔ kʋ lannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa m, ŋ bɩ yɩ meerbaa bʋnyaa ba gʋɔɔ ma zannɔ y, ŋn'a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ yɩ jɩnalɛrazannɔ hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
Daahanzaa biyəə lʋ a ga m an bɩr deem, an a da a nyɩnɔ ma mɩŋŋa, an dɩga a har mim ma mɩŋŋa.
Bala, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ daahanbaa zi bam mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ gore daʋrɛ yɩrɛ ŋnɩ heerkoodəbaa gʋta yɩ sɩra ka Krista Yeezuu ʋ zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam kʋ m bʋr ɩbɩɩ zi zɔɔ, bɩ naa haay gʋrsɩra mɔɔ ba ɩbɩɩ ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ,

kʋ mɔɔ bʋr m bɩr zɛm zɔɔ, k'ɩbɩɩ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a a ga m, an bɩr bam Woso gʋɔɔ gʋr zi bɩ dɔ. Wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma bɩ m, Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ y'a so ʋ, sokʋma bɩ do n ta hɔdɩndarɛ k'a m sɩra bɩ m, an n'a kam gʋɔɔ n'a dɔrɛ.

Wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ hɔ gʋta k'a nyaakʋm da Woso n a hɩnka bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an bɩsɩ ka ma y. A a hɩnka mɛsim nɔ ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩnka gʋaa tɩrga, malɛɛkarɔ m dɩga a. N n'a mim pa da do vantɔɔ zi. Gʋɔɔ sɩra ka ʋ durnya nɔ ʋ jilli. Woso n a busu an a nyɩnta lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ arzana ʋ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ paan••• a ʋ, jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ sɩrakarɛ tore, ŋnɩ yɛ brabagʋɔɔ m zinəro ma, kan hɔdɩndarɛrɔ kʋ zinəro wɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ, gʋɔɔ nɩ ŋ dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ ma.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔ bam ɩ ʋ, gʋɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n ŋ mɩ, ŋn'ɩ ŋʋaar bam nɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋn'a nyʋnnyɔɔ, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro heer ga, amba sɛ tɩr na hɔ ma bɩ m, nyannɩ ba ŋ nɩ fɩɩga y.

Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, gʋɔɔ bɩ lʋ ka cɛ ʋ dɔ y, bɩ lannɔ bɩ cɛ ka sɔ y, ŋ hɔbɩrɛrɔ niŋŋoo bɩrɛ cizɛm, an bɔkarɛ Woso ɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro da sɩrakarɛzannɔ tɔ ma, bala, brɔɔ sɩra dɔ, kʋ ŋ nɩ barka yaa da Woso nɩ, ŋn'a dɔ ŋnɩ ŋ bɩ.
Bala, hɔ haay kʋ Woso a da bɩ mɩŋŋa, kʋ gʋɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka ŋn'a dɔ ŋn'a sarɛ, ʋ n'ʋ ga m, ʋ dɩga deem taan••• ma hɔ bʋnyaa y.
Bala, Woso lemim bɩ kan wɔɔ yaadarɛ kɩ y'a hu bɔm.
Naa dɩnda sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m, k'ɩbɩɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ, ɩbɩɩ yɩm Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩ k'an mɩŋŋa, bɩ n'a hɩnkam sɔ a ʋ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ tʋrm sɩrakarɛ lemim bɩ m, kan sɩra hɔdɩndarɛ k'ɩ nɩ yɛm ma mɩŋŋa bɩ kɩ.
Ɩ bɩ yɛ biisi minno yaarsɩrɔ wɔɔ dɩndarɛ ma y, ŋ bɩr a dam gʋaa han sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ y. Ɩ bɩr ɩ tʋntɔŋ ʋ kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ barɛ kɩ.

Bala, kʋ gʋaa y'a mɛ paŋŋa dam la tʋntɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ, daahan m, b'a gʋaa bankarɛ bɩ gʋta y, an bɔkarɛ, kʋ gʋaa ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ barɛ, a y'a dam gʋaa han hɔ haay nɔ ʋ. Woso ler bɔ, k'a zaa m mɩsɩrbaa paan••• yɩ tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, kan booti hinni ʋ kɩ.
Meerbaa naa do, sɩra m, gʋaa haay n'a ga m, an a si mɩŋŋa.
Naa minto m, wɔɔ nɩ yɛm kɔrɛ ma, ʋ n'ʋ yoŋ ʋ, bala, Woso k'a m mɩsɩr bɩ wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ. A m gʋaa haay bʋmbɔrɛzaa, bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ an nɩ ŋ bʋmbɔm.
Naa, ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ hɩ paan•••, ɩ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m.

Ɩ b'a ka gɔsɩ n ɩ gore bɔ ʋ, k'ɩ m gʋaa poo bɩ tɔ ma y. Bɩ, a ka k'ɩ yɩ makra mɩŋŋa sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ mɩm ʋ, ɩ meerbaa nɔ ʋ, ɩ tarɛ nɔ ʋ, ɩ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'an mɩŋŋa Woso mɩm ʋ barɛ nɔ ʋ.
Ɩ bɩr ɩ tɔŋ ʋ, kan Woso lemim bɩ karɩnda barɛ kɩ, gʋɔɔ sokʋma nɔ ʋ. Ɩ tɔ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ dʋndɔrɛ kɩ, kan hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m kɩ, k'an ta an mɔɔ bʋrlɛ ku.
Ɩ bɩ ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso a ka ɩ ʋ, k'ɩ zi bam bɩ to y. A ka k'a ʋ ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ, nyɩnta ʋ kan wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʋrɛ meerbaa zannɔ kɩ, kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ y'a wɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ra kɩ sɔ.
Naa ɩbɩɩ ga m, ɩ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ ɩ heer ʋ, ɩ ɩ tʋntɔ ʋ kan a zibəə kɩ, gʋaa woo••• n a dɔ ŋ ʋ ɩ y'ɩ yoŋ ʋ, ɩ nɩ tam lɛɛ.
Dundo ɩ mɩŋŋa zi, ɩ dundo hɔ k'ɩ n'a dɩndam gʋɔɔ m bɩ zi, ɩ bɩr ɩ tɔŋ ʋ kan naa haay kɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ ba ncɩnaaʋ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ mɩŋŋa yɔm, ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr karɛ ɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ yɔ sɔ.
Ɩ bɩ həən si gʋaa gusire ma kan paŋŋa kɩ y, bɩ, dɩga ma ɩ zɩ, ɩ dʋndɔ. Nyukumbonno wɔɔ dʋndɔ danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ.
Ɩ lannɔ gusinno wɔɔ dʋndɔ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ dɔɔ m, lannɔ pooro wɔɔ dʋndɔ kan heer hu kɩ, ɩ ʋ, ɩ danlʋrɔ m.
Zonno kʋ ŋ gɔsɩ ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, nyasʋ ŋ nɩ kan daʋrɛ kɩ.

Zoro k'a nyɩnɔ n ta ʋ gɛɛ a yaŋŋɔɔ, nyɩnɔ wɔɔ, gɛɛ yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a ga m, ŋn'a yɩrɛzannɔ nyasʋm dɩnda. Naa ŋ y'a ga m, ŋn'a ba, a Woso zuure bɩ nɔ ʋ. Kʋ ŋ yɩrɛzannɔ wɔɔ nyasʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ nyasʋ ŋ nɩ sɔ. Woso n'a ŋʋam bɩ m naa.
Kʋ zoro k'an zoro paan••• an gɔɔta a deem bɩ nɩ, yo b'ʋ Woso ma, an nɩ yaa dam tee••• sinuu ʋ kan gunuu ʋ kɩ, an nɩ daahan yɛm Woso han.
Bɩ, kʋ zoro k'a n'a kam mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ma bɩ nɩ, a mɩsɩr mɩnyaa dɩgarɛ nɔ ʋ, bɩ, sɩra nɔ ʋ, gər m Woso mɩm ʋ.
Ŋ bɔ zaa ʋ meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro m, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ mim yɩ ŋ gʋr zi k'a dɩnda y.
Kʋ gʋaa bɩr nyasʋrɛ a hargʋɔɔ nɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, a jɛɛrzannɔ nɩ y, a zaa sɩrakarɛ bɔ a jɛ m, a bʋnyaabaa lɛ da basɩrakarɛzaa m.
K'ɩ ʋ k'ɩ zoro tɔ da zombaa daahan ci b'ʋ, a a ga m, kʋ zoro bɩ do dɔɔraa m busɔrdɩ ku, bɩ nyɩnta a ʋ, gʋaa deem taan••• lʋ sɔ.
A a ga m sɔ, gʋɔɔ n a zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ kasɛtɩ ka, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a a nyɩnɔ tʋr mɩŋŋa, a saanɔɔ si mɩŋŋa a har ʋ, an wosogʋɔɔ gannɔ sʋrgɔ, an a da cicirzannɔ han, an zi mɩŋŋa do haay ba.
Kʋ zonno pooro wɔɔ nɩ, ɩ bɩ ŋ tɔ da ci b'ʋ y, bala, kʋ gʋaayar sʋra bʋr an ta ŋ nɩ, bɩ ŋ y'a gʋ Krista zuure ma, ŋn'a ŋʋam k'a a ya a zim sa.
A ba kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, n yɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yarlɛ, bala, ŋ n jɩm a lɛ ra lɛɛkarɛ ler kʋ ŋ y'a bɔ Krista m bɩ nɔ ʋ y.
A n ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, mim ŋ y'a ka nyɩnta vam m, ŋn'ɩ gʋɔɔ harlɛrɔ sam, an lɛ da bɩ, a lɛ n'a zum gʋɔɔ minno ʋ, ŋ bɩr dundore a zi y, hɔ k'a n'a ga hɩrɛ m bɩ, bɩ ŋn'a hɩm.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa kʋ zonno pooro wɔɔ n'a ya ŋnɩ cɛ ka, ŋnɩ nyɩnɔ yɩ, ŋnɩ dɩga a jɛɛr mim ma mɩŋŋa, kʋ ŋ bɩ zaa ka wɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'a da ma, ŋn'a bʋnyaa hɩ wɔɔ ma y.
Bala, zonno pooro wɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a bɔ zaa tɩrga b'ʋ kara, ŋn'ɩ zum Sʋtaana ʋ.
Kʋ lʋ sɩrakarɛzaa ɩ zonno m a har gʋɔɔ barla, k'an nyasʋ ŋ nɩ, a b'a to kʋ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma n kɔ ŋ tɔ ma y, k'an a da ma, an a da zonno kʋ ŋ gʋɔɔ ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ han.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ m ŋn'a zi bam mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a ga daʋrɛ m gallɛm hɩɩya, an lɛ da bɩ, niŋŋoo kʋ ŋ nɩ kɔm kan Woso lemim padarɛ zibəə kɩ, hɔdɩnda gʋɔɔ m zibəə kɩ rɔ wɔɔ.
Bala, Wosoci b'a hɩ a ʋ: Ɩ bɩ hɔ du der k'a n'ɩ yɩr zɔm bɩ lɛ ma y. A a ya, an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Zibəəzaa a ga m, an a zibəə nyɔɔdʋ yɩ.
Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a ʋ, lɛɛzaa mim ba, kʋ gʋaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʋ n a hɩ ŋ ʋ, a mim bɩ do ba denter y, ɩ bɩ mim bɩ do si sɩra y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mimbʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ, həən si ŋ ma gʋɔɔ woo••• lɛɛ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ m nyi ba, ŋnɩ dundo a zi.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, Woso kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ, Woso malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ, k'ɩ zu hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m haay naa ʋ, ɩ bɩ jirə bɔ k'ɩ zɛ gʋaa m gumə ma y, gɛɛ k'ɩ gumə ka ʋ y.
Ɩ b'ɩ wɔ ka gɔsɩ mim la nyagɩra m, k'an zi ba wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla y, ɩ bɩ gasʋ gʋaa mimbʋnyaa ʋ y. Dundo ɩ mɩŋŋa zi, k'a bʋnyaa b'a nɔ ɩ ma y.
Ɩ bɩ gɔɔta ɩ bɩr hi mire a minto bala y, dɩvɛn mi poore, ɩ nɔ k'a tɩr busum an tɩr ɩ dam kɔrɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
Gʋɔɔ niŋŋoo mimbʋnyaarɔ ɩ yɩm garga ra, bɩ n ŋ dʋdɔ ka cɩna y, gɔsɩnnɔ hɔɔ bɩr dɔm zɔɔ y, ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ dɔ n tɩr a ʋ jɛ ʋ.
Zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ do m bɩ sɔ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ hɔɔ tɩr yɩm garga ra, nɔɔ zibəə bɩr yɩm garga ra lɛɛm nɩ y, bɩ ŋ zɛm bɩ bɔ garga ra.
Gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ lɔmbaa kɔrɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ a ga m, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ a ga daʋrɛ m. Kʋ gʋɔɔ bɩ Woso tɔ zar y, kʋ ŋ bɩ wɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ tɔ zar sɔ y.

Lɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ zannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ b'a hɩ ŋ ʋ, a hɔdeem kan ŋ kɩ Krista danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ gore bɔ ʋ y. A ga a ʋ m, ŋnɩ ŋ zi ba mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa denter an lɛ da, kʋ sɩrakarɛzannɔ m, ŋ bɔɔ m ŋnɩ ŋ ŋʋam, ŋn'ɩ ŋ zi bam bɩ tɔ ma. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ga m, ɩ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m, ɩ ŋ dʋndɔ m bɩ n naa.
Kʋ gʋaa ɩ hɔ vanta dɩndam, a bɩr yɛm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista sɩra meerbaarɔ wɔɔ ma y, b'a bɩr yɛm hɔdɩndarɛ k'a ga kʋ ʋ ba kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ kɩ ma sɔ,

gʋaa bɩ do bɩ, mɩŋŋabusurezaa m. A n hɔsɩ dɔ y, bɩsɩkarɛ waasɩ yaaba n ta m, an n'a kam ma k'a nyaa ba meerbaanyɩrɔ tɔ ma. Naa nɩ zɛm lɛtaama bʋnyaa m kan kʋmarɛwar kɩ, kʋ tɔ zarlɛ kɩ, hɔɔn da kʋ ma bʋnyaa kɩ m.
A ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔɔn m daŋŋada rɔ wɔɔ dam bɩsɩkarɛ jintoo ma, bala, ŋ n sɩra dɔ y, ŋn'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʋ, sɩrakawosoʋ bɩ, hɔnyɩ yɩrɛ zaa m.
Denter m, sɩrakawosoʋ bɩ, hɔnyɩ gʋta m, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ʋ, ɩ y'ɩ zergam hɔ k'ɩ m ta m bɩ rɛ.
Bala, bʋr kʋ wɔɔ ʋ durnya ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ n bʋr hɔsɩ nɩ y, wɔɔ y'ʋ bɔm sɔ ʋ wɔ m vam.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ m kan huu kɩ m, naa a ga m, an wɔɔ bɔ.
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam ma k'a ba hɔnyɩzannɔ wɔɔ, a do ŋ nawʋm makra nɔ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ gasʋm lɛtaamarɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋnyaa baŋŋa nɔ ʋ. Lɛtaamarɔ wɔɔ duro nɩ gʋɔɔ dam zaarbarɛ kan nyaanlɛ kɩ ma.
Bala, mimbʋnyaarɔ do haay məsi m busoo ŋʋarɛ m. Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a nyʋnnyɔɔ ŋn'a ba sɩrakarɛ ma laatʋ, ŋn'ɩ fɩr do y'a hʋnhɔ yɩm a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, busoo ŋʋarɛ kʋ ŋ gasʋ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
B'ɩbɩɩ, Woso gʋaa n'ɩ mɩ, ɩ ba laatʋ naa woo••• ma, ɩ ɩ tɔ ʋ kan tɩrgabaa zibəə kɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ kɩ, kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ, ŋʋarɛ kɩ, tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ, nyɩntabaa kɩ.
Zoo mɩŋŋa kʋ sɩrakarɛ zoo m bɩ ba, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ. Ɩbɩɩ bir Woso ʋ bɩ tɔ ma, ɩbɩɩ m nyɩnta ɩ yɛ ma, ɩ ɩ sɩrakarɛ bɔ ɩ lɛ ma mɩŋŋa gʋɔɔ cir lɛɛ.
Kʋ m lɛ cɩnta ɩ m, Woso k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam hɔ haay ʋ bɩ taa, kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ taa, bɩ nyɩnta an a sɩrakarɛ kasɛtɩ ka mɩŋŋa Pɔns Pɩlatɩ taa.
Lɛ kʋ mɔɔ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: Zu hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m haay b'ʋ, ɩ nyasʋ m kʋ dintim b'a nɔ ma y, kʋ minsi bɩ nyɩnta ɩ gʋr zi sɔ y, kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista n tolle ba an a bɔ an bʋr.
A zɛm dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta k'an b'ʋr ma b'ʋ, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ lɛ da haay, a y'a so heernyɔɔ ʋ, a m cinno haay Cir, a m zuubarɔ haay Zuuba,
a mɩŋŋa y'a deem taan••• ɩ bɩr garɛ y, lɛɛgure kʋ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a zɔ ma nɔ an nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ, gɔsɩ n a yɩ y, bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a yɩ y. A y'a so lɛbɔʋrɛ ʋ kan paŋŋa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ kɩ! Amina.

A hɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ m durnya naa do nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, ɩ ʋ, ŋ b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu, bɩ ŋ bɩ yo hɔnyɩ ma y, bala hɔ cenlezaa m. Bɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ yo Woso ma, a m nɩ hɔ woo••• kam wɔɔ ʋ gʋta, kʋ wɔɔ m bɩr ta ŋ nɩ, ʋ ʋ heer nyɔɔ ŋ nɩ.
A hɩ ŋ nɩ ɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba, ŋn'a ba zi mɩŋŋa barɛzannɔ gʋtɔɔ, ŋnɩ yɩ hɔkarɛzannɔ, ŋn'a da gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ han a hɔnyɩ bɩ m.
Kʋ ŋ y'a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, hɔnyɩ mɩŋŋa k'a b'a zarlɛ, ŋn'a cɩntarɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ m booti hinni tɔ ma, k'a bɩ mɩsɩrbaa paan••• yɩ.
Timote ra, nyasʋ hɔ kʋ Woso a da ɩ wɔ ʋ bɩ m, ɩ b'ɩ lɛ zu meerbaarɔ yaarsɩrɔ kʋ bɩsɩkawosoma meerbaarɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ʋ y, kan bɩsɩkarɛ kʋ n n'a hɩm ma hɔdɔrɛ, bɩ ŋʋaar hɔdɔrɛ m b'ʋ y.
Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ sɩrakarɛ to ŋn'a nyʋnnyɔɔ, kʋ ŋ ʋ, a ta hɔdɔrɛ naa do m bɩ tɔ ma. Bɩ, kʋ Woso barka n nyɩnta kan ɩ kɩ!
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol ɩ ci naa do ba, Woso ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʋ, kʋ mɔɔ n yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa, kʋ m mɩsɩrbaa kʋ Woso a ler bɔ, wɔɔ n'a yɩm Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ pa da.
Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, Timote, mɔɔ nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, m n'ɩ ŋʋam, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ kʋ Zɩ Woso, kan wɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu kɩ n barka, kan cicirzɛrɛ kɩ, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka ɩ ʋ.
Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka, a zi mɔɔ n'a bam kan noom hu kɩ, amba mɔɔ yaabɔɔ zu ʋ bɩ m. Sinuu ʋ kan gunuu ʋ kɩ mɔɔ yaadarɛ nɔ ʋ haay, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma, m n'a barka darɛ.
Nyi k'ɩbɩɩ ka bɩ tɔ ɩ mɔɔ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam paan••• kʋ m m ya, m ɩ yɩ, kʋ m heer n nyɔɔ gʋta.
Sɩra k'ɩbɩɩ ka denter bɩ, a tɔ ɩ mɔɔ nɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ yaabalʋ Loyis ɩ nyɩnta sɩrakarɛ bɩ do m, ɩ da Enis nyɩntam sɔ. Bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ta sɩrakarɛ bɩ do m sɔ.
Naa minto m, mɔɔ nɩ m ya, m n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, m ʋ, ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso a ka ɩ ʋ k'ɩ zi ba m, mɔɔ nɩ m wɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ra ɩbɩɩ n a yɩ bɩ, zi ba m.
Bala, Ɛspri kʋ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ bɩr wɔɔ dam nyibəə ma y, bɩ, paŋŋa kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, daamɩŋŋama kɩ an n'a kam wɔɔ ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ɩ bɩ nyannɩ zɛ wɔɔ Zuuba kasɛtɩ karɛ ma y, ɩ bɩ nyannɩ zɛ mɔɔ tɔ ma kʋ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ a tɔ ma bɩ minto sɔ y. Bɩ, yo Woso paŋŋa ma, ɩ yɛ fɩr ma lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma am mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.

Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ yɔ, wɔɔ bir a ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ a gʋɔɔ. A n naa ba, wɔɔ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ tɔ ma y, a mɩŋŋa hɔɔnhɔ kan barka k'a n'a kam bɩ kɩ tɔ ma m. Barka bɩ do ka a ʋ wɔɔ ʋ, Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya n a sɩŋŋɩda ba y.
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa Krista Yeezuu k'a bʋr bɩ, barka bɩ do a hɩnka garga ra. Bala, a zɛ paŋŋa zaar ba, an mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ hɩnka lemim nyɩnta bɩ m.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do padarɛ tɔ ma m, Woso n mɔɔ bɔ ʋ, kʋ m yɩ a padarɛzaa, kristazibəəzaa, a hɔdɩndarɛzaa.

Bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ fɩr naa yɩm, bɩ fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ nyannɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ y, bala, gʋaa kʋ mɔɔ sɩra ka ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ zaa dɔ mɩŋŋa, bɩ mɔɔ heer kookoo sɔ, m a dɔ m ʋ, a ɩ paŋŋa m k'a dɔ hɔ k'a a da mɔɔ wɔ ʋ bɩ ma, k'an ta an a zɛrɛ hinni ku.
Yo sɩra meerbaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ba kan ɩ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ jɩm sɩrakarɛ kan ŋʋarɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Dɔ hɔdɩndarɛ mɩŋŋa kʋ n y'a da ɩ wɔ ʋ bɩ ma, ɩ dɔ ma Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa k'a nɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ m.
Ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, kristagʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Azii kʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ haay a bɔ mɔɔ ʋ, Fizɛl kan Hɛrmozɛnnɩ kɩ yɩ ŋ barla sɔ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ Woso n'a cicirzɛrɛ kərgu Onezifɔɔr hargʋɔɔ ra, bala, a tɩr mɔɔ heer ba kookoo dɔmɩm niŋŋoo ʋ, nyannɩ n a nyasʋ mɔɔ dure bɩ tɔ ma y.
Bala, bʋr k'a ʋ Rɔm ʋ naa ʋ bɩ, a a ka mɔɔ bɩncɛ ma paan•••, an aa mɔɔ yɩ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ Zuuba n a ka, k'an Woso ba mɩŋŋa yɩ, Zuuba mɩŋŋa zɛrɛ hinni ʋ. Ɩbɩɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa sɔ ɩ ʋ, nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ ʋ Efɛɛzɩ ʋ bɩ, a a da mɔɔ han gʋta.
K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, m nyɩ, ɩ paŋŋa da ra, barka kʋ wɔɔ n ta m Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ma gʋɔɔ cir lɛɛ bɩ, a dɩnda gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyasʋm nɩ mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ m, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a dɩnda gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ m sɔ.
Yɛ fɩryɩrɛ ma am mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m, hɔ kʋ Krista Yeezuu yarbər mɩŋŋa a ga m, an a ba bɩ m naa.
Kʋ yarbər ta yar ma, k'a lɛ taa kʋ yarbənno cir bɩ nɔ n yɩ a ra, a bɩr a kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta har ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ ma y.
A dɔ sɔ ɩ ʋ, kʋ n brasire ganwʋrɛ cɩnta, kʋ gʋaa n zu bra bɩ sire zaa ʋ, n bɩ ganwʋrɛ bɩ kaŋ ʋ y.
Danwur k'a kɔ dam lɛ ra bɩ n nɩ lɛɛ kam an aa dam bɩ wʋrɛ hɔ yɩ.
Ɩ hɔɔn da hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a hɩm naa ma k'ɩ jɩ ma, bala, Zuuba hɔɔn karɛ ɩ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ jɩ ma haay.
Yeezuu Krista tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ, Davɩd do gʋaa m, a a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, amba lemim nyɩnta kʋ mɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ m.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩm, n nɩ mɔɔ du, ɩ ʋ, zibʋnyaabarɛzaa m mɔɔ m. Bɩ, kʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɩ, n a du y.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ yɛm fɩr do haay ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ minto, kʋ brɔɔ n a da ma sɔ, ŋnɩ bʋmbɔrɛ kʋ Krista Yeezuu n'a kam bɩ yɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ gasʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ b'ʋ.
Meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ba naa, sɩra m an a ga sire m: Kʋ wɔɔ ga kan Yeezuu Krista kɩ, wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bam kan kɩ sɔ.
Kʋ wɔɔ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ kan kɩ, wɔɔ cirbəə bɩm kan kɩ sɔ, kʋ wɔɔ bɩsɩ ka ma, a bɩsɩ kam wɔɔ ma sɔ.
Kʋ wɔɔ n jɩm ʋ lɛ ra kan kɩ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ jɩnɩm a lɛ ra tee•••, bala, a b'a dam ma, an bɩsɩ ka a mɩŋŋa ma y.

Meerbaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ba nɔɔn m tɔ da gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ haay, ɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ paan••• Woso lɛɛ, ɩ ʋ, ŋn'a si nyaa kʋ n n'a bam meerbaarɔ tɔ ma lɛɛ. Bala, ŋ hɔsɩ ba ʋ y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ an nɩ ŋ zaar bam.
Ɩ tɔ ʋ k'ɩ yɩ gʋaa k'a a ga m kʋ Woso nɔ n yɩ ra, k'ɩ yɩ zibəəzaa k'a zibəə nyannɩ ba ʋ y, an nɩ sɩra lemim bɩ dɩndam mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa.
Ɩ bɩ yɛ sʋʋra yaarsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr a dam gʋaa han sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ gɔɔtam tee••• ŋnɩ bɩr a bam laatʋ Woso ma.
Ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan nyim k'a nɩ gʋaa mɛ bɩm haay kɩ. Himene kan Filɛtɩ kɩ yɩ ŋ barla.
Ŋ hɔ, ŋnɩ sɩra bɩ to, ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ cem kara, ŋn'a kam gʋɔɔ gʋta n'a bɔm sɩrakarɛ ʋ.

Bɩ, kan naa kɩ haay Woso sɩra bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ, kan cɛjɩr kɩ, an gɔɔta an n'a bɩncɛ ʋ, n nɩ gʋrsɩra ba cɛjɩr bɩ ma, n ʋ: Zuuba a gʋɔɔ dɔ. N n'a ya, n ʋ: Gʋaa k'a ʋ Zuuba gʋaa n'a mɩ bɩ, k'an a gʋ mimbʋnyaa ma.

Cɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ, mɔr y'a hʋnhɔ ta ʋ, n n'a ba sarma m kan wanzurfu kɩ m, n nɩ nɔɔrɔ ba gɔ m kan taa kɩ m. Lɛɛkarɛ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ dɔmɩm gʋta hinni ʋ n nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, n nɩ zi barɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, dɔmɩm biyəə, n yɩ zi yaarsɩrɔ barɛ ŋ nɩ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ gʋaa a gʋ zi bʋnyaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ gaa da rɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hu bɔ, a bɔm mɔr gorezaa rɛ, mɔr k'an zore, an mɩŋŋa Zuuba ma, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ haay tɔ ma.
Ɩ si nyukumbombaa lɛtaamarɔ lɛɛ, ɩ ɩ tɔ ʋ kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, ɩ bɩr ɩ kam tɩrgabaa zibəə ma, sɩrakarɛ ma, kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ, laafɩɩ kɩ ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa dam Zuuba m kan heer hu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, ɩ bɩ yɛ, hɔɔnwar kan badɔ kɩ bɩsɩkarɛrɔ wɔɔ ma y, ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, ŋ nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, nyaa m.
A n bɔkarɛ, Zuuba zibəənyɩ n a ga m, an nyaa ba y, a ga a ʋ m, an bɩr mɩŋŋa kan gʋaa woo••• kɩ, an a da hɔdɩnda gʋɔɔ m ma, an bɩr bʋraama m.
A a ga m, k'an hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam ma rɔ wɔɔ m, heer bʋgʋ-bʋgʋda m, bala, a a da ma, brɔɔ n a bɔ a taa m, ŋnɩ sɩra dɔ.
Maam bɩ, ŋ hɔɔn zerm, ŋn'a yɔ Sʋtaana k'a ŋ gʋr a baŋŋarɔ ʋ, an ŋ ba a lɔnnɔ, kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔnhɔ ba bɩ m.
A dɔ mɩŋŋa ɩ ʋ, dɔmɩnnɔ jɛzannɔ ʋ, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ yɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.

Bala, gʋɔɔ y'a kam a mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan ma bala, busoo ŋʋarɛ n'a so ŋ ʋ, nyɩnta ŋ nawʋm lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʋ zannɔ, mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ, Woso sʋnsɔwʋrɛzannɔ, bɩsɩ ka a zɩrɔ ma zannɔ, bajindɔrɛzannɔ, Woso hɔ gore bɔʋrɛzannɔ.
Ŋ bɩ nyɩntam ŋʋarɛ m y, ŋ nyɩntam bacicirzɛrɛzannɔ, gʋɔɔtɔzarlɛzannɔ, badaamɩŋŋazannɔ, ŋ nyɩntam bʋnyaa gʋta, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ jɩnnɔ,
bɩmbɩrkʋmazannɔ, badundoamɩŋŋazizannɔ, mɩŋŋabusure n'a so ŋ ʋ maam-maam, ŋ y'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ŋʋarɛ an lɛ da Woso ŋʋarɛ m.
Ŋ y'a hɔ barɛ ɩ ʋ, wosozuurezannɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, bɩ ŋ zibəəro y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Woso paŋŋa bɩ n ŋ mɩsɩrbaa lʋr y. Ɩ gʋ gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma.
Ŋ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ gasʋm gʋɔɔ hadrɔ ʋ sɩɩ•••, ŋnɩ lannɔ hɔɔnwarzannɔ kum hɔɔnkarɛ m, lannɔ wɔɔ duro mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋta, ŋn'ɩ zum a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ haay ʋ.
Ŋ yɩ hɔ dɩndam tee•••, bɩ ŋ bɩr a dam ma ŋn'ɩ sɩra dɔrɛ y.
Amba Zanɛs kan Zambrɛs kɩ a da Moyiisi lɛ ʋ ŋ bɩr yɛm bɩ, gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro sɔ, a da ŋ nawʋm sɩra lɛ ʋ ŋ bɩr yɛrɛ y. Hɔɔn nyaanlɛzannɔ m, ŋ n sɩra ka Woso ʋ denter y.
Bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ ta lɛɛ y, bala, gʋaa woo••• sʋrlɛ ŋ hɔɔnwar zibəə bɩ ra, amba n nyɩnta n nɩ sʋr Zanɛs kan Zambrɛs kɩ hɔ ra bɩ m.
Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, ɩbɩɩ zu mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ ʋ mɩŋŋa, ɩ mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ dɔ, kan mɔɔ gɩngarɔ kɩ, m sɩrakarɛ kɩ, m bʋr m mɩŋŋa ma kɩ, m ŋʋarɛ kɩ, m tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ.
Ɩbɩɩ fɩr kʋ gʋɔɔ a ka mɔɔ ma, kan cicir kʋ mɔɔ yɩ Antɩyɔs kʋ ʋ, kan Ikoniyɔm kʋ ʋ kɩ, Listɩr kʋ ʋ kɩ bɩ dɔ. Mɔɔ fɩr do haay yɩ, bɩ Zuuba mɔɔ yɔ ŋ haay nɔ ʋ.
Pakra m hɔɔ, kʋ gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a zu Woso ʋ mɩŋŋa, Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ gʋɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ, bra bɩmba gʋɔɔ m zannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, ŋ gɔɔtarɛ ŋnɩ bɩr tam lɛɛ zi bʋnyaa barɛ nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr bra bɩmbam gʋɔɔ m ŋnɩ bɩr tarɛ, ŋnɩ bɩr bra bɩmbarɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ m sɔ.
K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, jɩm hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ dɩnda ɩ sɩra ka ʋ paan••• bɩ nɔ ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ. Bala, ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a dɩnda ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ sɩra bɩ.
A n a sa ɩbɩɩ nyɩbaa ma, ɩbɩɩ Wosoci bɩ dɔ, a y'a dam ma an hɔɔn ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ m sɩra ka Krista Yeezuu ʋ, ɩ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Hɔ kʋ n y'a da Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʋ haay bɩ, Woso Ɛspri y'a ka n n'a da ʋ, bɩ, ta an a wʋ ʋ gʋɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ minto, k'a nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ da jɩm ʋ, k'a gʋaa bɔ zaa ʋ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa tɩrga barɛ dɩnda gʋaa m.
Kʋ Woso gʋaa mɩsɩrbaa n bankarɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa, k'a n a da ma an zi mɩŋŋa do haay ba.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ han paan••• Woso mɩm ʋ, kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ mɩm ʋ, bɩ zɛm bɩ gʋɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ kan gəəno kɩ dʋdɔ ka, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, hinni k'a nɩ zɛŋ ʋ k'a bɩ cirbəə bɩ bɩ tɔ ma sɔ,

k'ɩ Woso lemim bɩ pa da, ɩ bɩr som la tee•••. K'a so ra dɔmɩm naanaa, gɛɛ k'a kʋsɩ, k'ɩ gɔɔta ɩ bɩr som la, həən si gʋɔɔ ma, ɩ bɔ ŋ lɛɛ kʋ ŋ n'a mimbʋnyaa to, ŋ heer yo kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa ba, naa haay ba bʋraama gʋta nɔ ʋ, ɩ bɩr hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.

Bala, dɔmɩm zɛm, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋn'a tʋr ka sɩra hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ ma y, bɩ zu ŋ nawʋrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛtaamarɔ ʋ, ŋn'a ka a hɔɔnhɔ karɩnsaambɔɔ ma ŋn'a bɩr a ma yɔɔgʋ, brɔɔ n bɩr hɔ k'an nyɩnta ŋ ma dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
Ŋ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋn'a tʋr ka sɩra ma dɔ y, ŋʋaar minno ŋn'a tʋr karɛ ŋ ma.
B'ɩbɩɩ, bʋr ɩ ma hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, yɛ fɩr ma, lemim nyɩnta padarɛzaa zi ba, zibəə kʋ Woso a ka ɩ ʋ bɩ ba mɩŋŋa.
Bala, kʋ mɔɔ nɩ, wakatɩ a ku kʋ m yɛ zɛ ma. Mɔɔ zɛ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan mannɩ kɩ, mɔɔ hʋrlɛ wakatɩ a ku.
Mɔɔ zoo mɩŋŋa ba, mɔɔ brasire a tɛkka ku, mɔɔ nyasʋ sɩrakarɛ m.

Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso dama ganwʋrɛ cɩnta mɔɔ m, ganwʋrɛ bɩ do bɩ, tɩrgabaa m, an b'a kam mɔɔ ʋ, dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ b'ʋ. A mɩŋŋa m dʋdɔkarɛzaa tɩrga. Mɔɔ bɛɛ an n'a karɛ m ʋ m deem nɩ y, a y'a kam gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ n'a ŋʋam k'an bʋr lɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Ɩ tɔ ʋ, k'ɩ bʋr mɔɔ zi zɔɔ.
Bala, Demas a bɔ mɔɔ ʋ, k'a nɩ her durnya naa ŋʋam bɩ tɔ ma. A a hʋr an ta Tesaloniki ʋ, Gresans ta Galasii ʋ, Tiitɩ ta Dalmasi ʋ.
Likki y'a deem ɩ gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ. K'ɩ bʋr ɩ n nɩ zɛm k'ɩ Markɩ gaa ɩ bʋr m, bala, a y'a dam mɔɔ han gʋta m zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ Tisikkɩ nyɔɔ Efɛɛzɩ ʋ.
K'ɩ zɛm, kɩ bɔ Trowas kʋ ʋ Karpus zi, ɩ nyɛɛm huu kʋ mɔɔ to b'ʋ bɩ sa ɩ bʋr m, ciro wɔɔ gʋr ɩ bʋr ŋ nɩ sɔ, an lɛ da bɩ, n nɩ ŋ ba hɔbɩsɩ ci m nɔ wɔɔ.
Alɛsandɩr, saar bɩ, a zi bʋnyaa ba mɔɔ m gʋta, Zuuba y'a zibəə zɩm kaŋ ʋ.
Dundo ɩ mɩŋŋa zi kan kɩ sɔ, bala, a bɩsɩ ka wɔɔ meerbaarɔ ma gʋta.
Mɔɔ lɛɛkarɛ dʋdɔ bɩ karɛ ma bɩ, gɔsɩ n nyɩnta ʋ k'a a da mɔɔ han y, a bɔ ŋ y'a mɔɔ ʋ haay. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm Woso han, k'a b'a taar ka ŋ la y.
Bɩ, Zuuba a da mɔɔ han an paŋŋa ka mɔɔ ʋ, yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ mɔɔ n zi kʋ n y'a ka mɔɔ ʋ lemim nyɩnta padarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ ba haay, do vantɔɔ gʋɔɔ haay n a ma. Bɩ, Zuuba mɔɔ yɔ taatii bɩ lɛ ʋ!
Zuuba gɔɔtarɛ an mɔɔ yɔ zi bʋnyaa haay wɔ ʋ, an dɔ mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ n gasʋ a cirbəə kʋ ʋ arzana ʋ. A tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay! Amina.
Yaa da Priska kan Akilas kɩ m, yaa da Onezifɔɔr har gʋɔɔ m sɔ.
Erastɩ gɔɔta Korɛntɩ kʋ ʋ. Trofim yaaba zɛ, mɔɔ n a to Milɛ kʋ ʋ.
Ɩ tɔ ʋ ɩ bʋr, kʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm n bɔkarɛ an a ku. Ebulus kan Pudɛns kɩ, Linus kɩ, Klodɩya kan danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ naa ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ k'ɩ yaa darɛ ɩ m.
Bɩ, kʋ Zuuba n bɩr kan ɩ kɩ. Woso barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, Yeezuu Krista zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, kʋ m a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n sɩra ka, ŋnɩ sɩra dɔ, an a ga mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ m,
kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ ta a heer lɛ. Woso ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do ler bɔ wɔɔ m, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya ba ʋ y. Bɩ, Woso bɩr ŋʋaar barɛ y.
Dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a b'a ku bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do hɩnka, lemim k'a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ n a pa da bɩ m. Woso mɩŋŋa, k'an wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ, a lɛ ka mɔɔ ʋ, an lemim bɩ do da mɔɔ wɔ ʋ, kʋ m a pa da.
Tiitɩ, ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, mɔɔ nyɩ paan••• n'ɩbɩɩ m, sɩrakarɛ deem kʋ wɔɔ m ta m bɩ nɔ ʋ. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa Krista Yeezuu kɩ n barka, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka ɩ ʋ.
Ɩbɩɩ to mɔɔ ʋ Krɛtɩ kʋ ʋ b'ʋ, k'ɩ gɔɔta ɩ hɔ k'a n bankarɛ yɩ cɩna bɩ banka, k'ɩ gʋɔɔ nyʋkɔ ʋ, ɩ ŋ ba kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ Krɛtɩ kʋnɔ rɔ wɔɔ biyəə nɔ ʋ, amba hɔ kʋ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m bɩ m.
K'ɩ ʋ k'ɩ lɛɛzaa bɔ ʋ, a a ga m, an yɩ gʋaa kʋ n bɩ mim yɩrɛ n a hɩ ma y, a lʋ m bɩr deem, a nyɩnɔ m sɩrakarɛzannɔ, ŋ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa bʋnyaa barɛ y, balɛsire zannɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ sɔ y.

Bala, kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ, wosogʋɔɔ nyasʋnzaa m, bɩ minto bɩ, a a ga m, k'an bɩr gʋaa kʋ n bɩ mim yɩrɛ n a hɩ ma y, a n a ga m, an yɩ mɩŋŋabusurezaa, nɔmaazaa, gɛɛ bɛɛmirezaa waasɩ y, a n a ga m, an yɩ wɔkaarɛzaa nyaa bɩncɛ ʋ, gɛɛ zambʋ hɔ kamazaa y.
A a ga m, an bɩr saanɔɔ sim a har ʋ mɩŋŋa, an bɩr zi mɩŋŋabarɛ ŋʋarɛ, an bɩr hɔɔndamimmazaa, an bɩr gʋaa tɩrga, gʋaa k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam, bʋraamazaa.
A a ga m, k'an jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Woso lemim paan••• kʋ ŋ y'a dɩndam bɩ nɔ ʋ. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, a y'a dam ma, an gʋɔɔ dʋndɔ sɩra hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, an bɩsɩkənno da jɩm ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʋkɔ ʋ amba wɔɔ hɩ bɩ m, bala, gʋɔɔ ta ʋ gʋta, an lɛ da bɩ, zɩɩfʋrɔ kʋ ŋ gasʋ baŋŋʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ barla, ŋ bɩr yɛm k'a zu sɩra ʋ y. Ŋ nɩ bra bɩmbam gʋɔɔ m meerbaa yaarsɩrɔ m.
A ka kʋ ŋ n'a meerbaarɔ wɔɔ barɛ to, bala, ŋ yɩ hadrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ gʋɔɔ zaar bam, ŋn'ɩ hɔ k'a n a ga m dɩndam gʋɔɔ m k'a hɔ yɩ, zambʋ hɔ yɩrɛ m.
Krɛtɩ zannɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ gʋaa deem, kʋ ŋ nɩ dɩgam ma a lɛsinnɩsorazaa nyɩnta an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Krɛtɩ zannɔ wɔɔ, ŋʋaarzannɔ m tee•••, poohɔɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, yakʋzannɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, ŋ n hɔ vanta dɔ kʋ hɔbɩrɛ bɛɛ y."
Hɔ kʋ gʋaa b'a hɩ naa, sɩra m, naa minto bɩ, həən si ŋ ma paan•••, kʋ ŋ sɩrakarɛ n yɩ mɩŋŋa.
Kʋ ŋ nɩ zɩɩfʋrɔ hɔdɩndarɛ k'ɩ ʋ noondarɛ m bɩ to, ŋ bɩ zu lɛrɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra to rɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta rɔ wɔɔ ʋ y.

Kʋ gʋaa heer hu ta ʋ, hɔ haay hu ta ʋ sɔ kan kɩ. Bɩ kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ dintinzannɔ m, ŋ bɩr sɩra kam nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, dintim m hɔ haay m kan ŋ kɩ. Bala, ŋ hɔɔndarɛrɔ bʋnyaa, kʋ ŋ y'a bʋnyaa bam sɔ, nyannɩ ba ŋ nɩ y.
Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, a Woso dɔ, bɩ ŋ zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ ʋ, ŋ n Woso dɔ y. Hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ Woso mɩm ʋ, bayɛrɛzannɔ m, ŋ b'a dam zi mɩŋŋa sɩ barɛ ma y.
K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ga kʋ ʋ kan hɔdɩndarɛ k'an sɩra bɩ kɩ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m.
A hɩ gʋɔɔ gusinno wɔɔ m ɩ ʋ, ŋn'a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr daʋrɛ m, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɔɔn dam mim ma mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ bɩr sɩrakarɛ m paan•••, ŋnɩ bɩr ŋʋarɛ denter m, ŋnɩ bɩr a tʋntɔŋ ʋ tee•••.
A hɩ lannɔ gusinno wɔɔ m sɔ ɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam, ŋ bɩ yɩ gʋɔɔ tɔzarlɛzannɔ y, ŋ bɩ yɩ bɛɛmirewaasɩzannɔ y, ŋnɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m.
Ŋ n'a ba ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ lannɔ pooro wɔɔ n hɔɔntaʋrɛ dɩnda a zino kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ ŋʋarɛ minto,
kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr hɔɔndamimmazannɔ, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa zore barɛ, ŋnɩ bɩr nyasʋrɛ a jɛɛr m mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ bɩr nyɩntabaa m, ŋnɩ bɩr yɛrɛ a zino lɛ ma, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ Woso lemim bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ y.
Nyukumbonno wɔɔ dʋndɔ maam sɔ ɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɔɔn dam mim ma mɩŋŋa hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
A ka k'ɩ mɩŋŋa n yɩ makra mɩŋŋa, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ nɔ ʋ, hɔ dɩnda gʋɔɔ m sɩra m kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, a ka k'ɩ hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ, kʋ n n'ɩ gore da ʋ.
A ka k'ɩ meerbaa n bɩr mɩŋŋa, kʋ gʋaa bɩ hɔsɩ yɩ k'a hɩ ɩ ma y, kʋ wɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma, ŋnɩ hɔ bʋnyaa hɩ wɔɔ ma y, kʋ ŋ nɩ nyannɩ bɩ.
Lɔnnɔ wɔɔ dʋndɔ ɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ yɛ a soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ ma hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, ŋ n'a ka ma k'a ŋ heer nyɔɔ, ŋ bɩ bɩsɩ ka ŋ ma y.
Ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ kʋna y, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam tee•••, kʋ ŋ n'a dɔ ŋ ʋ, a ɩ sɩra bam. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Woso kʋ wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ, hɔ kʋ n n'a dɩndam bɩ daʋrɛ yɩm hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
Bala, Woso a barka hɩnka gʋaa haay bʋmbɔrɛ tɔ ma.

Woso barka bɩ n'a ŋʋam bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ bɔ mɩsɩrbaa bʋnyaa haay ʋ, kan durnya naa do lɛtaamarɔ haay kɩ ʋ. K'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ her-her mɩsɩrbaa naa ba mɩŋŋanyasʋrɛ nɔ ʋ, kan tɩrgabaa kɩ, Woso hɔɔnhɔ mɩsɩrbaa kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Ʋ bɩr ʋ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, ʋ bɩr dɔm dɔmɩm nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ, wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa Yeezuu Krista lɛbɔʋrɛ n n'a hɩnkaŋ ʋ bɩ ma, a m wɔɔ Woso a m gʋta.
A a mɩŋŋa ka zɛ ma wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a a da ma, a wɔɔ bʋmbɔ mimbʋnyaa haay nɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ hu bɔ, awɔɔ ba a mɩŋŋa dogʋɔɔ, k'ʋ bɩr zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ ŋʋam tee•••.
Naa haay dɩnda, ɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ heer yo, ɩ ŋ bɔzaa ʋ lɛ kʋ Woso a ka ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ m. Ɩ b'a to kʋ gɔsɩ n'ɩ gore bɔ ʋ y.
A hɩ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m haay, ɩ ʋ, ŋnɩ yɛ kʋ lɛɛzannɔ haay ma, ŋnɩ ŋ lɛ si, ŋnɩ bɩr zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ do haay barɛ ŋʋarɛ.
Ŋ bɩ gɔsɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ y, ŋ bɩ nyaa ba y, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩŋŋabaa bam, ŋnɩ bɩr nyɩnta kan gʋɔɔ haay kɩ.

Bala, wɔɔ nyɩnta biisi sɔ, ʋ n nɩ hɔɔnwar zi bam, ʋ m bayɛrɛzannɔ, ʋ nyaam, mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ do haay kan a hɔɔnhɔrɔ kɩ n'a so wɔɔ ʋ, ʋ n nɩ bʋnyaabaa bam, ʋ n n'ʋ kam ma k'ʋ yɩ am gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ m, ʋ a ka gʋɔɔ m sɔ ʋ m, ʋ sɔ kʋ m.
Bɩ, Woso wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa bɩ, k'a b'a mɩŋŋabaa kan a ŋʋarɛ k'an ta m gʋɔɔ haay tɔ ma bɩ hɩnka bɩ,

a wɔɔ bʋmbɔ vam, a n wɔɔ bʋmbɔ zibəə tɩrga kʋ wɔɔ ba barɛ m tɔ ma y, wɔɔ bʋmbɔ a ʋ, k'awɔɔ cicir zɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ bʋmbɔ a ʋ, an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sʋrgɔ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n yɩrɛ daa ka wɔɔ ʋ, an mɩsɩrbaa daa ka wɔɔ ʋ.
Bala, Woso a ka Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer wɔɔ ra gʋta wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, k'awɔɔ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʋ, a barka tɔ ma, kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ hɔjirlezannɔ, wɔɔ taaheerlɛ bɩ m bɩ sɔ.

Meerbaa kʋ mɔɔ ba naa, sɩra m, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'ɩbɩɩ m bɩr a hɩm paan•••, ɩ bɩr som la, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n bɩr a tʋntɔŋ ʋ ŋnɩ bɩr lɛɛ, kan zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ kɩ tee•••. Zi mɩŋŋa barɛ bɩ, hɔ mɩŋŋa m, a y'a dam gʋɔɔ han sɔ.
Bɩ, ɩ bɩ yɛ bɩsɩkarɛ yaarsɩrɔ ma y, yaabɔɔ tɔrɔ gaandarɛrɔ sʋʋrarɔ ma y, Moyiisi lɛrɔ nyaabarɛ kan ŋ bakʋmarɛ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ y, ŋ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ, bɩ ŋ bɩr a dam gʋaa han sɔ y.
Kʋ gʋaa ɩ gʋɔɔ gʋngʋ kʋ ma zi bam, k'ɩ həən si ma, k'a gɔɔta an nɩ tam lɛɛ, k'ɩ ɩ ya ɩ həən si ma, k'a a gu an nɩ tam lɛɛ k'ɩ bɔ ɩ zi.
Ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, gʋɔɔ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ zaa tɩrga bɩ to, ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ nyaanlɛ hɩnkarɛ.
Mɔɔ Artemas gɛɛ Tisikkɩ nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi. K'a bɩ lee ku, k'ɩ tɔ ʋ ɩ bʋr Nikopolis ʋ mɔɔ zi. Bala, kʋ bɩ do mɔɔ hɔɔn bɔ ʋ, kʋ m nyɩnta ʋ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʋ.
Ɩ tɔ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ da lɛrɔ karɩnsaamba Zenas han, kan Apolɔs kɩ, kʋ hɔsɩ bɩ jɩra ŋ ma, ŋ zaakʋrɛ bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ y.
Wɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, ŋnɩ bɩr a kam ma k'a bɩr lɛɛ kan zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ dɩndarɛ kɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a da gʋɔɔ kʋ hɔ jɩra ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ han. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ barɛ y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ haay rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩ m. Yaa da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ ŋʋam sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m. Bɩ, Kʋ Woso barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, mɔɔ kʋ m nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma, mɔɔ kan wɔɔ danyɩ Timote kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ bam. A ba wɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, Filemɔn, wɔɔ gʋaasɩba n'ɩbɩɩ m, wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ.
A ba wɔɔ nawʋm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma k'a n'a som kʋ ma ɩbɩɩ har ʋ bɩ ma sɔ, kan wɔɔ danlʋ Apɩya kɩ ma, kan lemim nyɩnta zoobarɛkɔɔn Arsip kɩ ma sɔ.
Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka a ʋ.
Filemɔn, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m, bɩ mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ tɔ da m nɔ ʋ, m n'a barka dam tee••• ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma.
Bala, mɔɔ ɩ ŋʋarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma bɩ mim mam, kan sɩrakarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m Zuuba Yeezuu nɔ ʋ bɩ mim kɩ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm Woso han, k'ɩbɩɩ sɩrakarɛ k'awɔɔ zɛ kʋ ra kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ n zi ba, an hɔ mɩŋŋa haay kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ dam ma ʋ a ba Krista zibəə tɔ ma bɩ hɩnka.
M danyɩ, zi k'ɩbɩɩ ba ɩ ŋʋarɛ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ gʋta, an mɔɔ heer wʋta, bala, ɩbɩɩ wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ heer ba kookoo.
Naa minto nɩ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ to m nɩ lɛ m Krista tɔ ma, kʋ m lɛ ka ɩ ʋ, k'ɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa ɩbɩɩ gʋr zi bɩ ba bɩ,
kʋ mɔɔ hɔ bɩ do yɛ ɩbɩɩ han ŋʋarɛ tɔ ma, a jɩra mɔɔ m lɛ kʋ mɔɔ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ m. Ɩɩn••• mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m Pol, gʋaa gusire m mɔɔ m, m nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ kɛɛrɛ, Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma.
M wɔ mɔɔ n'a zɩnzɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, Onezim tɔ ma, a a ba mɔɔ nyɩnnɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa ʋ.
Biisi bɩ a zibəə ba ɩbɩɩ ma y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a zibəə ta ɩbɩɩ ma, a zibəə n ta mɔɔ ma sɔ.
A da mɔɔ nawʋrɛ ɩbɩɩ m zaa ra, a mɩŋŋa a ba hɔdeem kan mɔɔ kɩ kɛɛrɛ.
Kʋ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ m, mɔɔ ŋʋa k'an gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ naa ʋ, k'an bɩr mɔɔ ziro bam ɩbɩɩ bɩncɛ ʋ, lɔnnɔcɛ kʋ mɔɔ n ta ʋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma naa nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m hɔsɩ ba k'ɩbɩɩ n zaa ka y. Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'ɩbɩɩ n zi mɩŋŋa ba mɔɔ m paŋŋa nɩ y, mɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ɩbɩɩ n a ba ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ma.
A a da ma Onezim bɩ, a gʋ a ʋ ɩbɩɩ ma dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, k'an b'a bɔ an bɩ gɔɔta kan ɩ kɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ.

Dɩɩtaa naa, lɔ bɛɛ m bala dɔ y, a lɛ da lɔ m gʋta kɛɛrɛ, a ba a ʋ wɔɔ danyɩ wɔɔ n'a ŋʋam karɩ paan•••. Mɔɔ y'a ŋʋam gʋta paan•••, bɩ ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m ɩ ŋʋa an lɛ da, bala, gʋaa m, bɩ wɔɔ danyɩ m sɔ Krista nɔ ʋ.
K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ dɩgam mɔɔ ma ɩ danyɩ, k'a maam k'ɩ si, amba ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ sim bɩ m.
Bɩ, k'a kʋrɔ ma kan ɩ kɩ, gɛɛ ɩbɩɩ zɩm an ta m, k'ɩ ba mɔɔ mɩŋŋa mim.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ gʋrsɩra naa do bam: "K'a zɩm bɩ wuti karɔ, mɔɔ n n'a karɛ," bɩ pakra bɛɛ m kʋ m a hɩ ɩ m sɔ m ʋ, mɔɔ zɩm ta ɩbɩɩ ra y, ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ m.
Ɩɩn••• m danyɩ, m wɔ mɔɔ n'a zɩnzɛrɛ ɩ m, naa ba m m denter Zuuba tɔ ma. Mɔɔ heer ba kookoo Krista ŋʋarɛ bɩ tɔ ma.
Ci bɩ kʋ mɔɔ n'a barɛ ɩbɩɩ ma naa, a dɔ mɔɔ ʋ paan••• m ʋ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a yɛm bɩ bam, bɩ mɔɔ dɔ sɔ m ʋ, ɩbɩɩ y'a barɛ an cem hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a yɛm bɩ han.
Kʋ m a yɛ ɩ han lɛɛm k'ɩ cɛ banka ɩ cɩnta m m, bala, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɩŋŋa awɔɔ yaadarɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, m ʋ, n wɔ daam mɔɔ ma zɔɔ mɔɔ n bʋr awɔɔ zi b'ʋ.
Epafras ɩ yaa darɛ a m, a du n y'a ʋ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ naa ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma.
Mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ, Markɩ kan Aristarkɩ kɩ, Demas kɩ, Likki kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ a m sɔ.
Bɩ kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan a kɩ.
Biisi bɩ, Woso meer ba kan wɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lɛ m, gallɛm hɔka, zaa y'a hʋnhɔ m.
Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, jɛ dɔmɩm kʋ wɔɔ n ta ʋ naa ma bɩ, Woso meer ba kan wɔɔ kɩ a nyɩ bɩ lɛ m. A Nyɩ bɩ tɔ ma y'a ka an durnya bɩ da, a Nyɩ bɩ bɔ a ʋ sɔ k'an a so hɔ haay ʋ.

Nyɩ bɩ nɩ Woso mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʋrɛ hɩnkam, kʋ Woso lʋnlɔ bɩ, a mɩŋŋa maam, an n'a kam durnya bɩ nɩ gɔɔtarɛ a bɩncɛ ʋ, a lɛ meerbaa paŋŋa m. K'a gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋ ŋ ma zi ba an a nya bɩ, a a hʋr an aa nyɩnta Woso k'a nɩ cirbəə m bɩ bɩsɩ ra arzana ʋ.
Woso Nyɩ bɩ tɔ bɩ lɛ da malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ tɔ m soyy•••. Naa n'a hɩnkam wɔɔ m, ʋ a dɔ ʋ ʋ, a lɛ da malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ m gʋta maam-maam.
Woso n meer ba kan malɛɛka kɩ cɩna, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ Nyɩ, an a sa her ma, mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ y. A n a hɩ malɛɛka ma sɔ cɩna, a ʋ: Mɔɔ yɩrɛ a Zɩ, an yɩ mɔɔ Nyɩ y.
Bɩ, Woso k'a bʋr k'a Nyɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ nyɔɔ durnya ʋ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: Bɩ kʋ Woso malɛɛkarɔ haay n kukurə zɛ a taa.
Hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ malɛɛkarɔ mim nɔ ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: Malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ, ŋ ba a ʋ, ɩ ʋ hɩnhɛr nɩ ŋ mɩ, a zibəənyɩnɔ m, am sɛ nɛɛnnɔ m.
Bɩ meerbaa k'a a ba a Nyɩ bɩ mim nɔ ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ m Woso, ɩ cirbəə nyarɛ ba ʋ y. Ɩ so ɩbɩɩ nawʋrɛ ɩ cirbəə kʋ b'ʋ tɩrgabaa nɔ ʋ.
Ɩbɩɩ hɔ k'an tɩrga ŋʋa, ɩ n'ɩ sɔm hɔ bʋnyaa m. Bɩ y'a ka, Woso, ɩ Woso bɩ n'ɩ bɔ ʋ, an heernyɔɔ nyɔɔ tɔ ɩ mim ʋ. A ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa an cem ɩ muno wɔɔ han, bɩ tɔ ma m an ɩ bɔ ʋ.
A a ya, an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Zuuba, durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ tara burə da, bɩ, brama k'an ta ʋ naa, ɩbɩɩ wɔ zibəə m.
Brɔɔ cenim, b'ɩbɩɩ gɔɔtam tee•••. Brama kan tara bɩ kɩ zarm am huu hɔ bɩ m,
ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ huŋŋum am huu hɔ bɩ m, denter m, ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ lʋrm am huuro m. Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr ɩ lʋrlɛ y, ɩbɩɩ cenle ba ʋ y.
Woso n a hɩ malɛɛka m cɩna, amba a a hɩ a Nyɩ bɩ m, a ʋ: Bʋr ɩ nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ra, kʋ m a ka k'ɩ jɩnnɔ n bɩ nyɩnta ɩ taa y.
Malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ, nyiro m, ŋn'ɩ Woso zi bam, Woso n ŋ nyɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ ziro ba ŋn'a da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ hɔjirle yɩ rɔ wɔɔ han.
K'a a yo Woso n meer ba kan wɔɔ kɩ a Nyɩ bɩ lɛ m bɩ, ʋ hɔ k'a hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ gʋta, kʋ n bɛɛ m, wɔɔ nyaanɩm.
Lemim kʋ malɛɛkarɔ nyɩnta ŋnɩ b'a pa da bɩ, a a zi ba fasɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n yɛ ma y, ŋnɩ bɩsɩ ka ma rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ a bɩsɩ bɩ karɛ fɩr yɩ amba a a ga m bɩ m.

Bɩ, wɔɔ sɔ, kʋ wɔɔ n nyasʋ bʋmbɔrɛ gʋta maam-maam naa do nɩ, Woso wɔɔ dʋdɔ kam sɔ, wɔɔ bɩ bɔm lɛ nɩ y. Zuuba mɩŋŋa ɩ lɛɛ ka an bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ pa da, bɩ jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ma rɔ wɔɔ n a mɩŋŋabaa k'an ta ʋ hɩnka wɔɔ m.
Woso mɩŋŋa nɩ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ karɛ gore da ʋ, hoserlo paŋŋazannɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ, kan makra do y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ m. A Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʋrɛrɔ jir amba a lɛ n taa bɩ m.
Durnya daa kʋ wɔɔ n'a mim dɩndam bɩ, malɛɛkarɔ bɛɛ Woso ŋ da ʋ, kʋ ŋ n'a so ʋ y, a Nyɩ b'a da ʋ.
Bɩ, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ niŋŋə ʋ, n y'a hɩ, n ʋ: Woso ra, bɔ m gʋaa m, ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ hɔɔn dam ma? Gʋaa nyɔɔdʋ n bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ n nɩ nyasʋm nɩ?
Ɩbɩɩ ka an nɩ malɛɛkarɔ taa dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ b'a gore da ʋ, ɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ ka ʋ gʋta.

Ɩbɩɩ ka an a so hɔ haay ʋ, an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ. Kʋ n y'a hɩ, n ʋ: 'Woso a ka gʋaa nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ bɩ, naa k'a hɩ, a ʋ, a y'a so hɔ haay ʋ, hɔsɩ n gɔɔta k'a bɛɛ y'a so ʋ y.' A n bɔkarɛ, dɩɩtaa naa, dɩgarɛ nɔ ʋ, gʋaa bɛɛ y'a so hɔ haay ʋ y.

Bɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ n naa do: Woso a ka Yeezuu n a ba poore malɛɛkarɔ taa dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma, a ga gʋɔɔ haay minto. Bɩ wɔɔ y'a yɩm kɛɛrɛ an nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ kan daʋrɛ gʋta kɩ m, fɩr k'a yɩ a zɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.

Woso ɩ hɔ haay da, ŋn'a bɩncɛrɔ ʋ, a a ŋʋa kʋ gʋɔɔ gʋta n yɩ a nyɩnɔ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. A ga a ʋ m denter, k'an a ka kʋ Yeezuu n fɩr yɩ, k'an wɔ ʋ an yɩ gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛzaa k'a a ga m. Bala, Yeezuu nɩ karɛ ŋ lɛɛ kʋ ŋ nɩ bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ yɩ.
Yeezuu nɩ gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋrɛ ŋ ma, a mɩŋŋa kan gʋɔɔ k'a nɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ Zɩ deem. Bɩ y'a ka, Yeezuu nɩ ŋ birle a danyɩnɔ b'a nyannɩ ba nɩ y.
A a hɩ denter, a ʋ: Woso ra, mɔɔ y'ɩ mim dɩndarɛ m danyɩnɔ m, m m lɛ bɔ ɩ ʋ, sokʋmagʋɔɔ haay lɛɛ.
A a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ yom Woso ma. A n a ya, an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ ba n nɩ kan nyɩnɔ kʋ Woso ŋ ka mɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

Nyɩnɔ k'a n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, ŋnɩ yɩ mɛsim kan ma kɩ nɔ ʋ, Woso Nyɩ bɩ mɩŋŋa a ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m an nyɩnta gʋaa sɔ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m. A ba a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ, k'a Sʋtaana zaar ba, bɩ k'a a so zɛ paŋŋa ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
K'a a da ma, a gʋɔɔ kʋ lɔnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, nyi kʋ ŋ n'a bam zɛ m a mɩsɩrbaa tɛkka ma rɔ wɔɔ yɔ.
Bala, Yeezuu bɩ, malɛɛkarɔ bɛɛ an n'a darɛ ŋ han y, Abraham nyɩnɔ wɔɔ an n'a darɛ ŋ han.

Bɩ y'a ka, an yɩ pakra k'an a ba am a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, k'a wɔ ʋ, a yɩ ŋ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kʋ taalɛrazaa m, a m cicirzɛrɛzaa, a zibəə bɩ nɔ ʋ Woso lɛɛ. K'a gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, a ka ŋ ʋ.
Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, a a da ma an a da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ makra lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ han, bala, a mɩŋŋa makra yɩ, an fɩr yɩ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m danyɩnɔ wosogʋɔɔ, Woso y'awɔɔ bir sɔ k'awɔɔ n yɩ a gʋɔɔ. K'a a hɔɔn da Yeezuu ma mɩŋŋa, bala, Woso y'a nyɔɔ k'an bɩ yɩ sɩrakarɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ.
Sɩra m, Yeezuu zi kʋ Woso a bɔ ʋ k'an a ba bɩ ba taalɛra nɔ ʋ, amba Moyiisi nyɩnta an a ba bɩ m, n n a da Wosoci ʋ, n ʋ: "Moyiisi yɩ taalɛrazaa zibəə kʋ Woso a ka ʋ haay a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ nɔ ʋ."
Gʋaa k'a cɛ dɔ b'ɩ daʋrɛ yɩm an lɛ da cɛ bɩ mɩŋŋa m. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, Yeezuu a ga lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta m an lɛ da Moyiisi lɛbɔʋrɛ ra.
Cɛ k'an ta ʋ haay, gʋɔɔ yɩ ŋ dɔ, an bɔkarɛ, Woso ɩ hɔ woo••• da.
Kʋ Moyiisi nɩ, zibəənyɩ m, ta a ʋ a lɛ ra zi kʋ Woso a ka ʋ haay a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ nɔ ʋ, a zibəə bɩ, hɔ kʋ Woso ʋ k'a hɩ bɩ kasɛtɩ a a ka.
Bɩ, kʋ Krista nɩ, a m Woso Nyɩ an nɩ dɩgarɛ a Zɩ bɩ har bɩ nyasʋm ma, taalɛra nɔ ʋ. A har bɩ, wɔɔ m, kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, ʋ n'ʋ heer nyɔɔm hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma m, amba Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm bɩ, a ʋ: K'awɔɔ Woso leer ma her dɔmɩm naa ʋ,
a b'a gu ma, amba awɔɔ nyɩnta a bɩsɩ ka ma biisi bɩ nɩ y, amba hinni k'awɔɔ nyɩnta a makra ba poo ʋ bɩ nɩ y.
Ncɩnaaʋ m Woso n a hɩ, a ʋ: Poo ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ k'a dɩga hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ ma, bɩ, ŋ hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ba bɩ yɩ, dɔɔraa bam busi.
Naa y'a ka mɔɔ nɔ n ma ʋ kan gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro kɩ, m a hɩ, m ʋ: A nyʋnnyɔɔ ŋ nawʋm a hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʋ tee•••, ŋ n hɔ kʋ mɔɔ lɛ n taa ŋ gʋr zi bɩ jɩ dɔ y.
Naa y'a ka mɔɔ nɔ n ma ʋ, mɔɔ n m wer si, m ʋ: Ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ yɩm fɩɩga y.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a dundo a zi, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩnta heer bʋnyaa m a n a gu sɩrakarɛ ma, a n a bɔ Woso k'an mɩsɩr b'ʋ y.
Bɩ, an ta ʋ bɩ, k'a bɩr kʋ heer yom dɔmɩm biyəə, a b'a hɩ a ʋ k'a dɔ booti ma y. K'a bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ gɔsɩ b'a mɩŋŋa to kʋ mimbʋnyaa n bra ba nɩ y.
Bala, Krista hɔjirlezannɔ n wɔɔ m, bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ gɔɔta sɩra kʋ wɔɔ ka a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ m kɔɔkɔɔ, an ta an a tɛkka ku.
Hɔ kʋ Wosoci bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ, mɔɔ m ya m nɩ som la: K'awɔɔ Woso leer ma her, a b'a gu ma, amba awɔɔ nyɩnta biisi a bɩsɩ ka ma, a a gu ma bɩ nɩ y.
Nkɔɔ ɩ Woso leer bɩ ma, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a gu ma? Gʋɔɔ kʋ Moyiisi ŋ bɔ Eziptɩ ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ m.
Nkɔɔ Woso nɔ ma ʋ kan ŋ kɩ dɔɔraa bam busi bɩ? Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ mimbʋnyaa ba, ŋnɩ gɩnga poo ʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Woso k'a wer si, a ʋ: "Ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ yɩm bɩ." Nkɔɔ a a hɩ ŋ ma? Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩsɩ ka ma rɔ wɔɔ a a hɩ ŋ ma.
Wɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ denter, kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka bɩ y'a ka, ŋ n a da ma, ŋnɩ hoonsire kʋ Woso ʋ k'a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ yɩ y.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ nyi ba. Woso ler bɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ, wɔɔ ʋ da ma ʋ hoonsire k'a ʋ k'a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ yɩ. Ʋ dundo ʋ zi mɩŋŋa, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ barla an jɩra hoonsire bɩ do yɩrɛ zi y.
Bala, wɔɔ lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma, amba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta poo ʋ b'ʋ ŋn'a ma biisi rɔ wɔɔ m. Ŋ lemim bɩ ma, b'a nyɔɔdʋ n nyɩnta ŋ ma y, bala, a ma kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ bɩ, ŋ n a si kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ y.

Wɔɔ, k'ʋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ hoonsire bɩ do yɩ. Woso hoonsire bɩ do mim hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ m wer si m ʋ, ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ yɩm fɩɩga y. Meer naa do ba a ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, a a zibəə bɩ nya laatʋ dɔmɩm k'a durnya da ʋ b'ʋ.
Bala, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ niŋŋə ʋ, n dɔmɩm saanhɩna hɔ bɩ mim hɩ, n ʋ: 'Woso a zi haay ba, an hoon si dɔmɩm saanhɩna hinni ʋ.'
Wɔɔ ʋ ya ʋ a yɩ, n a gʋrsɩra ba, n ʋ: 'Ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ yɩm fɩɩga y.'
K'a maam, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a dam ma ŋn'a yɩ. A n bɔkarɛ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n hoonsire bɩ yɩ y, kʋ ŋ n yɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma.

Bɩ y'a ka, Woso n a ya, an dɔmɩm bɔ ʋ, n n'a birm, n ʋ: 'Her'. Maasɩrɛ k'a bɩ ba gʋta bɩ, a dɔmɩm bɩ do mim hɩ gʋta Davɩd lɛ m, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ niŋŋə kʋ wɔɔ mim hɩ b'ʋ, a ʋ: K'awɔɔ Woso leer ma her, a b'a gu ma y.
Denter sɔ, kʋ yɩ a nawʋrɛ ɩ ʋ, Zoziye wɔ ʋ an hoonsire ka Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Woso bɩ bɩ tom k'a a ya, a dɔmɩm vanta mim hɩ y.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hoonsire dɔmɩm ta ʋ Woso n a cɩnta a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan dɔmɩm saanhɩna hinni kʋ Woso hoonsire dɔmɩm m bɩ kɩ.
Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ hoonsire kʋ Woso n'a kam bɩ yɩm bɩ, a zaa zibəə nya an nɩ hoon sim, amba Woso mɩŋŋa a zi ba, an a nya an hoon si bɩ m.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ ʋ tɔ ʋ, k'ʋ hoonsire bɩ do yɩ. Ʋ dundo ʋ zi kʋ wɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ bɩsɩ ka Woso lɛ ma, an a do hoonsire bɩ yɩrɛ ma, amba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta poo ʋ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.

Bala, Woso lemim bɩ mɩsɩr an nɩ paŋŋa m. A lɛ ta ʋ an cem hɛɛnm lɛhɩɩyazaa han. A ɩ gasʋm gʋaa ʋ an nɩ tam lɛɛ kʋ wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa kan wɔɔ nyi kɩ nɩ kʋ zɛŋ ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ tam lɛɛ kʋ wɔɔ yaarɔ kan a hɩnɔ kɩ nɩ kʋ zɛŋ ʋ b'ʋ. A ɩ gʋaa lɛtaamarɔ kan a hɔɔndarɛrɔ kʋ ŋ n'a heer ʋ kɩ dʋdɔ kam.
Hɔsɩ ba ʋ, an nɩ wɔŋ ʋ an a nyaakʋm da Woso lɛɛ y. Hɔ k'a nɩ durnya ʋ haay dɩgɩ, an garga ra, Woso mɩm ʋ. Bɩ, a mɩŋŋa, ʋ woo••• n nɩ zɛm bɩ jɩm a taa, an wɔɔ lɩnlar mim kʋ wɔɔ ba haay ma.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʋ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩrakarɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ nɔ ʋ. Bala, wɔɔ ɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ k'a lɛ da haay m, an der an cem brama han, an wɔ ʋ an lee ku Woso mɩŋŋa zi, Woso Nyɩ, Yeezuu m.
Wɔɔ mannɩbər b'ɩ kɔm wɔɔ ma, ʋ paŋŋawarlɔ nɔ ʋ. A mɩŋŋa makra yɩ mim haay nɔ ʋ, amba wɔɔ nɩ makra yɩm bɩ m, b'a n a do mimbʋnyaa nɔ ʋ fɩɩga y.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ ʋ zɔ Woso ma a cirbəəduu bɩ jɩr ʋ heer koodə nɔ ʋ, a mɩŋŋa n ta barka m an n'a kam. Ʋ ʋ zɔ ma, k'an ʋ cicir zɛ an barka ka wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ daahan yɩ, daahan lɛtaama dɔmɩm ʋ.

Kʋ wɔɔ dɩga a, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ biyəə bɩ, Woso n'a bɔŋ ʋ gʋɔɔ gaa ma, an n'a darɛ a zibəə ʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ daahan tɔ ma. A zibəə bɩ, ganwʋrɛrɔ kan mannɩrɔ kɩ an nɩ ŋ kam Woso ʋ, mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ tɔ ma.
K'a mɩŋŋa ɩ paŋŋawar minno nɔ ʋ bɩ, a a da ma, an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kʋrɔm ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim jɩ ma, an a da ŋ han.
Kʋ paŋŋawarzaa n a mɩŋŋa m bɩ, pakra m k'an mannɩ ba a mɩŋŋa mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma sɔ, amba an n'a bam Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ m.
Gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a mɩŋŋa gore da ʋ, an a ba mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ a zim nɩ y. Woso mɩŋŋa nɩ gʋaa birm an n'a dam zibəə bɩ do ʋ, amba a a ba kan Aarɔn kɩ bɩ m.
Maam bɩ, Krista bɛɛ y'a mɩŋŋa gore da ʋ, k'a yɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ y. Bɩ, Woso mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ Nyɩ, an a sa her ma bɩ, mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ.
Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ vanta ʋ, a a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ yɩm mannɩbər dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ, amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.

Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta tara burə ʋ bɩ, a yaa da Woso m gʋta, an a wɔ zɩnzɛ m gʋta, an nyi ka kan zee gʋta kɩ. A n a yɛ Woso k'a a da ma an a yɔ zɛ wɔ ʋ bɩ han k'an a yɔ zɛ wɔ ʋ. Bɩ, Woso a yaa bɩ si, k'a nɩ yɛm Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
Baa kʋ Woso Nyɩ m bɩ, yɛ Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma bɩ dɔ a ʋ, a fɩryɩrɛrɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ m, Woso a ka an yɩ amba a a ga m bɩ m fasɩ k'an yɩ bʋmbɔrɛzaa. Maam m, an a ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yɛm ma rɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ zaa.
Bɩ Woso a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ, a m mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.
Wɔɔ ɩ hɔ m gʋta, k'ʋ a hɩ mim naa do nɔ ʋ, bɩ k'awɔɔ bɩr mim jɩ mam zɔɔ-zɔɔ bɩ, a jɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m wer ta ʋ.

A ga a ʋ m hɔɔ tee••• k'awɔɔ n a ba karɩnsaambɔɔ, kan bɩ kɩ, awɔɔ gɔɔta an n'a ŋʋam kʋ n n'a ya n nɩ Woso lemim bɩ minno k'awɔɔ ma a sɩrakarɛ sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ dɩnda a m. Kʋ hɔ m, k'awɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩm, bɩ ayy•••, awɔɔ gɔɔta an n'a ŋʋam kʋ n nɩ nyonhi ka a ʋ.
Nyɩ ɩ tɩr nyonhi mi, a n hɔ k'an tɩrga gɛɛ bʋnyaa dɔ kʋ nɩ y.
Bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩ, gʋɔɔ burgurɔ hɔ m, brɔɔ mim ka hɔ mɩŋŋa kan hɔ bʋnyaa kɩ dɔ n n'a bɔ kʋ zi m.

Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ cem sɩra ka Krista ʋ lɛɛkarɛ hɔdɩndarɛrɔ nyʋgɔ rɔ wɔɔ han, k'ʋ ta lɛɛ, ʋ gʋɔɔ burgurɔ hɔ dɩnda. Hɔdɩndarɛrɔ nyʋgɔrɔ wɔɔ duro jɩr ba n na: Pakra m kʋ gʋaa n a gʋ zibəəro kʋ ŋ nɩ tam gʋaa m zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, k'an sɩra ka Woso ʋ.
Batɛnnɔ wɔɔ mim ba n nɩ, kan wɔrɔ kɩnka gʋaa ra bɩ mim kɩ, kan gəəno mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ mim kɩ, kan durnya nyarɛ dʋdɔ bɩ mim kɩ. Wɔɔ b'ʋ yarɛ ʋ jɩm k'ʋ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro dɩnda y.
Ʋ ta lɛɛ, ʋ hɔɔ vantɔɔ dɩnda, kʋ Woso yɛ, naa wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a ba.
Ʋ makra sa gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Woso lɛɛgure yɩ biisi, ŋnɩ Woso mɩsɩrbaa ganwʋrɛ yɩ, ŋnɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri si a heer ʋ am gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ m,
ŋnɩ Woso lemim mɩŋŋabaa kasɛtɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ hɔɔ gʋtɔɔ paŋŋa k'a nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ durnya daa b'ʋ bɩ kasɛtɩ bɩ sɔ rɔ wɔɔ ma.

Baa kan naa haay kɩ, kʋ ŋ y'a gu ŋnɩ sɩrakarɛ to, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a ka gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n a ya, ŋn'a bɔ gallɛm hɩɩya hɔ ma, ŋn'a mɩsɩrbaa lʋr y. Bala, a ya ŋ y'a ʋ ŋnɩ so ra a zim ŋn'ɩ Woso Nyɩ bɩ wɔm gɔdarkʋra ma, ŋn'a kam gʋɔɔ n'a sʋnsɔ wʋm lɛɛ kar ʋ.
Ʋ ʋ ya, ʋ makra sa, kʋ hɔsɩra ɩ la hi yɩm tee••• an n'a mim, k'a ɩ hɔ bam mɩŋŋa a wʋrɛzannɔ wɔɔ n'a bɩrɛ, naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Woso tara bɩ do barka da ʋ.
Bɩ, kʋ laa gɔrɔ an nɩ ŋ bɔm kan bur kɩ, hɔsɩra bɩ do nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y. Woso ler bʋnyaa dam n'ʋ zɔɔ-zɔɔ, a nyambʋrlɛ bɩ, sɛ n n'a bɩ m.
M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, baa kʋ wɔɔ ɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, wɔɔ heer kookoo gʋta awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ. Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ zaa mɩŋŋa ra, bʋmbɔrɛ zaa bɩ m.
Woso tɩrga, a bɩ ziro k'awɔɔ n ba rɔ wɔɔ tɔ bɔrɛ a nɔ ʋ y, ŋʋarɛ k'awɔɔ n tam kan kɩ a zi ba, a ka a danyɩnɔ wosogʋɔɔ ʋ, a gɔɔta an n'a bam bɩ, a b'a tɔ bɔrɛ a nɔ ʋ sɔ y.
Bɩ, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə n gɔɔta an bɩr a yoŋ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ tee•••, k'an ta an dɔmɩnnɔ nyarɛ ku, kʋ hɔ k'awɔɔ ta a heer lɛ bɩ n yɩ fasɩ-fasɩ.
Wɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n a ba yakʋzannɔ y, bɩ, k'awɔɔ n gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ sɩra ka ŋn'ɩ bʋrlɛ a mɩŋŋa ma, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm maam nɔ wɔɔ makra sa.
Woso k'a nyɩnta an ler bɩ bɔ Abraham m bɩ, a a wer si an a na ma. Kʋ gɔsɩ ba ʋ, an lɛ da m an n'a wer bɩ sire a tɔ m bɩ, am naa an a wer bɩ si a mɩŋŋa m.
A n a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ n wer si, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ barka daŋ ʋ, m yaŋŋɔɔ ka ɩ ʋ gʋta.
Abraham ler bɩ bɔrɛ mɩm da bʋraama nɔ ʋ, an hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ.
Kʋ gʋɔɔ y'a wer sire, a si ŋ nawʋm gʋaa k'a lɛ da ŋ nɩ bɩ tɔ ra, bɩ, wer bɩ sire nɩ mim kʋ ŋ ʋ k'a ba bɩ kʋyɩrɛ kasɛtɩ, an nɩ bɩsɩkarɛ haay bɔrɛ ŋ bire ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma m Woso n a wer si, an a na a ler bɩ bɔrɛ ma, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ k'a ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ fasɩ ŋ ʋ, a bɩ hɔsɩ lʋrm hɔ k'a cɩnta k'a ba bɩ nɔ ʋ y.

Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hɔ hɩɩya n ta ʋ, ŋ b'a lʋrlɛ y, bɩ Woso b'a dam ma a n ŋʋaar ba ŋ mim nɔ ʋ sɔ y, ler bɩ bɔrɛ kan wer bɩ sire kɩ m. Ncɩnaaʋ naa, wɔɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ si, ʋ b'ʋ nyaakʋm da Woso zi rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ heer kookoo hɔ hɩɩya naa do tɔ ma, k'ʋ hɔ kʋ Woso wɔɔ bir ma, k'ʋ b'a yɩ bɩ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ.

Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ naa do a ka, wɔɔ nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr digə darɛ y. Amba kɔɔlʋʋ gʋta pɔyaa k'a n'a dam jɩm ʋ bɩ hɔ bɩ m. Taaheerlɛ bɩ do n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ cenim pɛɛra k'a ta lɛɛ kʋ Woso n ta ʋ bɩ rɛ bɩ han Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, ʋ nɩ gasʋm Woso mɩŋŋa zi, lɛɛ k'an ta ʋ b'ʋ.
Bɩncɛ bɩ do Yeezuu lɛɛ ka wɔɔ m, an gasʋ ʋ, gasʋ a ʋ wɔɔ tɔ ma. Bala, a a ba mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ, amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.
Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ bɩ, nyɩnta a ʋ Salɛm cir, bɩ Woso k'a lɛ da haay bɩ mannɩbər m sɔ. Abraham k'a nyɩnta an yar ba an a da cinno ma, an a bɔ an nɩ zɛm bɩ, Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ta an aa a zɛ ʋ, an barka da a mim ʋ.
Abraham n hɔ k'an ta m haay bɩ bɔ ʋ, bu biyəə barla deem, an a ka ʋ. Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ tɔ bɩ mɩŋŋa jɩ ba n nɩ: "Tɩrgabaa cir", an ta ʋ sɔ bɩ, nyɩnta a ʋ, Salɛm cir, naa jɩ ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ: "Laafɩɩ cir".
Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ bɩ, a ba zɩ nɩ, b'a ba da nɩ y, a ba do gʋɔɔ nɩ y. A taʋrɛ sɩŋŋɩda ba ʋ, b'a nyarɛ ba ʋ sɔ y. Bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan Woso Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, mannɩbər m dɔmɩm haay.
K'a dɩga a, awɔɔ n a dɔ kɛɛrɛ a ʋ, gʋaa gʋta m na? Abraham yɛ an hɔ k'a yɩ haay yar bɩ k'a a da ma bɩ nɔ ʋ bɔ ʋ bu biyəə nɔ ʋ, deem an a ka ʋ.

Levii nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ cɩnta ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔ haay buganwʋrɛ si Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ han, naa ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ, a si ŋ nawʋrɛ a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ han, an bɔkarɛ Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ n brɔɔ m sɔ.
Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ n nyɩnta Levii nyɩ y, an bɔkarɛ a hɔ kʋ Abraham m ta m haay bɩ buganwʋrɛ si han, an lɛ da sɔ bɩ, Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ Abraham barka da ʋ, an bɔkarɛ bɩ Woso lerlɔ bɔ m.
Bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ ʋ ʋ, gʋaa k'a lɛ da b'ɩ tɩr barka da gʋaa poore mim ʋ.
Levii har gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ buganwʋrɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ yɩ gɩngarɛ am gʋaa haay m. Bɩ, kʋ Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ k'a buganwʋrɛ si bɩ nɩ, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "A garɛ ba ʋ y."
Wɔɔ ʋ da ma, ʋ meerbaa bɩ nyambʋr, ʋ ʋ, Abraham k'a nyɩnta an buganwʋrɛ bɩ yawʋra bɩ ka Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ʋ bɩ, Levii k'a yaŋŋɔɔ nɩ buganwʋrɛ bɩ sim her naa, a buganwʋrɛ bɩ ka Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ʋ sɔ.
Bala, baa kʋ Levii n yɩ cɩna dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, bɩ Abraham yaŋŋa m bɩ, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ ʋ, hinni kʋ Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ta an aa Abraham zɛ ʋ bɩ, Levii nyɩnta ʋ hinni bɩ do ʋ sɔ, Abraham mɛ ʋ.

Levii dogʋɔɔ mannɩbər biyəə bɩ, a to a ʋ lɛrɔ kʋ Woso ŋ ka Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ. A n bɔkarɛ, kʋ yɩ an nawʋrɛ ɩ ʋ, Levii hargʋɔɔ wɔɔ mannɩbər zibəə b'a da ma an a ka gʋɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga fasɩ, pakra bɛɛ m kʋ mannɩbər vanta n nyɩnta ʋ, a zibəə n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ hɔ kɩ y. Mannɩbər bɩ do bɩ, Aarɔn yaŋŋa bɛɛ dɔ y.
Bala, kʋ mannɩbərbaa b'a lʋr, pakra m kʋ lɛ k'a nyɩnta ʋ bɩ n lʋr sɔ.
Bɩ, mannɩbər vanta kʋ wɔɔ mim hɩ bɩ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu m. A ba Levii dogʋɔɔ barla y, do k'a a to ʋ bɩ gɔsɩ n nyɩnta mannɩbər Wosocɛ b'ʋ y.
Gʋaa haay a dɔ, a ʋ, Ziida do gʋaa m, Moyiisi n do naa do mim hɩ mannɩbənno wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ y.
Hɔ k'a n'a kam wɔɔ n mim naa do jɩ ma fasɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Mannɩbər vanta n ta ʋ kɛɛrɛ, Levii dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʋ, bɔ b'ʋ kʋ ʋ kan Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ kɩ.
Lɛrɔ k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ yaŋŋɔɔ mim dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɛɛ m an a ba mannɩbər y, a ba a ʋ mannɩbər a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ paŋŋa tɔ ma.
Denter sɔ, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: Ɩ ba ɩbɩɩ nawʋm mannɩbər dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ, amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, n nɩ lɛ k'a nyɩnta ʋ biisi bɩ ci zɛ, bala, a paŋŋa ba ʋ, b'a b'a dam ma an a da gʋaa han y.
Bala, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ n a da ma, ŋn'a ka gʋɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga fasɩ Woso mɩm ʋ y. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, taaheerlɛ k'a lɛ da haay n ta ʋ, a tɔ ma m wɔɔ n'ʋ dam ma, ʋ n'ʋ zɔm Woso ma.
A n a na ma bɩ, Woso mɩŋŋa a wer si kʋ Yeezuu n yɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ. Levii dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ mannɩbənno, bɩ wersire naa do lɔɔ n nyɩnta ʋ y.
Bɩ kʋ Yeezuu nɩ, Woso a cɩnta mannɩbər, an a hɩ a ʋ: "Zuuba a wer si, b'a b'a bɔrɛ a taa nɩ y. A ʋ, ɩbɩɩ yɩm mannɩbər dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ."
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ nɩ gʋaasɩbabaa k'a lɛ da biisi hɔ bɩ ra bɩ m kan Woso kɩ.
Hɔ vanta n ta ʋ sɔ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, Levii dogʋɔɔ mannɩbənno wɔɔ, ŋ nyɩnta yɔɔgʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ gɩngam ŋn'a zibəə bɩ tom bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, kʋ Yeezuu nɩ, a garɛ ba ʋ y, a b'a mannɩbər zibəə bɩ tom gʋaa nɩ y.
Naa tɔ ma m, an n'a dam ma an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yom ma, k'a a zɔ Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ, dɩɩtaa kan dɔmɩm haay kɩ nɔ ʋ. Bala, k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa m dɔmɩm haay bɩ, a ɩ yaa dam Woso m dɔmɩm haay ŋ tɔ ma.

Naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Yeezuu n mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ ga m ʋ a yɩ. A tɩrga fasɩ, kʋrɔma sɩ kan mimbʋnyaa sɩ kɩ ba a gʋr zi y. A mɩsɩrbaa y'a hɔ kan mimbʋnyaabənno hɔ kɩ, Woso a busu, an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʋ.

A n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan biisi mannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ y, pakra bɛɛ m k'an mannɩ ba dɔmɩm biyəə a mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, k'a bɔkarɛ a gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ ba y. Ga k'a ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ, a mɩŋŋa a ka am mannɩ hɔ bɩ m, gallɛm deem taan••• dɔmɩm haay minto.

Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ mannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, ŋ yɩ kʋrɔma bam. Bɩ ler kʋ Woso a bɔ, an a wer si lɛrɔ wɔɔ cenle jɛ ʋ bɩ, a Nyɩ k'a mɩŋŋa a ka an a ba mɩŋŋa fasɩ dɔmɩm haay tɔ ma b'a cɩnta mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ.
Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ k'ʋ a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kʋ wɔɔ mim hɩ bɩ, wɔɔ n ta m denter, a ɩ nyɩntam cirbəə nɔ ʋ, Woso k'a a so hɔ haay ʋ bɩ jɩr ʋ arzana ʋ.
A mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ zi an n'a bam b'ʋ Woso taʋrɛ nɔ ʋ, pɛɛracɛ paan••• kʋ Woso a dɔ, gʋɔɔ bɛɛ y'a dɔ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Mannɩbər haay zibəə n ganwʋrɛrɔ kan mannɩrɔ kɩ ka Woso ʋ m, a a ga m sɔ, kʋ wɔɔ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n bɩr hɔ m k'a ka Woso ʋ sɔ.
Kʋ durnya naa do gʋaa nɩ, a b'a dam ma an yɩ mannɩbər y. Bala, mannɩbənno ta ʋ kara, ŋn'ɩ mannɩrɔ kam Woso ʋ amba Moyiisi lɛrɔ a hɩ bɩ m.

Bɩ, mannɩbənno wɔɔ duro zibəə bɩ, mannɩbər zibəə paan••• k'a nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ bɔkʋrɛ m, a makra m. A do m ba Moyiisi nyɩnta k'a pɛɛracɛ dɔ a ka Woso ʋ bɩ m. Woso a hɩ m, a ʋ: Ɩ tɔ ʋ k'ɩ pɛɛracɛ bɩ dɔ k'an yɩ hɔdeem kan mɔɔ n a hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m ci bɩ burə ʋ bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, mannɩbər zibəə k'a lɛ da brɔɔ hɔ bɩ ra gʋta bɩ Yeezuu n n'a bam. Bala, am gʋaasɩbabaa k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da bɩ zɛkʋrazaa, gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ do jɩr bɩ, lerbɔrɛrɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ da a yo ma.
Kʋ nyɩnta lɛɛkarɛ gʋaasɩbabaa b'ʋ zore, a bɩ yɩm pakra kʋ gʋaasɩbabaa k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da n sompi a yaa ʋ y.
Bɩ, Woso nyaa ba kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ kʋrɔmarɔ tɔ ma, a ʋ: Dɔmɩnnɔ ɩ zɛm, mɔɔ m bɩ gʋaasɩbabaa daa dam Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma, kan Ziida gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

Gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ do bɩ bɩr yɩrɛ, am gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ mɔɔ da ŋ zɩrɔ ma bɩ nɩ y, hinni kʋ mɔɔ ŋ gaa ŋ wɔ ma, m bɔ ŋ nɩ Eziptɩ ʋ bɩ, ŋ n ta a lɛ ra gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ do nɔ ʋ y, bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ m bɔ ŋ ʋ. Mɔɔ m Zuuba, mɔɔ ɩ meer bɩ ba.
Dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro jɛ ʋ, gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ mɔɔ n n'a dam Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, ba n nɩ: Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛrɔ wɔɔ darɛ ŋ hɔɔn ʋ, m ŋ gʋrsɩra ba ŋ heer ʋ. Mɔɔ yɩrɛ ŋ Woso, ŋnɩ yɩ mɔɔ gʋɔɔ.
Ŋ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ k'a a ka ma k'a hɔ dɩnda a mim nɩ y, gɛɛ a danyɩ m an bɩr a hɩrɛ a ʋ, a ka k'ɩ Zuuba dɔ. Bala, ŋ haay mɔɔ dɔm, an a sa ŋ poore ma an ta m ŋ gʋtɔɔ ma.
Mɔɔ yɩ ŋ kʋrɔmarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ bɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ darɛ m nɔ ʋ y.
Woso k'a bʋr an nɩ gʋaasɩbabaa daa mim dɩndam bɩ, naa ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ, lɛɛkarɛ gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ ba a ʋ hɔgusire. A n bɔkarɛ hɔ k'a gusi, b'a zibəə ba ʋ bɩ, a nyaanɩm zɔɔ.
Lɛɛkarɛ gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, lɛrɔ nyɩnta ʋ ŋn'ɩ yaa bɩ darɛ zaarɔ hɩnkam, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ cɛ dɔ sɔ k'a bɩr yaa bɩ daŋ ʋ.
Cɛ bɩ ba ŋ y'a ʋ pɛɛra m, a nɔ n hɩɩya, lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ bir ŋ nawʋm lɛɛ k'an jɩnjɛɛm Woso ma. Lɛɛ bɩ do ŋ fɩtɩrɛ bɩ kan mɔrcɩntarahɔ bɩ kɩ, bur kʋ ŋ n'a kam Woso ʋ bɩ kɩ kuntə ʋ.
Cɛ nɔ hɩɩyazaa bɩ, pɛɛra ŋ y'a ta a lɛ ma, cɛ nɔ bɩ do Woso taʋrɛ bɩncɛ m.

Lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, mannɩduu ŋ y'a ba sarma m, ŋn'a cɩnta b'ʋ, tidəər nyisi sɛnyaʋrɛ mɔr m bɩ, cɛ nɔ bɩ do ʋ sɔ bɩ, daka kʋ ŋ y'a ba gɔ m, ŋn'a lihi sarma m bɩ cɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ b'ʋ, daka bɩ do bir ŋ nawʋrɛ, ŋ ʋ, gʋaasɩbabaa daka. Daka bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, laaga nɩ b'ʋ ŋn'a ba sarma m, ŋnɩ mann zar ʋ, Aarɔn bənkə k'a vu da bɩ nyɩnta daka b'ʋ sɔ, jaa wargarɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʋ Woso a gʋaasɩbabaa gʋrsɩra ba ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta daka b'ʋ sɔ.

Gʋaasɩbabaa daka bɩ burə ʋ bɩ, hɔɔ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba hɩɩya ŋ zarɔ n ta ŋ ma, malɛɛkarɔ makra m, hɔɔ wɔɔ duro jɩ ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ, Woso ɩ lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ. A zarɔ wɔɔ ku ŋ y'a ʋ lɛɛ kʋ n nɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ mannɩhɔ ma zaasʋm ma bɩ ra. Wɔɔ bɩ toore yɩm dɩɩtaa k'ʋ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro mim dɩnda fasɩ y.
Pɛɛracɛ bɩ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ cɩncɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ biyəə kan a bɩncɛ kɩ, mannɩbənno wɔɔ nɩ gasʋm cɛ bɩ nɔ lɛɛkarɛ hɔ b'ʋ dɔmɩm biyəə ŋn'a zi bam.

Bɩ, cɛ nɔ hɩɩyazaa bɩ, mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ y'a deem taan••• nɩ gasʋm b'ʋ, dɔɔraa nɔ ʋ gallɛm deem. Gasʋ an nawʋm b'ʋ hɔbɩsɩ hɩɩya ma m k'a ka Woso ʋ, k'a a mɩŋŋa mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, kan Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba badɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ sugur yɩrɛ kɩ.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay naa, ŋ sa Sɛnt-Ɛspri ʋ k'a hɩnka wɔɔ m a ʋ, kʋ cɛ nɔ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ gɔɔta an ta ʋ, zaa ba ʋ cɩna gʋɔɔ n nɩ gasʋm Woso taʋrɛ bɩncɛ b'ʋ y.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ hɔ k'an ta ʋ her-her naa hɩnkam. Ŋ jɩ ʋ k'a hɩ a ʋ, ganwʋrɛrɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ nɩ ŋ kam Woso ʋ kan hɔbɩsɩrɔ mannɩrɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ kam nɔ wɔɔ heer hu n bɔ y.
Hɔɔ wɔɔ duro haay, hɔbɩrɛ kan hɔmire kɩ bankarɛ kan wɔɔ zɩɩfʋrɔ hɔbɩrɛ zaarɔ kɩ, ŋn'a dɩnda gʋɔɔ m. Durnya naa zibəə hɔɔ m. Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ tolle ba ŋnɩ dɔmɩm kʋ Woso hɔ haay lʋr ʋ bɩ ku.

Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Krista bʋr, mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m, a ɩ bʋr hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ her lɔ nɔɔm m. Cɛ k'a n'a zi bɩ baŋ ʋ bɩ gore kan a mɩŋŋabaa kɩ lɛ da biisi pɛɛracɛ bɩ m. Gʋɔɔ bɛɛ cɛ bɩ do dɔ y, durnya naa hɔ bɛɛ y.

Krista k'a gasʋ lɛɛ kʋ Woso n ta ʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a n gasʋ bɔnsannɔ kan dinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ kɩ ma nɩ y. Gasʋ a ʋ b'ʋ a mɩŋŋa ma m gallɛm deem taan••• dɔmɩm haay tɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, an bʋmbɔrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ yɩ an a ka wɔɔ ʋ.

Biisi bɩ, bɔnsannɔ kan ŋʋannɔ kɩ n nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ m, ŋn'ɩ zullur zɛm sɔ ŋn'a dam sɛ rɛ, ŋnɩ ma bɩ, kan zullur bɩ suu bɩ kɩ sarɛ, ŋn'a zɩnzaasʋm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ kʋrɔmarɔ ba, a minkəm bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ hu bɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ mim nɔ ʋ.

K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, hɔbɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ ma a da ma an gʋɔɔ hu bɔ, k'a maam, Krista ma b'ɩ lɛ da haay. A a mɩŋŋa ka Woso ʋ amba mannɩ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da bɩ m, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'an mɩsɩr dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ bɩ paŋŋa m. A ma b'ɩ wɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ sʋrgɔm, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ minno kʋ ŋ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ba y. Kʋ wɔɔ n Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ zi ba.

Krista k'a naa ba bɩ y'a ka, an a ba gʋɔɔ kan Woso kɩ zɛkʋrazaa, gʋaasɩbabaa daa a a cɩnta ŋ bire ʋ. A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ n hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyarɛ ba ʋ, Woso nɩ ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ yɩ, kʋ gʋaa ga bɩ tɔ ma m, Krista m. A zɛ b'ɩ gʋɔɔ yɔm mimbʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba, gʋaasɩbabaa gusire bɩ zuure dɔmɩm ʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
Kʋ gʋaa ci ba an a hɔnta jirle zaa hɩnka, kʋ n a jir a zɛ jɛ ʋ, hɔnta bɩ b'a dam ma an jir k'a zaa bɩ bɛɛ ga y.
Bala, k'a zaa bɩ n ga, ci k'a ba bɩ nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ y, bɩ k'a zaa bɩ bɩ ga, ci bɩ nyɔɔdʋ ta ʋ kɛɛrɛ.
Naa y'a ka, lɛɛkarɛ gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, an yɩ pakra kʋ ma n nyɩnta ʋ, kʋ gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ n a dɔ an a zi ba.

Biisi bɩ, lɛɛ Moyiisi a ka, an lɛrɔ kʋ Woso a ka bɩ pa da haay Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m. A n bɔkarɛ an hizɔp gɔ sa, serka piinə n ta ma, an a nyɔɔ dinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ kan bɔnsannɔ kɩ ma ma, kan hi kɩ, an a zaasʋ lɛrɔ ci bɩ ma, kan gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ ma haay.
A n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ma naa do n'a kam Woso nɩ gʋaasɩbabaa darɛ awɔɔ ma. Woso lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n ta a lɛ ra gʋaasɩbabaa bɩ nɔ ʋ."
Moyiisi ma zaasʋ pɛɛracɛ bɩ ma sɔ, kan yaa bɩ darɛ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ ma.
Lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ, pakra m kʋ n nɩ ma sa n nɩ hɔ gʋta hu bɔ m. Bɩ, kʋ ma n a lo sɔ, Woso bɩ gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʋ y.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ arzana ʋ bɩ makrarɔ m, b'a yɩ pakra kʋ n nɩ ŋ hu bɔ amba wɔɔ yɩ bɩ m. Bɩ, arzana hɔɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛ taa mannɩrɔ kʋ ŋ mɩŋŋabaa lɛ da fasɩ ma.
Bala, pɛɛracɛ kʋ gʋɔɔ a ba bɩ bɛɛ Krista gasʋ ʋ y, pɛɛracɛ bɩ do bɩ, lɛɛ kʋ Woso n ta ʋ paan••• bɩ makra m. Krista bɩ, gasʋ a ʋ arzana ʋ, lɛɛ kʋ Woso n ta ʋ b'ʋ, an nɩ b'ʋ wɔɔ tɔ ma.

Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ, gasʋ a tɩr a ʋ Woso taʋrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ b'ʋ gallɛm deem dɔɔraa biyəə nɔ ʋ, hɔbɩsɩ ma m. Bɩ kʋ Krista nɩ, a n gasʋ Woso zi k'a mɩŋŋa ba mannɩ gallɛm hɔka y. A mɩŋŋa ka a ʋ vugur.

K'a bɛɛ y'a ba ncɩnaaʋ, pakra m k'an fɩr yɩ gallɛm hɔka an a sa durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma, an lee kum her la. Bɩ, bʋr a ʋ, gallɛm deem taan••• biisi dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn nyarɛ ma, an b'a mɩŋŋa ka mannɩ, k'a mimbʋnyaa zaar ba.
Pakra m kʋ gʋaa biyəə n ga gallɛm deem taan•••, bɩ jɛ ʋ, Woso n a zaa dʋdɔ ka.

Ncɩnaaʋ m sɔ, Krista n a mɩŋŋa ka mannɩ, an ga gallɛm deem taan••• k'a gʋɔɔ gʋta mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋ ŋ ma. A y'a yarɛ an bʋr, k'a bɩ bʋr, mimbʋnyaarɔ bɛɛ an nɩ zɛm k'a b'a gʋ gʋɔɔ ma y, zɛ an nawʋm k'a bɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩm dam nɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ.

Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ, hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a ka wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ŋnɩ ŋ hɩnkam, hɔɔ wɔɔ duro bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y. Mannɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ bam tee••• rɔ wɔɔ hɔdeem, ŋnɩ ŋ bam dɔɔraa biyəə, ŋ barɛ nyarɛ ba ʋ y, bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ba tɩrga y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ yaa bɩ do dam Woso m nɔ wɔɔ, kʋ yaa bɩ do darɛ ɩ wɔ ʋ, an ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋ ŋ ma fasɩ, ŋ b'a yarɛ ŋn'a heer kɔ ŋ ʋ a mimbʋnyaa ba y, bɩ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ barɛ nyam sɔ.
Sɩra nɔ ʋ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro barɛ bɩ, gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ an nɩ ŋ tɔ darɛ ŋ nɔ ʋ dɔɔraa biyəə.
Bala, ŋʋannɔ kan bɔnsannɔ kɩ ma b'a dam ma fɩɩga an gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ ŋ ma y.
Naa y'a ka, Krista k'a bʋr durnya ʋ bɩ, an a hɩ Woso m, a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa mannɩ ma, bɩ ganwʋrɛ nɩ y, bɩ y'a ka ɩbɩɩ n mɛsim ka mɔɔ ʋ.
Hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ dam sɛ rɛ k'a ŋ ka ɩ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bɩr ɩbɩɩ nɔ yɩrɛ y, mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ bɩr ɩbɩɩ nɔ yɩm sɔ y.
Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ n a hɩ, m ʋ, Woso ra, mɔɔ ba n nɩ, zɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ m b'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba, amba hɔ kʋ n y'a gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʋ lɛrɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ m.

Lɛɛ a ka an a hɩ a ʋ: Ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa mannɩrɔ ma, b'ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa ganwʋrɛrɔ ma y, ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ da sɛ rɛ rɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ y, b'ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ y, ɩbɩɩ bɩr ŋ ŋʋarɛ y. A n bɔkarɛ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro barɛ a ga m, lɛrɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʋ.
A n a ya an a na ma, a ʋ: Woso ra, mɔɔ ba n nɩ, zɛ mɔɔ nawʋm kʋ m b'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba. Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, Woso n biisi mannɩrɔ wɔɔ haay ci zɛ, an Krista mannɩ bɩ sompi ŋ yaa ʋ.
Kʋ Yeezuu Krista Woso hɔɔnhɔ ba, an a mɩŋŋa sa an a ba mannɩ gallɛm deem taan••• bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ n'ʋ ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ mannɩbənno wɔɔ, jɩm ŋ nawʋm dɔmɩm biyəə ŋn'a zi bɩ bam, ŋnɩ mannɩrɔ deem-deem nɔ wɔɔ bam, an bɔkarɛ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro b'a dam ma fɩɩga ŋnɩ gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ ŋ ma y.
Bɩ kʋ Krista nɩ, mannɩ deem taan••• a a ba gʋɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, mannɩ naa do barɛ nyɔɔdʋ bɩr nyam fɩɩga y, bɩ jɛ ʋ an ta an aa nyɩnta cirbəə nɔ ʋ Woso jɩr ʋ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, dɔ a nawʋm ma, kʋ Woso n a jɩnnɔ da a wɔ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ nɩ, mannɩ deem taan••• tɔ ma, an a ka gʋɔɔ k'a ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ sʋrgɔ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ n a ba tɩrga fasɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ naa hɩm wɔɔ m paan••• denter. Bala, a y'a hɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, a ʋ:
Zuuba y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, gʋaasɩbabaa kʋ mɔɔ n n'a darɛ ŋ ma dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn jɛ ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ darɛ ŋ heer ʋ, m a gʋrsɩra ba ŋ hɔɔn ʋ.
A n a ya an a na ma, a ʋ: Mɔɔ bɩ ŋ mimbʋnyaarɔ kan ŋ kʋrɔmarɔ kɩ tɔ darɛ m nɔ ʋ y.
A n bɔkarɛ, kʋ Woso mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka bɩ, a n a ga m dɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ n mannɩ ba k'a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ y.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ heer kookoo kɛɛrɛ k'ʋ gasʋ lɛɛ kʋ Woso n ta ʋ b'ʋ, Yeezuu ma bɩ mannɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
A pɛɛra k'a ta Woso taʋrɛ bɩncɛ bɩ rɛ bɩ kaansʋ kʋ wɔɔ n gasʋ. A zaa daa gʋ wɔɔ m, zaa mɩsɩr m. Pɛɛra k'a kaansʋ bɩ, a mɩŋŋa mɛ bɩ m.
Wɔɔ ɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m, a m Wosocɛ bɩ nyasʋm minzaa.
K'a maam, k'ʋ ʋ zɔ Woso ma kan ʋ heer kɩ haay, heerkoodəbaa m sɩrakarɛ denter nɔ ʋ, heer kʋ zi bʋnyaa haay bɔ ʋ Yeezuu ma tɔ ma, kan mɛ k'a sʋrgɔrɛ yɩ hi mɩŋŋa m kɩ.
Ʋ taaheerlɛ kʋ wɔɔ n ta m, ʋ n'a pa dam bɩ nyasʋ kɔɔkɔɔ, bala, wɔɔ dɔ denter m, ʋ ʋ, hɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ ler bɔ wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, a yɩ ŋ kam wɔɔ ʋ.
Ʋ bɩr ʋ dam kʋ han, zi mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋʋarɛ kan ŋ barɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Ʋ b'ʋ gʋ ʋ sokʋmarɔ tarɛ ma y, ʋ bɩ yɩ am gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʋ ŋ minkə yarlɛ n nɔ wɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, an ta ʋ bɩ, ʋ bɩr kʋ heer yom, ʋ bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʋ, bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Zuuba dɔmɩm y'a zɔm.
Bala, kʋ wɔɔ sɩra dɔ, ʋ tɔ ka, ʋ ʋ gu ʋ nɩ mimbʋnyaa barɛ, mannɩ vanta ba ʋ dɔ an nɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋm wɔɔ ma y.
Kʋ wɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta wɔɔ m bɩ, nyibəə wɔɔ nɩ ba n bɩr a nɔ ʋ, ʋ bɩr dɔm mim k'a nɩ wɔɔ yɩm bɩ ma, mim bɩ do bɩ, dʋdɔyarlɛ k'a nɩ wɔɔ yɩm, ʋ gasʋ sɛ gʋta k'a nɩ Woso jɩnnɔ bɩm bɩ m.
Kʋ gʋaa bɩsɩ ka Moyiisi lɛ bɩ ma, a bɩsɩ bɩ karɛ kasɛtɩzannɔ n ta ʋ hɩɩya, gɛɛ kaakʋ, a zaa bɩ zɛ n nawʋm gər, cicirzɛrɛ ba ʋ y.

Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa Woso Nyɩ bɩ gore bɔ ʋ, bɩ zaa n a ga fɩryɩrɛ m an lɛ da ra? Bala, naa zaa bɩ, dɩga a ʋ, ma kʋ Woso a sa an gʋaasɩbabaa da an a mɩŋŋa sʋrgɔ m bɩ ma hɔnɩbɩr. Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a nɩ barka kam wɔɔ ʋ b'a n'a sʋnsɔ wʋm sɔ.
Bala, wɔɔ Woso k'a hɩ, a ʋ: 'Mɔɔ nɩ zɩm bɔm, mɔɔ n'a sompim gʋaa n'ʋ' bɩ dɔ. A a hɩ sɔ a ʋ: 'Zuuba y'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ kam.'
Kʋ Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ gʋaa ku, k'a dʋdɔ ka, a yɩrɛ a zaa ma kʋsɩ maam-maam.
Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ biisi, a sɩrakarɛ daa baa ma, a Woso lɛɛgure yɩ, a fɩr yɩ gʋta, a a gu a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ zoo bɩ barɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ tɩr awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋ, ŋnɩ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma gʋɔɔ gaa ʋ, awɔɔ tɩr a dam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ rɔ wɔɔ han.
Awɔɔ kɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ du Krista tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ minto, gʋɔɔ awɔɔ hɔnta yɔ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n yɛ a to kan heernyɔɔ kɩ. Bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔnta k'a mɩŋŋabaa lɛ da bɩ m, bɩ nyarɛ ba ʋ y.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a bɩ heerkoodəbaa k'awɔɔ n ta m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ bɩ to y, awɔɔ zɛm bɩ ganwʋrɛ gʋta yɩ.
Pakra m k'awɔɔ n bʋr a ma k'a a da ma, a hɔ k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ ba, k'a hɔ k'a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ.
Naa y'a ka Wosoci bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: A gɔɔta poore, poore tɔkkɛ, gʋaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ n bʋr, a bɩ maasɩrɛ barɛ y.
Bɩ, gʋaa k'an tɩrga mɔɔ mɩm ʋ bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba a nawʋm sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, k'a zaa a bɔ a jɛ m, mɔɔ heer bɩ yɩm nyɩnta kan kɩ dɔ y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ tɩr a bɔ a jɛ m, ŋnɩ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y. Sɩra wɔɔ n'a kam, ʋ nyiro wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ tɔ ma.
Sɩrakarɛ bɩ, kasɛtɩ m gʋaa n ta m a heer ʋ, a ʋ, a hɔ k'a ta a heer lɛ bɩ yɩm, an a dɔ paan••• a heer ʋ a ʋ, hɔ k'a bɩr yɩm mɩm m bɩ ta ʋ denter.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta biisi rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Woso nɔ ŋ yɩ ŋ la.
Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka wɔɔ n a dɔ ʋ ʋ, Woso ɩ durnya da a lemim m. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ yɩm mɩm m haay naa, a to a ʋ hɔ kʋ mɩm bɩr a yɩm nɔ ʋ.

Abɛl sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an mannɩ k'a mɩŋŋabaa cem Kayɛn hɔ han ba an a ka Woso ʋ. A sɩra bɩ karɛ y'a ka Woso n a hɩ a ʋ, a tɩrga a mɩm ʋ, bala, Woso mɩŋŋa yɛ a ganwʋrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma. Abɛl ga, bɩ, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ, a gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam.
Enɔk sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Woso n a busu a zi, b'a n ga y. Gʋɔɔ n a ka ma bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y, kʋ Woso a busu a zi bɩ tɔ ma. Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a ʋ, kʋ Woso n bɔkarɛ an Enɔk busu a zi bɩ, Woso nɔ yɩ ra.
Woso nɔ b'a dam ma an yɩ gɔsɩ ra, k'a zaa n sɩra ka y. Bala, gʋaa k'a n'a zɔm Woso ma b'a ga m an sɩra ka a ʋ Woso ta ʋ, an sɩra ka sɔ a ʋ, Woso gan wʋm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n a kam ma k'a a dɔ rɔ wɔɔ ma.

Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Nowee n zu hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ m b'ʋ. Minno kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ ba rɔ wɔɔ a lɛɛ ka an a hɩ m. Nowee n hɔɔ wɔɔ duro yɩ a mɩm nɩ y, b'a gu an zu hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ b'ʋ. A kɔɔlʋʋ gʋta ba an gasʋ ʋ kan a hargʋɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bɔlɛm yɩ. Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, an a hɩnka a ʋ, a zamaana gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bʋnyaa, a sɩra bɩ karɛ tɔ ma, Woso n dɩga a gʋaa tɩrga.
Woso k'a Abraham bir bɩ, sɩrakarɛ y'a ka, an yɛ Woso ma, an ta tara kʋ Woso n'a kaŋ ʋ k'an yɩ a hɔjirle bɩ ra. A n a hʋr a kʋ b'ʋ, b'a n a dɔ kʋ ta a nawʋm ka y.
A sɩra bɩ karɛ y'a ka an nyɩnta kʋ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ m b'ʋ, am saana hɔ bɩ m. Nyɩnta a ʋ pɛɛracɛrɔ ʋ, Izakkɩ kan Zakɔɔb kɩ nyɩnta pɛɛracɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ sɔ. Lerbɔrɛ deem-deem bɩ Woso a bɔ brɔɔ m.
Bala, Abraham bɩ, dɔ a nawʋm kʋ k'a jɩr paŋŋa n ta ʋ bɩ ma, k'a nyɩnta ʋ. Woso mɩŋŋa n kʋ bɩ do dɔrɛzaa.
Abraham sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an wɔ ʋ an nyɩ yɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, a gusi an cem nyɩyɩrɛ dɔmɩm han, a lʋ Saara maam sɔ. Bɩ, a a gu an sɩra ka a ʋ, Woso hɔ k'a ler bɔ a m bɩ bam.
Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, gʋaa deem taan••• naa tɔ ma, baa k'a gusi an a zɔ zɛ ma bɩ, yaŋŋɔɔ n nyɩnta ʋ gʋta, am monyaarɔ hɔ bɩ m, am nyɩntaayaa k'a nɩ higʋta lɛ ra bɩ m.

Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay, gɩnga ŋ y'a ʋ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ. Ŋ n hɔɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ ŋ nɩ bɩ yɩ y, bɩ, ŋ y'a to ŋnɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro yɩ laatʋ, ŋn'a heer nyɔɔ ŋ tɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ ʋ, saanɔɔ n'a mɩ, bɩ zaakʋrɛzannɔ n'a mɩ sɔ tara burə ʋ naa ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʋ rɔ wɔɔ, a hɩnka ŋ nawʋrɛ ŋ ʋ, a ka a nawʋrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ma.
Kʋ kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kʋrkʋr n ta ŋ nɩ, ŋ toore yɩrɛ ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ ta ŋ ʋ.
Bɩ, ncɩnaaʋ bɛɛ y, a ka ŋ nawʋm kʋ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da ma, arzana ŋn'a kam ma. Naa tɔ ma nɩ, nyannɩ bɩr Woso zɛm kʋ n ŋ bir a gʋɔɔ y, bala, a kʋ banka, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ nyɩnta ʋ.

Abraham sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an yɛ k'a Izakkɩ zɛ Woso m mannɩ, dɔmɩm kʋ Woso a ka lɛɛ k'a dɩga ma bɩ ma. Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ ler bɔ Abraham m k'a nyɩ ka ʋ, an bɔkarɛ Abraham yɛ zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'a nyɩ deem taan••• bɩ ka ʋ mannɩ.
Woso nyɩnta an a hɩ m, a ʋ: Izakkɩ n nɩ yaŋŋɔɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ler bɔ ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ yɩm.
A dɔ Abraham ʋ a heer ʋ a ʋ, Woso ɩ paŋŋa m k'a Izakkɩ mɩm bɔ ʋ, denter sɔ, Woso a ya an Izakkɩ ka Abraham ʋ ɩ ʋ, a mɩm a a bɔ ʋ.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Izakkɩ n Zakɔɔb kan Eso kɩ barka da ʋ ŋ booti mim nɔ ʋ.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m sɔ, Zakɔɔb zɛ k'a b'a zɔ bɩ, a Zozɛf nyɩnɔ wɔɔ barka da ʋ. A n yo a bənkə ma an zerga, an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ.
Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka, Zozɛf n Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ bɔ Eziptɩ ʋ bɩ mim hɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, a garɛ a zɔ. A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ kʋ ŋ n'a yaarɔ gʋr, ŋnɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ bɔrɛ bɩ ma.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Moyiisi zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a nyaakʋm da a yɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, mom bam kaakʋ. Dɩga kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ nyɩ bɩ gʋɛrɛ ma bɩ y'a ka, ŋ n nyi ba cir bɩ lɛ k'a ka bɩ bɩsɩ ka ma nɩ y.
Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Moyiisi k'a b'a ba gʋaa burgu bɩ, a n yɛ kʋ ŋ n'a bir Farawɔn nyɩmbʋɛɛrɛ nyɩ y.
A yɛ k'a fɩr yɩ kan Woso dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an a gu mim bʋnyaa heernyɔɔ k'a nɩ cenim bɩ ma.
A dɔ a ʋ a heer ʋ, a ʋ, k'ɩ fɩr yɩ amba Krista nɩ, a nyɔɔdʋ ta ʋ an lɛ da Eziptɩ hɔnta haay yɩrɛ m. Bala, dɩga a nawʋm ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a ka a gʋɔɔ ʋ bɩ ma.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Moyiisi n a hʋr Eziptɩ kʋ b'ʋ, a n nyi ba cir bɩ nɔmaa nɩ y, an jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, amba gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso kʋ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a yɩ a mɩm m bɩ yɩm.
Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba, an a hɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m kʋ ŋ nɩ ma zaasʋ a hallɛrɔ, kan a sɩgarɔ kɩ ma, kʋ zɛ malɛɛka bɩ bɩ Israyɛl lɛɛkarɛ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ y.
Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n bra higʋta piinə bɩ ma, a tara n gər. Bɩ, Eziptɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ k'a bra ma sɔ bɩ, hi bɩ nɩ ŋ bɩ.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Zeriko pəŋŋəro wɔɔ n a dɩnda, Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr ma dɔmɩm saanhɩna bɩ tɔ ma.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Rahab n ga kan bɩsɩkawosomazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ y, a yɛ an dundolɛɛzizannɔ wɔɔ si a har ʋ an a mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ.
M ya m bɔ hɩ? Toore ba ʋ mɔɔ nɩ Zedenyɔɔ mim dɩndarɛ y, kan Barakkɩ hɔ kɩ, Samsɔn kɩ, Zɛfte kɩ, Davɩd kɩ, Sanwɛl kɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ hɔ kɩ y.
Ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ yar ba ŋn'a so kʋrɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ tɩrgabaa zi ba, ŋnɩ hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ ŋ nɩ yɩ. Ŋ n'a ka poozannɔ n wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ bɩ y.
Ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ sɛrɔ gʋtɔɔ lihi, gʋɔɔ n a ŋʋa k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ hɛnnɔ m, ŋnɩ bɔ lɛ m. Ŋ nyɩnta paŋŋawar nɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ paŋŋa yɩ, ŋ nyɩnta yarbənno wɩsɩrɔ, ŋnɩ bʋr kʋrɔ vantɔɔ yarbənno ra, brɔɔ n a si.

Lannɔ niŋŋoo sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩngarɔ a mɩm bɔ ʋ. Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ fɩr yɩ, ŋnɩ gɩnga sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ n yɛ ŋn'a bɔ a taa m k'a bɩ ga y, a ba ŋ y'a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, k'a wɔ ʋ, a mɩmbɔʋrɛ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da yɩ.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n yɛ gʋɔɔ n yaa wʋ ŋ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ zɛ mawʋr m, ŋnɩ nɔɔrɔ kʋsɩ baŋŋarɔ m, ŋnɩ ŋ du.

Ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ bɩmba jaarɔ m, ŋnɩ ŋ meeyaa bɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ gɔsɩnnɔ zɛ kumbir sii m, gɛɛ ŋnɩ zɛ kargʋ m. Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m nɔɔrɔ n kʋrɔ cɛ ma, ŋn'a dam lɛɛ zi, seero ci gɛɛ biiro ciro ɩ nyɩnta ŋ huuro, ŋnɩ ŋʋazaabaa nɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ nɩ nyannɩ darɛ ŋ ma, ŋn'ɩ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma.

A n bɔkarɛ gʋɔɔ wɩsɩrɔ m Woso mɩm ʋ, durnya naa do gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n a ga m kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro n nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ y. Ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, ŋ ba lɛɛ nɩ y, ŋn'ɩ poo sam kan ciro gaa kɩ, ŋn'ɩ wʋtam yaarɔ ʋ kan ciro yaarɔ kɩ ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay, Woso nɔ nyɔɔ ŋ la ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma. A n bɔkarɛ ŋ n hɔ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ ŋ nɩ bɩ yɩ y.
Bala, Woso hɔ mɩŋŋa k'a lɛ da hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ cɩnta k'a b'a ba wɔɔ m, a ŋʋa a ʋ k'a ka kʋ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro kan wɔɔ kɩ, k'ʋ b'ʋ dakʋ ʋ, ʋ yɩ amba Woso n lɛ n taa kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ bɩ m fasɩ.

Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay kʋ ŋ sɩra ka Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, kasɛtɩzannɔ m, ŋnɩ bɩr wɔɔ ma. Ʋ mɔr haay k'a nɩ wɔɔ tarɛ dam jɩm ʋ bɩ to, kan mimbʋnyaa k'a n'a som wɔɔ ʋ zɔɔ-zɔɔ bɩ kɩ. K'ʋ gɔɔta ʋ ta lɛɛ tee••• hɔ kʋ Woso ʋ wɔɔ n a ba bɩ nɔ ʋ k'an ta an a nyarɛ ku.

Ʋ ʋ mɩm ka Yeezuu zi, a m wɔɔ sɩra bɩ karɛ sɩŋŋɩda kan a nyambʋrlɛ kɩ. A yɛ n n a zɛ gɔdarkʋra ma, a n nyannɩ zɛ k'a ga gɔdarkʋra ma y, bala, dɩga an nawʋm heernyɔɔ niŋŋə k'a nɩ zɛm ba yɩ bɩ ma. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, nyɩnta an nawʋm Woso jɩr ʋ cirbəə nɔ ʋ.
K'a a hɔɔn da ma a dɩga a, a yɛ an fɩr yɩ mimbʋnyaabənno wɔ ʋ, k'a a hɔɔn da ma denter k'a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ to heerzar nɔ ʋ, a paŋŋa n a da y.
Bala, zoo k'awɔɔ n'a bam kan mimbʋnyaa kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ n a ba cɩna an wɔ ʋ a n awɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʋ y.

Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, meerbaarɔ k'a ŋ ba k'awɔɔ heer yo bɩ, ŋ tɔ ba awɔɔ nɔ ʋ ra? A a hɩ, a ʋ: M nyɩnnɩ, ɩ bɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ kʋ Zuuba n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ bɩ ba hɔnɩbɩr y, ɩ b'ɩ heer zar sɔ ɩ bɔ k'a nawʋm zaa ʋ bɩ tɔ ma y.
Bala, gʋaa kʋ Zuuba a ŋʋa bɩ, bɩ zaa an n'a hʋnhʋrm, gʋaa k'a nɩ dɩgam ma a nyɩ bɩ, bɩ zaa an nɩ mawʋr soŋ ʋ.
K'a yɛ fɩr k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ ma, ɩ ʋ, hʋnhʋrlɛ m. Bala, awɔɔ fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, Woso ɩ dɩgarɛ awɔɔ ma a nyɩnɔ. Nyɩ ka n ta ʋ, a zɩ bɩr a hʋnhʋrlɛ?
K'awɔɔ bɩr hʋnhʋrlɛ yɩrɛ amba a nyɩnɔ haay n'a yɩm bɩ nɩ, k'a maam, a nyɩnɔ paan•••rɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y, gʋsɩmarɔ n'awɔɔ m.
Ʋ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ zɩrɔ n'a bam wɔɔ m bɩ tɔ da ʋ nɔ ʋ, wɔɔ hʋnhʋr ŋ nawʋm, wɔɔ nɩ ŋ da ŋ ʋ. Bɩ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ yɛ ʋ Zɩ Woso ma an lɛ da, maam bɩ a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ kam wɔɔ ʋ.
Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ hʋnhʋr ŋ nawʋm dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ bala, amba a a ga m ŋ hɔɔn ʋ bɩ m. Bɩ, Woso bɩ, wɔɔ hʋnhʋr an nawʋm k'a wɔɔ banka kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ amba a mɩŋŋa m.

Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm, wɔɔ heer tɩr a zaar ba fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, heernyɔɔ ba ʋ y. Bɩ, k'a bɩ maasɩrɛ ba fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔ dɩnda fɩr bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a nyɔɔdʋ yɩm, laafɩɩ m kan mɩsɩrbaa tɩrga kɩ.
Awɔɔ kɔ kan Woso hɔɔnhɔ bɩ barɛ kɩ, k'a a ya, a bɩr a bam paan•••, a b'a to y, awɔɔ kɔ kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ kɩ, k'a banka a ta lɛɛ kan kɩ.
K'a zaarɔ tɩrgɔɔ sa, kʋ gʋaa k'a n'a bam k'a do bɩ b'a do y, bɩ k'a n'a banka an jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.
K'a a tɔ ʋ, a bɩr laafɩɩ m kan gʋaa woo••• kɩ. A bɩr mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam, bala, kʋ gʋaa bɩr mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ barɛ a bɩ Zuuba yɩrɛ y.
K'a dundo a zi k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ b'a do Woso barka bɩ ma y. K'a dundo a zi k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gɔnyim kʋsɩ kɩ y. Kʋ n bɛɛ m a lɛɛ warm kʋ ma an a kʋsɩrabaa bɩ da gʋɔɔ gʋta ma.
Gɔsɩ bɩ yɩ jaandər awɔɔ barla, b'a bɩ yɩ Woso hɔɔ gore bɔʋrɛzaa am Eso hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Bɩ yɛ an a jɩtambaa hɔjirle hɛɛ a dam han k'an hɔbɩrɛ ka a ʋ poore k'a bɩ.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, maasɩrɛ k'a bɩ ba bɩ, a a ŋʋa k'a zɩ n a barka da ʋ, bɩ n a gu. A n nyi ka k'a zɩ bɩ n a barka da ʋ ŋʋɩɩ•••, k'an bɩ kɩ haay, an wɔ ʋ an hɔ k'a ba bɩ lʋr y.

K'a dɔ a ʋ, bɩncɛ k'awɔɔ n ta ʋ Woso taa naa, a do bɛɛ m Israyɛl gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta Sinayii ci jɩr ʋ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋn'a wɔ da ma bɩ nɩ y. Sɛ wurə ɩ nyɩnta ci bɩ ma, monsigə n bɩr ma bidə, kan hɩnhɛr gʋta kɩ.
Ŋ huure kan leer kɩ ma b'ʋ. Israyɛl gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kʋ ŋ leer bɩ do ma bɩ, ŋ n a ŋʋa k'a a ya a tʋr ka ma y.
Bala, ŋ n wɔ ʋ ŋnɩ lɛ kʋ leer b'a cɩnta naa do si y. Leer b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Gʋaa k'a n'a nɔm ci bɩ ma bɩ, baa kʋ hɔbɩsɩ m, a zaa bɩmba n nawʋm jaarɔ m an ga.
Hɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ŋ da bɔ ʋ gʋta, baa Moyiisi mɩŋŋa, nyibəə a nyasʋ an kɔ an a hɩ, a ʋ: "Nyibəə ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, mɔɔ mɛ nɩ hinkəm maam-maam."
Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, a zɔ awɔɔ ʋ Siyɔn ci bɩ ma, Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ kʋ bɩ awɔɔ a zɔ ma, arzana Zerizalɛm bɩ m, kan a malɛɛkarɔ tisi-tisi rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

Woso lɛɛkarɛ nyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ heernyɔɔ bam nɔ wɔɔ awɔɔ a zɔ ŋ ma, Woso brɔɔ tɔrɔ gʋrsɩra ba arzana ʋ. A zɔ awɔɔ ʋ Woso ma, a m gʋɔɔ haay dʋdɔkər, a zɔ awɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ kʋ Woso a ka ŋnɩ yɩ amba a lɛ n taa rɔ wɔɔ ma fasɩ.
A zɔ awɔɔ ʋ Yeezuu ma, a m gʋaasɩbabaa daa bɩ zɛkʋrazaa, a zɔ awɔɔ ʋ a ma zaasʋrɛ bɩ ma, a ma bɩ nɩ mimbʋnyaa gʋm gʋɔɔ ma, an nɩ meer bam wɔɔ daahan tɔ ma, an lɛ da Abɛl ma bɩ ra.

Naa minto bɩ, k'a dundo a zi. Woso k'a nɩ meer bam kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a b'a tʋr ta a meerbaa bɩ rɛ y. Awɔɔ yaabɔɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'a tʋr ta a zaa k'a nɩ ŋ bɔm zaa ʋ tara burə ʋ bɩ meerbaa bɩ rɛ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ fɩr yɩ. Bɩ wɔɔ, Woso y'a to brama an nɩ wɔɔ bɔm zaa ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ tʋr ta a meerbaa bɩ rɛ, ʋ ʋ gu ma, wɔɔ fɩr yɩm an lɛ da paan•••.
Biisi bɩ, Woso bɩ leer a ka tara n hinkə, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a ler bɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: Mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m tara hinkə, bɩ, bɩ bɛɛ nɩ yɩrɛ a deem nɩ y, mɔɔ brama hinkəm sɔ.
K'a a hɩ a ʋ: "Mɔɔ yɩ m yam" bɩ, naa ʋ k'a hɩ, a ʋ, hɔɔ k'a ŋ da ŋnɩ hinkəm nɔ wɔɔ hinkəre ŋnɩ nyaam, kʋ hɔɔ kʋ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ hinkə rɔ wɔɔ n gɔɔta ŋnɩ bɩr ta ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ yɩ Woso barkadarɛzannɔ, k'a cirbəə kʋ k'a bɩ hinkəm ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ barka bɩ darɛ ba n nɩ: Ʋ bɩr Woso daŋ ʋ amba a a ŋʋa bɩ m, yɛ a lɛ ma nɔ ʋ, kan a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Bala, wɔɔ Woso bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sɛ k'a nɩ bɩm kɩ. Hɔ k'a bɩr a nɔ yɩm bɩ zaar an n'a barɛ.
Kristagʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr kʋ ŋʋam tee•••,
k'a bɩr saanɔɔ sim mɩŋŋa a hadrɔ ʋ, a bɩ naa tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ y. Bala, gʋɔɔ nyɩnta ŋnɩ naa ba, ŋnɩ malɛɛkarɔ si a hadrɔ ʋ bɩ ŋ n a dɔ ŋ ʋ, malɛɛkarɔ nɩ y.
K'a bɩr a hɔɔn dam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʋ, lɔnnɔcɛ awɔɔ n ta ʋ kan ŋ kɩ. K'a bɩr a hɔɔn dam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʋ, fɩr awɔɔ n'a yɩm sɔ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m.
Gʋaa haay n harcɩntarɛ gore da ʋ, gʋaa kan a lʋ kɩ n bɩr sɩra zi bam kan kʋ kɩ, ŋ bɩ jaan da y. Bala, Woso yɔɔdɩrbənno wɔɔ kan jaandənno wɔɔ kɩ dʋdɔ kam.
A bɩ busoo ŋʋa y, k'a zerga hɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ rɛ, bala, Woso a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ b'ɩbɩɩ tore y, bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ sɔ fɩɩga y.
Naa y'a ka wɔɔ n'ʋ dam ma ʋ a hɩ, ʋ ʋ: Zuuba n mɔɔ daahanzaa, mɔɔ bɩ nyi bam hɔsɩ nɩ y. Bɔ gʋaa n nɩ wɔŋ ʋ an a ba mɔɔ nɩ?

K'a gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ka awɔɔ lɛɛ biisi rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Woso lemim dɩnda awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ. K'a a hɔɔn da ŋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ barɛ lɔɔ ma, kan ga kʋ ŋ y'a ʋ lʋnlɔ bɩ kɩ ma, k'a sɩra ka Woso ʋ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m.
Yeezuu Krista k'a nyɩnta lʋnlɔ jim bɩ, a maam her sɔ a gɔɔtam maam dɔmɩm haay.
A b'a to hɔdɩndarɛrɔ daarɔ do y'a hʋnhɔ rɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ y. Woso barka bɩ y'a da ma an paŋŋa ka wɔɔ heer ʋ, hɔbɩrɛrɔ bɩrɛ minno bɛɛ y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zu minno wɔɔ duro ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n a nyɔɔdʋ yɩ y.
Zɩɩfʋrɔ wɔɔ mannɩbənno kʋ ŋ n'a zi barɛ ŋ Wosocɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ ba lɛ m k'a wɔɔ mannɩduu hɔ bɩ y.

Zɩɩfʋrɔ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ, hɔbɩsɩrɔ k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, ta an nawʋm nɩ Woso taʋrɛ bɩncɛ ʋ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an n'a kam Woso ʋ k'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʋ. Bɩ, sɛ n n'a dam hɔbɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ rɛ kʋ bɩ bɔlɛɛma.
Naa y'a ka Yeezuu mɩŋŋa n bɩ ga kʋ bɩ bɔlɛɛma, k'a gʋɔɔ hu bɔ a ma bɩ m.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʋ bɔ ʋ ta zi amba a mɩŋŋa ga bɔlɛɛma bɩ m, ʋ b'ʋ gu y.
Bala, wɔɔ ba kʋ m tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, ʋ n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔmɩm haay y. Ʋ ka wɔɔ nawʋm booti kʋ bɩ ma.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ʋ bɩr ʋ lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ tee••• Yeezuu tɔ ma. Ʋ lɛ kʋ wɔɔ n'a bɔŋ ʋ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, mannɩ wɔɔ n'a kaŋ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n'ʋ lɛ bɔŋ ʋ tee••• bɩ tɔ ma.
K'a bɩr a bam kʋ m mɩŋŋa, a bɩr a dam kʋ han, a bɩ naa barɛ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ y. Bala, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, mannɩrɔ m, Woso yɩ ŋ ŋʋam.

K'a bɩr yɛm a lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ ma, a bɩr hɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ barɛ. Bala, dɔ ŋ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ ma dɔmɩm haay, kʋ Woso n nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ lar awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ mim ma bɩ y'a ka ŋn'a bam maam. K'awɔɔ ɩ zure ŋ lɛ ʋ, ŋ y'a zi bɩ bam kan heernyɔɔ kɩ. Kʋ n bɛɛ m, zi bɩ ba ŋ nawʋm kan heerzar kɩ, bɩ, naa b'a darɛ awɔɔ han fɩɩga y.
K'a gɔɔta a bɩr yaa dam wɔɔ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ dɔ paan•••, ʋ ʋ, ʋ n a bʋnyaa ba y, bala, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ʋ bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam tee••• hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm gʋta k'a yaa da mɔɔ tɔ ma, kʋ Woso n a ka kʋ m m bɔ m bʋr awɔɔ zi zɔɔ.

Bɩ, kʋ Woso k'a nɩ laafɩɩ kam bɩ n'awɔɔ barka da ʋ. Wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu n wɔɔ dundor gʋta, amba hɔbɩsɩrɔ dundor m, a ma k'a ka Woso ʋ am mannɩ hɔ bɩ m bɩ tɔ ma m. A ma bɩ tɔ ma m sɔ gʋaasɩbabaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ n ta ʋ. Woso a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ.

A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʋ a hɔ haay k'an mɩŋŋa ba, maam bɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ. K'an a ka kʋ hɔ k'a nɔ yɩ haay n kʋ yɩ wɔɔ gʋr zi Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma. Bɩ kʋ Yeezuu Krista tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.
M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm k'a a hɔɔn da meerbaarɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ nɔɔn ma kan bʋraama kɩ, a zu ŋ ʋ. Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ gʋrsɩra ba awɔɔ ma sɔ naa, a bɩ jintə y.
K'a dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ danyɩ Timote bɩ, n y'a bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ b'ʋ. K'a bʋr mɔɔ zi zɔɔ, mɔɔ y'a gaam ʋ zu kʋ ʋ, ʋ bʋr ʋ bɩ dɩga awɔɔ ma.
K'a yaa da a lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ m haay, kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay. Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Italii ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ a m.
Bɩ kʋ Woso barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zakkɩ, Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m. Yaa mɔɔ n'a dam Woso dogʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a kərgu lɛɛ haay ra durnya nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ ɩ fɩr do haay yɩm k'a a heer nyɔɔ,
bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, awɔɔ bʋraama yɩm.
Bɩ, pakra m, k'awɔɔ bʋraama bɩ n a hɩnka fasɩ, k'awɔɔ n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ, hɔsɩ bɩ jɩra a ma y.
Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa y'awɔɔ barla mindɔrɛ n jɩra ma, k'an a yɛ Woso han, a y'a kaŋ ʋ, bala, Woso ɩ hɔ kam gʋaa haay ʋ an lɛ da a zaa n'a yɛm bɩ ra, b'a bɩr meer bam ma y.
A n ta ʋ bɩ, pakra m, k'a zaa n a yɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, a bɩ sɩnsɩm ka y. Bala, gʋaa k'a nɩ sɩnsɩm kam bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ, kan higʋta kurə kɩ, hɩnhɛr n'a yəŋŋəm jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ.
Gʋaa naa do lɔɔ n a ga m an a gɩnga a ʋ, a hɔ yɩm Zuuba zi y.
Bala, hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya zaa m, a heer n sɩra ka kan hɔsɩ barɛ kɩ y.
Kristagʋaa k'an ŋʋazaa bɩ n a heer nyɔɔ, bala, Woso a busu.
Kʋ kristagʋaa kʋ hɔntazaa m bɩ, n a heer nyɔɔ sɔ, bala, Woso a ka an zer. Sɩra nɔ ʋ, hɔntazaa cenim amba burvu tɩr sur bɩ m.
Bala, kʋ woso haan, b'a gu kan paŋŋa kɩ an na bur bɩ ma, bur bɩ n ga, a vu bɩ n sur, a gʋɛrɛ k'an ta ʋ bɩ n nyaam. Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, hɔntazaa n cem zɔɔ-zɔɔ a zibəəro dɔmɩm ʋ.
