Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ makra nɔ ʋ bɩ m. Bala, k'a wɔ makra b'ʋ an bɔ ʋ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ yɩm, ganwʋrɛ kʋ Woso a ler bɔ k'a ka gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ n bɩ.
Kʋ gʋaa ɩ makra lɛɛ, a b'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Woso nɩ mɔɔ makra barɛ y." Bala, mimbʋnyaa b'a dam ma an Woso makra ba y, bɩ Woso mɩŋŋa bɩr gɔsɩ makra bam k'an mimbʋnyaa ba y.
Bɩ, gʋaa lɛtaama bʋnyaa ɩ tɩr a zaa gaa an wɔ ʋ an a da makra ʋ, k'an mimbʋnyaa ba.
Kʋ lɛtaama bʋnyaa bɩ paŋŋa yɩ a zaa zi, b'a a ka a zaa n mimbʋnyaa ba. Kʋ mimbʋnyaa bɩ ba an nya, b'a zaa ga.
M danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, a b'a nyʋnnyɔɔ y.
Hɔ mɩŋŋa haay kʋ wɔɔ n'a yɩm, ganwʋrɛ k'an mɩŋŋa fasɩ haay, a to a nawʋm Woso zi, brama, a ɩ lɛɛgurehɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ da. A mɩŋŋa bɩr a lʋrm fɩɩgaa y, bɩ monsigə ba zi y.
A mɩŋŋa ɩ hɔɔn bɔ ʋ a zim, an mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ ʋ a lemim k'an sɩra bɩ m. A ba a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ kʋ wɔɔ n yɩ lɛɛkarɛzannɔ hɔɔ daarɔ k'a nɩ ŋ dam nɔ wɔɔ barla.
M danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, a ʋ, gʋaa biyəə a ga m an bɩr a tʋr kam mɩŋŋa, b'a bɩ nyagɩra ba k'a meer ba, a bɩ nyagɩra ba sɔ k'a nɔmaa ba y.
Bala, nɔmaa kʋ gʋaa n'a bam bɩ bɛɛ n'a kam an hɔ k'an tɩrga Woso mɩm ʋ bɩ ba y.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a hɔ k'an bʋnyaa a heer ʋ haay to, a a gʋ mimbʋnyaa haay ma.
A bɩ ŋʋaar ba a mɩŋŋɔɔ m a ʋ, a y'a tʋr kam Woso lemim bɩ ma y, k'a sa a zi bam paan•••.
Bala, gʋaa k'a n'a tʋr kam lemim bɩ ma b'a bɩr zi bam nɩ bɩ, bɔ a ʋ kʋ ʋ, kan gʋaa k'a nɩ dɩgarɛ a meer ma jɛtɩga ʋ kɩ,
dɩga k'a ʋ a ma an a hʋr bɩ, a meer bɩ k'an lʋnlɔ bɩ, an bɩ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ lɛɛm.

Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ bɩ k'an mɩŋŋa fasɩ bɩ karɩnda bam k'a zu ʋ bɩ, a kʋsɩ a nawʋm ma taalɛra nɔ ʋ, a bɩr a tʋr kam ma bala k'a b'a tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ y, bɩ, zi an n'a bam nɩ, Woso bɩ zaa bɩ barka daŋ ʋ, a zibəə haay nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ gʋaa ʋ, zu a nawʋm Woso ʋ b'a bɩr bʋrlɛ a nɛɛm ma kan meerbaarɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ, bra an n'a barɛ a mɩŋŋa m, wosozuure bɛɛ m bɩ y.
Wosozuure k'an mɩŋŋa, dintim ba ma Zɩ Woso mɩm ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: Ʋ nyasʋ sʋnnɔ m, kan zonno kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩm nɔ kɩ m, ʋ dundo ʋ zi kʋ durnya hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ b'ʋ da mimbʋnyaa barɛ ma y.
M danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista n nɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m gʋta, awɔɔ n sɩra ka ʋ. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a n a ga m k'awɔɔ n gʋɔɔ jirə bɔ y.
Ʋ makra sa, a a da ma, gʋɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ n bɩ gasʋ awɔɔ sokʋma nɔ ʋ, deem n huu mɩŋŋa du a ma an sarma tolleŋŋarɔ dɩnda a nyʋkʋnnɔ ma, deem n bɩr ŋʋazaa an huu yaarsɩrɔ du a ma.

K'awɔɔ gʋaa k'a huu wɩsɩrɔ du a ma bɩ nyaasɩ ka mɩŋŋa, a bɔkarɛ a hɩ m a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ, bʋr ɩ nyɩnta bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa naa do ʋ", a bɔkarɛ a hɩ ŋʋazaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ, jɩm brama" gɛɛ, a hɩ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr ɩ nyɩnta tara ʋ naa ʋ, mɔɔ gam taa".
K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ, jirə bɛɛ awɔɔ bɔ a barla ra? Bɩ, naa k'awɔɔ n'a bam naa, a ba bɛɛ awɔɔ ʋ dʋdɔkənno hɔɔndarɛ bʋnyaarɔ m na?

M danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, k'a tʋr ka mɩŋŋa! Woso gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋʋazannɔ m durnya naa do ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bɔ ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔnta paan••• kʋ sɩrakarɛ m bɩ yɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ yɩ, Woso ɩ cirbəə bɩ do ler bɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a ŋʋam nɔ wɔɔ m.
B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ ɩ ŋʋazannɔ gore bɔŋ ʋ. A n bɔkarɛ, hɔntazannɔ wɔɔ nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ awɔɔ m dʋdɔkənno taa.
Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ tɔ mɩŋŋa kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ma bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋm.
N y'a da Wosoci b'ʋ, n ʋ: "Ɩ ɩ mim ŋʋa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m", Woso cirbəə bɩ mɩsɩrbaa zaa n naa do. K'awɔɔ ɩ zuŋ ʋ, awɔɔ y'a bam mɩŋŋa.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ, mimbʋnyaa awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, b'awɔɔ ɩ kʋrɔma nɔ ʋ, bala awɔɔ n zu Woso lɛ b'ʋ y.
Bala, kʋ gʋaa ɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ haay, k'a bɩ bɔ deem la m, bɔ a ʋ ŋ haay la m.
Bala, Woso y'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ jaan da y," a a ya an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ gʋaa meeyaa bɔ ʋ y." Bɩ kʋ gʋaa n jaan da y, an bɔkarɛ an gər zɛ, bɩsɩ a a ka lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma.
Kʋ meer awɔɔ n'a bam, kʋ zi awɔɔ n'a bam, k'a dɔ a ʋ, lɛ k'a nɩ soamɩŋŋaʋ kam bɩ, Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a sa an awɔɔ dʋdɔ ka m.
Bala, gʋaa k'a n a mim cicir zɛ bɩ, Woso b'a cicir zɛm dʋdɔkarɛ nɔ ʋ y, bɩ kʋ gʋaa y'a muno cicir zɛm, a bɩ nyi bam dʋdɔkarɛ nɩ y.
M danyɩnɔ, kʋ gʋaa ʋ, a sɩra ka Woso ʋ, an bɔkarɛ a bɩr sɩrakarɛ zibəəro sɩ barɛ y, sɩrakarɛ k'a ʋ, a ta m bɩ y'a dam ma an a bʋmbɔ ra?
A a da ma kristagʋaa n ta ʋ yar gɛɛ lʋ, ŋ b'a huuro m k'a du a ma, bɩ ŋ ba hɔsɩ m k'a bɩ y.
K'awɔɔ gʋaa deem a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a doo laafɩɩ, a huu du a ma, k'a hɔ bɩ mɩŋŋa." B'awɔɔ n hɔ k'a jɩra ŋ ma bɩ ka ŋ ʋ y, meerbaa naa do nyɔɔdʋ ta ʋ ra?
Ncɩnaaʋ sɔ bɩ, sɩrakarɛ k'a bɩr zi bam bɩ, hɔgər m fasɩ.

A a da ma gʋaa n a hɩ, a ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ sɩrakarɛ m, mɔɔ nɩ zibəəro m. Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a zaa m, m ʋ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ bɩ hɩnka m m, zibəəbarɛ war nɔ ʋ, kʋ m m zibəəro wɔɔ barɛ hɩnka a ɩ m, k'ɩ dɔ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩ sɩrakarɛ m.
Ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka ɩ ʋ, Woso deem taan••• n ta ʋ, ɩ y'a bam mɩŋŋa, bɩ, zinəro naa dɔ sɔ, ŋn'ɩ nyi bam.
Yarma ra, a dɔ ɩ ʋ, sɩrakarɛ k'a bɩr zi bam bɩ vam.
Wɔɔ yaaba Abraham bɩ, a zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y'a ka Woso n a ba tɩrga ra, k'a yɛ k'a mannɩ ba a nyɩ Izakkɩ m bɩ bɛɛ ra?
Ɩbɩɩ dɔ kɛɛrɛ ɩ ʋ, Abraham sɩrakarɛ bɩ, zu a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan a zibəəro kɩ, a zibəəro wɔɔ y'a ka a sɩrakarɛ bɩ n yɩ paan•••.
Ncɩnaaʋ m, hɔ kʋ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ n kʋ yɩ, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʋ, am naa, Woso n dɩga a gʋaa tɩrga." Woso n a bir a gʋaasɩba sɔ.
Awɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ a ʋ, Woso bɩ, gʋaa ba a nawʋm tɩrga a zibəəro tɔ ma, a sɩrakarɛ y'a deem tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
Yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ kan lʋmɩŋŋahɛɛrɛzaa Rahab kɩ, a zibəəro y'a ka Woso n tɩrgabaa ka ʋ, Israyɛl dundolɛɛzizannɔ k'a ŋ si a har ʋ, an zaa vanta hɩnka ŋ nɩ ŋn'a sa ŋn'a hʋr bɩ tɔ ma m.
Denter m, amba gʋaa nyi nɩ bɔrɛ a mɛ ʋ, a zaa nɩ gam bɩ, sɩrakarɛ k'a n zu kʋ ʋ kan zibəəro kɩ bɩ, hɔ gər m sɔ.
M danyɩnɔ, a b'a ka ma k'a yɩ hɔdɩndagʋɔɔnzannɔ woo••• y. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, wɔɔ kʋ ʋ nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʋɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, n wɔɔ dʋdɔ kam kʋsɩ an lɛ da.
Bala, wɔɔ haay, wɔɔ ɩ kʋrɔm ma. Gʋaa k'a bɩr kʋrɔm ma a meerbaa nɔ ʋ bɩ, gʋaa tɩrga m fasɩ, a a da ma an bʋr a mɩŋŋa ma jilli.
Kʋ wɔɔ tɩr sarbɩr da sisiro lɛ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ zu wɔɔ ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ y'ʋ so ŋ mɛ b'ʋ jilli sɔ ŋn'ɩ wɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ bam.
K'a dɩga kɔɔlʋʋ gʋtɔɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ, kʋ ŋ bɩ to ŋnɩ gʋta maam-maam, hɩnhɛr gʋtɔɔ nɩ ŋ nyɔɔtam bɩ, ŋ hɔ poore n ta ʋ, an a ka ŋn'ɩ tam lɛɛ haay k'a brarɛzaa bɩ lɛ n taa b'ʋ.
A maam sɔ kan gʋaa nɛɛm kɩ, vəŋŋə poore m gʋaa mɛ ʋ, an bɔkarɛ an n'a mɩŋŋa busum hɔɔ gʋtɔɔ barɛ mim nɔ ʋ. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, sɛ poore a da ma, an poo gʋta bɩ.
Gʋaa nɛɛm bɩ do m bɩ, sɛ m sɔ, an ta hɔ bʋnyaa haay m, wɔɔ mɛ b'an ta ʋ, an nɩ dintim kam wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ma jilli, an nɩ sɛ dam wɔɔ ma haay, sɛhar sɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋa ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ a da ma, ŋn'ɩ hɔmɩsɩr haay tʋntɔrɛ, poohɔɔ kan bɛnnɔ kɩ, hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ kʋ ŋ n'a gaatam kan zɔnɔ kɩ, ŋ wɔ ŋ ʋ denter.
Bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an nɛɛm tʋntɔ y. Hɔ bʋnyaa m, an nɩ lɛɛ sam, gʋɔɔ meeyaa bɔʋrɛ nyɩsɩ y'a han.
Ʋ nɛɛm wɔɔ sa, ʋ n'ʋ lɛ bɔm Zuuba ʋ, ʋ Zɩ b'ʋ, ʋ n'a sam sɔ, ʋ nɩ lɛ kʋsɩ dam gʋɔɔ n'ʋ, an bɔkarɛ Woso yɩ ŋ da ŋnɩ bɔ a mɩŋŋa rɛ.
M danyɩnɔ, a n a ga m kʋ wɔɔ lɛ deem-deem bɩ n bɩr ler mɩŋŋa bɔm, an bɩr a bʋnyaa bɔm sɔ y.
Hiyəə ba ʋ, an nɩ bɔm hi nyɩnta m kan hi kʋsɩ kɩ nɩ y.
Sɔɔn b'a dam ma an tʋgɔ nyɩ da y, gɛɛ dɩvɛn gɔ n sɔɔn nyɩ da y. Yɛhiyəə b'a dam ma, an bɔ hi nyɩnta nɩ y.
Gʋaa y'awɔɔ barla an mim dɔ ra? K'an a hɩnka mɩsɩrbaa tɩrga nɔ ʋ, bʋraama zibəə nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, kʋ jɩmbaa kan heer kʋsɩ kɩ, lɛɛzaabaa kama kɩ y'awɔɔ heer han, a b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ y, b'a bɩ sɩra gore bɔ ʋ a ŋʋaarlɔ nɩ y.
Bala, mindɔrɛ naa do n a to Woso zi y, durnya hɔ m, a to a ʋ gʋɔɔ zi, bɔ a ʋ Sʋtaana zi.
Sɩra nɔ ʋ, lɛɛ kʋ jɩmbaa n ta ʋ, gʋɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma con bɩ, lɛɛ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, hɔ haay woo••• yɩm bʋrga, ziro bʋnyaarɔ n nyɩnta ʋ sɔ.
Bɩ, mindɔrɛ k'a a to Woso zi bɩ y'a hɔ, a mɩŋŋa, laafɩɩ kama m, a bʋgʋ-bʋgʋ, kʋmarɛ kama m, cicirzɛrɛ m gʋta, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ m gʋta, jɩmbaa b'a nɔ ʋ, bɩ zambʋ b'a nɔ ʋ sɔ y.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a kam ma kʋ laafɩɩ n bɩr ta ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, tɩrgabaa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba ŋ nawʋm laafɩɩ kama nɔ ʋ, a nyɔɔdʋ bɩ, tɩrgabaa mɩsɩrbaa ŋn'a yɩm.
A a ba lɔ awɔɔ bɩr kʋ marɛ, an nɩ nyaa bam kan kʋ kɩ tee•••? K'awɔɔ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ nɩ zoo bam awɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma m.

Awɔɔ lɛ taa hɔɔ niŋŋoo ma, b'awɔɔ bɩr ŋ yɩrɛ y, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ y'a kam ma k'a gər zɛ, awɔɔ ɩ jɩm bam bɩ hɔsɩ bɩr kʋyɩrɛ awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ n a ka awɔɔ nɩ zoo bam an nɩ nyaa bam kan kʋ kɩ. Awɔɔ bɩr hɔsɩ yɛm Woso han y, bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ ba hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ nɩ y.
Awɔɔ y'a yɛm b'awɔɔ bɩr a yɩrɛ y, k'awɔɔ bɩr a yɛm han mɩŋŋa bɩ tɔ ma, bala, a yɛ awɔɔ nawʋm k'a sa, a a hɔɔnhɔ ba m.
Taalɛrazannɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y! Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ durnya jɛ ʋ, Woso jɩm n'ɩ mɩ ra? Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa durnya ma bɩ, a ba a nawʋm Woso jɩm.
A hɔɔn awɔɔ n'a darɛ a ʋ, hɔ kʋ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ vam m na? A a hɩ a ʋ, Woso ɩ jɩm bam k'a a Ɛspri ka wɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, a y'a barka kam wɔɔ ʋ gʋta, bɩ tɔ ma m Wosoci bɩ n a hɩ a ʋ, Woso y'a gum mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ ma, b'a ɩ barka kam mɩŋŋazerlezannɔ ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer a yɛ Woso ma. K'a a gu Sʋtaana ma, a y'a sire an a gʋ awɔɔ ma laatʋ.
K'a zɔ Woso ma, a y'a zɔrɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ. Awɔɔ k'an kʋrɔmazannɔ, k'a zi bʋnyaa barɛ to! K'a heer hu bɔ hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya zannɔ ra!
K'a heer zaar ba a kʋrɔmarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma! K'a zɛ heerzar ba a nyi ka! K'a yaawʋrɛ to a nyi ka, k'a a heernyɔɔ bɩ to, a a heer zar!
K'a a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer Zuuba taa, k'an awɔɔ busu.

M danyɩnɔ, a ba bʋnyaa hɩ kʋ ma y. Gʋaa k'an a bʋnyaa hɩrɛ a mim ma, gɛɛ an a dʋdɔ karɛ, a bʋnyaa an n'a hɩm Woso lɛ ma, an nɩ Woso lɛ bɩ dʋdɔ kam. Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ Woso lɛ bɩ dʋdɔ kam, ɩ ba ɩ ʋ, a dʋdɔkər, a zuurezaa bɛɛ n'ɩ mɩ dɔ y.
A n bɔkarɛ, Woso y'a deem taan••• nɩ lɛ bɩ kam, a y'a deem taan••• m dʋdɔkər sɔ. A n n'a dam ma an gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔ, an n'a dam ma an ŋ zaar ba sɔ. Nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ n'ɩ mim dʋdɔ karɛ?
K'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma kɛɛrɛ, awɔɔ k'a n'a hɩrɛ a ʋ: "Her, gɛɛ booti m, wɔɔ tam kʋ na ʋ gɛɛ kʋ na ʋ, ʋ gɔɔta b'ʋ dɔɔraa deem, ʋ ter ba ʋ busoo yɩ,"
awɔɔ n a dɔ k'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ yɩm lɔ booti nɩ y, bala, awɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sɛbtur kɩ, k'a bɔ b'a nyaam lɛɛm.
A ga awɔɔ ʋ m, a hɩ a ʋ: "Kʋ Zuuba yɛ, wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ, ʋ na ba kan na kɩ."
A n bɔkarɛ a lɛ awɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ a dɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ. Lɛbɔaʋ naa do lɔɔ bʋnyaa.
Gʋaa k'a hɔ k'a ga barɛ m dɔ, b'a n a ba y, a zaa mimbʋnyaa ba.
Hɔntazannɔ wɔɔ, k'a tʋr ka mɔɔ ma, k'a nyi ka a baa da, bala, awɔɔ fɩr yɩm gʋta.
Awɔɔ hɔnta bɩ, hɔ vəm m, bɛɛ y'awɔɔ huuro bɩm sɔ.
Tankampiisi y'awɔɔ sarma kan awɔɔ busoo kɩ zaar bam, ŋ zaarbarɛ bɩ nɩ nyɩntam kasɛtɩ an awɔɔ bɩ, am sɛ hɔ bɩ m. Awɔɔ hɔnta gʋr a kuntə jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔm nɔ ʋ.
Awɔɔ n gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ zi ba awɔɔ hɔsɩrarɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ yawʋra ba y, k'a a tʋr ka, ŋ yɩ zee dam, bɩ, ŋ zee bɩ darɛ lee ku Zuuba k'a paŋŋa jirə ba ʋ bɩ zi.
Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nyɩnta yɩ tara burə ʋ, a a hɔɔnhɔ yɩ, awɔɔ hɔ bɩ gʋta a mɛ ka am hɔbɩsɩrɔ m, bɩ awɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ dɔmɩm y'a kum.
Awɔɔ gʋaa tɩrga dʋdɔ yar, a meeyaa bɔ ʋ, a n wɔ ʋ an jɩm awɔɔ lɛɛ y.
M danyɩnɔ, ʋ bʋr ʋ ma, kʋ Zuuba n tolle ba an bʋr. K'a makra sa danwur ma, bʋr a nawʋrɛ a ma an nɩ dɔm mɔsa ma, k'a a tara zibəə hɔ yɩ, an nɩ dɔm lɛɛkarɛ labarɛrɔ, kan jɛ labarɛrɔ kɩ ma.
Awɔɔ, k'a bʋr a ma sɔ, a bɩr heer koodə m, bala, Zuuba wusigəre dɔmɩm a zɔ.
M danyɩnɔ, a bɩ kukur ba kʋ ma y, kʋ Woso b'a dʋdɔ ka y. K'a dɩga a, ba dʋdɔkər bɩ nɩ cɛlɛ ma na.
M danyɩnɔ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ŋnɩ meer ba Zuuba tɔ ra rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ fɩr yɩ, bɩ ŋ bʋr a ma fɩr bɩ nɔ ʋ. K'a ŋ hɔbaa sa.

K'a dɩga a, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ y'a hɩm wɔɔ ʋ, ŋ mimbirenyɩnta. Awɔɔ Zɔɔb k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩr nɔ ʋ bɩ mim ma, awɔɔ hɔ kʋ Zuuba a ba m fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʋ bɩ dɔ sɔ, bala, Zuuba ɩ gʋɔɔ cicir zɛm gʋta, an n'a mɩŋŋa barɛ ŋ nɩ.

M danyɩnɔ, an lɛ da bɩ, a b'a wer si y, a b'a wer si brama tɔ nɩ, b'a ba si tara tɔ nɩ y, a b'a wer si fɩɩga y. K'awɔɔ yɛ mim ma, k'a ʋ ɩɩn••• bala. K'awɔɔ n yɛ, k'a ʋ ayy•••. A bɩ hɔsɩ na ma y, kʋ Woso b'awɔɔ dʋdɔ ka y.
Kʋ gʋaa y'awɔɔ barla an nɩ fɩr yɩm k'an yaa da. Kʋ gʋaa nɩ heernyɔɔ m, k'an laa lɔ an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ.
K'awɔɔ gʋaa deem bɩ laafɩɩ, k'an kristagʋɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ bir, kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɔɔ nɔ ma Zuuba tɔ ra, ŋnɩ yaa da a tɔ ma.
Kʋ ŋ yaa bɩ da kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ, yaabazaa bɩ laafɩɩ yɩm, Zuuba y'a waam, k'a mimbʋnyaarɔ ba sɔ, Zuuba sugur kaŋ ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mimbʋnyaarɔ bɔ a lɛ ma, a hɩ kʋ m, k'a yaa da kʋ tɔ ma, kʋ Woso n a waa. Gʋaa tɩrga yaadarɛ ɩ zi bam kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Elii nyɩnta gʋaa am wɔɔ m, a yaa da Woso m ŋʋɩɩ•••, kʋ la bɩ ba y, denter sɔ, la a gʋsɩ dɔɔraa kaakʋ kan a kur kɩ.
A n a ya an yaa da, kʋ la bɩ n ba, Woso n a ka la bɩ n ba, hɔbɩrɛ n nyɩnta ʋ tara burə ʋ.
M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ gʋaa deem nyaam, an Woso zaa k'an sɩra bɩ to, kʋ gʋaa a ka an a ya an bʋr zaa bɩ ra,
k'a dɔ a ʋ, gʋaa k'a ka mimbʋnyaabər n a bɔ a mimbʋnyaabarɛ zaa ʋ, k'a zu Woso ʋ bɩ, a zaa bɩ meeyaa a a bʋmbɔ, an a ka sɔ, baa k'a mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋta, Woso n ŋ sugur ka ʋ haay.

Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pɩyɛɛr nɩ ci bɩ bam, Yeezuu Krista zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m. A ba mɔɔ nawʋm awɔɔ kʋ Woso a bɔ ʋ k'a yɩ a gʋɔɔ a hɩsɩga da, a m saanɔɔ Pɔn kʋ ʋ kan Galasii kʋ kɩ ʋ, Kapadɔs kʋ kɩ ʋ, Azii kan Bitinii kʋrɔ kɩ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma.

Zɩ Woso y'awɔɔ bɔ ʋ, amba a lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta a hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʋ k'a ba bɩ tɔ ma, a y'a so awɔɔ ʋ, a Ɛspri k'a a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n yɛ Yeezuu Krista ma, k'a ma bɩ n'awɔɔ hu bɔ. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm, kʋ Woso n a barka, kan a laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta.
Ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ bɩ, bala, a cicirzɛrɛ gʋta bɩ nɔ ʋ, a a ka wɔɔ n yɩrɛdaa yɩ, k'ʋ taaheerlɛ paan••• yɩ, Yeezuu Krista k'a a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
A ba a ʋ maam kʋ wɔɔ n hɔjirle k'a b'a dam ma an vɔn gɛɛ an dintim ka, gɛɛ a paŋŋa n a bɔ ʋ yɩ, hɔjirle bɩ do Woso a cɩnta awɔɔ m arzana ʋ.
Awɔɔ kʋ Woso paŋŋa nɩ dɔrɛ a ma sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n bɩ bʋmbɔrɛ k'an b'a hɩnkam lɛɛm jɛ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ yɩ.
Bɩ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n'a heer nyɔɔm gʋta, baa kʋ pakra m k'awɔɔ n fɩr yɩ dɩɩtaa, makrarɔ y'a hʋnhɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ heer zarm dɔmɩm poorero nɔɔn duro nɔ ʋ.

Fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ makra an n'a bam, kʋ sɩrakarɛ paan••• m gɛ. Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ mɩŋŋabaa lɛ da sarma m, hɔcenlezaa m bɩ, an bɔkarɛ n tɩr a makra ba sɛ ʋ, k'a mɩŋŋabaa dɔ. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ makra jɛ ʋ, awɔɔ lɛbɔʋrɛ kan cirbəə kɩ, daʋrɛ kɩ yɩm dɔmɩm kʋ Yeezuu Krista n b'a hɩnkaŋ ʋ b'ʋ.

Awɔɔ ɩ Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa ŋʋam b'awɔɔ n a yɩ a mɩm nɩ y, awɔɔ sɩra ka ʋ, b'awɔɔ n a yɩ cɩna y. Naa tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n'a heer nyɔɔm heernyɔɔ gandaa ʋ m, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an heernyɔɔ gʋta bɩ do dɔ an a hɩ y.
K'awɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'a nyiro wɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ bɩ, bɩ y'a ka Woso ʋ awɔɔ n sɩra ka.
Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta biisi ŋnɩ so Woso lɛ ra, ŋnɩ barka kʋ Woso ʋ k'a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ mim hɩ bɩ, ŋ bʋmbɔrɛ k'awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ bɩ daasɩ ŋn'a a ka.

A ka ŋ y'a ʋ ma, k'a minno kʋ Krista Ɛspri b'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ bɩ kʋyɩrɛ dɔmɩm kan ŋ zaarɔ kɩ dɔ, bala, Ɛspri bɩ do k'a nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ bɩ lɛɛ ka an fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʋ Krista n'a yɩm bɩ mim hɩ, kan lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a n'a yɩm, fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʋ bɩ kɩ.

Bɩ, Woso a hɩnka a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ duro m, a ʋ, lemim k'a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ so ra bɩ, a n a ka ŋ bɔɔm tɔ ma y, awɔɔ hɔ m. Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do padənno wɔɔ a hɩ awɔɔ m, bɩ, a pa ŋ y'a da awɔɔ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kʋ Woso a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ m. Malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n lɛ taa k'a lemim bɩ do dɔ gʋta.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a a banka, k'a ta lɛɛ kan zibəə kɩ, a b'a zu a ʋ y, k'a barka kʋ Woso n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ Yeezuu Krista hɩnkarɛ ma bɩ ta a heer lɛ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Amba nyɩnɔ nɩ yɛrɛ a zɩrɔ ma bɩ, k'a yɛ Woso ma, a b'a ya a zu lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ k'awɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ biisi badɔ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ y.
Bɩ, amba Woso k'awɔɔ bir bɩ n mɩŋŋa bɩ, awɔɔ sɔ k'a bɩr mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa bam a tarɛ haay nɔ ʋ.
Bala, Woso a hɩ a ci b'ʋ, a ʋ: "K'a yɩ mɩŋŋa, bala, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa."

Woso k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ dʋdɔ kam b'a bɩr ŋ jirə bɔm bɩ, awɔɔ nɩ yaa dam nɩ a ʋ, a Zɩ m, gʋaa biyəə dʋdɔ an n'a kam amba a zaa zibəə a ga m bɩ m. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a gɔɔta awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n'a bam tara burə ʋ bɩ ba, Woso mɩŋŋa daʋrɛ kan a nyibəə kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyɔɔdʋ ba ʋ, awɔɔ zɩrɔ n a to awɔɔ m bɩ, Woso awɔɔ yɔ b'ʋ. Bɩ, hɔ k'a n'a zaar bam, gɛɛ wanzurfu gɛɛ sarma bɛɛ a a sa, an awɔɔ yɔ nɩ y.
Awɔɔ yɔ a ʋ, Krista ma kʋ n b'a dam ma n a lɛ hɩ bɩ m, bɔ b'ʋ kʋ ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm k'a m mɩŋŋa, hɔ bʋnyaa sɩ ba ma bɩ kɩ.
Woso lɛɛ ka an a bɔ ʋ, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya ba ʋ y. Kɛɛrɛ naa, a a hɩnka jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ, awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma.
A tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n sɩra ka Woso ʋ, bɩ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, an lɛbɔʋrɛ ka ʋ, yɩ a ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ kan awɔɔ taaheerlɛ kɩ n yo Woso ma.
Yɛ k'awɔɔ ʋ sɩra ma b'a ka, awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ hu n bɔ, k'a a da ma, a kʋ ŋʋa paan••• danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ. K'a kʋ ŋʋa gʋta noom hu m.
Bala, yɩrɛdaa awɔɔ yɩ, b'a n a to gʋaa zi y, gʋaa ɩ gam, bɩ Woso y'awɔɔ yɩ, a garɛ ba ʋ y. A lemim k'an mɩsɩr a cenle ba ʋ b'a sa an awɔɔ yɩ m.
Amba Wosoci n'a hɩm bɩ m bɩ: Gʋɔɔ haay bɔ kʋ ʋ kan bur kɩ, lɛbɔʋrɛ kʋ ŋ nɩ tam haay bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan burvu kɩ, kʋ bur bɩ ga, b'a vu bɩ sur.
Bɩ Zuuba lemim b'ɩ gɔɔtam dɔmɩm haay. Bɩ, lemim bɩ do bɩ, lemim nyɩnta kʋ n y'a pa da awɔɔ m bɩ m.
K'a bʋnyaabaa do haay to kan ŋʋaar do haay kɩ, noombakʋma kɩ, a bɩ jɩm ba y, b'a b'a bʋnyaa hɩ gɔsɩ ma y.
Amba nyɩnɔ poorero nɩ nyonhi ŋʋam bɩ, k'a Woso lemim k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ ŋʋa tee••• k'a a da ma a ma Woso zaa bɩ nɔ ʋ, a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Bala, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩm denter, a ʋ: Awɔɔ b'a dɔ a ʋ, Zuuba mɩŋŋa.
K'a zɔ Zuuba ma, jaa mɩsɩr m, gʋɔɔ n kaanm m, bɩ, Woso dɩga a jaa tɔzaa m, an a bɔ ʋ.

K'a a zɔ ma, bala, awɔɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan jaa mɩsɩɩrɔ kɩ sɔ, kʋ Woso n awɔɔ sa an awɔɔ ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri cɛ. Awɔɔ yɩrɛ a mannɩbənno kʋ ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa ka ʋ, k'a mannɩrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a to Sɛnt-Ɛspri zi rɔ wɔɔ ba a ŋ ka Woso ʋ, a yɩ ŋ ŋʋam Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
Bala, Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʋ, n ʋ: K'a dɩga a, mɔɔ ɩ jaa paŋŋazaa cɩntam Siyɔn ʋ, mɔɔ y'a bɔ ʋ, jaa tɔzaa m gʋta, gʋaa k'a sɩra ka ʋ bɩ, a bɩ nyannɩ bɩrɛ y.
Awɔɔ k'a sɩra ka ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, jaa naa do tɔ ma awɔɔ ɩ lɛbɔʋrɛ m, bɩ kʋ bɩsɩkənno wɔɔ nɩ, Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Jaa kʋ cɛdonno wɔɔ kaanm m bɩ y'a ba cɛ bɩ jɩrjaa paŋŋazaa.
Wosoci b'a y'a an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: Jaa bɩ do a ba gʋɔɔ gənzɛrɛ jaa, ŋ dore jaa. Kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka Woso lemim b'ʋ bɩ y'a ka ŋn'a gəm zɛm ma, Woso lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʋ.

B'awɔɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ bɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, cir m Woso m, a mannɩbənno n'awɔɔ m, gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso a so ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, Woso mɩŋŋa y'awɔɔ ba a hɔ, k'awɔɔ n a zibəəro gʋtɔɔ wɔɔ pa da, a y'awɔɔ bir an bɔ awɔɔ m monsigə ʋ, an bʋr awɔɔ m a lɛɛgure k'an mɩŋŋa gʋta b'ʋ.
Biisi bɩ, Woso bɩ gʋɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a gʋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m. Biisi bɩ, Woso n a cicirzɛrɛ hɩnka awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a awɔɔ cicir zɛ.
M danyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, cenlezannɔ n'awɔɔ m tara burə ʋ naa ʋ, saanɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a gʋ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ ma, a ka ŋ nawʋm ma k'a awɔɔ zaar ba.

K'awɔɔ nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ kristagʋɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ bire ʋ bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'an zore ba, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ ŋ y'awɔɔ tɔ zaar barɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʋ, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ, kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ, maam bɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʋ, hinni k'a n'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ nɩ b'ʋ.
K'a yɛ lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya ʋ naa ʋ haay rɔ wɔɔ ma Zuuba tɔ ma. Kʋ cir nɩ, k'a yɛ ma k'a m cir bɩ tɔ ma.
Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ cir n cɩncɩnta kʋ ŋ n a so lɛɛrɔ ʋ wɔɔ nɩ, k'a yɛ ŋ ma sɔ, ŋ cɩncɩnta a ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ hʋnhʋr, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa bam nɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Bala, Woso lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam, kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ, ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma ŋnɩ hɔsɩ hɩ y.
K'awɔɔ a so a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba, b'a bɩ yo soamɩŋŋaʋ bɩ do ma, k'a bʋnyaa ba y. Bɩ k'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba, kʋ Woso zibəənyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ tɔ ma.
K'a gʋɔɔ haay da ʋ, k'a danyɩnɔ Krista nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa, k'a nyi ba Woso m, k'a cir da ʋ sɔ.

Awɔɔ kʋ zibəənyɩnɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ a soʋrezannɔ wɔɔ ma daʋrɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ, k'a ba ncɩnaaʋ kan bɔɔ n nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa barɛ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ. K'a ba ncɩnaaʋ sɔ, kan bɔɔ n kʋsɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Bala, kʋ gʋaa ɩ yɛm fɩr ma Woso tɔ ma, bɩ kʋrɔ bɛɛ a ʋ ma an nɩ fɩr bɩ do yɩrɛ, Woso nɔ ɩ yɩm bɩ zaa ra.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bʋnyaa ba, ŋnɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, nka n'a lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʋ naa tɔ ma? Bɩ, k'awɔɔ mɩŋŋa ba, n nɩ bɔkarɛ n nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ nɩ yɛm ma bʋraama nɔ ʋ, Woso nɔ ɩ yɩrɛ awɔɔ ra naa nɔ ʋ.
A n bɔkarɛ Woso bɩ, awɔɔ bir a ʋ, naa tɔ ma. Bala, Krista fɩr yɩ awɔɔ tɔ ma, an n'a ŋʋam k'awɔɔ n a hɔbaa sa.
A mɩŋŋa n mimbʋnyaa sɩ ba y, a n ŋʋaar ba fɩɩga y,
n y'a sʋnsɔ wʋ, b'a n a sompi gʋaa n'ʋ y, gʋɔɔ fɩr ka ma, b'a n nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ y, a mɩŋŋa to a ʋ, Woso wɔ ʋ, bɩ n nɩ dʋdɔ kam tɩrga.

A mɩŋŋa ɩ yɛ an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ sa an fɩr yɩ ŋ nɩ, an ga gɔdarkʋra ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, gəəno n wɔɔ m wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ, k'ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ba tɩrgabaa nɔ ʋ. A mɩŋŋa sampɔɔrlɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n laafɩɩ yɩ.
Bala, biisi bɩ, awɔɔ nyaam am seero hɔ bɩ m, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ a bɔ a bʋr a dundor bɩ zi, an nɩ dɔrɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ.
Lannɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ sɔ, k'a zu a zino wɔɔ lɛ ʋ, maam bɩ, kʋ gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʋ, ŋ bɩr sɩra kam Woso lemim b'ʋ, kʋ ŋ lannɔ wɔɔ zibəə n a ka, kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Woso ʋ, baa kʋ ŋ n meer ba y.
Ŋ y'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'an mɩŋŋa, an nɩ zure ŋ lɛ ʋ bɩ yɩm.
A b'a ka ma k'a a mɛ gʋɛrɛ da ma, mintɔɔnrɛ m, gɛɛ sarma nyɛɛnnɔ nɩ, gɛɛ garbarɛ waasɩ nɩ y.
Bɩ k'a ka k'a gʋɛrɛ bɩ n bɩr a heer ʋ, bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdabaa kan bʋraama kɩ gʋɛrɛ bɩ, bɩ nyarɛ ɩ ba ʋ y, a nyɔɔdʋ ta ʋ sɔ Woso mɩm ʋ gʋta.
Lannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta biisi ŋn'ɩ zum Woso ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, gʋɛrɛbaa naa do ŋnɩ ta m, ŋn'ɩ zure a zino lɛ ʋ.
Nyɩnta Saara ʋ ncɩnaaʋ, an nɩ yɛm Abraham lɛ ma, an n'a birm a zuuba, k'awɔɔ y'a mɩŋŋa bam, awɔɔ bɩr a tom hɔsɩ nɩ nyibəə darɛ a ma, awɔɔ nyɩntarɛ a nyɩnɔ.

Awɔɔ k'an zino wɔɔ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba kan a lannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a dɔ a ʋ, ŋ paŋŋa n awɔɔ hɔ ku y, k'a daʋrɛ zi ba kan ŋ kɩ, bala, ŋ mɩsɩrbaa denter bɩ hɔjirle yɩm sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ, Woso barka bɩ nɔ ʋ. K'a ŋ da ʋ, kʋ hɔsɩ b'a ta a yaadarɛ nɩ y.
Meer naa do ba mɔɔ nawʋm kan awɔɔ haay kɩ kɛɛrɛ: K'a ka, k'a hɔɔn n bɩr deem, a bɩr kʋ cicir zɛm, a bɩr kʋ ŋʋam danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ, a bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam kʋ m, a bɩr mɩŋŋazerle m.
A b'a bʋnyaa sompi gʋaa nʋ y, kʋ gʋaa awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋ, a b'a sʋnsɔ wʋ sɔ y. Bɩ, k'a barka da ʋ, bala, awɔɔ bir Woso ʋ, k'awɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba ncɩnaaʋ, k'awɔɔ n a barka hɔjirle yɩ.
Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Kʋ gʋaa lɛ taa mɩsɩrbaa ma, k'a taʋrɛ n yɩ a ma mɩŋŋa, a zaa a ga m, an meerbaa bʋnyaa barɛ to, kan ŋʋaarbarɛ kɩ.
K'a zaa n a bɔ a bʋnyaa barɛ ʋ, an a mɩŋŋa ba, an bɩr a kam ma tee••• kʋ laafɩɩ n bɩr gʋɔɔ bire ʋ.
Bala, Zuuba mɩm ɩ gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ ra, an n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ yaadarɛ ma, bɩ, a bɩr yɛm gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a bʋnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ ma y.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ ŋʋarɛ, nka n n'a bʋnyaa barɛ awɔɔ nɩ?
Baa k'awɔɔ fɩr yɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ tɔ ma, k'a dɔ a ʋ, mimbirenyɩnta m. A bɩ nyi ba gʋɔɔ nɩ y, b'a b'a heer kɔ y.
Bɩ, k'a Krista da ʋ a heer nɔ ʋ, a m Zuuba. K'a banka mɩŋŋa, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, kʋ gʋɔɔ awɔɔ lar taaheerlɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ mim ma, k'a a da ma a jɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa.
Bɩ, k'a jɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ bʋgʋ-bʋgʋdabaa m, kan daʋrɛ kɩ m, a bɩr noom hu m. Maam bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ tɔ zarm, ŋn'a bʋnyaa hɩrɛ awɔɔ tarɛ ma Krista Zuure tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyannɩ bɩrɛ.
Bala, k'awɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm zi mɩŋŋa k'awɔɔ n'a bam tɔ ma, kʋ Woso hɔɔnhɔ m maam nɩ, naa jɩra fɩr yɩ a bʋnyaa barɛ tɔ ma m.

Krista mɩŋŋa ga wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, ga a ʋ gallɛm deem taan•••, a mɩŋŋa tɩrga, an bɔkarɛ an ga gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma, a ba a ʋ maam, k'a wɔɔ gaa a bʋr wɔɔ m Woso zi, n y'a zɛ gər a mɛsim nɔ ʋ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ya, an mɩsɩrbaa ka ʋ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ do a nyɩnta m biisi, an Woso lemim pa da m. Pa bɩ da a ʋ, bayɛrɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nyɩnta ʋ, ŋnɩ gɩnga, ŋnɩ gəənokʋ ʋ, lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Bayɛrɛzannɔ wɔɔ duro dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ, Woso bʋr a ma, Nowee nɩ kɔɔlʋʋ bɩ bam. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bɩ gʋta y, ŋ gʋaa sinnyə ŋnɩ bɔlɛm yɩ hi bɩ wakatɩ ʋ.

Dɩɩtaa sɔ naa, bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ yɩ awɔɔ ʋ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ, batɛm kʋ wɔɔ n'a sim bɩ bɔkʋrɛ m minno wɔɔ duro m. Batɛm bɩ bɩr wɔɔ mɛ dintim sʋrgɔrɛ y, bɩ, a ka a nawʋm wɔɔ nɩ hɔɔn bɔŋ ʋ, k'ʋ zu Woso ʋ kan noom hu kɩ. Bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ yɩ wɔɔ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ Yeezuu Krista a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
A a busu, an ta arzana ʋ, an nɩ nyɩntam Woso bɩsɩ ra, malɛɛkarɔ haay kan lɛɛsoʋzannɔ kɩ, paŋŋazannɔ kɩ haay nɩ zure a lɛ ʋ.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, kʋ Krista fɩr yɩ a mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ, awɔɔ sɔ, k'a naa da a heer ʋ a dɔ a ʋ, gʋaa k'a fɩr yɩ a mɛsim nɔ ʋ bɩ, a a gʋ mimbʋnyaa ma.
A n a sa dɩɩtaa ma, k'a dɔmɩm k'a gɔɔta awɔɔ m k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba tara burə ʋ bɩ sa, a Woso hɔɔnhɔ ba m, a b'a sa a lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ gʋɔɔ nɩ ŋ ŋʋam bɩ ba nɩ y.

Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʋ biisi, a bawosodonno mɩsɩrbaa ba bɩ, a kɔ an bʋrbɔ kɛɛrɛ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʋ bɩ, ta awɔɔ nawʋm yɔka, a n nɩ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ m, a n nɩ bɛɛ mim waasɩ, a n nɩ hɔ bɩm waasɩ, a n nɩ hɔ mim waasɩ, a n nɩ yaa dam wosobaawɔnnɔ m zibʋnyaabarɛ nɔ ʋ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, bawosodonno kʋ ŋ nɩ dɩgarɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ bɩr a mɩŋŋɔɔ kam zibʋnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro barɛ ʋ kan a kɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋn'a dɔ kʋ bɔ an n'a hɩrɛ y, am naa, ŋn'awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋm.
Bɩ, Woso zɛm bɩ ŋ da lɛ ʋ, ŋn'a zi bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ mim nyɩ bɔ ʋ, Woso mɩŋŋa a banka an nya, k'a gʋɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ kan gəəno kɩ dʋdɔ ka.

Naa y'a ka, n nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, n brɔɔ dʋdɔ ka, amba n nɩ gʋaa woo••• dʋdɔ kam bɩ m, lemim bɩ pa n y'a da ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri tɔ ma, amba Woso n mɩsɩr bɩ m.
Hɔ haay nyarɛ a zɔ, maam bɩ, gʋaa biyəə n bʋr a ma, a b'a zu a ʋ y, k'a a da ma, a bɩr yaa dam.
A n lɛ da haay bɩ, k'a bɩr kʋ ŋʋam paan•••, bala, ŋʋarɛ ɩ hɔ kam mimbʋnyaa yɔɔgʋ ra.
K'a saana ba kʋ m, b'a bɩ kukur ba y.
Woso ganwʋrɛ y'a hʋnhɔ ka awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə ʋ, gʋaa biyəə n zi ba a ganwʋrɛ bɩ m, a mim daahan tɔ ma. K'a ba ncɩnaaʋ, amba zibəənyɩnɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ m, a nyasʋ Woso barka k'a nɩ zi hɔka bam bɩ m mɩŋŋa.

Kʋ gʋaa ɩ lemim padarɛ ganwʋrɛ nɩ, k'an Woso lemim pa da. Gʋaa k'a nɩ daahan zi bam bɩ, k'an a ba paŋŋa kʋ Woso a ka ʋ bɩ m. K'a ba ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ Woso n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ hɔ haay woo••• nɔ ʋ, Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma. Woso mɩŋŋa y'a so lɛbɔʋrɛ ʋ, kan paŋŋa kɩ dɔmɩm haay, Amina.
M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, a bɩ dɩga fɩr k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma naa ma, ɩ ʋ, mim daŋŋada nɩ, a zɛ kədə y.
K'a a heer nyɔɔ, bala a na awɔɔ ʋ Krista ma a fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ, maam bɩ, k'a lɛbɔʋrɛ b'a hɩnka, awɔɔ nyɩntam heernyɔɔ nɔ ʋ sɔ.
Kʋ gʋɔɔ y'awɔɔ sʋnsɔ wʋm Krista tɔ ma, mimbirenyɩnta m kan awɔɔ kɩ, bala, Woso Ɛspri kʋ lɛbɔʋrɛ Ɛspri m b'ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ.
A b'a ka, awɔɔ gɔsɩ n fɩr yɩ, k'a gər zɛ, gɛɛ k'a kom ba, gɛɛ k'a zi bʋnyaa ba, gɛɛ k'a a lɛ zu gʋɔɔ minno ʋ tɔ ma y.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ gʋaa ɩ fɩr yɩm, kʋ kristagʋaa m bɩ tɔ ma, nyannɩ b'a zɛ y, k'an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ denter, kʋ n n'a birm kristagʋaa bɩ tɔ ma.
Dɔmɩm kʋ Woso n nɩ dʋdɔ kam b'a ku, a sa a nawʋm a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma. Bɩ, k'a sa a nawʋm wɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n sɩra ka Woso lemim nyɩnta b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, kʋ dʋdɔ bɩ ŋ ku, a yɩrɛ ŋ ma lɔ?
Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Gʋɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩm, B'a wer nyɩntaŋ ʋ. K'a maam, a nyɩntam gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kan mimbʋnyaabənno kɩ ma lʋnlɔ?
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩm Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ to a darɛzaa Woso wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam. Taalɛrazaa m Woso m.

Lɛɛzannɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m ŋ dʋndɔ. Lɛɛzaa m mɔɔ m sɔ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, bɩ Krista fɩryɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa m mɔɔ m sɔ, mɔɔ nyɩntam lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a n'a hɩnkam b'ʋ sɔ. Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba n nɩ:
K'a nyasʋ bakʋ kʋ Woso a da awɔɔ wɔ ʋ bɩ m mɩŋŋa. A bɩ dɔ ma pakra nɩ y, k'a dɔ ma heernyɩnta m, amba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m. A bɩ dɔ bakʋ bɩ ma sɔ, k'a busoo yɩ y, bɩ k'a dɔ ma kan a heer kɩ haay.
A b'a so gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ da a wɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ paŋŋa nɩ y, bɩ k'a a tɔ ʋ k'a hɔbaarɔ n bɩr mɩŋŋa, kʋ gʋɔɔ n a da ma ŋnɩ ŋ sa.
K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ, kʋ dundonno jɩtaarɛ bɩ bɩ bʋr, a y'a kam awɔɔ n nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a bɩr a zarm bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ ma. Awɔɔ haay k'a bɩr mɩŋŋazerle m kan kʋ kɩ, bala, Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʋ: Woso bɩr yɛm mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ wɔɔ ma y, b'a y'a barka bɩ kam mɩŋŋazerlezannɔ ʋ.
K'a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer Woso taa, a paŋŋa ɩ lɛ da haay, maam bɩ, a y'awɔɔ gore daŋ ʋ a dɔmɩm ʋ.
K'a minno kʋ ŋ n'awɔɔ kɔm nɔ wɔɔ haay da a wɔ ʋ, bala, a mɩŋŋa ɩ nyasʋrɛ awɔɔ m.
A b'a zu a ʋ y, k'a dundo a zi. Sʋtaana awɔɔ jɩm b'ɩ kumkum lɛɛ ma am poozaa hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ baa dam, an n'a kam gʋaa ma k'a nyasʋ a bɩ.
K'a a da a lɛ ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ, sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʋ, a dɔ a ʋ, awɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ danyɩnɔ yɩm sɔ durnya b'ʋ jilli.

Awɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʋ, bɩ, Woso k'a a so barka do haay ʋ, an awɔɔ bir, k'awɔɔ n nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ, Krista zuure nɔ ʋ bɩ y'awɔɔ bankam fasɩ, an awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra, an a ka awɔɔ n jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, hɔsɩ b'a darɛ awɔɔ ma y.
A y'a so paŋŋa ʋ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.

Wɔɔ danyɩ Silas mɔɔ da ʋ, an ci poore naa gʋrsɩra ba, kʋ m a nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma. Mɔɔ ɩ dɩgam ma sɩrabarɛzaa sɩrakarɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ ma, kʋ m awɔɔ heer yo, kʋ m a hɩ a m paan••• m ʋ, Woso barka denter b'awɔɔ n a nɔ ʋ naa, k'a gɔɔta a nɔ ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso ŋ ba a gʋɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ sokʋma k'a nɩ Babɩlɔnnɩ ʋ naa ʋ b'ɩ yaa darɛ a m. Mɔɔ nyɩ Markɩ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m sɔ.
K'a yaa da kʋ m mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa danyɩbaa nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, kʋ Woso laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay k'a nɩ Krista nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Simɔn Pɩyɛɛr, mɔɔ nɩ ci bɩ bam, Yeezuu Krista zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, a zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m sɔ. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋm awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ k'a sɩrakarɛ n hɔdeem kan wɔɔ hɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ. Yeezuu Krista m wɔɔ Woso, a m wɔɔ Bʋmbɔrɛzaa sɔ, a tɩrgabaa y'a ka, awɔɔ n sɩra ka.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʋm k'awɔɔ n bɩr Woso dɔm, kan wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu kɩ, k'a a da ma a barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ yɩ gʋta.

Woso zi ba a paŋŋa bɩ m, an a ka wɔɔ nɩ hɔ haay kʋ wɔɔ ʋ ga m ʋ a yɩ, k'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ba a zuure nɔ ʋ mɩŋŋa bɩ m. A ka k'a ʋ wɔɔ n Krista dɔ bɩ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ bir a lɛbɔʋrɛ kan a paŋŋa kɩ m.

Yɩ a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ, an hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋtɔɔ Woso n ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ ka wɔɔ ʋ, ŋ ka a ʋ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a a yɔ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya ʋ, ŋn'ɩ gʋɔɔ zaar bam nɔ wɔɔ m. K'a wɔ ʋ, a Woso mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa ba.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a a tɔ ʋ paan••• a mɩsɩrbaa zore na a sɩrakarɛ bɩ ma, a Woso dɔrɛ na mɩsɩrbaa zore bɩ ma.
A a tɔ ʋ gʋta, a a da a mɩŋŋa ma, k'a tʋntɔʋrɛ na daamɩŋŋama bɩ ma, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ na tʋntɔʋrɛ bɩ ma,
k'a a tɔ ʋ sɔ, a bakʋmmɩŋŋa na mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ ma, k'a ŋʋarɛ na bakʋmmɩŋŋa bɩ ma.
K'awɔɔ ɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro bam tee•••, ŋ y'a karɛ awɔɔ n ziro ba gʋta a bɩr wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista dɔm tee•••.
Bala, gʋaa kʋ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ba zi bɩ, bʋʋ n a zaa m, an n'a wɔ dɩndam, a tɔ ba a nɔ ʋ dɔ, a ʋ, n y'a mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ a ma biisi y.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, Woso y'awɔɔ bɔ ʋ, k'a a tɔ ʋ, a gɔɔta a zuure nɔ ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ. K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʋ, awɔɔ b'a dom fɩɩga y.
Yɩ a nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ, Woso n zaa ka awɔɔ ʋ fasɩ, awɔɔ n gasʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kʋ wɔɔ Bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ cirbəə kʋ k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ b'ʋ.
Naa tɔ ma m, mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam kʋ m bɩr hɔɔ nɔɔn duro tɔ darɛ awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, baa k'awɔɔ ŋ dɔ kara, an nɩ zum sɩra naa do ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam m ʋ, a a ga m kʋ m bɩr hɔɔ nɔɔn duro tɔ darɛ awɔɔ nɔ ʋ tee•••, kʋ mɔɔ gɔɔta m m mɩsɩr naa dɔmɩm ʋ, k'awɔɔ b'a zu a ʋ y.
Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ hʋrlɛ a zɔ durnya naa ʋ, amba wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista nyɩnta an a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m tɔŋ ʋ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, mɔɔ baʋrɛ jɛ ʋ, awɔɔ a da ma dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʋ a hɔdɩndarɛrɔ nɔɔn duro tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
Bala, yo bɛɛ wɔɔ ʋ ŋʋaar dɔrɛ noonno ma, ʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista k'a nɩ zɛm kan paŋŋa gʋta kɩ bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y. A mɩŋŋa yɩ wɔɔ ʋ ʋ zim a lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ.
Wakatɩ kʋ Zɩ Woso daʋrɛ kan lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ ka ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ nyɩnta b'ʋ. Woso mɩŋŋa nyɩnta a lɛbɔʋrɛ gʋta nɔ ʋ, an meer ba kan kɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ Nyɩ m naa do, mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam gʋta."
Nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ ʋ kan kɩ ci mɩŋŋa bɩ burə ʋ bɩ, wɔɔ leer naa do k'a a to brama bɩ ma ʋ zim.

Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wɔɔ sɩra ka gʋta, ʋ ʋ, lemim kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ, sɩra m. A a ga m, k'awɔɔ n lemim bɩ si mɩŋŋa, bala, fɩtɩrɛ m, an nɩ yɔm monsigə ʋ, k'a gɔɔta a lemim bɩ si kʋ lɛɛgure dɔmɩm n a ku, kʋ Krista k'a bɔ kʋ ʋ kan dɔgta monyaa kɩ bɩ n bʋr, an lɛɛ gu awɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
A n cem haay bɩ, k'a dɔ a ʋ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an wosolɛsinnɩsorameerbaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Wosoci b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ jɩ dɩnda a zim nɩ y.
Bala, gʋaa bɛɛ hɔɔn bɔ ʋ a zim, k'a wosolɛsinnɩsora meer ba y, fɩɩga. Bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a ka gʋɔɔ n wɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ Woso lɛ si, ŋnɩ so ra.

Biisi bɩ, ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ nyɩnta ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ dogʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla. Kɛɛrɛ sɔ naa, ŋʋaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ barla. Ŋ gasʋm hɔdɩndarɛrɔ bʋnyaarɔ m awɔɔ bire ʋ lɔɔ•••, ŋnɩ bɩsɩ ka Zuuba k'a ŋ bʋmbɔ bɩ ma. Naa ŋn'a bam hʋnhʋrlɛ n bɩ daata zɛ ŋ la, an ŋ zar.
Gʋɔɔ gʋta zure ŋ jɛ ʋ, ŋ jaandarɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a kam gʋɔɔ n sɩra zaa bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ.
Busoo lɛtaama gʋta y'a sore ŋ ʋ, bɩ n a ka, ŋnɩ bra ba awɔɔ m meerbaarɔ nyɩntɔɔ m, k'a hɔ yɩ awɔɔ gʋr zi. Bɩ, Woso lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta tee••• k'a ŋ dʋdɔ yar, ŋ zaarbarɛ ɩ zɛm k'a bɩ ŋ ku.
Makrarɔ ba n nɩ: Woso n malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ kʋrɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ to y, ŋ nyɔɔ a ʋ, an ŋ da sɛhar ʋ, ŋnɩ baŋŋarɔ n'a ma monsigə ʋ, ŋnɩ dɔm dʋdɔyarlɛ hinni ma.

Woso n durnya k'a nyɩnta ʋ biisi bɩ to y, a a ka hi gʋta n bʋr an bɩ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zaar ba, nyɩnta brɔɔ ʋ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ. Bɩ, Woso Nowee bʋmbɔ, kan gʋɔɔ vantɔɔ kɩ saanhɩna. Bɩ nyɩnta an nɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ pa dam.
Woso Sodɔm kʋ kan Gomɔɔr kʋ kɩ dʋdɔ yar an a ka sɛ n bɩ ŋ zar. A ba a ʋ maam, k'a hɔ k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ yɩm bɩ hɩnka.
A Lɔttɩ yɔ, nyɩnta b'ʋ gʋaa tɩrga, an nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bʋnyaa bam a zamaana nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ, a heer n'a zarm.
Bala, k'a mɩŋŋa n tɩrga, an nɩ ŋ kʋ b'ʋ bɩ, a yɩ ŋ zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ yɩm, an nɩ ŋ mim mam, naa n a ka k'an tɩrga bɩ, a heer nɩ kɔm, gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.

Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a yɩm minno nɔɔn duro haay nɔ ʋ, ʋ ʋ, zaa kʋ Zuuba n'a sam, an n'a gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔm bɩ, a a dɔ. K'a y'a bam lɔ sɔ an gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ to, k'a bɩ ŋ dʋdɔ ka dʋdɔyarlɛ hinni ʋ, a fɩr ka ŋ ma, a a dɔ sɔ.

A fɩr kam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zure a lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma, an lɛ da. Brɔɔ bɩr yɛm Woso ma y. Ŋʋaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ kʋ mɔɔ ŋ mim hɩ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ heer ka, mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ m sɔ, ŋ leer ba malɛɛkarɔ ʋ y, brɔɔ sʋnsɔ ŋ n'a wʋm a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
Baa malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ da ŋʋaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m a paŋŋa kan a lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ bɩr malɛɛkarɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yarlɛ y, bɩ ŋ bɩr ŋ sʋnsɔ wʋm Zuuba lɛɛ y.
Bɩ gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro bɔ kʋ ʋ kan poohɔɔ kɩ, ŋ hɔɔn ba ʋ y, ta ŋ nawʋ ʋ, kʋ n nɩ bɩ ŋ gʋr baŋŋarɔ ʋ, n nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ. Hɔ kʋ ŋ n a dɔ bɩ n n'a sʋnsɔ wʋm. N zɛm bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ am poohɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.

Kʋ ŋ y'a ka gʋɔɔ ŋ fɩr yɩ bɩ, fɩryɩrɛ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ yawʋra sɔ. A lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ ŋʋa ŋ tɩr a ʋ, ŋnɩ ŋ ba sinsebir ma. A so k'awɔɔ ʋ tɩr a ʋ kʋ ma, k'a kʋ ŋʋarɛ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ, nyɩnta kʋ ŋ tɩr a ʋ kan awɔɔ kɩ ŋnɩ bɩr a heer nyɔɔm a ŋʋaar zibəə nɔ ʋ bɩ, ŋ taʋrɛ awɔɔ bire ʋ b'ɩ nyannɩ darɛ awɔɔ ma.

Ŋ ba zibəə m kʋ dɩga lannɔ ma, k'a mim bʋnyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ bɛɛ y. Ŋ bɩr kɔm kan mimbʋnyaa barɛ kɩ y, ŋn'a kam sɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ paŋŋa ba ʋ Woso zaa bɩ ra rɔ wɔɔ, ŋn'a dam mimbʋnyaa ʋ kan ŋ kɩ. Busoo yɩrɛ lɛtaama y'a so ŋ heer ʋ jilli. Woso lerbɔrɛ kʋsɩ ɩ kan ŋ kɩ.
Ŋ zaa tɩrga bɩ to, ŋn'a nyʋnnyɔɔ. Bozɔɔr nyɩ Balam zaa bɩ ŋ y'a sa, bɩ yɛ an a bʋnyaa ba k'a busoo yɩ.
Bɩ, Woso həən si ma a kʋrɔma bɩ tɔ ma. Bra bɩr meer barɛ y, bɩ, hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, bra meer ba kan kɩ am gʋaa hɔ bɩ m. Yɩ a ʋ, ncɩnaaʋ bra bɩ n wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ hɔɔzaabaa zibəə bɩ da jɩm ʋ.
Ŋʋaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ nɔɔm bɔ kʋ ʋ, kan hiyəə gəəro kɩ. Ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ sɔ kan warkʋ kʋ hɩnhɛr gʋta nɩ cenim nɩ kɩ, Woso lɛɛ banka ŋ nɩ monsigə gʋta ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩ gɔɔta ʋ.
A lɛ ŋn'a bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʋ meerbaa vanvannɔ m, ŋn'ɩ ŋʋaar bam gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɔ nyaanlɛzannɔ bire ʋ lɛɛm nɔ wɔɔ m. Naa ba ŋ nawʋm a jaandarɛ lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ m, kʋ brɔɔ n jaan da sɔ.
Soamɩŋŋaʋ ler ŋn'a bɔm gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro m, an bɔkarɛ mimbʋnyaa lɔnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ m. Bala, kʋ hɔ a so ɩ ʋ, hɔ bɩ do lɔ n'ɩ mɩ.

Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista, kʋ wɔɔ Bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɔlɛm yɩ durnya zibəə bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dintim kam gʋaa ma rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʋ. Bɩ, kʋ ŋ y'a ya, ŋnɩ gasʋ minno wɔɔ duro barɛ ʋ, hɔɔ wɔɔ duro barɛ n'a so ŋ ʋ, a yɩrɛ ŋ ma bʋnyaa gʋta, an lɛ da biisi m.
Kʋ jɩra ŋ y'a ʋ zaa k'an tɩrga bɩ dɔrɛ ra, k'a jɩra hɔɔ. Bɩ, ŋ y'a ku ŋn'a dɔ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a bɔ Woso lɛrɔ kʋ ŋ y'a dɩnda ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.

Mim niŋŋə k'a ŋ yɩ naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, hɔ kʋ bɔɔr naa do a hɩ naa, sɩra m, a a hɩ, a ʋ: "Ji b'a bɔ, an aa hɔ k'a bɔ a rɛ bɩ bɩ." A a y'a an a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ: "Kurkur kʋ n y'a sʋrgɔ lɛɛm-lɛɛm b'a ya an ta, an n'a birmim bɩtɛ ʋ."

M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, mɔɔ ci hɩɩyazaa m naa, mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma. Ciro hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔm haay nɔ ʋ bɩ, m ya mɔɔ ʋ, m nɩ som hɔɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ dɔ hɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ ra, kʋ ŋ tɔ n bɩr awɔɔ nɔ ʋ, k'a bɩr a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma, amba a a ga m bɩ m.

Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n meerbaarɔ kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ nyɩnta ŋn'a ba biisi rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ. K'a wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista, kʋ wɔɔ Bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ lɛ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ. A zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a ŋ da ʋ, ŋn'a dɩnda awɔɔ m.
K'a ser ka a dɔ a ʋ, jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ nyɩntaŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩsɩrbaa bam a lɛtaamarɔ bʋnyaarɔ tɔ ma bala.
Ŋ yaa wʋrɛ awɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Yeezuu a hɩ a ʋ, a zɛm, gɛɛ lɔ? Bɩ bɔ m, an bʋr? Bala, wɔɔ zɩrɔ gɩnga laatʋ, bɩ durnya bɩ gɔɔta an n'a bɩncɛ ʋ, amba a nyɩnta ʋ a darɛ dɔmɩm ʋ bɩ m."

Meerbaa naa do kʋ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n'a bam naa, a tɔ ŋn'a bɔrɛ a nɔ ʋ, ŋ ʋ, biisi-biisi bɩ, Woso nyɩnta an meer ba, an a ka, brama kan tara kɩ n nyɩnta ʋ. Tara bɩ banka a ʋ hi m, zu a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan hi kɩ tara bɩ n ta ʋ.
Bɩ, durnya k'a nyɩnta ʋ biisi bɩ, hi a a zaar ba m sɔ.

Bɩ, Woso lemim deem-deem bɩ do a hɩ sɔ, a ʋ, kʋ sɛ n bɩ brama kan tara kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ʋ her lɔ nɔɔm zaar ba. Ŋ to Woso ʋ, k'a bɩ ŋ zaar ba hinni k'a nɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bɩr yɛm ma rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm, an ŋ zaar ba b'ʋ.
Bɩ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ, hɔ deem n ta ʋ, a n a ga m k'awɔɔ n a tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʋ y. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ: Zuuba mɩm ʋ, dɔmɩm deem bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, dɔɔraa tisi m, dɔɔraa tisi n bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, dɔmɩm deem m.

Gʋɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʋ, Zuuba bɩr hɔ k'a ler bɔ bɩ bam zɔɔ y. A bɩ ncɩnaaʋ y. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, bʋr a nawʋrɛ a ma kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a lɛ baa, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ n nyaam bɩ tɔ ma. A ŋʋa a nawʋm kʋ gʋaa haay n a bɔ a taa m, an sugur yɛ.

A n bɔkarɛ, hinni kʋ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʋ bɩ, yɩ a nawʋrɛ am koor hɔ bɩ m. Hinni bɩ do ʋ bɩ, brama nyaanɩm bʋrga guta maam-maam nɔ ʋ, sɛ n hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama haay bɩ. Tara burə kan hɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a nɔ ʋ haay kɩ mim bɔm garga ra.
K'a yo sɛ n nɩ zɛm bɩ hɔ haay bɩ bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m a mɩsɩrbaa k'awɔɔ a ga m, a ba bɩ dɔ. Awɔɔ a ga m, a a mɩsɩrbaa ba zorebaa nɔ ʋ, a bɩr hɔ k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam hɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
A bɩr dɔm Woso dɔmɩm bɩ ma, a bɩr a tʋntɔŋ ʋ gʋta, k'an bʋr zɔɔ. Hinni bɩ do ʋ, sɛ n nɩ brama zaar baŋ ʋ, hɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ haay n faan sɛwurəro wɔɔ sebtur nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ, Woso brama kan tara daa kɩ ler bɔ, tɩrgabaa nyɩntam durnya daa bɩ do ʋ. Naa wɔɔ ta ʋ heer lɛ, ʋ nɩ dɔm ma.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ, kʋ dɔ wɔɔ nawʋm dɔmɩm naa do ma bɩ, k'a a tɔ ʋ paan••• a bɩr mɩŋŋa, kʋ minsi bɩ nyɩnta a ma Woso mɩm ʋ y, k'a bɩr laafɩɩ m kan kɩ.

K'a dɩga wɔɔ Zuuba bʋraama bɩ ma, a dɔ a ʋ, toore an n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʋ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ. Wɔɔ danyɩ Pol kʋ wɔɔ n'a ŋʋam bɩ, a ci ba awɔɔ ma an a hɩ ncɩnaaʋ sɔ. Ci bɩ ba a ʋ, mindɔrɛ kʋ Woso a ka ʋ bɩ m.

Ciro k'a ŋ ba haay, k'a hɔ naa do mim dɩnda bɩ, naa do an n'a hɩm tee•••. Ciro k'a ŋ ba rɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ, lɛɛ niŋŋoo ta ʋ ŋ jɩ marɛ wer n ta ʋ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔsɩ dɔ, bɩ ŋ bɩr jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ tɩr ŋ jɩ bɩ lʋr, amba ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n'a bam Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ vantɔɔ m bɩ m. A ba kʋ ŋ nawʋrɛ ncɩnaaʋ naa, a mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋn'a zaar barɛ a zim.
Bɩ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ, k'awɔɔ m, mɔɔ lɛɛ ka, m hɔ k'a n ta ʋ hɩ awɔɔ m. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a dundo a zi, kʋ gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ nyʋnnyɔɔrɛ zibəəro b'a nyʋnnyɔɔ y, k'a b'a gaa jɩnjɩ k'a ŋ ta ʋ kɔɔkɔɔ naa ʋ y.
Bɩ, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr tam lɛɛ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kʋ wɔɔ Bʋmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ barka kan a dɔrɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ tee•••. A tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, dɩɩtaa kan dɔmɩm haay kɩ nɔ ʋ. Amina!
Hɔ k'a nyɩnta ʋ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ, wɔɔ n a ma, wɔɔ n a yɩ, ʋ mɩm m. Wɔɔ n dɩga a sɩɩ•••, ʋ ʋ wɔ da ma, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa Lemim dɩndam bɩ,
bala, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do a hɩnka wɔɔ n a yɩ, ʋ n'a kasɛtɩ karɛ, ʋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ mim hɩrɛ awɔɔ m. A ɩ nyɩnta Zɩ zi, an b'a hɩnka wɔɔ m.
Hɔ kʋ wɔɔ yɩ, ʋ a ma sɔ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m sɔ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma, a a zɛ kʋ ra kan wɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan Zɩ kɩ kan a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista kɩ.
Naa wɔɔ n'a gʋrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma, kʋ wɔɔ heernyɔɔ bɩ n yɩ gʋta.
Lemim kʋ wɔɔ ma zi, ʋ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ. Woso bɩ, lɛɛgure m. Monsigə ba zi fɩɩgaa y.
Kʋ wɔɔ hɩ, wɔɔ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan kɩ", ʋ bɔkarɛ, ʋ nɩ tam monsigə ʋ, ŋʋaar wɔɔ n'a barɛ, bɩ wɔɔ bɩr sɩra barɛ y.
Bɩ, kʋ wɔɔ ɩ tam lɛɛgure ʋ, amba a mɩŋŋa nɩ lɛɛgure nɔ ʋ bɩ nɩ, wɔɔ ʋ zɛ kʋ ra kan ʋ muno kɩ, b'a Nyɩ Yeezuu bɩ ma bɩ nɩ wɔɔ hubɔm wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ haay nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ: "Mimbʋnyaa ba wɔɔ ma y", bra wɔɔ n'a barɛ ʋ mɩŋŋɔɔ m, sɩra bɩ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y.
Kʋ wɔɔ ʋ mimbʋnyaarɔ bɔ ʋ lɛ ma Woso taa, a wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur kam wɔɔ ʋ, an tɩrgabaawar haay gʋ wɔɔ ma, bala, sɩrazaa m b'a tɩrga sɔ.
Kʋ wɔɔ hɩ, wɔɔ ʋ: "Mimbʋnyaabənno bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ", a ba wɔɔ ʋ ŋʋaarzaa, b'a meerbaa ba wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y.
M nyɩnzɛɛnnyɩnɔ, naa gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ minto, k'a bɩ mimbʋnyaa ba y. Bɩ, kʋ gʋaa mimbʋnyaa ba, wɔɔ mimbankarɛzaa ta ʋ Zɩ taa, Yeezuu Krista k'an tɩrga bɩ m.
Bala, a mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta mannɩhɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ minto. Bɩ wɔɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ minto bɛɛ m bala y, durnyazannɔ haay hɔɔ minto m sɔ.
Kʋ wɔɔ zu a lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ Woso dɔ.
Gʋaa k'a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ dɔ", b'a bɩr zure a lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋʋaarzaa m, sɩra b'a nɔ ʋ y.
Bɩ kʋ gʋaa a meerbaa bɩ si, kan sɩra kɩ, a zaa Woso ŋʋa paan•••. Bɩ minto bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ʋ ɩ kan kɩ.
Kʋ gʋaa a ʋ, a ɩ gɔɔtam kan kɩ, pakra m k'a mɩŋŋa m zu zaa kʋ Yeezuu a sa b'ʋ.
M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, lɛ daa bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a gʋrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma y, lɛ gusire m, awɔɔ n ta m a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ. Lɛ gusire naa do, meerbaa k'awɔɔ ma bɩ m.
Bɩ kan bɩ kɩ, lɛ daa mɔɔ n'a gʋrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma. Bɩ naa sɩra, kan Krista kɩ, kan awɔɔ kɩ sɔ. Bala, monsigə ɩ cenim, lɛɛgure denter paan••• b'ɩ yɔm kaka.
Gʋaa k'a ʋ, a ɩ lɛɛgure nɔ ʋ, an bɔkarɛ, an sɔ a danyɩ m bɩ, a gɔɔta, an nɩ monsigə ʋ tee•••.
Gʋaa k'a danyɩ ŋʋa b'ɩ lɛɛgure ʋ, bɩ hɔsɩ ba zi an b'a dam ma, an a ka an a gəm zɛ y.
Bɩ gʋaa k'a sɔ a danyɩ m bɩ, monsigə nɔ an ta ʋ. A n nɩ tam monsigə ʋ, b'a n a dɔ kʋ ta an nawʋm ka y. Bala, monsigə b'a mɩm ta.
A gʋrsɩra mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma, m nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, bala, awɔɔ a mimbʋnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, Yeezuu Krista tɔ minto.
Zɩrɔ, a gʋrsɩra mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma, bala, awɔɔ Gʋaa k'a nyɩnta ʋ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ dɔ. A gʋrsɩra mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma gʋɔɔ pooro, bala, awɔɔ bʋr Bʋnyaabarɛzaa ra.

A gʋrsɩra mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma, m nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, bala, awɔɔ Zɩ dɔ. A gʋrsɩra mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma, zɩrɔ, bala, awɔɔ Gʋaa k'a nyɩnta ʋ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ dɔ. A gʋrsɩra mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ pooro, bala, awɔɔ paŋŋa ta ʋ, bɩ Woso lemim gɔɔta awɔɔ ʋ, a bʋr Bʋnyaabarɛzaa ra.
A bɩ durnya ŋʋa, kan hɔ k'a n'a nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ y. Kʋ gʋaa durnya ŋʋa, Zɩ ŋʋarɛ b'a nɔ ʋ y.
Bala, hɔ haay k'a nɩ durnya nɔ ʋ bɩ, mɛsim lɛtaama, mɩm lɛtaama bʋnyaa, mɩŋŋabusure arzaka nɔ ʋ, naa haay n a to Zɩ zi y. A to a ʋ durnya nɔ ʋ.
Durnya ɩ cenim kan a lɛtaamarɔ kɩ. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso hɔɔnhɔ bam bɩ gɔɔtam dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
M nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, dɔmɩm jɛzaa a ku. Awɔɔ ma, n n a pa da, n ʋ, Krista jɩm b'ɩ zɛm. A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa naa ma, Krista jɩnnɔ wɔɔ a hɩnka gʋta. Naa minto y'a ka, wɔɔ n'a dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, dɔmɩm jɛzaa a ku.
A to ŋ y'a ʋ wɔɔ zi, bɩ ŋ n nyɩnta wɔɔ gʋɔɔ y. Kʋ nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʋ wɔɔ gʋɔɔ, ŋ gɔɔtam kan wɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, pakra m, kʋ gʋaa haay n a dɔ paan••• a ʋ, wɔɔ gʋɔɔ bɛɛ m gʋaa haay nɩ y.
K'awɔɔ nɩ, Krista bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka awɔɔ ʋ, b'awɔɔ haay, awɔɔ sɩra dɔ kɛɛrɛ.
Mɔɔ n a gʋrsɩra ba awɔɔ ma, mɔɔ ʋ, awɔɔ n sɩra dɔ y, awɔɔ dɔ. B'awɔɔ dɔ sɔ, a ʋ, ŋʋaar n a to sɩra nɔ ʋ y.
Nka m ŋʋaarzaa? Kʋ bɩ m gʋaa k'a nɩ bɩsɩ karɛ, a ʋ, Yeezuu bɩ Krista bɛɛ nɩ y. Krista jɩm bɩ, gʋaa k'a bɩsɩ ka Zɩ kan Nyɩ kɩ ma m.
Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a bɩsɩ ka Nyɩ bɩ ma, a ba kan Zɩ bɩ kɩ sɔ y. Gʋaa k'a a bɔ a lɛ ma, a ʋ, a Nyɩ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a ɩ kan Zɩ bɩ kɩ sɔ.
Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, kʋ lemim niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma a sɩŋŋɩda ma bɩ n gɔɔta awɔɔ heer ʋ. Kʋ lemim niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma bɩ gɔɔta awɔɔ heer ʋ, awɔɔ gɔɔta sɔ, an nɩ Nyɩ kan Zɩ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Lerbɔrɛ niŋŋə kʋ Zɩ a bɔ wɔɔ m bɩ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m.
Naa gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ ma gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ minto.

K'awɔɔ nɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'awɔɔ si Krista bɩ zi bɩ, a gɔɔta awɔɔ heer ʋ. Pakra bɛɛ m kʋ n nɩ hɔ dɩnda a m dɔ y. Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ hɔ haay dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m. A hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ sɩra m, ŋʋaar bɛɛ y. K'a gɔɔta Krista nɔ ʋ, amba a hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ m.
Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, m nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, k'a gɔɔta Krista nɔ ʋ, k'a b'a hɩnka, k'ʋ heer n bɩr kookoo, kʋ wɔɔ bɩ nyannɩ yɩ a taa, ʋ ʋ ba ma laatʋ a zɛrɛ hinni ʋ y.
K'awɔɔ dɔ, a ʋ, Krista tɩrga bɩ, k'a dɔ sɔ a ʋ, gʋaa k'a nɩ tɩrgabaa zi barɛ, Woso nyɩ m paan•••.
K'a dɩga ŋʋarɛ gʋta kʋ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʋ, an nɩ wɔɔ birm a nyɩnɔ bɩ ma. Bɩ, sɩra m, Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m. Bɩ y'a ka, durnya b'a dam ma, an wɔɔ dɔ y. Bala, durnyazannɔ wɔɔ n Woso dɔ y.

M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m. Bɩ, nyɩnta kʋ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'a ʋ hɔ niŋŋə bɩ, bɩ n a hɩnka cɩna y. Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, k'a b'a hɩnka, wɔɔ zɛm bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan kɩ. Bala, k'a lɔ, wɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ.
Gʋaa niŋŋə k'an ta taaheerlɛ naa do m Krista nɔ ʋ bɩ, a ɩ dintim gʋrɛ a ma, k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa amba Yeezuu m mɩŋŋa bɩ m.
Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a mimbʋnyaa ba, kaanm a nawʋm Woso lɛ m, bala, mimbʋnyaa bɩ, kaanm lɛ m m.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Yeezuu bʋr k'a bɩ mimbʋnyaarɔ gʋngʋ wɔɔ ma, bɩ mimbʋnyaa ba ma y.
Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a gɔɔta kan kɩ, a bɩr mimbʋnyaa bam dʋntɔ y. Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaa bam, a n a yɩ, b'a n a dɔ sɔ y.
M nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, k'a bɩ yɛ kʋ gɔsɩ n'awɔɔ nyʋnnyɔɔ y. Gʋaa k'a nɩ tɩrgabaa zi bam bɩ tɩrga, amba Yeezuu n tɩrga bɩ m.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ mimbʋnyaa bam, Sʋtaana gʋaa m. Bala, mimbʋnyaabər m Sʋtaana m a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ. Bɩ minto y'a ka Woso Nyɩ bɩ n bʋr k'a bɩ Sʋtaana zibəəro zaar ba.
Gʋaa niŋŋə haay kʋ Woso a yɩ bɩ bɩr mimbʋnyaa bam dʋntɔ y, a mɩsɩrbaa hɔdo bɩ y'a nɔ ʋ, a b'a dam ma, an mimbʋnyaa ba dʋntɔ y, bala Woso y'a yɩ.
Naa minto y'a ka n nɩ Woso nyɩnɔ dɔ, n nɩ ŋ bɔ kʋ zi kan Sʋtaana hɔɔ kɩ. Gʋaa k'a bɩr tɩrgabaa zi barɛ y, b'a bɩr a danyɩ ŋʋam sɔ y, Woso gʋaa bɛɛ y.
Kʋ sɩra m, lemim niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma a sɩŋŋɩda ma bɩ n naa: Ʋ kʋ ŋʋa.
A b'a ba am Kayɛn hɔ bɩ nɩ y, kʋ Bʋnyaabarɛzaa gʋaa m bɩ, a a danyɩ zɛ gər. Bɩ, bɔ minto an a zɛ? K'a zibəəro wɔɔ nyɩnta bʋnyaa, a danyɩ bɩ zibəəro wɔɔ n nyɩnta tɩrga bɩ m.
Kʋ durnya sɔ awɔɔ m, m danyɩnɔ, a bɩ zɛ kədə y.
Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, bɔ wɔɔ ʋ zɛ nɔ ʋ, ʋ bʋr mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ ʋ danyɩnɔ ŋʋa bɩ minto. Gʋaa k'a bɩr a danyɩ ŋʋam bɩ gɔɔta zɛ nɔ ʋ.
Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a sɔ a danyɩ m bɩ, gərzer m. B'awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, gərzer deem taan••• ba mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɩ a zi y.
Hɔ k'a a ka wɔɔ n ŋʋarɛ k'an hɔ niŋŋə bɩ dɔ ba n nɩ: Yeezuu a mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ minto. A a ga m sɔ, wɔɔ n ʋ mɩsɩrbaa ka, ʋ danyɩnɔ minto.
Kʋ gʋaa ɩ durnya naa do arzakarɔ m, an a danyɩ yɩ cicir nɔ ʋ, b'a n a da han y, Woso ŋʋarɛ bɩ y'a bam lɔ k'a bɩr a zaa ʋ?
M nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, ʋ bɩ ŋʋarɛ ba lɛmindɔ m kan meerbaa kɩ nɔ ʋ y. Ʋ kʋ ŋʋa, zibəə barɛ kan sɩra kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Naa minto, wɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ ʋ ʋ, ʋ ɩ sɩra nɔ ʋ, bɩ wɔɔ heerkoodəbaa yɩm zi.
Bala, kʋ wɔɔ heer ɩ mim kam wɔɔ ra, Woso gʋtabaa lɛ da wɔɔ heer la, a hɔ haay dɔ.
M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, kʋ wɔɔ heer bɩr mim kam wɔɔ ra, wɔɔ heer koodə Woso zi.
Kʋ wɔɔ hɔ yɛ han, wɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ, bala, wɔɔ a lɛrɔ wɔɔ si, ʋ nɩ hɔ k'a nɔ yɩ bɩ barɛ.
Ba a lɛ n na: K'ʋ sɩra ka a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista bɩ tɔ ʋ, k'ʋ kʋ ŋʋa amba a lɛ ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Gʋaa k'a n'a lɛrɔ wɔɔ sire, a ɩ kan Woso kɩ, Woso nɩ kan kɩ sɔ. Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, a ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto.

M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, a bɩ sɩra ka gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ ʋ, a ɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m nɔ wɔɔ ʋ y. K'a ŋ ka a lɛɛ a dɩga ŋ ma, kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ŋ nɩ ta m paan••• gɛɛ hɔ vanta m gɛ. Bala, ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gʋta y'a kərgu durnya ra.
Hɔ niŋŋə k'a n'a karɛ awɔɔ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ dɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: Gʋaa k'a bɔ a lɛ ma, a ʋ, Yeezuu Krista a ba gʋaa bɩ, a ɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m.
Bɩ gʋaa haay k'a bɩr Yeezuu Krista kasɛtɩ karɛ ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, bɩ zaa b'a Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ y. Zinə k'a nɩ Krista jɩm nɔ ʋ bɩ m, awɔɔ n a ma, n n'a hɩrɛ n ʋ, a ɩ zɛm bɩ. B'a lee ku durnya nɔ ʋ kaka.
Awɔɔ kʋ Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, m nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, awɔɔ paŋŋa bʋr ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ duro ra. Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ paŋŋa lɛ da zinə k'a nɩ kan durnyazannɔ kɩ bɩ ra.
Durnyazannɔ n ŋ mɩ, ŋn'ɩ durnya mim dɩndam, durnya n'a tʋr karɛ ŋ ma.

Wɔɔ, Woso gʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m. Gʋaa k'a Woso dɔ bɩ, a tʋr an n'a kam wɔɔ ma. Gʋaa kʋ Woso gʋaa bɛɛ bɩ bɩr a tʋr kam wɔɔ ma y. Bɩ, wɔɔ nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'an sɩra bɩ dɔm ma kan zinə k'a nɩ Krista jɩm nɔ ʋ, an nɩ ŋʋaar bam bɩ kɩ.
M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, ʋ kʋ ŋʋa, bala, ŋʋarɛ bɩ, a to a ʋ Woso zi. Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a a mim ŋʋa Woso y'a yɩ, a Woso dɔ.
Gʋaa k'a bɩr a mim ŋʋarɛ, a n Woso dɔ y, bala, Woso bɩ ŋʋarɛzaa m.
Woso ŋʋarɛ k'a hɩnka wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ ba n nɩ: Woso a Nyɩ deem nyɔɔ durnya ʋ, kʋ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba a minto.
Ba a ŋʋarɛ bɩ n na: Wɔɔ bɛɛ ɩ Woso ŋʋa y, a ɩ wɔɔ ŋʋa. A y'a Nyɩ nyɔɔ, k'an bɩ nyɩnta mannɩhɔ wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ minto.
M gʋaasɩbɔɔ, kʋ Woso wɔɔ ŋʋa ncɩnaaʋ, wɔɔ sɔ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ kʋ ŋʋa.
Gɔsɩ n Woso yɩ cɩna y. Kʋ wɔɔ kʋ ŋʋa, Woso ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, b'a ŋʋarɛ b'ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ paan•••.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ minto, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ ɩ kan kɩ, an nɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ wɔɔ yɩ, wɔɔ n'a kasɛtɩ karɛ, wɔɔ ʋ, Woso a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ k'an bɩ yɩ durnya bʋmbɔrɛzaa.
Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a bɔ a lɛ ma, a ʋ, Yeezuu Krista bɩ Woso Nyɩ nɩ, Woso ɩ gɔɔtam kan kɩ, an nɩ kan Woso kɩ.
Bɩ wɔɔ, wɔɔ Woso ŋʋarɛ k'an ta m wɔɔ minto bɩ dɔ, wɔɔ sɩra ka naa ʋ sɔ. Woso bɩ, ŋʋarɛzaa m. Gʋaa k'a gɔɔta ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, a zaa ɩ gɔɔtam kan Woso kɩ, Woso nɩ gɔɔtam kan kɩ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋʋarɛ nɩ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ paan•••, wɔɔ n n'ʋ dam ma, ʋ heerkoodəbaa yɩ dʋdɔkarɛ hinni ʋ. Bala, Yeezuu k'an hɔ niŋŋə bɩ, wɔɔ maam sɔ durnya naa do nɔ ʋ.
Dabɔʋ ba ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ y. Bɩ ŋʋarɛ paan••• ɩ lam nyibəə ra. Bala, nyibəə ɩ kan booti fɩryɩrɛ kɩ. Bɩ, gʋaa k'a nɩ nyi barɛ, ŋʋarɛ paan••• b'a nɔ ʋ y.
Kʋ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ɩ kʋ ŋʋam, bala, Woso ɩ lɛɛ ka an wɔɔ ŋʋa.
Kʋ gʋaa a hɩ a ʋ: "Mɔɔ ɩ Woso ŋʋam", an bɔkarɛ, an sɔ a danyɩ m, ŋʋaarzaa m. Sɩra m, gʋaa k'a bɩr a danyɩ k'a n'a yɩm bɩ ŋʋarɛ, a b'a dam ma, an Woso k'a bɩr a yɩm bɩ ŋʋa y.
Ba lɛ kʋ Krista a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ n na: Gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso ŋʋam, k'an a danyɩ ŋʋa sɔ.
Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a sɩra ka a ʋ, Yeezuu bɩ Krista m, Woso nyɩ m. Gʋaa niŋŋə haay k'a Zɩ ŋʋa, a a Nyɩ ŋʋa sɔ.
Hɔ k'a n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʋ, wɔɔ Woso nyɩnɔ ŋʋa bɩ ba n nɩ: Kʋ wɔɔ Woso ŋʋa, ʋ nɩ zure a lɛrɔ ʋ.
Ba wɔɔ ŋʋarɛ kan Woso kɩ bɩ n na: Kʋ wɔɔ n a lɛrɔ si. B'a lɛrɔ wɔɔ, mɔr gorezaa bɛɛ y.
Bala, gʋaa haay kʋ Woso y'a yɩ bɩ bʋr durnya ra. Hɔ k'a bʋr durnya ra bɩ, wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ m.
Nka ɩ bʋr durnya ra? Kʋ bɩ m, gʋaa k'a sɩra ka, a ʋ, Yeezuu bɩ, Woso Nyɩ m.
Yeezuu Krista ɩ bʋr durnya ʋ, an a hɩnka hi m kan ma kɩ. Hi bɛɛ m bala y, hi m kan ma kɩ. Bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kasɛtɩ kam, bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri m sɩra.
Ŋ kaakʋ, ŋ n'a kasɛtɩ karɛ:
Sɛnt-Ɛspri, hi kan ma kɩ. Bɩ ŋ kaakʋ rɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ deem ŋ n'a karɛ.
Kʋ wɔɔ ɩ gʋɔɔ kasɛtɩ sire, Woso kasɛtɩ bɩ gʋtabaa lɛ da. Ba Woso kasɛtɩ bɩ n na: A kasɛtɩ ka a Nyɩ b'ʋ.
Gʋaa k'a sɩra ka Woso Nyɩ b'ʋ, a ɩ kasɛtɩ naa do m a heer ʋ. Gʋaa k'a n sɩra ka Woso ʋ bɩ, Woso ba an nawʋm ŋʋaarzaa. K'a n sɩra ka kasɛtɩ kʋ Woso a ka a Nyɩ b'ʋ bɩ minto.
Ba kasɛtɩ bɩ n na: Woso mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ ka wɔɔ ʋ, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do ɩ Nyɩ bɩ zi.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ kan Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa m. Gʋaa k'a ba kan Woso Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, a ba mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do nɩ y.
Naa haay gʋrsɩra ba mɔɔ ʋ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ k'a nɩ sɩra kam Woso Nyɩ b'ʋ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʋ, a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m.
Hɔ k'a nɩ wɔɔ heer bam kookoo Woso zi bɩ ba n nɩ: Kʋ wɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə yɛ han an zu a hɔɔnhɔ ʋ, a y'a tʋr kam wɔɔ ma.
Bɩ kʋ wɔɔ dɔ, ʋ ʋ, kʋ bɔ wɔɔ yɛ han a y'a tʋr kam wɔɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, wɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʋ wɔɔ yɛ bɩ m.

Kʋ gʋaa a danyɩ yɩ, an nɩ mimbʋnyaa barɛ, mimbʋnyaa bɩ do bɩr tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ, k'an yaa da. Woso mɩsɩrbaa kaŋ ʋ, kʋ mimbʋnyaa bɩ do bɩr tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ paan••• y. Bala, mimbʋnyaa ta ʋ, an nɩ tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ. Mimbʋnyaa bɩ do minto bɛɛ mɔɔ ʋ, a yaa da y.
Zibəə bʋnyaa haay bɩ, mimbʋnyaa m. Bɩ, mimbʋnyaa haay bɛɛ nɩ tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʋ y.
Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, gʋaa niŋŋə haay kʋ Woso a yɩ bɩ bɩr mimbʋnyaa bam dʋntɔ y. Bala, Woso Nyɩ b'ɩ dɔm ma, Bʋnyaabarɛzaa bɩr heer bam ma y.
Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Woso gʋɔɔ m wɔɔ m, bɩ durnya haay jilli ɩ Bʋnyaabarɛzaa wɔ ʋ.
Bɩ wɔɔ dɔ sɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Woso Nyɩ bʋr, an bɩ wɔɔ hɔɔn gu, k'ʋ Woso paan••• bɩ dɔ. Bɩ Woso paan••• Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista nɔ wɔɔ n ta ʋ. A m Woso paan•••, a m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ.
M nyɩnɔ ŋʋarɛrɔ, a b'a ka a wosobaawɔnnɔ wɔɔ da ʋ y.
Mɔɔ, Gʋaagusire, mɔɔ ɩ ci naa do nyɔɔ lʋ kʋ Woso a bɔ ʋ bɩ ma kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ ŋ ŋʋam paan•••. Mɔɔ bɛɛ bala y, bɩ mɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ sɩra dɔ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ.
Sɩra ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, b'a nyɩntam kan wɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Yeezuu Krista, Woso Nyɩ bɩ kɩ barka nyɩntam kan wɔɔ kɩ, kan a cicirzɛrɛ kɩ, a laafɩɩ kɩ, sɩra kan ŋʋarɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ heernyɔɔ gʋta yɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ɩ nyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam sɩra zaa ra, amba lɛ kʋ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lʋ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, ʋ kʋ ŋʋa. Mɔɔ bɩr lɛ daa gʋrsɩra barɛ ɩbɩɩ ma y, lɛ kʋ wɔɔ yɩ hallɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ m.
Ba ŋʋarɛ n na: k'ʋ ta a lɛrɔ wɔɔ zaa bɩ ra. Lɛ naa do awɔɔ nyɩnta a ma a sɩŋŋɩda ʋ, k'awɔɔ n ŋʋarɛ zaa bɩ sa.
Bala, braba gʋɔɔ m zannɔ a kərgu durnya ra. Ŋ bɩr kasɛtɩ karɛ ŋ ʋ, Yeezuu Krista a ba gʋaa y. Gʋaa k'a nɩ naa bam bɩ, ŋʋaarzaa m, Krista jɩm m.
K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka awɔɔ zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʋ bɩ n nyaam y, bɩ k'a ganwʋrɛ haay k'an ta ʋ yɩ.
Gʋaa haay k'a bɩr gɔɔtam Krista hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʋ, an n'a hɔɔnhɔ zum la bɩ, a zaa ba kan Woso kɩ y. Gʋaa k'a gɔɔta a nɔ ʋ, a ɩ kan wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kɩ, a Nyɩ kɩ.
Kʋ gʋaa bʋr awɔɔ zi, b'a ba hɔdɩndarɛ naa do nɔ ʋ, a b'a si a har ʋ y, a b'a nyaasɩ ka y.
Bɩ gʋaa k'a nyaasɩ ka, a zɛ a ʋ kʋ ra kan kɩ a mimbʋnyaarɔ nɔ ʋ.
Minno ta ʋ gʋta mɔɔ nɩ ŋ ci barɛ awɔɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m ŋ ba, ci m kan gar hi kɩ nɩ y. A ŋʋa mɔɔ ʋ kʋ m bʋr awɔɔ zi, kʋ m bɩ meer ba, m lɛ m kan awɔɔ kɩ, kʋ wɔɔ heernyɔɔ n yɩ gʋta paan•••.
Ɩ danlʋ kʋ Woso a bɔ ʋ sɔ bɩ nyɩnɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m.
Mɔɔ, Gʋaagusire, mɔɔ ɩ ci naa do nyɔɔ m ŋʋarɛzaa paan••• Gayus ma.
M gʋaasɩba mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ y'a yɛm Woso han k'ɩbɩɩ n bɩr mɩŋŋa hɔ haay nɔ ʋ, k'ɩbɩɩ laafɩɩ bɩ n bɩr mɩŋŋa, amba ɩ nyi hɔ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ heer yɩ nyɩnta gʋta, bala, danyɩnɔ bʋr naa ʋ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ mɩsɩrbaa kasɛtɩ karɛ, ŋ ʋ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ tam sɩra nɔ ʋ. Bɩ denter m, ɩbɩɩ ɩ tam sɩra nɔ ʋ.
Mɔɔ heernyɔɔ gʋta k'a lɛ da haay bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ ma, ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ ɩ tam sɩra nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
M gʋaasɩba mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ hɔbaa mɩŋŋa kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, baa kan saanarɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ bɩ, sɩrakarɛ zibəə m.
Ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋabaa kasɛtɩ ka Krista gʋɔɔ taa. K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ŋ han amba Woso hɔɔnhɔ m, ŋ zaa sarɛ minto bɩ, a mɩŋŋa gʋta.
Krista tɔ minto y'a ka, ŋnɩ wuti, ŋn'ɩ tam, bɩ ŋ n hɔsɩ si gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Krista dɔ rɔ wɔɔ zi y.
Bɩ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ʋ ga m, ʋ daahan ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ, k'ʋ ʋ da ma, ʋ zi ba kan kʋ kɩ sɩra tɔ ma.
Mɔɔ ci ba Krista gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma. Bɩ, Diyotrefɛs k'a nɩ lɛɛzaabaa ŋʋam ŋ barla bɩ, a bɩr yɛm mɔɔ hɔ ma y.

Bɩ, kʋ mɔɔ bɩ bʋr, mɔɔ bɔm hɔ niŋŋə k'a a ba mɔɔ m haay kan a meerbaa bʋnyaa kɩ bɩ m. Bɩ, a n a ba naa n a bɔ y. A lɛ baa k'a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ si sɔ y, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a ŋ si rɔ wɔɔ a y'a tarɛ ŋ nɩ tolle, an nɩ ŋ bɔm Krista gʋɔɔ wɔɔ barla.
M gʋaasɩba mɩŋŋa, ɩ bɩ gʋaa k'a bʋnyaa ba tar sa y, gʋaa k'a mɩŋŋa ba tar sa. Gʋaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa barɛ, Woso gʋaa m, gʋaa k'a n'a bʋnyaa barɛ, a n Woso yɩ y.
Kʋ Demetrus nɩ, gʋaa haay y'a kasɛtɩ mɩŋŋa karɛ. Sɩra mɩŋŋa y'a kasɛtɩ kam. Wɔɔ y'a kasɛtɩ kam, b'ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʋ, wɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ, sɩra m.
Minno ta ʋ gʋta, mɔɔ n a ŋʋa kʋ m ŋ ci ba ɩbɩɩ ma, bɩ mɔɔ lɛ baa kʋ m ŋ ba gʋrsɩrabarɛhɔ m kan gar hi kɩ nɩ y.
A ŋʋa mɔɔ ʋ, kʋ m b'ɩ yɩ dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʋ, k'ʋ sʋʋra ba kan kʋ kɩ.
Kʋ laafɩɩ n bɩr kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ! Gʋaasɩbɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ yaa da gʋaasɩbɔɔ wɔɔ m, gʋaa biyəə m.

Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Ziidi m nɩ ci bɩ bam, Yeezuu Krista zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, Zakkɩ dam m mɔɔ m sɔ. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʋrɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ kʋ Zɩ Woso a ŋʋa, an awɔɔ bir k'a yɩ a gʋɔɔ, an nɩ dɔrɛ awɔɔ ma Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ.
Bɩ, kʋ Woso n a cicirzɛrɛ kan a laafɩɩ kɩ, a ŋʋarɛ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ gʋta.

M gʋaasɩbɔɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, mɔɔ ŋʋa gʋta kʋ m ci ba awɔɔ ma, kʋ m bʋmbɔrɛ kʋ wɔɔ ʋ da kʋ ʋ, ʋ n ta m bɩ mim dɩnda. Bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ dɩga a, pakra m kʋ m ci bɩ ba awɔɔ ma dɩɩtaa, kʋ m a yɛ a han k'a zoo ba sɩrakarɛ kʋ Woso a ka a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ʋ gallɛm deem taan••• dɔmɩm haay minto bɩ tɔ ma.

Bala, gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ a da wɔɔ zi, Woso barka lemim bɩ ŋ n'a nʋkʋm, k'a a da ma a mɩsɩrbaa ba a hɔɔnhɔ ma mimbʋnyaa barɛ nɔ ʋ, bɩsɩ ŋn'a kam Yeezuu Krista ma, an bɔkarɛ a mɩŋŋa y'a deem n soʋrezaa, a m wɔɔ Zuuba sɔ. Bɩ, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ ka an gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro dʋdɔyarlɛ kʋ ŋ n'a yɩm mim hɩ laatʋ.

Hɔ kʋ mɔɔ n'a ŋʋam kʋ m a hɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʋ m a tɔ da a nɔ ʋ. Zuuba k'a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ bʋmbɔ lɔmbaa nɔ ʋ Eziptɩ kʋ ʋ bɩ, a a ya an so ra an gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n yɛ ŋnɩ sɩra ka ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ.
Bɩ, malɛɛkarɔ kʋ ŋ y'a bɩncɛrɔ to, ŋn'a zerga paŋŋa kʋ Woso a ka ŋ ʋ bɩ rɛ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʋ, Woso brɔɔ da baŋŋarɔ ʋ monsigə nɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay minto, k'a bɩ ŋ dʋdɔ ka dʋdɔkarɛ hinni gʋta b'ʋ.

Kʋ Sodɔm kan Gomɔɔr kɩ, kan kʋrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ jɩr ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim nɩ, awɔɔ dɔ sɔ. Kʋrɔ nɔɔn duro a mɩŋŋɔɔ sa, ŋn'a ka dintim zibəəro wɔɔ ʋ sɔ, ŋn'ɩ jaandarɛ k'an bʋnyaa maam-maam bam. Naa tɔ ma m, Woso n ŋ dʋdɔ yar, ŋn'ɩ sɛ k'a lihire ba ʋ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ, ŋ fɩryɩrɛ bɩ, makra m sɔ, k'a gʋaa haay zɛ kəbə.

Kan naa kɩ haay, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a da wɔɔ zi rɔ wɔɔ, a ba ŋ nawʋrɛ am kʋrɔ nɔɔn duro hɔ bɩ m. A hɔɔn ŋ n'a dam mim daŋŋadɔɔ ma, bɩ n'a kam ŋn'ɩ jaan dam, ŋ bɩr yɛm Zuuba ma y, malɛɛkarɔ paŋŋazannɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ sʋnsɔ wʋm sɔ.
A n bɔkarɛ, Malɛɛkarɔ haay cir Misɛl mɩŋŋa, bʋr k'a ʋ, an nɩ bɩsɩ kam kan Sʋtaana kɩ Moyiisi gər sarɛ ma bɩ, a n yɛ an meerbaa bʋnyaa ba Sʋtaana ma y. A hɩ a ʋ bala, a ʋ: "Zuuba fɩr karɛ ɩ ma."
Bɩ, gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro, hɔ kʋ ŋ n a dɔ bɩ ŋn'a sʋnsɔ wʋm. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan poohɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ba hɔɔndarɛ zore nɩ y, hɔ k'a bʋr ŋ heer ʋ bɩ n'a bam, hɔ bɩ do bɔkarɛ an nɩ nyaanlɛ ŋ nɩ.
Kʋsɩ ɩ kan ŋ kɩ, bala, zu ŋ y'a ʋ Kayɛn hɔbaa ʋ, zi bʋnyaa ŋn'a bam k'a busoo yɩ am Balam hɔ bɩ m. A mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋ n'a zarm, bala, ŋ y'a da a nyaa ma kan Woso kɩ, amba Kooree a ba bɩ m.

B'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʋ ma k'a hɔ bɩ danyɩbaa zɛkʋra nɔ ʋ bɩ, kʋ ŋ y'awɔɔ barla nyannɩ m, nyannɩ ba ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ kan hɔ bɩ bɩ maam-maam kɩ y, a hɔɔn ŋn'a darɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma bala. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ, kan warkʋ kʋ hɩnhɛr n'a gaam, bɩ la bɩ bam bɩ kɩ. Ŋ bɔ kʋ ʋ sɔ kan gɔ k'a bɩr nyɩ darɛ y, baa a nyɩdarɛ dɔmɩm ʋ, bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan gɔrɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ wʋnwʋr ŋnɩ gɩnga fɩɩgaa rɔ kɩ.

Amba higʋta kurəro tɩr a fur bɔ a rɛ bɩ, a nyannɩ zibəəro wɔɔ kərgu ŋ nawʋm lɛɛ ra maam sɔ. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan monyaarɔ kʋ ŋ n a tajɩ dɔ rɔ kɩ, Woso n ŋ to kʋ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta monsigə gʋta maam-maam nɔ ʋ dɔmɩm haay.
Adam yaŋŋa tɔɔlɛma saanhɩnazaa Enɔk lɛɛ ka an gʋɔɔ nɔɔm mim hɩ laatʋ hɔɔ, Woso lɛsinnɩsora meerbaa nɔ ʋ, a ʋ: "A ba n nɩ, Zuuba ɩ zɛm kan malɛɛkarɔ kɩ miliyɔn bam hɔka,

k'a bɩ durnya jilli dʋdɔ ka. A gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n Woso dɔ rɔ wɔɔ dʋdɔ yarm, ŋ zibəə bʋnyaarɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba haay bɩsɩ ka Woso ma nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma. A yɩ ŋ dʋdɔ yarm sɔ meerbaarɔ bʋnyaarɔ kʋ bawosodɔrɛzannɔ nɔɔm ŋ ba Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma."
Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɔ bɩr nyɔɔm fɩɩga y, kukur ŋn'a bam can, a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba ŋ nawʋm a lɛtaamarɔ barɛ nɔ ʋ bala. Mɩŋŋabusure meerbaarɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ bam, ŋn'ɩ bra bɩmbam gʋɔɔ m k'a hɔ yɩ.
B'awɔɔ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ ŋʋarɛ nɔ ʋ, k'a meerbaarɔ kʋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ ŋ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
Ŋ y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʋ: "Dɔmɩm jɛzannɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ nyɩntaŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩr yaa wʋrɛ awɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩsɩrbaa bam a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ nɔ ʋ, bawosodɔrɛ nɔ ʋ."
Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ duro nɩ zɛm gʋngʋrɛrɔ m bɩ, durnya hɔɔndarɛrɔ y'a so ŋ ʋ, ŋ ba Woso Ɛspri nɩ y.
B'awɔɔ, m gʋaasɩbɔɔ, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee••• a sɩrakarɛ k'an mɩŋŋa an cem bɩ nɔ ʋ, k'a bɩr yaa dam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʋ.
K'a gɔɔta Woso ŋʋarɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ, a bɩr dɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista ma, an nɩ zɛm bɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ ka awɔɔ ʋ, a cicirzɛrɛ nɔ ʋ.
K'a bɩr gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩnsɩm kam nɔ wɔɔ cicir zɛm.

K'a ŋ yɔ sɛ zaa ra, a ŋ bʋmbɔ. Gɔsɩnnɔ n ta ʋ, k'a brɔɔ cicir zɛ, bɩ k'a dundo a zi kʋ ŋ b'awɔɔ da a kʋrɔmarɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y. K'a sɔ ŋ zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ m, bala, kʋ mimbʋnyaabənno nɩ ŋ mɩ bɩ, ŋ dintim ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma.

Bɩ kʋ Woso k'an deem an nɩ wɔɔ yɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma bɩ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ. A a da ma, an a ka awɔɔ b'a dore y, an a ka sɔ, awɔɔ n bɩ jɩm a lɛɛ, bɩ, kʋrɔma sɩ ba awɔɔ ma y, heernyɔɔ gʋta nɔ ʋ, a lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ k'a tɔ n lɛbɔʋrɛ yɩ, kan gʋtabaa kɩ, paŋŋa kɩ, a y'a so hɔ haay ʋ. Biisi tee•••, dɩɩtaa kan dɔmɩm haay kɩ nɔ ʋ. Amina.
Yeezuu Krista bɩ, Woso y'a ka ʋ, k'an hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ dɩɩtaa bɩ hɩnka a zibəənyɩnɔ m. A malɛɛka a nyɔɔ k'an b'a hɩ a zibəənyɩ Zaan m.
A n nɩ Woso lemim bɩ hɩrɛ, an Yeezuu Krista kasɛtɩ ka kan hɔ haay k'a a yɩ bɩ kɩ.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a nɩ karɩnda bam, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a tʋr kam wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zum hɔ kʋ ŋ y'a gʋrsɩra ba b'ʋ. Bala, wakatɩ b'a zɔ.

Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zaan m nɩ gʋrsɩra naa do bam kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Azii kʋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma: K'a barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ yɩ, gʋaa k'an ta ʋ, an nyɩnta ʋ, an nɩ zɛm bɩ zi, kan ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ n a duu jɩr ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ zi,
kan Yeezuu Krista, kasɛtɩzaa paan•••, k'a lɛɛ ka an a mɩm bɔ ʋ gəəno bire ʋ, a m durnya cinno wɔɔ cir bɩ kɩ zi. Bɔ nɩ wɔɔ ŋʋam, an wɔɔ mimbʋnyaarɔ sʋrgɔ a ma m,
an a ka, wɔɔ n ʋ ba a cirbəə mannɩbənno a Zɩ Woso zibəə minto. A y'a ga lɛbɔʋrɛ m kan paŋŋa kɩ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ. Amina!
Ba n nɩ, a ɩ zɛm warkʋ nɔ ʋ, bɩ gʋaa haay y'a yɩm, baa gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ rɔ wɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ. Tara burə gʋɔɔ heerzarlɛ nyi karɛ a minto. Ɩɩn•••, k'an yɩ maam!
Zuuba Woso a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ m lɛɛkarɛzaa, mɔɔ m jɛzaa. Mɔɔ n ta ʋ, m nyɩnta ʋ, m n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ, hɔ haay Zuuba.

Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zaan, awɔɔ danyɩ awɔɔ zukuuzaa, fɩryɩrɛ, cirbəə kan tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ Yeezuu zuure nɔ ʋ, nyɩnta mɔɔ ʋ, m nɩ tara deem kʋ hi bɩr ma, n n'a hɩm ma Patmɔs ʋ, Woso lemim kan Krista kasɛtɩ karɛ kɩ minto.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer mɔɔ ra Zuuba dɔmɩm deem hinni ʋ, mɔɔ n leer paŋŋazaa ma m jɛ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, huure n n'a hɛm, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ:
Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a yɩm bɩ gʋrsɩra ba ci ʋ, ɩ nyɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ ma: Efɛɛzɩ ʋ, Simɩrnɩ ʋ, Pɛrgam ʋ, Tɩyatɩɩr ʋ, Sardɩ ʋ, Filadɛlfii ʋ, kan Lawodisee kɩ ʋ.
Mɔɔ n bɔ kʋ m dɩga gʋaa k'a nɩ meer bam kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ ma. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ m wusigə bɩ, mɔɔ sarma fɩtɩrɛrɔ yɩ saanhɩna.
Fɩtɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ bire ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ gʋaa yɩ, an bɔ kʋ ʋ ɩ ʋ, Gʋaanyɩ m, an huu jintə da a ra, an sarma hɔsoaʋ so a cɩ ʋ.
A mim bɩ kan a minkə bɩ kɩ nyɩnta fu fɩtɩtɩ ɩ ʋ, ser ka m, gɛɛ lajaa m, a mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ yɩrɛ ʋ, sɛwurə m.
A gannɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan zaan kʋ n y'a sʋr, an nɩ yɔm bɩ kɩ. A leer nɩ yɩrɛ ʋ hiro gʋtɔɔ susur m,
an nɩ monyaa saanhɩna m a bɩsɩ ʋ. Kargʋ lɛ hɩɩya nɩ bɔrɛ a lɛ ʋ. A meer nɩ yɔrɛ ɩ ʋ, woso nɩ gum kan paŋŋa kɩ.
Kʋ mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, mɔɔ m do a taa ɩ ʋ ga mɔɔ ʋ. A n a bɩsɩ wɔ ka mɔɔ ra, an a hɩ, a ʋ: Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʋ y, mɔɔ m lɛɛkarɛzaa, mɔɔ m jɛzaa,
mɔɔ n mɩsɩr. Mɔɔ nyɩnta, m ga, bɩ ba n nɩ, mɔɔ mɩsɩr dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ, bɩ mɔɔ ɩ zɛ cɛlɛnyɩnɔ m kan gəənokʋ hɔɔ kɩ.
Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ bɩ gʋrsɩra ba, kan hɔ kan ta ʋ kɩ, kan hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr bɩ kɩ.

Ba monyaa saanhɩnarɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ yɩ mɔɔ bɩsɩ wɔ ʋ kan sarma fɩtɩrɛrɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ kɩ jɩ n na: Monyaa saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ, kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ malɛɛkarɔ m. Fɩtɩrɛrɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m.
Gʋrsɩra ba Efɛɛzɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: Gʋaa k'an ta monyaa saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m a bɩsɩ ʋ, an nɩ tam sarma fɩtɩrɛ saanhɩnarɔ bire ʋ,

bɩ y'a hɩ, a ʋ: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ kɔrɛ kan ɩ tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ dɔ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr yɛm gʋɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ ma y. Ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ a ma kristazibəəzannɔ, bɩ kristazibəəzannɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ ka lɛɛ. Ɩbɩɩ bɩ ŋ dɔ ŋʋaarzannɔ.
Tʋntɔʋrɛ ta ɩbɩɩ ʋ: ɩbɩɩ fɩr yɩ mɔɔ tɔ ma, b'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ bɔ ɩ jɛ nɩ y.
Bɩ mim kʋ mɔɔ n ta m kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ wɔ saa ɩ lɛɛkarɛ ŋʋarɛ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ ma.
Bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta ʋ, ɩ ɩ bɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ. Ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam k'ɩ biisi zibəəro wɔɔ bɔɔta. Kʋ n bɛɛ nɩ, mɔɔ zɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ bɔ ɩ taam, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ fɩtɩrɛ bɩ sarɛ a bɩncɛ ʋ.
Hɔ niŋŋə k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m bɩ, ɩbɩɩ nyi sɔ Nikola gʋɔɔ wɔɔ zibəəro m, amba mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma. Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa gɔ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ nyɩ kaŋ ʋ an a bɩ.
Gʋrsɩra ba Simɩrnɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: A m lɛɛkarɛzaa, a m jɛzaa. A nyɩnta an ga, an a bɔ an bʋr mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ, bɩ n nɩ meer naa do barɛ:
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ fɩryɩrɛ dɔ kan ɩ ŋʋa kɩ. Bɩ arzakazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ zɩɩfʋrɔ n'a mɩ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔzarlɛ zibəə kʋ ŋ nɩ ta m bɩ dɔ, Sʋtaana sokʋmacɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ.
Ɩ bɩ nyi ba hɔ k'a n'a kam k'ɩ fɩr yɩ bɩ ma y. Sʋtaana y'ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ dum lɔnnɔcɛ ʋ, k'a a gɩnga awɔɔ ma, b'awɔɔ fɩr yɩm dɔmɩm bu. Jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ k'an ta an ɩ zɛ ku. Mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa firgə karɛ ɩ ʋ.
Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma. Damazaa bɩ bɩ fɩr yɩm zɛ hɩɩya hɔ ma fɩɩga y.
Gʋrsɩra ba Pɛrgam kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: A n nɩ kargʋ lɛ hɩɩyazaa m bɩ nɩ meer naa do barɛ:

Mɔɔ bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n ta ʋ bɩ dɔ. Sʋtaana cirbəəduu bɩncɛ m. Ɩbɩɩ gɔɔta ɩ nɩ nyasʋm mɔɔ tɔ m, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʋ to y, baa dɔmɩm niŋŋə kʋ ŋ mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa paan••• Antipas zɛ ʋ gər awɔɔ zi bɩncɛ kʋ Sʋtaana n ta ʋ b'ʋ.
Bɩ mɔɔ ɩ mim m kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ. Gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'awɔɔ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ yɛ Balam mim ma. A ɩ dʋndɔrɛ bʋnyaa ka Balak ʋ k'an Israyɛl nyɩnɔ nyʋnnyɔɔta kʋ ŋ nɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩ sim sʋ kan jaandarɛ do haay kɩ.
Ɩbɩɩ zi sɔ bɩ, gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʋ, ŋnɩ yɛ Nikola gʋɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ ma.
Bɩ minto bɩ, ɩ bɔ ɩ taam, kʋ n bɛɛ mɔɔ zɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi dɩɩtaa, m bɩ yar ba kan ŋ kɩ, m lɛ kargʋ bɩ m.

Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma. Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ mann k'a nyaakʋm da kaŋ ʋ, m jaa fu kʋ n tɔdaa gʋrsɩra ba ma bɩ ka ʋ. Gɔsɩ n tɔ bɩ do dɔ kʋ gʋaa k'a a si bɩ bɛɛ y.
Gʋrsɩra ba Tɩyatɩɩr kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: Woso Nyɩ k'a mɩnyaarɔ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sɛwurə kɩ, a gannɔ m bɔ kʋ ʋ kan zaantɔzaa kɩ bɩ nɩ meer naa do barɛ:
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro, ɩbɩɩ ŋʋarɛ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ, ɩ zibəə kan ɩ tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ dɔ. Ɩ zibəəro k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ba jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ da biisi hɔɔ wɔɔ ra.

Bɩ, mɔɔ heer bɩ nyɩnta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ y. Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ yɛ Zezabɛl ma. Lʋ naa do n'a hɩrɛ a ma wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa, an nɩ mɔɔ zibəənyɩnɔ nyʋnnyɔɔm, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ kʋ ŋ nɩ jaan da, kʋ ŋ nɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩ sim sʋ.
Mɔɔ toore ka ʋ k'an a bɔ a taam, b'a lɛ baa k'a a bɔ taam a jaandarɛ nɔ ʋ y.
Dɩga! Mɔɔ y'a karɛ an wʋta yaaba m, an fɩr yɩ, a muno jaandənno wɔɔ maam sɔ, kʋ ŋ n a bɔ a taam a zibəəro wɔɔ nɔ ʋ y.
Mɔɔ y'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛm. Bɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ haay y'a dɔrɛ ŋ ʋ: mɔɔ m gʋaa k'a gʋaa haay lɛtaama dɔ kan a heer kɩ. Bɩ mɔɔ y'awɔɔ gʋaa biyəə hɔ kaŋ ʋ, an a ga kʋ ʋ kan a zaa zibəə kɩ.

B'awɔɔ gʋɔɔ k'a nɩ Tɩyatɩɩr ʋ, a gɔɔta a n yɛ hɔdɩndarɛ naa do ma bɩ, awɔɔ n yɛ hɔ kʋ n'a hɩm ma Sʋtaana minno kʋ ŋ y'a nyaakʋm da rɔ wɔɔ ma y, awɔɔ n a ka ma k'a ŋ dɔ y. Maam bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m mɔr gorezaa ka awɔɔ m la y.
Bɩ, k'a nyasʋ hɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ m bala kɔɔkɔɔ, k'an ta an mɔɔ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ku.

Damazaa bɩ, gʋaa k'a nyasʋ mɔɔ zibəə bɩ m an ta an a nyarɛ ku, mɔɔ paŋŋa kʋ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a yɩ m Zɩ zi bɩ kaŋ ʋ: Mɔɔ y'a karɛ an a so do gʋta ʋ, a y'a sore ŋ ʋ kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ, a yɩ ŋ zɔrɛ amba nɩ gedro zɔm bɩ m. Mɔɔ dɔmɩrɛ monyaa kaŋ ʋ.
Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.

Gʋrsɩra ba Sardɩ kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: Gʋaa k'a nɩ Woso ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ m kan monyaa saanhɩnarɔ kɩ bɩ nɩ meer naa do barɛ: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro dɔ, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʋ ŋ ʋ, ɩ mɩsɩr, bala gər n'ɩ mɩ.
Ɩ tɔ ʋ, ɩ b'a ka an gɔɔta an n'a ŋʋam k'a ga bɩ n a nyambʋr y, a mɩm bɔ ʋ. Bala, mɔɔ yɩ, ɩbɩɩ zibəə bɩ mɩŋŋabaa bɩ gʋta mɔɔ Woso mɩm ʋ y.
Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ, ɩ ma sɔ bɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʋ. Nyasʋ m k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam. K'ɩbɩɩ n dundo ɩ zi, mɔɔ zɛrɛ am koor hɔ bɩ m. B'ɩbɩɩ bɩ wakatɩ kʋ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ daata zɛ ɩbɩɩ ra bɩ dɔrɛ y.
Bɩ kan bɩ kɩ, ɩbɩɩ gʋɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ Sardɩ ʋ, ŋ n dintim ka a huuro ma y. Ŋ zum kʋ ʋ kan mɔɔ kɩ, huu furo n a ma, bala, ŋ y'a ga m.
Damazaa bɩ, huu fu dure a ma ncɩnaaʋ, mɔɔ b'a tɔ bɔm mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʋ y. Mɔɔ y'a kasɛtɩ kam m Zɩ kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ taa, mɔɔ ʋ, mɔɔ gʋaa m.
Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.

Gʋrsɩra ba Filadɛlfii kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: Gʋaa mɩŋŋa, sɩrazaa bɩ, k'a nɩ Davɩd cɛlɛnyɩ m, an a gʋm bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma a n a ta y, an n'a tam bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a gʋ y bɩ nɩ meer barɛ, a ʋ:
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro dɔ: Ba n nɩ, mɔɔ cɛlɛ gʋ, ɩ lɛɛ, bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a ta y. Ɩbɩɩ paŋŋa bɩ bɩ gʋta y, bɩ kan bɩ kɩ, ɩbɩɩ gɔɔta ɩ zu mɔɔ lemim ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ tɔ ma y.
Sʋtaana sokʋmacɛ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ ʋ, zɩɩfʋrɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋʋaar ŋn'a barɛ, zɩɩfʋrɔ bɛɛ n ŋ mɩ y. Mɔɔ y'a karɛ, ŋnɩ bʋr, ŋnɩ bɩ kukurə zɛ ɩbɩɩ taa, bɩ ŋn'a dɔm ma ŋ ʋ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ zum mɔɔ lemim ʋ kan tʋntɔʋrɛ kɩ, mɔɔ dɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma sɔ fɩryɩrɛ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʋr durnya jilli nɔ ʋ k'a bɩ durnyazannɔ makra ba bɩ dɔmɩm ʋ.
Mɔɔ zɛm zɔɔ, nyasʋ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ta m bɩ m kɔɔkɔɔ, kʋ gɔsɩ b'ɩbɩɩ firgə bɩ yɔ ɩ nɩ y.

Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ y'a bam mɔɔ Zɩ Wosocɛ bɩ sagɔ, a bɩ bɔm dɔ fɩɩga y. Bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m Woso tɔ gʋrsɩra bam ma, kan mɔɔ Woso kʋ tɔ kɩ, Zerizalɛm daa k'a a to brama mɔɔ Woso zi an nɩ zerm bɩ kɩ, kan mɔɔ tɔ daa bɩ kɩ.
Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
Gʋrsɩra ba Lawodisee kristagʋɔɔ sokʋma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʋ: Ba hɔ kʋ Amina, kasɛtɩzaa paan•••, sɩrazaa, an a zɛ kʋ ra kan Woso kɩ hɔ haay darɛ sɩŋŋɩda ʋ bɩ n'a hɩm na:
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro dɔ. Ɩbɩɩ bɩ nyɔɔrɛ, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩ kaarɛ y. A ŋʋa mɔɔ ʋ k'ɩbɩɩ n bɩr nyɔɔrɛ gɛɛ kaarɛ.
Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n zaarɔɔ, ɩbɩɩ bɩ nyɔɔrɛ, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩ kaarɛ bɩ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ bɔrɛ m lɛ.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ: Hɔnyɩzaa n'ɩ mɩ, mɔɔ m ba hɔnyɩzaa, mɔɔ bɩr m kam hɔsɩ ma dɔ y, bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ ɩ ʋ, ɩ ɩ fɩr nɔ ʋ, cicir nɔ ʋ, ɩ m ŋʋazaa, ɩ m bʋʋ, ɩ m dɩgɩ bɩ.
Ɩbɩɩ dʋndɔ mɔɔ nawʋm k'ɩ sarma kʋ ŋ y'a sʋr bɩ si mɔɔ zi k'ɩ ba hɔnyɩzaa, k'ɩ huuro furo si, k'ɩ du ɩ ma, k'ɩ nyannɩ nyaakʋm da m. Ɩ hɔ si ɩ tɔ ɩ mɩm la k'ɩ ɩ da ma ɩ lɛɛ yɩ.
Gʋɔɔ haay kʋ mɔɔ ŋʋa rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ nɩ ŋ bɔm zaa ʋ, m nɩ ŋ hʋnhʋrm. Ncɩnaaʋ bɩ, ɩ tɔ ʋ, k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam!
Ba mɔɔ jɩm cɛlɛ ma, m n'a zɛm na. Kʋ gʋaa mɔɔ leer ma, an cɛ bɩ lɛ gʋ, mɔɔ gasʋm zi. M hɔ bɩ kan kɩ, an a bɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ y'a karɛ, an nyɩnta kan mɔɔ kɩ, m cirbəəduu ra, amba mɔɔ m da ma sɔ, m ta m aa nyɩnta kan m Zɩ kɩ a cirbəəduu ra bɩ m.
Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.

Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ m ya m a yɩ cɛlɛ n a gʋ brama, bɩ leer kʋ mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a ma, an meer ba kan mɔɔ kɩ an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan huure leer kɩ b'a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Der naa ʋ, kʋ m hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʋ bɩ hɩnka ɩ m.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer mɔɔ ra. Bɩ, mɔɔ duu yɩ brama b'ʋ, gʋaa nɩ nyɩntam la.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam la bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan jaa kʋ n n'a birm zaspɩ, n n'a birm sardʋannɩ bɩ kɩ. Bramahɔwosɩʋrɛ k'a bɔ kʋ ʋ kan jaa kʋ n n'a birm emerodɩ bɩ n bɩr duu bɩ ma.
Duuro buhɩra a yaa si ɩ bɩr duu bɩ ma, bɩ duuro wɔɔ duro burə ʋ, gʋɔɔgusinno buhɩra a yaa si ɩ nyɩnta ŋ la, ŋnɩ huuro furo du a ma, sarma firgəro nɩ ŋ mim ma.
Brama nyakɩ nɩ bɔm duu bɩ nɔ ʋ kan leerlo kɩ, kan bramahəənsire kɩ. Fɩtɩrɛ saanhɩnarɔ nɩ cirbəəduu bɩ jɩr ʋ, ŋn'ɩ yɔm kan paŋŋa kɩ, brɔɔ m Woso ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ.
Duu bɩ lɛɛ bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, higʋta hi k'a nɩ yɔm pɛkʋ-pɛkʋ am kristal hɔ bɩ m bɩ m. Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ si ɩ bɩr duu bɩ ma. Ŋ nɩ mɩnyaarɔ m a mɛ ma jilli lɛɛ kan jɛ kɩ.
Lɛɛkarɛ hɔmɩsɩr bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan poozaa kɩ. A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan ŋʋaapoo kɩ. A kaakʋ hɔ bɩ meer ɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa hɔ kɩ. A si hɔ bɩ bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan caa gʋta k'a wer bɩ kɩ.

Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ za sɔrdɩ-sɔrdɩ, mɩnyaarɔ n bɩr ŋ ma jilli, kan ŋ nɔ ʋ kɩ. Sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, a hɩ nawʋm ncɩnaaʋ bɩ ŋ bɩr a tore y, ŋ ʋ: "Mɩŋŋa, Mɩŋŋa, Mɩŋŋa, Zuuba, Woso paŋŋa k'a jirə ba ʋ, a ɩ nyɩnta ʋ, an ta ʋ, an nɩ zɛm bɩ."
Bɩ kʋ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ bʋr ŋn'ɩ laa lɔm ŋn'a lɛ bɔm bɔ nɩ nyɩntam duu bɩ ra an mɩsɩr dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, ŋn'a daŋ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam nɩ barka,
gʋɔɔgusinno buhɩra a yaa si rɔ wɔɔ ɩ kukurə zɛrɛ bɔ nɩ nyɩntam duu burə ʋ an mɩsɩr dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ bɩ taa, ŋn'a daŋ ʋ, ŋn'a firgəro wɔɔ zom duu bɩ lɛɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ:
"Zuuba wɔɔ Woso, ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga lɛbɔʋrɛ, daʋrɛ kan paŋŋa kɩ m. Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ haay da: ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ ŋʋa, kʋ ŋ nɩ bɩr ta ʋ, bɩ y'a ka, ɩ ŋ da."
Mɔɔ ci yɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam duu bɩ ra bɩ bɩsɩ wɔ ʋ, n n a gʋrsɩra ba a nɔ ʋ kan a burə kɩ, n n a kʋsɩ kʋsɩrɛ saanhɩna m.
Mɔɔ malɛɛka paŋŋazaa yɩ, an n'a hɩm kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: Nka y'a ga m, an ci bɩ gʋ, an a kʋsɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ cincer?
Bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ an nɩ brama gɛɛ, tara burə ʋ gɛɛ, tara noom ʋ, an n'a dam ma, an ci bɩ gʋ, gɛɛ an dɩga a y.
Bɩ, mɔɔ heer a zar kʋ n n gʋaa yɩ an a ga m an ci bɩ gʋ, gɛɛ, an dɩga a bɩ tɔ ma.
Gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ gʋaa deem n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Ɩ b'ɩ heer zar y. Ba n nɩ, Ziida do poozaa k'an Davɩd yaŋŋa bɩ, k'a yɩ damazaa bɩ, an nɩ ci bɩ gʋm kan a kʋsɩrɛrɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ sinnyɛɛm yɩ an jɩm, ɩ ʋ, a zɛ n y'a ʋ, duu bɩ bire ʋ, hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ m bɩr ma. A mɩnnɔ saanhɩna kan a mɩnyaarɔ kɩ saanhɩna, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n Woso ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ k'a ŋ nyɔɔ tara burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ.
A a zɔ k'a ci bɩ si bɔ nɩ nyɩntam duu bɩ burə ʋ bɩ bɩsɩ wɔ ʋ.
K'a ci bɩ si bɩ, hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ si rɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno buhɩra yaa si rɔ wɔɔ kɩ kukurə zɛ sinnyɛɛm bɩ taa. Gʋaa biyəə nɩ kɔnnɩ m kan sarma laagarɔ kɩ, tidəər nyisi nɩ ŋ hɩnhan. Wosogʋɔɔ yaadarɛ m.

Ŋ nɩ laa daa lɔrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ ga m ɩ ci bɩ si, ɩ kʋsɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ cincer, bala, n y'ɩbɩɩ zɛ ɩbɩɩ n gʋɔɔ bʋmbɔ do haay nɔ ʋ, lemim biyəə nɔ ʋ, kʋrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ nɔ ʋ, tara y'a hʋnhɔ ɩ ma bɩ m, ɩ ŋ ka Woso ʋ.
Ɩbɩɩ ŋ ba cinno, mannɩbənno wɔɔ Woso minto, bɩ ŋ cirbəə bɩm tara burə ʋ."
Mɔɔ dɩga, m malɛɛkarɔ cir leer ma, ŋ lɛ tisi-tisi kan tisi-tisi k'a lɛ ba ʋ y, ŋnɩ bɩr duu bɩ ma kan hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno kɩ.
Ŋ n a leer busu kan paŋŋa kɩ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Sinnyɛɛm kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ b'a ga m an paŋŋa yɩ kan arzaka kɩ, mindɔrɛ kɩ, kan dama kɩ, daʋrɛ kɩ, cirbəə kɩ, lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ."

Hɔɔdarɛ haay k'a nɩ brama, an nɩ tara burə ʋ, tara noom ʋ kan hi burə kɩ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ ta ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ ma ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bɔ nɩ duu burə ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ m lɛbɔʋrɛ, daʋrɛ, cirbəə kan paŋŋa kɩ yɩ dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ."
Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Amina!" Gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ n kukurə zɛ, ŋn'a daŋ ʋ.
Kʋ sinnyɛɛm bɩ lɛɛkarɛ kʋsɩrɛ bɩ hʋr saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ bar la bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ, m a ma hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ həən si bramahəənsire m, a ʋ: "Bʋr!"
Bɩ, mɔɔ sisi fu yɩ. Gʋaa k'a da ʋ bɩ n sa nyasʋ a wɔ ʋ. N n cirbəə firgə ka ʋ, an ta k'a yaa yar ba, a ɩ dama m, b'a dama yɩm.
K'a kʋsɩrɛ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, mɔɔ ma hɔmɩsɩr hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n həən si, a ʋ: "Bʋr!"
Sisi vanta n a hɩnka piin•••: N lɛ ka gʋaa k'a da ʋ b'ʋ k'an laafɩɩ bɔ durnya ʋ kʋ gʋɔɔ n bɩr kʋ zɩnzɛm, n kargʋ jintə ka ʋ sɔ.
K'a kʋsɩrɛ kaakʋ hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, mɔɔ ma, hɔmɩsɩr kaakʋ hɔ bɩ həən si, a ʋ: "Bʋr!" Bɩ, mɔɔ sisi kundə yɩ. Gʋaa k'a da ʋ bɩ nɩ hɔ kʋ n nɩ mɔr gore makra bam nɩ bɩ n'a wɔ ʋ.

Bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə ma an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan leer kɩ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ bire ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Yɩryaa makra ba deem, hindeem zibəə busoo ma, naanyaa makra kaakʋ, hindeem zibəə busoo ma. K'a gɔɔta nyɔɔ bɩ ma kan dɩvɛn bɩ kɩ, ɩ b'ɩ wɔ da ma y."
K'a kʋsɩrɛ si hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, mɔɔ ma hɔmɩsɩr si hɔ bɩ m həən si, a ʋ: "Bʋr!"

Bɩ, mɔɔ sisi vɔnnɩmɛzaa yɩ. Gʋaa k'a da ʋ bɩ bir n nawʋm "zɛ" gəənokʋ n zu a jɛ ʋ. Ŋ paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a so tara burə zɛkumbir si kər bɩ deem ʋ, kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ zɩnzɛ kargʋ m, nɔ m, yaaba bʋnyaa m kan poohɔɔ kɩ m.
K'a kʋsɩrɛ soor hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ Woso lemim kan kasɛtɩ kʋ ŋ y'a ka bɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ nyiro yɩ, mannɩduu bɩ lɛtaa.
Ŋ n'ɩ zee dam kan paŋŋa kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba mɩŋŋa, sɩrazaa, ɩbɩɩ maasɩrɛ barɛ an ta an dɔmɩm kara ku k'ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ dʋdɔ ka, ɩ wɔɔ ma bɩ zɩm bɔ durnyazannɔ ma?"
N n huu fu ka ŋ gʋaa biyəə ʋ, n n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, kʋ ŋ n'a ya, ŋnɩ bʋr a ma poore, k'an ta, an ŋ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ kan ŋ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ lɛzerle dɔmɩm ku.
Bɩ, k'a kʋsɩrɛ sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, mɔɔ taranyiŋŋəre gʋta yɩ. Woso n a ba kundə ɩ ʋ pɛɛra kʋ n y'a ba hɔmɩsɩr ka kundə m, mom bɩ jilli n a ba ɩ ʋ ma m.
Monyaarɔ n sur tara ʋ, ɩ ʋ, hɩnhɛr gandaara ɩ sɔɔn jɩngɩr sur.
Brama n a gʋr ɩ ʋ, wʋtaa n y'a gʋr. Ciro haay kan tararɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hi bire ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ n'a gaa a bɩncɛrɔ ʋ.
Tara burə cinno, gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ, yarbənno cinno, arzakazannɔ kan paŋŋazannɔ kɩ, lɔnnɔ kan soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ kɩ, ŋ haay, a nyaakʋm dɩnda ciyaarɔ kan cigəəziro kɩ ʋ.
Ŋ n a hɩ ciro kan jaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, ŋ ʋ: "K'a dɩnda wɔɔ ra, k'a wɔɔ nyaakʋm da laatʋ gʋaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam cirbəəduu burə ʋ bɩ meer ma, kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ nɔmaa kɩ.
Bala, ŋ nɔmaa dɔmɩm gʋta ɩ bʋr, nka n n'a dam ma an bɔlɛ nɩ?"
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛkarɔ yɩ si, ŋnɩ jɩm tara gʋrga si bɩ nɔ ʋ. Ŋ nɩ tara burə hɩnhɛr si bɩ nyasʋ, kʋ hɩnhɛr sɩ b'a da ma an hɔn tara burə ʋ, higʋta burə ʋ, gɛɛ gɔ deem taan••• burə ʋ y.

Mɔɔ malɛɛka vanta yɩ, an a to dɔgʋr ʋ, an Woso mɩsɩr bɩ hɔ makra sa a wɔ ʋ. A n a leer busu gʋta an a hɩ malɛɛkarɔ siro kʋ ŋ nɩ paŋŋa m, ŋn'a dam ma, ŋn'a bʋnyaa ba tara kan higʋta kɩ m nɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ:
"A bɩ hɔsɩ ba tara m kan higʋta kɩ, gɔrɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, kʋ wɔɔ n makra da wɔɔ Woso zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ tusə ʋ y."
Bɩ, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ Woso makra bɩ yɩ a tusə ma rɔ wɔɔ lɛ ma: Ŋ tisi-tisi zɔrɔ busi yaa si, ŋnɩ makra bɩ yɩ, Israyɛl nyɩnɔ paryaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Ziida paryaa ma, gʋaa tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya, ŋ makra bɩ nɔ ŋ tusə ma. Rubɛn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Gaad paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya;
Asɛɛr paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Nɛftalii paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Manase paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya;
Sɩmɩnyɔn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Levii paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Isakaar paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya;
Zabɩlɔn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Zozɛf paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Bɛnzamɛn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya, ŋnɩ makra bɩ m a tusə ma.

Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ gʋɔɔ cir gʋta yɩ, gʋaa b'a dam ma, an ŋ lɛ sa y. Tara y'a hʋnhɔ, do y'a hʋnhɔ, kʋrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ, lemim y'a hʋnhɔ gʋɔɔ m. Ŋ n jɩm brama cirbəəduu bɩ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ taa, ŋnɩ zaba huuro du a ma, ŋn'ɩ bɛ lɛɛrɔ m a wɔ ʋ.
Ŋ n a leer busu brama, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bʋmbɔrɛ bɩ, a to a ʋ wɔɔ Woso k'a nɩ nyɩntam cirbəəduu ra kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ zi!"
Malɛɛkarɔ haay kʋ ŋ y'a zɛ kʋ ra ŋnɩ bɩr cirbəəduu bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ kan gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ, hɔmɩsɩr siro wɔɔ kɩ kukurə zɛ ŋn'a meer ku tara ma duu bɩ lɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ Woso daŋ ʋ.
Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Amina! Wɔɔ Woso n daʋrɛ yɩ kan lɛbɔʋrɛ kɩ, mindɔrɛ, barka yaa, cirbəə kan paŋŋa kɩ yɩ dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ. Amina!"
Gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ gʋaa deem meerbaa sa, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Gʋɔɔ nɔɔn duro kʋ ŋ zaba furo du a ma rɔ wɔɔ, nkɔɔ nɩ? A to ŋ y'a ʋ ka?
Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʋ, mɔɔ ʋ: Mɔɔ Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ y'a dɔ! A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ fɩr gʋta bɩ nɔ ʋ. A huuro wɔɔ sʋrgɔ ŋ y'a ʋ, sinnyɛɛm ma bɩ nɔ ʋ, ŋ fu n bɔ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm Woso cirbəəduu bɩ lɛ ʋ, ŋn'ɩ daʋrɛ zi bam sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ a cɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Bɩ, bɔ nɩ nyɩntam a cirbəəduu bɩ ra bɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma.
Nɔ bɩ ŋ zɛm dɔ, mɩsɩ bɩ ŋ nyasʋm dɔ y, wosogure kan sɩnsɛɛm kɩ bɩ narɛ ŋ ma dɔ y.
Bala, sinnyɛɛm k'a nɩ jɩnɩm cirbəəduu bɩ burə ʋ bɩ n nɩ yɩrɛ ŋ dundor. A karɛ ŋ lɛɛ, an ta ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa himinyaarɔ bɩncɛ ʋ. Bɩ Woso yɩ ŋ nyifeer do haay gʋngʋm ma.
Kʋ sinnyɛɛm bɩ kʋsɩrɛ saanhɩna hɔ bɩ hʋr bɩ, lɛɛ zɛ sɩɩ••• brama ʋ, an ta, an miniti bukərku ku.
Bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso taa rɔ wɔɔ yɩ. Ŋ n huurero gʋtɔɔ ka ŋ ʋ saanhɩna.

Malɛɛka vanta n bʋr an bɩ jɩm mannɩjaa bɩ lɛ ʋ. A n tidəər nyisi laaga kʋ n y'a ba sarma m bɩ sa a wɔ ʋ, n n tidəərlo ka ʋ gʋta k'an a zɛ kʋ ra kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ haay yaadarɛrɔ kɩ k'a nɩ ŋ ka Woso ʋ sarma mannɩjaa k'a nɩ cirbəəduu bɩ lɛ ʋ bɩ burə ʋ.
Tidəər siŋŋə bɩ n a to malɛɛka bɩ wɔ ʋ kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ yaa darɛ kɩ, an der an ta Woso taa.
Malɛɛka bɩ n tidəər nyisi mɔr bɩ sa, an mannɩduu bɩ sɛ sa an a da ʋ, an a han, an a zo tara burə ʋ. Bramahəənsirero, leerlo kɩ, brama nyakɩ kan taranyiŋŋəre kɩ nyɩnta ʋ.
Malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ huurero saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, ŋ y'a banka ka ŋ hɛ.
Lɛɛkarɛzaa b'a huure bɩ hɛ: Lajaa kan sɛ kɩ an a war kʋ ma kan ma kɩ sur tara burə ʋ. Sɛ n tara burə zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem sa kan tara burə zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem gɔrɔ kɩ, burbutur do haay kɩ.
Malɛɛka hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n a huure bɩ hɛ: Hɔ m, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan ci gʋta kʋ sɛ a sa, n n a nyɔɔta n a da higʋta ʋ kɩ. Higʋta bɩ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem a ba ma.
Higʋta bɩ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem nɔ n gɩnga, kɔɔlʋʋ gʋta-gʋtarɔ wɔɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem n a zar.
Malɛɛka kaakʋ hɔ bɩ n a huure bɩ hɛ: Monyaa gandaa n a to brama an a da an nɩ bɩrɛ, ɩ ʋ sɛwurə m. A da a ʋ kɔyaarɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem kan himinyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ra.
Monyaa bɩ do tɔ m "kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ". Hiro wɔɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem n a ba "kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ", gʋɔɔ n gɩnga gʋta hiro wɔɔ kʋ ŋ y'a ba kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ minto.

Malɛɛka si hɔ bɩ n a huure bɩ hɛ: Wosogure zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem kan mom zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem kɩ, monyaarɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem kɩ n a ba monsigə. Sinuu zɛkumbir kaakʋ bɩ deem n a ba monsigə, gunuu maam sɔ.

Mɔɔ n dɩga, m cɛda yɩ werle ma brama nɔyaa ʋ, m a ma, an n'a hɩm kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "A yɩm kʋsɩ! A yɩm kʋsɩ! A yɩm kʋsɩ, tara burə gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma huurero kʋ malɛɛkarɔ kaakʋrɔ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm k'a b'a hɛ bɩ minto."
Malɛɛka soor hɔ bɩ n a huure bɩ hɛ: Mɔɔ n monyaa yɩ, an a to brama ʋ, an b'a da. N n yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ bɩ cɛlɛnyɩ ka ʋ.
A n yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ bɩ lɛ gʋ, siŋŋə n bɔ ʋ, ɩ ʋ, sɛ gandaa siŋŋə m. Siŋŋə bɩ n a ka woso kan hɩnhɛr kɩ n a ba kundə.
