Bɩsɩnɔ n bɔ siŋŋə bɩ do nɔ ʋ, ŋn'a kərgu tara burə ra. N n paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ, am tara burə bɔɔrɔrɔ hɔ bɩ m.
N n lɛ ka ŋ ʋ: Kʋ ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ ba tara burə bur nɩ, bɩ ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ ba gɔ m, gɛɛ hɔ k'a nɩ lɛɛ dam tara burə ʋ bɩ nɩ y. Bɩ kʋ ŋ n nyaa ba kan gʋɔɔ kʋ Woso makra ba ŋ tusə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ bala.
N zaa ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n fɩr ka gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma mom soor tɔr, bɩ kʋ ŋ bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ y. Bɩ fɩr kʋ ŋ n'a kam gʋɔɔ ma bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan bɔɔrɔ k'a nɩ gʋaa hanm bɩ kɩ.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʋ bɩ, gʋɔɔ zɛ birm, bɩ ŋ b'a yɩrɛ y. Ŋ y'a ŋʋam k'a gɩnga, bɩ zɛ bɩ y'a sire ŋ lɛɛ.
Bɩsɩnɔ wɔɔ duro bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan sisiro kʋ ŋ mɔr da ŋ ma k'a ta ŋ nɩ yar ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Ŋ minno wɔɔ ra bɩ, a k'an naa ɩ ʋ, sarma firgəro m. Ŋ meerlɔ wɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋɔɔ hɔɔ kɩ.
Ŋ minkəro n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan lannɔ hɔɔ kɩ, ŋ sɔrɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan poozaa sɔrɔ kɩ.
Ŋ cɩrɔ wɔɔ k'an naa ɩ ʋ, pɔyaa goŋŋoro ŋ yɩ ŋ ka a ma, ŋ zarɔ wɔɔ bʋgʋr bɩ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sisiro tɛrkʋrɔ kʋ ŋ bra si ŋn'ɩ tam yar ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bʋgʋr kɩ.
Ŋ monno wɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan bɔɔrɔrɔ monno kɩ, ŋ karɔ n ta ʋ. Ŋ monno wɔɔ ŋ paŋŋa bɩ n ta ʋ, k'a fɩr ka gʋɔɔ ma mom soor tɔr.
Ŋ cir bɩ m yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ malɛɛka kʋ n n'a birm ebree lemim m "Abadɔn", n n'a birm grɛkkɩ m "Apoliyɔn" bɩ m.
Lɛɛkarɛ kʋsɩ bɩ cem: Ba kʋsɩ vantɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ n nɩ zɛm k'a b'a nya ʋ na.
Malɛɛka sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ n a huure bɩ hɛ: Bɩ, mɔɔ leer ma an a to sarma mannɩjaa kɔɔn siro k'a nɩ Woso lɛɛ bɩ zeezi.
A n n'a hɩm malɛɛka sɔrdɩ hɔ k'a nɩ huure bɩ m bɩ m, a ʋ: "Bar zɛ malɛɛkarɔ siro kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ sur Efratɩ kɔ gʋta burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ma."
N n bar zɛ malɛɛkarɔ siro kʋ ŋ y'a banka ŋn'ɩ dɔm wakatɩ, dɔmɩm, mom kan dɔɔraa kɩ minto, k'a bɩ zamaa zɛkumbir kaakʋ deem zɛ rɔ wɔɔ ma.
Bɩ, mɔɔ sisiro zannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ma: Ŋ miliyɔn zɔɔhɩra.

Siirozannɔ kʋ ŋ y'a hɩnka mɔɔ m makra bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ba n nɩ: Goŋŋoro ŋ yɩ ŋ ka a ma, ŋnɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sɛ kɩ, bʋramɛ kɩ, kidibirmɛ kɩ. Sisiro wɔɔ minno wɔɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan poozannɔ minno kɩ, sɛ n nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ lɛ ʋ kan siŋŋə kɩ, kidibir kɩ.
Kʋsɩ kaakʋrɔ nɔɔm, sɛ, siŋŋə kan kidibir kʋ ŋ nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ lɛrɔ ʋ, gʋɔɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋ deem zɛ.
Bala, sisiro wɔɔ paŋŋa bɩ, ŋ lɛrɔ an ta ʋ kan ŋ monno kɩ sɔ. Kʋ sɩra nɩ, ŋ monno wɔɔ bɔ ŋ y'a ʋ kʋ ʋ kan mɩnnɔ kɩ, ŋ minno n tɩnta ʋ, bɩ n'a karɛ ŋn'a dam ma, ŋn'ɩ fɩr kam gʋɔɔ ma.

Kʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔtarɔ wɔɔ nɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n gɩnga fɩryɩrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n a bɔ a taam ŋn'a wɔbʋmbɔ a zibəəro wɔɔ ʋ y. Ŋ gɔɔta, ŋn'ɩ zinəro, wosobaawɔnnɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba sarma m gɛɛ wanzur m, gɛɛ zaan m, gɛɛ jaa m, gɛɛ gɔ m, kʋ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ lɛɛ yɩ, ŋnɩ mim ma, ŋnɩ ta rɔ wɔɔ daŋ ʋ y.
Ŋ n a bɔ a taam ŋn'a wɔbʋmbɔ a gərzɛrɛ, a wɔkurero, a jaandarɛ kan a kombaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʋ y.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛka paŋŋazaa deem yɩ, an a to brama, an nɩ zerm, warkʋ n a kurə ɩ ʋ, huu m. Brama hɔwasɩʋʋrɛ n a bɩr a mim ma, a meer nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ wosogure m. A gannɔ nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ sɛ y'a zaa da.
Ci poore n'a wɔ ʋ, an gʋ. A n a bɩsɩ gam tɔ higʋta ra, an a jɩsa gam tɔ tara ra.
A n zee gʋta da, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan poozaa baadarɛ kɩ. K'a zee bɩ da kan paŋŋa kɩ bɩ, bramahəənsire saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ baa da.
Kʋ bramahəənsire saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ baa da bɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta kʋ m a gʋrsɩra ba, mɔɔ leer ma an a to brama, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Bramahəənsire saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ leer nyaakʋm da, ɩ bɩ ŋ da ci ʋ y.
Malɛɛka kʋ mɔɔ nyɩnta m a yɩ, an nɩ jɩnɩm higʋta kan tara kɩ burə ʋ bɩ, a a bɩsɩ wɔ busu brama, an a wer si
k'an bɔ m mɩsɩr dɔɔraa nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔ ʋ, an brama da kan tara kɩ kan hɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an higʋta da kan hɔ k'a n'a nɔ ʋ bɩ kɩ m, a ʋ: Dɔmɩm darɛ ba ʋ dɔ y.
Dɔmɩm kʋ malɛɛka saanhɩna hɔ bɩ n n'a huure bɩ hɛŋ ʋ bɩ, Woso mim k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ kʋ yɩrɛ, amba a hɩ a zibəənyɩnɔ lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ padarɛ m bɩ m.
Leer kʋ mɔɔ ma an a to brama b'a ya an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Ta, ɩ ci kʋ n y'a gʋ malɛɛka k'a nɩ jɩnɩm higʋta burə ʋ kan tara kɩ wɔ ʋ bɩ si.
Mɔɔ nɩ m zɔ malɛɛka bɩ ma, m a yɛ han k'an ci poore bɩ ka m ʋ. A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: A si, ɩ sʋ. A nyɩntam kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ ɩbɩɩ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, a nyɩntarɛ am zɔɔn hɔ bɩ m ɩbɩɩ lɛ ʋ.
Mɔɔ n ci poore bɩ si malɛɛka bɩ wɔ ʋ, m a sʋ. Mɔɔ lɛ ʋ bɩ a nyɩnta am zɔɔn hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ kʋ mɔɔ sʋ bɩ, mɔɔ nɔ a ba kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ.
N n a hɩ mɔɔ m, n ʋ: A a ga m k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ ya, ɩ Woso lɛ si ɩ so ra kʋrɔ gʋta minto, tararɔ gʋta minto, lemim gʋta kan cinno gʋta kɩ minto.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, n n niigə gɔ ka mɔɔ ʋ, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan hɔ makra barɛ gʋra kɩ, n n'a hɩ mɔɔ m, n ʋ: wuti, ɩ Wosocɛ bɩ makra ba kan mannɩjaa bɩ kɩ, k'ɩ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʋ b'ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ sa.
Bɩ kʋ Wosocɛ jɛɛr bɩ nɩ, k'ɩ to maam, ɩ b'a makra ba y. Bala, a da n y'a ʋ doro vantɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ tʋntɔ tara mɩŋŋa bɩ ra mom busi a yaa hɩɩya nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʋ.
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a kam mɔɔ kasɛtɩzannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ m yɔrgɔrɔ huuro du a ma, ŋnɩ Woso lɛ si ŋnɩ so ra dɔmɩm tisi kan a zɔɔhɩra a busɔrdɩ kɩ nɔ ʋ.
Kasɛtɩzannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ, oliviyee hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ m kan fɩtɩrɛ cɩntarahɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ jɩnɩm durnya Zuuba taa rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m.
Kʋ gʋaa ʋ k'a bʋnyaa ba ŋ nɩ, sɛ n nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ lɛ ʋ, an ŋ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ bɩ. Denter, kʋ gʋaa ʋ k'a hɔ bʋnyaa ba ŋ nɩ, a a ga m, k'an ga ncɩnaaʋ.

Bala, ŋ y'ɩ lɛ m k'a brama ta, bɩ la b'a dam ma, an tɔkʋ ŋ wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa dɔmɩm ʋ y. Ŋ y'a da ma, ŋn'a ka hi n a lʋr ma. Ŋ y'a da ma ŋn'a ka fɩr do haay n bʋr durnya ʋ, dɔmɩm kʋ ŋ y'a ŋʋa ma.
Bɩ kʋ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ ka ŋn'a nya, hɔnyaazaa k'a n'a tom yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ b'ʋ bɩ wutim yarm kan ŋ kɩ, an bʋr ŋ la, an ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Ŋ gəəro wɔɔ gɔɔtam kʋ gʋta kʋ n n'a birm makra nɔ ʋ Sodɔm kan Eziptɩ kɩ bire ma. Bɩncɛ bɩ do n yɩ ŋ Zuuba bɩ wɔ ʋ gɔdarkʋra ma bɩ.
Kʋrɔ y'a hʋnhɔ, do y'a hʋnhɔ, lemim y'a hʋnhɔ, kan tararɔ y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ zɛm bɩ dɩga ŋ gəəro ma dɔmɩm kaakʋ kan a kur kɩ, bɩ, ŋ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋ birle ma y.
Durnyazannɔ y'a heer nyɔɔrɛ ŋ mim ma, ŋ nyɩntam heer nyɔɔ nɔ ʋ, ŋ ganwʋrɛ nyɔɔm kʋ ma, kʋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro fɩr ka ŋ ma gʋta bɩ minto.
Bɩ dɔmɩm kaakʋ kan a kur kɩ rɔ nɔɔn duro jɛ ʋ bɩ, Woso a ka mɩsɩrbaa hoonsi n gasʋ ŋ ʋ, ŋnɩ wuti, ŋnɩ jɩnjɩm. Bɩ, nyibəə gʋta gasʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Ŋ leer gʋta ma an a to brama, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʋ: "K'a der naa ʋ!" Bɩ ŋ der brama warkʋ nɔ ʋ, ŋ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ mɩm m.

Wakatɩ bɩ do ʋ bɩ, taranyiŋŋəre paŋŋazaa nyɩnta ʋ. Tara bɩ do nɔ ʋ, cɛ bu barla, cɛ deem wurgə haay, bɩ gʋaa tisi saanhɩna ɩ gɩnga tara bɩ nyiŋŋəre nɔ ʋ. Nyibəə gasʋ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ ʋ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ brama Woso ʋ.
Kʋsɩ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ cem. Ba "kʋsɩ" kaakʋ hɔ n nɩ zɛm lɛɛm na.
Malɛɛka saanhɩna hɔ b'a huure bɩ hɛ: Leer gʋtɔɔ n a to brama, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ Zuuba Woso kan a Krista kɩ y'a so durnya cirbəə b'ʋ kɛɛrɛ. A cirbəə bɩm dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ."
Gʋɔɔgusinno buhɩra a yaa si rɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso taa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋn'ɩ nyɩntarɛ a cirbəəduuro ra rɔ wɔɔ kukurə zɛ, ŋn'a meer ku tara ma, ŋn'a daŋ ʋ,
ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Wɔɔ ɩ barka darɛ ɩbɩɩ m Zuuba Woso paŋŋa k'a jire ba ʋ, ɩbɩɩ n ta ʋ, ɩ nyɩnta ʋ. Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ paŋŋa gʋta hɩnka ɩ ɩ cirbəə cɩnta.

Tara cinno wuti nɔmaa m, b'ɩbɩɩ nɔmaa ɩ bʋr. Gəəno dʋdɔkarɛ dɔmɩm m naa, ɩbɩɩ zibəənyɩnɔ lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ganwʋrɛ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm m naa, kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyi barɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔ poorero kan gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya zarm nɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ dɔmɩm m naa."
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, Wosocɛ k'a nɩ arzana ʋ b'a gʋ, gʋaasɩbabaa daka bɩ n a hɩnka Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, brama nyakɩrɔ, leerlo kan bramahəənsirero kɩ, taranyiŋŋəre kɩ lajaa paŋŋazannɔ kɩ nyɩnta ʋ.
Makra gandaa a hɩnka brama. Lʋ m, an wosogure du a ma, mom n'a gannɔ taa, an monyaa bueerehɩɩya ku a mim ma, ɩ ʋ, firgə m.
A n nɩ jɩsɩ m, an nɩ zee darɛ a nyoosibarɛ nɔbusu nɔ ʋ.
Makra vanta n a hɩnka brama. Mɩnda gandaara m bʋmbʋɛɛda yoyy••• A mim saanhɩna, a mɩnnɔ bu, firgəro saanhɩna n a minno wɔɔ ma.
A mom bɩ n brama monyaarɔ zɛkumbir kaakʋrɔ wɔɔ deem waa, an a sur tara ʋ. Mɩnda bɩ n a da lʋ k'a nɩ nyɩ yɩm bɩ lɛ ʋ, kʋ nyɩ bɩ bɩ bɔ k'a a da ma a mom.
Lʋ bɩ n nyɩ bɩ yɩ yar. A n n'a so tara burə kʋrɔ haay ʋ kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ. Bɩ, n y'a nyɩ bɩ busu, n n der m Woso zi a cirbəəduu bɩ jɩr ʋ.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lʋ bɩ bra si an ta poohɔɔn ʋ. Poohɔɔn bɩ do Woso bɩncɛ banka ʋ a tɔ ma, kʋ n n'a tʋr ʋ dɔmɩm tisi zɔɔhɩra busɔrdɩ nɔ ʋ.
Yar nyɩnta ʋ brama b'ʋ: Misɛl kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ yar ba kan mɩnda bɩ kɩ. Mɩnda bɩ kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ nɩ yar bam sɔ.
Bɩ, Misɛl kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ bʋr ŋ la. Mɩnda kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ ba bɩncɛ m brama dɔ y.
N n mɩnda gʋta bɩ bra n n a da tara ʋ. A m mɩm gusire, n n'a birm minkagʋaarazaa gɛɛ Sʋtaana, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ, jɩm, a m nɩ bra bam durnya haay m bɩ. N y'a bra n n a da tara ʋ kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ.

Mɔɔ n leer paŋŋazaa ma brama, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Wɔɔ Woso bʋmbɔrɛ dɔmɩm a ku. Wɔɔ Woso paŋŋa kan a cirbəə kɩ dɔmɩm n a ku, a Krista paŋŋa dɔmɩm a ku. Bala, bɔ nɩ mim kam wɔɔ danyɩnɔ ra Woso taa sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ bɩ, n bɩ bra n n a da tara ʋ:
Bɩ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bʋr la sinnyɛɛm bɩ ma paŋŋa m, kan ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ kɩ m. Bala, ŋ yɛ ŋnɩ kaanm a mɩsɩrbaa m, ŋnɩ yɛ zɛ ma.
Arzana kan a gʋɔɔ kɩ k'a heer nyɔɔ, tara kan higʋta kɩ kʋsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ. Bala, Sʋtaana zer awɔɔ zi nɔmaa n a heer ʋ, bala, a a dɔ a ʋ, a dɔmɩm n gɔɔta hɔsɩ y."
Mɩnda bɩ k'a bɩ dɩga a, ŋ y'a bra ŋn'a dam bɩ, a a da a ra, an nɩ lam lʋ k'a nyɩ yɩ yar bɩ ra.
Bɩ, n cɛda za hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ ka lʋ b'ʋ kan wer an ta poohɔɔn ʋ bɩncɛ kʋ n y'a ka ʋ, k'an nyɩnta ʋ kʋ n n'a tʋr ʋ b'ʋ dɔɔraa kaakʋ kan a kur kɩ nɔ ʋ, laatʋ mɩnda bɩ ma.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɩnda bɩ hi bɔ a rɛ gʋta am kɔyaa hɔ bɩ m, lʋ bɩ jɛ ʋ, k'an a gaa an cenim.
Tara n bʋr an b'a da lʋ bɩ han, an yar ʋ, an kɔyaa kʋ mɩnda b'a bɔ a rɛ bɩ mom.
Mɩnda bɩ k'a heer nɩ busum kan lʋ bɩ kɩ bɩ, a yar bɩ lɛ bɩr kan lʋ bɩ yaŋŋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ zum Woso lɛrɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta Yeezuu kasɛtɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
A m bɩ, an gɔɔta higʋta nyɩntaa bɩ ra.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ hɔturma yɩ an wuti an nɩ bɔm higʋta b'ʋ. A mɩnnɔ bu, a mim saanhɩna. A mɩnnɔ wɔɔ, firgəro bu nɩ ŋ la. A minno wɔɔ ra bɩ, Woso sʋnsɔ tɔ n ta ŋ ma.
Hɔturma kʋ mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan bɔnla kɩ. A gannɔ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan ursi gannɔ kɩ, a lɛ n bɔ kʋ ʋ kan poozaa hɔ kɩ, mɩnda bɩ n a paŋŋa ka ʋ kan a cirbəə kɩ, lɛ gʋta kɩ.
A minno wɔɔ deem nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ, a sakʋ n y'a ʋ, k'an ga, b'a sakʋrɛ maam-maam bɩ nyim bɩ nya. Durnya haay n a lɛ bɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ zu a jɛ ʋ.
Ŋ n mɩnda bɩ da ʋ, bala, a ɩ paŋŋa ka hɔturma b'ʋ, ŋn'a da ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Nka n'a makra bam kan hɔturma bɩ kɩ? Nka y'a da ma, an zoo ba kan kɩ?"
N n a da meerbaa ma k'an a lɛ bɔ a ʋ, k'an Woso sʋnsɔ wʋ. N lɛ ka ʋ k'an zi ba mom busi a yaa hɩɩya.
A n a lɛ gʋ, an nɩ Woso sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ an n'a tɔ kan a har bɩ kɩ sʋnsɔ wʋrɛ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ arzana ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
N lɛ ka ʋ k'an yar ba kan wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'an bʋr ŋ la. N paŋŋa ka ʋ do y'a hʋnhɔ, kʋ y'a hʋnhɔ, lemim y'a hʋnhɔ kan tara y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ burə ʋ.
Kʋ durnya gʋɔɔ haay n a da ʋ kan gʋɔɔ niŋŋoo kʋ ŋ n ŋ tɔ gʋrsɩra ba sinnyɛɛm kʋ n y'a zɛ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʋ hal durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
"Gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa bɩ k'an a ma!
Kʋ n y'a cɩnta kʋ gʋaa m ta lɔmbaa ʋ, ta an nawʋm lɔmbaa ʋ. Kʋ n y'a cɩnta kʋ kargʋ n gʋaa zɛ, kargʋ n n'a zɛm. Wosogʋɔɔ tʋntɔʋrɛ wakatɩ m naa kan ŋ sɩrakarɛ kɩ."
Mɔɔ m ya, m hɔturma vanta yɩ, an nɩ bɔm tara ʋ. A mɩnnɔ hɩɩya, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm mɩnnɔ kɩ. A n nɩ meer barɛ am mɩnda bɩ hɔ bɩ m.

A n nɩ lɛɛkarɛ hɔturma bɩ paŋŋa m haay, an nɩ zi bam lɛɛkarɛ hɔturma bɩ mɩm m. A n a ka durnya kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɩ lɛɛkarɛ hɔturma kʋ n y'a sakʋ maam-maam, a nyi m n nya bɩ daŋ ʋ.
A ɩ makrarɔ gʋta bam. A a ka sɛ n'a tom brama sɔ an nɩ zerm tara burə ʋ, gʋaa haay mɩm ʋ.

Bra an n'a bam tara burə gʋɔɔ m kan makrarɔ gʋtɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ ka ʋ k'a nɩ ŋ ba lɛɛkarɛ hɔturma bɩ mɩm ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. A a hɩ durnyazannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ, ŋnɩ hɔturma kʋ n y'a sakʋ kargʋ m, a nyim n nyɔɔ bɩ bɔkʋrɛ ba.
N paŋŋa ka hɔturma hɩɩya hɔ b'ʋ k'an meeyaa ka hɔturma bɩ bɔkʋrɛ b'ʋ, k'a n'a da ma an meer ba sɔ. Gʋaa haay k'a bɩr hɔturma bɩ bɔkʋrɛ bɩ daŋ ʋ bɩ, k'an a ka kʋ ŋ nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Hɔturma b'ɩ paŋŋa bam gʋɔɔ ma, gʋɔɔ poorero gɛɛ gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ, arzakazannɔ gɛɛ ŋʋazannɔ, soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ gɛɛ lɔnnɔ, an nɩ gʋrsɩra barɛ ŋ bɩsɩ wɔ ma gɛɛ ŋ tusə ma.
Gʋaa b'a dam ma an hɔ hɛɛ gɛɛ an hɔ si k'a ba hɔturma bɩ makra m, a tɔ gɛɛ a tɔ bɩ lɛsarɛnyɩ m a mɛ ma y.
Mindɔrɛ bɩncɛ n naa: Bala, gʋaa k'a hɔɔn ta ʋ k'an lɛsarɛnyɩ kʋ hɔturma bɩ n ta m bɩ jɩ hɩ. Gʋaa makra m lɛsarɛnyɩ bɩ m. Lɛsarɛnyɩ bɩ zɔrsɔddɩ busɔrdɩ yaa sɔrdɩ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ m ya, m dɩga, m sinnyɛɛm bɩ yɩ, an jɩm Siyɔn ci bɩ burə ʋ, gʋaa tisi-tisi zɔrɔ busi a yaa siro kʋ ŋ y'a tɔ kan a zɩ tɔ kɩ gʋrsɩra ba ŋ tusə ma rɔ wɔɔ nɩ kan kɩ.
Mɔɔ leer ma, an a to brama an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan higʋtɔɔ susur bɩncɛ kɩ, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan bramahəənsire paŋŋazaa kɩ. Bɩ, leer kʋ mɔɔ ma bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan kɔnnɩ zenno kʋ ŋ n'a kɔnnɩ zɛm nɔ laa leer kɩ.

Ŋ n'ɩ laa daa lɔrɛ cirbəəduu kan hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ kɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ taa. Bɩ gʋaa ba ʋ, an b'a dam ma an laa bɩ do dɩnda kʋ gʋaa tisi-tisi zɔrɔ busi a yaa siro kʋ ŋ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ tara burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y.

Gʋɔɔ m, ŋ n a mɩŋŋɔɔ zar kan lannɔ kɩ y, ŋ n dintim zi ba kan lannɔ kɩ y. Zu ŋ nawʋm kʋ ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ bɩncɛ haay k'a nɩ taŋ ʋ b'ʋ. Ŋ bʋmbɔrɛ yɩ gʋɔɔ bire ʋ, ŋnɩ lɛɛkarɛ gʋɔɔ, n nɩ ŋ ka Woso ʋ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ ʋ.
Ŋʋaar n nyɩnta ŋ lɛ ʋ y, bala, kʋrɔma ba ŋ gʋr zi y.

Mɔɔ malɛɛka vanta yɩ an wer brama yaa ʋ, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ m, k'a pa da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ tara burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, tara y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ, do y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ, lemim y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ, kʋ y'a hʋnhɔ kɩ m.
A n n'a hɩm leer paŋŋazaa m, a ʋ: "K'a nyi ba Woso m, k'a a lɛ bɔ ʋ, bala, a dʋdɔkarɛ wakatɩ a ku. K'a bɔ ɩ brama da kan tara kɩ, higʋta kan himinyaarɔ kɩ bɩ da ʋ!"
Malɛɛka vanta n zu lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ jɛ ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "A a da! A a da! Babɩlɔnnɩ kʋ gʋta b'a da! A y'a ka tararɔ haay n a jaandarɛ bʋnyaabaa dɩvɛn bɩ mi!"
Malɛɛka kaakʋ hɔ n zu malɛɛka hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ jɛ ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ kan leer paŋŋazaa kɩ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋaa hɔturma bɩ bɔkʋrɛ bɩ da ʋ kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ, k'a a makra bɩ yɩ a tusə ma gɛɛ a wɔ ma,
a zaa Woso nɔmaa dɩvɛn bɩ mire. A heerbusu dɩvɛn paan•••, dɩvɛn k'a a tɔ nɔmaa laaga ʋ bɩ, a bɩ mim sɔ. B'a fɩryɩrɛ dɔm sɛ ʋ kan kidibir sɛ kɩ malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ mɩm ʋ.
Ŋ fɩryɩrɛ sɛ siŋŋə bɩ derm dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ. Bɩ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔturma bɩ da ʋ kan a bɔkʋrɛ bɩ kɩ, ŋnɩ yɛ a tɔ makra ma rɔ wɔɔ bɩ mɛnyɔɔ yɩm sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ y."
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zum Woso lɛrɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʋ rɔ wɔɔ tʋntɔʋrɛ dɔmɩm m naa.

Mɔɔ leer ma brama, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: naa gʋrsɩra ba: "Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ gɩnga Zuuba zaa zuure nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m dɩɩtaa." "Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ, a ʋ: sɩra m, kʋ ŋ n a kɔrɛ mɛnyɔɔ da. Bala, ŋ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ zure ŋ jɛ ʋ."
Mɔɔ m ya, m warkʋ yɩ fu. Warkʋ bɩ burə ʋ bɩ, gʋaa nɩ nyɩntam, an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan gʋaa nyɩ kɩ. Sarma firgə n'a mim ma, gore lɛzaa n'a wɔ ʋ.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, malɛɛka vanta n bɔ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an a leer busu, an a hɩ gʋaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam warkʋ burə ʋ bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ gore bɩ sa, ɩ hɔ dam, bala, hɔdarɛ dɔmɩm y'a ku. Bala, hɔ ma tara burə ʋ."
Gʋaa k'a nɩ warkʋ burə ʋ bɩ n a gore bɩ sa, an a nyɔɔ tara burə ʋ, an hɔ k'a nɩ tara burə ʋ bɩ da.
Mɔɔ m ya, m malɛɛka deem yɩ, an bɔ Wosocɛ ʋ arzana ʋ. Guere lɛzaa n'a wɔ ʋ sɔ.

Malɛɛka vanta n a ya, an bɔ mannɩjaa bɩ bɩncɛ ʋ. A paŋŋa n bʋr sɛ ra. A n a leer busu kan paŋŋa kɩ an a hɩ malɛɛka k'a nɩ gore lɛzaa bɩ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ gore lɛzaa bɩ nyɔɔ, ɩ tara burə dɩvɛn gɔ bɩ nyɩ bɩ nɔ m. Bala, a nyɩ bɩ ma."
Malɛɛka bɩ n a gore bɩ sa, an a nyɔɔ tara burə ʋ, an tara burə dɩvɛn gɔ nyɩ bɩ nɔ m, an a nyɔɔ an a zar Woso nɔmaa mɔr gʋta ʋ.
N n tʋntɔ ra mɔr gʋta b'ʋ kʋ bɩ toore ma. Ma n bɔ an der an b'a dam ma an sisi mom an a sarbɩr ku, an bra, an yar an a zɔ cilo zɔɔhɩra bunɛɛhʋ ma.
Mɔɔ m ya, m makra vanta yɩ brama gandaa ʋ, a dɩgama sʋra n ta ʋ. Malɛɛkarɔ saanhɩnarɔ nɩ kʋsɩrɔ saanhɩna m a wɔ ʋ. Kʋsɩrɔ jɛzannɔ m, bala, brɔɔ nɩ Woso heerbusu bɩ zibəə nyambʋrlɛ.

Mɔɔ m higʋta hi k'a nɩ yɔm pɛkʋ-pɛkʋ an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan kristal kɩ yɩ, an a war kʋ ma kan sɛ kɩ. Mɔɔ yɩ sɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ bʋr hɔturma bɩ ra kan a bɔkʋrɛ bɩ kɩ, kan a tɔ bɩ lɛsarɛnyɩ bɩ kɩ ra rɔ wɔɔ n jɩm higʋta hi k'a nɩ yɔm pɛkʋ-pɛkʋ am kristal hɔ bɩ m bɩ jɩr ma, ŋn'ɩ Woso kɔnnɩrɔ m.

Ŋ n'ɩ laa kʋ Moyiisi, Woso zibəənyɩ a lɔ bɩ lɔrɛ, sinnyɛɛm bɩ hɔ kɩ, ŋ ʋ: "Zuuba Woso paŋŋa k'a jire ba ʋ zaa, ɩbɩɩ zibəəro wɔɔ gʋta, ŋnɩ mɩŋŋa paan•••, ŋn'a ga dɩgama m. Tararɔ haay cir, ɩbɩɩ n'a bam haay bɩ tɩrga, sɩra m sɔ, Zuuba!
Nka ɩ bɩ nyi barɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ m, an a lɛ bɔ ʋ? Bala, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ deem n mɩŋŋa. Tararɔ haay zɛrɛ ŋnɩ b'ɩbɩɩ da ʋ. Bala, ɩbɩɩ dʋdɔkarɛ b'a hɩnka."
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ Wosocɛ kʋ gʋaasɩbabaa kasɛtɩ pɛɛracɛ bɩ n ta ʋ bɩ n a gʋ brama.
Malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ta kʋsɩ saanhɩna rɔ wɔɔ n bɔ Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ. Ŋ n huu furo kʋ ŋ nɩ yɔm nɔ wɔɔ du a ma, ŋnɩ sarma hɔsoaʋrɔ so a cɩ ʋ.
Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ deem n sarma laaga saanhɩnarɔ ka malɛɛkarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ ʋ, Woso k'an mɩsɩr dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ bɩ nɔmaa nɩ ŋ hɩnhan.
Siŋŋə n Wosocɛ bɩ han, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ kan a paŋŋa gʋta bɩ kɩ minto. Bɩ gʋaa b'a dam ma, an gasʋ Wosocɛ b'ʋ kʋ kʋsɩ saanhɩnarɔ kʋ malɛɛkarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ bʋr ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ n nya y.
Mɔɔ leer gʋta ma an a to Wosocɛ bɩ zeezi, an n'a hɩm malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a ta, a Woso nɔmaa k'a nɩ laaga saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ lo tara burə ʋ!"
Lɛɛkarɛ malɛɛka bɩ n ta, an aa a laaga hɔ bɩ lo tara burə ʋ. Nyim bʋnyaa k'a nɩ busum gʋta y'a da gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hɔturma bɩ makra m, ŋn'a bɔkʋrɛ bɩ daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ʋ.
Malɛɛka hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo higʋta burə ʋ. Hi bɩ n a ba am gər ma hɔ bɩ m. Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ hi bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ n gɩnga.
Malɛɛka kaakʋ hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo kɔyaarɔ ʋ, himinyaarɔ kɩ ʋ, ŋn'a ba ma.
Mɔɔ malɛɛka k'a so hi ʋ bɩ leer ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n ta ʋ, ɩ nyɩnta ʋ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ tɩrga. Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa, bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ dʋdɔ ka kan tɩrgabaa kɩ.
Kʋ ŋ y'a ka wosogʋɔɔ ma n bra kan ɩ lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ hɔ kɩ bɩ, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ ma ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ n'a mi sɔ, naa ŋ y'a ga m."
Mɔɔ ma mannɩjaa bɩ n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Sɩra m, Zuuba Woso paŋŋa k'a jire ba ʋ zaa, ɩbɩɩ dʋdɔkarɛrɔ wɔɔ sɩra m, bɩ ŋ tɩrga sɔ."
Malɛɛka si hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo wosogure burə ʋ. N n paŋŋa ka ʋ k'a sɛ n gʋɔɔ bɩ.
Fɩnfɩr gandaara n na gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ma. Ŋ n Woso k'a so kʋsɩrɔ nɔɔn duro ʋ bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ. Ŋ lɛ baa k'a bɔ a taam, k'a a lɛ bɔ Woso ʋ y.
Malɛɛka soor hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo hɔturma bɩ cirbəəduu bɩ ra. A cirbəə bɩncɛ bɩ n a ba monsigə bimm•••. Gʋɔɔ n'a nɛɛm sʋm fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʋ.
Ŋ n arzana Woso bɩ sʋnsɔ wʋ, ŋ fɩryɩrɛ kan ŋ nyinno wɔɔ kɩ minto, bɩ ŋ heer n a lʋr a zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ minto y.
Malɛɛka sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo Efratɩ kɔ gʋta b'ʋ. Hi bɩ n gaan k'a zaa to cinno kʋ ŋ n'a tom dɔjɩr ʋ rɔ wɔɔ cenle minto.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ zinəro yɩ kaakʋ, ŋnɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan ŋʋɩɩkannɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bɔ mɩnda bɩ lɛ ʋ kan hɔturma bɩ lɛ kɩ, ŋʋaarlɛsinnɩsorazaa lɛ kɩ.
Zinəro wɔɔ duro nɩ hoserlo barɛ. Ta ŋ nawʋm durnya haay cinno wɔɔ zi k'a yaa ŋ so kʋ ma yar k'a nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ Woso paŋŋa k'a jire ba ʋ zaa dɔmɩm gʋta hinni ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.
"Ba n na: Zɛ mɔɔ nawʋrɛ, am koor hɔ bɩ m. Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a nɩ dɔrɛ a huuro ma, a n a zu a ʋ y, a yaa ta dɩgɩ, a a nyannɩ hɩnka bɩ m."
Zinəro wɔɔ cinno wɔɔ so kʋ ma bɩncɛ kʋ n n'a birm ebree lemim m Armagedɔn b'ʋ.
Malɛɛka saanhɩna hɔ bɩ n a laaga hɔ bɩ lo hɩnhɛr nɔ ʋ. Leer paŋŋazaa n a to cirbəəduu bɩ zeezi Wosocɛ ʋ b'ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "A ba an nya!"
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, bramanyakɩrɔ, leerlo kan bramahəənsirero kɩ, taranyiŋŋəre paŋŋazaa kɩ nyɩnta ʋ. Hɔ kʋ gʋaa bʋr durnya ʋ, taranyiŋŋəre naa do lɔɔ n nyɩnta ʋ cɩna y.
Kʋnɔ gʋta bɩ n a zɛ kumbir lɛ kaakʋ, tararɔ kʋnɔrɔ n wurgə. Woso Babɩlɔnnɩ gʋta bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ, k'a nɔmaa dɩvɛn laaga k'a nɩ hirm bɩ kɩnka ma.
Kʋrɔ kʋ hi bɩr ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ haay n nyaam, n n a ya, n n ciro yɩ sɔ y.
Lajaa gandaarɔ ŋ cilo n a zɔ busi-busi ma n a to brama, ŋnɩ b'a da gʋɔɔ wɔɔ ra. Gʋɔɔ wɔɔ n Woso sʋnsɔ wʋ, kʋsɩ lajaa k'a nyɔɔ bɩ minto, bala, kʋsɩ m, a paŋŋa n ta ʋ gʋta.

Malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ deem k'a nɩ laaga saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ n b'a zɔ, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr kʋ m hʋnhʋrlɛ niŋŋə kʋ jaandər gʋta bɩ n'a yɩm bɩ hɩnka ɩ m. Jaandər bɩ do, kʋ gʋta k'a nɩ bɔrkɔrɔ lɛ ra bɩ m.
Durnya cinno wɔɔ jaan da ma, durnyazannɔ n a jaandarɛ dɩvɛn mi an ŋ zɛ."
Ɛspri n gasʋ mɔɔ ʋ, malɛɛka bɩ n mɔɔ gaa, an ta mɔɔ m poohɔɔn ʋ. Bɩ, mɔɔ lʋ yɩ an nɩ nyɩntam hɔturma piin••• ra. Hɔturma bɩ mim saanhɩna, a mɩnnɔ bu. N n Woso sʋnsɔrɔ gʋrsɩra ba a mɛ bɩ ma.
Lʋ bɩ n huu piinə wɩsɩ du a ma, kan sarma mɔdrɔ kɩ, jaa tɔzannɔ kɩ, nyɛɛnnɔ kɩ da a ma. Sarma laaga n'a wɔ ʋ, hɔ bʋnyaa n a han: a jaandarɛ bɩ dintim m.
Tɔ k'a jɩ n dɔ n'a tusə ma: "Babɩlɔnnɩ gʋta, jaandənno kan durnya hɔɔ bʋnyaarɔ kɩ da."
Bɩ mɔɔ lʋ bɩ yɩ, an wosogʋɔɔ ma kan Yeezuu kasɛtɩzannɔ ma kɩ mi, an n'a zɛrɛ. Kʋ mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, mɔɔ n zɛ kədə.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Bɔ minto ɩbɩɩ n zɛ kədə? Mɔɔ lʋ bɩ kan hɔturma k'a da ʋ a minno saanhɩna, a mɩnnɔ bu bɩ jɩ k'a nyaakʋm da bɩ hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m.

Hɔturma k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ bɩ nyɩnta ʋ, b'a ba ʋ dɔ y. A bɔm yaa gʋta k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ b'ʋ an ta nyaanlɛ bɩncɛ ʋ. Bɩ durnyazannɔ kʋ ŋ n tɔ gʋrsɩra ba mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʋ hal durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zɛm kədə hɔturma bɩ yɩrɛ tɔ ma. Bala, a nyɩnta ʋ biisi, b'a ba ʋ dɔ y, b'a y'a bɔrɛ an bʋr.
Naa ʋ bɩ, mimpʋnɔ kan mindɔrɛ kɩ bɩncɛ m. Mim saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʋ, ciro saanhɩnarɔ kʋ lʋ bɩ nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ burə ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, cinno saanhɩnarɔ m sɔ.
Cinno soorlɔ wɔɔ cirbəə nya, a sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ gɔɔta an nɩ cirbəə ʋ, a saanhɩna hɔ bɩ n bʋr cɩna y, bɩ k'a bɩ bʋr, a bɩ maasɩrɛ barɛ y.
Hɔturma k'a nyɩnta ʋ, b'a ba ʋ dɔ bɩ, a mɩŋŋa m cir sinnyə hɔ. A nyɩnta cinno saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ barla, b'a ɩ tam nyaanlɛ bɩncɛ ʋ.
Mɩnnɔ buro k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ, cinno bu kʋ ŋ n cirbəə bɩ cɩna rɔ m. Bɩ, wakatɩ deem nɔ ʋ, ŋ yirm cirbəə ma ŋn'a bɩ kan hɔturma bɩ kɩ.
Cinno buro wɔɔ haay lɛ bɩ deem: Ŋ y'a paŋŋa kan a cirbəə kɩ sam, ŋn'ɩ zi bam hɔturma bɩ minto.
Ŋ yar bam kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ, bɩ sinnyɛɛm bɩ bʋrlɛ ŋ la. Bala, a m zuubarɔ haay Zuuba, cinno Cir. A kan a gʋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bʋrlɛ ŋ la. Gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ bir, n ŋ nyʋkɔ ʋ, a lɛsirezannɔ m."
Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Hiro k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ yɩ bɩncɛ kʋ jaandər bɩ n ta ʋ bɩ, do y'a hʋnhɔ m, gʋɔɔ ciiro m, tararɔ m kan leminno kɩ m.
Mɩnnɔ buro kan hɔturma bɩ kɩ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ sɔm lʋ jaandər bɩ m, ŋ hɔ k'an ta m yɔm nɩ, ŋn'a to dɩgɩ. Ŋ y'a nyasʋrɛ ŋn'a sʋ, ŋn'a mɩsɩ zar sɛ ʋ.
Bala, Woso hɔɔndarɛ da ŋ heer ʋ, hɔɔndarɛ deem ŋn'ɩ zi bam nɩ: kʋ ŋ n'a cirbəə bɩ sa ŋnɩ zi ba m hɔturma bɩ minto, k'an ta an Woso meerbaarɔ wɔɔ kʋyɩrɛ dɔmɩm ku.
Bɩ, lʋ k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ bɩ, kʋ gʋta k'a a so durnya cinno wɔɔ bɩ m."
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛka vanta yɩ an a to brama an nɩ zerm. Paŋŋa gʋta an ta m, a gure n tara bɔ a ʋ jilli.
A n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʋ: "A a da, Babɩlɔnnɩ gʋta b'a da. A a ba zinəro bɩncɛ. A tara b'a ba ɛspri bʋnyaarɔ haay bɩncɛ kɛɛrɛ. Bɛnnɔ bʋnyaarɔ do haay kʋ ŋ dɩgama sʋra ba ʋ rɔ bɩncɛ.
Bala, a a jaandarɛ waasɩ bɩ dɩvɛn kɩnka tararɔ haay ma. Durnya cinno jaan da ma, durnya terbənno n a ba arzakazannɔ a hɔnta paŋŋa minto."
Mɔɔ m ya, m leer vanta ma, an a to brama, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ gʋɔɔ wɔɔ, k'a bɔ kʋ naa do bire ʋ a mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ yaa zar da a ma, kʋsɩ k'a nɩ zɛm la bɩ yaa a ku.
Bala, a mimbʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ a sonso kʋ ra an ta an brama ku. Bɩ, Woso a zibəə bʋnyaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʋ.
K'a ba m sɔ, amba a a ba awɔɔ m bɩ m. Hɔ k'a ba awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a suutə gallɛm hɩɩya. Dɩvɛn k'a tɔ a laaga ʋ an a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ, k'a dɩvɛn k'a paŋŋa lɛ da a hɔ bɩ ra gallɛm hɩɩya bɩ tɔ nʋ.
K'a hʋnhʋrlɛ kan kʋsɩ kɩ k'a ka a mɩŋŋa ʋ tɔkama kan gʋɛrɛ kɩ m bɩ ka ʋ maam sɔ. A y'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʋ: Nyɩnta mɔɔ nawʋrɛ m cirbəə nɔ ʋ naa ʋ, zoro bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y, mɔɔ bɩ zɛheerzar dɔrɛ y.
Bɩ y'a ka, kʋsɩrɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ banka awɔɔ minto bɩ zɛm hindeem ʋ, an b'awɔɔ zɛ: zɛ, zɛheerzar, nɔ kɩ. Sɛ n n'a bɩm. Bala, Zuuba Woso k'a n'a dʋdɔ kam bɩ, paŋŋa gʋtazaa m."
Durnya cinno wɔɔ kʋ ŋ jaan da ma kan a hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ baa darɛ, ŋ y'a wʋnwʋrŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ bʋr ŋn'ɩ sɛ k'a n'a bɩm bɩ siŋŋə bɩ yɩm.
Ŋ jɩnɩm laatʋ, a hʋnhʋrlɛ bɩ nyibəə minto. Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Waay••• waay•••. Babɩlɔnnɩ tara gʋta ra, Babɩlɔnnɩ gʋta k'a paŋŋa n ta ʋ! Wakatɩ deem taan••• ɩbɩɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ bɔ ra?"
Bɩ durnya terbənno wɔɔ ɩ baa dam sɔ ŋn'a zɛnyi da ʋ, kʋ gɔsɩ bɩr ŋ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ sim dɔ bɩ minto.

Sarma kan wanzur kɩ, jaa tɔzannɔ kan nyɛɛnnɔ kɩ, pɛɛrarɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba pannɩ mɩŋŋɔɔ furo m kan pɛɛrarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ piinoo kɩ, sʋa kɩ, gɔ mɩŋŋa k'a ji n ta ʋ k'a yɩrɛ wer n ta ʋ kan mɔdrɔ do haay kʋ n y'a ba yɩbɩr sɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gɔrɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, zaan kan pɔyaa mɔdrɔ kɩ, jaa mɩŋŋɔɔ mɔdrɔ n nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Kanɛl kan dʋrɔ kɩ, tidəər, miir kan tidəər nyisi kɩ, dɩvɛn, nyɔɔ, nyisi kan ble kɩ, dono kan seero kɩ, sisiro kan tɛrkʋrɔ kɩ, lɔnnɔ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ gʋr yar ʋ rɔ kɩ.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, a ʋ: "Mɔdrɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋʋa k'ɩ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ nyaam ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ. Ɩbɩɩ arzaka bɩ haay kan ɩbɩɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ kɩ a zar, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩ ɩ yarɛ, ɩ ŋ yɩ fɩɩga y!"
Terbənno k'a ŋ ba arzakazannɔ terbarɛ naa do jɛ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm laatʋ a fɩryɩrɛ nyibəə minto. Ŋ baa darɛ ŋnɩ zɛnyi da ʋ,
ŋ ʋ: "Waay••• waay•••, bɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ ɩ kʋ gʋta yɩ! A pannɩ mɩŋŋa huu da a ra, kan pɛɛrarɔ piinoo mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ, sarma mɔdrɔ n a bɔ mɩŋŋa, jaa tɔzannɔ kɩ, nyɛɛnnɔ kɩ!

Wakatɩ deem taan••• ɩbɩɩ hʋnhʋrlɛ bɔ, k'ɩbɩɩ arzaka haay n a zar!" Kɔɔlʋʋ gʋtɔɔ kənno haay, gʋɔɔ haay kʋ ŋ nɩ zi bam higʋta burə ʋ bɩ zeezi, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ zi bam kɔɔlʋʋ gʋtɔɔ burə ʋ kɩ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a lɛhɔ yɩm higʋta zibəə minto rɔ wɔɔ kɩ jɩm laatʋ,
ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ a sɛ siŋŋə kʋ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ minto: "Kʋ kara ɩ nyɩnta an kʋ gʋta naa do ku?"

Ŋ taapuu gʋr, ŋn'a lore a mim la, ŋn'ɩ baa darɛ, ŋn'ɩ zɛnyi daŋ ʋ, ŋ ʋ: "Waay••• waay•••, bɔ hʋnhʋrlɛ ɩ kʋ gʋta yɩ! A arzaka minto y'a ka higʋta kɔɔlʋʋ zannɔ a ba arzakazannɔ haay. Wakatɩ deem taan••• nɔ ʋ a a do hɔ haay ma!"
Brama, ɩ heer nyɔɔ a darɛ minto! K'a heer nyɔɔ wosogʋɔɔ, kristazibəəzannɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ! Bala, Woso a dʋdɔ ka, k'a zibəə bʋnyaa ba awɔɔ m bɩ minto.

Malɛɛka paŋŋazaa deem jaa busu an bɔ kʋ ʋ kan jɛnlajaa gʋta kɩ, an a nyɔɔ an a da higʋta ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Kʋ gʋta Babɩlɔnnɩ bɩ busu n nawʋrɛ n n a da ncɩnaaʋ kan paŋŋa kɩ, bɩ n b'a yarɛ, n a yɩ fɩɩga y.

N b'a yarɛ, n n kɔnnɩzenno, kan hɔzenno kɩ leer ma ɩbɩɩ zi y. Hirhenno kan huurehenno kɩ leer b'a yarɛ, an bɔ ɩbɩɩ zi y. N b'a yarɛ n n zibəəsɩzaa yɩ ɩbɩɩ zi y. N b'a yarɛ n n jaalɔrɛ nyi ma ɩbɩɩ zi y.

Fɩtɩrɛ lɛɛgure b'a yarɛ an yɔ ɩbɩɩ zi fɩɩga y. N b'a yarɛ n n lʋdaa kan a zim kɩ leer ma ɩbɩɩ zi y. Ɩbɩɩ terbənno wɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta terbənno paŋŋazannɔ durnya naa nɔ ʋ, bɩ kan ɩbɩɩ ŋʋaar zibəəro wɔɔ kɩ, ɩbɩɩ bra ba gʋɔɔ wɔɔ m haay."
Babɩlɔnnɩ fɩr yɩ, bala, n wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ma kan wosogʋɔɔ kɩ ma, kan gʋɔɔ haay kʋ n yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ tara burə ʋ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ma yɩ tara naa do nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ gʋaa cir gʋta leer paŋŋazaa ma brama ʋ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "K'a Woso da ʋ! Bʋmbɔrɛ, kan cirbəə kɩ, paŋŋa gʋta kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ Woso hɔɔ m.
A dʋdɔkarɛrɔ mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ tɩrga. Bala, a jaandər gʋta bɩ dʋdɔ ka, k'a gʋɔɔ zar gʋta tara burə ʋ a jaandarɛ bɩ minto, n bɩ dʋdɔ ka. Woso hʋnhʋrlɛ ka ʋ an a zibəənyɩnɔ k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ zɩm bɔ ma."
Ŋ n a ya, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a Woso da ʋ! Bɩ kʋ gʋta bɩ sɛ siŋŋə bam bɩr derm dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ."
Bɩ, gʋɔɔgusinno buhɩra a yaa si rɔ wɔɔ kan hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ kɩ kukurə zɛ ŋnɩ Woso k'a nɩ nyɩntarɛ cirbəəduu ra bɩ da ʋ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Amina, Aleluya!"
Leer n a to cirbəəduu bɩ ra, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Awɔɔ haay k'an Woso zibəənyɩnɔ, awɔɔ k'a nɩ nyi bam nɩ, gʋɔɔ poorero kan gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kɩ, k'a wɔɔ Woso bɩ da ʋ!"
Mɔɔ m ya, m a ma ɩ ʋ, gʋaa cir gʋta leer m, ɩ ʋ, higʋta surle m, ɩ ʋ, bramahəənsire paŋŋazaa leer m. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "K'a Woso da ʋ! Bala, Zuuba, wɔɔ Woso paŋŋa k'a jire ba ʋ b'a cirbəə hɩnka.
Ʋ ʋ heer nyɔɔ k'ʋ saŋŋa ba, k'ʋ ʋ lɛ bɔ ʋ, bala, sinnyɛɛm bɩ lʋsarɛ cibsa m. A lʋ b'a banka,
ŋ zaa ka ʋ k'an huu fu k'a nɩ yɔm bɩ du a ma, a fu n ta ʋ." Bala, huu fu bɩ, wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ zibəə mɩŋŋɔɔ m.
Malɛɛka deem n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: A gʋrsɩra ba! Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ yɩ ŋ bir sinnyɛɛm lʋsarɛ hɔbɩrɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ m. A n a ya, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Woso mɩŋŋa leminno m.

Mɔɔ n kukurə zɛ a taa kʋ m a da ʋ, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: Ɩ b'a ka ɩ naa ba y. Ɩ zibəəkɔɔn m mɔɔ m, ɩbɩɩ kan ɩ danyɩnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ sɩra zi bam Yeezuu zuure nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Woso ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ da ʋ, bala, Yeezuu kasɛtɩ bɩ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn gum.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ brama yɩ an a gʋ: sisi fu n bɔ, gʋaa k'a da ʋ bɩ tɔ m, gʋaa paan••• sɩrazaa, dʋdɔ an n'a kam, an nɩ zoo bam kan tɩrgabaa kɩ.
A mɩnyaa bɩ, bɔ a kʋ ʋ kan sɛwurə kɩ. A mim la bɩ, cinno firgəro gʋta ta ma, n n tɔ k'a deem y'a dɔ bɩ ba a mɛ ma.
A n huu gʋta kʋ n y'a gɔrmɩ ma ʋ du a ma b'a tɔ m: 'Woso lemim'.
Brama yarbənno n da sisi furo ʋ, ŋnɩ huu furo kʋ ŋ fu n ta ʋ rɔ du a ma, ŋn'ɩ zure a jɛ ʋ.
Kargʋ lɛzaa nɩ bɔrɛ a lɛ ʋ k'a tararɔ zɛ m. A y'a sore ŋ ʋ kʋsɩ-kʋsɩ, b'a Woso k'a paŋŋa jire ba ʋ bɩ nɔmaa gʋta lom tara burə gʋɔɔ ra.
A huu gʋta burə kan a ganda burə kɩ ma, n tɔ gʋrsɩra ba ŋ ma ncɩnaaʋ: 'Cinno wɔɔ Cir, zuubarɔ wɔɔ Zuuba'.
Mɔɔ malɛɛka deem yɩ, an nɩ jɩnɩm wosogure nɔ ʋ. A n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ bɛnnɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ werm brama yaa ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʋ: "K'a bʋr, a a zɛ kʋ ra hɔbɩrɛ gʋta kʋ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʋ bɩ tɔ ma.

K'a bʋr a cinno mɛsim sʋ, kan yarbənno lɛɛzannɔ mɛsim kɩ, paŋŋazannɔ mɛsim kɩ, k'a sisiro sim sʋ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ darɛ ŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ mɛsim kɩ. K'a gʋɔɔ haay mɛsim sʋ, lɔnnɔ mɛsim kan soamɩŋŋaʋzannɔ mɛsim kɩ, gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ poorero mɛsim kɩ."
Bɩ, mɔɔ hɔturma bɩ yɩ, tararɔ cinno kan a yarbənno kɩ n a zɛ kʋ ra k'a yar ba kan gʋaa k'a da sisi b'ʋ bɩ kɩ, a yarbənno kɩ.

N hɔturma bɩ nyasʋ kan hɔdɔrɛŋʋaarzaa bɩ kɩ. A ɩ hoserlo ba hɔturma bɩ mɩm ʋ bɩ. A ɩ hoserlo ba an bra ba gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ hɔturma bɩ makra yɩ, ŋn'a bɔkʋrɛ bɩ daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m. N yɩ ŋ hɩɩya haay zar sɛ haarɛ gʋta kʋ kidibir sɛ nɩ bɩŋ ʋ b'ʋ hɩɩya haay mɩsɩr.
Kargʋ k'a nɩ bɔm gʋaa k'a da sisi ʋ bɩ lɛ ʋ bɩ bɔ ɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, bɛnnɔ haay nɩ ŋ sinno bɩ, an ŋ ka.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛka deem yɩ an a to brama an nɩ zerm. A n nɩ yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ bɩ lɛ nyɩ m, kan baŋŋa gandaa kɩ a wɔ ʋ.
A mɩnda gʋta bɩ nyasʋ, mɩm gusire bɩ, n n'a birm minkagʋaarazaa gɛɛ Sʋtaana bɩ, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʋ, jɩm bɩ, an a sur dɔɔraa tisi minto.

A n a nyɔɔ an a da yaa gandaa k'a nɔ tɛkka ba ʋ b'ʋ, an a lɛ bɩ ta, an a nyɩ da ʋ, an a naasʋ, k'a b'a da ma dʋntɔ, an bra ba tararɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, kʋ dɔɔraa tisi bɩ n ta an a ku. Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, a a ga m, kʋ n n wɔ saa ma dɔmɩm poore minto.

Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ cirbəəduuro yɩ. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ la rɔ wɔɔ, n paŋŋa ka ŋ ʋ kʋ ŋ nɩ gʋɔɔ dʋdɔ ka. Mɔɔ gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ mim gʋngʋ ma Yeezuu kasɛtɩ karɛ kan Woso lemim kɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ nyiro yɩ sɔ, kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n hɔturma bɩ gɛɛ a bɔkʋrɛ bɩ kɩ da ʋ, bɩ ŋ n makra yɩ a tusə ma gɛɛ a wɔ kɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyiro kɩ sɔ. Ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʋ, ŋnɩ bɩ cirbəə bɩ dɔɔraa tisi nɔ ʋ kan Krista kɩ.
Gəəno gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ b'a bɔrɛ ŋnɩ bʋr mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʋ kʋ dɔɔraa tisi bɩ n a ku y. Lɛɛkarɛ mɩmbɔʋrɛ m bɩ.
Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛkarɛ mɩmbɔʋrɛ bɩ nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m, wosogʋɔɔ m sɔ. Zɛ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ paŋŋa ba ŋ zi y. Ŋ nyɩntam Woso kan Krista kɩ mannɩbənno. Ŋ cirbəə bɩm kan kɩ dɔɔraa tisi bɩ nɔ ʋ.
Kʋ dɔɔraa tisi b'a ku, n Sʋtaana bɔrɛ a dujɩ ʋ b'ʋ.
Bɩ, a tarɛ an aa bra ba tararɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ durnya gʋrga siro wɔɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ m, Gɔg kan Magɔg kɩ m. A yɩ ŋ som kʋ ma yar bɩ barɛ minto. Ŋ lɛ gʋtabaa do m higʋta nyɩntaayaa m.
Ba ŋ y'a kərgu durnya burə ʋ jilli, ŋnɩ bɩr wosogʋɔɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ bɩ ma kan kʋ kʋ Woso a ŋʋa bɩ kɩ ma na. Bɩ, sɛ a to brama, an ŋ bɩ.

Bɩ, minkagʋaarazaa k'a nɩ bra barɛ ŋ nɩ bɩ, n y'a nyɔɔ, n n a da sɛ haarɛ kʋ kidibir sɛ nɩ bɩŋ ʋ b'ʋ, hɔturma bɩ kan hɔdɔrɛŋʋaarzaa bɩ kɩ zi. Ŋ fɩr yɩm b'ʋ gʋta sinuu ʋ kan a gunuu ʋ kɩ, dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ cirbəəduu gʋta yɩ fu, a zaa nɩ nyɩntam la. Brama kan tara kɩ n nyaam a lɛɛ fɩɩgaa.

Mɔɔ gəəno yɩ sɔ, gʋɔɔ gʋtɔɔ kan gʋɔɔ poorero kɩ, ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm cirbəəduu bɩ lɛ ʋ. N n ciro gʋngʋ, n n a ya, n nɩ ci vanta gʋ: mɩsɩrbaa ci bɩ. N n gəəno wɔɔ dʋdɔ yar an a gakʋ ʋ ba kan ŋ zibəəro kɩ, amba n y'a gʋrsɩra ba ciro wɔɔ nɔ ʋ bɩ m.
Higʋta, zɛ kan gəənokʋ kɩ a gəəno bɔ a rɛ. Ŋ gʋaa biyəə dʋdɔ ka an a gakʋ ʋ ba kan a zibəə kɩ.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, n zɛ kan gəənokʋ kɩ nyɔɔta n nɩ ŋ da sɛ haarɛ b'ʋ. Sɛ haarɛ bɩ do m zɛ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ.
Gʋaa kʋ n n'a tɔ yɩ mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʋ bɩ, bɩ n y'a nyɔɔta, n n a da sɛ haarɛ b'ʋ.
Bɩ jɛ ʋ bɩ, mɔɔ brama daa yɩ kan tara daa kɩ. Bala, lɛɛkarɛ brama bɩ kan lɛɛkarɛ tara bɩ kɩ nyaam, bɩ higʋta bɩ ba ʋ dɔ y.
Mɔɔ kʋ mɩŋŋa bɩ yɩ, Zerizalɛm daa bɩ. Mɔɔ yɩ, an a to brama Woso zi an nɩ zerm. A n a banka am lʋ daa k'a gar ba a zim minto bɩ hɔ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ leer paŋŋazaa ma an a to cirbəəduu bɩ zeezi, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Ba Woso a har cɩnta gʋɔɔ bireyaa ʋ na. A gɔɔtam kan ŋ kɩ. Ŋ nyɩntarɛ a gʋɔɔ, a mɩŋŋa n nyɩnta ŋ Woso, an bɩr kan ŋ kɩ.
A yɩ ŋ nyifeer do haay gʋngʋm ma. Zɛ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ y. Heerzar bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ kan zee kɩ, fɩr kɩ y. Bala, durnya gusire bɩ cem."
Bɔ n nɩ nyɩntam cirbəəduu ra bɩ n a hɩ, a ʋ: "Kɛɛrɛ naa hɔ haay daarɔ mɔɔ n nɩ ŋ bam." A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʋ: "A gʋrsɩra ba: Meerbaa paan•••rɔ m nawɔnnɔ, n a ga m, n ŋ si sɩra m sɔ."
A n a ya, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Hɔ haay nya. Mɔɔ m lɛɛkarɛzaa, mɔɔ m jɛzaa. Mɔɔ n'a sɩŋŋɩda, mɔɔ n'a nyarɛ. Gʋaa kʋ mɩsɩ n'a zɛrɛ, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa himinyaa hi kaŋ ʋ, an a mi vam.
Damazaa bɩ ganwʋrɛ naa do yɩm, mɔɔ nyɩntarɛ a Woso, a m nyɩnta mɔɔ nyɩ.

Kʋ nyibəəzannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, sɩrakarɛwarzannɔ wɔɔ, dintinzannɔ wɔɔ, gərzenno wɔɔ, jaandənno, nyɩsɩzannɔ wɔɔ, gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ wosoro bawɔnnɔ daŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kan ŋʋaarzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, ŋ hɔjirlehɔ ɩ sɛ haarɛ kan kidibir sɛ kɩ nɔ ʋ. Zɛ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ m bɩ."
Malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ laaga saanhɩnarɔ kʋ kʋsɩ jɛzannɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ a hɩnhan rɔ wɔɔ deem bʋr, an b'a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Bʋr kʋ m lʋdaa k'a m sinnyɛɛm bɩ lʋ bɩ hɩnka ɩ m."
Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer mɔɔ ra, malɛɛka bɩ n mɔɔ gaa an ta mɔɔ m ci gandaa k'a nɩ mim ʋ nɩʋʋ••• b'ʋ, an kʋ mɩŋŋa Zerizalɛm, k'a a to Woso zi brama an nɩ zerm bɩ hɩnka mɔɔ m.
A n nɩ yɔm Woso mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʋrɛ nɔ ʋ. A yɔrɛ bɩ bɔ kʋ ʋ kan jaa tɔzaa yɔrɛ kɩ, an nɩ yɔrɛ ɩ ʋ jaa kʋ n n'a birm zaspɩ bɩ m.
A pəŋŋə bɩ nyɩnta jintə brama, a dəu n ta ʋ. A lɛrɔ bueerehɩɩya. Malɛɛka bueerehɩɩyɔɔ nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma. N n Israyɛl paryaa bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ bɩmba cɛlɛrɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ ma.
Dɔjɩr ʋ cɛlɛ kaakʋ, meer ʋ cɛlɛ kaakʋ, jɩsadɔpaasɩ ma cɛlɛ kaakʋ bɩsɩdɔpaasɩ ma cɛlɛ kaakʋ.
Kʋ bɩ pəŋŋə bɩ jɩr jaa bueerehɩɩya, n sinnyɛɛm bɩ zibəəzannɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ gʋrsɩra bɩmba jaarɔ wɔɔ ma.
Malɛɛka k'a nɩ meer bam kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ nɩ makra ba hɔ m a wɔ ʋ, sarma bənkə m, k'a kʋ bɩ kan a cɛlɛrɔ, a pəŋŋəro kɩ makra ba m.
Kʋnɔ bɩ pəŋŋə bɩ gʋrga si, b'a jintəbaa kan a hɛ kɩ hɔdeem. Malɛɛka bɩ kʋ bɩ makra ba a bənkə bɩ m. A jintəbaa bɩ cilomɛtɩr tisi hɩɩya kan a zɔɔhɩra kɩ. A hɛ kan a jintəbaa burə kɩ hɔdeem sɔ.
Malɛɛka bɩ n pəŋŋə bɩ makra ba. A jintəbaa burə bɩ mɛtɩr busaanhɩna a yaa hɩɩya. Makra bɩ ba a ʋ gʋɔɔ makra barɛ m.
Pəŋŋə bɩ dɔ n y'a ʋ jaa kʋ n n'a birm zaspɩ bɩ m. Kʋ bɩ mɩŋŋa dɔ n y'a ʋ sarma paan••• m, an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʋ jaa pɛkʋ-pɛkʋda fɩrr••• m.
Kʋnɔ bɩ pəŋŋə bɩ jɩr banka n y'a ʋ jaa tɔzaa do haay m. A jɩr bɩ lɛɛkarɛ jaa bɩ, zaspɩ m, a hɩɩya hɔ bɩ, safɩɩr, a kaakʋ hɔ bɩ, agatɩ, a si hɔ bɩ, emerodɩ,

a soor hɔ bɩ, oniksi, a sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ, sardʋannɩ, a saanhɩna hɔ bɩ, krizolitɩ, a sinnyə hɔ bɩ, beril, a nɛɛhʋ hɔ bɩ, topaazɩ, a bu hɔ bɩ, krizopraazɩ, a bueeredeem hɔ bɩ, tɩrkʋaazɩ, a bueerehɩɩya hɔ bɩ, ametistɩ m.
Cɛlɛ bueerehɩɩya rɔ wɔɔ nyɛɛnyaa bueerehɩɩyɔɔ m. Cɛlɛ biyəə bɩ ba n y'a ʋ nyɛɛnyaa deem m. Kʋ bɩ bire ma bɩ, sarma n y'a wʋta ra, an nɩ yɔrɛ am jaa pɛkʋ-pɛkʋda hɔ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ n Wosocɛ yɩ kʋ bɩ do nɔ ʋ fɩɩga y, bala, a Wosocɛ bɩ m Zuuba Woso k'a paŋŋa jire ba ʋ bɩ m, kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ m.
Kʋ bɩ bɩr a kam wosogure ma, a bɩr a kam mom gure ma sɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ gu a nɩ y. Bala, Woso lɛbɔʋrɛ bɩ nɩ guŋ ʋ, a sinnyɛɛm bɩ m fɩtɩrɛ.
Tararɔ tarɛ a lɛɛgure bɩ nɔ ʋ, durnya cinno zɛrɛ a arzakarɔ m.
N bɩ kʋ bɩ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ tɩntam sinuu ʋ fɩɩga y, bɩncɛ bɩ do ʋ gunuu bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ y.
N zɛm tararɔ arzaka m kan a daʋrɛ kɩ m kʋ b'ʋ.
Bɩ dintim sɩ bɩ gasʋm kʋ bɩ do ʋ y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ dintim zi bam kan ŋʋaar kɩ rɔ wɔɔ bɩ gasʋŋ ʋ sɔ y. Gʋɔɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ tɔ gʋrsɩra ba sinnyɛɛm bɩ mɩsɩrbaa ci ʋ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ bala n nɩ gasʋŋ ʋ bala.
Malɛɛka b'a ya, an mɩsɩrbaa kɔyaa hi hɩnka mɔɔ m, an nɩ yɔm am jaa kristal hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ bɔm Woso cirbəəduu kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ bɩncɛ ʋ.
Hi bɩ nɩ bram kʋ bɩ bire ʋ. Kɔyaa bɩ gəm biyəə ra bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa gɔ nɩ b'ʋ, an nɩ nyɩ dam gallɛm bueerehɩɩya dɔɔraa deem nɔ ʋ. Mom biyəə, a ɩ nyɩ dam. A lɛɛ bɩ, yaaba nyɩsɩ m tararɔ minto.
Ler kʋsɩ bɔrɛ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ y. Woso kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ cirbəəduu nyɩntam kʋ b'ʋ, a zibəənyɩnɔ y'a daŋ ʋ.
Ŋ y'a meer yɩrɛ, bɩ, a tɔ nyɩntarɛ ŋ tusə ma.
Gunuu bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʋ dɔ y. Gɔsɩ b'a kam fɩtɩrɛ lɛɛgure ma gɛɛ woso gure ma dɔ y. Bala, Zuuba Woso y'a lɛɛgure kərgure ŋ la. Bɩ ŋ cirbəə bɩm dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʋ nɔ ʋ.

Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Meerbaarɔ paan•••rɔ n'awɔɔ m, n a ga m, n ŋ si sɩra m sɔ. Woso k'a m Zuuba, k'a n'a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ hɔɔn gum Sɛnt-Ɛspri m bɩ, a malɛɛka nyɔɔ k'an hɔ k'a nɩ zɛrɛ an a zɔ bɩ hɩnka a zibəənyɩnɔ m."
Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʋ: "Mɔɔ zɛm dɩɩtaa. Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʋaa k'a nɩ ci naa do meerbaarɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ Woso hɔɔnhɔ hɩnkam sim an nɩ zuŋ ʋ bɩ m."
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zaan hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ma, m ŋ yɩ sɔ. Kʋ mɔɔ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ma, m ŋ yɩ sɔ bɩ, mɔɔ kukurə zɛ malɛɛka k'an ŋ hɩnka mɔɔ m bɩ taa.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ b'a ka ɩ naa ba y. Ɩ zibəəkɔɔn n mɔɔ m kan ɩbɩɩ danyɩnɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kan gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ nɩ ci naa do meerbaarɔ sim ŋn'ɩ zuŋ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Woso ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m ɩ da ʋ."
A n a ya, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʋ: "Ɩ bɩ ci naa do wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaarɔ to ɩ nɔ ʋ y, bala, dɔmɩm b'a zɔ.
Kʋ gʋaa bʋnyaa n gɔɔta an bɩr a bʋnyaa bam, kʋ dintinzaa n gɔɔta, an bɩr a dintim zi bam. Kʋ sɩrazaa n gɔɔta an bɩr a sɩra ra, kʋ gʋaa mɩŋŋa n bɩr a mɩŋŋabaa dam la."
"K'a tʋr ka, mɔɔ zɛm dɩɩtaa. Bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ zɛrɛ m ganwʋrɛ m, m n'a kam gʋaa biyəə ʋ, amba a a ga a zibəə m.
Mɔɔ m Alfa, mɔɔ m Omega. Mɔɔ m lɛɛkarɛzaa, mɔɔ m jɛzaa. Mɔɔ n'a sɩŋŋɩda, mɔɔ n'a nyarɛ."
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʋɔɔ kʋ ŋ n'a huuro sʋrgɔm k'a b'a da ma a zaa yɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa gɔ bɩ nyɩ bɩ, k'a b'a da ma, a gasʋ kʋ b'ʋ a cɛlɛrɔ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ jino, wɔkunno kan jaandənno kɩ, gerzenno kan wosoro ba a wɔ m nɔ daʋrɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan gʋaa k'a ŋʋaar ŋʋa gɛɛ an n'a zi bam bɩ kɩ, brɔɔ haay gɔɔtam garga ra.
"Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa, Yeezuu, m malɛɛka bɩ nyɔɔ mɔɔ ʋ k'an bɩ kasɛtɩ naa do ka mɔɔ gʋɔɔ sokʋmarɔ wɔɔ ʋ. Davɩd yaŋŋa m mɔɔ m. Dɔgta Monyaa k'a nɩ yɔm bɩ m mɔɔ m."
Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan lʋdaa bɩ kɩ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʋ: "Bʋr!" Kʋ gʋaa k'a n'a mam bɩ na hɩ, a ʋ: "Bʋr!" Kʋ gʋaa kʋ mɩsɩ n'a zɛm bɩ n bʋr! Kʋ gʋaa k'a lɛ n taa mɩsɩrbaa hi ma bɩ n a yɩ vam!

Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zaan, awɔɔ haay k'a n'a tʋr kam wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ma ci naa do nɔ ʋ bɩ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʋ: Kʋ gʋaa hɔ zu hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ bɩ ra, Woso kʋsɩrɔ kʋ n yɩ ŋ gaa da ci naa do nɔ ʋ rɔ wɔɔ zure a zaa m la.
Bɩ kʋ gʋaa hɔ bɔ hɔ kʋ Woso a hɩ ci naa do nɔ ʋ b'ʋ, Woso mɩsɩrbaa gɔ bɩ, kan kʋ mɩŋŋa kʋ n yɩ ŋ hɩnka ci naa do ʋ kɩ bɩ, hɔjirle k'a zaa n n'a yɩm bɩ yɔm nɩ.
Gʋaa k'a nɩ naa haay kasɛtɩ kam bɩ n'a hɩrɛ, a ʋ: "Denter m, Mɔɔ zɛm dɩɩtaa." Amina, Zuuba Yeezuu, bʋr!
Kʋ Zuuba Yeezuu barka n nyɩnta awɔɔ haay mim ʋ.
